atk-s0508a2:12_0: Alaṅkatātiādikā āyasmato nāgasamālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:12_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gimhasamaye sūriyātapasantattāya
atk-s0508a2:12_2: bhūmiyā gacchantaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso chattaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a2:12_3: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā nāgasamāloti
atk-s0508a2:12_4: laddhanāmo vayappatto ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kiñci kālaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:12_5: upaṭṭhāko ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ aññataraṃ
atk-s0508a2:12_6: naccakiṃ mahāpathe tūriyesu vajjantesu naccantiṃ disvā, “ayaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena
atk-s0508a2:12_7: karajakāyassa tathā tathā parivatti, aho aniccā saṅkhārā”ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:12_8: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:16: Tattha disvāna sambuddhaṃ, vitti me upapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:27: “Ayaṃ me pacchimā jāti, carimo vattate bhavo;
atk-s0508a2:35: Majjhe mahāpathe nārī, tūriye naccati naṭṭakī.
atk-s0508a2:44: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:45: Catūhi gāthāhi attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:46_0: Tattha alaṅkatāti hatthūpagādiābharaṇehi alaṅkatagattā. Suvasanāti sundaravasanā
atk-s0508a2:46_2: candanānulepalittasarīrā. Majjhe mahāpathe nārī, tūriye naccati naṭṭakīti yathāvuttaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:46_3: ekā nārī naṭṭakī nāṭakitthī nagaravīthiyā majjhe pañcaṅgike tūriye vajjante naccati,
atk-s0508a2:47_0: Piṇḍikāyāti bhikkhāya. Paviṭṭhohanti nagaraṃ paviṭṭho ahaṃ. Gacchanto naṃ udikkhisanti
atk-s0508a2:47_1: nagaravīthiyaṃ gacchanto parissayapariharaṇatthaṃ vīthiṃ olokento taṃ naṭṭakiṃ olokesiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:47_2: Kiṃ viya? Maccupāsaṃva oḍḍitanti yathā maccussa maccurājassa pāsabhūto rūpādiko oḍḍito
atk-s0508a2:47_3: loke anuvicaritvā ṭhito ekaṃsena sattānaṃ anatthāvaho, evaṃ sāpi appaṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:48_0: Tatoti tasmā maccupāsasadisattā. Meti mayhaṃ. Manasīkāro yoniso udapajjathāti “ayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:48_1: aṭṭhisaṅghāto nhārusambandho maṃsena anupalitto chaviyā paṭicchanno asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlo
atk-s0508a2:48_3: manasikāro uppajji. Ādīnavo pāturahūti evaṃ kāyassa sabhāvūpadhāraṇamukhena tassa
atk-s0508a2:48_4: ca taṃnissitānañca cittacetasikānaṃ udayabbayaṃ sarasapabhaṅgutañca manasi karoto
atk-s0508a2:48_5: tesu ca yakkharakkhasādīsu viya bhayato upaṭṭhahantesu tattha me anekākāraādīnavo
atk-s0508a2:48_6: doso pāturahosi. Tappaṭipakkhato ca nibbāne ānisaṃso. Nibbidā samatiṭṭhathāti nibbindanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:48_7: ādīnavānupassanānubhāvasiddhaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ mama hadaye saṇṭhāsi, muhuttampi tesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:48_8: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ gahaṇe cittaṃ nāhosi, aññadatthu muñcitukāmatādivasena tattha udāsīnameva jātanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:49_0: Tatoti vipassanāñāṇato paraṃ. Cittaṃ vimucci meti lokuttarabhāvanāya vattamānāya
atk-s0508a2:49_1: maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilesehi mama cittaṃ vimuttaṃ ahosi. Etena phaluppattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:49_2: Maggakkhaṇe hi kilesā vimuccanti nāma, phalakkhaṇe vimuttāti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:52_0: Ahaṃ middhenātiādikā āyasmato bhaguttherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:52_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuyo
atk-s0508a2:52_2: pupphehi pūjesi. So tena puññakammena nimmānaratīsu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:52_3: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā bhagūti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:52_4: anuruddhakimilehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā bālakaloṇakagāme vasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:52_5: thinamiddhābhibhavaṃ vinodetuṃ vihārato nikkhamma caṅkamaṃ abhiruhanto papatitvā
atk-s0508a2:52_6: tadeva aṅkusaṃ katvā thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:58: Saṃsarāmi manusse ce, rājā homi mahāyaso.
atk-s0508a2:66_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmento satthārā ekavihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:66_1: anumodituṃ upagatena – “kacci tvaṃ, bhikkhu, appamatto viharasī”ti puṭṭho attano
atk-s0508a2:78: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:80_0: Tattha middhena pakatoti kāyālasiyasaṅkhātena asattivighātasabhāvena middhena abhibhūto.
atk-s0508a2:80_1: Vihārāti senāsanato. Upanikkhaminti caṅkamituṃ nikkhamiṃ. Tattheva papatiṃ chamāti
atk-s0508a2:80_2: tattheva caṅkamasopāne niddābhibhūtatāya bhūmiyaṃ nipatiṃ. Gattāni parimajjitvāti
atk-s0508a2:80_3: bhūmiyaṃ patanena paṃsukitāni attano sarīrāvayavāni anumajjitvā. Punapāruyha caṅkamanti
atk-s0508a2:80_4: “patito dānāha”nti saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā punapi caṅkamaṭṭhānaṃ āruhitvā. Ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:80_5: susamāhitoti gocarajjhatte kammaṭṭhāne nīvaraṇavikkhambhanena suṭṭhu samāhito ekaggacitto
atk-s0508a2:80_6: hutvā caṅkaminti yojanā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:83_0: Pare cātiādikā āyasmato sabhiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:83_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:83_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ divāvihārāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:83_3: upāhanaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassape bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0508a2:83_4: patiṭṭhite suvaṇṇacetiye chahi kulaputtehi saddhiṃ attasattamo sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:83_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto itare āha – “mayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:83_6: piṇḍapātāya gacchanto jīvite sāpekkhā homa, jīvite sāpekkhena ca na sakkā lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:83_7: adhigantuṃ, puthujjanakālaṅkiriyā ca dukkhā. Handa, mayaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ
atk-s0508a2:83_8: abhiruyha kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā samaṇadhammaṃ karomā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:84_0: Atha nesaṃ mahāthero upanissayasampannattā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño hutvā uttarakuruto
atk-s0508a2:84_1: piṇḍapātaṃ upanesi. Itare – “tumhe, bhante, katakiccā tumhehi saddhiṃ sallāpamattampi
atk-s0508a2:84_2: papañco, samaṇadhammameva mayaṃ karissāma, tumhe attanā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuñjathā”ti
atk-s0508a2:84_3: vatvā piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipiṃsu. Thero ne sampaṭicchāpetuṃ asakkonto agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:85_0: Tato nesaṃ eko dvīhatīhaccayena abhiññāparivāraṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikatvā tatheva
atk-s0508a2:85_1: vatvā tehi paṭikkhitto agamāsi. Tesu khīṇāsavatthero parinibbāyi, anāgāmī suddhāvāsesu
atk-s0508a2:85_2: uppajji. Itare puthujjanakālaṅkiriyameva katvā chasu kāmasaggesu anulomapaṭilomato
atk-s0508a2:85_3: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokā cavitvā eko mallarājakule
atk-s0508a2:85_4: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, eko gandhārarājakule, eko bāhiraraṭṭhe, eko rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya
atk-s0508a2:85_5: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Itaro aññatarissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:85_6: aggahesi. Sā kira aññatarassa khattiyassa dhītā, naṃ mātāpitaro – “amhākaṃ dhītā
atk-s0508a2:85_7: samayantaraṃ jānātū”ti ekassa paribbājakassa niyyādayiṃsu. Atheko paribbājako tāya
atk-s0508a2:85_8: saddhiṃ vippaṭipajji. Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. Taṃ gabbhiniṃ disvā paribbājakā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:85_9: Sā aññattha gacchantī antarāmagge sabhāyaṃ vijāyi. Tenassa sabhiyotveva nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:85_10: So vaḍḍhitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā nānāsatthāni uggahetvā mahāvādī hutvā
atk-s0508a2:85_11: vādappasuto vicaranto attanā sadisaṃ adisvā nagaradvāre assamaṃ kāretvā khattiyakumārādayo
atk-s0508a2:85_12: sippaṃ sikkhāpento viharanto attano mātuyā itthibhāvaṃ jigucchitvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0508a2:85_13: brahmaloke uppannāya abhisaṅkharitvā dinne vīsatipañhe gahetvā te te samaṇabrāhmaṇe
atk-s0508a2:85_14: pucchi. Te cassa tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthaṃ byākātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Sabhiyasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:85_15: pana “suddhāvāsabrahmā te pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā adāsī”ti āgataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:86_0: Yadā pana bhagavā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā veḷuvane vihāsi,
atk-s0508a2:86_1: tadā sabhiyo tattha gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā te pañhe pucchi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0508a2:86_2: te pañhe byākāsīti sabbaṃ sabhiyasutte āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. Sabhiyo pana bhagavatā
atk-s0508a2:86_3: tesu pañhesu byākatesu paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:92: Arahā pana hutvā devadatte saṅghabhedāya parakkamante devadattapakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a2:95: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
atk-s0508a2:98: Vijānanti ca ye dhammaṃ, āturesu anāturā.
atk-s0508a2:100: “Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhañca yaṃ vataṃ;
atk-s0508a2:101: Saṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ, na taṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:104: Ārakā hoti saddhammā, nabhaṃ puthaviyā yathā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:106_0: Tattha pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe – “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti “dhammaṃ adhammo”tiādibhedakaravatthudīpanavasena
atk-s0508a2:106_1: vivādappasutā pare nāma. Te tattha vivādaṃ karontā “mayaṃ yamāmase uparamāma nassāma
atk-s0508a2:106_2: satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā”ti na jānanti. Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye
atk-s0508a2:106_3: tattha paṇḍitā – “mayaṃ maccusamīpaṃ gacchāmā”ti vijānanti. Tato sammanti medhagāti
atk-s0508a2:106_4: evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0508a2:106_5: Atha nesaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā te medhagā sammanti. Atha vā pare cāti ye satthu ovādānusāsaniyā
atk-s0508a2:106_6: aggahaṇena sāsanato bāhiratāya pare, te yāva “mayaṃ micchāgāhaṃ gahetvā ettha idha
atk-s0508a2:106_7: loke sāsanassa paṭiniggāhena yamāmase vāyamāmā”ti na vijānanti, tāva vivādā na vūpasammanti,
atk-s0508a2:106_8: yadā pana tassa gāhassa vissajjanavasena ye ca tattha tesu vivādappasutesu adhammadhammādike
atk-s0508a2:106_9: adhammadhammādito yathābhūtaṃ vijānanti, tato tesaṃ santikā te paṇḍitapurise nissāya
atk-s0508a2:106_10: vivādasaṅkhātā medhagā sammantīti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:107_0: Yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Avijānantāti vivādassa vūpasamūpāyaṃ, dhammādhamme vā yāthāvato
atk-s0508a2:107_1: ajānantā. Iriyantyamarā viyāti amarā viya jarāmaraṇaṃ atikkantā viya uddhatā unnaḷā
atk-s0508a2:107_2: capalā mukharā vippakiṇṇavācā hutvā vattanti caranti vicaranti tadā vivādo na vūpasammateva.
atk-s0508a2:107_3: Vijānanti ca ye dhammaṃ, āturesu anāturāti ye pana satthu sāsanadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:107_4: jānanti, te kilesarogena āturesu sattesu anāturā nikkilesā anīghā viharanti, tesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:108_0: Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammanti oliyitvā karaṇena sithilagāhaṃ katvā sāthalibhāvena kataṃ
atk-s0508a2:108_1: yaṃ kiñci kusalakammaṃ. Saṃkiliṭṭhanti vesīādike agocare caraṇena, kuhanādimicchājīvena
atk-s0508a2:108_2: vā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vatasamādānaṃ. Saṅkassaranti saṅkāhi saritabbaṃ, vihāre kiñci asāruppaṃ
atk-s0508a2:108_3: sutvā – “nūna asukena kata”nti parehi asaṅkitabbaṃ, uposathakiccādīsu aññatarakiccavasena
atk-s0508a2:108_4: sannipatitampi saṅghaṃ disvā, “addhā ime mama cariyaṃ ñatvā maṃ ukkhipitukāmā sannipatitā”ti
atk-s0508a2:108_5: evaṃ attano vā āsaṅkāhi saritaṃ usaṅkitaṃ parisaṅkitaṃ. Na taṃ hotīti taṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:108_6: brahmacariyaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ tassa puggalassa mahapphalaṃ na hoti. Tassa amahapphalabhāveneva
atk-s0508a2:108_7: paccayadāyakānampissa na mahapphalaṃ hoti. Tasmā sallekhavuttinā bhavitabbaṃ. Sallekhavuttino
atk-s0508a2:108_8: ca vivādassa avasaro eva natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:109_0: Gāravo nūpalabbhatīti anusāsaniyā apadakkhiṇaggāhibhāvena garukātabbesu sabrahmacārīsu
atk-s0508a2:109_1: yassa puggalassa gāravo garukaraṇaṃ na vijjati. Ārakā hoti saddhammāti so evarūpo
atk-s0508a2:109_2: puggalo paṭipattisaddhammatopi paṭivedhasaddhammatopi dūre hoti, na hi taṃ garū sikkhāpenti,
atk-s0508a2:109_3: asikkhiyamāno anādiyanto na paṭipajjati, appaṭipajjanto kuto saccāni paṭivijjhissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:109_4: Tenāha – “ārakā hoti saddhammā”ti. Yathā kiṃ? “Nabhaṃ puthaviyā yathā”ti yathā nabhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:109_5: ākāsaṃ puthaviyā pathavīdhātuyā sabhāvato dūre. Na kadāci sammissabhāvo. Tenevāha –
atk-s0508a2:110: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0508a2:111: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti.;
atk-s0508a2:114_0: Dhiratthūtiādikā āyasmato nandakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:114_1: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0508a2:114_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:114_3: patthetvā satasahassagghanikena vatthena bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā paṇidhānamakāsi, satthu
atk-s0508a2:114_4: bodhirukkhe padīpapūjañca pavatteti. So tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu saṃsaranto kakusandhassa
atk-s0508a2:114_5: bhagavato kāle karavikasakuṇo hutvā madhurakūjitaṃ kūjanto satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:114_6: akāsi. Aparabhāge mayūro hutvā aññatarassa paccekabuddhassa vasanaguhāya dvāre pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:114_7: divase divase tikkhattuṃ madhuravassitaṃ vassi, evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā
atk-s0508a2:114_8: amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā nandakoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:114_9: satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:120_0: Arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhena vītināmento satthārā bhikkhunīnaṃ ovāde āṇatto ekasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:120_1: uposathadivase pañca bhikkhunisatāni ekovādeneva arahattaṃ pāpesi. Tena naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:120_2: bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Athekadivasaṃ theraṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:120_3: aññatarā purāṇadutiyikā itthī kilesavasena oloketvā hasi. Thero tassā taṃ kiriyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:123: Navasotāni te kāye, yāni sandanti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a2:126: Saggepi te na rajjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mānuse.
atk-s0508a2:128: “Ye ca kho bālā dummedhā, dummantī mohapārutā;
atk-s0508a2:131: “Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
atk-s0508a2:132: Tādī tattha na rajjanti, chinnasuttā abandhanā”ti. – gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:133_0: Tattha dhīti jigucchanatthe nipāto, ratthūti ra-kāro padasandhikaro, dhī atthu taṃ
atk-s0508a2:133_1: jigucchāmi tava dhikkāro hotūti attho. Pūretiādīni tassā dhikkātabbabhāvadīpanāni
atk-s0508a2:133_2: āmantanavacanāni. Pūreti ativiya jegucchehi nānākuṇapehi nānāvidhaasucīhi sampuṇṇe.
atk-s0508a2:133_3: Duggandheti kuṇapapūritattā eva sabhāvaduggandhe. Mārapakkheti yasmā visabhāgavatthu
atk-s0508a2:133_5: ca otāraṃ paviṭṭhaṃ deti. Tasmā mārassa pakkho hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “mārapakkhe”ti.
atk-s0508a2:133_6: Avassuteti sabbakālaṃ kilesāvassavanena tahiṃ tahiṃ asucinissandanena ca avassute.
atk-s0508a2:133_7: Idānissā navasotāni te kāye, yāni sandanti sabbadāti “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:134_0: Evaṃ pana navachiddaṃ dhuvassavaṃ asucibharitaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānantī mā purāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:134_1: amaññitthoti purāṇaṃ ajānanakāle pavattaṃ hasitalapitaṃ kīḷitaṃ mā maññi, “idānipi
atk-s0508a2:134_2: evaṃ paṭipajjissatī”ti mā cintehi. Māsādesi tathāgateti yathā upanissayasampattiyā
atk-s0508a2:134_3: purimakā buddhasāvakā āgatā, yathā vā te sammāpaṭipattiyā gatā paṭipannā, yathā ca
atk-s0508a2:134_4: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ tathadhamme ca ariyasaccāni āgatā adhigatā avabuddhā,
atk-s0508a2:134_5: tathā imepīti evaṃ tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgate ariyasāvake pakatisatte viya
atk-s0508a2:134_6: avaññāya kilesavasena ca upasaṅkamamānā māsādesi. Anāsādetabbatāya kāraṇamāha. Saggepi
atk-s0508a2:134_7: te na rajjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mānuseti sabbaññubuddhenāpi akkhānena pariyosāpetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:134_8: asakkuṇeyyasukhe saggepi te sāvakabuddhā na rajjanti, saṅkhāresu ādīnavassa suparidiṭṭhattā
atk-s0508a2:134_9: rāgaṃ na janenti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mīḷharāsisadise mānuse kāmaguṇe, tattha na rajjantīti
atk-s0508a2:135_0: Ye ca khoti ye pana bālyappayogato bālā, dhammojapaññāya abhāvato dummedhā, asubhe
atk-s0508a2:135_1: subhānupassanena ducintitacintitāya dummantī, mohena aññāṇena sabbaso paṭicchāditacittatāya
atk-s0508a2:135_2: mohapārutā tādisā tathārūpā andhaputhujjanā, tattha tasmiṃ itthisaññite, mārakhittamhi
atk-s0508a2:135_3: bandhane mārena oḍḍite mārapāse, rajjanti rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhopannā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0508a2:136_0: Virājitāti yesaṃ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ telañjanarāgo viya dummocanīyasabhāvo rāgo sapatto
atk-s0508a2:136_1: viya laddhokāso dussanasabhāvo doso aññāṇasabhāvā avijjā ca ariyamaggavirāgena sabbaso
atk-s0508a2:136_2: virājitā pahīnā samucchinnā, tādisā aggamaggasatthena chinnabhavanettisuttā tato
atk-s0508a2:136_3: eva katthacipi bandhanābhāvato abandhanā tattha tasmiṃ yathāvutte mārapāse na rajjanti.
atk-s0508a2:136_4: Evaṃ thero tassā itthiyā dhammaṃ kathetvā gato.
atk-s0508a2:139_0: Pañcapaññāsātiādikā āyasmato jambukattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:139_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:139_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu sammāsambodhiṃ saddahanto bodhirukkhaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0508a2:139_3: bījanena pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:139_4: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sāsane pabbajitvā aññatarena upāsakena kārite
atk-s0508a2:139_5: ārāme āvāsiko hutvā viharati tena upaṭṭhīyamāno. Athekadivasaṃ eko khīṇāsavatthero
atk-s0508a2:139_6: lūkhacīvaradharo kesoharaṇatthaṃ araññato gāmābhimukho āgacchati, taṃ disvā so upāsako
atk-s0508a2:139_7: iriyāpathe pasīditvā kappakena kesamassūni ohārāpetvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhojetvā sundarāni
atk-s0508a2:139_8: cīvarāni datvā “idheva, bhante, vasathā”ti vasāpeti. Taṃ disvā āvāsiko issāmaccherapakato
atk-s0508a2:139_9: khīṇāsavattheraṃ āha – “varaṃ te, bhikkhu, iminā pāpupāsakena upaṭṭhīyamānassa evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:139_10: idha vasanato aṅgulīhi kese luñcitvā acelassa sato gūthamuttāhārajīvana”nti. Evañca
atk-s0508a2:139_11: pana vatvā tāvadeva vaccakuṭiṃ pavisitvā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhento viya hatthena gūthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a2:139_12: vaḍḍhetvā yāvadatthaṃ khādi, muttañca pivi. Iminā niyāmena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kālaṅkatvā
atk-s0508a2:139_13: niraye paccitvā puna gūthamuttāhāro vasitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena manussesu
atk-s0508a2:139_14: uppannopi pañca jātisatāni nigaṇṭho hutvā gūthabhakkho ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:140_0: Puna imasmiṃ buddhuppāde manussayoniyaṃ nibbattamānopi ariyūpavādabalena duggatakūle
atk-s0508a2:140_1: nibbattitvā thaññaṃ vā khīraṃ vā sappiṃ vā pāyamāno, taṃ chaḍḍetvā muttameva pivati,
atk-s0508a2:140_2: odanaṃ bhojiyamāno, taṃ chaḍḍetvā gūthameva khādati, evaṃ gūthamuttaparibhogena vaḍḍhanto
atk-s0508a2:140_3: vayappattopi tadeva paribhuñjati. Manussā tato vāretuṃ asakkontā pariccajiṃsu. So
atk-s0508a2:140_4: ñātakehi pariccatto naggapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā na nhāyati, rajojalladharo kesamassūni
atk-s0508a2:140_5: luñcitvā aññe iriyāpathe paṭikkhipitvā ekapādena tiṭṭhati, nimantanaṃ na sādiyati,
atk-s0508a2:140_6: māsopavāsaṃ adhiṭṭhāya puññatthikehi dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ māse māse ekavāraṃ kusaggena
atk-s0508a2:140_7: gahetvā divā jivhaggena lehati, rattiyaṃ pana “allagūthaṃ sappāṇaka”nti akhāditvā
atk-s0508a2:140_8: sukkhagūthameva khādati, evaṃ karontassa pañcapaññāsavassāni vītivattāni mahājano
atk-s0508a2:141_0: Atha bhagavā tassa hadayabbhantare ghaṭe padīpaṃ viya arahattūpanissayaṃ pajjalantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:141_1: disvā sayameva tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā, ehibhikkhūpasampadāya
atk-s0508a2:141_2: laddhūpasampadaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0508a2:141_3: Vitthāro pana dhammapade “māse māse kusaggenā”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vuttanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:141_4: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito parinibbānakāle “ādito micchā paṭipajjitvāpi sammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:141_5: nissāya sāvakena adhigantabbaṃ mayā adhigata”nti dassento –
atk-s0508a2:147: Sukkhagūthāni ca khādiṃ, uddesañca na sādiyiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:153: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:155_1: pañcādhikāni paññāsavassāni sarīre laggaṃ āgantukareṇusaṅkhātaṃ rajo, sarīramalasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:155_2: jallañca kāyena dhāresiṃ. Bhuñjanto māsikaṃ bhattanti rattiyaṃ gūthaṃ khādanto lokavañcanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:155_3: māsopavāsiko nāma hutvā puññatthikehi dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ māse māse ekavāraṃ jivhagge
atk-s0508a2:155_4: paṭhanavasena bhuñjanto alocayinti tādisacchārikāpakkhepena sithilamūlaṃ kesamassuṃ
atk-s0508a2:156_0: Ekapādena aṭṭhāsiṃ, āsanaṃ parivajjayinti sabbena sabbaṃ āsanaṃ nisajjaṃ parivajjesiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:156_1: tiṭṭhanto ca ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā ekeneva pādena aṭṭhāsiṃ. Uddesanti nimantanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:156_2: Udissakatanti keci. Na sādiyinti na sampaṭicchiṃ paṭikkhipinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:157_0: Etādisaṃ karitvāna, bahuṃ duggatigāminanti etādisaṃ evarūpaṃ vipākanibbattanakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:157_1: duggatigāminaṃ bahuṃ pāpakammaṃ purimajātīsu idha ca katvā uppādetvā. Vuyhamāno mahoghenāti
atk-s0508a2:157_2: kāmoghādinā mahatā oghena visesato diṭṭhoghena apāyasamuddaṃ patiākaḍḍhiyamāno, buddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:157_3: saraṇamāgamanti tādisena puññakammacchiddena kicchena manussattabhāvaṃ labhitvā idāni
atk-s0508a2:157_5: satthari pasīdiṃ. Saraṇagamanaṃ passa, passa dhammasudhammatanti āyatanagataṃ mama
atk-s0508a2:157_6: saraṇagamanaṃ passa, passa sāsanadhammassa ca sudhammataṃ yohaṃ tathāmicchāpaṭipannopi
atk-s0508a2:157_7: ekovādeneva satthārā edisaṃ sampattiṃ sampāpito. “Tisso vijjā”tiādinā taṃ sampattiṃ dasseti tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:165_0: Svāgataṃ vatātiādikā āyasmato senakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:165_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:165_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso morahatthena
atk-s0508a2:165_3: bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:165_4: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uruvelakassapattherassa bhaginiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, senakotissa
atk-s0508a2:165_5: nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato gharāvāsaṃ vasati.
atk-s0508a2:165_6: Tena ca samayena mahājano saṃvacchare saṃvacchare phaggunamāse uttaraphaggunanakkhatte
atk-s0508a2:165_7: ussavaṃ anubhavanto gayāyaṃ titthābhisekaṃ karoti. Tena taṃ ussavaṃ “gayāphaggū”ti
atk-s0508a2:165_8: vadanti. Atha bhagavā tādise ussavadivase veneyyānukampāya gayātitthasamīpe viharati,
atk-s0508a2:165_9: mahājanopi titthābhisekādhippāyena tato tato taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchati. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0508a2:165_10: senakopi titthābhisekatthaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:165_11: dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a2:169: Nibbāyiṃsu tayo aggī, labhāmi vipulaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:170: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthusampadā;
atk-s0508a2:177: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:191_0: Tattha svāgataṃ vata me āsīti mayā suṭṭhu āgataṃ vata āsi. Mama vā sundaraṃ vata
atk-s0508a2:191_1: āgamanaṃ āsi. Gayāyanti gayātitthasamīpe. Gayaphagguyāti “gayāphaggū”ti laddhavohāre
atk-s0508a2:191_3: Tattha yanti yasmā. Addasāsinti addakkhiṃ. Sambuddhanti sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:191_4: buddhattā sambuddhaṃ. Desentaṃ dhammamuttamanti uttamaṃ aggaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ ekantaniyyānikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:192_0: Mahappabhanti mahatiyā sarīrappabhāya ñāṇappabhāya ca samannāgataṃ. Gaṇācariyanti
atk-s0508a2:192_1: bhikkhuparisādīnaṃ gaṇānaṃ uttamena damathena ācārasikkhāpanena gaṇācariyaṃ. Aggabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:192_2: sīlādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ adhigamena aggappattaṃ. Devamanussādīnaṃ paramena vinayena vinayanato,
atk-s0508a2:192_3: sayaṃ nāyakarahitattā ca vināyakaṃ. Kenaci anabhibhūto hutvā sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavitvā
atk-s0508a2:192_4: ṭhitattā, pañcannampi mārānaṃ jitattā ca sadevakassa lokassa jinaṃ sadevake loke
atk-s0508a2:193_1: ca mahānāgaṃ. Mārasenāvimathanato mahāvikkantatāya ca mahāvīraṃ. Mahājutinti mahāpatāpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:193_2: mahātejanti attho. Natthi etassa cattāropi āsavāti anāsavaṃ. Sabbe āsavā savāsanā
atk-s0508a2:193_3: parikkhīṇā etassāti sabbāsavaparikkhīṇaṃ. Kāmaṃ sāvakabuddhā paccekabuddhā ca khīṇāsavāva,
atk-s0508a2:193_4: sabbaññubuddhā eva pana savāsane āsave khepentīti dassanatthaṃ “anāsava”nti vatvā
atk-s0508a2:193_5: puna “sabbāsavaparikkhīṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “sabbe āsavā savāsanā parikkhīṇā
atk-s0508a2:193_7: veneyyānaṃ anusāsanato satthāraṃ, catuvesārajjavisāradatāya kutocipi bhayābhāvato
atk-s0508a2:193_8: akutobhayaṃ, evarūpaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ yaṃ yasmā addasāsiṃ, tasmā svāgataṃ vata me āsīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:194_0: Idāni satthu dassanena attanā laddhaguṇaṃ dassento catutthaṃ gāthamāha. Tassattho
atk-s0508a2:194_1: – kañjiyapuṇṇalābu viya takkabharitacāṭi viya vasāpītapilotikā viya ca saṃkilesavatthūhi
atk-s0508a2:194_2: anamatagge saṃsāre cirakālaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ. Gaddulabandhitaṃ viya thambhe sārameyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:194_3: sakkāyathambhe diṭṭhisandānena, diṭṭhibandhanena bandhitaṃ baddhaṃ, tato vimocento
atk-s0508a2:194_4: ca abhijjhādīhi sabbaganthe hi maṃ senakaṃ ariyamaggahatthena, vimocayi vata so bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:197_0: Yo dandhakāletiādikā āyasmato sambhūtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:197_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto buddhasuññe loke candabhāgāya nadiyā
atk-s0508a2:197_2: tīre kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbatto. Ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:197_3: vanditvā katañjalī ajjunapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:197_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbattitvā sambhūtoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:197_5: bhagavato parinibbānassa pacchā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:197_6: pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:207: Sukhette vappitaṃ bījaṃ, sayambhumhi aho mama.
atk-s0508a2:211_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikesu
atk-s0508a2:211_1: vajjiputtakesu dasa vatthūni paggayha ṭhitesu kākaṇḍakaputtena yasattherena ussāhitehi
atk-s0508a2:211_2: sattasatehi khīṇāsavehi taṃ diṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā saddhammaṃ paggaṇhantehi dhammavinayasaṅgahe
atk-s0508a2:211_3: kate tesaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ uddhammaubbinayadīpane dhammasaṃvegena thero –
atk-s0508a2:223: Yaso kittiñca pappoti, mittehi na virujjhatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:225_0: Tattha yo dandhakāle taratīti kismiñci kattabbavatthusmiṃ – “kappati nu kho, na nu
atk-s0508a2:225_1: kho kappatī”ti vinayakukkucce uppanne yāva viyattaṃ vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā taṃ kukkuccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:225_2: na vinodeti, tāva dandhakāle tassa kiccassa dandhāyitabbasamaye tarati madditvā vītikkamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:225_3: karoti. Taraṇīye ca dandhayeti gahaṭṭhassa tāva saraṇagamanasīlasamādānādike, pabbajitassa
atk-s0508a2:225_4: vattapaṭivattakaraṇādike samathavipassanānuyoge ca taritabbe sampatte sīghaṃ taṃ
atk-s0508a2:225_5: kiccaṃ ananuyuñjitvā – “āgamanamāse pakkhe vā karissāmī”ti dandhāyeyya, taṃ kiccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:225_6: akarontova kālaṃ vītināmeyya. Ayonisaṃvidhānenāti evaṃ dandhāyitabbe taranto taritabbe
atk-s0508a2:225_7: ca dandhāyanto anupāyasaṃvidhānena upāyasaṃvidhānābhāvena bālo, mandabuddhiko puggalo,
atk-s0508a2:226_0: Tassatthā parihāyantīti tassa tathārūpassa puggalassa diṭṭhadhammikādibhedā atthā
atk-s0508a2:226_1: kāḷapakkhe candimā viya, parihāyanti divase divase parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a2:226_2: “Asuko puggalo assaddho appasanno kusīto hīnavīriyo”tiādinā. Āyasakyaṃ viññūhi garahitabbataṃ
atk-s0508a2:226_3: pappoti pāpuṇāti. Mittehi ca virujjhatīti “evaṃ paṭipajja, mā evaṃ paṭipajjā”ti ovādadāyakehi
atk-s0508a2:226_4: kalyāṇamittehi “avacanīyā maya”nti ovādassa anādāneneva viruddho nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:227_0: Sesagāthādvayassa vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Keci panettha – “tarati dandhaye”tipadānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:227_1: atthabhāvena bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahe uddharanti. Taṃ pacchimagāthāsu yujjati.
atk-s0508a2:227_2: Purimā hi dve gāthā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya caritabbaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā kukkuccapakatatāya
atk-s0508a2:227_3: dasa vatthūni dīpetvā saṅghena nikkaḍḍhite vajjiputtake sandhāya therena vuttā. Pacchimā
atk-s0508a2:227_4: pana attasadise sammā paṭipanne sakatthaṃ nipphādetvā ṭhiteti.
atk-s0508a2:230_0: Ubhayenātiādikā āyasmato rāhulattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:230_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a2:230_2: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:230_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā senāsanavisodhanavijjotanādikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:230_4: uḷāraṃ puññaṃ katvā paṇidhānamakāsi. So tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:230_5: buddhuppāde amhākaṃ bodhisattaṃ paṭicca yasodharāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:230_6: rāhuloti laddhanāmo mahatā khattiyaparivārena vaḍḍhi, tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ khandhake
atk-s0508a2:230_7: āgatameva. So pabbajitvā satthu santike anekehi suttapadehi suladdhovādo paripakkañāṇo
atk-s0508a2:230_8: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:236: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a2:240: Nibbattissanti pāsādā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0508a2:254: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:260: Rāhulo nāma nāmena, arahā so bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:266: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:269: Yañcamhi putto buddhassa, yañca dhammesu cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a2:271: “Yañca me āsavā khīṇā, yañca natthi punabbhavo;
atk-s0508a2:280_0: Tattha ubhayeneva sampannoti jātisampadā, paṭipattisampadāti ubhayasampattiyāpi sampanno
atk-s0508a2:280_1: samannāgato. Rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidūti “rāhulabhaddo”ti maṃ sabrahmacārino sañjānanti.
atk-s0508a2:280_2: Tassa hi jātasāsanaṃ sutvā bodhisattena “rāhu jāto, bandhanaṃ jāta”nti vuttavacanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:280_3: upādāya suddhodanamahārājā “rāhulo”ti nāmaṃ gaṇhi. Tattha ādito pitarā vuttapariyāyameva
atk-s0508a2:280_4: gahetvā āha – “rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidū”ti. Bhaddoti ca pasaṃsāvacanametaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:281_0: Idāni taṃ ubhayasampattiṃ dassetuṃ “yañcamhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yanti yasmā. Ca-saddo
atk-s0508a2:281_1: samuccayattho. Amhi putto buddhassāti sammāsambuddhassa orasaputto amhi. Dhammesūti
atk-s0508a2:281_2: lokiyesu lokuttaresu ca dhammesu, catusaccadhammesūti attho. Cakkhumāti maggapaññācakkhunā
atk-s0508a2:282_0: Puna aparāparehipi pariyāyehi attani ubhayasampattiṃ dassetuṃ – “yañca me āsavā khīṇā”ti
atk-s0508a2:282_1: gāthamāha. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyoti dakkhiṇāraho. Amataddasoti nibbānassa dassāvī. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0508a2:283_0: Idāni yāya vijjāsampattiyā ca vimuttisampattiyā ca abhāvena sattakāyo kumine bandhamacchā
atk-s0508a2:283_1: viya saṃsāre parivattati, taṃ ubhayasampattiṃ attani dassetuṃ “kāmandhā”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a2:283_2: Tattha kāmehi kāmesu vā andhāti kāmandhā. “Chando rāgo”tiādivibhāgehi kilesakāmehi
atk-s0508a2:283_3: rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu anādīnavadassitāya andhīkatā. Jālapacchannāti sakalaṃ bhavattayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:283_4: ajjhottharitvā ṭhitena visattikājālena pakārato channā paliguṇṭhitā. Taṇhāchadanachāditāti
atk-s0508a2:283_5: tato eva taṇhāsaṅkhātena chadanena chāditā nivutā sabbaso paṭikujjitā. Pamattabandhunā
atk-s0508a2:283_6: baddhā, macchāva kumināmukheti kumināmukhe macchabandhānaṃ macchapasibbakamukhe baddhā
atk-s0508a2:283_7: macchā viya pamattabandhunā mārena yena kāmabandhanena baddhā ime sattā tato na nigacchanti
atk-s0508a2:284_0: Taṃ tathārūpaṃ kāmaṃ bandhanabhūtaṃ ujjhitvā pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā pahāya kilesamārassa
atk-s0508a2:284_1: bandhanaṃ chetvā, puna ariyamaggasatthena anavasesato samucchinditvā tato eva avijjāsaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a2:284_2: mūlena samūlaṃ, kāmataṇhādikaṃ taṇhaṃ abbuyha uddharitvā sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhābhāvato,
atk-s0508a2:284_3: sītibhūto saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbuto, ahaṃ asmi homīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:287_0: Jātarūpenātiādikā āyasmato candanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:287_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe buddhasuññe
atk-s0508a2:287_2: loke rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto sudassanaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ pabbatantare vasantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:287_3: disvā pasannamānaso kuṭajapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:287_4: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā candanoti
atk-s0508a2:287_5: laddhanāmo vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:287_6: So ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:287_7: araññe viharanto satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato susāne vasati. Tassa āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:287_8: sutvā purāṇadutiyikā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā dārakaṃ ādāya mahatā parivārena therassa santikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:287_9: gacchati – “itthikuttādīhi naṃ palobhetvā uppabbājessāmī”ti. Thero taṃ āgacchantiṃ
atk-s0508a2:287_10: dūratova disvā “idānissā avisayo bhavissāmī”ti yathāraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:297_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ākāse ṭhatvā tassā dhammaṃ desetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:297_1: sayaṃ attanā pubbe vasitaṭṭhānameva gato. Sahāyabhikkhūhi – “vippasannāni kho te,
atk-s0508a2:297_2: āvuso, indriyāni, kacci tayā saccāni paṭividdhānī”ti puṭṭho –
atk-s0508a2:309: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:310: Imāhi gāthāhi attano paṭipattiṃ kathento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:311_0: Tattha jātarūpena sañchannāti jātarūpamayena sīsūpagādialaṅkārena alaṅkaraṇavasena
atk-s0508a2:311_2: alaṅkatapaṭiyattena attano dāsigaṇena purato katā parivāritāti attho. Aṅkena puttamādāyāti
atk-s0508a2:311_3: “api nāma puttampi disvā gehassitasāto bhaveyyā”ti puttaṃ attano aṅkena gahetvā.
atk-s0508a2:312_0: Āyantinti āgacchantiṃ. Sakaputtassa mātaranti mama orasaputtassa jananiṃ, mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:312_1: purāṇadutiyikanti attho. Sabbamidaṃ thero attano kāmarāgasamucchedaṃ bahumaññanto
atk-s0508a2:312_2: vadati. Yoniso udapajjathāti “evarūpāpi nāma sampatti jarābyādhimaraṇehi abhibhuyyati,
atk-s0508a2:312_3: aho saṅkhārā aniccā adhuvā anassāsikā”ti evaṃ yonisomanasikāro uppajji. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:315_0: Dhammo havetiādikā āyasmato dhammikattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:315_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle migaluddako
atk-s0508a2:315_2: hutvā ekadivasaṃ araññāyatane devaparisāya satthu dhammaṃ desentassa “dhammo eso
atk-s0508a2:315_3: vuccatī”ti desanāya nimittaṃ gaṇhi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:315_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammikoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:315_5: jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe laddhappasādo pabbajitvā aññatarasmiṃ gāmakāvāse āvāsiko hutvā
atk-s0508a2:315_6: viharanto āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattāvattesu ujjhānabahulo akkhamo ahosi. Tena bhikkhū
atk-s0508a2:315_7: taṃ vihāraṃ chaḍḍetvā pakkamiṃsu. So ekakova ahosi. Vihārasāmiko upāsako taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:315_8: sutvā bhagavato taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosetvā tamatthaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0508a2:315_9: tena “evaṃ, bhante”ti vutte – “nāyaṃ idāneva akkhamo, pubbepi akkhamo ahosī”ti vatvā
atk-s0508a2:315_10: bhikkhūhi yācito rukkhadhammaṃ kathetvā upari tassa ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a2:317: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
atk-s0508a2:318: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī.
atk-s0508a2:320: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0508a2:321: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggatiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:323: “Tasmā hi dhammesu kareyya chandaṃ, iti modamāno sugatena tādinā;
atk-s0508a2:324: Dhamme ṭhitā sugatavarassa sāvakā, nīyanti dhīrā saraṇavaraggagāmino.
atk-s0508a2:328: Cando yathā dosinā puṇṇamāsiya”nti. – catasso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:329_0: Tattha dhammoti lokiyalokuttaro sucaritadhammo. Rakkhatīti apāyadukkhato rakkhati,
atk-s0508a2:329_1: saṃsāradukkhato ca vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūto rakkhatiyeva. Dhammacārinti taṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:329_2: carantaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ. Suciṇṇoti suṭṭhu ciṇṇo kammaphalāni saddahitvā sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:329_3: cittīkatvā upacito. Sukhanti lokiyalokuttarasukhaṃ. Tattha lokiyaṃ tāva kāmāvacarādibhedo
atk-s0508a2:329_4: dhammo yathāsakaṃ sukhaṃ diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye āvahati nipphādeti,
atk-s0508a2:329_5: itaraṃ pana vivaṭṭūpanissaye ṭhatvā ciṇṇo paramparāya āvahatīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati anupanissayassa
atk-s0508a2:329_6: tadabhāvato. Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārīti dhammacārī
atk-s0508a2:329_7: puggalo dhamme suciṇṇe taṃnimittaṃ duggatiṃ na gacchatīti eso dhamme suciṇṇe ānisaṃso udrayoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:330_0: Yasmā dhammeneva sugatigamanaṃ, adhammeneva ca duggatigamanaṃ, tasmā “dhammo adhammo”ti
atk-s0508a2:330_1: ime aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaphalāti dassetuṃ “na hi dhammo”tiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:330_2: Tattha adhammoti dhammapaṭipakkho duccaritaṃ. Samavipākinoti sadisavipākā samānaphalā.
atk-s0508a2:331_0: Tasmāti yasmā dhammādhammānaṃ ayaṃ yathāvutto vipākabhedo, tasmā. Chandanti kattukamyatāchandaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:331_1: Iti modamāno sugatena tādināti iti evaṃ vuttappakārena ovādadānena sugatena sammaggatena
atk-s0508a2:331_2: sammāpaṭipannena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā tādināmavatā hetubhūtena modamāno tuṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:331_3: āpajjamāno dhammesu chandaṃ kareyyāti yojanā. Ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0508a2:331_4: dassento “dhamme ṭhitā”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yasmā sugatassa varassa sugatesu ca
atk-s0508a2:331_5: varassa sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā tassa dhamme ṭhitā dhīrā ativiya aggabhūtasaraṇagāmino
atk-s0508a2:331_6: teneva saraṇagamanasaṅkhāte dhamme ṭhitabhāvena sakalavaṭṭadukkhatopi nīyanti nissaranti,
atk-s0508a2:332: Evaṃ satthārā tīhi gāthāhi dhamme desite desanānusārena yathānisinnova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:338: Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, uttariṃ duttaraṃ bhavaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:342: Tathā arahatte patiṭṭhito. Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā adhigataṃ visesaṃ satthu nivedento carimagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:343_0: Tattha vipphoṭitoti vidhuto, maggañāṇena paṭinissaṭṭhoti attho. Gaṇḍamūloti avijjā.
atk-s0508a2:343_1: Sā hi gaṇḍati savati. “Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti
atk-s0508a2:343_2: evaṃ satthārā vuttassa dukkhamūlayogato, kilesāsucipaggharaṇato, uppādajarābhaṅgehi
atk-s0508a2:343_3: uddhumātapakkapabhijjanato ca, gaṇḍābhidhānassa upādānakkhandhapañcakassa mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:343_4: taṇhājālo samūhatoti taṇhāsaṅkhāto jālo maggena samugghāṭito. So khīṇasaṃsāro na
atk-s0508a2:343_5: catthi kiñcananti so ahaṃ evaṃ pahīnataṇhāvijjatāya parikkhīṇasaṃsāro pahīnabhavamūlattā
atk-s0508a2:343_6: eva na catthi, na ca upalabbhati rāgādikiñcanaṃ. Cando yathā dosinā puṇṇamāsiyanti
atk-s0508a2:343_7: yathā nāma cando abbhamahikādidosarahito puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle evaṃ ahampi arahattādhigamena
atk-s0508a2:346_0: Yadā balākātiādikā āyasmato sappakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:346_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe mahānubhāvo
atk-s0508a2:346_2: nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto sambhavassa nāma paccekabuddhassa abbhokāse samāpattiyā nisinnassa
atk-s0508a2:346_3: mahantaṃ padumaṃ gahetvā uparimuddhani dhārento pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a2:346_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:346_5: sappakoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:346_6: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ajakaraṇiyā nāma nadiyā tīre leṇagirivihāre vasanto
atk-s0508a2:346_7: nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:348: Buddhopi sambhavo nāma, abbhokāse vasī tadā.
atk-s0508a2:354_0: So arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato ñātīhi upaṭṭhīyamāno tattha
atk-s0508a2:354_1: katipāhaṃ vasitvā dhammaṃ desetvā ñātake saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā yathāvuttaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0508a2:354_2: gantukāmo ahosi. Taṃ ñātakā “idheva, bhante, vasatha, mayaṃ paṭijaggissāmā”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:354_3: So gamanākāraṃ dassetvā ṭhito attanā vasitaṭṭhānakittanāpadesena vivekābhiratiṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a2:356: “Yadā balākā sucipaṇḍaracchadā, kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitā;
atk-s0508a2:357: Palehiti ālayamālayesinī, tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:359: “Yadā balākā suvisuddhapaṇḍarā, kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitā;
atk-s0508a2:360: Pariyesati leṇamaleṇadassinī, tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:362: “Kaṃ nu tattha na ramenti, jambuyo ubhato tahiṃ;
atk-s0508a2:367: Khemā ajakaraṇī sivā surammā”ti. – catasso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:368_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Balākāti balākāsakuṇikā. Sucipaṇḍaracchadāti sucisuddhadhavalapakkhā.
atk-s0508a2:368_1: Kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitāti jalabhārabharitatāya kāḷassa añjanagirisannikāsassa
atk-s0508a2:368_2: pāvussakameghassa gajjato vuṭṭhibhayena nibbijjitā bhiṃsāpitā. Palehitīti gocarabhūmito
atk-s0508a2:368_3: uppatitvā gamissati. Ālayanti nilayaṃ attano kulāvakaṃ. Ālayesinīti tattha ālayanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:368_4: nilīyanameva icchantī. Tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti manti tasmiṃ pāvussakakāle ajakaraṇīnāmikā
atk-s0508a2:368_5: nadī navodakassa pūrā hārahārinī kulaṅkasā maṃ rameti mama cittaṃ ārādhetīti utupadesavisesakittanāpadesena
atk-s0508a2:369_0: Suvisuddhapaṇḍarāti suṭṭhu visuddhapaṇḍaravaṇṇā, asammissavaṇṇā sabbasetāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:369_1: Pariyesatīti maggati. Leṇanti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Aleṇadassinīti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ apassantī.
atk-s0508a2:369_2: Pubbe nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānassa abhāvena aleṇadassinī, idāni pāvussakakāle meghagajjitena
atk-s0508a2:369_3: āhitagabbhā pariyesati leṇanti nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānaṃ kulāvakaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:370_0: Kaṃ nu tattha…pe… pacchatoti mama vasanakamahāleṇassa pacchato pacchābhāge āpagākūlaṃ
atk-s0508a2:370_1: ajakaraṇīnadiyā ubhatotīraṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ ito cito ca sobhentiyo niccakālaṃ phalabhāranamitasākhā
atk-s0508a2:370_2: siniddhapaṇṇacchāyā jambuyo tattha tasmiṃ ṭhāne kaṃ nāma sattaṃ na ramenti nu, sabbaṃ ramentiyeva.
atk-s0508a2:371_0: Tāmatamadasaṅghasuppahīnāti amataṃ vuccati agadaṃ, tena majjantīti amatamadā, sappā,
atk-s0508a2:371_1: tesaṃ saṅgho amatamadasaṅgho, tato suṭṭhu pahīnā apagatā. Bhekā maṇḍūkiyo, mandavatī
atk-s0508a2:371_2: saravatiyo, panādayanti taṃ ṭhānaṃ madhurena vassitena ninnādayanti. Nājja girinadīhi
atk-s0508a2:371_3: vippavāsasamayoti ajja etarahi aññāhipi pabbateyyāhi nadīhi vippavāsasamayo na hoti,
atk-s0508a2:371_4: visesato pana vāḷamacchasusumārādivirahitato khemā ajakaraṇī nadī. Sundaratalatitthapulinasampattiyā
atk-s0508a2:371_5: sivā. Suṭṭhu rammā ramaṇīyā, tasmā tattheva me mano ramatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:372: Evaṃ pana vatvā ñātake vissajjetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato. Suññāgārābhiratidīpanena idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a2:375_0: Pabbajintiādikā āyasmato muditattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:375_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:375_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekaṃ mañcamadāsi.
atk-s0508a2:375_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe gahapatikule
atk-s0508a2:375_4: nibbattitvā muditoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena ca samayena taṃ kulaṃ raññā
atk-s0508a2:375_5: kenacideva karaṇīyena palibuddhaṃ ahosi. Mudito rājabhayābhīto palāyitvā araññaṃ
atk-s0508a2:375_6: paviṭṭho aññatarassa khīṇāsavattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upagacchi. Thero tassa bhītabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:375_7: ñatvā “mā bhāyī”ti samassāsesi. So “kittakena nu kho, bhante, kālena idaṃ me bhayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:375_8: vūpasamessatī”ti pucchitvā “sattaṭṭhamāse atikkamitvā”ti vutte – “ettakaṃ kālaṃ adhivāsetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:375_9: na sakkomi, pabbajissāmahaṃ, bhante, pabbājetha ma”nti jīvitarakkhaṇatthaṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:375_10: yāci. Thero taṃ pabbājesi. So pabbajitvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho bhaye vūpasantepi
atk-s0508a2:375_11: samaṇadhammaṃyeva rocento kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto – “arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:375_12: appatvā imasmā vasanagabbhā bahi na nikkhamissāmī”tiādinā paṭiññaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:375_13: ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:377: Ekaṃ mañcaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, pasannena sapāṇinā.
atk-s0508a2:383: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento sahāyabhikkhūhi adhigataṃ pucchito attano paṭipannākāraṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:391: “Nāsissaṃ na pivissāmi, vihārā ca na nikkhame;
atk-s0508a2:395: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:397_0: Tattha jīvikatthoti jīvikāya atthiko jīvikappayojano. “Ettha pabbajitvā nibbhayo
atk-s0508a2:397_1: sukhena akilamanto jīvissāmī”ti evaṃ jīvikatthāya pabbajinti attho. Laddhāna upasampadanti
atk-s0508a2:397_2: paṭhamaṃ sāmaṇerapabbajjāyaṃ ṭhito ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadaṃ labhitvā.
atk-s0508a2:397_3: Tato saddhaṃ paṭilabhinti tato upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya kalyāṇamitte sevanto dve
atk-s0508a2:397_4: mātikā, tisso anumodanā, ekaccaṃ suttaṃ, samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ, vipassanāvidhiñca uggaṇhanto
atk-s0508a2:397_5: buddhādīnaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ disvā – “sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno
atk-s0508a2:397_6: saṅgho”ti ratanattaye saddhaṃ paṭilabhiṃ. Daḷhavīriyo parakkaminti evaṃ paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:397_7: hutvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva saccapaṭivedhāya daḷhavīriyo thiravīriyo
atk-s0508a2:397_8: hutvā parakkamiṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya sammadeva padahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:398_0: Yathā pana parakkamiṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “kāma”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāmanti yathākāmaṃ
atk-s0508a2:398_1: ekaṃsato vā bhijjatu. Ayaṃ kāyoti ayaṃ mama pūtikāyo, iminā vīriyapatāpena bhijjati
atk-s0508a2:398_2: ce, bhijjatu chinnabhinnaṃ hotu. Maṃsapesī visīyarunti iminā daḷhaparakkamena imasmā
atk-s0508a2:398_3: kāyā maṃsapesiyo visīyanti ce, visīyantu ito cito viddhaṃsantu. Ubho jaṇṇukasandhīhi,
atk-s0508a2:398_4: jaṅghāyo papatantu meti ubhohi jaṇṇukasandhīhi saha mama ubho jaṅghāyo satthiyo ūrubandhato
atk-s0508a2:398_5: bhijjitvā bhūmiyaṃ papatantu. “Ma”ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:403_0: Pañcakanipāte bhikkhu sivathikaṃ gantvātiādikā āyasmato rājadattattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:403_1: Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro, tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:403_2: puññaṃ upacinanto, ito catuddase kappe buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a2:403_3: patto, ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṃ upagato tattha aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:403_4: rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso suparisuddhaṃ ambāṭakaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena
atk-s0508a2:403_5: puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ satthavāhakule
atk-s0508a2:403_6: nibbatti. Tassa mahārājaṃ vessavaṇaṃ ārādhetvā paṭiladdhabhāvato mātāpitaro rājadattoti
atk-s0508a2:403_7: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya vāṇijjavasena rājagahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:403_8: agamāsi. Tena ca samayena rājagahe aññatarā gaṇikā abhirūpā dassanīyā paramasobhaggayogato
atk-s0508a2:403_9: divase divase sahassaṃ labhati. Atha so satthavāhaputto divase divase tassā gaṇikāya
atk-s0508a2:403_10: sahassaṃ datvā saṃvāsaṃ kappento nacirasseva sabbaṃ dhanaṃ khepetvā duggato hutvā
atk-s0508a2:403_11: ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhanto ito cito ca paribbhamanto saṃvegappatto ahosi. So
atk-s0508a2:404_0: Tena ca samayena satthā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
atk-s0508a2:404_1: So parisapariyante nisīditvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:404_2: dhutaṅgāni samādiyitvā susāne vasati. Tadā aññataropi satthavāhaputto sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0508a2:404_3: tāya gaṇikāya saha vasati. Sā ca gaṇikā tassa hatthe mahaggharatanaṃ disvā lobhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:404_4: uppādetvā aññehi dhuttapurisehi taṃ mārāpetvā taṃ ratanaṃ gaṇhi. Atha tassa satthavāhaputtassa
atk-s0508a2:404_5: manussā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ocarakamanusse pesesuṃ. Te rattiyaṃ tassā gaṇikāya gharaṃ
atk-s0508a2:404_6: pavisitvā chaviādīni anupahacceva taṃ māretvā sivathikāya chaḍḍesuṃ. Rājadattatthero
atk-s0508a2:404_7: asubhanimittaṃ gahetuṃ susāne vicaranto tassā gaṇikāya kaḷevaraṃ paṭikkulato manasi
atk-s0508a2:404_8: kātuṃ upagato katipayavāre yoniso manasi katvā aciramatabhāvato soṇasiṅgālādīhi anupahatachavitāya
atk-s0508a2:404_9: visabhāgavatthutāya ca ayoniso manasikaronto, tattha kāmarāgaṃ uppādetvā saṃviggataramānaso
atk-s0508a2:404_10: attano cittaṃ paribhāsitvā muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ apasakkitvā ādito upaṭṭhitaṃ asubhanimittameva
atk-s0508a2:404_11: gahetvā yoniso manasikaronto jhānaṃ uppādetvā taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:404_12: paṭṭhapetvā tāvadeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:410: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto –
atk-s0508a2:425: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:427_0: Tattha bhikkhu sivathikaṃ gantvāti saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanato bhikkhu, asubhakammaṭṭhānatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:427_1: āmakasusānaṃ upagantvā. “Bhikkhū”ti cetaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya thero sayaṃ vadati. Itthinti
atk-s0508a2:427_2: thīyati ettha sukkasoṇitaṃ sattasantānabhāvena saṃhaññatīti thī, mātugāmo. Evañca
atk-s0508a2:427_3: sabhāvaniruttivasena “itthī”tipi vuccati. Vañjhādīsu pana taṃsadisatāya taṃsabhāvānativattanato
atk-s0508a2:427_4: ca tabbohāro. “Itthī”ti itthikaḷevaraṃ vadati. Ujjhitanti pariccattaṃ ujjhaniyattā
atk-s0508a2:427_5: eva apaviddhaṃ anapekkhabhāvena khittaṃ. Khajjantiṃ kimihī phuṭanti kimīhi pūritaṃ hutvā khajjamānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:428_0: Yañhi eke jigucchanti, mataṃ disvāna pāpakanti yaṃ apagatāyuusmāviññāṇatāya mataṃ
atk-s0508a2:428_1: kaḷevaraṃ pāpakaṃ nihīnaṃ lāmakaṃ eke cokkhajātikā jigucchanti, oloketumpi na icchanti.
atk-s0508a2:428_2: Kāmarāgo pāturahūti tasmiṃ kuṇape ayonisomanasikārassa balavatāya kāmarāgo mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:428_3: pāturahosi uppajji. Andhova savatī ahunti tasmiṃ kaḷevare navahi dvārehi asuciṃ savati
atk-s0508a2:428_4: sandante asucibhāvassa adassanena andho viya ahosiṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:429: “Ratto atthaṃ na jānāti, ratto dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0508a2:430: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara”nti ca.
atk-s0508a2:431_0: “Kāmacchando kho, brāhmaṇa, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo”ti ca ādi. Keci panettha takārāgamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:431_1: katvā “kilesapariyuṭṭhānena avasavatti kilesassa vā vasavattī”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:431_2: Apare “andhova asati ahu”nti pāḷiṃ vatvā “kāmarāgena andho eva hutvā satirahito ahosi”nti
atk-s0508a2:431_3: atthaṃ vadanti. Tadubhayaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ natthi.
atk-s0508a2:432_0: Oraṃ odanapākamhāti odanapākato oraṃ, yāvatā kālena suparidhotatintataṇḍulanāḷiyā
atk-s0508a2:432_1: odanaṃ pacati, tato orameva kālaṃ, tatopi lahukālena rāgaṃ vinodento, tamhā ṭhānā
atk-s0508a2:432_2: apakkamiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitassa me rāgo uppajji, tamhā ṭhānā apakkamiṃ apasakkiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:432_3: Apakkantova satimā sampajānohaṃ samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā satipaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena
atk-s0508a2:432_4: satimā, sammadeva dhammasabhāvajānanena sampajāno ca hutvā ekamantaṃ upāvisiṃ, pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0508a2:432_5: ābhujitvā nisīdiṃ. Nisinnassa ca tato me manasīkāro, yoniso udapajjathātiādi sabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:435_0: Ayogetiādikā āyasmato subhūtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a2:435_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ gahapatimahāsālakule
atk-s0508a2:435_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:435_3: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya māse māse aṭṭhakkhattuṃ catujjātiyagandhena satthu
atk-s0508a2:435_4: gandhakuṭiṃ opuñjāpesi. So tena puññakammena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sugandhasarīro
atk-s0508a2:435_5: hutvā, imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā subhūtoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a2:435_6: vayappatto, nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya titthiyesu pabbajitvā tattha
atk-s0508a2:435_7: sāraṃ alabhanto, satthu santike upatissakolitaselādike bahū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:435_8: sāmaññasukhaṃ anubhavante disvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ācariyupajjhāye
atk-s0508a2:435_9: ārādhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vivekavāsaṃ vasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:437: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
atk-s0508a2:443: Ākāso viya paññāya, asaṅgo anilo yathā.
atk-s0508a2:486: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto vippakule ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:487: Gabbhaṃ me vasato mātā, dehenāsi sugandhitā.
atk-s0508a2:493: Vāsayiṃsu sugandhena, yasmiṃ jāto ahaṃ ghare.
atk-s0508a2:494: “Yadā ca taruṇo bhaddo, paṭhame yobbane ṭhito;
atk-s0508a2:497: Tadā buddhānubhāvaṃ taṃ, disvā pabbajito ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:500: “Yadā pabbajito cāhaṃ, yadā ca arahā ahuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:501: Nibbāyissaṃ yadā cāhaṃ, gandhavasso tadā ahu.
atk-s0508a2:503: Tatheva gandhe itare ca sabbaso, pasayha vāyāmi tato tahiṃ tahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:505_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā titthiyesu pabbajitvā attano pattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:505_1: sāsane pabbajitvā pattaṃ jhānādisukhañca cintetvā attano paṭipattipaccavekkhaṇamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:508: Caraṃ ce nādhigaccheyya, taṃ me dubbhagalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:510: “Abbūḷhaṃ aghagataṃ vijitaṃ, ekañce ossajeyya kalīva siyā;
atk-s0508a2:511: Sabbānipi ce ossajeyya andhova siyā, samavisamassa adassanato.
atk-s0508a2:513: “Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade;
atk-s0508a2:517: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
atk-s0508a2:520: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:522_0: Tattha ayogeti ayuñjitabbe asevitabbe antadvaye. Idha pana attakilamathānuyogavasena
atk-s0508a2:522_1: attho veditabbo. Yuñjanti tasmiṃ attānaṃ yuñjanto yojento tathā paṭipajjanto. Kiccamicchakoti
atk-s0508a2:522_2: ubhayahitāvahaṃ kiccaṃ icchanto, tappaṭipakkhato ayoge caraṃ caranto ce bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a2:522_3: Nādhigaccheyyāti yathādhippetaṃ hitasukhaṃ na pāpuṇeyyāti ñāyo. Tasmā yaṃ ahaṃ titthiyamatavañcito
atk-s0508a2:522_4: ayoge yuñjiṃ, taṃ me dubbhagalakkhaṇaṃ apuññasabhāvo. “Purimakammabyāmohito ayoge yuñji”nti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:523_0: Abbūḷhaṃ aghagataṃ vijitanti vibādhanasabhāvatāya aghā nāma rāgādayo, aghāni eva
atk-s0508a2:523_1: aghagataṃ, aghagatānaṃ vijitaṃ saṃsārappavatti, tesaṃ vijayo kusaladhammābhibhavo.
atk-s0508a2:523_2: “Aghagataṃ vijita”nti anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ. Taṃ abbūḷhaṃ anuddhataṃ yena,
atk-s0508a2:523_3: taṃ abbūḷhāghagataṃ vijitaṃ katvā evaṃbhūto hutvā, kilese asamucchinditvāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:523_4: Ekañce ossajeyyāti adutiyatāya padhānatāya ca ekaṃ appamādaṃ sammāpayogameva vā ossajeyya
atk-s0508a2:523_5: pariccajeyya ce. Kalīva so puggalo kāḷakaṇṇī viya siyā. Sabbānipi ce ossajeyyāti
atk-s0508a2:523_6: sabbānipi vimuttiyā paripācakāni saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññindriyāni ossajeyya ce,
atk-s0508a2:523_7: abhāvanāya chaḍḍeyya ce, andhova siyā samavisamassa adassanato.
atk-s0508a2:524_0: Yathāti opammasampaṭipādanatthe nipāto. Ruciranti sobhanaṃ. Vaṇṇavantanti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānasampannaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:524_2: vācāti subhāsitā vācā nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānasampannapupphasadisaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:524_3: Yathā hi agandhakaṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa sarīre gandho na pharati, evaṃ etampi yo
atk-s0508a2:524_4: sakkaccasavanādīhi ca samācarati, tassa sakkaccaṃ asamācarantassa yaṃ tattha kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:524_5: taṃ akubbato sutagandhaṃ paṭipattigandhañca na āvahati aphalā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:525_0: Sugandhakanti sumanacampakanīluppalapupphādibhedaṃ. Evanti yathā taṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa
atk-s0508a2:525_1: sarīre gandho pharati, evaṃ tepiṭakabuddhavacanasaṅkhātā subhāsitā vācāpi yo sakkaccasavanādīhi
atk-s0508a2:525_2: tattha kattabbaṃ karoti, assa puggalassa saphalā hoti, sutagandhapaṭipattigandhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:525_3: āvahanato mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā. Tasmā yathovādaṃ paṭipajjeyya, yathākārī tathāvādī
atk-s0508a2:528_0: Vassati devotiādikā āyasmato girimānandattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:528_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:528_2: nibbattitvā vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto attano bhariyāya putte ca kālaṅkate sokasallasamappito
atk-s0508a2:528_3: araññaṃ paviṭṭho satthārā tattha gantvā dhammaṃ kathetvā sokasalle abbūḷhe pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:528_4: sugandhapupphehi pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā abhitthavi.
atk-s0508a2:529_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe bimbisārarañño
atk-s0508a2:529_1: purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti, girimānandotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a2:529_2: satthu rājagahagamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:529_3: karonto katipayaṃ divasaṃ gāmakāvāse vasitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:529_4: Bimbisāramahārājā tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā “idheva, bhante, vasatha, ahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:529_5: catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahāmī”ti sampavāretvā gato bahukiccatāya na sari. “Thero abbhokāse
atk-s0508a2:529_6: vasatī”ti devatā therassa temanabhayena vassaṃ vāresuṃ. Rājā avassanakāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0508a2:529_7: therassa kuṭikaṃ kārāpesi. Thero kuṭikāyaṃ vasanto senāsanasappāyalābhena samādhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:529_8: labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:531: Mātā pitā matā bhātā, ekacitamhi ḍayhare.
atk-s0508a2:533: Cittakkhepo ca me āsi, tena sokena aṭṭito.
atk-s0508a2:547: Yathāgatā tathā gatā, tattha kā paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:551: Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:553: Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:554: “Yathāpi urago jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tacaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:555: Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, saṃ tanuṃ idha hīyare.
atk-s0508a2:563: Sabbe satte uddharasi, ñāṇena tvaṃ mahāmune.
atk-s0508a2:565: Paṭipādesi me maggaṃ, tava ñāṇena cakkhuma.
atk-s0508a2:568: “Paṭipannā ca sekhā ca, phalaṭṭhā santi sāvakā;
atk-s0508a2:585: Atha therassa arahattappattiyā haṭṭhatuṭṭhe viya deve vassante upari taṃ vassane niyojanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:587: “Vassati devo yathāsugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
atk-s0508a2:588: Tassaṃ viharāmi vūpasanto, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva.
atk-s0508a2:590: “Vassati devo yathāsugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
atk-s0508a2:591: Tassaṃ viharāmi santacitto, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva.
atk-s0508a2:598: Atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti. – imā pañca gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:599_0: Tattha yathāsugītanti sugītānurūpaṃ, sundarassa attano meghagītassa anurūpamevāti
atk-s0508a2:599_1: attho. Valāhako hi yathā agajjanto kevalaṃ vassanto na sobhati, evaṃ satapaṭalasahassapaṭalena
atk-s0508a2:599_2: uṭṭhahitvā thanayanto gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārentopi avassanto na sobhati, tathābhūto
atk-s0508a2:599_3: pana hutvā vassanto sobhatīti vuttaṃ “vassati devo yathāsugīta”nti. Tenāha – “abhitthanaya,
atk-s0508a2:599_4: pajjunna”, “gajjitā ceva vassitā cā”ti ca. Tassaṃ viharāmīti tassaṃ kuṭikāyaṃ ariyavihāragabbhena
atk-s0508a2:599_5: iriyāpathavihārena viharāmi. Vūpasantacittoti aggaphalasamādhinā sammadeva upasantamānaso.
atk-s0508a2:600: Evaṃ therassa anekavāraṃ kataṃ uyyojanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanto valāhakadevaputto ninnañca thalañca pūrento mahāvassaṃ vassāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:603_0: Yaṃ patthayānotiādikā āyasmato sumanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:603_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcanavute kappe buddhasuññe
atk-s0508a2:603_2: loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ byādhitaṃ disvā harītakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:603_3: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a2:603_4: gahapatikule nibbattitvā sumanoti laddhanāmo sukhena vaḍḍhi. Tassa pana mātulo pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:603_5: arahā hutvā araññe viharanto sumane vayappatte taṃ pabbājetvā caritānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:603_6: adāsi. So tattha yogakammaṃ karonto cattāri jhānāni pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi.
atk-s0508a2:603_7: Athassa thero vipassanāvidhiṃ ācikkhi. So ca nacireneva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte
atk-s0508a2:613: Sabbattha sukhito hotu, mā ca te byādhimāgamā.
atk-s0508a2:617: Imaṃ jātiṃ upādāya, byādhi me nupapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:619: Tisso vijjā sacchikatā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:623: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṃ mātulattherassa upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ thero adhigamaṃ pucchi, taṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:632: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:635: Sabbe me āsavā khīṇā, natthi dāni punabbhavo.
atk-s0508a2:639: Imāhi pañcahi gāthāhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:640_0: Tattha yaṃ patthayāno dhammesu, upajjhāyo anuggahi. Amataṃ abhikaṅkhantanti samathavipassanādīsu
atk-s0508a2:640_1: anavajjadhammesu yaṃ dhammaṃ mayhaṃ patthayanto ākaṅkhanto upajjhāyo amataṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:640_2: abhikaṅkhantaṃ maṃ ovādadānavasena anuggaṇhi. Kataṃ kattabbakaṃ mayāti tassa adhigamatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:640_3: kattabbaṃ pariññādisoḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ kataṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ mayā.
atk-s0508a2:641_0: Tato eva anuppatto adhigato catubbidhopi maggadhammo sacchikato. Sayaṃ dhammo anītihoti
atk-s0508a2:641_1: sayaṃ attanāyeva nibbānadhammo phaladhammo ca anītiho asandiddho attapaccakkho kato,
atk-s0508a2:641_2: “itiha, iti kirā”ti pavattiyā itihasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsayaṃ samucchindantoyeva ariyamaggo
atk-s0508a2:641_3: pavattati. Tenāha “visuddhañāṇo nikkaṅkho”tiādi. Tattha visuddhañāṇoti sabbasaṃkilesavisuddhiyā
atk-s0508a2:642_0: Sadatthoti arahattaṃ. Sikkhāti adhisīlasikkhādayo. Sussutāti pariyattibāhusaccassa
atk-s0508a2:642_1: paṭivedhabāhusaccassa ca pāripūrivasena suṭṭhu sutā. Tava sāsaneti tava ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa.
atk-s0508a2:643: Ariyavatāti suvisuddhasīlādivatasamādānena. Antevāsimhi sikkhitoti tuyhaṃ samīpe ciṇṇabrahmacariyavāsatāya antevāsī sikkhitavā sikkhitaadhisīlādisikkho amhīti.
atk-s0508a2:646_0: Sādhū hītiādikā āyasmato vaḍḍhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:646_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:646_2: bhārukacchanagare gahapatikule nibbattitvā vaḍḍhoti laddhanāmo anupubbena vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0508a2:646_3: Athassa mātā saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvegā puttaṃ ñātīnaṃ niyyādetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike
atk-s0508a2:646_4: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā aparena samayena puttampi
atk-s0508a2:646_5: viññutaṃ pattaṃ veḷudantattherassa santike pabbājesi. So pabbajito buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:646_6: uggahetvā bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvā ganthadhuraṃ vahanto ekadivasaṃ “ekako santaruttarova
atk-s0508a2:646_7: mātaraṃ passissāmī”ti bhikkhunupassayaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ disvā mātā “kasmā tvaṃ ekako
atk-s0508a2:646_8: santaruttarova idhāgato”ti codesi. So mātarā codiyamāno “ayuttaṃ mayā kata”nti uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0508a2:646_9: vihāraṃ gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisinno vipassitvā arahattaṃ patvā mātu ovādasampattipakāsanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:648: “Sādhū hi kira me mātā, patodaṃ upadaṃsayi;
atk-s0508a2:655: “Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, ye me vijjiṃsu āsavā;
atk-s0508a2:656: Sabbe asesā ucchinnā, na ca uppajjare puna.
atk-s0508a2:659: Apihā nūna mayipi, vanatho te na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:662: Jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:663_0: Tattha sādhū hi kira me mātā, patodaṃ upadaṃsayīti sādhu vata mātā mayhaṃ ovādasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:663_1: patodaṃ dasseti, tena me vīriyaṃ uttejentī uttamaṅge paññāsīse vijjhi. Yassāti yassā
atk-s0508a2:663_2: me mātuyā. Sambodhinti arahattaṃ. Ayañhettha yojanā – janettiyā me anusiṭṭho yassā
atk-s0508a2:663_3: anusāsanībhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ahaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitatto viharanto uttamaṃ aggaphalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:664_0: Tato eva ārakattā kilesehi arahā puññakkhettatāya dakkhiṇeyyo dakkhiṇāraho amhi.
atk-s0508a2:664_1: Pubbenivāsañāṇādivijjāttayassa adhigatattā tevijjo nibbānassa sacchikatattā amataddaso
atk-s0508a2:664_2: namucino mārassa senaṃ kilesavāhiniṃ bodhipakkhiyasenāya jinitvā tassa jitattāyeva
atk-s0508a2:665_0: Idāni “anāsavo”ti vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “ajjhattañcā” ti gāthamāha. Tassattho
atk-s0508a2:665_1: – ajjhattaṃ ajjhattavatthukā ca bahiddhā bahiddhavatthukā ca āsavā ye mayhaṃ ariyamaggādhigamato
atk-s0508a2:665_2: pubbe vijjiṃsu upalabbhiṃsu, te sabbe anavasesā ucchinnā ariyamaggena samucchinnā
atk-s0508a2:665_3: pahīnā puna dāni kadācipi na ca uppajjeyyuṃ na uppajjissantiyevāti.
atk-s0508a2:666_0: Idāni mātu vacanaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā attanā arahattassa adhigatattā mātaraṃ thomento
atk-s0508a2:666_1: “visāradā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha visāradā khoti ekaṃsena vigatasārajjā. Evaṃ mātu attano
atk-s0508a2:666_2: ca arahattādhigamena satthu orasaputtabhāvaṃ ullapento mātaraṃ “bhaginī”ti āha. Etamatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:666_3: abhāsayīti etaṃ mama ovādabhūtaṃ atthaṃ abhaṇi. Evaṃ pana maṃ ovadantī na kevalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:666_4: visāradā eva, atha kho apihā nūna mayipi tava puttakepi apihā asanthavā maññe, kiṃ
atk-s0508a2:666_5: vā etena parikappanena? Vanatho te na vijjati avijjādiko vanatho tava santāne nattheva,
atk-s0508a2:667: Idāni “tayā niyojitākāreneva mayā paṭipanna”nti dassento “pariyantakata”nti osānagāthamāha, tassattho suviññeyyova.
atk-s0508a2:670_0: Atthāya vata metiādikā āyasmato nadīkassapattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:670_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:670_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:670_3: disvā pasannamānaso attanā ropitassa ambarukkhassa paṭhamuppannaṃ manosilāvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:670_4: ekaṃ ambaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:670_5: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uruvelakassapassa bhātā hutvā nibbatto. Vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a2:670_6: gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ nerañjarāya
atk-s0508a2:670_7: nadiyā tīre assamaṃ māpetvā viharati. Nadītīre vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca
atk-s0508a2:670_8: nadīkassapoti samaññā ahosi. Tassa bhagavā saparisassa ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ
atk-s0508a2:670_9: adāsi. Taṃ sabbaṃ khandhake āgatameva. So bhagavato ādittapariyāyadesanāya arahatte
atk-s0508a2:680: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito aparabhāge attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā diṭṭhisamugghātakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:682: “Atthāya vata me buddho, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ agā;
atk-s0508a2:697_0: Tattha atthāya vata meti mayhaṃ atthāya vata hitāya vata. Buddhoti sabbaññubuddho.
atk-s0508a2:697_1: Nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ agāti nerañjarāsaṅkhātaṃ nadiṃ agañchi, tassā nadiyā tīre ca mama
atk-s0508a2:698_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yassāha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yassāti yassa buddhassa
atk-s0508a2:698_1: bhagavato. Dhammaṃ sutvānāti catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā, sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0508a2:699_1: Tattha yajiṃ uccāvace yaññeti pākaṭayaññe somayāgavājapeyyādike nānāvidhe yaññe yajiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:699_2: Aggihuttaṃ juhiṃ ahanti tesaṃ yaññānaṃ yajanavasena āhutiṃ paggaṇhanto aggiṃ paricariṃ.
atk-s0508a2:699_3: Esā suddhīti maññantoti esā yaññakiriyā aggipāricariyā suddhihetubhāvato suddhi “evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:699_4: me saṃsārasuddhi hotī”ti maññamāno. Andhabhūto puthujjanoti paññācakkhuvekallena
atk-s0508a2:699_5: avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthujjano hutvā vanagahanapabbatagahanādīni viya duratikkamanaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a2:699_6: diṭṭhiyeva gahanaṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ, taṃ pakkhando anupaviṭṭhoti diṭṭhigahanapakkhando.
atk-s0508a2:699_7: Parāmāsenāti dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā “idameva sacca”nti parāmasanato parāmāsasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a2:699_8: micchābhinivesena. Mohitoti mūḷhabhāvaṃ pāpito. Asuddhiṃ maññisaṃ suddhinti asuddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:699_9: maggaṃ “suddhiṃ magga”nti maññisaṃ maññiṃ. Tattha kāraṇamāha “andhabhūto aviddasū”ti.
atk-s0508a2:699_10: Yasmā avijjāya andhabhūto, tato eva dhammādhammaṃ yuttāyuttañca avidvā, tasmā tathā maññinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:700_0: Micchādiṭṭhi pahīnā meti evaṃbhūtassa pana satthu sammukhā catusaccagabbhaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0508a2:700_1: sutvā yoniso paṭipajjantassa ariyamaggasammādiṭṭhiyā sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhi samucchedappahānavasena
atk-s0508a2:700_2: mayhaṃ pahīnā. Bhavāti kāmabhavādayo sabbepi bhavā ariyamaggasatthena vidālitā viddhaṃsitā.
atk-s0508a2:700_3: Juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyagginti āhavanīyādike aggī chaḍḍetvā sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya
atk-s0508a2:700_4: sabbassa ca pāpassa dahanato dakkhiṇeyyaggiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ juhāmi paricarāmi. Tayidaṃ
atk-s0508a2:700_6: āha “namassāmi tathāgata”nti. Atha vā juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyagginti dāyakānaṃ dakkhiṇāya
atk-s0508a2:700_7: mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena pāpassa ca dahanena dakkhiṇeyyaggibhūtaṃ attānaṃ juhāmi paricarāmi
atk-s0508a2:700_8: tathā katvā paricarāmi, tathā katvā pariharāmi. Pubbe aggidevaṃ namassāmi, idāni
atk-s0508a2:701_0: Mohā sabbe pahīnā meti dukkhe aññāṇādibhedā sabbe mohā mayhaṃ pahīnā samucchinnā,
atk-s0508a2:701_1: tato eva “bhavataṇhā padālitā. Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti tīsu
atk-s0508a2:704_0: Pāto majjhanhikantiādikā āyasmato gayākassapattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:704_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a2:704_2: ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a2:704_3: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṃ kāretvā vanamūlaphalāhāro
atk-s0508a2:704_4: vasati. Tena ca samayena bhagavā eko adutiyo tassa assamasamīpena gacchati. So bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:704_5: disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito velaṃ oloketvā manoharāni
atk-s0508a2:704_6: kolaphalāni satthu upanesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:704_7: buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:704_8: pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dvīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ gayāyaṃ viharati. Gayāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:704_9: vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca gayākassapoti samaññā ahosi. So bhagavatā saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:704_10: parisāya ehibhikkhūpasampadaṃ datvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya ovadiyamāno arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:707: “Tamhi kāle sikhī buddho, eko adutiyo ahu;
atk-s0508a2:714: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpapavāhanakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:719: “Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ pāpaṃ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu;
atk-s0508a2:720: Taṃ dānīdha pavāhemi, evaṃdiṭṭhi pure ahuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:726: Suddho suddhassa dāyādo, putto buddhassa oraso.
atk-s0508a2:729: Tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:731_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – pāto sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ, majjhanhikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:731_1: majjhanhavelāyaṃ, sāyaṃ sāyanhavelāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ tayo vāre ahaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:731_2: otariṃ ogāhiṃ. Otaranto ca sohaṃ na yattha katthaci yadā vā tadā vā otariṃ, atha
atk-s0508a2:731_3: kho gayāya mahājanassa “pāpapavāhana”nti abhisammate gayātitthe, gayaphagguyā gayāphaggunāmake
atk-s0508a2:732_0: Idāni tadā yenādhippāyena udakorohanamanuyuttaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ mayā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:732_1: Tassattho – “yaṃ mayā pubbe ito aññāsu jātīsu pāpakammaṃ upacitaṃ. Taṃ idāni idha
atk-s0508a2:732_2: gayātitthe imissā ca gayāphagguyā iminā udakorohanena pavāhemi apanemi vikkhālemī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:732_3: Pure satthu sāsanupagamanato pubbe evaṃdiṭṭhi evarūpaviparītadassano ahuṃ ahosiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:733_0: Dhammatthasahitaṃ padanti vibhattialopena niddeso. Dhammena ca atthena ca sahitakoṭṭhāsaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:733_1: ādito majjhato pariyosānato ca dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ atthūpasaṃhitaṃ suṭṭhu ekantena niyyānikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:733_2: katvā bhāsitaṃ vācaṃ sammāsambuddhavacanaṃ sutvā tena pakāsitaṃ paramatthabhāvena
atk-s0508a2:733_3: tacchabhāvato tathaṃ yathārahaṃ pavattinivattiupāyabhāve byabhicārābhāvato yāthāvakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:733_4: dukkhādiatthaṃ yoniso upāyena pariññeyyādibhāvena paccavekkhisaṃ “dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:733_5: samudayo pahātabbo, nirodho sacchikātabbo, maggo bhāvetabbo”ti patiavekkhiṃ, ñāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0508a2:734_0: Ninhātasabbapāpomhīti evaṃ paṭividdhasaccattā eva ariyamaggajalena vikkhālitasabbapāpo
atk-s0508a2:734_1: amhi. Tato eva rāgamalādīnaṃ abhāvena nimmalattā nimmalo. Tato eva parisuddhakāyasamācāratāya
atk-s0508a2:734_2: parisuddhavacīsamācāratāya parisuddhamanosamācāratāya payato suci suddho. Savāsanasabbakilesamalavisuddhiyā
atk-s0508a2:734_3: suddhassa buddhassa bhagavato lokuttaradhammadāyassa ādiyanato dāyādo. Tasseva desanāñāṇasamuṭṭhānaurovāyāmajanitābhijātitāya
atk-s0508a2:735_0: Punapi attano paramatthato nhātakabhāvameva vibhāvetuṃ “ogayhā”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:735_1: Tattha ogayhāti ogāhetvā anupavisitvā. Aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ sotanti sammādiṭṭhiādīhi aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:735_2: maggasotaṃ. Sabbapāpaṃ pavāhayinti anavasesaṃ pāpamalaṃ pakkhālesiṃ, ariyamaggajalapavāhanena
atk-s0508a2:735_3: paramatthanhātako ahosiṃ. Tato eva tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a2:738_0: Vātarogābhinītotiādikā āyasmato vakkalittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:738_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a2:738_2: haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu santikaṃ gacchantehi upāsakehi
atk-s0508a2:738_3: saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:738_4: saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento sattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:738_5: mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā byākari.
atk-s0508a2:739_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ satthu kāle sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:739_1: brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, vakkalītissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vuddhippatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0508a2:739_2: brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato satthāraṃ disvā rūpakāyassa sampattidassanena atitto
atk-s0508a2:739_3: satthārā saddhiṃyeva vicarati. “Agāramajjhe vasanto niccakālaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:739_4: na labhissāmī”ti satthu santike pabbajitvā ṭhapetvā bhojanavelaṃ sarīrakiccakālañca
atk-s0508a2:739_5: sesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ, tattha ṭhito aññaṃ kiccaṃ pahāya
atk-s0508a2:739_6: bhagavantaṃ olokentova viharati. Satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento bahukālaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:739_7: rūpadassaneneva vicarante kiñci avatvā punekadivasaṃ “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena
atk-s0508a2:739_8: diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passati. Yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:739_9: passati. Dhammañhi, vakkali, passanto maṃ passati, maṃ passanto dhammaṃ passatī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:740_0: Satthari evaṃ vadantepi thero satthu dassanaṃ pahāya aññattha gantuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0508a2:740_1: Tato satthā “nāyaṃ bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī”ti vassūpanāyikadivase
atk-s0508a2:740_2: “apehi, vakkalī”ti theraṃ paṇāmesi. So satthārā paṇāmito sammukhe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0508a2:740_3: “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, yohaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmī”ti gijjhakūṭapabbate papātaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:740_4: abhiruhi. Satthā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto
atk-s0508a2:740_5: maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ nāseyyā”ti attānaṃ dassetuṃ obhāsaṃ vissajjento –
atk-s0508a2:743_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “ehi, vakkalī”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Thero “dasabalo me diṭṭho, ‘ehī’ti
atk-s0508a2:743_1: avhānampi laddha”nti balavapītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā “kuto āgacchāmī”ti attano gamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:743_2: ajānitvā satthu sammukhe ākāse pakkhandanto paṭhamapādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva satthārā
atk-s0508a2:743_3: vuttagāthaṃ āvajjento ākāseyeva pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:744_0: Idha pana evaṃ vadanti – “kiṃ te, vakkalī”tiādinā satthārā ovadito gijjhakūṭe viharanto
atk-s0508a2:744_1: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tassa saddhāya balavabhāvato eva vipassanā vīthiṃ na otarati,
atk-s0508a2:744_2: bhagavā taṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. Puna vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:744_3: nāsakkhiyeva, athassa āhāravekallena vātābādho uppajji, taṃ vātābādhena pīḷiyamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:762_0: Tattha vātarogābhinītoti vātābādhena aseribhāvaṃ upanīto, vātabyādhinā abhibhūto.
atk-s0508a2:762_1: Tvanti theraṃ ālapati. Viharanti tena iriyāpathavihārena viharanto. Kānane vaneti
atk-s0508a2:762_2: kānanabhūte vane, mahāaraññeti attho. Paviddhagocareti vissaṭṭhagocare dullabhapaccaye.
atk-s0508a2:762_3: Vātarogassa sappāyānaṃ sappiādibhesajjānaṃ abhāvena pharusabhūmibhāgatāya ca lūkhe
atk-s0508a2:762_4: lūkhaṭṭhāne. Kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasīti bhikkhu tvaṃ kathaṃ viharissasīti bhagavā pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:763_0: Taṃ sutvā thero nirāmisapītisomanassādinā attano sukhavihāraṃ pakāsento “pītisukhenā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:763_1: Tattha pītisukhenāti ubbegalakkhaṇāya pharaṇalakkhaṇāya ca pītiyā taṃsampayuttasukhena
atk-s0508a2:763_2: ca. Tenāha “vipulenā”ti uḷārenāti attho. Pharamāno samussayanti yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhitehi
atk-s0508a2:763_3: paṇītehi rūpehi sakalaṃ kāyaṃ pharāpento nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ karonto. Lūkhampi abhisambhontoti
atk-s0508a2:763_4: araññāvāsajanitaṃ sallekhavuttihetukaṃ dussahampi paccayalūkhaṃ abhibhavanto adhivāsento.
atk-s0508a2:763_5: Viharissāmi kānaneti jhānasukhena vipassanāsukhena ca araññāyatane viharissāmīti
atk-s0508a2:765: Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata”nti ca. ;
atk-s0508a2:766_0: Bhāvento satipaṭṭhāneti maggapariyāpanne kāyānupassanādike cattāro satipaṭṭhāne uppādento
atk-s0508a2:766_1: vaḍḍhento ca. Indriyānīti maggapariyāpannāni eva saddhādīni pañcindriyāni. Balānīti
atk-s0508a2:766_2: tathā saddhādīni pañca balāni. Bojjhaṅgānīti tathā satisambojjhaṅgādīni satta bojjhaṅgāni.
atk-s0508a2:766_3: Ca-saddena sammappadhānaiddhipādamaggaṅgāni saṅgaṇhāti. Tadavinābhāvato hi taggahaṇeneva
atk-s0508a2:766_4: tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ hoti. Viharissāmīti yathāvutte bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvento maggasukhena
atk-s0508a2:767_1: patipesitacitte. Niccaṃ daḷhaparakkameti sabbakālaṃ asithilavīriye. Avivādavasena
atk-s0508a2:767_2: kāyasāmaggidānavasena ca samagge. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena sahite sabrahmacārī disvā.
atk-s0508a2:768_0: Anussaranto sambuddhanti sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhaṃ sabbasattuttamatāya,
atk-s0508a2:768_1: aggaṃ uttamena damathena dantaṃ, anuttarasamādhinā samāhitaṃ atandito analaso hutvā,
atk-s0508a2:768_2: rattindivaṃ sabbakālaṃ “itipi so bhagavā araha”ntiādinā anussaranto viharissāmi.
atk-s0508a2:769: Evaṃ pana vatvā thero vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:781: Rañjayaṃ parisaṃ sabbaṃ, santhavī sāvakaṃ sakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:783: Natthi etādiso añño, yathāyaṃ bhikkhu vakkali.
atk-s0508a2:785: Hutvā sutvā ca taṃ vākyaṃ, taṃ ṭhānamabhirocayiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:790: “Yo so tayā santhavito, ito sattamake muni;
atk-s0508a2:791: Bhikkhu saddhāvataṃ aggo, tādiso homahaṃ mune.
atk-s0508a2:801: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:803: Vakkali nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:807: Sāvatthiyaṃ pure jāto, kule aññatare ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:811: Imaṃ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyaka.
atk-s0508a2:812: “Tadā paṭiggahi so maṃ, bhītānaṃ saraṇo muni;
atk-s0508a2:821: Alaṃ vakkali kiṃ rūpe, ramase bālanandite.
atk-s0508a2:822: “Yo hi passati saddhammaṃ, so maṃ passati paṇḍito;
atk-s0508a2:823: Apassamāno saddhammaṃ, maṃ passampi na passati.
atk-s0508a2:831: Vakkalīti jino vācaṃ, taṃ sutvā mudito ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:841: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi thero imā eva gāthā abhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
