atk-s0508a2:844_0: Olaggessāmītiādikā āyasmato vijitasenattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:844_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0508a2:844_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:844_3: pabbajitvā araññe viharanto ākāsena gacchantaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pasannākāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:844_4: dassento añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ākāsato otari. So
atk-s0508a2:844_5: bhagavato manoharāni madhurāni phalāni upanesi, paṭiggahesi bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya.
atk-s0508a2:844_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe hatthācariyakule
atk-s0508a2:844_7: nibbattitvā vijitasenoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa mātulā seno ca upaseno
atk-s0508a2:844_8: cāti dve hatthācariyā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajitvā vāsadhuraṃ
atk-s0508a2:844_9: pūrentā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Vijitasenopi hatthisippe nipphattiṃ gato nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a2:844_10: gharāvāse alaggamānaso satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātulattherānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:844_11: santike pabbajitvā tesaṃ ovādānusāsaniyā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanāvīthiṃ
atk-s0508a2:844_12: laṅghitvā bahiddhā nānārammaṇe vidhāvantaṃ attano cittaṃ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a2:847: Na taṃ pāpe niyojessaṃ, kāmajālaṃ sarīrajaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:849: “Tvaṃ olaggo na gacchasi, dvāravivaraṃ gajova alabhanto;
atk-s0508a2:850: Na ca cittakali punappunaṃ, pasakka pāparato carissasi.
atk-s0508a2:853: Balavā āvatteti akāmaṃ, evaṃ āvattayissaṃ taṃ.
atk-s0508a2:856: Evaṃ damayissaṃ taṃ, patiṭṭhito pañcasu balesu.
atk-s0508a2:859: Vīriyadhuraniggahito, na yito dūraṃ gamissase cittā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:861_0: Tattha olaggessāmīti saṃvarissāmi nivāressāmi. Teti taṃ. Upayogatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:861_1: Te gamananti vā vacanaseso. Hatthinanti ca hatthinti attho. Cittāti attano cittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:861_2: ālapati. Yathā taṃ vāretukāmo, taṃ dassento “āṇidvāreva hatthina”nti āha. Āṇidvāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:861_3: nāma pākārabaddhassa nagarassa khuddakadvāraṃ, yaṃ ghaṭikāchidde āṇimhi pakkhitte
atk-s0508a2:861_4: yantena vinā abbhantare ṭhitehipi vivarituṃ na sakkā. Yena manussagavassamahiṃsādayo
atk-s0508a2:861_5: na niggantuṃ sakkā. Nagarato bahi niggantukāmampi hatthiṃ yato palobhetvā hatthācariyo
atk-s0508a2:861_6: gamanaṃ nivāresi. Atha vā āṇidvāraṃ nāma palighadvāraṃ. Tattha hi tiriyaṃ palighaṃ
atk-s0508a2:861_7: ṭhapetvā rukkhasūcisaṅkhātaṃ āṇiṃ palighasīse āvuṇanti. Pāpeti rūpādīsu uppajjanakaabhijjhādipāpadhamme
atk-s0508a2:861_8: taṃ na niyojessaṃ na niyojissāmi. Kāmajālāti kāmassa jālabhūtaṃ. Yathā hi macchabandhamigaluddānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:861_9: jālaṃ nāma macchādīnaṃ tesaṃ yathākāmakārasādhanaṃ, evaṃ ayonisomanasikārānupātitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:861_10: cittaṃ mārassa kāmakārasādhanaṃ. Tena hi so satte anatthesu pāteti. Sarīrajāti sarīresu
atk-s0508a2:861_11: uppajjanaka. Pañcavokārabhave hi cittaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttitāya “sarīraja”nti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:862_0: Tvaṃ olaggo na gacchasīti tvaṃ, cittakali, mayā satipaññāpatodaaṅkusehi vārito na
atk-s0508a2:862_1: dāni yathāruciṃ gamissasi, ayonisomanasikāravasena yathākāmaṃ vattituṃ na labhissasi.
atk-s0508a2:862_2: Yathā kiṃ? Dvāravivaraṃ gajova alabhanto nagarato gajanirodhato vā niggamanāya dvāravivarakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:862_3: alabhamāno hatthī viya. Cittakalīti cittakāḷakaṇṇi. Punappunanti aparāparaṃ. Pasakkāti
atk-s0508a2:862_4: saraṇasampassāsavasena. Pāparatoti pāpakammanirato pubbe viya idāni na carissasi
atk-s0508a2:863_0: Adantanti adamitaṃ hatthisikkhaṃ asikkhitaṃ. Navaggahanti aciragahitaṃ. Aṅkusaggahoti
atk-s0508a2:863_1: hatthācariyo. Balavāti kāyabalena ñāṇabalena ca balavā. Āvatteti akāmanti anicchantameva
atk-s0508a2:863_2: nisedhanato nivatteti. Evaṃ āvattayissanti yathā yathāvuttaṃ hatthiṃ hatthācariyo,
atk-s0508a2:863_3: evaṃ taṃ cittaṃ cittakaliṃ duccaritanisedhanato nivattayissāmi.
atk-s0508a2:864_0: Varahayadamakusaloti uttamānaṃ assadammānaṃ damane kusalo. Tato eva sārathipavaro
atk-s0508a2:864_1: assadammasārathīsu visiṭṭho dameti ājaññaṃ ājānīyaṃ assadammaṃ desakālānurūpaṃ saṇhapharusehi
atk-s0508a2:864_2: dameti vineti nibbisevanaṃ karoti. Patiṭṭhito pañcasu balesūti saddhādīsu pañcasu
atk-s0508a2:864_3: balesu patiṭṭhito hutvā assaddhiyādinisedhanato taṃ damayissaṃ damessāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:865_0: Satiyā taṃ nibandhissanti gocarajjhattato bahi gantuṃ adento satiyottena kammaṭṭhānathambhe,
atk-s0508a2:865_1: cittakali, taṃ nibandhissāmi niyamessāmi. Payutto te damessāmīti tattha nibandhanto
atk-s0508a2:865_2: eva yuttappayutto hutvā te damessāmi, saṃkilesamalato taṃ visodhessāmi. Vīriyadhuraniggahitoti
atk-s0508a2:865_3: yathāvutto chekena susārathinā yuge yojito yuganiggahito yugantaragato taṃ nātikkamati,
atk-s0508a2:865_4: evaṃ tvampi citta, mama vīriyadhure niggahito sakkaccakāritāya sātaccakāritāya aññathā
atk-s0508a2:865_5: vattituṃ alabhanto ito gocarajjhattato dūraṃ bahi na gamissasi. Bhāvanānuyuttassa
atk-s0508a2:865_6: hi kammaṭṭhānato aññaṃ āsannampi lakkhaṇato dūramevāti evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi attano
atk-s0508a2:865_7: cittaṃ niggaṇhantova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:869: Anukampatu maṃ buddho, bhikkhaṃ icchāmi dātave.
atk-s0508a2:875: Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, abhivandiṃ tadā jinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:879: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:882_0: Upārambhacittotiādikā āyasmato yasadattattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:882_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacini. Tathā hesa padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:882_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato
atk-s0508a2:882_3: kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:882_4: añjaliṃ paggayha abhitthavi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:882_5: buddhuppāde mallaraṭṭhe mallarājakule nibbattitvā yasadattoti laddhanāmo, vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:882_6: takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni sikkhitvā sabhiyena paribbājakena saddhiṃyeva cārikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:882_7: caramāno, anupubbena sāvatthiyaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sabhiyena puṭṭhapañhesu
atk-s0508a2:882_8: vissajjiyamānesu sayaṃ otārāpekkho suṇanto nisīdi “samaṇassa gotamassa vāde dosaṃ
atk-s0508a2:882_9: dassāmī”ti. Athassa bhagavā cittācāraṃ ñatvā sabhiyasuttadesanāvasāne ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a2:885: Ārakā hoti saddhammā, nabhaso pathavī yathā.
atk-s0508a2:894: Na virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva pūtikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:900_0: Tattha upārambhacittoti sārambhacitto, dosāropanādhippāyoti attho. Dummedhoti nippañño.
atk-s0508a2:900_1: Ārakā hoti saddhammāti so tādiso puggalo nabhaso viya pathavī paṭipattisaddhammatopi
atk-s0508a2:900_2: dūre hoti, pageva paṭivedhasaddhammato. “Na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:901_1: nihīyati. Parisussatīti visussati kāyacittānaṃ pīṇanarasassa pītipāmojjādikusaladhammassābhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:901_2: Na virūhatīti virūḷhiṃ vuddhiṃ na pāpuṇāti. Pūtikanti gomayalepadānādiabhāvena pūtibhāvaṃ pattaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:902_0: Tuṭṭhena cittenāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ, attamano pamudito hutvāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:902_1: Khepetvāti samucchinditvā. Akuppatanti arahattaṃ. Pappuyyāti pāpuṇitvā. Paramaṃ santinti
atk-s0508a2:902_2: anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ. Tadadhigamo cassa kevalaṃ kālāgamanameva, na kocividhoti taṃ
atk-s0508a2:903: Evaṃ satthārā ovadito saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:907: Ekaṃsaṃ ajinaṃ katvā, buddhaseṭṭhaṃ thaviṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:911: Ñāṇe te upamā natthi, yāvatā jagato gati.
atk-s0508a2:917: Arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi thero imā eva gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:920_0: Upasampadā ca me laddhātiādikā āyasmato soṇassa kuṭikaṇṇassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:920_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vibhavasampanno seṭṭhi hutvā uḷārāya
atk-s0508a2:920_2: issariyasampattiyā ṭhito ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivutaṃ mahatiyā
atk-s0508a2:920_3: buddhalīḷāya mahantena buddhānubhāvena nagaraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā
atk-s0508a2:920_4: añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi. So pacchābhattaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:920_5: santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0508a2:920_6: disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0508a2:920_7: anantarāyataṃ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:921_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a2:921_1: sāsane pabbajitvā vattapaṭivattāni pūrento ekassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ sibbitvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:921_2: Puna buddhasuññe loke bārāṇasiyaṃ tunnavāyo hutvā ekassa paccekabuddhassa cīvarakoṭiṃ
atk-s0508a2:921_3: chinnaṃ ghaṭetvā adāsi. Evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a2:921_4: kuraraghare mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti. Soṇotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:921_5: Koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena “koṭikaṇṇo”ti vattabbe kuṭikaṇṇoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a2:922_0: So anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapento āyasmante mahākaccāne kulagharaṃ nissāya
atk-s0508a2:922_1: pavattapabbate viharante tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a2:922_2: taṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi. So aparabhāge saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvego therassa santike
atk-s0508a2:922_3: pabbajitvā kicchena kasirena dasavaggaṃ saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā upasampajjitvā katipayakālaṃ
atk-s0508a2:922_4: therassa santike vasitvā, theraṃ āpucchitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ upagato,
atk-s0508a2:922_5: satthārā ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ labhitvā paccūsasamaye ajjhiṭṭho soḷasaaṭṭhakavaggiyānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:922_6: ussāraṇena sādhukāraṃ datvā bhāsitāya “disvā ādīnavaṃ loke”ti udānagāthāya pariyosāne
atk-s0508a2:922_7: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:928: Sayaṃ vīṇā pavajjanti, buddhassa pavisato puraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:931: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a2:936_0: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito attano upajjhāyena ācikkhitaniyāmena paccantimesu janapadesu
atk-s0508a2:936_1: vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā, dhuvanhānaṃ, cammattharaṇaṃ, guṇaṅguṇūpāhanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:936_2: cīvaravippavāsoti pañca vare yācitvā te satthu santikā labhitvā punadeva attano vasitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:936_3: gantvā upajjhāyassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:936_4: āgatanayena veditabbo. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “upasampanno hutvā attano upajjhāyassa
atk-s0508a2:936_5: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:937: So aparabhāge vimuttisukhena viharanto attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:939: “Upasampadā ca me laddhā, vimutto camhi anāsavo;
atk-s0508a2:940: So ca me bhagavā diṭṭho, vihāre ca sahāvasiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:954_0: Tattha upasampadā ca me laddhāti yā sā kicchena dasavaggaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā
atk-s0508a2:954_1: attanā laddhā upasampadā. Yā ca pana varadānavasena sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu
atk-s0508a2:954_2: vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena satthārā anuññātā upasampadā, tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0508a2:954_3: Ca-saddo samuccayattho, tena itarepi satthu santikā laddhavare saṅgaṇhāti. Vimutto
atk-s0508a2:954_4: camhi anāsavoti aggamaggena sakalakilesavatthuvimuttiyā vimutto ca amhi. Tato eva
atk-s0508a2:954_5: kāmāsavādīhi anāsavo amhīti yojanā. So ca me bhagavā diṭṭhoti yadatthaṃ ahaṃ avantiraṭṭhato
atk-s0508a2:954_6: sāvatthiṃ gato, so ca bhagavā mayā adiṭṭhapubbo diṭṭho. Vihāre ca sahāvasinti na
atk-s0508a2:954_7: kevalaṃ tassa bhagavato dassanameva mayā laddhaṃ, atha kho vihāre satthu gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:954_8: satthārā kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā vāsentena saha avasiṃ. “Vihāreti vihārasamīpe”ti keci.
atk-s0508a2:955_0: Bahudeva rattinti paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāvasena kammaṭṭhānasodhanavasena
atk-s0508a2:955_1: ca, majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ devānaṃ brahmūnañca kaṅkhacchedanavasena bhagavā bahudeva rattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:955_2: abbhokāse atināmayi vītināmesi. Vihārakusaloti dibbabrahmaāneñjaariyavihāresu kusalo.
atk-s0508a2:955_3: Vihāraṃ pāvisīti ativelaṃ nisajjacaṅkamehi uppannaparissamavinodanatthaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0508a2:956_0: Santharitvāna saṅghāṭiṃ, seyyaṃ kappesīti catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā sīhaseyyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:956_1: kappesi. Tenāha “gotamo sīho selaguhāyaṃva pahīnabhayabheravo”ti. Tattha gotamoti
atk-s0508a2:956_2: bhagavantaṃ gottena kitteti. Sīho selaguhāyaṃvāti selassa pabbatassa guhāyaṃ. Yathā
atk-s0508a2:956_3: sīho migarājā tejussadatāya pahīnabhayabheravo dakkhiṇena passena pāde pādaṃ accādhāya
atk-s0508a2:956_4: seyyaṃ kappesi, evaṃ cittutrāsalomahaṃsanachambhitattahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā
atk-s0508a2:956_5: pahīnabhayabheravo gotamo bhagavā seyyaṃ kappesīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:957_0: Tatoti pacchā, sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā “paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo
atk-s0508a2:957_1: bhāsitu”nti satthārā ajjhesitoti attho. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇoti sundaravacīkaraṇo, lakkhaṇasampannavacanakkamoti
atk-s0508a2:957_2: attho. Soṇo abhāsi saddhammanti soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggiyasuttāni soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo, buddhaseṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a2:957_3: sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā, paccakkhato abhāsīti thero attānameva paraṃ viya avoca.
atk-s0508a2:958_0: Pañcakkhandhe pariññāyāti pañcupādānakkhandhe tīhipi pariññāhi parijānitvā te parijānantoyeva,
atk-s0508a2:958_1: añjasaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayitvā, paramaṃ santiṃ nibbānaṃ pappuyya pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0508a2:958_2: ṭhito anāsavo. Tato eva idāni parinibbissati anupādisesanibbānavasena nibbāyissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:961_0: Yo eva garūnantiādikā āyasmato kosiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:961_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:961_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a2:961_3: ucchukhaṇḍikaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:961_4: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, kosiyotissa gottavasena nāmaṃ akāsi. So viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a2:961_5: patto āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ abhiṇhaṃ upasaṅkamati, tassa santike dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0508a2:961_6: So tena sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:969: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā garuvāsaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0508a2:971: “Yo ve garūnaṃ vacanaññu dhīro, vase ca tamhi janayetha pemaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:972: So bhattimā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:975: So thāmavā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:977: “Yo ve samuddova ṭhito anejo, gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī;
atk-s0508a2:978: Asaṃhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:980: “Bahussuto dhammadharo ca hoti, dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī;
atk-s0508a2:981: So tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:988_0: Tattha yoti khattiyādīsu catūsu parisāsu yo koci. Veti byattaṃ. Garūnanti sīlādigaruguṇayuttānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:988_1: paṇḍitānaṃ. Vacanaññūti tesaṃ anusāsanīvacanaṃ jānanto, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno
atk-s0508a2:988_2: paṭipajjitvā ca tassa phalaṃ jānantoti attho. Dhīroti dhitisampanno. Vase ca tamhi
atk-s0508a2:988_3: janayetha pemanti tasmiṃ garūnaṃ vacane ovāde vaseyya yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjeyya,
atk-s0508a2:988_4: paṭipajjitvā “iminā vatāhaṃ ovādena imaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ vītivatto”ti tattha janayetha
atk-s0508a2:988_5: pemaṃ gāravaṃ uppādeyya. Idañhi dvayaṃ “garūnaṃ vacanaññu dhīro”ti padadvayena vuttassevatthassa
atk-s0508a2:988_6: pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Soti yo garūnaṃ vacanaññū dhīro, so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā tattha
atk-s0508a2:988_7: bhattimā ca nāma hoti, jīvitahetupi tassa anatikkamanato paṇḍito ca nāma hoti. Ñatvā
atk-s0508a2:988_8: ca dhammesu visesi assāti tathā paṭipajjanto ca tāya eva paṭipattiyā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:989_0: Yanti yaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipattiyā antarāyakaraṇato “āpadā”ti laddhavohārā sotuṇhakhuppipāsādipākaṭaparissayā
atk-s0508a2:989_1: ceva rāgādipaṭicchannaparissayā ca uppatitā uppannā, uḷārā balavantopi nakkhambhayante
atk-s0508a2:989_2: na kiñci cālenti. Kasmā? Paṭisaṅkhayantanti paṭisaṅkhāyamānaṃ paṭisaṅkhānabale ṭhitanti
atk-s0508a2:989_3: attho. Soti yo daḷhatarāhi āpadāhipi akkhambhanīyo, so thāmavā dhitimā daḷhaparakkamo
atk-s0508a2:989_5: ca nāma hoti. Tathābhūto ca ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assāti taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a2:990_0: Samuddova ṭhitoti samuddo viya ṭhitasabhāvo. Yathā hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre
atk-s0508a2:990_1: sinerupādasamīpe mahāsamuddo aṭṭhahipi disāhi uṭṭhitehi pakativātehi aniñjanato ṭhito
atk-s0508a2:990_2: anejo gambhīro ca, evaṃ kilesavātehi titthiyavādavātehi ca akampanīyato ṭhito anejo.
atk-s0508a2:990_3: Gambhīrassa anupacitañāṇasambhārehi aladdhagādhassa nipuṇassa sukhumassa paṭiccasamuppādādiatthassa
atk-s0508a2:990_4: paṭivijjhanena gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī. Asaṃhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito so
atk-s0508a2:990_5: tādiso puggalo kilesehi devaputtamārādīsu vā kenaci asaṃhāriyatāya asaṃhāriyo nāma
atk-s0508a2:990_6: hoti, yathāvuttena atthena paṇḍito ca nāma hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:991_0: Bahussutoti pariyattibāhusaccavasena bahussuto, suttageyyādi bahuṃ sutaṃ etassāti
atk-s0508a2:991_1: bahussuto. Tameva dhammaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantameva
atk-s0508a2:991_2: dhāretīti dhammadharo ca hoti. Dhammassa hoti anudhammacārīti yathāsutassa yathāpariyattassa
atk-s0508a2:991_3: dhammassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpaṃ dhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:991_5: hoti, “ajja ajjevā”ti paṭivedhaṃ ākaṅkhanto vicarati. So tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍitoti
atk-s0508a2:991_6: yo puggalo yaṃ garuṃ nissāya bahussuto dhammadharo dhammassa ca anudhammacārī hoti.
atk-s0508a2:991_7: So ca tādiso tena garunā sadiso paṇḍito nāma hoti paṭipattiyā sadisabhāvato. Tathābhūto
atk-s0508a2:991_8: pana so ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa, taṃ vuttatthaṃva.
atk-s0508a2:992_0: Atthañca yo jānāti bhāsitassāti yo puggalo sammāsambuddhena bhāsitassa pariyattidhammassa
atk-s0508a2:992_1: atthaṃ jānāti. Jānanto pana “idha sīlaṃ vuttaṃ, idha samādhi, idha paññā”ti tattha
atk-s0508a2:992_2: tattha yathāvuttaṃ atthañca ñatvāna tathā karoti yathā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā
atk-s0508a2:992_3: paṭipajjati. Atthantaro nāma sa hoti paṇḍitoti so evarūpo puggalo atthantaro atthakāraṇā
atk-s0508a2:992_4: sīlādiatthajānanamattameva upanissayaṃ katvā paṇḍito hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:993_0: Ettha ca paṭhamagāthāya “yo ve garūna”ntiādinā saddhūpanissayo visesabhāvo vutto,
atk-s0508a2:993_1: dutiyagāthāya “yaṃ āpadā”ti ādinā vīriyūpanissayo, tatiyagāthāya “yo ve samuddova
atk-s0508a2:993_3: pañcamagāthāya “atthañca yo jānātī”tiādinā paññūpanissayo visesabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:998_0: Chakkanipāte disvāna pāṭihīrānītiādikā āyasmato uruvelakassapattherassa gāthā. Kā
atk-s0508a2:998_1: uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:998_2: kusalaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā, vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:998_3: satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mahāparisānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0508a2:998_4: disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānamakāsi. Bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:998_5: cassa anantarāyataṃ disvā, “anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane mahāparisānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:999_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvānavutikappamatthake
atk-s0508a2:999_1: phussassa bhagavato vemātikakaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti. Aññepissa dve kaniṭṭhabhātaro
atk-s0508a2:999_2: ahesuṃ. Te tayopi buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ paramāya pūjāya pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:999_3: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:999_4: brāhmaṇakule bhātaro hutvā, anukkamena nibbattā gottavasena tayopi kassapā eva nāma
atk-s0508a2:999_5: jātā. Te vayappattā tayo vede uggaṇhiṃsu. Tesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa pañca māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0508a2:999_6: parivāro, majjhimassa tīṇi, kaniṭṭhassa dve. Te attano ganthe sāraṃ olokentā diṭṭhadhammikameva
atk-s0508a2:999_7: atthaṃ disvā pabbajjaṃ rocesuṃ. Tesu jeṭṭhabhātā attano parivārena saddhiṃ uruvelaṃ
atk-s0508a2:999_8: gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā uruvelakassapo nāma jāto mahāgaṅgānadīvaṅke pabbajito
atk-s0508a2:999_9: nadīkassapo nāma jāto, gayāsīse pabbajito gayākassapo nāma jāto.
atk-s0508a2:1000_0: Evaṃ tesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha tattha vasantesu bahūnaṃ divasānaṃ accayena
atk-s0508a2:1000_1: amhākaṃ bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā, paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo anukkamena
atk-s0508a2:1000_2: dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā, pañcavaggiyatthere arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā yasappamukhe pañcapaññāsa
atk-s0508a2:1000_3: sahāyake vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante “caratha, bhikkhave, cārika”nti vissajjetvā, bhaddavaggiye
atk-s0508a2:1000_4: vinetvā uruvelakassapassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vasanatthāya agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0508a2:1000_5: tattha katanāgadamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassehi pāṭihāriyehi uruvelakassapaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1000_6: saparisaṃ vinetvā pabbājesi. Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ ñatvā itarepi dve bhātaro saparisā
atk-s0508a2:1000_7: āgantvā satthu santike pabbajiṃsu. Sabbeva ehibhikkhū iddhimayapattacīvaradharā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1001: Satthā taṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisinno ādittapariyāyadesanāya sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:1013: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1023: Parisā mahatī hotu, nibbattassa tahiṃ tahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1031: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:1033: Kassapo nāma gottena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:1036: “So ca sabbaṃ tamaṃ hantvā, vijaṭetvā mahājaṭaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1043: Khemaṃ vijiritaṃ katvā, puna dethāti bhāsatha.
atk-s0508a2:1055: Nibbute tamhi lokagge, pūjaṃ katvā yathābalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1063: Bahudhā saṃsito santo, diṭṭhiṃ hitvāna pāpikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1070: “Tadā dve bhātaro mayhaṃ, pabbajiṃsu mayā saha;
atk-s0508a2:1073: Tato me āsi paññatti, uruvelakassapo iti.
atk-s0508a2:1077: Mama pañca satānūnā, sissā sabbe mamānugā.
atk-s0508a2:1078: “Tadā upecca maṃ buddho, katvāna vividhāni me;
atk-s0508a2:1082: “Te cevaññe ca bahavo, sissā maṃ parivārayuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1085: Aho buddhe kataṃ kāraṃ, saphalaṃ me ajāyatha.
atk-s0508a2:1087: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a2:1093: Tato me āsi saṃvego, abbhuto lomahaṃsano.
atk-s0508a2:1107_0: Tattha disvāna pāṭihīrānīti nāgarājadamanādīni aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassāni pāṭihāriyāni disvā.
atk-s0508a2:1107_1: “Pāṭihīraṃ, pāṭiheraṃ, pāṭihāriya”nti hi atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Yasassino”ti
atk-s0508a2:1107_2: “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā sadevake loke yathābhuccaṃ patthaṭakittisaddassa. Na tāvāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1107_3: paṇipatinti yāva maṃ bhagavā “neva kho tvaṃ, kassapa, arahā, nāpi arahattamaggaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1107_4: samāpanno, sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa, arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti
atk-s0508a2:1107_5: na tajjesi, tāva ahaṃ na paṇipātanaṃ akāsiṃ. Kiṃkāraṇā? Issāmānena vañcito, “imassa
atk-s0508a2:1107_6: mayi sāvakattaṃ upagate mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati, imassa eva vaḍḍhissatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:1107_7: evaṃ parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya ceva, “ahaṃ gaṇapāmokkho bahujanasammato”ti
atk-s0508a2:1107_8: evaṃ abbhunnatilakkhaṇena mānena ca vañcito, palambhito hutvāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1108_0: Mama saṅkappamaññāyāti mayhaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ jānitvā, yaṃ yaṃ bhagavā uttari manussadhammā
atk-s0508a2:1108_1: iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti, taṃ taṃ disvā “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo”ti
atk-s0508a2:1108_2: cintetvāpi “na tveva kho arahā yathā aha”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ jānantopi
atk-s0508a2:1108_3: ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento ajjhupekkhitvā pacchā nerañjarāya majjhe samantato udakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1108_4: ussāretvā reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkamitvā tena ābhatanāvāya ṭhito tadāpi “mahiddhiko”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1108_5: cintetvā puna “na tveva kho arahā yathā aha”nti pavattitaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ ñatvāti
atk-s0508a2:1108_6: attho. Codesi narasārathīti tadā me ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā “neva kho tvaṃ arahā”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:1108_7: purisadammasārathi satthā maṃ codesi niggaṇhi. Tato me āsi saṃvego, abbhuto lomahaṃsanoti
atk-s0508a2:1108_8: tato yathāvuttacodanāhetu ettakaṃ kālaṃ abhūtapubbatāya abbhuto lomahaṃsanavasena
atk-s0508a2:1108_9: pavattiyā lomahaṃsano “anarahāva samāno ‘arahā’ti maññi”nti saṃvego sahottappo ñāṇuppādo mayhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:1109_0: Jaṭilabhūtassāti tāpasabhūtassa. Siddhīti lābhasakkārasamiddhi. Parittikāti appamattikā.
atk-s0508a2:1109_1: Tāhanti taṃ ahaṃ. Tadāti bhagavato codanāya saṃveguppattikāle. Nirākatvāti apanetvā
atk-s0508a2:1109_2: chaḍḍetvā, anapekkho hutvāti attho. “Iddhīti bhāvanāmayaiddhī”ti vadanti. Tadayuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1109_3: tadā tassa ajhānalābhībhāvato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kāmadhātupurakkhato”ti.
atk-s0508a2:1110_0: Yaññena santuṭṭhoti “yaññaṃ yajitvā saggasukhaṃ anubhavissāmi, alamettāvatā”ti yaññayajanena
atk-s0508a2:1110_1: santuṭṭho niṭṭhitakiccasaññī. Kāmadhātupurakkhatoti kāmasugatiṃ ārabbha uppannataṇho
atk-s0508a2:1110_2: yaññayajanena kāmalokaṃ purakkhatvā ṭhito. So ce yañño pāṇātipātapaṭisaṃyutto hoti,
atk-s0508a2:1110_3: na tena sugatiṃ sakkā laddhuṃ. Na hi akusalassa iṭṭho kanto vipāko nibbattati. Yā
atk-s0508a2:1110_4: pana tattha dānādikusalacetanā, tāya sati paccayasamavāye sugatiṃ gaccheyya. Pacchāti
atk-s0508a2:1110_5: tāpasapabbajjāto pacchā satthu ovādena tāpasaladdhiṃ pahāya catusaccakammaṭṭhānānuyogakāle.
atk-s0508a2:1110_6: Samūhaninti vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā rāgañca dosañca mohañca anavasesato samugghātesiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1111_0: Yasmā panāyaṃ thero ariyamaggena rāgādayo samūhanantoyeva chaḷabhiñño ahosi, tasmā
atk-s0508a2:1111_1: taṃ attano chaḷabhiññabhāvaṃ dassento “pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmī”tiādimāha. Tattha pubbenivāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1111_2: jānāmīti attano paresañca pubbenivāsaṃ atītāsu jātīsu nibbattakkhandhe khandhapaṭibaddhe
atk-s0508a2:1111_3: ca pubbenivāsañāṇena hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato jānāmi bujjhāmi. Dibbacakkhu
atk-s0508a2:1111_4: visodhitanti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visodhitaṃ, pakaticakkhunā āpāthagataṃ pakatirūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1111_5: viya dibbaṃ mānusampi dūraṃ tiroṭṭhitaṃ atisukhumañca rūpaṃ vibhāvetuṃ samatthañāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1111_6: bhāvanāya mayā visuddhaṃ katvā paṭiladdhanti attho. Iddhimāti adhiṭṭhāniddhivikubbaniddhiādīhi
atk-s0508a2:1111_7: iddhīhi iddhimā, iddhividhañāṇalābhīti attho. Sarāgādibhedassa paresaṃ cittassa jānanato
atk-s0508a2:1111_8: paracittaññū, cetopariyañāṇalābhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dibbasotañca pāpuṇinti dibbasotañāṇañca paṭilabhiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1112_0: So me attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayoti yo sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayabhūto
atk-s0508a2:1112_1: khayena vā laddhabbo, so sadattho paramattho ca mayā ariyamaggādhigamena adhigatoti.
atk-s0508a2:1112_2: Evametāya gāthāya therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:1115_0: Atihitā vīhītiādikā āyasmato tekicchakārittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1115_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a2:1115_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā vejjasatthe nipphattiṃ gato. Vipassissa
atk-s0508a2:1115_3: bhagavato upaṭṭhākaṃ asokaṃ nāma theraṃ byādhitaṃ arogamakāsi, aññesañca sattānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1116_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde subuddhassa nāma
atk-s0508a2:1116_1: brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa tikicchakehi gabbhakāle parissayaṃ apaharitvā
atk-s0508a2:1116_2: paripālitatāya tekicchakārīti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So attano kulānurūpāni vijjāṭṭhānāni
atk-s0508a2:1116_3: sippāni ca sikkhanto vaḍḍhati. Tadā cāṇakko subuddhassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ kiriyāsu
atk-s0508a2:1116_4: upāyakosallañca disvā, “ayaṃ imasmiṃ rājakule patiṭṭhaṃ labhanto maṃ abhibhaveyyā”ti
atk-s0508a2:1116_5: issāpakato raññā candaguttena taṃ bandhanāgāre khipāpesi. Tekicchakārī pitu bandhanāgārappavesanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1116_6: sutvā bhīto palāyitvā sāṇavāsittherassa santikaṃ gantvā attano saṃvegakāraṇaṃ therassa
atk-s0508a2:1116_7: kathetvā pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā abbhokāsiko nesajjiko ca hutvā viharati,
atk-s0508a2:1116_8: sītuṇhaṃ agaṇento samaṇadhammameva karoti, visesato brahmavihārabhāvanamanuyuñjati.
atk-s0508a2:1116_9: Taṃ disvā māro pāpimā “na imassa mama visayaṃ atikkamituṃ dassāmī”ti vikkhepaṃ kātukāmo
atk-s0508a2:1116_10: sassānaṃ nipphattikāle khettagopakavaṇṇena therassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ nippaṇḍento –
atk-s0508a2:1119: Na ca labhe piṇḍaṃ, kathamahaṃ kassa”nti. – āha; Taṃ sutvā thero –
atk-s0508a2:1121: “Buddhamappameyyaṃ anussara pasanno, pītiyā phuṭasarīro hohisi satatamudaggo.
atk-s0508a2:1128: Mā sītena pareto vihaññittho, pavisa tvaṃ vihāraṃ phusitaggaḷa”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:1131: “Phusissaṃ catasso appamaññāyo, tāhi ca sukhito viharissaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1132: Nāhaṃ sītena vihaññissaṃ, aniñjito viharanto”ti. – āha;
atk-s0508a2:1133_0: Tattha atihitā vīhīti vīhayo koṭṭhāgāraṃ atinetvā ṭhapitā, tattha paṭisāmitā khalato
atk-s0508a2:1133_1: vā gharaṃ upanītāti attho. Vīhiggahaṇena cettha itarampi dhaññaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sālī
atk-s0508a2:1133_2: pana yebhuyyena vīhito pacchā paccantīti āha. Khalagatā sālīti khalaṃ dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1133_3: gatā, tattha rāsivasena maddanacāvanādivasena ṭhitāti attho. Padhānadhaññabhāvadassanatthañcettha
atk-s0508a2:1133_4: sālīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, ubhayenapi gāme, gāmato bahi ca dhaññaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ṭhitanti
atk-s0508a2:1133_5: dasseti. Na ca labhe piṇḍanti evaṃ sulabhadhaññe subhikkhakāle ahaṃ piṇḍamattampi
atk-s0508a2:1133_6: na labhāmi. Idāni kathamahaṃ kassanti ahaṃ kathaṃ karissāmi, kathaṃ jīvissāmīti parihāsakeḷiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1134_0: Taṃ sutvā thero “ayaṃ varāko attanā attano pavattiṃ mayhaṃ pakāsesi, mayā pana attanāva
atk-s0508a2:1134_1: attā ovaditabbo, na mayā kiñci kathetabba”nti vatthuttayānussatiyaṃ attānaṃ niyojento
atk-s0508a2:1134_2: “buddhamappameyya”ntiādinā tisso gāthā abhāsi. Tattha buddhamappameyyaṃ anussara
atk-s0508a2:1134_3: pasannoti savāsanāya avijjāniddāya accantavigamena, buddhiyā ca vikasitabhāvena buddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1134_4: bhagavantaṃ pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ abhāvā aparimāṇaguṇasamaṅgitāya appameyyapuññakkhettatāya
atk-s0508a2:1134_5: ca appameyyaṃ. Okappanalakkhaṇena abhippasādena pasanno, pasannamānaso “itipi so
atk-s0508a2:1134_6: bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādinā anussara anu anu buddhārammaṇaṃ satiṃ pavattehi,
atk-s0508a2:1134_7: pītiyā phuṭasarīro hohisi. Satatamudaggoti anussarantova pharaṇalakkhaṇāya pītiyā
atk-s0508a2:1134_8: satataṃ sabbadā phuṭasarīro pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi ajjhotthaṭasarīro ubbegapītiyā
atk-s0508a2:1134_9: udaggo kāyaṃ udaggaṃ katvā ākāsaṃ laṅghituṃ samattho ca bhaveyyāsi, buddhānussatiyā
atk-s0508a2:1134_10: buddhārammaṇaṃ uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyyāsi. Yato sītuṇhehi viya jighacchāpipāsāhipi
atk-s0508a2:1135_0: Dhammanti ariyaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ. Saṅghanti ariyaṃ paramatthasaṅghaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:1135_1: Anussarāti panettha “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādinā dhammaṃ, “suppaṭipanno bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:1136_0: Evaṃ therena ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇe niyojanavasena attani ovadite puna māro vivekavāsato
atk-s0508a2:1136_1: naṃ vivecetukāmo hitesībhāvaṃ viya dassento “abbhokāse viharasī”ti pañcamaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:1136_2: Tassattho – tvaṃ, bhikkhu, abbhokāse kenaci apaṭicchanne vivaṭaṅgaṇe viharasi iriyāpathe
atk-s0508a2:1136_3: kappesi. Hemantikā himapātasamaye pariyāpannā imā sītā rattiyo vattanti. Tasmā sītena
atk-s0508a2:1136_4: pareto abhibhūto hutvā mā vihaññittho vighātaṃ mā āpajji mā kilami. Phusitaggaḷaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1136_5: pihitakavāṭaṃ senāsanaṃ pavisa, evaṃ te sukhavihāro bhavissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:1137_0: Taṃ sutvā thero “na mayhaṃ senāsanapariyesanāya payojanaṃ, etthevāhaṃ sukhavihārī”ti
atk-s0508a2:1137_1: dassento “phusissa”ntiādinā chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha phusissaṃ catasso appamaññāyoti
atk-s0508a2:1137_2: appamāṇagocaratāya “appamaññā”ti laddhavohāre cattāro brahmavihāre phusissaṃ phusissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:1137_3: kālena kālaṃ samāpajjissāmi. Tāhi ca sukhito viharissanti tāhi appamaññāhi sukhito
atk-s0508a2:1137_4: sañjātasukho hutvā viharissaṃ cattāropi iriyāpathe kappessāmīti. Tena mayhaṃ sabbakāle
atk-s0508a2:1137_5: sukhameva, na dukkhaṃ. Yato nāhaṃ sītena vihaññissaṃ antaraṭṭhakepi himapātasamaye
atk-s0508a2:1137_6: ahaṃ sītena na kilamissāmi, tasmā aniñjito viharanto cittassa iñjitakāraṇānaṃ byāpādādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1137_7: suppahīnattā paccayuppanniñjanāya ca abhāvato samāpattisukheneva sukhito viharissāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:1137_8: Evaṃ thero imaṃ gāthaṃ vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:1149: Ettha ca bindusārarañño kāle imassa therassa uppannattā tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ imā gāthā saṅgītāti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:1152_0: Yassa sabrahmacārīsūtiādikā āyasmato mahānāgattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:1152_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a2:1152_2: kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ kakusandhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1152_3: bhagavantaṃ araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle jhānasukhena nisinnaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:1152_4: pasannamānaso tassa dāḷimaphalaṃ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:1152_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete madhuvāseṭṭhassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:1152_6: mahānāgotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto bhagavati sākete añjanavane viharante
atk-s0508a2:1152_7: āyasmato gavampatittherassa pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho therasseva santike
atk-s0508a2:1152_8: pabbajitvā tassovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:1162: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto thero chabbaggiye bhikkhū sabrahmacārīsu gāravaṃ akatvā viharante disvā tesaṃ ovādadānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:1168: Na virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva pūtikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1174: Na vihāyati saddhammā, maccho bavhodake yathā.
atk-s0508a2:1177: So virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva bhaddakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1182_0: Tattha sabrahmacārīsūti samānaṃ brahmaṃ sīlādidhammaṃ carantīti sabrahmacārino, sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagatā
atk-s0508a2:1182_1: sahadhammikā, tesu. Gāravoti garubhāvo sīlādiguṇanimittaṃ garukaraṇaṃ. Nūpalabbhatīti
atk-s0508a2:1182_2: na vijjati na pavattati, na upatiṭṭhatīti attho. Nibbānāti kilesānaṃ nibbāpanato
atk-s0508a2:1182_3: kilesakkhayāti attho. Dhammarājassāti satthuno. Satthā hi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ yathārahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1182_4: lokiyalokuttarena dhammena rañjeti tosetīti dhammarājā. Ettha ca “dhammarājassa sāsane”ti
atk-s0508a2:1182_5: iminā nibbānaṃ nāma dhammarājasseva sāsane, na aññattha. Tattha yo sabrahmacārīsu
atk-s0508a2:1182_6: gāravarahito, so yathā nibbānā ārakā hoti, tathā dhammarājassa sāsanatopi ārakā hotīti
atk-s0508a2:1182_7: dasseti. Bavhodaketi bahuudake. Santike hoti nibbānanti nibbānaṃ tassa santike samīpe
atk-s0508a2:1182_8: eva hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Imā eva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1185_0: Kullo sivathikantiādikā āyasmato kullattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1185_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1185_2: kuṭumbiyakule nibbattitvā kulloti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1185_3: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. So ca rāgacaritattā tibbarāgajātiko hoti. Tenassa
atk-s0508a2:1185_4: abhikkhaṇaṃ kilesā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti. Athassa satthā cittācāraṃ ñatvā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1185_5: datvā, “kulla, tayā abhiṇhaṃ susāne cārikā caritabbā”ti āha. So susānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0508a2:1185_6: uddhumātakādīni tāni tāni asubhāni disvā taṃ muhuttaṃ asubhamanasikāraṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0508a2:1185_7: susānato nikkhantamattova kāmarāgena abhibhuyyati. Puna bhagavā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1185_8: ñatvā ekadivasaṃ tassa susānaṭṭhānaṃ gatakāle ekaṃ taruṇitthirūpaṃ adhunā mataṃ avinaṭṭhacchaviṃ
atk-s0508a2:1185_9: nimminitvā dasseti. Tassa taṃ diṭṭhamattassa jīvamānavisabhāgavatthusmiṃ viya sahasā
atk-s0508a2:1185_10: rāgo uppajjati. Atha naṃ satthā tassa pekkhantasseva navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharamānāsuciṃ
atk-s0508a2:1185_11: kimikulākulaṃ ativiya bībhacchaṃ duggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ katvā dassesi. So
atk-s0508a2:1185_12: taṃ pekkhanto virattacitto hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Athassa bhagavā obhāsaṃ pharitvā satiṃ janento –
atk-s0508a2:1188_0: Āha. Taṃ sutvā thero sammadeva sarīrasabhāvaṃ upadhārento asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0508a2:1188_1: tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1198: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1199: Yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho.
atk-s0508a2:1201: “Yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā;
atk-s0508a2:1202: Yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure.
atk-s0508a2:1207: Tattha kulloti attānameva thero paraṃ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:1208_0: Āturanti nānappakārehi dukkhehi abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷitaṃ. Asucinti sucirahitaṃ jegucchaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1208_1: paṭikkūlaṃ. Pūtinti duggandhaṃ. Passāti sabhāvato olokehi. Kullāti ovādakāle bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:1208_2: theraṃ ālapati. Udānakāle pana thero sayameva attānaṃ vadati. Samussayanti sarīraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1208_3: Uggharantanti uddhaṃ vaṇamukhehi asuciṃ savantaṃ. Paggharantanti adho vaṇamukhehi
atk-s0508a2:1208_4: samantato ca asuciṃ savantaṃ. Bālānaṃ abhinanditanti bālehi andhaputhujjanehi diṭṭhitaṇhābhinandanāhi
atk-s0508a2:1209_0: Dhammādāsanti dhammamayaṃ ādāsaṃ. Yathā hi sattā adāsena attano mukhe kāye vā guṇadose
atk-s0508a2:1209_1: passanti, evaṃ yogāvacaro yena attabhāve saṃkilesavodānadhamme yāthāvato passati,
atk-s0508a2:1209_2: taṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ idha “dhammādāsa”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ ñāṇadassanassa maggañāṇasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0508a2:1209_3: dhammacakkhussa adhigamāya attano santāne uppādetvā. Paccavekkhiṃ imaṃ kāyanti imaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1209_4: karajakāyaṃ niccasārādivirahato tucchaṃ attaparasantānānaṃ vibhāgato santarabāhiraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1210_0: Yathā pana paccavekkhiṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “yathā ida”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā idaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1210_1: tathā etanti yathā idaṃ mayhaṃ sarīrasaṅkhātaṃ asubhaṃ āyuusmāviññāṇānaṃ anapagamā
atk-s0508a2:1210_2: nānāvidhaṃ māyopamaṃ kiriyaṃ dasseti, tathāva etaṃ matasarīraṃ pubbe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1210_3: anapagamā ahosi. Yathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā na kiñci
atk-s0508a2:1210_4: kiriyaṃ dasseti, tathā idaṃ mama sarīrampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā nassatevāti. Yathā
atk-s0508a2:1210_5: ca idaṃ mama sarīraṃ etarahi susāne na mataṃ na sayitaṃ, na uddhumātakādibhāvaṃ upagataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1210_6: tathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīrampi pubbe ahosi. Yathā panetaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ susāne
atk-s0508a2:1210_7: sayitaṃ uddhumātakādibhāvaṃ upagataṃ, tathā idaṃ mama sarīrampi bhavissati. Atha
atk-s0508a2:1210_8: vā yathā idaṃ mama sarīraṃ asuci duggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1210_9: anattā, tathā etaṃ matasarīrampi. Yathā vā etaṃ matasarīraṃ asuciādisabhāvañceva
atk-s0508a2:1210_10: aniccādisabhāvañca, tathā idaṃ mama sarīrampi. Yathā adho tathā uddhanti yathā nābhito
atk-s0508a2:1210_11: adho heṭṭhā ayaṃ kāyo asuci duggandho jeguccho paṭikkūlo anicco dukkho anattā ca,
atk-s0508a2:1210_12: tathā uddhaṃ nābhito upari asuciādisabhāvo ca. Yathā uddhaṃ tathā adhoti yathā ca
atk-s0508a2:1210_13: nābhito, uddhaṃ asuciādisabhāvo, tathā adho nābhito heṭṭhāpi.
atk-s0508a2:1211_0: Yathā divā tathā rattinti yathā ayaṃ kāyo divā “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā asuci
atk-s0508a2:1211_1: paggharati, tathā rattimpi. Yathā rattiṃ tathā divāti yathā ca rattiṃ ayaṃ kāyo asuci
atk-s0508a2:1211_2: paggharati, tathā divāpi, nayimassa kālavibhāgena aññathābhāvoti attho. Yathā pure
atk-s0508a2:1211_3: tathā pacchāti yathā ayaṃ kāyo pure pubbe taruṇakāle asuci duggandho jeguccho paṭikkūlo,
atk-s0508a2:1211_4: tathā ca pacchā jiṇṇakāle. Yathā ca pacchā jiṇṇakāle asuciādisabhāvo, tathā pure
atk-s0508a2:1211_5: taruṇakālepi. Yathā vā pure atītakāle saviññāṇakāle asuciādisabhāvo ca aniccādisabhāvo
atk-s0508a2:1211_6: ca, tathā pacchā anāgatakāle aviññāṇakāleti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:1212_0: Pañcaṅgikena turiyenāti “ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ ghanaṃ susīra”nti evaṃ pañcaṅgikena
atk-s0508a2:1212_1: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatena turiyena paricariyamānassa kāmasukhasamaṅgino issarajanassa
atk-s0508a2:1212_2: tādisī tathārūpā rati sukhassādo na hoti. Yathā ekaggacittassa, sammā dhammaṃ vipassatoti
atk-s0508a2:1212_3: samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena vīthipaṭipannāya vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:1212_4: khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passantassa yogāvacarassa yādisā dhammarati, tassā kalampi
atk-s0508a2:1215: Imā eva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1218_0: Manujassātiādikā āyasmato mālukyaputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1218_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1218_2: kosalarañño aggāsanikassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa mātā mālukyā nāma, tassā vasena
atk-s0508a2:1218_3: mālukyaputtotveva paññāyittha. So vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya
atk-s0508a2:1218_4: paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vicaranto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:1218_5: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. So ñātīsu anukampāya
atk-s0508a2:1218_6: ñātikulaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ ñātakā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisitvā dhanena
atk-s0508a2:1218_7: palobhetukāmā mahantaṃ dhanarāsiṃ purato upaṭṭhapetvā “idaṃ dhanaṃ tava santakaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1218_8: vibbhamitvā iminā dhanena puttadāraṃ paṭijagganto puññāni karohī”ti yāciṃsu. Thero
atk-s0508a2:1221: So plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
atk-s0508a2:1223: “Yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā;
atk-s0508a2:1226: “Yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1229: “Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
atk-s0508a2:1231: Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappunaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1239_0: Tattha manujassāti sattassa. Pamattacārinoti sativossaggalakkhaṇena pamādena pamattacārissa,
atk-s0508a2:1239_1: neva jhānaṃ, na vipassanā, na maggaphalāni vaḍḍhanti. Yathā pana rukkhaṃ saṃsibbantī
atk-s0508a2:1239_2: pariyonandhantī tassa vināsāya māluvā latā vaḍḍhati, evamassa cha dvārāni nissāya
atk-s0508a2:1239_3: rūpādīsu punappunaṃ uppajjamānā taṇhā vaḍḍhati. Vaḍḍhamānāva yathā māluvā latā attano
atk-s0508a2:1239_4: apassayabhūtaṃ rukkhaṃ ajjhottharitvā pāteti, evaṃ taṇhāvasikaṃ puggalaṃ apāye nipāteti.
atk-s0508a2:1239_5: So plavatīti so taṇhāvasiko puggalo aparāparaṃ bhavābhave uplavati dhāvati. Yathā
atk-s0508a2:1239_6: kiṃ? Phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro yathā rukkhaphalaṃ icchanto vānaro vanasmiṃ dhāvanto
atk-s0508a2:1239_7: rukkhassa ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ muñcitvā aññanti “sākhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1239_8: alabhitvā nisinno”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati; evameva taṇhāvasiko puggalo hurā huraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1239_9: dhāvanto “ārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā taṇhāya appavattiṃ patto”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati.
atk-s0508a2:1240_0: Yanti yaṃ puggalaṃ. Esā lāmakabhāvena jammī visāhāratāya visamūlatāya visaphalatāya
atk-s0508a2:1240_1: visaparibhogatāya rūpādīsu visattatāya āsattatāya ca visattikāti saṅkhaṃ gatā chadvārikā
atk-s0508a2:1240_2: taṇhā sahate abhibhavati tassa puggalassa. Yathā nāma vane punappunaṃ vassante deve
atk-s0508a2:1240_3: abhivaṭṭhaṃ bīraṇaṃ bīraṇatiṇaṃ vaḍḍhati, evaṃ vaṭṭamūlakā sokā abhivaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ āpajjantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1241_0: Yo cetaṃ…pe… duraccayanti yo pana puggalo evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ atikkamituṃ pajahituṃ
atk-s0508a2:1241_1: dukkaratāya duraccayaṃ taṇhaṃ sahate abhibhavati, tamhā puggalā vaṭṭamūlakā sokā
atk-s0508a2:1241_2: papatanti. Yathā nāma pokkhare padumapatte patitaṃ udabindu na patiṭṭhāti, evaṃ na
atk-s0508a2:1242_0: Taṃ vo vadāmīti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ tumhe vadāmi. Bhaddaṃ voti bhaddaṃ tumhākaṃ hotu,
atk-s0508a2:1242_1: mā taṇhaṃ anuvattapuggalo viya vibhavaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇāthāti attho. Yāvantettha samāgatāti
atk-s0508a2:1242_2: imasmiṃ ṭhāne yattakā sannipatitā, tattakā. Kiṃ vadasīti ce? Taṇhāya mūlaṃ khaṇatha
atk-s0508a2:1242_3: imissā chadvārikataṇhāya mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ avijjādikilesaggahanaṃ arahattamaggañāṇakudālena
atk-s0508a2:1242_4: khaṇatha samucchindatha. Kiṃ viyāti? Usīratthova bīraṇaṃ yathā usīrena atthiko puriso
atk-s0508a2:1242_5: mahantena kudālena bīraṇāparanāmaṃ usīraṃ nāma tiṇaṃ khaṇati, evamassa mūlaṃ khaṇathāti
atk-s0508a2:1242_6: attho. Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappunanti tumhe nadītīre jātaṃ naḷaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1242_7: mahāvegena āgato nadīsoto viya kilesamāro maccumāro devaputtamāro ca punappunaṃ mā bhañjīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1243_0: Tasmā karotha buddhavacanaṃ “jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādatthā”tiādinā vuttaṃ buddhassa
atk-s0508a2:1243_1: bhagavato vacanaṃ karotha, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā sampādetha. Khaṇo vo mā upaccagāti
atk-s0508a2:1243_2: yo hi buddhavacanaṃ na karoti, taṃ puggalaṃ ayaṃ buddhuppādakkhaṇo patirūpadesavāse
atk-s0508a2:1243_3: uppattikkhaṇo sammadiṭṭhiyā paṭiladdhakkhaṇo channaṃ āyatanānaṃ avekallakkhaṇoti
atk-s0508a2:1243_4: sabbopi khaṇo atikkamati, so khaṇo mā tumhe atikkamatu. Khaṇātītāti ye hi taṃ khaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1243_5: atītā, ye vā puggale so khaṇo atīto, te nirayamhi samappitā tattha nibbattā cirakālaṃ socanti.
atk-s0508a2:1244_0: Pamādo rajoti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu sativossaggalakkhaṇo pamādo, saṃkilesasabhāvattā
atk-s0508a2:1244_1: rāgarajādimissatāya ca rajo. Pamādānupatito rajoti yo hi koci rajo nāma rāgādiko,
atk-s0508a2:1244_2: so sabbo pamādānupatito pamādavaseneva uppajjati. Appamādenāti appamajjanena appamādapaṭipattiyā.
atk-s0508a2:1244_3: Vijjāyāti aggamaggavijjāya. Abbahe sallamattanoti attano hadayanissitaṃ rāgādisallaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1247_0: Paṇṇavīsatītiādikā āyasmato sappadāsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1247_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:1247_2: kapilavatthusmiṃ suddhodanamahārājassa purohitaputto hutvā nibbatti, tassa sappadāsoti
atk-s0508a2:1247_3: nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kilesābhibhavena
atk-s0508a2:1247_4: cetosamādhiṃ alabhanto brahmacariyaṃ caritvā saṃvegajāto pacchā satthaṃ āharanto
atk-s0508a2:1247_5: yoniso manasikāraṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:1255: “Satthaṃ vā āharissāmi, ko attho jīvitena me;
atk-s0508a2:1256: Kathañhi sikkhaṃ paccakkhaṃ, kālaṃ kubbetha mādiso.
atk-s0508a2:1265: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:1267_0: Tattha paṇṇavīsativassāni, yato pabbajito ahanti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ pabbajito tānimāni
atk-s0508a2:1267_2: kālaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranto accharāsaṅghātamattampi aṅguliphoṭanamattampi khaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1268_0: Evaṃ pana aladdhā cittassekaggataṃ, tattha kāraṇamāha “kāmarāgena aṭṭito”ti. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:1268_1: aṭṭitoti pīḷito, abhibhūtoti attho. Bāhā paggayha kandantoti “idamidha ativiya ayuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1268_2: vattati, yadāhaṃ niyyānike sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ kilesapaṅkato uddharituṃ na
atk-s0508a2:1268_3: sakkomī”ti uddhaṃmukho bāhā paggayha kandamāno. Vihārā upanikkhaminti vasanakavihārato bahi nikkhanto.
atk-s0508a2:1269_0: Yenādhippāyena nikkhanto, taṃ dassetuṃ “satthaṃ vā āharissāmī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:1269_1: satthaṃ vā āharissāmīti vā-saddo vikappanattho. Tena “rukkhā vā papatissāmi, ubbandhitvā
atk-s0508a2:1269_2: vā marissāmī”tiādike maraṇappakāre saṅgaṇhāti. Sikkhanti adhisīlasikkhaṃ. Paccakkhanti
atk-s0508a2:1269_3: paccācikkhanto pariccajanto. “Paccakkhā”tipi pāḷi, paccakkhāyāti attho. Kālanti maraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1269_4: Kathañhi nāma mādiso sikkhāpaccakkhānena kālaṃ kareyyāti attho. Sikkhāpaccakkhānañhi
atk-s0508a2:1269_5: ariyassa vinaye maraṇaṃ nāma. Yathāha bhagavā – “maraṇañhetaṃ, bhikkhave, yo sikkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1269_6: paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatī”ti. “Sikkhaṃ paccakkhā”ti pana pāṭhe kathañhi nāma mādiso
atk-s0508a2:1269_7: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya kālaṃ kareyya, sikkhāsamaṅgī eva pana hutvā kālaṃ kareyya? Tasmā
atk-s0508a2:1269_8: satthaṃ vā āharissāmi, ko attho jīvitena meti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:1270_0: Tadāhanti yadā kilesābhibhavena samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya jīvite nibbindanto
atk-s0508a2:1270_1: tadā. Khuranti nisitakhuraṃ, khurasadisaṃ vā satthakaṃ. Mañcakamhi upāvisinti paresaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1270_2: nivāraṇabhayena ovarakaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīdiṃ. Parinītoti upanīto, gale ṭhapitoti
atk-s0508a2:1270_3: adhippāyo. Dhamaninti “kaṇṭhe dhamaniṃ, kaṇṭhadhamaniṃ galavalaya”ntipi vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:1271_0: Tato me manasīkāro, yoniso udapajjathāti “yadāhaṃ marissāmī”ti kaṇṭhe dhamaniṃ chindituṃ
atk-s0508a2:1271_1: khuraṃ upanesiṃ, tato paraṃ “arogaṃ nu kho me sīla”nti paccavekkhantassa akkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1271_2: acchiddaṃ suparisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ disvā pīti uppajji, pītimanassa kāyo passambhi, passaddhakāyassa
atk-s0508a2:1271_3: nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavantassa cittassa samāhitatāya vipassanāvasena yoniso manasikāro
atk-s0508a2:1271_4: uppajji. Atha vā tatoti kaṇṭhe khurassa upanayato vaṇe jāte uppannaṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhento
atk-s0508a2:1271_5: vipassanāya vasena yonisomanasikāro uppajji. Idāni tato paraṃ maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1271_6: uppannabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ādīnavo pāturahū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a2:1274_0: Uṭṭhehītiādikā āyasmato kātiyānattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1274_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1274_2: aññatarassa kosiyagottassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatto, mātugottavasena pana
atk-s0508a2:1274_3: kātiyānoti laddhanāmo vayappatto sāmaññakānittherassa gihisahāyo theraṃ disvā pabbajito
atk-s0508a2:1274_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto rattiṃ “niddābhibhavaṃ vinodessāmī”ti caṅkamaṃ āruhi. So caṅkamanto
atk-s0508a2:1274_5: niddāya abhibhūto pacalāyamāno paripatitvā tattheva anantarahitāya bhūmiyā nipajji,
atk-s0508a2:1274_6: satthā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ disvā sayaṃ tattha gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā “kātiyānā”ti saññaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1274_7: adāsi. So satthāraṃ disvā uṭṭhahitvā vanditvā saṃvegajāto aṭṭhāsi. Athassa satthā dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a2:1276: “Uṭṭhehi nisīda kātiyāna, mā niddābahulo ahu jāgarassu;
atk-s0508a2:1277: Mā taṃ alasaṃ pamattabandhu, kūṭeneva jinātu maccurājā.
atk-s0508a2:1280: So karohi sudīpamattano tvaṃ, na hi tāṇaṃ tava vijjateva aññaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1282: “Satthā hi vijesi maggametaṃ, saṅgā jātijarābhayā atītaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1286: Mā khiḍḍāratiñca mā niddaṃ, anuyuñjittha jhāya kātiyāna.
atk-s0508a2:1289: Pappuyya anuttaraṃ visuddhiṃ, parinibbāhisi vārināva joti.
atk-s0508a2:1292: Evampi tuvaṃ anādiyāno, māraṃ indasagotta niddhunāhi;
atk-s0508a2:1293: So vedayitāsu vītarāgo, kālaṃ kaṅkha idheva sītibhūto”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1295_0: Tattha uṭṭhehīti niddūpagamanato uṭṭhahanto uṭṭhānavīriyaṃ karohi. Yasmā nipajjā
atk-s0508a2:1295_1: nāma kosajjapakkhiyā, tasmā mā sayi. Nisīdāti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya
atk-s0508a2:1295_2: parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisīda. Kātiyānāti taṃ nāmena ālapati. Mā niddābahulo
atk-s0508a2:1295_3: ahūti niddābahulo niddābhibhūto mā ahu. Jāgarassūti jāgara, jāgariyamanuyutto hohi.
atk-s0508a2:1295_4: Mā taṃ alasanti jāgariyaṃ ananuyuñjantaṃ taṃ alasaṃ kusītaṃ pamattabandhu maccurājā
atk-s0508a2:1295_5: kūṭeneva adduhanena viya nesādo migaṃ vā pakkhiṃ vā jarārogehi mā jinātu mā abhibhavatu,
atk-s0508a2:1296_0: Seyyathāpīti seyyathā api. Mahāsamuddavegoti mahāsamuddassa ūmivego. Evanti yathā
atk-s0508a2:1296_1: nāma mahāsamuddaūmivego uparūpari uṭṭhahanto taṃ abhikkamituṃ asakkontaṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1296_2: abhibhavati, evaṃ jāti jarā ca kosajjābhibhūtaṃ taṃ ativattate uparūpari ajjhottharati.
atk-s0508a2:1296_3: So karohīti so tvaṃ, kātiyāna, catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyaṃ arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1296_4: sudīpaṃ attano karohi attano santāne uppādehi. Na hi tāṇaṃ tava vijjateva aññanti
atk-s0508a2:1296_5: hīti hetuatthe nipāto. Yasmā tato aggaphalato aññaṃ tava tāṇaṃ nāma idha vā huraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1296_6: vā na upalabbhati, tasmā taṃ arahattasaṅkhātaṃ sudīpaṃ karohīti.
atk-s0508a2:1297_0: Satthā hi vijesi maggametanti yaṃ sādhetuṃ avisahantā yato parājitā puthū aññatitthiyā,
atk-s0508a2:1297_1: tadetaṃ tassa sudīpassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ pañcavidhasaṅgato jātiādibhayato ca atītaṃ ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1297_2: devaputtamārādike abhibhavitvā tuyhaṃ satthā vijesi sādhesi. Yasmā satthu santakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1297_3: nāma sāvakena adhigantabbaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ, tasmā tassa adhigamāya pubbarattāpararattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1297_4: purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca, appamatto sato sampajāno hutvā anuyuñja yogaṃ bhāvanaṃ daḷhañca karohi.
atk-s0508a2:1298_0: Purimāni pamuñca bandhanānīti purimakāni gihikāle ābaddhāni gihibandhanāni kāmaguṇabandhanāni
atk-s0508a2:1298_1: pamuñca vissajjehi, tattha anapekkho hohi. Saṅghāṭikhuramuṇḍabhikkhabhojīti saṅghāṭidhārī
atk-s0508a2:1298_2: khurena katasiramuṇḍo bhikkhāhārabhojī, tividhampetaṃ purimabandhanapamokkhassa khiḍḍāratiniddānanuyogassa
atk-s0508a2:1298_3: ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā tvaṃ saṅghāṭipāruto muṇḍo bhikkhāhāro jīvati, tasmā te kāmasukhānuyogo
atk-s0508a2:1298_4: khiḍḍāratiniddānuyogo ca na yuttoti tato purimāni pamuñca bandhanāni khiḍḍāratiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1298_5: niddañca mānuyuñjitthāti yojanā. Jhāyāti jhāyassu ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ anuyuñja.
atk-s0508a2:1299_0: Taṃ pana anuyuñjanto yena jhānena jhāyato kilesā sabbaso jitā honti, taṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1299_1: anuyuñjāti dassento “jhāyāhi jināhī”ti āha. Yogakkhemapathesu kovidosīti catūhi yogehi
atk-s0508a2:1299_2: khemassa nibbānassa pathabhūtesu bodhipakkhiyadhammesu kusalo cheko asi, tasmā bhāvanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1299_3: ussukkāpento anuttaraṃ uttararahitaṃ, visuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ arahattañca pappuyya pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0508a2:1299_4: pana tvaṃ parinibbāhisi. Vārināva jotīti mahatā salilavuṭṭhinipātena aggikhandho
atk-s0508a2:1300_0: Pajjotakaroti pajjotiṃ karo padīpo. Parittaraṃsoti khuddakacciko. Vinamyateti vinamīyati
atk-s0508a2:1300_1: apaniyyati. Latāvāti valli viya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā vaṭṭiādipaccayavekallena
atk-s0508a2:1300_2: parittaraṃso mandapabho padīpo appikā latā vā vātena vidhamiyyati viddhaṃsiyyati,
atk-s0508a2:1300_3: evaṃ tuvampi. Kosiyagottatāya, indasagotta, indasamānagottaṃ. Māraṃ tassa vase anāvattanā
atk-s0508a2:1300_4: anupādānato ca anādiyāno, niddhunāhi vidhamehi viddhaṃsehi. Evaṃ pana viddhaṃsamāno
atk-s0508a2:1300_5: so tvaṃ vedayitāsu sabbāsu vedanāsu vigatacchandarāgo idheva imasmiṃyeva attabhāve
atk-s0508a2:1300_6: sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhābhāvena sītibhūto nibbuto attano parinibbānakālaṃ kaṅkha
atk-s0508a2:1300_7: āgamehīti. Evaṃ satthārā anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpetvā desanāya katāya thero desanāvasāne
atk-s0508a2:1300_8: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthārā desitaniyāmeneva
atk-s0508a2:1300_9: imā gāthā abhāsi. Tā eva imā gāthā therassa aññābyākaraṇañca jātā.
atk-s0508a2:1303_0: Sudesitotiādikā āyasmato migajālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1303_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1303_2: visākhāya mahāupāsikāya putto hutvā nibbatti, migajālotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1303_3: gantvā abhiṇhaso dhammassavanena paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a2:1323: Mahākhemaṅgamo santo, pariyosānabhaddako”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1324_0: Tattha sudesitoti suṭṭhu desito, veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1324_1: yāthāvato vibhāvanavasena desitoti attho. Atha vā sudesitoti sammā desito, pavattinivattīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1324_2: tadubhayahetūnañca aviparītato pakāsanavasena bhāsito svākhyātoti attho. Cakkhumatāti
atk-s0508a2:1324_3: maṃsacakkhu, dibbacakkhu, paññācakkhu, buddhacakkhu, samantacakkhūti imehi pañcahi
atk-s0508a2:1324_4: cakkhūhi cakkhumatā. Buddhenāti sabbaññubuddhena. Ādiccabandhunāti ādiccagottena.
atk-s0508a2:1324_5: Duvidho hi loke khattiyavaṃso – ādiccavaṃso, somavaṃsoti. Tattha ādiccavaṃso, okkākarājavaṃsoti
atk-s0508a2:1324_6: jānitabbaṃ. Tato sañjātatāya sākiyā ādiccagottāti bhagavā “ādiccabandhū”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:1324_7: Atha vā ādiccassa bandhūtipi bhagavā ādiccabandhu, svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0508a2:1324_9: tato eva kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ vināsanato viddhaṃsanato sabbavaṭṭavināsano, saṃsāracārakato
atk-s0508a2:1324_10: niyyānato niyyāniko, saṃsāramahoghato samuttaraṇaṭṭhena uttaraṇo, kāmataṇhādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1324_11: sabbataṇhānaṃ mūlaṃ avijjaṃ ayoniso manasikārañca visoseti sukkhāpetīti taṇhāmūlavisosano,
atk-s0508a2:1324_12: tiṇṇampi vedānaṃ sampaṭivedhassa viddhaṃsanato visassa dukkhassa kāraṇattā visamūlaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1324_13: sattānaṃ byasanuppattiṭṭhānatāya āghātanaṃ kammaṃ kilesaṃ vā chetvā samucchinditvā
atk-s0508a2:1325_0: Aññāṇassa mūlaṃ ayoniso manasikāro āsavā ca “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1325_1: tassa bhedāya vajirūpamañāṇena bhindanatthāya. Atha vā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādivacanato
atk-s0508a2:1325_2: aññāṇaṃ mūlaṃ etassāti aññāṇamūlaṃ, bhavacakkaṃ, tassa maggañāṇavajirena padālanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1325_3: desitoti sambandho. Kammayantavighāṭanoti kammaghaṭitassa attabhāvayantassa viddhaṃsano.
atk-s0508a2:1325_4: Viññāṇānaṃ pariggaheti kāmabhavādīsu yathāsakakammunā viññāṇaggahaṇe upaṭṭhiteti
atk-s0508a2:1325_5: vacanaseso. Tattha tattha hi bhave paṭisandhiyā gahitāya taṃtaṃbhavanissitaviññāṇānipi
atk-s0508a2:1325_6: gahitāneva honti. Ñāṇavajiranipātanoti ñāṇavajirassa nipāto, ñāṇavajiraṃ nipātetvā
atk-s0508a2:1325_7: tesaṃ padāletā. Lokuttaradhammo hi uppajjamāno sattamabhavādīsu uppajjanārahāni viññāṇāni
atk-s0508a2:1326_0: Vedanānaṃ viññāpanoti sukhādīnaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ dukkhasallāniccavasena
atk-s0508a2:1326_1: yāthāvato pavedako. Upādānappamocanoti kāmupādānādīhi catūhipi upādānehi cittasantānassa
atk-s0508a2:1326_2: vimocako. Bhavaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃva, ñāṇena anupassanoti kāmabhavādinavavidhampi bhavaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1326_3: ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato sādhikaporisaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ viya maggañāṇena anupaccakkhato dassetā.
atk-s0508a2:1327_0: Santapaṇītabhāvato atittikaraṭṭhena mahāraso pariññādivasena vā mahākiccatāya sāmaññaphalavasena
atk-s0508a2:1327_1: mahāsampattitāya ca mahāraso, anupacitasambhārehi duravagāhatāya alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhatāya
atk-s0508a2:1327_2: ca suṭṭhu gambhīro jarāmaccunivāraṇo, āyatiṃ bhavābhinipphattiyā nivattanena jarāya
atk-s0508a2:1327_3: maccuno ca paṭisedhako. Idāni yathāvuttaguṇavisesayuttaṃ dhammaṃ sarūpato dassento
atk-s0508a2:1327_4: “ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko”ti vatvā punapi tassa katipaye guṇe vibhāvetuṃ “dukkhūpasamano
atk-s0508a2:1327_6: aṭṭhaṅgiko, nibbānagavesanaṭṭhena maggo sakalavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamanaṭṭhena dukkhavūpasamano, khemaṭṭhena sivo.
atk-s0508a2:1328_0: Yathā ito bāhirakasamaye asammāsambuddhapaveditattā kammavipāko vipallāso siyāti
atk-s0508a2:1328_1: evaṃ avipallāsetvā paṭiccuppannadhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kammaṃ kammanti
atk-s0508a2:1328_2: vipākañca vipākato ñatvāna pubbabhāgañāṇena jānanahetu sassatucchedaggāhānaṃ vidhamanena
atk-s0508a2:1328_3: yāthāvato ālokadassano takkarassa lokuttarañāṇālokassa dassano. Kenaci kañci kadācipi
atk-s0508a2:1328_4: anupaddutattā mahākhemaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati satte gameti cāti mahākhemaṅgamo, sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamanato
atk-s0508a2:1328_5: santo, akuppāya cetovimuttiyā anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyā pāpanena pariyosānabhaddako
atk-s0508a2:1329: Evaṃ thero nānānayehi ariyadhammaṃ pasaṃsanto tassa dhammassa attanā adhigatabhāvaṃ aññāpadesena pakāsesi.
atk-s0508a2:1332_0: Jātimadena mattohantiādikā āyasmato jentattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1332_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1332_2: kosalarañño purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti, tassa jentoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:1332_3: jātimadena bhogaissariyarūpamadena ca matto aññe hīḷento garuṭṭhāniyānampi apacitiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1332_4: akaronto mānathaddho vicarati. So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1332_5: dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā upasaṅkamanto “sace maṃ samaṇo gotamo paṭhamaṃ ālapissati,
atk-s0508a2:1332_6: ahampi ālapissāmi; no ce, nālapissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā upasaṅkamitvā ṭhito bhagavati
atk-s0508a2:1332_7: paṭhamaṃ anālapante sayampi mānena anālapitvā gamanākāraṃ dassesi. Taṃ bhagavā –
atk-s0508a2:1335: Gāthāya ajjhabhāsi. So “cittaṃ me samaṇo gotamo jānātī”ti abhippasanno bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā paramanipaccākāraṃ katvā –
atk-s0508a2:1336: “Kesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, kesu cassa sagāravo;
atk-s0508a2:1337: Kyassa apacitā assu, kyassu sādhu supūjitā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1341: “Tesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, tesu assa sagāravo;
atk-s0508a2:1342: Kyassa apacitā assu, tyassu sādhu supūjitā.
atk-s0508a2:1344: Nihacca mānaṃ atthaddho, te namasse anuttare”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1345: Pañhaṃ vissajjento dhammaṃ desesi. So tāya desanāya sotāpanno hutvā pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:1365_0: Tattha jātimadena mattohanti ahaṃ udicce brāhmaṇakule nibbatto, “na mādiso ubhato
atk-s0508a2:1365_1: sujāto añño atthī”ti kulamānena matto mānathaddho acārinti yojanā. Bhogaissariyena
atk-s0508a2:1365_2: cāti vibhavena ādhipaccena ca hetubhūtena bhogasampadañca issariyasampadañca paṭicca
atk-s0508a2:1365_3: uppannamadena matto ahaṃ acārinti yojanā. Saṇṭhānavaṇṇarūpenāti saṇṭhānaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampatti,
atk-s0508a2:1365_4: vaṇṇo odātasāmatādichavisampatti, rūpaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasobhā. Idhāpi vuttanayena yojanā
atk-s0508a2:1365_5: veditabbā. Madamattoti vuttappakārato aññenapi madena matto.
atk-s0508a2:1366_0: Nāttano samakaṃ kañcīti attano samakaṃ sadisaṃ jātiādīhi samānaṃ atirekaṃ vā kañci
atk-s0508a2:1366_1: na maññisaṃ na maññiṃ, mayā samānampi na maññiṃ, kuto adhikanti adhippāyo. Atimānahato
atk-s0508a2:1366_2: bāloti bālo ahaṃ tato bālabhāvato atimānena khatūpahatakusalācāro, tato eva patthaddho
atk-s0508a2:1366_3: ussitaddhajo thambhavasena garūnampi nipaccakārassa akaraṇato bhusaṃ thaddho anonamanathaddhajāto ussitamānaddhajo.
atk-s0508a2:1367: Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “mātara”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aññeti jeṭṭhabhātuādike, samaṇabrāhmaṇe ca. Garusammateti garūti sammate garuṭṭhāniye. Anādaroti ādararahito.
atk-s0508a2:1368_0: Disvā vināyakaṃ agganti evaṃ mānathaddho hutvā vicaranto diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi
atk-s0508a2:1368_1: veneyyānaṃ vinayanato sayambhutāya nāyakabhāvato ca vināyakaṃ. Sadevake loke sīlādiguṇehi
atk-s0508a2:1368_2: seṭṭhabhāvato aggaṃ. Purisadammānaṃ accantatāya damanato sārathīnaṃ varuttamaṃ, ativiya
atk-s0508a2:1368_3: uttamaṃ byāmappabhādiobhāsena ādiccamiva tapantaṃ, obhāsantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ
atk-s0508a2:1368_4: dhammaṃ desentaṃ sabbasattānaṃ uttamaṃ satthāraṃ disvā buddhānubhāvena santajjito
atk-s0508a2:1368_5: “ahameva seṭṭho, aññe hīnā”ti pavattamānaṃ bhogamadādimadañca chaḍḍetvā pahāya vippasannena
atk-s0508a2:1368_6: cetasā sirasā abhivādesinti yojanā. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ mānathaddho samāno satthu dassanamattena
atk-s0508a2:1368_7: mānaṃ pahāsīti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Satthu dassanamattena mānaṃ na pahāsi
atk-s0508a2:1368_8: “na mānaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sādhū”tiādikāya pana desanāya mānaṃ pahāsi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1368_9: “mānaṃ madañca chaḍḍetvā, vippasannena cetasā. Sirasā abhivādesi”nti. Vippasannena
atk-s0508a2:1369_0: “Ahameva seṭṭho”ti pavatto māno atimāno. “Ime pana nihīnā”ti aññe hīnato dahantassa
atk-s0508a2:1369_1: māno “omāno”ti vadanti. “Seyyohamasmī”ti pana aññaṃ atikkamitvā attānaṃ seyyato dahantassa
atk-s0508a2:1369_2: pavatto seyyamāno atimāno. “Hīnohamasmī”ti pavatto hīnamāno omāno. Pahīnā susamūhatāti
atk-s0508a2:1369_3: heṭṭhimamaggehi pahīnā hutvā aggamaggena suṭṭhu samugghāṭitā. Asmimānoti “esohamasmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:1369_4: khandhe “aha”nti gahaṇavasena pavattamāno. Sabbeti na kevalaṃ atimānaomānaasmimānā
atk-s0508a2:1369_5: eva, atha kho seyyassa seyyamānādayo navavidhā antarabhedena anekavidhā ca sabbe
atk-s0508a2:1372_0: Yadā navo pabbajitotiādikā āyasmato sumanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1372_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle mālākārakule
atk-s0508a2:1372_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi
atk-s0508a2:1372_3: pūjaṃ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa
atk-s0508a2:1372_4: upāsakassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. So ca upāsako āyasmato anuruddhattherassa upaṭṭhāko
atk-s0508a2:1372_5: ahosi. Tassa ca tato pubbe jātājātā dārakā mariṃsu. Tena so “sacāhaṃ idāni ekaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1372_6: labhissāmi, ayyassa anuruddhattherassa santike pabbājessāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi. So
atk-s0508a2:1372_7: ca dasamāsaccayena jāto arogoyeva hutvā anukkamena vaḍḍhento sattavassiko ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:1372_8: taṃ pitā therassa santike pabbājesi. So pabbajitvā tato paripakkañāṇattā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:1372_9: kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño hutvā theraṃ upaṭṭhahanto “pānīyaṃ āharissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:1372_10: ghaṭaṃ ādāya iddhiyā anotattadahaṃ agamāsi. Atheko micchādiṭṭhiko nāgarājā anotattadahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1372_11: paṭicchādento sattakkhattuṃ bhogena parikkhipitvā upari mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā sumanassa
atk-s0508a2:1372_12: pānīyaṃ gahetuṃ okāsaṃ na deti. Sumano garuḷarūpaṃ gahetvā taṃ nāgarājaṃ abhibhavitvā
atk-s0508a2:1372_13: pānīyaṃ gahetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ uddissa ākāsena gacchati. Taṃ satthā jetavane
atk-s0508a2:1372_14: nisinno tathā gacchantaṃ disvā dhammasenāpatiṃ āmantetvā, “sāriputta, imaṃ passā”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:1372_15: catūhi gāthāhi tassa guṇe abhāsi. Atha sumanatthero –
atk-s0508a2:1378: Āharāmi tato disvā, maṃ satthā etadabravi.
atk-s0508a2:1390: Sāmaṇero sa sumano, mā maṃ jaññāti icchatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1392_0: Tattha ādito dve gāthā sumanatthereneva bhāsitā, itarā catasso taṃ pasaṃsantena satthārā
atk-s0508a2:1392_1: bhāsitā. Tā sabbā ekajjhaṃ katvā sumanatthero pacchā aññābyākaraṇavasena abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1392_2: Tattha pannagindanti nāgarājaṃ. Tatoti tattha, yadā navo pabbajito jātiyā sattavassiko
atk-s0508a2:1392_3: iddhibalena mahiddhikaṃ nāgarājaṃ abhibhavitvā anotattadahato upajjhāyassa pānīyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1393: Maṃ uddissa mayhaṃ satthā etadabravi, taṃ dassento, “sāriputta, imaṃ passā”tiādimāha. Ajjhattaṃ susamāhitanti visayajjhattabhūtena aggaphalasamādhinā suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1394_0: Pāsādikena vattenāti passantānaṃ pasādāvahena ācāravattena, karaṇatthe idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1394_1: Kalyāṇairiyāpathoti sampanniriyāpatho. Pāsādikena vattenāti vā itthambhūtalakkhaṇe
atk-s0508a2:1394_2: karaṇavacanaṃ. Samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaṇyaṃ, sāmaññanti attho. Tadatthaṃ īrati pavattatīti
atk-s0508a2:1394_3: sāmaṇero, samaṇuddeso. Iddhiyā ca visāradoti iddhiyampi byatto sukusalo. Ājānīyenāti
atk-s0508a2:1394_4: purisājānīyena. Attahitaparahitānaṃ sādhanato sādhunā katakiccena anuruddhena sādhu
atk-s0508a2:1394_5: ubhayahitasādhako, suṭṭhu vā ājañño kārito damito. Aggavijjāya vinīto asekkhabhāvāpādanena
atk-s0508a2:1395_0: So sāmaṇero sumano paramaṃ santiṃ nibbānaṃ patvā aggamaggādhigamena adhigantvā sacchikatvā
atk-s0508a2:1395_1: attapaccakkhaṃ katvā akuppataṃ arahattaphalaṃ appicchabhāvassa paramukkaṃsagatattā
atk-s0508a2:1395_2: mā maṃ jaññāti maṃ “ayaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti vā “chaḷabhiñño”ti vā kocipi mā jāneyyāti icchati abhikaṅkhatīti.
atk-s0508a2:1398_0: Vātarogābhinītotiādikā āyasmato nhātakamunissa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1398_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a2:1398_2: nibbattitvā vayappatto vijjāṭṭhānādīsu nipphattiṃ gato nhātakalakkhaṇayogena nhātakoti
atk-s0508a2:1398_3: paññāyittha. So tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā rājagahassa tiyojanappamāṇe ṭhāne araññāyatane
atk-s0508a2:1398_4: nīvārehi yāpento aggiṃ paricārayamāno vasati. Tassa satthā ghaṭe viya padīpaṃ hadayabbhantare
atk-s0508a2:1398_5: pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā assamapadaṃ agamāsi. So bhagavantaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0508a2:1398_6: attano upakappananiyāmena āhāraṃ upanesi. Taṃ bhagavā paribhuñji. Evaṃ tayo divase
atk-s0508a2:1398_7: datvā catutthadivase “bhagavā tumhe paramasukhumālā, kathaṃ iminā āhārena yāpethā”ti
atk-s0508a2:1398_8: āha. Tassa satthā ariyasantosaguṇaṃ pakāsento dhammaṃ desesi. Tāpaso taṃ sutvā sotāpanno
atk-s0508a2:1398_9: hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Bhagavā taṃ arahatte patiṭṭhapetvā gato. So pana
atk-s0508a2:1398_10: tattheva viharanto aparabhāge vātābādhena upadduto ahosi. Satthā tattha gantvā paṭisanthāramukhena
atk-s0508a2:1401: Paviddhagocare lūkhe, kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasī”ti. – gāthamāha; Atha thero –
atk-s0508a2:1412: “Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, ye me vijjiṃsu āsavā;
atk-s0508a2:1413: Sabbe asesā ucchinnā, na ca uppajjare puna.
atk-s0508a2:1417: Imāhi sesagāthāhi attano vihāraṃ satthu pavedesi.
atk-s0508a2:1418_0: Tattha jhānasokhummasampannoti jhānasukhumabhāvena samannāgato. Jhānasukhumaṃ nāma
atk-s0508a2:1418_1: arūpajjhānaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhimhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tena attano ubhatobhāgavimuttitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1418_2: dasseti. Apare panāhu – “sokhummanti aggamaggaphalesu adhipaññāsikkhā adhippetā,
atk-s0508a2:1418_3: tato jhānaggahaṇena attano ubhatobhāgavimuttitaṃ vibhāvetī”ti. Vippamuttaṃ kilesehīti
atk-s0508a2:1418_4: paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā sabbakilesehi vimuttaṃ, tato eva suddhacittaṃ, anāvilasaṅkappatāya
atk-s0508a2:1418_5: anāvilaṃ, tīhipi padehi arahattaphalacittameva vadati. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:1421_0: Akkodhassātiādikā āyasmato brahmadattattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1421_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1421_2: kosalarañño putto hutvā nibbatti, brahmadattotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto jetavanamahe
atk-s0508a2:1421_3: buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto saha
atk-s0508a2:1421_4: paṭisambhidāhi chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ nagare piṇḍāya carantaṃ aññataro
atk-s0508a2:1421_5: brāhmaṇo akkosi. Thero taṃ sutvāpi tuṇhībhūto piṇḍāya caratiyeva, brāhmaṇo punapi
atk-s0508a2:1421_6: akkosiyeva. Manussā evaṃ akkosantampi naṃ “ayaṃ thero na kiñci bhaṇatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:1421_7: Taṃ sutvā thero tesaṃ manussānaṃ dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a2:1430: Paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati.
atk-s0508a2:1432: “Ubhinnaṃ tikicchantaṃ taṃ, attano ca parassa ca;
atk-s0508a2:1433: Janā maññanti bāloti, ye dhammassa akovidā. ;
atk-s0508a2:1436: Uppajje ce rase taṇhā, puttamaṃsūpamaṃ sara.
atk-s0508a2:1438: “Sace dhāvati cittaṃ te, kāmesu ca bhavesu ca;
atk-s0508a2:1439: Khippaṃ niggaṇha satiyā, kiṭṭhādaṃ viya duppasu”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:1441_0: Tattha akkodhassāti kodharahitassa maggena samucchinnakodhassa. Kuto kodhoti kuto
atk-s0508a2:1441_1: nāma hetu kodho uppajjeyya, tassa uppattikāraṇaṃ natthīti attho. Dantassāti uttamena
atk-s0508a2:1441_2: damena aggamaggadamathena dantassa. Samajīvinoti kāyavisamādīni sabbaso pahāya kāyasamādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1441_3: vasena samaṃ jīvantassa sattaṭṭhāniyena sampajaññena sammadeva vattantassa. Sammadaññā
atk-s0508a2:1441_4: vimuttassāti sammā aññāya abhiññeyyādike dhamme jānitvā sabbāsavehi vippamuttassa.
atk-s0508a2:1441_5: Tato eva sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena upasantassa. Iṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā
atk-s0508a2:1441_6: tādino khīṇāsavassa kuto kodhoti aññāpadesena thero attano kodhābhāvaṃ tassa ca kāraṇāni
atk-s0508a2:1441_7: vatvā idāni kodhe akodhe ca ādīnavānisaṃsadassanena dhammaṃ kathento “tassevā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:1441_8: Tattha yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhatīti yo puggalo attano upari kuddhaṃ kupitaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1441_9: paṭikujjhati, tasseva tena paṭikujjhanapaccakkosanapaṭippaharaṇādinā pāpiyo idhaloke
atk-s0508a2:1441_10: viññūgarahādivasena paraloke nirayadukkhādivasena abhaddakataraṃ akalyāṇataraṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:1441_11: Kujjhanena pana akuddhassa pāpaṃ hotīti vattabbameva natthi. Keci pana “yo akuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1441_12: paṭikuddhaṃ ārabbha kujjhatī”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Kuddhaṃ appaṭikujjhantoti yo pana
atk-s0508a2:1441_13: kuddhaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ kuddho kodhapareto”ti ñatvā na paṭikujjhati khamati, so dujjayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1441_14: kilesasaṅgāmaṃ jeti nāma. Na kevalañcassa kilesasaṅgāmajayo eva, atha kho ubhayahitapaṭipattimpīti
atk-s0508a2:1441_15: dassento āha “ubhinnamatthaṃ…pe… upasammatī”ti. Yo paraṃ puggalaṃ saṅkupitaṃ kuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1441_16: “kodhapareto”ti ñatvā taṃ mettāyanto ajjhupekkhanto vā sato sampajāno hutvā upasammati
atk-s0508a2:1441_17: khamati na paṭippharati. So attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ ubhayalokasukhāvahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1442_0: Ubhinnaṃ tikicchantaṃ tanti taṃ attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kodhabyādhitikicchāya
atk-s0508a2:1442_1: tikicchantaṃ khamantaṃ puggalaṃ ye janā dhammassa ariyācāradhamme akusalā, te bālā
atk-s0508a2:1442_2: “ayaṃ aviddasu yo attānaṃ akkosantassa paharantassa kiñci na karotī”ti maññanti,
atk-s0508a2:1442_3: taṃ tesaṃ ayoniso maññananti adhippāyo. “Tikicchana”ntipi paṭhanti, tikicchanasabhāvanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1443_0: Evaṃ therena vuccamānaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā akkosakabrāhmaṇo saṃviggo pasannacitto ca hutvā
atk-s0508a2:1443_1: theraṃ khamāpetvā tasseva santike pabbaji. Thero tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ dento “imassa
atk-s0508a2:1443_2: mettābhāvanā yuttā”ti mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā kodhapariyuṭṭhānādīsu paccavekkhaṇādividhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1443_3: dassento “uppajje te”tiādimāha. Tattha uppajje te saceti sace te kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa
atk-s0508a2:1443_4: kañci puggalaṃ nissāya ciraparicayo kodho uppajjeyya, tassa vūpasamāya –
atk-s0508a2:1444: “Ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ, tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti –
atk-s0508a2:1445: Satthārā vuttaṃ kakacūpamaṃ ovādaṃ āvajjehi. Uppajje ce rase taṇhāti sace te madhurādibhede rase taṇhā abhilāso uppajjeyya, tassa vūpasamāya –
atk-s0508a2:1446: “Puttamaṃsaṃ jāyampatikā yathā kantāranittharaṇatthameva khādiṃsu, na rasataṇhāya evaṃ kulaputtopi pabbajito piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati…pe… phāsuvihāro cā”ti –
atk-s0508a2:1448_0: Sace dhāvati te cittanti ayoniso manasi karoto tava cittaṃ kāmesu pañcakāmaguṇesu
atk-s0508a2:1448_1: chandarāgavasena, kāmabhavādīsu bhavesu bhavapatthanāvasena sace dhāvati sarati javati.
atk-s0508a2:1448_2: Khippaṃ niggaṇha satiyā, kiṭṭhādaṃ viya duppasunti tathā dhāvituṃ adento yathā nāma
atk-s0508a2:1448_3: puriso kiṭṭhādaṃ sassakhādakaṃ duppasuṃ duṭṭhagoṇaṃ yottena thambhe bandhitvā attano
atk-s0508a2:1448_4: vase vatteti, evaṃ satiyā satiyottena sammādhithambhe bandhanto khippaṃ sīghameva
atk-s0508a2:1448_5: niggaṇha, yathā kilesavigamena nibbisevanaṃ hoti, tathā damehīti. Keci pana “thero
atk-s0508a2:1448_6: puthujjanova hutvā akkosaṃ adhivāsento tesaṃ manussānaṃ ariyaguṇe pakāsento dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1448_7: kathetvā pacchā dvīhi gāthāhi attānaṃ ovadanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0508a2:1448_8: aññaṃ byākaronto imāyeva gāthā abhāsī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:1451_0: Channamativassatītiādikā āyasmato sirimaṇḍattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1451_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde saṃsumāragire
atk-s0508a2:1451_2: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā sirimaṇḍoti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhesakalāvane bhagavati
atk-s0508a2:1451_3: viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0508a2:1451_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesaṭṭhāne nisinno nidānuddesassa
atk-s0508a2:1451_5: pariyosāne “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti pāḷiyā atthaṃ upadhārento āpannaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1451_6: anāvikatvā paṭicchādento uparūpari āpattiyo āpajjati, tenassa na phāsu hoti, āvikatvā
atk-s0508a2:1451_7: pana yathādhammaṃ paṭikarontassa phāsu hotīti imamatthaṃ manasi katvā “aho satthu
atk-s0508a2:1451_8: sāsanaṃ suvisuddha”nti laddhappasādo tathā uppannaṃ pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1451_9: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pasannamānaso bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a2:1454: Tasmā channaṃ vivaretha, evaṃ taṃ nātivassati.
atk-s0508a2:1463: Paccuggantuṃ balaṃ natthi, javo natthi palāyituṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1466: Yaṃ yaṃ vijahate rattiṃ, tadūnaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1469: Upeti carimā ratti, na te kālo pamajjitu”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:1471_0: Tattha channanti chāditaṃ yathābhūtaṃ avivaṭaṃ appakāsitaṃ duccaritaṃ. Ativassatīti
atk-s0508a2:1471_1: āpattivassañceva kilesavassañca ativiya vassati. Āpattiyā hi chādanaṃ alajjibhāvādinā
atk-s0508a2:1471_2: tādisova, chādanena tato aññathāva punapi tathārūpaṃ tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ āpattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1471_3: āpajjeyyāti chādanaṃ vassanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Vivaṭanti pakāsitaṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1471_4: Nātivassatīti ettha atīti upasaggamattaṃ, na vassatīti attho. Avassanañcettha vuttavipariyāyena
atk-s0508a2:1471_5: veditabbaṃ cittasantānassa visodhitattā. Tasmāti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati,
atk-s0508a2:1471_6: channassa duccaritassa āpattivassādīnaṃ ativassanato vivaṭassa ca avassanatoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1471_7: Channaṃ vivarethāti puthujjanabhāvena chādanādhippāye uppannepi taṃ ananuvattitvā
atk-s0508a2:1471_8: vivaretha āvikareyya, yathādhammaṃ paṭikareyya. Evanti vivaraṇena yathādhammaṃ paṭipattiyā.
atk-s0508a2:1471_9: Tanti taṃ channaṃ duccaritaṃ. Nātivassati āpattivassaṃ kilesavassañca na vassati,
atk-s0508a2:1472_0: Idāni “ekaṃsena sīghaṃyeva ca attā sodhetabbo, appamādo kātabbo”ti tassa kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1472_1: saṃvegavatthuṃ dassento “maccunābbhāhato loko”tiādimāha. Tattha maccunābbhāhato lokoti
atk-s0508a2:1472_2: ayaṃ sabbopi sattaloko coro viya coraghātakena, sabbavaṭṭanipātinā maccunā maraṇena
atk-s0508a2:1472_3: abhihato, na tassa hatthato muccati. Jarāya parivāritoti ayaṃ loko uppādato uddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1472_4: maraṇūpanayanarasāya jarāya parivārito ajjhotthaṭo, jarāsaṅghātaparimukkoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1472_5: Taṇhāsallena otiṇṇoti sarīrassa anto nimuggena visapītakhurappena viya upādānalakkhaṇena
atk-s0508a2:1472_6: taṇhāsaṅkhātena sallena otiṇṇo hadayabbhantare ogāḷho. Taṇhā hi pīḷājananato anto
atk-s0508a2:1472_7: tudanato duruddhārato ca “sallo”ti vuccati. Icchādhūpāyitoti ārammaṇābhipatthanalakkhaṇāya
atk-s0508a2:1472_8: icchāya santāpito. Taṃ visayaṃ icchanto hi puggalo yadicchitaṃ visayaṃ labhanto vā
atk-s0508a2:1472_9: alabhanto vā tāya eva anudahanalakkhaṇāya icchāya santatto pariḷāhappatto hoti. Sadāti
atk-s0508a2:1473_0: Parikkhitto jarāya cāti na kevalaṃ maccunā abbhāhatoyeva, atha kho jarāya ca parikkhitto.
atk-s0508a2:1473_1: Jarāya samavaruddho jarāpākāraparikkhitto, na taṃ samatikkamatīti attho. Haññati
atk-s0508a2:1473_2: niccamattāṇoti atāṇo asaraṇo hutvā niccakālaṃ jarāmaraṇehi haññati vibādhīyati. Yathā
atk-s0508a2:1473_3: kiṃ? Pattadaṇḍova takkaro yathā takkaro coro katāparādho vajjhappatto atāṇo rājāṇāya
atk-s0508a2:1474_0: Āgacchantaggikhandhāvāti mahāvane ḍayhamāne taṃ abhibhavantā mahantā aggikkhandhā
atk-s0508a2:1474_1: viya maccu byādhi jarāti ime tayo anudahanaṭṭhena aggikkhandhā imaṃ sattalokaṃ abhibhavantā
atk-s0508a2:1474_2: āgacchanti, tesaṃ pana paṭibalo hutvā paccuggantuṃ abhibhavituṃ balaṃ ussāho natthi,
atk-s0508a2:1474_3: imassa lokassa, javo natthi palāyituṃ javantesu, ajjhottharantesu. Yattha te nābhibhavanti,
