atk-s0508a2:1474_4: piṭṭhiṃ dassetvā tato palāyitumpi imassa lokassa jaṅghājavo natthi, evaṃ attanā asamattho
atk-s0508a2:1474_5: māyādīhi upāyehi appaṭikāre tividhe balavati paccāmitte niccupaṭṭhite kiṃ kātabbanti
atk-s0508a2:1474_6: ce? Amoghaṃ divasaṃ kayirā, appena bahukena vāti appena antamaso gaddūhanamattampi
atk-s0508a2:1474_7: kālaṃ pavattitena bahukena vā sakalaṃ ahorattaṃ pavattitena vipassanāmanasikārena
atk-s0508a2:1474_8: amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ divasaṃ kareyya, yasmā yaṃ yaṃ vijahate rattiṃ, tadūnaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1474_9: ayaṃ satto yaṃ yaṃ rattiṃ vijahati nāseti khepeti, tadūnaṃ tena ūnaṃ tassa sattassa
atk-s0508a2:1474_10: jīvitaṃ hoti. Etena rattikkhayo nāma jīvitakkhayo tassa anivattanatoti dasseti. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:1476: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti. ;
atk-s0508a2:1477_0: Na kevalaṃ rattivaseneva, atha kho iriyāpathavasenāpi jīvitakkhayo upadhāretabboti
atk-s0508a2:1477_1: āha “carato”tiādi. Caratoti gacchantassa. Tiṭṭhatoti ṭhitaṃ kappentassa. Āsīnasayanassa
atk-s0508a2:1477_2: vāti āsīnassa sayanassa vā, nisinnassa nipajjantassa vāti attho. “Āsīdana”ntipi paṭhanti,
atk-s0508a2:1477_3: tattha sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Upeti carimā rattīti carimakacittasahitā
atk-s0508a2:1477_4: ratti upagacchati, rattiggahaṇañcettha desanāsīsamattaṃ. Gamanādīsu yena kenaci iriyāpathena
atk-s0508a2:1477_5: samaṅgībhūtassa carimakāloyeva, tenevassa iriyāpathakkhaṇā jīvitaṃ khepetvā eva gacchanti,
atk-s0508a2:1477_6: tasmā na te kālo pamajjituṃ nāyaṃ tuyhaṃ pamādaṃ āpajjituṃ kālo “imasmiṃ nāma kāle
atk-s0508a2:1477_7: maraṇaṃ na hotī”ti aviditattā. Vuttaṃ hi –
atk-s0508a2:1480: Tasmā evaṃ attānaṃ ovaditvā appamattena tīsu sikkhāsu anuyogo kātabboti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:1483_0: Dvipādakotiādikā āyasmato sabbakāmittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:1483_1: bhagavato sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ sodhetvā paṭipākatikaṃ ṭhapentaṃ ekaṃ theraṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a2:1483_2: “ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane abbudaṃ sodhetvā paṭipākatikaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samattho
atk-s0508a2:1483_3: bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadanurūpāni puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:1483_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aparinibbute eva bhagavati vesāliyaṃ khattiyakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:1483_5: sabbakāmoti laddhanāmo vayappatto ñātakehi dārapariggahaṃ kārito nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a2:1483_6: gharāvāsaṃ jigucchanto dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa santike pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a2:1483_7: upajjhāyena saddhiṃ vesāliṃ upagato ñātigharaṃ agamāsi. Tattha naṃ purāṇadutiyikā
atk-s0508a2:1483_8: pativiyogadukkhitā kisā dubbaṇṇā analaṅkatā kiliṭṭhavatthanivasanā vanditvā rodamānā
atk-s0508a2:1483_9: ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ disvā therassa karuṇāpurassaraṃ mettaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato anubhūtārammaṇe
atk-s0508a2:1484_0: So tena kasāhi tāḷito ājānīyo viya sañjātasaṃvego tāvadeva susānaṃ gantvā, asubhanimittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1484_1: uggahetvā, tattha paṭiladdhajhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā, vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā, arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1484_2: pāpuṇi. Athassa sasuro alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ dhītaraṃ ādāya mahatā parivārena naṃ uppabbājetukāmo
atk-s0508a2:1484_3: vihāraṃ agamāsi. Thero tassā adhippāyaṃ ñatvā attano kāmesu virattabhāvaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0508a2:1492: “Rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā;
atk-s0508a2:1504_0: Tattha dvipādakoti yadipi apādakādayopi kāyā asucīyeva, adhikāravasena pana ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena
atk-s0508a2:1504_1: vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā aññe asucibhūtāpi kāyā loṇambilādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā manussānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1504_2: bhojanepi upanīyanti, na pana manussakāyo, tasmā asucitarasabhāvamassa dassento “dvipādako”ti
atk-s0508a2:1504_3: āha. Ayanti tadā upaṭṭhitaṃ itthirūpaṃ sandhāyāha. Asucīti asuci eva, na ettha kiñcipi
atk-s0508a2:1504_4: sucīti attho. Duggandho parihīratīti duggandho samāno pupphagandhādīhi saṅkharitvā
atk-s0508a2:1504_6: tatoti pupphagandhādīhissa jegucchabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ vāyamantānampi taṃ vāyāmaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1504_7: nipphalaṃ katvā navahi dvārehi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādīni lomakūpehi ca sedajallikaṃ ‘vissavantoyeva
atk-s0508a2:1505_0: Evaṃ jegucchopi samāno cāyaṃ kāyo kūṭādīhi viya migādike attano rūpādīhi andhaputhujjane
atk-s0508a2:1505_1: vañcetiyevāti dassento “miga”ntiādimāha. Tattha migaṃ nilīnaṃ kūṭenāti pāsavākarādinā
atk-s0508a2:1505_2: kūṭena nilīnaṃ, paṭicchannaṃ katvā migaṃ viya nesādo. Vakkhamāno hi iva-saddo idhāpi
atk-s0508a2:1505_3: ānetvā yojetabbo. Baḷiseneva ambujanti ambujaṃ macchaṃ āmisabaddhena baḷisena viya
atk-s0508a2:1505_4: bāḷisiko. Vānaraṃ viya lepenāti rukkhasilādīsu pakkhittena makkaṭalepena makkaṭaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1506_0: Ke pana bādhentīti āha. “Rūpā saddā”tiādi. Rūpādayo hi pañca kāmakoṭṭhāsā visesato
atk-s0508a2:1506_2: andhaputhujjanānaṃ mano ramento kilesavatthutāya anatthāvahabhāvato te bādhenti nāma.
atk-s0508a2:1507_0: Itthiggahaṇañcettha adhikāravasena katanti veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha “ye etā upasevantī”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:1507_1: Tassattho – ye puthujjanā etā itthiyo rattacittā rāgābhibhūtacittā upabhogavatthusaññāya
atk-s0508a2:1507_2: upasevanti. Vaḍḍhenti kaṭasiṃ ghoranti te jātiādīhi nirayādīhi ca ghoraṃ, bhayānakaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1507_3: andhabālehi abhiramitabbato kaṭasisaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ punappunaṃ uppattimaraṇādinā
atk-s0508a2:1508_0: Yo cetāti yo pana puggalo etā itthiyo tattha chandarāgassa vikkhambhanena vā samucchindanena
atk-s0508a2:1508_1: vā attano pādena sappassa siraṃ viya parivajjeti, so sabbaṃ lokaṃ visajitvā ṭhitattā
atk-s0508a2:1508_2: loke visattikāsaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ sato hutvā samativattati.
atk-s0508a2:1509_0: Kāmesvādīnavaṃ disvāti “aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”tiādinā vatthukāmesu
atk-s0508a2:1509_1: kilesakāmesu anekākāravokāraṃ ādīnavaṃ, dosaṃ, disvā. Nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khematoti
atk-s0508a2:1509_2: kāmehi bhavehi ca nikkhantabhāvato nekkhammaṃ, pabbajjaṃ, nibbānañca, khemato, anupaddavato,
atk-s0508a2:1509_3: daṭṭhu, disvā. Sabbakāmehipi tebhūmakadhammehi nissaṭo visaṃyutto. Sabbepi tebhūmakā
atk-s0508a2:1509_4: dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, tehi ca thero visaṃyutto. Tenāha “patto me āsavakkhayo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:1510_0: Evaṃ thero ādito pañcahi gāthāhi dhammaṃ kathetvā chaṭṭhagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi. Taṃ
atk-s0508a2:1510_1: sutvā sasuro “ayaṃ sabbattha anupalitto, na sakkā imaṃ kāmesu patāretu”nti yathāgatamaggeneva
atk-s0508a2:1510_2: gato. Theropi vassasataparinibbute bhagavati upasampadāya vīsavassasatiko pathabyā
atk-s0508a2:1510_3: thero hutvā, vesālikehi vajjiputtehi uppāditaṃ sāsanassa abbudaṃ sodhetvā, dutiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1510_4: dhammasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyitvā “anāgate dhammāsokakāle uppajjanakaṃ abbudaṃ sodhehī”ti
atk-s0508a2:1515_0: Sattakanipāte alaṅkatātiādikā āyasmato sundarasamuddattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a2:1515_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1515_2: buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarassa mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti. Samuddotissa
atk-s0508a2:1515_3: nāmaṃ ahosi. Rūpasampattiyā pana sundarasamuddoti paññāyittha. So paṭhamavaye ṭhito
atk-s0508a2:1515_4: bhagavato rājagahappavese buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā, paṭiladdhasaddho nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a2:1515_5: pabbajitvā, laddhūpasampado samādinnadhutadhammo rājagahato sāvatthiṃ gantvā, kalyāṇamittassa
atk-s0508a2:1515_6: santike vipassanācāraṃ uggahetvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto viharati. Tassa mātā rājagahe
atk-s0508a2:1515_7: ussavadivase aññe seṭṭhiputte sapajāpatike alaṅkatapaṭiyatte ussavakīḷaṃ kīḷante
atk-s0508a2:1515_8: disvā, puttaṃ anussaritvā rodati. Taṃ disvā aññatarā gaṇikā rodanakāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:1515_9: Sā tassā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā gaṇikā “ahaṃ taṃ ānessāmi, passa tāva mama
atk-s0508a2:1515_10: itthibhāva”nti vatvā “yadi evaṃ taṃyeva tassa pajāpatiṃ katvā imassa kulassa sāminiṃ

atk-s0508a2:1515_16: Taṃ sutvā thero “puthujjanacittaṃ nāma cañcalaṃ, yaṃnūna mayā idāneva ussāho karaṇīyo”ti

atk-s0508a2:1538_0: Tattha māladhārīti mālādhārinī piḷandhapupphadāmā. Vibhūsitāti ūnaṭṭhānassa pūraṇavasena

atk-s0508a2:1539_0: Pādukā oruhitvānāti pādukāhi otaritvā, suvaṇṇapādukāyo omuñcitvāti attho. Pañjalīkatāti

atk-s0508a2:1539_2: Saṇhenāti maṭṭhena. Mudunāti madhurena. “Vacanenā”ti avuttampi vuttameva hoti, abhāsathāti, vuttattā.
atk-s0508a2:1540_0: Yuvāsi tvaṃ pabbajitoti tvaṃ pabbajanto yuvā, daharoyeva hutvā pabbajitosi, nanu
atk-s0508a2:1540_1: pabbajantena sattame dasake sampatteva pabbajitabbanti dasseti. Tiṭṭhāhi mama sāsaneti mama vacane tiṭṭha.
atk-s0508a2:1541_0: Kiṃ pana tanti āha “bhuñja mānusake kāme”ti kāme paribhuñjitukāmassa rūpasampatti,
atk-s0508a2:1541_1: vayasampatti, parivārasampatti, bhogasampatti ca icchitabbā. Tattha “kuto me bhogasampattī”ti
atk-s0508a2:1541_2: vadeyyāti, āha “ahaṃ vittaṃ dadāmi te”ti. “Tayidaṃ vacanaṃ kathaṃ saddahātabba”nti
atk-s0508a2:1541_3: maññeyyāti taṃ saddahāpentī āha “saccaṃ te paṭijānāmi, aggiṃ vā te harāmaha”nti.
atk-s0508a2:1541_4: “Bhuñja mānusake kāme, ahaṃ vittaṃ dadāmi te”ti yadidaṃ mayā paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsena
atk-s0508a2:1541_5: saccameva paṭijānāmi, sace me na pattiyāyasi, aggiṃ vā te harāmahaṃ aggiṃ haritvā
atk-s0508a2:1541_6: aggipaccayaṃ sapathaṃ karomīti attho. Ubhayattha kaṭaggahoti amhākaṃ ubhinnaṃ jiṇṇakāle
atk-s0508a2:1541_7: pabbajjanaṃ ubhayattha jayaggāho. Yaṃ mayaṃ yāva daṇḍaparāyanakālā bhoge bhuñjāma,
atk-s0508a2:1541_8: evaṃ idhalokepi bhogehi na jīyāma, mayaṃ pacchā pabbajissāma, evaṃ paralokepi bhogehi
atk-s0508a2:1541_9: na jīyāmāti adhippāyo. Tatoti taṃ nimittaṃ, kāmehi nimantentiyā “yuvāsi tva”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a2:1541_10: “yadā jiṇṇā bhavissāmā”tiādinā ca tassā vesiyā vuttavacanahetu. Tañhi vacanaṃ aṅkusaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1541_11: katvā thero samaṇadhammaṃ karonto sadatthaṃ paripūresi. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:1544_0: Pare ambāṭakārāmetiādikā āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1544_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhoge kule nibbattitvā, vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:1544_2: satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinno tasmiṃ khaṇe satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mañjussarānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1544_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a2:1544_4: mahādānaṃ datvā, “aho vatāhampi anāgate ayaṃ bhikkhu viya ekassa buddhassa sāsane

atk-s0508a2:1545_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto phussassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a2:1545_1: cittapattakokilo hutvā rājuyyānato madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍenādāya gacchanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1545_2: disvā pasannamānaso “dassāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi. Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā pattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1545_3: gahetvā nisīdi. Kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakkaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthā taṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0508a2:1545_4: So kokilo pasannamānaso teneva pītisukhena sattāhaṃ vītināmesi. Tena ca puññakammena
atk-s0508a2:1545_5: mañjussaro ahosi. Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle pana cetiye āraddhe kiṃ pamāṇaṃ karoma?
atk-s0508a2:1545_6: Sattayojanappamāṇaṃ. Atimahantametaṃ. Chayojanappamāṇaṃ. Etampi atimahantaṃ. Pañcayojanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1545_7: catuyojanaṃ, tiyojanaṃ, dviyojananti vutte ayaṃ tadā jeṭṭhavaḍḍhakī hutvā “etha,
atk-s0508a2:1545_8: bho, anāgate sukhapaṭijaggiyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā rajjuyā parikkhipanto gāvutamattake
atk-s0508a2:1545_9: ṭhatvā “ekekaṃ mukhaṃ gāvutaṃ gāvutaṃ hotu, cetiyaṃ ekayojanāvaṭṭaṃ yojanubbedhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1545_10: bhavissatī”ti āha. Te tassa vacane aṭṭhaṃsu. Iti appamāṇassa buddhassa pamāṇaṃ akāsīti.
atk-s0508a2:1545_11: Tena pana kammena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne aññehi nīcatarappamāṇo hoti.
atk-s0508a2:1546_0: So amhākaṃ satthu kāle sāvatthiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbatti, bhaddiyotissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:1546_1: Atirassatāya pana lakuṇḍakabhaddiyoti paññāyittha. So satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā,

atk-s0508a2:1620_0: Phalasukhena ca jhānasamāpattīhi ca vītināmetīti attano vivekaratiṃ dassetvā “ramanteke”ti

atk-s0508a2:1635_0: Tattha ye maṃ rūpena pāmiṃsūti ye janā aviddasū mama rūpena apasādikena nihīnena

atk-s0508a2:1636_1: vuttaṃ. Ajjhattanti attano santāne khandhāyatanādidhammaṃ. Bahiddhāti parasantāne.
atk-s0508a2:1636_2: Atha vā ajjhattanti, mama abbhantare asekkhasīlakkhandhādiṃ. Bahiddhāti, mameva ākappasampattiyādiyuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1636_3: bahiddhā rūpadhammappavattiṃ cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiñca. Samantāvaraṇoti evaṃ ajjhattañca

atk-s0508a2:1636_5: so paraneyyabuddhiko bālo ghosena paresaṃ vacanena vuyhati niyyati ākaḍḍhīyati.
atk-s0508a2:1637_0: Bahiddhā ca vipassatīti yo ca vuttanayena ajjhattaṃ na jānāti, bahiddhā pana sutānusārena
atk-s0508a2:1637_1: ākappasampattiādiupadhāraṇena vā visesato passati. “Guṇavisesayutto siyā”ti maññati,

atk-s0508a2:1638_0: Yo pana ajjhattañca khīṇāsavassa abbhantare asekkhasīlakkhandhādiguṇaṃ jānāti, bahiddhā

atk-s0508a2:1638_2: anāvaṭo hutvā ariyānaṃ guṇe daṭṭhuṃ ñātuṃ samattho, na so ghosamattena vuyhati yāthāvato dassanatoti.
atk-s0508a2:1641_0: Ekaputtotiādikā āyasmato bhaddattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1641_1: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca satasahassaparimāṇaṃ cīvarādīhi catūhi paccayehi pūjesi.

atk-s0508a2:1704_1: tato vuṭṭhāya. Tenāha “paṭisallānavuṭṭhito”ti. Sā me āsūpasampadāti yā maṃ uddissa
atk-s0508a2:1704_2: “ehi, bhaddā”ti satthu vācā pavattā, sā eva me mayhaṃ upasampadā āsi. Evaṃ jātiyā
atk-s0508a2:1704_3: sattavassena, laddhā me upasampadāti sātisayaṃ satthārā attano kataṃ anuggahaṃ sāsanassa
atk-s0508a2:1705_0: Ettha ca “cittaṃ vimucci me”ti khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ pakāsetvāpi puna “tisso vijjā anuppattā”ti
atk-s0508a2:1708_0: Disvā pāsādachāyāyantiādikā āyasmato sopākattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1708_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a2:1708_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato kāmesu ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1708_3: disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ pabbate viharati. Satthā
atk-s0508a2:1708_4: āsannamaraṇaṃ taṃ ñatvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a2:1708_5: uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ pavedento pupphamayaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā adāsi. Satthā tattha
atk-s0508a2:1708_6: nisīditvā, aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā tassa passantasseva ākāsena
atk-s0508a2:1708_7: agamāsi. So pubbe gahitaṃ niccaggāhaṃ pahāya aniccasaññaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā, kālaṅkatvā,
atk-s0508a2:1708_8: devaloke uppajitvā, aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto, imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a2:1708_9: sopākayoniyaṃ nibbatti. So jātiāgatena sopākoti nāmena paññāyi. Keci pana “vāṇijakule
atk-s0508a2:1708_10: nibbatto, ‘sopāko’ti pana nāmamatta”nti vadanti. Taṃ apadānapāḷiyā virujjhati “pacchime
atk-s0508a2:1709_0: Tassa catumāsajātassa pitā kālamakāsi, cūḷapitā posesi. Anukkamena sattavassiko jāto.
atk-s0508a2:1709_1: Ekadivasaṃ cūḷapitā “attano puttena kalahaṃ karotī”ti kujjhitvā, taṃ susānaṃ netvā,
atk-s0508a2:1709_2: dve hatthe rajjuyā ekato bandhitvā, tāya eva rajjuyā matamanussassa sarīre gāḷhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1709_3: bandhitvā gato “siṅgālādayo khādantū”ti. Pacchimabhavikatāya dārakassa puññaphalena
atk-s0508a2:1709_4: sayaṃ māretuṃ na visahi, siṅgālādayopi na abhibhaviṃsu. Dārako aḍḍharattasamaye evaṃ vippalapati –
atk-s0508a2:1710: “Kā gati me agatissa, ko vā bandhu abandhuno;
atk-s0508a2:1712: Satthā tāya velāya veneyyabandhave olokento dārakassa hadayabbhantare pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā satiṃ janetvā evamāha –
atk-s0508a2:1715_0: Dārako buddhānubhāvena chinnabandhano gāthāpariyosāne sotāpanno hutvā gandhakuṭisammukhe
atk-s0508a2:1715_1: aṭṭhāsi. Tassa mātā puttaṃ apassantī cūḷapitaraṃ pucchitvā tenassa pavattiyā akathitāya
atk-s0508a2:1715_2: tattha tattha gantvā vicinantī “buddhā kira atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ jānanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1715_3: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mama puttassa pavattiṃ jāneyya”nti satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1715_4: Satthā, iddhiyā taṃ paṭicchādetvā, “bhante, mama puttaṃ na passāmi, apica bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:1716: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0508a2:1718: Dhammaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā sā sotāpannā ahosi. Dārako arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:1720: Siddhattho nāma bhagavā, āgacchi mama santikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1730: Ekāhaṃ bhāvayitvāna, tattha kālaṃ kato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1740: Taṃ saññaṃ bhāvayantassa, patto me āsavakkhayo.
atk-s0508a2:1742_0: Atha bhagavā iddhiṃ paṭisaṃhari. Sāpi puttaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho tassa khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1742_1: sutvā pabbājetvā gatā. So satthāraṃ gandhakuṭicchāyāyaṃ caṅkamantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0508a2:1742_2: vanditvā anucaṅkami. Tassa bhagavā upasampadaṃ anujānitukāmo “ekaṃ nāma ki”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a2:1742_3: dasa pañhe pucchi. Sopi satthu adhippāyaṃ gaṇhanto sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsandento
atk-s0508a2:1742_4: “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”tiādinā te pañhe vissajjesi. Teneva te kumārapañhā nāma
atk-s0508a2:1742_5: jātā. Satthā tassa pañhabyākaraṇena ārādhitacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni. Tena sā pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā
atk-s0508a2:1742_6: nāma jātā. Tassimaṃ attano pavattiṃ pakāsetvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:1750: “Tato pañhe apucchi maṃ, pañhānaṃ kovido vidū;
atk-s0508a2:1751: Acchambhī ca abhīto ca, byākāsiṃ satthuno ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1761: Esā ceva te sopāka, bhavatu upasampadā”’.
atk-s0508a2:1764: Dhāremi antimaṃ dehaṃ, aho dhammasudhammatā”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1766_0: Saṃharitvāna pāṇayoti ubho hatthe kamalamakuḷākārena saṅgate katvā, añjaliṃ paggahetvāti
atk-s0508a2:1766_1: attho. Anucaṅkamissanti caṅkamantassa satthuno anupacchato anugamanavasena caṅkamiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1767_0: Pañheti kumārapañhe. Vidūti veditabbaṃ viditavā, sabbaññūti attho. “Satthā maṃ pucchatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:1767_1: uppajjanakassa chambhitattassa bhayassa ca setughātena pahīnattā acchambhī ca abhīto ca byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1768: Yesāyanti yesaṃ aṅgamagadhānaṃ ayaṃ sopāko. Paccayanti gilānapaccayaṃ. Sāmīcinti maggadānabījanādisāmīcikiriyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1769_0: Ajjadaggeti da-kāro padasandhikaro, ajja agge ādiṃ katvā, ajja paṭṭhāya. “Ajjatagge”tipi
atk-s0508a2:1769_1: pāḷi, ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti attho. Dassanāyopasaṅkamāti “hīnajacco, vayasā taruṇataro”ti
atk-s0508a2:1769_2: vā acintetvā dassanāya maṃ upasaṅkama. Esā cevāti yā tassa mama sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0508a2:1769_3: saddhiṃ saṃsandetvā katā pañhavissajjanā. Esāyeva te bhavatu upasampadā iti ca abravīti
atk-s0508a2:1769_4: yojanā. “Laddhā me upasampadā”tipi pāḷi. Ye pana “laddhāna upasampada”ntipi paṭhanti,
atk-s0508a2:1769_5: tesaṃ sattavassenāti sattamena vassenāti attho, sattavassena vā hutvāti vacanaseso.
atk-s0508a2:1772_0: Sare hatthehītiādikā āyasmato sarabhaṅgattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:1772_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:1772_2: rājagahe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, anabhilakkhitotissa kulavaṃsāgataṃ
atk-s0508a2:1772_3: nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā saratiṇāni sayameva
atk-s0508a2:1772_4: bhañjitvā paṇṇasālaṃ katvā vasati. Tato paṭṭhāya sarabhaṅgotissa samaññā ahosi. Atha
atk-s0508a2:1772_5: bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento tassa arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā, tattha gantvā,
atk-s0508a2:1772_6: dhammaṃ desesi. So paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a2:1772_7: arahattaṃ patvā tattheva vasati. Athassa tāpasakāle katā paṇṇasālā jiṇṇā paluggā
atk-s0508a2:1772_8: ahosi. Taṃ disvā manussā “kissa, bhante, imaṃ kuṭikaṃ na paṭisaṅkharothā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:1772_9: Thero “kuṭikā yathā tāpasakāle katā, idāni tathā kātuṃ na sakkā”ti taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a2:1775: Tena me sarabhaṅgoti, nāmaṃ sammutiyā ahu.
atk-s0508a2:1777: “Na mayhaṃ kappate ajja, sare hatthehi bhañjituṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1778: Sikkhāpadā no paññattā, gotamena yasassinā”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1779_0: Tattha sare hatthehi bhañjitvāti, pubbe tāpasakāle saratiṇāni mama hatthehi chinditvā
atk-s0508a2:1779_1: tiṇakuṭiṃ katvā acchisaṃ vasiṃ, nisīdiñceva nipajjiñca. Tenāti kuṭikaraṇatthaṃ sarānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1779_2: bhañjanena. Sammutiyāti anvatthasammutiyā sarabhaṅgoti, nāmaṃ ahu ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:1780_0: Na mayhaṃ kappate ajjāti ajja idāni upasampannassa mayhaṃ sare saratiṇe hatthehi
atk-s0508a2:1780_1: bhañjituṃ na kappate na vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Sikkhāpadā no paññattā, gotamena yasassināti.
atk-s0508a2:1780_2: Tena yaṃ amhākaṃ satthārā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mayaṃ jīvitahetunāpi nātikkamāmāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1781: Evaṃ ekena pakārena tiṇakuṭikāya apaṭisaṅkharaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni aparenapi pariyāyena naṃ dassento –
atk-s0508a2:1784: Soyaṃ rogo diṭṭho, vacanakarenātidevassā”ti. – imaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:1785_0: Tattha sakalanti sabbaṃ. Samattanti sampuṇṇaṃ, sabbabhāgato anavasesanti attho. Roganti
atk-s0508a2:1785_1: dukkhadukkhatādivasena rujanaṭṭhena rogabhūtaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:1785_2: Nāddasaṃ pubbeti satthu ovādapaṭilābhato pubbe na addakkhiṃ. Soyaṃ rogo diṭṭho, vacanakarenātidevassāti
atk-s0508a2:1785_3: sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti sabbepi deve attano sīlādiguṇehi atikkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:1785_4: ṭhitattā atidevassa sammāsambuddhassa ovādapaṭikarena sarabhaṅgena so ayaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto
atk-s0508a2:1785_5: rogo vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pañcakkhandhato diṭṭho, pariññātoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1785_6: Etena evaṃ attabhāvakuṭikāyampi anapekkho bāhiraṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ kathaṃ paṭisaṅkharissatīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1786_0: Idāni yaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjantena mayā ayaṃ attabhāvarogo yāthāvato diṭṭho, svāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1786_1: maggo sabbabuddhasādhāraṇo. Yena nesaṃ ovādadhammopi majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇasadiso yatthāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1786_2: patiṭṭhāya dukkhakkhayaṃ pattoti evaṃ attano arahattapaṭipattiṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:1788: “Yeneva maggena gato vipassī, yeneva maggena sikhī ca vessabhū;
atk-s0508a2:1789: Kakusandhakoṇāgamano ca kassapo, tenañjasena agamāsi gotamo.
atk-s0508a2:1798: Bhedā imassa kāyassa, jīvitassa ca saṅkhayā;
atk-s0508a2:1801_0: Tattha yeneva maggenāti yeneva sapubbabhāgena ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena. Gatoti
atk-s0508a2:1801_1: paṭipanno nibbānaṃ adhigato. Vipassīti vipassī sammāsambuddho. Kakusandhāti avibhattiko
atk-s0508a2:1801_2: niddeso. “Kakusandhakoṇāgamanā”tipi pāṭho. Tenañjasenāti teneva añjasena ariyamaggena.
atk-s0508a2:1802_0: Anādānāti anupādānā appaṭisandhikā vā. Khayogadhāti nibbānogadhā nibbānapatiṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a2:1802_1: Yehāyaṃ desito dhammoti yehi sattahi sammāsambuddhehi ayaṃ sāsanadhammo desito pavedito.
atk-s0508a2:1802_2: Dhammabhūtehīti dhammakāyatāya dhammasabhāvehi, navalokuttaradhammato vā bhūtehi
atk-s0508a2:1802_3: jātehi, dhammaṃ vā pattehi. Tādibhīti, iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattehi.
atk-s0508a2:1803_0: “Cattāri ariyasaccānī”tiādinā tehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ dasseti. Tattha cattārīti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0508a2:1803_1: Ariyasaccānīti paricchinnadhammadassanaṃ. Vacanatthato pana ariyāni ca avitathaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a2:1803_2: saccāni cāti ariyasaccāni, ariyassa vā bhagavato saccāni tena desitattā, ariyabhāvakarāni
atk-s0508a2:1803_3: vā saccānīti ariyasaccāni. Kucchitabhāvato tucchabhāvato ca dukkhaṃ, upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1803_4: Taṃ dukkhaṃ samudeti etasmāti samudayo, taṇhā. Kilese mārento gacchati, nibbānatthikehi
atk-s0508a2:1803_5: maggīyatīti vā maggo, sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha dhammā. Saṃsāracārakasaṅkhāto natthi
atk-s0508a2:1803_6: ettha rodho, etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa rodhābhāvo hoti, nirujjhati dukkhametthāti
atk-s0508a2:1803_7: vā nirodho, nibbānaṃ. Tenāha “dukkhasaṅkhayo”ti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana
atk-s0508a2:1804_0: Yasminti yasmiṃ nirodhe nibbāne adhigate. Nivattateti ariyamaggabhāvanāya sati anantakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1804_1: apariyantaṃ imasmiṃ saṃsāre jātiādidukkhaṃ na pavattati ucchijjati, so nirodhoti
atk-s0508a2:1804_2: ayaṃ dhammabhūtehi sammāsambuddhehi desito dhammoti yojanā. “Bhedā”tiādinā “rogo
atk-s0508a2:1804_3: diṭṭho”ti dukkhapariññāya sūcitaṃ attano arahattappattiṃ sarūpato dasseti. “Yasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1804_4: nibbattate dukkha”nti pana pāṭhe sakalagāthāya tatthāyaṃ yojanā – yasmiṃ khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññite
atk-s0508a2:1804_5: saṃsāre idaṃ anantakaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ nibbattaṃ, so ito dukkhappattito añño punappunaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1804_6: bhavanabhāvato punabbhavo. Imassa jīvitindriyassa saṅkhayā kāyasaṅkhātassa khandhapañcakassa
atk-s0508a2:1804_7: bhedā vināsā uddhaṃ natthi, tasmā sabbadhi sabbehi kilesehi sabbehi bhavehi suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a2:1809_0: Aṭṭhakanipāte kammaṃ bahukantiādikā āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a2:1809_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakule
atk-s0508a2:1809_2: nibbattitvā vuddhippatto, ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā saṃkhittena
atk-s0508a2:1809_3: bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:1809_4: disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā, dānādīni puññāni katvā, devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:1809_5: saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1809_6: himavantapabbate ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1810_0: So tena puññakammena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kāle
atk-s0508a2:1810_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulaghare nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:1810_2: satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā, “bhagavā mayhaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:1811_0: Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1811_1: buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ rañño caṇḍapajjotassa purohitagehe nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0508a2:1811_2: mātā “mayhaṃ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavo tveva
atk-s0508a2:1811_3: nāmaṃ akāsi. So vuḍḍhimanvāya tayo vede uggahetvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0508a2:1811_4: So gottavasena kaccāyanoti paññāyittha. Taṃ rājā caṇḍapajjoto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0508a2:1811_5: “ācariya, tvaṃ tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānehī”ti pesesi. So attaṭṭhamo satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1811_6: upagato. Tassa satthā dhammaṃ deseti. Desanāpariyosāne so sattahi janehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1811_7: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:1827: Parisaṃ mañca toseti, yathā kaccāyano ayaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1833: Tadā mamāsayaṃ ñatvā, byākāsi sa raṇañjaho.
atk-s0508a2:1838: “Kaccānassa guṇaṃ sutvā, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayaṃ ṭhito;
atk-s0508a2:1841: Kaccāno nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:1843: Pāpuṇissati taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yathāyaṃ byākato mayā.
atk-s0508a2:1847: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na gacchāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1849: Nīce kule na jāyāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1850: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto ujjeniyaṃ pure;

atk-s0508a2:1869_0: Tattha kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kārayeti navāvāsakārāpanādiṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇassa paribandhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1869_1: mahantaṃ navakammaṃ na paṭṭhapeyya, khuddakaṃ appasamārambhaṃ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇādiṃ

atk-s0508a2:1869_5: Na uyyameti, paccayuppādanatthaṃ kulasaṅgaṇhanavasena na vāyameyya, yasmā so ussukko
atk-s0508a2:1869_6: rasānugiddho, atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhādhivāhoti yo rasānugiddho rasataṇhāvasiko bhikkhu
atk-s0508a2:1869_7: paccayuppādanapasuto, so kulasaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ussukko, tesu sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu
atk-s0508a2:1869_8: dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā yogaṃ āpajjati, yo sukhādhivāho samathavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānasukhāvaho
atk-s0508a2:1869_9: sīlādiattho, taṃ riñcati pajahati ekaṃsena attānaṃ tato vivecetīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1870_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “kammārāmataṃ saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ paccayagedhañca vajjethā”ti ovaditvā

atk-s0508a2:1870_3: ca, yasmā taṃ abhāvitattānaṃ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malinabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ca paṅko kaddamoti
atk-s0508a2:1870_4: buddhādayo ariyā pavedayuṃ abbhaññaṃsu pavedesuṃ vā, yasmā ca apariññātakkhandhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1870_5: andhaputhujjanānaṃ sakkārābhilāsaṃ duviññeyyasabhāvatāya pīḷājananato anto tudanato
atk-s0508a2:1870_6: duruddharaṇato ca sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ pavedayuṃ, tato eva sakkāro kāpurisena
atk-s0508a2:1870_7: dujjaho duppajaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato. Sakkārābhilāsappahānena
atk-s0508a2:1870_8: hi sakkāro pahīno hoti, tasmā tassa pahānāya āyogo karaṇīyoti dasseti –
atk-s0508a2:1873: Attanā taṃ na seveyya, kammabandhū hi mātiyā.

atk-s0508a2:1876: Attā ca naṃ yathā vedi, devāpi naṃ tathā vidū.
atk-s0508a2:1879: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.

atk-s0508a2:1890_0: Imā cha gāthā rañño pajjotassa ovādavasena abhāsi. So kira brāhmaṇe saddahitvā pasughātayaññaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1890_1: kāreti, kammaṃ asodhetvāva acore corasaññāya daṇḍesi, aṭṭakaraṇe ca assāmike sāmike
atk-s0508a2:1890_2: karoti, sāmike ca assāmike. Tato naṃ thero vivecetuṃ “na parassā”tiādinā cha gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1891_0: Tattha na parassupanidhāya, kammaṃ maccassa pāpakanti parassa maccassa sattassa upanidhāya
atk-s0508a2:1891_1: uddissa kāraṇaṃ katvā pāpakaṃ vadhabandhādikammaṃ na seveyya, parena na kārāpeyyāti
atk-s0508a2:1891_2: attho. Attanā taṃ na seveyyāti attanāpi taṃ pāpakaṃ na kareyya. Kasmā? Kammabandhū
atk-s0508a2:1891_3: hi mātiyā ime mātiyā maccā kammadāyādā, tasmā attanā ca kiñci pāpakammaṃ na kareyya,
atk-s0508a2:1892_0: Na pare vacanā coroti attanā coriyaṃ akatvā paravacanā parassa vacanamattena coro
atk-s0508a2:1892_1: nāma na hoti, tathā na pare vacanā muni parassa vacanamattena muni suvisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācāro
atk-s0508a2:1892_2: na hoti. Ettha hi pareti vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso. Keci pana “paresanti vattabbe
atk-s0508a2:1892_3: pareti saṃ-kāralopaṃ katvā niddiṭṭha”nti vadanti. Attā ca naṃ yathā vedīti naṃ sattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1892_4: tassa attā cittaṃ yathā “ahaṃ parisuddho, aparisuddho vā”ti yāthāvato avedi jānāti.

atk-s0508a2:1892_6: tasmā sayaṃ tādisā devā ca pamāṇaṃ suddhāsuddhānaṃ suddhāsuddhabhāvajānane, na ye
atk-s0508a2:1893_0: Pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe, kusalākusalasāvajjānavajjaṃ kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1893_1: kāyassa asubhataṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccataṃ ajānantā idha pare nāma. Te mayamettha imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1893_2: jīvaloke yamāma uparamāma, “satataṃ samitaṃ maccu santikaṃ gacchāmā”ti na jānanti.
atk-s0508a2:1893_3: Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye ca tattha paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccu samīpaṃ gacchāmā”ti vijānanti.
atk-s0508a2:1893_4: Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā medhagānaṃ paravihiṃsanānaṃ vūpasamāya
atk-s0508a2:1893_5: paṭipajjanti, attanā pare ca aññe na medhanti na bādhentīti attho. Tvaṃ pana jīvitanimittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1893_6: acore core karontopi daṇḍanena sāmike assāmike karontopi dhanajāniyā bādhasi paññāvekallato.
atk-s0508a2:1893_7: Tathā akarontopi jīvate vāpi sappañño, api vittaparikkhayo parikkhīṇadhanopi sappaññajātiko
atk-s0508a2:1893_8: itarītarasantosena santuṭṭho anavajjāya jīvikāya jīvatiyeva. Tassa hi jīvitaṃ nāma.
atk-s0508a2:1893_9: Tenāha bhagavā – “paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha”nti. Dummedhapuggalo pana paññāya
atk-s0508a2:1893_10: ca alābhena diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca atthaṃ virādhento vittavāpi na jīvati
atk-s0508a2:1893_11: garahādipavattiyā jīvanto nāma na hoti, anupāyaññutāya yathādhigataṃ dhanaṃ nāsento
atk-s0508a2:1894_0: Imā kira catassopi gāthā thero supinantena rañño kathesi. Rājā supinaṃ disvā theraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1894_1: namassantoyeva pabujjhitvā pabhātāya rattiyā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā attanā
atk-s0508a2:1894_2: diṭṭhaniyāmena supinaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā thero tā gāthā paccunubhāsitvā “sabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1894_3: suṇātī”tiādinā dvīhi gāthāhi rājānaṃ ovadi. Tattha sabbaṃ suṇāti sotenāti idha sotabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1894_4: saddaṃ āpāthagataṃ sabbaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitañca abadhiro sotena suṇāti. Tathā
atk-s0508a2:1894_5: sabbaṃ rūpaṃ sundaraṃ asundarampi cakkhunā anandho passati, ayamindriyānaṃ sabhāvo.
atk-s0508a2:1894_6: Tattha pana na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro, sabbaṃ ujjhitunti ca nidassanamattametaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1894_7: Yañhi taṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ vā, na taṃ sabbaṃ dhīro sappañño ujjhituṃ pariccajituṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:1894_8: vā arahati. Guṇāguṇaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhitvā ujjhitabbameva ujjhituṃ gahetabbañca
atk-s0508a2:1894_9: gahetuṃ arahati, tasmā cakkhumāssa yathā andho cakkhumāpi samāno ujjhitabbe diṭṭhe
atk-s0508a2:1894_10: andho yathā assa apassanto viya bhaveyya, tathā ujjhitabbe sute sotavāpi badhiro
atk-s0508a2:1894_11: yathā assa asuṇanto viya bhaveyya. Paññavāssa yathā mūgoti vicāraṇapaññāya paññavā
atk-s0508a2:1894_12: vacanakusalopi avattabbe mūgo viya bhaveyya. Balavā thāmasampannopi akattabbe dubbaloriva,
atk-s0508a2:1894_13: rakāro padasandhikaro, asamattho viya bhaveyya. Atha atthe samuppanne, sayetha matasāyikanti
atk-s0508a2:1894_14: attanā kātabbakicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṃ sayetha, matasāyikaṃ sayitvāpi
atk-s0508a2:1894_15: taṃ kiccaṃ tīretabbameva, na virādhetabbaṃ. Atha vā atha atthe samuppanneti attanā
atk-s0508a2:1894_16: akaraṇīye atthe kicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṃ sayetha, matasāyikaṃ sayitvāpi
atk-s0508a2:1894_17: taṃ na kātabbameva. Na hi paṇḍito ayuttaṃ kātumarahatīti evaṃ therena ovadito rājā
atk-s0508a2:1897_0: Akkodhanotiādikā āyasmato sirimittattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu

atk-s0508a2:1897_4: bhāgineyyo sirimitto vayappatto satthu dhanapāladamane laddhappasādo pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:1897_5: kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto. Ekadivasaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ āsanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1897_6: abhiruhitvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi. Kathento ca

atk-s0508a2:1909: Kalyāṇamitto so bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati.

atk-s0508a2:1921: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1922_0: Tattha akkodhanoti akujjhanasīlo. Upaṭṭhite hi kodhuppattinimitte adhivāsanakhantiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1922_1: ṭhatvā kopassa anuppādako. Anupanāhīti na upanāhako, parehi kataṃ aparādhaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0508a2:1922_2: “akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me”tiādinā kodhassa anupanayhanasīlo. Santadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya
atk-s0508a2:1922_3: māyāya abhāvato amāyo. Pisuṇavācāvirahitato rittapesuṇo, sa ve tādisako bhikkhūti
atk-s0508a2:1922_4: so tathārūpo tathājātiko yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato bhikkhu. Evaṃ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a2:1922_5: pecca paraloke na socati sokanimittassa abhāvato. Cakkhudvārādayo kāyadvārādayo ca
atk-s0508a2:1922_6: guttā pihitā saṃvutā etassāti guttadvāro. Kalyāṇasīloti sundarasīlo suvisuddhasīlo. Kalyāṇamittoti –
atk-s0508a2:1924: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojaye”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1925: Evaṃ vibhāvitalakkhaṇo kalyāṇamitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto. Kalyāṇapaññoti sundarapañño. Yadipi paññā nāma asundarā natthi, niyyānikāya pana paññāya vasena evaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1926_0: Evamettha kodhādīnaṃ vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca akkodhanādimukhena, puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0508a2:1926_1: gāthāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni nipphattitalokuttarasaddhādike uddharitvā

atk-s0508a2:1926_3: Tassattho – yassa puggalassa tathāgate sammāsambuddhe “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattā
atk-s0508a2:1926_4: maggenāgatasaddhā, tato eva acalā avikampā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. “Atthī”ti, padaṃ ānetvā
atk-s0508a2:1926_5: sambandhitabbaṃ. Ariyakantanti ariyānaṃ kantaṃ piyāyitaṃ bhavantarepi avijahanato.
atk-s0508a2:1926_6: Pasaṃsitanti buddhādīhi pasaṭṭhaṃ, vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ atthīti yojanā. Taṃ panetaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1926_7: sīlaṃ gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ pabbajitasīlanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ nāma pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ,

atk-s0508a2:1926_9: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbampi akhaṇḍādibhāvena aparāmaṭṭhatāya “kalyāṇa”nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1927_0: Saṅghe pasādo yassatthīti “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā ariyasaṅghe
atk-s0508a2:1927_1: pasādo saddhā yassa puggalassa atthi acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Ujubhūtañca
atk-s0508a2:1927_2: dassananti diṭṭhivaṅkābhāvato kilesavaṅkābhāvato ca ujubhūtaṃ. Akuṭilaṃ ajimhaṃ kammassakatādassanañceva
atk-s0508a2:1927_3: sappaccayanāmarūpadassanañcāti duvidhampi dassanaṃ yassa atthi acalaṃ suppatiṭṭhitanti
atk-s0508a2:1927_4: yojanā. Adaliddoti taṃ āhu saddhādhanaṃ, sīladhanaṃ, sutadhanaṃ, cāgadhanaṃ, paññādhananti
atk-s0508a2:1927_5: imesaṃ suvisuddhānaṃ dhanānaṃ atthitāya “adaliddo”ti taṃ tādisaṃ puggalaṃ buddhādayo
atk-s0508a2:1927_6: ariyā āhu. Amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ tassa tathārūpassa jīvitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādiatthādhigamena
atk-s0508a2:1928_1: vuccati, tasmā ahampi tathārūpo bhaveyyanti. Saddhañca…pe… sāsananti “sabbapāpassa
atk-s0508a2:1928_2: akaraṇa”ntiādinā vuttaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ anussaranto kulaputto vuttappabhedaṃ saddhañceva
atk-s0508a2:1928_3: sīlañca dhammadassanahetukaṃ dhamme sunicchayā vimokkhabhūtaṃ pasādañca anuyuñjeyya vaḍḍheyyāti.
atk-s0508a2:1929: Evaṃ thero bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāmukhena attani vijjamāne guṇe pakāsento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1932_0: Yadā paṭhamamaddakkhintiādikā āyasmato mahāpanthakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1932_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vibhavasampanno kuṭumbiyo hutvā
atk-s0508a2:1932_2: ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1932_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a2:1932_4: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā, “bhante, yaṃ bhikkhuṃ tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake
atk-s0508a2:1932_5: – ‘saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ ayaṃ mama sāsane aggo’ti etadagge ṭhapayittha, ahampi imassa
atk-s0508a2:1932_6: adhikārakammassa balena so bhikkhu viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane aggo bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0508a2:1932_7: patthanaṃ akāsi. Kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa tatheva bhagavati adhikārakammaṃ katvā manomayassa
atk-s0508a2:1932_8: kāyassābhinimmānaṃ cetovivaṭṭakosallanti dvinnaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena vuttanayeneva paṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1932_9: akāsi. Bhagavā dvinnampi patthanaṃ anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0508a2:1932_10: gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane tumhākaṃ patthanā samijjhissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1933_0: Te ubhopi janā tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattiṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:1933_1: mahāpanthakassa antarākataṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ na kathīyati. Cūḷapanthako pana kassapassa
atk-s0508a2:1933_2: bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni odātakasiṇakammaṃ katvā devapure
atk-s0508a2:1933_3: nibbatti. Apadāne pana “cūḷapanthako padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tāpaso hutvā himavante
atk-s0508a2:1933_4: vasanto tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā pupphacchattena pūjaṃ akāsī”ti āgataṃ. Tesaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:1933_5: saṃsarantānaṃyeva kappasatasahassaṃ atikkantaṃ. Atha amhākaṃ satthā abhisambodhiṃ

atk-s0508a2:1934_0: Tena ca samayena rājagahe dhanaseṭṭhissa dhītā attano dāsena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:1934_1: ñātakehi bhītā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ palāyitvā aññattha vasantī taṃ paṭicca

atk-s0508a2:1934_4: panthakoti, nāmaṃ akāsi. Tasmiṃ ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle tameva paṭicca
atk-s0508a2:1934_5: dutiyaṃ gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā paripakkagabbhā pubbe vuttanayeneva antarāmagge puttaṃ

atk-s0508a2:1934_8: ayyakakulaṃ no dassehī”ti nibundhiyamānā dārake mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ pesesi. Tato
atk-s0508a2:1934_9: paṭṭhāya dārakā dhanaseṭṭhino gehe vaḍḍhanti. Tesu cūḷapanthako atidaharo. Mahāpanthako
atk-s0508a2:1934_10: pana ayyakena saddhiṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gato satthāraṃ disvā saha dassanena paṭiladdhasaddho

atk-s0508a2:1934_13: upasampajjitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karonto visesato catunnaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ lābhī

atk-s0508a2:1937: Tato me ahu saṃvego, passitvā purisuttamaṃ.

atk-s0508a2:1958: Sabbaṃ taṇhaṃ visosetvā, pallaṅkena upāvisi”nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1959_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Paṭhamanti ādito. Addakkhinti passiṃ, satthāranti, bhagavantaṃ.

atk-s0508a2:1959_2: kutocipi bhayābhāvato akutobhayaṃ nibbhayaṃ, catuvesārajjavisāradaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi
atk-s0508a2:1959_3: veneyyānaṃ yathārahamanusāsanato satthāraṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ mayhaṃ pitāmahena saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:1959_4: gantvā yāya velāya sabbapaṭhamaṃ passiṃ, taṃ purisuttamaṃ sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1959_5: passitvā tato dassanahetu tato dassanato pacchā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:1959_6: dhammañca sotuṃ nālattha”nti mayhaṃ saṃvego ahu sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajji. Uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0508a2:1959_7: panāhaṃ evaṃ cintesinti dasseti siriṃ hatthehīti gāthāya. Tassattho – yo vibhavatthiko
atk-s0508a2:1959_8: puriso “upaṭṭhāyiko hutvā tava santike vasissāmī”ti saviggahaṃ siriṃ sayane upagataṃ
atk-s0508a2:1959_9: hatthehi ca pādehi ca koṭṭento paṇāmeyya nīhareyya, so tathārūpo alakkhikapuriso
atk-s0508a2:1959_10: etādisaṃ satthāraṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ārādhetvā imasmiṃ navame khaṇe paṭilabhitvā virādhaye
atk-s0508a2:1959_11: tassa ovādākaraṇena taṃ virajjheyya, ahaṃ panevaṃ na karomīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tadāhaṃ…pe…
atk-s0508a2:1959_12: anagāriya”nti. Tattha chaḍḍayinti, pajahiṃ. “Chaḍḍiya”ntipi pāṭho. Nanu ayaṃ thero
atk-s0508a2:1959_13: dārapariggahaṃ akatvāva pabbajito, so kasmā “puttadārañca chaḍḍayi”nti avocāti? Yathā
atk-s0508a2:1959_14: nāma puriso anibbattaphalameva rukkhaṃ chindanto acchinne tato laddhaphalehi parihīno
atk-s0508a2:1960_0: Sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā adhisīlasikkhā, tāya ca, yattha bhikkhū saha jīvanti,
atk-s0508a2:1960_1: ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, tena bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātena sājīvena
atk-s0508a2:1960_2: ca samannāgato sikkhanabhāvena samaṅgībhūto, sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto
atk-s0508a2:1960_3: hutvā tadubhayaṃ sampādentoti attho. Tena suvisuddhe pātimokkhe sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1960_4: dasseti. Indriyesu susaṃvutoti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu suṭṭhu saṃvuto. Rūpādivisayesu
atk-s0508a2:1960_7: dassitameva hotīti thero attano catupārisuddhisīlasampadaṃ dassetvā “namassamāno
atk-s0508a2:1960_8: sambuddha”nti iminā buddhānussatibhāvanānuyogamāha. Vihāsiṃ aparājitoti kilesamārādīhi
atk-s0508a2:1960_9: aparājito eva hutvā vihariṃ, yāva arahattappatti, tāva tehi anabhibhūto, aññadatthu
atk-s0508a2:1961_0: Tatoti tasmā, yasmā suvisuddhasīlo satthari abhippasanno kilesābhibhavanapaṭipattiyañca
atk-s0508a2:1961_1: ṭhito, tasmā. Paṇidhīti paṇidhānaṃ. Tato vā cittābhinīhāro. Āsīti ahosi. Cetaso abhipatthitoti,
atk-s0508a2:1961_2: mama cittena icchito. Kīdiso pana soti āha “na nisīde muhuttampi, taṇhāsalle anūhate”ti.
atk-s0508a2:1961_3: “Aggamaggasaṇḍāsena mama hadayato taṇhāsalle anuddhaṭe muhuttampi na nisīde, nisajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1961_4: na kappeyya”nti evaṃ me cittābhinīhāro ahosīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1962_0: Evaṃ pana cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya bhāvanaṃ bhāvayitvā ṭhānacaṅkameheva rattiṃ vītināmento
atk-s0508a2:1962_1: arūpasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgamukhena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1962_2: Tena vuttaṃ “tassa me”tiādi. Nirūpadhīti kilesupadhiādīnaṃ abhāvena nirupadhi. Ratyāvivasāneti
atk-s0508a2:1962_3: rattibhāgassa vigamane vibhātāya rattiyā. Sūriyuggamanaṃ patīti sūriyuggamanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1962_4: katvā. Sabbaṃ taṇhanti kāmataṇhādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ aggamaggena visosetvā
atk-s0508a2:1962_5: sukkhāpetvā “taṇhāsalle anūhate na nisīde”ti, paṭiññāya mocitattā. Pallaṅkena upāvisinti
atk-s0508a2:1967_0: Navakanipāte yadā dukkhantiādikā āyasmato bhūtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:1967_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto
atk-s0508a2:1967_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā senoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1967_3: patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso “usabhaṃ pavara”ntiādinā catūhi gāthāhi abhitthavi.
atk-s0508a2:1968_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāketanagarassa
atk-s0508a2:1968_1: dvāragāme mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhissa putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa kira seṭṭhino jātā
atk-s0508a2:1968_2: jātā dārakā baddhāghātena ekena yakkhena khāditā, imassa pana pacchimabhavikattā
atk-s0508a2:1968_3: bhūtā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Yakkho pana vessavaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gato, puna nāgamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1968_4: Nāmakaraṇadivase cassa “evaṃ kate amanussā anukampantā parihareyyu”nti bhūtoti nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1968_5: akaṃsu. So pana attano puññabalena anantarāyo vaḍḍhi, tassa “tayo pāsādā ahesu”ntiādi
atk-s0508a2:1968_6: sabbaṃ yasassa kulaputtassa vibhavakittane viya veditabbaṃ. So viññutaṃ patto satthari
atk-s0508a2:1968_7: sākete vasante upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato. Satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:1968_8: pabbajitvā ajakaraṇiyā nāma nadiyā tīre leṇe vasanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a2:1972: Tatheva jhānaṃ buddhassa, ko disvā nappasīdati.

atk-s0508a2:1986_1: tehi upaṭṭhiyamāno añjanavane vasitvā puna attanā vasitaṭṭhānameva gantukāmo gamanākāraṃ

atk-s0508a2:1986_3: vaḍḍhissāmā”ti theraṃ yāciṃsu. Thero attano vivekābhiratiṃ tattha ca phāsuvihāraṃ pakāsento –

atk-s0508a2:2016_2: dukkha”nti aviddasū yathābhūtaṃ ajānantā puthujjanā yattha yasmiṃ upādānakkhandhapañcake

atk-s0508a2:2016_4: maggapaññāya parijānitvā, idha imasmiṃ sāsane sato sampajāno, paṇḍito bhikkhu, yadā

atk-s0508a2:2021_0: Evaṃ pariññābhisamayamukhena vivekaratiṃ dassetvā idāni pahānābhisamayādimukhenapi
atk-s0508a2:2021_1: taṃ dassetuṃ dutiyādikā tisso gāthā abhāsi. Tattha dukkhassāvahaninti dukkhassa āyatiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2021_2: pavattiṃ, dukkhassa nipphattikanti attho. Visattikanti taṇhaṃ. Sā hi visatāti visattikā,
atk-s0508a2:2021_3: visālāti visattikā, visaṭāti visattikā, visakkatīti visattikā, visaṃ haratīti visattikā,
atk-s0508a2:2021_4: visaṃvādikāti visattikā, visamūlāti visattikā, visaphalāti visattikā, visaparibhogāti
atk-s0508a2:2021_5: visattikā, visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule
atk-s0508a2:2021_6: gaṇe vitthaṭāti visattikāti vuccati. Papañcasaṅghātadukhādhivāhininti sattasantānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2021_7: saṃsāre papañcenti vitthārentīti papañcā, rāgādayo mānādayo ca. Te eva pavattidukkhassa
atk-s0508a2:2021_9: tassa adhivāhato nibbattanato papañcasaṅghātadukhādhivāhinī. Taṃ taṇhaṃ pahantvānāti
atk-s0508a2:2022_0: Sivanti khemaṃ, akhemakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchindanena tehi anupaddutanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2022_1: Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ vasena dvicaturaṅgo hutvā ariye nibbānaṃ gametīti dvecaturaṅgagāminaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2022_2: gāthāsukhatthañcettha vibhattialopo katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rūpūpapattimaggādīsu sabbesu
atk-s0508a2:2022_3: maggesu uttamattā magguttamaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā – “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho”tiādi. Sabbehi
atk-s0508a2:2022_4: kilesamalehi sattānaṃ sodhanato sabbakilesasodhanaṃ. Paññāya passitvāti paṭivedhapaññāya
atk-s0508a2:2023_0: Sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato puggalassa ca sokābhāvahetuto natthi ettha sokoti asokaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0508a2:2023_1: vigatarāgādirajattā virajaṃ. Na kenaci paccayena saṅkhatanti asaṅkhataṃ. Sabbesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2023_2: kilesānaṃ sabbassa ca dukkhassa vūpasamabhāvato, saṃsāradukkhadditehi pajjitabbato
atk-s0508a2:2023_3: adhigantabbato ca santaṃ padaṃ. Sabbehi kilesamalehi sattasantānassa sodhananimittato
atk-s0508a2:2023_5: nibbānaṃ ārabbha sacchikiriyābhisamayaṃ pavattentassa ālambake labbhamānavisesakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2023_6: ālambitabbe āropetvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Saṃyojanasaṅkhātānaṃ bandhanānaṃ chedanato saṃyojanabandhanacchidaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2023_7: Nimittañhettha kattubhāvena upacāritaṃ, yathā ariyabhāvakarāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti.
atk-s0508a2:2023_8: Yathā purimagāthāsu yadā jhāyati, tadā tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2023_9: Evaṃ idha yadā bhāveti, tadā tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2024_0: Evaṃ thero catūhi gāthāhi attānaṃ anupanetvāva catusaccapaṭivedhakittanena aññaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2024_1: byākaritvā idāni attanā vasitaṭṭhānassa vivittabhāvena phāsutaṃ dassento “yadā nabhe”tiādikā

atk-s0508a2:2024_3: meghadundubhi. Samantato paggharantīhi dhārāhi ākulāti dhārākulā. Vihagānaṃ pakkhīnaṃ

atk-s0508a2:2025_0: Kusumākulānanti tarūhi gaḷitakusumehi samohitānaṃ. Vicittavāneyyavaṭaṃsakānanti vane
atk-s0508a2:2025_1: jātattā vāneyyāni vanapupphāni, vicittāni vāneyyāni vaṭaṃsakāni etāsanti vicittavāneyyavaṭaṃsakā
atk-s0508a2:2026_0: Nisītheti rattiyaṃ. Rahitamhīti, janasambādhavirahite vivitte. Deveti meghe. Gaḷantamhīti
atk-s0508a2:2026_1: vuṭṭhidhārāyo paggharante vassante. Dāṭhinoti sīhabyagghādayo paṭipakkhasattā. Te
atk-s0508a2:2026_2: hi dāṭhāvudhāti “dāṭhino”ti vuccanti, nadanti dāṭhinoti idampi janavivekadassanatthameva gahitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2027_0: Vitakke uparundhiyattanoti attasantānapariyāpannatāya attano kāmavitakkādike micchāvitakke
atk-s0508a2:2027_1: paṭipakkhabalena nisedhetvā. Attanoti vā idaṃ vindatīti iminā yojetabbaṃ “tato ratiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2027_2: paramataraṃ attanā na vindatī”ti. Nagantareti pabbatantare. Nagavivaranti pabbataguhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2027_3: pabbhāraṃ vā. Samassitoti nissito upagato. Vītaddaroti vigatakilesadaratho. Vītakhiloti pahīnacetokhilo.
atk-s0508a2:2028_0: Sukhīti jhānādisukhena sukhito. Malakhilasokanāsanoti rāgādīnaṃ malānaṃ pañcannañca
atk-s0508a2:2028_1: cetokhilānaṃ ñātiviyogādihetukassa sokassa ca pahāyako. Niraggaḷoti, aggaḷaṃ vuccati
atk-s0508a2:2028_2: avijjā nibbānapurapavesanivāraṇato, tadabhāvato niraggaḷo. Nibbanathoti nitaṇho.
atk-s0508a2:2028_3: Visalloti, vigatarāgādisallo. Sabbāsaveti, kāmāsavādike sabbepi āsave. Byantikatoti
atk-s0508a2:2028_4: byantikatāvī ariyamaggena vigatante katvā ṭhito diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ yadā
atk-s0508a2:2028_5: jhāyati, tato jhānaratito paramataraṃ ratiṃ na vindatīti yojanā. Evaṃ pana vatvā
atk-s0508a2:2033_0: Dasakanipāte aṅgārinotiādikā āyasmato kāḷudāyittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:2033_1: padumuttarabuddhassa kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2033_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā tajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2034_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa mātukucchiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2034_1: paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase kapilavatthusmiṃyeva amaccagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Bodhisattena
atk-s0508a2:2034_2: saddhiṃ ekadivasaṃyeva jātoti taṃdivasaṃyeva naṃ dukūlacumbaṭe nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa
atk-s0508a2:2034_3: upaṭṭhānaṃ nayiṃsu. Bodhisattena hi saddhiṃ bodhirukkho, rāhulamātā, cattāro nidhī,
atk-s0508a2:2034_4: ārohaniyahatthī, assakaṇḍako, channo kāḷudāyīti ime satta ekadivasaṃyeva jātattā
atk-s0508a2:2034_5: sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ. Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase
atk-s0508a2:2034_6: jātattā udāyītveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu, thokaṃ kāḷadhātukattā pana kāḷudāyīti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a2:2034_7: So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vuddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2035_0: Aparabhāge lokanāthe mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0508a2:2035_1: pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante suddhodanamahārājā
atk-s0508a2:2035_2: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā purisasahassaparivāraṃ ekaṃ amaccaṃ “puttaṃ me idhānehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0508a2:2035_3: So dhammadesanāvelāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:2035_4: sapariso arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha ne satthā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāreti. Sabbe
atk-s0508a2:2035_5: taṅkhaṇaṃyeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. Arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2035_6: pattato paṭṭhāya pana ariyā majjhattāva honti, tasmā raññā pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0508a2:2035_7: na kathesi. Rājā “neva gatabalakoṭṭhako āgacchati, na sāsanaṃ suyyatī”ti aparampi
atk-s0508a2:2035_8: amaccaṃ purisasahassena pesesi. Tasmimpi tathā paṭipanne aparanti evaṃ navahi amaccehi
atk-s0508a2:2035_9: saddhiṃ nava purisasahassāni pesesi sabbe arahattaṃ patvā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2036_0: Atha rājā cintesi – “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena dasabalassa idhāgamanatthāya
atk-s0508a2:2036_1: na kiñci kathayiṃsu, ayaṃ kho pana udāyī dasabalena samavayo sahapaṃsukīḷiko, mayi
atk-s0508a2:2036_2: ca sinehavā, imaṃ pesessāmī”ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta, tvaṃ purisasahassaparivāro
atk-s0508a2:2036_3: rājagahaṃ gantvā dasabalaṃ ānehī”ti vatvā pesesi. So pana gacchanto “sacāhaṃ, deva,
atk-s0508a2:2036_4: pabbajituṃ labhissāmi, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ idhānessāmī”ti vatvā “yaṃ kiñci katvā mama
atk-s0508a2:2036_5: puttaṃ dassehī”ti vutto rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāvelāya parisapariyante
atk-s0508a2:2036_6: ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā saparivāro arahattaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:2044: Sudukkaraṃ kataṃ tena, yo me pupphaṃ adāsidaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2054: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2062: Udāyī nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:2063: “Rāgo doso ca moho ca, māno makkho ca dhaṃsito;
atk-s0508a2:2066: Pasādito ca sambuddho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2068_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā “na tāvāyaṃ dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ kālo, vasante pana
atk-s0508a2:2068_1: upagate pupphitesu vanasaṇḍesu haritatiṇasañchannāya bhūmiyā gamanakālo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2068_2: kālaṃ paṭimānento vasante sampatte satthu kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ gamanamaggavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇento –
atk-s0508a2:2070: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0508a2:2071: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra bhāgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2074: Pattaṃ pahāya phalamāsasānā, kālo ito pakkamanāya vīra.
atk-s0508a2:2076: “Nevātisītaṃ na panātiuṇhaṃ, sukhā utu addhaniyā bhadante;
atk-s0508a2:2077: Passantu taṃ sākiyā koḷiyā ca, pacchāmukhaṃ rohiniyaṃ tarantaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2081: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmi, sā me āsā samijjhatu.
atk-s0508a2:2084: Punappunaṃ khettaṃ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṃ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2087: Punappunaṃ dānapatī daditvā, punappunaṃ saggamupenti ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2089: “Vīro have sattayugaṃ puneti, yasmiṃ kule jāyati bhūripañño;
atk-s0508a2:2090: Maññāmahaṃ sakkati devadevo, tayā hi jāto muni saccanāmo.
atk-s0508a2:2092: “Suddhodano nāma pitā mahesino, buddhassa mātā pana māyanāmā;
atk-s0508a2:2093: Yā bodhisattaṃ parihariya kucchinā, kāyassa bhedā tidivamhi modati.
atk-s0508a2:2095: “Sā gotamī kālakatā ito cutā, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūtā;
atk-s0508a2:2096: Sā modati kāmaguṇehi pañcahi, parivāritā devagaṇehi tehi.
atk-s0508a2:2099: Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:2101_0: Tattha aṅgārinoti aṅgārāni viyāti aṅgārāni, rattapavāḷavaṇṇāni rukkhānaṃ pupphapallavāni,
atk-s0508a2:2101_1: tāni etesaṃ santīti aṅgārino, atilohitakusumakisalayehi aṅgāravuṭṭhisaṃparikiṇṇā
atk-s0508a2:2101_2: viyāti attho. Idānīti imasmiṃ kāle. Dumāti rukkhā. Bhadanteti, bhaddaṃ ante etassāti
atk-s0508a2:2101_3: bhadanteti ekassa dakārassa lopaṃ katvā vuccati, guṇavisesayutto, guṇavisesayuttānañca
atk-s0508a2:2101_4: aggabhūto satthā. Tasmā bhadanteti satthu ālapanaṃ. Paccattavacanañcetaṃ ekārantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2101_5: “sukaṭe paṭikamme sukhe dukkhepi ce”tiādīsu viya. Idha pana sambodhanatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2101_7: Phalāni esantīti phalesino. Acetanepi hi sacetanakiriyamāropetvā voharanti, yathā
atk-s0508a2:2101_8: kulaṃ patitukāmanti, phalāni gahetumāraddhā sampattiphalagahaṇakālāti attho. Chadanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2101_9: vippahāyāti purāṇapaṇṇāni pajahitvā sampannapaṇḍupalāsāti attho. Teti dumā. Accimantova
atk-s0508a2:2101_10: pabhāsayantīti dīpasikhāvanto viya jalitaaggī viya vā obhāsayanti sabbā disāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2101_11: Samayoti kālo, “anuggahāyā”ti vacanaseso. Mahāvīrāti mahāvikkanta. Bhāgī rasānanti
atk-s0508a2:2101_12: attharasādīnaṃ bhāgī. Vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā – “bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa
atk-s0508a2:2101_13: dhammarasassā”tiādi. Mahāvīra, bhāgīti ca idampi dvayaṃ sambodhanavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2101_14: Bhāgīrathānanti pana pāṭhe bhagīratho nāma ādirājā. Tabbaṃsajātatāya sākiyā bhāgīrathā,
atk-s0508a2:2102_0: Dumānīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, dumā rukkhāti attho. Samantato sabbadisā pavantīti,
atk-s0508a2:2102_1: samantato sabbabhāgato sabbadisāsu ca phullāni, tathā phullattā eva sabbadisā pavanti
atk-s0508a2:2102_2: gandhaṃ vissajjenti. Āsamānāti āsīsantā gahitukāmā. Evaṃ rukkhasobhāya gamanamaggassa
atk-s0508a2:2102_3: rāmaṇeyyataṃ dassetvā idāni “nevātisīta”ntiādinā utusampattiṃ dasseti. Sukhāti nātisītanātiuṇhabhāveneva
atk-s0508a2:2102_4: sukhā iṭṭhā. Utu addhaniyāti addhānagamanayoggā utu. Passantu taṃ sākiyā koḷiyā ca,
atk-s0508a2:2102_5: pacchāmukhaṃ rohiniyaṃ tarantanti rohinī nāma nadī sākiyakoḷiyajanapadānaṃ antare
atk-s0508a2:2102_6: uttaradisato dakkhiṇamukhā sandati, rājagahaṃ cassā puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya,
atk-s0508a2:2102_7: tasmā rājagahato kapilavatthuṃ gantuṃ taṃ nadiṃ tarantā pacchāmukhā hutvā taranti.
atk-s0508a2:2102_8: Tenāha “passantu taṃ…pe… taranta”nti. “Bhagavantaṃ pacchāmukhaṃ rohiniṃ nāma nadiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2102_9: atikkamantaṃ sākiyakoḷiyajanapadavāsino passantū”ti kapilavatthugamanāya bhagavantaṃ āyācanto ussāheti.
atk-s0508a2:2103_0: Idāni attano patthanaṃ upamāhi pakāsento “āsāya kasate”ti gāthamāha. Āsāya kasate
atk-s0508a2:2103_1: khettanti kassako kasanto khettaṃ phalāsāya kasati. Bījaṃ āsāya vappatīti kasitvā
atk-s0508a2:2103_2: ca vapantena phalāsāya eva bījaṃ vappati nikkhipīyati. Āsāya vāṇijā yantīti dhanahārakā
atk-s0508a2:2103_3: vāṇijā dhanāsāya samuddaṃ tarituṃ desaṃ upagantuṃ samuddaṃ nāvāya yanti gacchanti.
atk-s0508a2:2103_4: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmīti evaṃ ahampi yāya āsāya patthanāya bhagavā tumhākaṃ kapilapuragamanapatthanāya
atk-s0508a2:2103_5: idha tiṭṭhāmi. Sā me āsā samijjhatu, tumhehi “kapilavatthu gantabba”nti vadati, āsāya
atk-s0508a2:2104_1: vuttaṃ. Tassattho – sakiṃ vuttamattena vappe asampajjamāne kassakā punappunaṃ dutiyampi
atk-s0508a2:2104_2: tatiyampi bījaṃ vapanti. Pajjunno devarājāpi ekavārameva avassitvā punappunaṃ kālena
atk-s0508a2:2104_3: kālaṃ vassati. Kassakāpi ekavārameva akasitvā sassasampattiatthaṃ paṃsuṃ kaddamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2104_4: vā muduṃ kātuṃ khettaṃ punappunaṃ kasanti. Ekavārameva dhaññaṃ saṅgahaṃ katvā “alamettāvatā”ti
atk-s0508a2:2104_5: aparitussanato koṭṭhāgārādīsu paṭisāmanavasena manussehi upanīyamānaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2105_0: Yācanakāpi yācantā punappunaṃ kulāni caranti upagacchanti, na ekavārameva, yācitā
atk-s0508a2:2105_1: pana tesaṃ punappunaṃ dānapatī dadanti, na sakiṃyeva. Tathā pana deyyadhammaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2105_2: dānapatī daditvā dānamayaṃ puññaṃ upacinitvā punappunaṃ aparāparaṃ saggamupenti ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2105_3: paṭisandhivasena devalokaṃ upagacchanti. Tasmā ahampi punappunaṃ yācāmi bhagavā mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2106_0: Idāni yadatthaṃ satthāraṃ kapilavatthugamanaṃ yācati, taṃ dassetuṃ “vīro have”tigāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2106_1: Tassattho – vīro vīriyavā mahāvikkanto bhūripañño mahāpañño puriso yasmiṃ kule jāyati
atk-s0508a2:2106_2: nibbattati, tattha have ekaṃsena sattayugaṃ sattapurisayugaṃ yāvasattamaṃ pitāmahayugaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2106_3: sammāpaṭipattiyā puneti sodhetīti lokavādo ativādo aññesu. Bhagavā pana sabbesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2106_4: devānaṃ uttamadevatāya devadevo pāpanivāraṇena kalyāṇapatiṭṭhāpanena tato parampi
atk-s0508a2:2106_5: sodhetuṃ sakkati sakkotīti maññāmi ahaṃ. Kasmā? Tayā hi jāto muni saccanāmo yasmā
atk-s0508a2:2106_6: tayā satthārā ariyāya jātiyā jāto munibhāvo, muni vā samāno attahitaparahitānaṃ idhalokaparalokānañca
atk-s0508a2:2106_7: munanaṭṭhena “munī”ti avitathanāmo, monavā vā muni, “samaṇo pabbajito isī”ti avitathanāmo
atk-s0508a2:2106_8: tayā jāto. Tasmā sattānaṃ ekantahitapaṭilābhahetubhāvato bhagavā tava tattha gamanaṃ yācāmāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2107_0: Idāni “sattayuga”nti vutte pituyugaṃ dassetuṃ “suddhodano nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2107_1: odanaṃ jīvanaṃ etassāti suddhodano. Buddhapitā hi ekaṃsato suvisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācāro
atk-s0508a2:2107_2: suvisuddhājīvo hoti tathā abhinīhārasampannattā. Māyanāmāti kularūpasīlācārādisampattiyā
atk-s0508a2:2107_3: ñātimittādīhi “mā yāhī”ti vattabbaguṇatāya “māyā”ti laddhanāmā. Parihariyāti dhāretvā.
atk-s0508a2:2107_4: Kāyassa bhedāti sadevakassa lokassa cetiyasadisassa attano kāyassa vināsato uddhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2108_0: Sāti māyādevī. Gotamīti gottena taṃ kitteti. Dibbehi kāmehīti, tusitabhavanapariyāpannehi
atk-s0508a2:2108_1: dibbehi vatthukāmehi. Samaṅgibhūtāti samannāgatā. Kāmaguṇehīti kāmakoṭṭhāsehi, “kāmehī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2108_2: vatvā puna “kāmaguṇehī”ti vacanena anekabhāgehi vatthukāmehi paricāriyatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0508a2:2108_3: Tehīti yasmiṃ devanikāye nibbatti, tehi tusitadevagaṇehi, tehi vā kāmaguṇehi. “Samaṅgibhūtā
atk-s0508a2:2108_4: parivāritā”ti ca itthiliṅganiddeso purimattabhāvasiddhaṃ itthibhāvaṃ, devatābhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2108_5: vā sandhāya kato, devūpapatti pana purisabhāveneva jātā.
atk-s0508a2:2109_0: Evaṃ therena yācito bhagavā tattha gamane bahūnaṃ visesādhigamaṃ disvā vīsatisahassa
atk-s0508a2:2109_2: Thero iddhiyā kapilavatthuṃ gantvā rañño purato ākāse ṭhito adiṭṭhapubbaṃ vesaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:2109_3: raññā “kosi tva”nti pucchito, “sace amaccaputtaṃ tayā bhagavato santikaṃ pesitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2109_4: maṃ na jānāsi, evaṃ pana jānāhī”ti dassento –
atk-s0508a2:2111: Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:2113_0: Tattha buddhassa puttomhīti, sabbaññubuddhassa ure jātatāya orasaputto amhi. Asayhasāhinoti,
atk-s0508a2:2113_1: abhisambodhito pubbe ṭhapetvā mahābodhisattaṃ aññehi sahituṃ vahituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
atk-s0508a2:2113_2: asayhassa sakalassa bodhisambhārassa mahākāruṇikādhikārassa ca sahanato vahanato,
atk-s0508a2:2113_3: tato parampi aññehi sahituṃ abhibhavituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhānaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2113_6: buddhakiccassa ca sahanato, tattha vā sādhukārībhāvato asayhasāhino. Aṅgīrasassāti
atk-s0508a2:2113_8: “aṅgīraso, siddhatthoti dve nāmāni pitarāyeva gahitānī”ti vadanti. Appaṭimassāti
atk-s0508a2:2113_9: anūpamassa. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādino. Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsīti
atk-s0508a2:2113_10: ariyajātivasena mayhaṃ pitu sammāsambuddhassa lokavohārena tvaṃ pitā asi. Sakkāti
atk-s0508a2:2113_11: jātivasena rājānaṃ ālapati. Dhammenāti sabhāvena ariyajāti lokiyajātīti dvinnaṃ jātīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2113_12: sabhāvasamodhānena gotamāti rājānaṃ gottena ālapati. Ayyakosīti pitāmaho asi. Ettha
atk-s0508a2:2113_13: ca “buddhassa puttomhī”tiādiṃ vadanto thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2114_0: Evaṃ pana attānaṃ jānāpetvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano
atk-s0508a2:2114_1: paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasassa bhojanassa pattaṃ pūretvā dinne gamanākāraṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2114_2: “Kasmā gantukāmattha, bhuñjathā”ti ca vutte, “satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhuñjissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2114_4: paṭipanno”ti. “Tumhe imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā yāva mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ sampāpuṇāti,
atk-s0508a2:2114_5: tāvassa itova piṇḍapātaṃ harathā”ti. Thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā rañño parisāya ca dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2114_6: kathetvā satthu āgamanato puretarameva sakalaṃ rājanivesanaṃ ratanattaye abhippasannaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2114_7: karonto sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva satthu āharitabbabhattapuṇṇaṃ pattaṃ ākāse vissajjetvā
atk-s0508a2:2114_8: sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ upanetvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi. Satthā taṃ
atk-s0508a2:2114_9: piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji. Evaṃ saṭṭhiyojanaṃ maggaṃ divase divase yojanaṃ gacchantassa
atk-s0508a2:2114_10: satthu rājagehatova bhattaṃ āharitvā adāsi. Atha naṃ bhagavā “mayhaṃ pitu mahārājassa
atk-s0508a2:2117_0: Purato pacchato vātiādikā āyasmato ekavihāriyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:2117_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0508a2:2117_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:2118_0: So tena puññakammena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:2118_1: bhagavati parinibbute dhammāsokarañño kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti. Asokamahārājā
atk-s0508a2:2118_2: kira satthu parinibbānato dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari aṭṭhārasame vasse sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0508a2:2118_3: ekarajjābhisekaṃ patvā attano kaniṭṭhaṃ tissakumāraṃ oparajje ṭhapetvā ekena upāyena
atk-s0508a2:2118_4: taṃ sāsane abhippasannaṃ akāsi. So ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ gato araññe yonakamahādhammarakkhitattheraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2118_5: hatthināgena sālasākhaṃ gahetvā bījiyamānaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā sañjātapasādo “aho vatāhampi
atk-s0508a2:2118_6: ayaṃ mahāthero viya pabbajitvā araññe vihareyya”nti cintesi. Thero tassa cittācāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2118_7: ñatvā tassa passantasseva ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā asokārāme pokkharaṇiyā abhijjamāne
atk-s0508a2:2118_8: udake ṭhatvā cīvarañca uttarāsaṅgañca ākāse olaggetvā nhāyituṃ ārabhi. Kumāro therassa
atk-s0508a2:2118_9: ānubhāvaṃ disvā abhippasanno araññato nivattitvā rājagehaṃ gantvā “pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2118_10: rañño ārocesi. Rājā taṃ anekappakāraṃ yācitvā pabbajjādhippāyaṃ nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a2:2120: “Purato pacchato vāpi, aparo ce na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:2121: Atīva phāsu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane.
atk-s0508a2:2138_0: Tattha purato pacchato vāti attano purato vā pacchato vā, vā-saddassa vikappatthattā
atk-s0508a2:2138_1: passato vā aparo añño jano na vijjati ce, atīva ativiya phāsu cittasukhaṃ bhavati.
atk-s0508a2:2138_2: Ekavihārībhāvena ekassa asahāyassa. Vane vasatoti ciraparicitena vivekajjhāsayena
atk-s0508a2:2138_3: ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayo so rattindivaṃ mahājanaparivutassa vasato saṅgaṇikavihāraṃ nibbindanto
atk-s0508a2:2139_0: Handāti vossaggatthe nipāto, tena idāni karīyamānassa araññagamanassa nicchitabhāvamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2139_1: Eko gamissāmīti “suññāgāre kho, gahapati, tathāgatā abhiramantī”tiādivacanato buddhehi
atk-s0508a2:2139_2: vaṇṇitaṃ pasaṭṭhaṃ araññaṃ eko asahāyo gamissāmi vāsādhippāyena upagacchāmi. Yasmā
atk-s0508a2:2139_3: ekavihārissa ṭhānādīsu asahāyabhāvena ekavihārissa nibbānaṃ paṭipesitacittatāya pahitattassa
atk-s0508a2:2139_4: adhisīlasikkhādikā tisso sikkhā sikkhato bhikkhuno araññaṃ phāsu iṭṭhaṃ sukhāvahanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2140_0: Yogī-pītikaranti yogīnaṃ bhāvanāya yuttappayuttānaṃ appasaddādibhāvena jhānavipassanādipītiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2140_3: dasseti. Atthavasīti idha atthoti samaṇadhammo adhippeto. “Kathaṃ nu kho so me bhaveyyā”ti tassa vasaṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:2141_0: Supupphiteti suṭṭhu pupphite. Sītavaneti chāyūdakasampattiyā sīte vane. Ubhayenapi
atk-s0508a2:2141_1: tassa ramaṇīyataṃyeva vibhāveti. Girikandareti girīnaṃ abbhantare kandare. Kanti
atk-s0508a2:2141_2: hi udakaṃ, tena dāritaṃ ninnaṭṭhānaṃ kandaraṃ nāma. Tādise sītale girikandare ghammaparitāpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2141_3: vinodetvā attano gattāni parisiñcitvā nhāyitvā caṅkamissāmi ekakoti katthaci anāyattavuttitaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2142_0: Ekākiyoti ekākī asahāyo. Adutiyoti taṇhāsaṅkhātadutiyābhāvena adutiyo. Taṇhā hi purisassa
atk-s0508a2:2142_1: sabbadā avijahanaṭṭhena dutiyā nāma. Tenāha bhagavā – “taṇhādutiyo puriso, dīghamaddhāna saṃsara”nti.
atk-s0508a2:2143_0: Evaṃ me kattukāmassāti “handa eko gamissāmī”tiādinā vuttavidhinā araññaṃ gantvā bhāvanābhiyogaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2143_1: kattukāmassa me. Adhippāyo samijjhatūti “kadāhaṃ viharissāmi, katakicco anāsavo”ti
atk-s0508a2:2143_2: evaṃ pavatto manoratho ijjhatu siddhiṃ pāpuṇātu. Arahattappatti ca yasmā na āyācanamattena
atk-s0508a2:2143_3: sijjhati, nāpi aññena sādhetabbā, tasmā āha “sādhayissāmahaṃyeva, nāñño aññassa kārako”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2144_0: Evaṃ uparājassa pabbajjāya daḷhanicchayataṃ ñatvā rājā asokārāmagamanīyaṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2144_1: alaṅkārāpetvā kumāraṃ sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ mahatiyā senāya mahaccarājānubhāvena
atk-s0508a2:2144_2: vihāraṃ nesi. Kumāro padhānagharaṃ gantvā mahādhammarakkhitattherassa santike pabbaji,
atk-s0508a2:2144_3: anekasatā manussā taṃ anupabbajiṃsu. Rañño bhāgineyyo saṅghamittāya sāmiko aggibrahmāpi
atk-s0508a2:2144_4: tameva anupabbaji. So pabbajitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho attanā kātabbaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a2:2155_0: Tattha esa bandhāmi sannāhanti esāhaṃ vīriyasaṅkhātaṃ sannāhaṃ bandhāmi, kāye ca
atk-s0508a2:2155_1: jīvite ca nirapekkho vīriyasannāhena sannayhāmi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma sūro
atk-s0508a2:2155_2: puriso paccatthike paccupaṭṭhite taṃ jetukāmo aññaṃ kiccaṃ pahāya kavacapaṭimuccanādinā
atk-s0508a2:2155_3: yuddhāya sannayhati, yuddhabhūmiñca gantvā paccatthike ajetvā tato na nivattati,
atk-s0508a2:2155_4: evamahampi kilesapaccatthike jetuṃ ādittampi sīsaṃ celañca ajjhupekkhitvā catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyasannāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2155_5: sannayhāmi, kilese ajetvā kilesavijayayoggaṃ vivekaṭṭhānaṃ na vissajjemīti. Tena
atk-s0508a2:2155_6: vuttaṃ “pavisissāmi kānanaṃ na tato nikkhamissāmi, appatto āsavakkhaya”nti.
atk-s0508a2:2156_1: nūna giribbajeti yojanā. Pabbataparikkhepe abhiramissāmi maññeti anāgatatthaṃ parikappento
atk-s0508a2:2157_0: Evaṃ vatvā thero araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto upajjhāyena saddhiṃ kaliṅgaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2157_1: agamāsi. Tatthassa pāde cammikābādho uppajji, taṃ disvā eko vejjo “sappiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:2157_2: pariyesatha, tikicchissāmi na”nti āha. Thero sappipariyesanaṃ akatvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:2157_3: eva kammaṃ karoti, rogo vaḍḍhati, vejjo therassa tattha appossukkataṃ disvā sayameva
atk-s0508a2:2157_4: sappiṃ pariyesitvā theraṃ arogaṃ akāsi. So arogo hutvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:2159: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
atk-s0508a2:2177: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there tattha viharante rājā koṭidhanapariccāgena bhojakagirivihāraṃ nāma kāretvā theraṃ tattha vāsesi. So tattha viharanto parinibbānakāle –
atk-s0508a2:2181: Osānagāthamāha. Sā uttānatthāva. Tadeva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a2:2184_0: Anāgataṃ yo paṭikacca passatītiādikā āyasmato mahākappinattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a2:2184_1: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a2:2184_2: satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:2184_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā tajjaṃ adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0508a2:2185_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0508a2:2185_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto purisasahassagaṇajeṭṭhako hutvā gabbhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2185_2: mahantaṃ pariveṇaṃ kārāpesi. Te sabbepi janā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā taṃ upāsakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2185_3: jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā saputtadārā devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:2185_4: saṃsariṃsu. Tesu gaṇajeṭṭhako amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva paccantadese
atk-s0508a2:2185_5: kukkuṭanāmake nagare rājagehe nibbatti, tassa kappinoti nāmaṃ ahosi. Sesapurisā tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:2185_6: nagare amaccakule nibbattiṃsu. Kappinakumāro pitu accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā mahākappinarājā
atk-s0508a2:2185_7: nāma jāto. So sutavittakatāya pātova catūhi dvārehi sīghaṃ dūte pesesi – “yattha
atk-s0508a2:2185_8: bahussute passatha, tato nivattitvā mayhaṃ ārocethā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2186_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya viharati. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2186_1: kāle sāvatthivāsino vāṇijā sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā taṃ nagaraṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a2:2186_2: bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā “rājānaṃ passissāmā”ti paṇṇākārahatthā rañño ārocāpesuṃ. Te rājā
atk-s0508a2:2186_3: pakkosāpetvā niyyāditapaṇṇākāre vanditvā ṭhite “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi. “Sāvatthito,
atk-s0508a2:2186_4: devā”ti. “Kacci vo raṭṭhaṃ subhikkhaṃ, dhammiko rājā”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Kīdiso dhammo
atk-s0508a2:2186_5: tumhākaṃ dese idāni pavattatī”ti? “Taṃ, deva, na sakkā ucchiṭṭhamukhehi kathetu”nti.
atk-s0508a2:2186_6: Rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena udakaṃ dāpesi. Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā dasabalābhimukhā añjaliṃ
atk-s0508a2:2186_7: paggahetvā, “deva, amhākaṃ dese buddharatanaṃ nāma uppanna”nti āhaṃsu. Rañño “buddho”ti
atk-s0508a2:2186_8: vacane sutamatteyeva sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā pīti uppajji. Tato “buddhoti, tātā,
atk-s0508a2:2186_9: vadethā”ti āha. “Buddhoti, deva, vadāmā”ti. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vadāpetvā “buddhoti padaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2186_10: aparimāṇa”nti tasmiṃyeva pade pasanno satasahassaṃ datvā “aparaṃ vadethā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:2186_11: “Deva, loke dhammaratanaṃ nāma uppanna”nti. Tampi sutvā tatheva satasahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0508a2:2186_12: “aparaṃ vadethā”ti pucchi. “Deva, saṅgharatanaṃ nāma uppanna”nti. Tampi sutvā tatheva
atk-s0508a2:2186_13: satasahassaṃ datvā “buddhassa bhagavato santike pabbajissāmī”ti tatova nikkhami.
atk-s0508a2:2186_14: Amaccāpi tatheva nikkhamiṃsu. So amaccasahassena saddhiṃ gaṅgātīraṃ patvā “sace satthā
atk-s0508a2:2186_15: sammāsambuddho, imesaṃ assānaṃ khuramattampi mā temetū”ti saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā udakapiṭṭheneva
atk-s0508a2:2186_16: pūraṃ gaṅgānadiṃ atikkamitvā aparampi aḍḍhayojanavitthāraṃ nadiṃ tatheva atikkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:2186_17: tatiyaṃ candabhāgaṃ nāma mahānadiṃ patvā tampi tāya eva saccakiriyāya atikkami.
atk-s0508a2:2187_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsasamayaṃyeva mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0508a2:2187_1: “ajja mahākappino tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivāro mama santike
atk-s0508a2:2187_2: pabbajituṃ āgamissatī”ti disvā “mayā tesaṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātuṃ yutta”nti pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2187_3: katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0508a2:2187_4: sayameva ākāsena gantvā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre tesaṃ uttaraṇatitthassābhimukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:2187_5: mahānigrodhamūle pallaṅkena nisinno chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi. Te tena titthena
atk-s0508a2:2187_6: uttarantā buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vidhāvantiyo olokento bhagavantaṃ disvā “yaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2187_7: satthāraṃ uddissa mayaṃ āgatā, addhā so eso”ti dassaneneva niṭṭhaṃ gantvā diṭṭhaṭṭhānato
atk-s0508a2:2187_8: paṭṭhāya onamitvā paramanipaccākāraṃ karontā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu. Rājā bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:2187_9: gopphakesu gahetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena. Satthā
atk-s0508a2:2187_10: tesaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne saddhiṃ parisāya arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:2213: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2215: Kappino nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:2223: Tato cutā mayaṃ sabbe, ahumha tidasūpagā.
atk-s0508a2:2232: “Suyuttā tassa sissā ca, sumuttā ca anāsavā;
atk-s0508a2:2251: Tato no āsayaṃ ñatvā, buddho dhammamadesayi.
atk-s0508a2:2262: “Jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2264: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a2:2267_0: Arahattaṃ patvā pana te sabbeva satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Satthā te “etha, bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0508a2:2267_1: āha. Sā eva tesaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā ca ahosi. Satthā taṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ ādāya
atk-s0508a2:2267_2: ākāsena jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā tassantevāsike bhikkhū āha – “kacci,
atk-s0508a2:2267_3: bhikkhave, kappino bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti? “Na, bhagavā, deseti. Appossukko
atk-s0508a2:2267_4: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyutto viharati, ovādamattampi na detī”ti. Satthā theraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2267_5: pakkosāpetvā – “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, kappina, antevāsikānaṃ ovādamattampi na desī”ti?
atk-s0508a2:2267_6: “Saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti. “Brāhmaṇa, mā evaṃ kari, ajja paṭṭhāya upagatānaṃ dhammaṃ desehī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2267_7: “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero satthu vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā ekovādeneva samaṇasahassaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2267_8: arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Tena naṃ satthā paṭipāṭiyā attano sāvake there ṭhānantare
atk-s0508a2:2267_9: ṭhapento bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Athekadivasaṃ thero bhikkhuniyo ovadanto –
atk-s0508a2:2269: “Anāgataṃ yo paṭikacca passati, hitañca atthaṃ ahitañca taṃ dvayaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2270: Viddesino tassa hitesino vā, randhaṃ na passanti samekkhamānā.
atk-s0508a2:2274: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
atk-s0508a2:2280: Paññāya ca alābhena, vittavāpi na jīvati.
atk-s0508a2:2283: Paññāsahito naro idha, api dukkhesu sukhāni vindati.
atk-s0508a2:2286: Yattha jāyetha mīyetha, tattha kiṃ viya abbhutaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2289: Jātā jātā marantīdha, evaṃ dhammā hi pāṇino.
atk-s0508a2:2291: “Na hetadatthāya matassa hoti, yaṃ jīvitatthaṃ paraporisānaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2292: Matamhi ruṇṇaṃ na yaso na lokyaṃ, na vaṇṇitaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇehi.
atk-s0508a2:2294: “Cakkhuṃ sarīraṃ upahanti tena, nihīyati vaṇṇabalaṃ matī ca;
atk-s0508a2:2295: Ānandino tassa disā bhavanti, hitesino nāssa sukhī bhavanti.
atk-s0508a2:2297: “Tasmā hi iccheyya kule vasante, medhāvino ceva bahussute ca;
atk-s0508a2:2298: Yesañhi paññāvibhavena kiccaṃ, taranti nāvāya nadiṃva puṇṇa”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:2300_0: Tattha anāgatanti na āgataṃ, avindanti, attho. Paṭikaccāti putetaraṃyeva. Passatīti
atk-s0508a2:2300_1: oloketi. Atthanti kiccaṃ. Taṃ dvayanti hitāhitaṃ. Viddesinoti amittā. Hitesinoti
atk-s0508a2:2300_2: mittā. Randhanti chiddaṃ. Samekkhamānāti gavesantā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo puggalo
atk-s0508a2:2300_3: attano hitāvahaṃ ahitāvahaṃ tadubhayañca atthaṃ kiccaṃ anāgataṃ asampattaṃ puretaraṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:2300_4: paññācakkhunā ahaṃ viya passati vīmaṃsati vicāreti, tassa amittā vā ahitajjhāsayena
atk-s0508a2:2300_5: mittā vā hitajjhāsayena randhaṃ gavesantā na passanti, tādiso paññavā puggalo acchiddavutti,
atk-s0508a2:2301_0: Idāni ānāpānasatibhāvanāya guṇaṃ dassento tattha tāni yojetuṃ “ānāpānasatī yassā”ti
atk-s0508a2:2301_1: dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha ānanti assāso. Apānanti passāso. Assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇā
atk-s0508a2:2301_2: sati ānāpānasati. Satisīsena cettha taṃsampayuttasamādhibhāvanā adhippetā. Yassāti,
atk-s0508a2:2301_3: yassa yogino. Paripuṇṇā subhāvitāti catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ soḷasannañca ākārānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2301_4: pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ vijjāvimuttīnañca pāripūriyā suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a2:2301_5: bhāvitā vaḍḍhitā. Anupubbaṃ paricitā, yathā buddhena desitāti “so satova assasatī”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:2301_6: yathā bhagavatā desitā, tathā anupubbaṃ anukkamena paricitā āsevitā bhāvitā. Somaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2301_7: lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimāti so yogāvacaro yathā abbhādiupakkilesā vimutto
atk-s0508a2:2301_8: cando candālokena imaṃ okāsalokaṃ pabhāseti, evaṃ avijjādiupakkilesavimutto ñāṇālokena
atk-s0508a2:2301_9: attasantānapatitaṃ parasantānapatitañca saṅkhāralokaṃ pabhāseti pakāseti. Tasmā tumhehi
atk-s0508a2:2302_0: Idāni attānaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā bhāvanābhiyogassa saphalataṃ dassento “odātaṃ vata
atk-s0508a2:2302_1: me citta”nti tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tassattho – nīvaraṇamalavigamato odātaṃ suddhaṃ vata
atk-s0508a2:2302_2: mama cittaṃ. Yathā pamāṇakarā rāgādayo pahīnā, appamāṇañca nibbānaṃ paccakkhaṃ kataṃ
atk-s0508a2:2302_3: ahosi, tathā bhāvitattā appamāṇaṃ subhāvitaṃ, tato eva catusaccaṃ nibbiddhaṃ paṭivijjhitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2302_4: sakalasaṃkilesapakkhato paggahitañca hutvā dukkhādikā pubbantādikā ca disā obhāsate
atk-s0508a2:2302_5: tattha vitiṇṇakaṅkhattā sabbadhammesu vigatasammohattā ca. Tasmā tumhehipi evaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2303_0: Yathā bhāvanāmayā paññā cittamalavisodhanādinā purisassa bahupakārā, evaṃ itarāpīti
atk-s0508a2:2303_1: dassento “jīvate vāpi sappañño”ti catutthagāthamāha. Tassattho – parikkhīṇadhanopi
atk-s0508a2:2303_2: sappaññajātiko itarītarasantosena santuṭṭho anavajjāya jīvikāya jīvatiyeva. Tassa
atk-s0508a2:2303_3: hi jīvitaṃ jīvitaṃ nāma. Tenāha bhagavā – “paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha”nti. Dummedhapuggalo
atk-s0508a2:2303_4: pana paññāya alābhena diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca atthaṃ virādhento vittavāpi
atk-s0508a2:2303_5: na jīvati, garahādippattiyā jīvanto nāma na tassa hoti, anupāyaññutāya vā yathādhigataṃ
atk-s0508a2:2303_6: dhanaṃ nāsento jīvitampi sandhāretuṃ na sakkotiyeva, tasmā pārihāriyapaññāpi tumhehi
atk-s0508a2:2304_0: Idāni paññāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “paññā sutavinicchinī”ti pañcamaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:2304_1: paññā sutavinicchinīti paññā nāmesā sutassa vinicchayinī, yathāsute sotapathamāgate
atk-s0508a2:2304_2: atthe “ayaṃ akusalo, ayaṃ kusalo, ayaṃ sāvajjo, ayaṃ anavajjo”tiādinā vinicchayajananī.
atk-s0508a2:2304_3: Kittisilokavaddhanīti kittiyā sammukhā pasaṃsāya silokassa patthaṭayasabhāvassa vaddhanī,
atk-s0508a2:2304_4: paññavatoyeva hi kittiādayo viññūnaṃ pāsaṃsabhāvato. Paññāsahitoti pārihāriyapaññāya,
atk-s0508a2:2304_5: vipassanāpaññāya ca yutto. Api dukkhesu sukhāni vindatīti ekantadukkhasabhāvesu khandhāyatanādīsu
atk-s0508a2:2305_0: Idāni tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhīrabhāvāvahaṃ dhammaṃ kathento “nāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2305_1: ajjatano dhammo”tiādinā sesagāthā abhāsi. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yvāyaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2305_2: jāyanamīyanasabhāvo, ayaṃ dhammo ajjatano adhunāgato na hoti, abhiṇhapavattikatāya
