atk-s0508a2:2305_3: na acchariyo, abbhutapubbatābhāvato nāpi abbhuto. Tasmā yattha jāyetha mīyetha, yasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2305_4: loke satto jāyeyya, so ekaṃsena mīyetha, tattha kiṃ viya? Kiṃ nāma abbhutaṃ siyā?
atk-s0508a2:2305_5: Sabhāvikattā maraṇassa – na hi khaṇikamaraṇassa kiñci kāraṇaṃ atthi. Yato anantarañhi
atk-s0508a2:2305_6: jātassa, jīvitā maraṇaṃ dhuvaṃ jātassa jātisamanantaraṃ jīvitato maraṇaṃ ekantikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2305_7: uppannānaṃ khandhānaṃ ekaṃsena bhijjanato. Yo panettha jīvatīti lokavohāro, so tadupādānassa
atk-s0508a2:2305_8: anekapaccayāyattatāya anekantiko, yasmā etadevaṃ, tasmā jātā marantīdha, evaṃdhammā
atk-s0508a2:2305_9: hi pāṇinoti ayaṃ sattānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ jātānaṃ maraṇanti jātiyā maraṇānubandhanataṃ āha.
atk-s0508a2:2306_0: Idāni yasmā tāsu bhikkhunīsu kāci sokabandhitacittāpi atthi, tasmā tāsaṃ sokavinodanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2306_1: kātuṃ “na hetadatthāyātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha na hetadatthāya matassa hotīti yaṃ matassa
atk-s0508a2:2306_2: jīvitatthaṃ jīvitanimittaṃ paraporisānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ ruṇṇaṃ, etaṃ tassa matassa
atk-s0508a2:2306_3: sattassa jīvitatthaṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, kassacipi atthāya na hoti, ye pana rudanti, tesampi
atk-s0508a2:2306_4: matamhi matapuggalanimittaṃ ruṇṇaṃ, na yaso na lokyaṃ yasāvahaṃ visuddhāvahañca na
atk-s0508a2:2306_5: hoti. Na vaṇṇitaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇehīti viññuppasaṭṭhampi na hoti, atha kho viññugarahitamevāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2307_0: Na kevalameteva ye rudato ādīnavā, atha kho imepīti dassento “cakkhuṃ sarīraṃ upahantī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2307_1: gāthaṃ vatvā tato paraṃ sokādianatthapaṭibāhanatthaṃ kalyāṇamittapayirupāsanāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2307_2: tā niyojento “tasmā”tiādinā osānagāthamāha. Tattha tasmāti yasmā ruṇṇaṃ rudantassa
atk-s0508a2:2307_3: puggalassa cakkhuṃ sarīrañca upahanti vibādhati, tena ruṇṇena vaṇṇo balaṃ mati ca
atk-s0508a2:2307_4: nihīyati parihāyati, tassa rudantassa puggalassa disā sapattā ānandino pamodavanto
atk-s0508a2:2307_5: pītivanto bhavanti. Hitesino mittā dukkhī dukkhitā bhavanti tasmā dhammojapaññāya
atk-s0508a2:2307_7: bahussute, attano kule vasante iccheyya pāṭikaṅkheyya kulūpake kareyya. Yesanti yesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2307_8: medhāvīnaṃ bahussutānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ paññāvibhavena paññābalena yathā mahoghassa puṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2307_9: nadiṃ nāvāya taranti, evaṃ kulaputtā attano atthakiccaṃ taranti pāraṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0508a2:2308: Evaṃ thero tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā vissajjesi. Tā therassa ovāde ṭhatvā sokaṃ vinodetvā yoniso paṭipajjantiyo sadatthaṃ paripūresuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2311_0: Dandhā mayhaṃ gatītiādikā āyasmato cūḷapanthakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Yadettha
atk-s0508a2:2311_1: aṭṭhuppattivasena vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakanipāte mahāpanthakavatthusmiṃ vuttameva.
atk-s0508a2:2311_2: Ayaṃ pana viseso – mahāpanthakatthero arahattaṃ patvā aggaphalasukhena vītināmento
atk-s0508a2:2311_3: cintesi – “kathaṃ nu kho sakkā cūḷapanthakampi imasmiṃ sukhe patiṭṭhapetu”nti? So
atk-s0508a2:2311_4: attano ayyakaṃ dhanaseṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “sace, mahāseṭṭhi, anujānātha, ahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2311_5: cūḷapanthakaṃ pabbājeyya”nti. “Pabbājetha, bhante”ti. Thero taṃ pabbājesi. So dasasu
atk-s0508a2:2312: “Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2314_0: Gāthaṃ uggaṇhanto catūhi māsehi gahetuṃ nāsakkhi, gahitagahitaṃ padaṃ hadaye na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a2:2314_1: Atha naṃ mahāpanthako āha – “panthaka, tvaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane abhabbo, catūhi māsehi
atk-s0508a2:2314_2: ekagāthampi gahetuṃ na sakkosi. Pabbajitakiccaṃ pana tvaṃ kathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessasi?
atk-s0508a2:2314_3: Nikkhama ito”ti. So therena paṇāmito dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2315_0: Tena ca samayena satthā jīvakambavane viharati. Atha jīvako purisaṃ pesesi, “pañcahi
atk-s0508a2:2315_1: bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ nimantehī”ti. Tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāpanthako
atk-s0508a2:2315_2: bhattuddesako hoti. So “pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭicchatha, bhante”ti
atk-s0508a2:2315_3: vutto “cūḷapanthakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ paṭicchāmī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā cūḷapanthako bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0508a2:2315_4: domanassappatto ahosi. Satthā tassa cittakkhedaṃ ñatvā, “cūḷapanthako mayā katena
atk-s0508a2:2315_5: upāyena bujjhissatī”ti tassa avidūre ṭhāne attānaṃ dassetvā “kiṃ, panthaka, rodasī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2315_6: pucchi. “Bhātā maṃ, bhante, paṇāmetī”ti āha. “Panthaka, mā cintayi, mama sāsane tuyhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2315_7: pabbajjā, ehi, imaṃ gahetvā ‘rajoharaṇaṃ, rajoharaṇa’nti manasi karohī”ti iddhiyā
atk-s0508a2:2315_8: suddhaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā adāsi. So satthārā dinnaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ “rajoharaṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2315_9: rajoharaṇa”nti hatthena parimajjanto nisīdi. Tassa taṃ parimajjantassa kiliṭṭhadhātukaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2315_10: jātaṃ, puna parimajjantassa ukkhaliparipuñchanasadisaṃ jātaṃ. So ñāṇassa paripakkattā
atk-s0508a2:2315_11: evaṃ cintesi – “idaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ pakatiyā parisuddhaṃ, imaṃ upādiṇṇakasarīraṃ nissāya
atk-s0508a2:2315_12: kiliṭṭhaṃ aññathā jātaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ yathāpetaṃ, evaṃ cittampī”ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:2315_13: tasmiṃyeva nimitte jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0508a2:2317: Gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho so, himavante vasī tadā.
atk-s0508a2:2332: “Yaṃ yaṃ yoniṃ saṃsarati, devattaṃ atha mānusaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2335: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2342: “Dandhā mayhaṃ gatī āsi, paribhūto pure ahuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2343: Bhātā ca maṃ paṇāmesi, gaccha dāni sakaṃ gharaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2351: Tattha cittaṃ vimucci me, arahattaṃ apāpuṇiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2355_0: Arahattamaggenevassa tepiṭakaṃ pañcābhiññā ca āgamiṃsu. Satthā ekena ūnehi pañcahi
atk-s0508a2:2355_1: bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ gantvā jīvakassa nivesane paññatte āsane nisīdi. Cūḷapanthako
atk-s0508a2:2355_2: pana attano bhikkhāya appaṭicchitattā eva na gato. Jīvako yāguṃ dātuṃ ārabhi, satthā
atk-s0508a2:2355_3: pattaṃ hatthena pidahi. “Kasmā, bhante, na gaṇhathā”ti vutte – “vihāre eko bhikkhu
atk-s0508a2:2355_4: atthi, jīvakā”ti. So purisaṃ pahiṇi, “gaccha, bhaṇe, vihāre nisinnaṃ ayyaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:2355_5: ehī”ti. Cūḷapanthakattheropi rūpena kiriyāya ca ekampi ekena asadisaṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2355_6: nimminitvā nisīdi. So puriso vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ disvā gantvā jīvakassa
atk-s0508a2:2355_7: kathesi – “imasmā bhikkhusaṅghā vihāre bhikkhusaṅgho bahutaro, pakkositabbaṃ ayyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2355_8: na jānāmī”ti. Jīvako satthāraṃ paṭipucchi – “konāmo, bhante, vihāre nisinno bhikkhū”ti?
atk-s0508a2:2355_9: “Cūḷapanthako nāma, jīvakā”ti. “Gaccha, bhaṇe, ‘cūḷapanthako nāma kataro’ti pucchitvā
atk-s0508a2:2355_10: taṃ ānehī”ti. So vihāraṃ gantvā “cūḷapanthako nāma kataro, bhante”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2355_11: cūḷapanthako”,“ahaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti ekapahāreneva bhikkhusahassampi kathesi. So punāgantvā
atk-s0508a2:2355_12: taṃ pavattiṃ jīvakassa ārocesi. Jīvako paṭividdhasaccattā “iddhimā maññe, ayyo”ti
atk-s0508a2:2355_13: nayato ñatvā “gaccha, bhaṇe, paṭhamaṃ kathanakamayyameva ‘tumhe satthā pakkosatī’ti
atk-s0508a2:2355_14: vatvā cīvarakaṇṇe gaṇhā”ti āha. So vihāraṃ gantvā tathā akāsi, tāvadeva nimmitabhikkhū
atk-s0508a2:2356_0: Satthā tasmiṃ khaṇe yāguñca khajjakādibhedañca paṭiggaṇhi. Dasabale bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2356_1: katvā vihāraṃ gate dhammasabhāyaṃ kathā udapādi – “aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo, yatra
atk-s0508a2:2356_2: hi nāma cattāro māse ekagāthaṃ gahetuṃ asakkontampi lahukena khaṇeneva evaṃ mahiddhikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2356_3: akaṃsū”ti. Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā āgantvā buddhāsane nisajja,
atk-s0508a2:2356_4: “kiṃ vadetha, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā, “imaṃ nāma, bhante”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, cūḷapanthakena
atk-s0508a2:2356_5: idāni mayhaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā lokuttaradāyajjaṃ laddhaṃ, pubbe pana lokiyadāyajja”nti
atk-s0508a2:2356_6: vatvā tehi yācito cūḷaseṭṭhijātakaṃ kathesi. Aparabhāge taṃ satthā ariyagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0508a2:2356_7: dhammāsane nisinno manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca
atk-s0508a2:2356_8: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So aparena samayena bhikkhūhi “tathā dandhadhātukena kathaṃ tayā
atk-s0508a2:2356_9: saccāni paṭividdhānī”ti puṭṭho bhātu paṇāmanato paṭṭhāya attano paṭipattiṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a2:2358: “Dandhā mayhaṃ gatī āsi, paribhūto pure ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2359: Bhātā ca maṃ paṇāmesi, gaccha dāni tuvaṃ gharaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2374: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2383: Nisinnaṃ maṃ viditvāna, attha satthā paṭiggahi.
atk-s0508a2:2388_0: Tattha dandhāti, mandā, catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ catūhi māsehi gahetuṃ asamatthabhāvena
atk-s0508a2:2388_1: dubbalā. Gatīti ñāṇagati. Āsīti, ahosi. Paribhūtoti, tato eva “muṭṭhassati asampajāno”ti
atk-s0508a2:2388_2: hīḷito. Pureti, pubbe puthujjanakāle. Bhātā cāti samuccayattho ca-saddo, na kevalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2388_3: paribhūtova, atha kho bhātāpi maṃ paṇāmesi, “panthaka, tvaṃ duppañño ahetuko maññe,
atk-s0508a2:2388_4: tasmā pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ asamattho, na imassa sāsanassa anucchaviko,
atk-s0508a2:2388_5: gaccha dāni tuyhaṃ ayyakaghara”nti nikkaḍḍhesi. Bhātāti, bhātarā.
atk-s0508a2:2389: Koṭṭhaketi, dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe. Dummanoti, domanassito. Sāsanasmiṃ apekkhavāti, sammāsambuddhassa sāsane sāpekkho avibbhamitukāmo.
atk-s0508a2:2390_0: Bhagavā tattha āgacchīti, mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso maṃ anuggaṇhanto bhagavā yatthāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2390_1: ṭhito, tattha āgacchi. Āgantvā ca, “panthaka, ahaṃ te satthā, na mahāpanthako, maṃ
atk-s0508a2:2390_2: uddissa tava pabbajjā”ti samassāsento sīsaṃ mayhaṃ parāmasi jālābandhanamudutalunapīṇavarāyataṅgulisamupasobhitena
atk-s0508a2:2390_3: vikasitapadumasassirīkena cakkaṅkitena hatthatalena “idāniyeva mama putto bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2390_4: dīpento mayhaṃ sīsaṃ parāmasi. Bāhāya maṃ gahetvānāti, “kasmā tvaṃ, idha tiṭṭhasī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2390_5: candanagandhagandhinā attano hatthena maṃ bhuje gahetvā antosaṅghārāmaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0508a2:2390_6: Pādāsi pādapuñchaninti pādapuñchaniṃ katvā pādāsi “rajoharaṇanti manasi karohī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2390_7: adāsīti attho. “Adāsī”ti “pādapuñchani”nti ca paṭhanti. Keci pana “pādapuñchani”nti
atk-s0508a2:2390_8: pādapuñchanacoḷakkhaṇḍaṃ pādāsī”ti vadanti. Tadayuttaṃ iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā coḷakkhaṇḍassa
atk-s0508a2:2390_9: dinnattā. Etaṃ suddhaṃ adhiṭṭhehi, ekamantaṃ svadhiṭṭhitanti, etaṃ suddhaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2390_10: “rajoharaṇaṃ, rajoharaṇa”nti manasikārena svadhiṭṭhitaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ekamante
atk-s0508a2:2390_11: vivitte gandhakuṭipamukhe nisinno adhiṭṭhehi tathā cittaṃ samāhitaṃ katvā pavattehi.
atk-s0508a2:2391_0: Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāti, tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ ovādaṃ ahaṃ sutvā tasmiṃ sāsane
atk-s0508a2:2391_1: ovāde rato abhirato hutvā vihāsiṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjiṃ. Paṭipajjanto ca samādhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2391_2: paṭipādesiṃ, uttamatthassa pattiyāti, uttamattho nāma arahattaṃ, tassa adhigamāya
atk-s0508a2:2391_3: kasiṇaparikammavasena rūpajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:2391_4: maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggasamādhiṃ sampādesinti attho. Ettha hi samādhīti upacārasamādhito
atk-s0508a2:2391_5: paṭṭhāya yāva catutthamaggasamādhi, tāva samādhisāmaññena gahito, aggaphalasamādhi
atk-s0508a2:2391_6: pana uttamatthaggahaṇena, sātisayaṃ cevāyaṃ samādhikusalo, tasmā “samādhiṃ paṭipādesi”nti
atk-s0508a2:2391_7: āha. Samādhikusalatāya hi ayamāyasmā cetovivaṭṭakusalo nāma jāto, mahāpanthakatthero
atk-s0508a2:2391_8: pana vipassanākusalatāya saññāvivaṭṭakusalo nāma. Eko cettha samādhilakkhaṇe cheko,
atk-s0508a2:2391_9: eko vipassanālakkhaṇe, eko samādhigāḷho, eko vipassanāgāḷho eko aṅgasaṃkhitte cheko,
atk-s0508a2:2391_10: eko ārammaṇasaṃkhitte, eko aṅgavavatthāne, eko ārammaṇavavatthāneti vaṇṇenti. Apica
atk-s0508a2:2391_11: cūḷapanthakatthero sātisayaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ lābhitāya cetovivaṭṭakusalo
atk-s0508a2:2391_12: vutto, mahāpanthakatthero sātisayaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ lābhitāya saññāvivaṭṭakusalo.
atk-s0508a2:2391_13: Paṭhamo vā rūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattoti cetovivaṭṭakusalo,
atk-s0508a2:2391_14: itaro arūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattoti saññāvivaṭṭakusalo.
atk-s0508a2:2391_15: Manomayaṃ pana kāyaṃ nibbattento aññe tayo vā cattāro vā nibbattanti, na bahuke,
atk-s0508a2:2391_16: ekasadiseyeva ca katvā nibbattenti, ekavidhameva kammaṃ kurumāne. Ayaṃ pana thero
atk-s0508a2:2391_17: ekāvajjanena samaṇasahassaṃ māpesi, dvepi na kāyena ekasadise akāsi, na ekavidhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2391_18: kammaṃ kurumāne. Tasmā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0508a2:2392_0: Idāni attano adhigatavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmī”tiādimāha. Kāmañcāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2392_1: thero chaḷabhiñño, yā pana abhiññā āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamassa bahūpakārā, taṃ dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2392_2: “pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmi, dibbacakkhu visodhita”nti vatvā “tisso vijjā anuppattā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2392_3: Pubbenivāsayathākammupagaanāgataṃsañāṇāni hi vipassanācārassa bahūpakārāni, na tathā itarañāṇāni.
atk-s0508a2:2393_0: Sahassakkhattunti sahassaṃ. “Sahassavāra”nti keci vadanti. Ekāvajjanena pana thero
atk-s0508a2:2393_1: sahasse manomaye kāye nimmini, na vārena. Te ca kho aññamaññamasadise vividhañca
atk-s0508a2:2393_2: kammaṃ karonte. “Kiṃ pana sāvakānampi evarūpaṃ iddhinimmānaṃ sambhavatī”ti? Na sambhavati
atk-s0508a2:2393_3: sabbesaṃ, abhinīhārasampattiyā pana ayameva thero evamakāsi, tathā hesa iminā aṅgena
atk-s0508a2:2393_4: etadagge ṭhapito. Panthako nisīdīti attānameva paraṃ viya vadati. Ambavaneti, ambavane
atk-s0508a2:2393_5: jīvakena katavihāre. Vehāsādupasaṅkaminti vehāsāti karaṇe nissakkavacanaṃ, vehāsenāti
atk-s0508a2:2393_6: attho, da-kāro padasandhikaro. Athāti, mama nisajjāya pacchā. Paṭiggahīti dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2393_7: paṭiggaṇhi. Āyāgo sabbalokassāti, sabbassa sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya
atk-s0508a2:2393_8: deyyadhammaṃ ānetvā yajitabbaṭṭhānabhūto. Āhutīnaṃ paṭiggahoti, mahāphalabhāvakaraṇena
atk-s0508a2:2393_9: dakkhiṇāhutīnaṃ paṭiggaṇhako. Paṭiggaṇhittha dakkhiṇanti jīvakena upanītaṃ yāgukhajjādibhedaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2394_0: Atha kho bhagavā katabhattakicco āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ āṇāpesi – “anumodanaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2394_1: So sineruṃ gahetvā mahāsamuddaṃ manthento viya pabhinnapaṭisambhidāppattatāya tepiṭakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2394_2: buddhavacanaṃ saṅkhobhento satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhanto anumodanaṃ akāsi. Tathā upanissayasampannopi
atk-s0508a2:2394_3: cāyamāyasmā tathārūpāya kammapilotikāya paribādhito catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ catūhipi
atk-s0508a2:2394_4: māsehi gahetuṃ nāsakkhi. Taṃ panassa upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā satthā pubbacariyānurūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2394_5: yonisomanasikāre niyojesi. Tathā hi bhagavā tadā jīvakassa nivesane nisinno eva “cūḷapanthakassa
atk-s0508a2:2394_6: cittaṃ samāhitaṃ, vīthipaṭipannā vipassanā”ti ñatvā yathānisinnova attānaṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0508a2:2394_7: “panthaka, yadipāyaṃ pilotikā saṃkiliṭṭhā rajānukiṇṇā, ito pana añño eva ariyassa
atk-s0508a2:2395: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0508a2:2396: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā bhikkhavo, viharanti te vītarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0508a2:2399: Imā tisso obhāsagāthā abhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne cūḷapanthako abhiññāpaṭisambhidāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0508a2:2402_0: Nānākulamalasampuṇṇotiādikā āyasmato kappattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:2402_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne
atk-s0508a2:2402_2: kule nibbattitvā pitu accayena viññutaṃ patto nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittehi vatthehi anekavidhehi
atk-s0508a2:2402_3: ābharaṇehi nānāvidhehi maṇiratanehi bahuvidhehi pupphadāmamālādīhi ca kapparukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2402_4: nāma alaṅkaritvā tena satthu thūpaṃ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:2402_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe maṇḍalikarājakule nibbattitvā pitu accayena rajje
atk-s0508a2:2402_6: patiṭṭhito kāmesu ativiya ratto giddho hutvā viharati. Taṃ satthā mahākaruṇāsamāpattito
atk-s0508a2:2402_7: vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento ñāṇajāle paññāyamānaṃ disvā, “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento,
atk-s0508a2:2402_8: “esa mama santike asubhakathaṃ sutvā kāmesu virattacitto hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2433_0: Imāhi gāthāhi tassa asubhakathaṃ kathesi. So satthu sammukhā anekākāravokāraṃ yāthāvato
atk-s0508a2:2433_1: sarīrasabhāvavibhāvanaṃ asubhakathaṃ sutvā sakena kāyena aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno
atk-s0508a2:2433_2: saṃviggahadayo satthāraṃ vanditvā, “labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja”nti
atk-s0508a2:2433_3: pabbajjaṃ yāci. Satthā samīpe ṭhitamaññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a2:2433_4: imaṃ pabbājetvā upasampādetvā ānehī”ti. So taṃ tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0508a2:2433_5: So khuraggeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:2439: Tamhā dussaṃ gahetvāna, nivāsema mayaṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:2442: “Ito ca sattame kappe, suceḷā aṭṭha khattiyā;
atk-s0508a2:2445: Arahattaṃ pana patvā laddhūpasampado satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno aññaṃ byākaronto tā eva gāthā abhāsi. Teneva tā theragāthā nāma jātā.
atk-s0508a2:2446_0: Tattha nānākulamalasampuṇṇoti, nānākulehi nānābhāgehi malehi sampuṇṇo, kesalomādinānāvidhaasucikoṭṭhāsabharitoti
atk-s0508a2:2446_1: attho. Mahāukkārasambhavoti, ukkāro vuccati vaccakūpaṃ. Yattakavayā mātā, tattakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2446_2: kālaṃ kārapariseditavaccakūpasadisatāya mātu kucchi idha “mahāukkāro”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0508a2:2446_3: So kucchi sambhavo uppattiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti mahāukkārasambhavo. Candanikaṃvāti candanikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2446_4: nāma ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ, yaṃ jaṇṇumattaṃ asucibharitampi
atk-s0508a2:2446_5: hoti, tādisanti attho. Paripakkanti, pariṇataṃ purāṇaṃ. Tena yathā caṇḍālagāmadvāre
atk-s0508a2:2446_8: upari pheṇapubbuḷakāni muñcantaṃ abhinīlavaṇṇaṃ paramaduggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ candanikāvāṭaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2446_9: neva upagantuṃ, na daṭṭhuṃ araharūpaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, tathārūpoyaṃ kāyoti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2446_11: ca mahanto gaṇḍo viyāti mahāgaṇḍo. Sabbatthakameva dukkhavedanānubaddhattā gaṇḍānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2446_12: sahanato asucivissandanato ca mahanto vaṇo viyāti mahāvaṇo gūthakūpena gāḷitoti,
atk-s0508a2:2446_13: vaccakūpena vacceneva vā bharito. “Gūthakūpanigāḷhito”tipi pāḷi, vaccakūpato nikkhantoti
atk-s0508a2:2446_14: attho. Āpopaggharaṇo kāyo, sadā sandati pūtikanti, ayaṃ kāyo āpodhātuyā sadā paggharaṇasīlo,
atk-s0508a2:2446_15: tañca kho pittasemhasedamuttādikaṃ pūtikaṃ asuciṃyeva sandati, na kadāci sucinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2447_0: Saṭṭhikaṇḍarasambandhoti, gīvāya uparimabhāgato paṭṭhāya sarīraṃ vinaddhamānā sarīrassa
atk-s0508a2:2447_1: purimapacchimadakkhiṇavāmapassesu paccekaṃ pañca pañca katvā vīsati, hatthapāde vinaddhamānā
atk-s0508a2:2447_2: tesaṃ purimapacchimapassesu pañca pañca katvā cattālīsāti saṭṭhiyā kaṇḍarehi mahānhārūhi
atk-s0508a2:2447_3: sabbaso baddho vinaddhoti saṭṭhikaṇḍarasambandho. Maṃsalepanalepitoti, maṃsasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a2:2447_4: lepanena litto, navamaṃsapesisatānulittoti attho. Cammakañcukasannaddhoti, cammasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a2:2447_5: kañcukena sabbaso onaddho pariyonaddho paricchinno. Pūtikāyoti, sabbaso pūtigandhiko
atk-s0508a2:2447_6: kāyo. Niratthakoti, nippayojano. Aññesañhi pāṇīnaṃ kāyo cammādiviniyogena siyā sappayojano,
atk-s0508a2:2447_7: na tathā manussakāyoti. Aṭṭhisaṅghātaghaṭitoti, atirekatisatānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ saṅghātena
atk-s0508a2:2447_8: ghaṭito sambandho. Nhārusuttanibandhanoti, suttasadisehi navahi nhārusatehi nibandhito.
atk-s0508a2:2448_0: Dhuvappayāto maraṇāyāti, maraṇassa atthāya ekantagamano, nibbattito paṭṭhāya maraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2448_1: pati pavatto. Tato eva maccurājassa maraṇassa santike ṭhito. Idheva chaḍḍayitvānāti,
atk-s0508a2:2448_2: imasmiṃyeva loke kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā, yathārucitaṭṭhānagāmī ayaṃ satto, tasmā “pahāya
atk-s0508a2:2448_3: gamanīyo ayaṃ kāyo”ti evampi saṅgo na kātabboti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2449_0: Avijjāya nivutoti, avijjānīvaraṇena nivuto paṭicchāditādīnavo, aññathā ko ettha saṅgaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2449_1: janeyyāti adhippāyo. Catuganthenāti, abhijjhākāyaganthādinā catubbidhena ganthena
atk-s0508a2:2449_2: ganthito, ganthaniyabhāvena vinaddhito. Oghasaṃsīdanoti, oghaniyabhāvena kāmoghādīsu
atk-s0508a2:2449_3: catūsu oghesu saṃsīdanako. Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sentīti anusayā, kāmarāgādayo
atk-s0508a2:2449_4: anusayā. Tesaṃ jālena otthato abhibhūtoti anusayājālamotthato. Makāro padasandhikaro,
atk-s0508a2:2449_5: gāthāsukhatthaṃ dīghaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Kāmacchandādinā pañcavidhena nīvaraṇena yutto
atk-s0508a2:2450_0: Kāmavitakkādinā micchāvitakkena samappito samassitoti vitakkena samappito. Taṇhāmūlenānugatoti,
atk-s0508a2:2450_1: taṇhāsaṅkhātena bhavamūlena anubaddho. Mohacchādanachāditoti, sammohasaṅkhātena āvaraṇena
atk-s0508a2:2450_2: paliguṇṭhito. Sabbametaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ karajakāyaṃ sandhāya vadati. Saviññāṇako hi
atk-s0508a2:2450_3: attabhāvo “ucchinnabhavanettiko, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa kāyo tiṭṭhati, ayañceva
atk-s0508a2:2450_4: kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu kāyoti vuccati, evāyaṃ vattate kāyoti evaṃ “nānākulamalasampuṇṇo”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:2450_5: “avijjāya nivuto”tiādinā ca vuttappakārena ayaṃ kāyo vattati, vattanto ca kammayantena
atk-s0508a2:2450_6: sukatadukkaṭena kammasaṅkhātena yantena yantito saṅghaṭito. Yathā vā khemantaṃ gantuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2450_7: na sakkoti, tathā saṅkhobhito sugatiduggatīsu vattati paribbhamati. Sampatti ca vipatyantāti
atk-s0508a2:2450_8: yā ettha sampatti, sā vipattipariyosānā. Sabbañhi yobbanaṃ jarāpariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2450_9: ārogyaṃ byādhipariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇapariyosānaṃ, sabbo samāgamo viyogapariyosāno.
atk-s0508a2:2450_10: Tenāha “nānābhāvo vipajjatī”ti. Nānābhāvoti, vinābhāvo vippayogo, so kadāci vippayuñjakassa
atk-s0508a2:2450_11: vasena, kadāci vippayuñjitabbassa vasenāti vividhaṃ pajjati pāpuṇīyati.
atk-s0508a2:2451_0: Yemaṃ kāyaṃ mamāyantīti ye andhabālā puthujjanā evaṃ asubhaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2451_1: asāraṃ imaṃ kāyaṃ “mama ida”nti gaṇhantā mamāyanti chandarāgaṃ uppādenti, te jātiādīhi
atk-s0508a2:2451_2: nirayādīhi ca ghoraṃ bhayānakaṃ apaṇḍitehi abhiramitabbato kaṭasisaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2452_0: Yemaṃ kāyaṃ vivajjenti, gūthalittaṃva pannaganti yathā nāma puriso sukhakāmo jīvitukāmo
atk-s0508a2:2452_1: gūthagataṃ āsīvisaṃ disvā jigucchaniyatāya vā sappaṭibhayatāya vā vivajjeti na allīyati,
atk-s0508a2:2452_2: evamevaṃ ye paṇḍitā kulaputtā asucibhāvena jegucchaṃ aniccādibhāvena sappaṭibhayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2452_3: imaṃ kāyaṃ vivajjenti chandarāgappahānena pajahanti. Te bhavamūlaṃ avijjaṃ bhavataṇhañca
atk-s0508a2:2452_4: vamitvā chaḍḍetvā accantameva pahāya tato eva sabbaso anāsavā saupādisesāya anupādisesāya
atk-s0508a2:2455_0: Vivittaṃ appanigghosantiādikā āyasmato upasenattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0508a2:2455_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto satthu
atk-s0508a2:2455_2: santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇamāno satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:2455_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2455_4: katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nālakagāme rūpasārībrāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0508a2:2455_5: kucchimhi nibbatti, upasenotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā satthu
atk-s0508a2:2455_6: santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadāya ekavassiko “ariyagabbhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2455_7: vaḍḍhemī”ti ekaṃ kulaputtaṃ attano santike upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2455_8: gato. Satthārā cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ sutvā, “atilahuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2455_9: kho tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bāhullāya āvatto”ti garahito. “Idānāhaṃ yadipi parisaṃ nissāya
atk-s0508a2:2455_10: satthārā garahito, parisaṃyeva pana nissāya satthu pāsaṃsopi bhavissāmī”ti vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:2455_11: kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:2461: Buddhena navame tattha, samaṇe aṭṭha bhojayiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2469: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2475: Dhāremi antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2477_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā sayampi sabbe dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati, aññepi tadatthāya
atk-s0508a2:2477_1: samādapeti, tena naṃ bhagavā samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So aparena samayena
atk-s0508a2:2477_2: kosambiyaṃ kalahe uppanne bhikkhusaṅghe ca dvidhābhūte ekena bhikkhunā taṃ kalahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2477_3: parivajjitukāmena “etarahi kho kalaho uppanno, saṅgho dvidhābhūto, kathaṃ nu kho
atk-s0508a2:2477_4: mayā paṭipajjitabba”nti puṭṭho vivekavāsato paṭṭhāya tassa paṭipattiṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:2483: Tato saṅghāṭikaṃ katvā, lūkhaṃ dhāreyya cīvaraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2488: “Lūkhenapi vā santusse, nāññaṃ patthe rasaṃ bahuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2489: Rasesu anugiddhassa, jhāne na ramatī mano.
atk-s0508a2:2494: “Yathā jaḷo va mūgo va, attānaṃ dassaye tathā;
atk-s0508a2:2503: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṃ, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0508a2:2508_0: Tattha vivittanti, janavivittaṃ suññaṃ araññādiṃ. Appanigghosanti, nissaddaṃ saddasaṅghaṭṭanarahitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2508_1: Vāḷamiganisevitanti, sīhabyagghadīpivāḷamigehi caritaṃ. Imināpi janavivekaṃyeva dasseti
atk-s0508a2:2508_2: pantasenāsanabhāvadīpanato. Senāsananti, sayituṃ āsayituñca yuttabhāvena vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2508_3: idha senāsananti adhippetaṃ. Paṭisallānakāraṇāti, paṭisallānanimittaṃ, nānārammaṇato
atk-s0508a2:2508_4: nivattetvā kammaṭṭhāneyeva cittassa paṭi paṭi sammadeva allīyanatthaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2509_0: Evaṃ bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ niddisanto senāsane santosaṃ dassetvā idāni cīvarādīsupi
atk-s0508a2:2509_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “saṃkārapuñjā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saṃkārapuñjāti saṃkārānaṃ puñjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2509_2: saṃkārapuñjaṃ, tato kacavaraṭṭhānā. Āhatvāti āharitvā. Tatoti tathā āhaṭacoḷakkhaṇḍehi.
atk-s0508a2:2509_3: Karaṇe hi idaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ lūkhanti satthalūkharajanalūkhādinā lūkhaṃ avaṇṇāmaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2509_4: Dhāreyyāti nivāsanādivasena parihareyya, etena cīvarasantosaṃ vadati.
atk-s0508a2:2510_0: Nīca manaṃ karitvānāti “antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikāna”ntiādikaṃ sugatovādaṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0508a2:2510_1: nihatamānadappaṃ cittaṃ katvā. Sapadānanti gharesu avakhaṇḍarahitaṃ; anugharanti
atk-s0508a2:2510_2: attho. Tenāha “kulā kula”nti. Kulā kulanti kulato kulaṃ, kulānupubbiyā gharapaṭipāṭiyāti
atk-s0508a2:2510_3: attho. Piṇḍikāyāti missakabhikkhāya, iminā piṇḍapātasantosaṃ vadati. Guttadvāroti
atk-s0508a2:2510_4: supihitacakkhādidvāro. Susaṃvutoti hatthakukkuccādīnaṃ abhāvena suṭṭhu saṃvuto.
atk-s0508a2:2511_0: Lūkhenapi vāti apisaddo samuccaye, vā-saddo vikappe. Ubhayenapi lūkhenapi appenapi
atk-s0508a2:2511_1: yena kenaci sulabhena itarītarena santusse samaṃ sammā tusseyya. Tenāha “nāññaṃ patthe
atk-s0508a2:2511_2: rasaṃ bahu”nti. Nāññaṃ patthe rasaṃ bahunti attanā yathāladdhato aññaṃ madhurādirasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2511_3: bahuṃ paṇītañca na pattheyya na piheyya, iminā gilānapaccayepi santoso dassito hoti.
atk-s0508a2:2511_4: Rasesu gedhavāraṇatthaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ vadanto rasesu anugiddhassa, jhāne na ramatī
atk-s0508a2:2511_5: mano”ti āha. Indriyasaṃvarampi aparipūrentassa kuto vikkhittacittasamādhānanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2512_0: Evaṃ catūsu paccayesu sallekhapaṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni avasiṭṭhakathāvatthūni dassetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2512_1: “appiccho cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha appicchoti, aniccho catūsu paccayesu icchārahito,
atk-s0508a2:2512_2: tena catubbidhapaccayesu taṇhuppādavikkhambhanamāha. Santuṭṭhoti, catūsu paccayesu
atk-s0508a2:2515_0: Pavivittoti gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya kāyena pavivitto vūpakaṭṭho. Cittavivekādike hi
atk-s0508a2:2515_1: parato vakkhati. Vaseti sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Moneyyadhammasamannāgamena muni. Asaṃsaṭṭhoti
atk-s0508a2:2515_3: Ubhayanti, gahaṭṭhehi anāgārehi cāti ubhayehipi asaṃsaṭṭho. Karaṇe hi idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2516_0: Attānaṃ dassaye tathāti ajaḷo amūgopi samāno yathā jaḷo vā mūgo vā, tathā attānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2516_1: dasseyya, etena pāgabbiyappahānamāha. Jaḷo va mūgo vāti ca gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2516_2: kataṃ, samuccayattho ca vāsaddo. Nātivelaṃ sambhāseyyāti ativelaṃ atikkantapamāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2516_3: na bhāseyya, mattabhāṇī assāti attho. Saṅghamajjhamhīti bhikkhusaṅghe, janasamūhe vā.
atk-s0508a2:2517_0: Na so upavade kañcīti so yathāvuttapaṭipattiko bhikkhu hīnaṃ vā majjhimaṃ vā ukkaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2517_1: vā yaṃkiñci na vācāya upavadeyya. Upaghātaṃ vivajjayeti kāyena upaghātaṃ pariviheṭhanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2517_2: vajjeyya. Saṃvuto pātimokkhasminti pātimokkhamhi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle saṃvuto assa,
atk-s0508a2:2517_3: pātimokkhasaṃvarena pihitakāyavāco siyāti attho. Mattaññū cassa bhojaneti pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogavissajjanesu
atk-s0508a2:2518_0: Suggahītanimittassāti “evaṃ me manasi karoto cittaṃ samāhitaṃ ahosī”ti tadākāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2518_1: sallakkhento suṭṭhu gahitasamādhinimitto assa. “Suggahītanimitto so”tipi pāṭho, so
atk-s0508a2:2518_2: yogīti attho. Cittassuppādakovidoti evaṃ bhāvayato cittaṃ līnaṃ hoti, “evaṃ uddhata”nti
atk-s0508a2:2518_3: līnassa uddhatassa ca cittassa uppattikāraṇe kusalo assa. Līne hi citte dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgā
atk-s0508a2:2518_4: bhāvetabbā, uddhate passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgā. Satisambojjhaṅgo pana sabbattha
atk-s0508a2:2518_5: icchitabbo. Tenāha bhagavā – “yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:2518_6: kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”tiādi. Samathaṃ anuyuñjeyyāti
atk-s0508a2:2518_7: samathabhāvanaṃ bhāveyya, anuppannaṃ samādhiṃ uppādeyya, uppannañca yāva vasībhāvappatti,
atk-s0508a2:2518_8: tāva vaḍḍheyya byūheyyāti attho. Kālena ca vipassananti yathāladdhaṃ samādhiṃ nikantiyā
atk-s0508a2:2518_9: apariyādānena hānabhāgiyaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ vā akatvā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃva katvā kālena
atk-s0508a2:2518_10: vipassanañca anuyuñjeyya. Atha vā kālena ca vipassananti samathaṃ anuyuñjanto tassa
atk-s0508a2:2518_11: thirībhūtakāle saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā ariyamaggādhigamāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjeyya. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a2:2521_0: Tena vuttaṃ – “vīriyasātaccasampanno”tiādi. Satatabhāvo sātaccaṃ, vīriyassa sātaccaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2521_1: tena sampanno samannāgato, satatapavattavīriyo, niccapaggahitavīriyoti attho. Yuttayogo
atk-s0508a2:2521_2: sadā siyāti sabbakālaṃ bhāvanānuyutto siyā. Dukkhantanti vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2521_3: nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appatvā vissāsaṃ na eyya na gaccheyya. “Ahaṃ parisuddhasīlo jhānalābhī
atk-s0508a2:2521_4: abhiññālābhī vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito”ti vā vissaṭṭho na bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2522_0: Evaṃ viharamānassāti, evaṃ vivittasenāsanasevanādinā vipassanāvasena yuttayogatāpariyosānena
atk-s0508a2:2522_1: vidhinā viharantassa. Suddhikāmassāti, ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ accantavisuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2522_2: arahattañca icchantassa. Saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhato bhikkhuno, kāmāsavādayo sabbe āsavā
atk-s0508a2:2522_3: khīyanti khayaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃ khayagamaneneva saupādisesaanupādisesapabhedaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2523: Evaṃ thero tassa bhikkhuno ovādadānāpadesena attanā tathāpaṭipannabhāvaṃ dīpento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2526_0: Vijāneyya sakaṃ atthantiādikā āyasmato aparassa gotamattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a2:2526_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā
atk-s0508a2:2526_2: amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva sāvatthiyaṃ udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:2526_3: vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā, vādamaggaṃ uggahetvā attano vādassa upari
atk-s0508a2:2526_4: uttariṃ vadantaṃ alabhanto tehi tehi viggāhikakathaṃ anuyutto vicarati. Atha amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2526_5: bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena yasādike veneyye vinetvā
atk-s0508a2:2526_6: anāthapiṇḍikassa abhiyācanāya sāvatthiṃ upagacchi. Tadā satthu jetavanapaṭiggahe
atk-s0508a2:2526_7: paṭiladdhasaddho satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Satthā aññataraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2526_8: piṇḍacārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi – “bhikkhu, imaṃ pabbājehī”ti. So tena pabbājiyamāno
atk-s0508a2:2526_9: khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā kosalajanapadaṃ gantvā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā puna
atk-s0508a2:2526_10: sāvatthiṃ paccāgami. Taṃ bahū ñātakā brāhmaṇamahāsālā upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsitvā
atk-s0508a2:2526_11: nisinnā “imasmiṃ loke bahū samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṃsāre suddhivādā, tesu katamesaṃ nu kho
atk-s0508a2:2526_12: vādo niyyāniko, kathaṃ paṭipajjanto saṃsārato sujjhatī”ti pucchiṃsu. Thero tesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2531: “Mittaṃ idha ca kalyāṇaṃ, sikkhā vipulaṃ samādānaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2532: Sussūsā ca garūnaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2535: Saṅghe ca cittīkāro, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2538: Cittassa ca saṇṭhapanaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2541: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2550: Lokamhi ca anabhiratiṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2558_0: Tattha vijāneyya sakaṃ atthanti, viññūjātiko puriso attano atthaṃ yāthāvato vicāretvā
atk-s0508a2:2558_1: jāneyya. Vicārento ca avalokeyyātha pāvacanaṃ idha loke puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇehi sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0508a2:2558_2: ca pavuttaṃ pāvacanaṃ, samayo. Tattha yaṃ niyyānikaṃ, taṃ olokeyya paññācakkhunā
atk-s0508a2:2558_3: passeyya. Ime hi nānātitthiyā samaṇabrāhmaṇā anicce “nicca”nti, anattani “attā”ti,
atk-s0508a2:2558_5: nesaṃ vādo aniyyāniko. Sammāsambuddho pana “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā,
atk-s0508a2:2558_6: santaṃ nibbāna”nti sayambhūñāṇena yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāya pavedeti, tasmā “tassa vādo
atk-s0508a2:2558_7: niyyāniko”ti satthu sāsanamahantataṃ olokeyyāti attho. Yañcettha assa patirūpaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2558_8: sāmaññaṃ ajjhūpagatassāti, sāmaññaṃ samaṇabhāvaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagatassa kulaputtassa
atk-s0508a2:2558_9: yaṃ ettha sāsane pabbajitabhāve vā patirūpaṃ yuttarūpaṃ sāruppaṃ assa siyā, tampi apalokeyya.
atk-s0508a2:2559_0: Kiṃ pana tanti āha “mittaṃ idha ca kalyāṇa”ntiādi. Imasmiṃ sāsane kalyāṇamittaṃ seviyamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2559_1: samaṇassa patirūpanti yojanā. Esa nayo itaresupi. Kalyāṇamittañhi nissāya akusalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2559_2: pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, suddhamattānaṃ pariharati. Sikkhā vipulaṃ samādānanti
atk-s0508a2:2559_3: vipulaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ, mahatiyā nibbānāvahāya adhisīlādisikkhāya anuṭṭhānanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2559_4: Sussūsā ca garūnanti garūnaṃ ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ kalyāṇamittānaṃ ovādassa sotukamyatā
atk-s0508a2:2560_0: Buddhesu sagāravatāti sabbaññubuddhesu “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti gāravayogo garucittīkāro.
atk-s0508a2:2560_1: Dhamme apaciti yathābhūtanti ariyadhamme yāthāvato apacāyanaṃ ādarena abhipūjanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2560_2: Saṅgheti ariyasaṅghe. Cittīkāroti sakkāro sammānanaṃ. Etanti ratanattayagarukaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2561_0: Ācāragocare yuttoti kāyikavācasikavītikkamanasaṅkhātaṃ anācāraṃ, piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya
atk-s0508a2:2561_2: ācārena piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānabhūtena gocarena ca yutto
atk-s0508a2:2561_3: sampanno, sampannaācāragocaroti attho. Ājīvo sodhitoti veḷudānādiṃ buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2561_4: anesanaṃ pahāya anavajjuppāde paccaye sevantassa ājīvo sodhito hoti suvisuddho, sodhitattā
atk-s0508a2:2561_5: eva agārayho viññūhi. Cittassa ca saṇṭhapananti yathā cakkhādidvārehi rūpādiārammaṇesu
atk-s0508a2:2561_6: abhijjhādayo nappavattanti, evaṃ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattādivasena cittassa sammā ṭhapanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2561_7: Etanti ācāragocarasampatti ājīvapārisuddhi indriyesu guttadvāratāti etaṃ tayaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2562_0: Cārittanti caritvā paripūretabbasīlaṃ. Vārittanti viratiyā akaraṇena paripūretabbasīlaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2562_1: Iriyāpathiyaṃ pasādaniyanti paresaṃ pasādāvahaṃ ākappasampattinimittaṃ iriyāpathanissitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2562_2: sampajaññaṃ. Adhicitte ca āyogoti samathavipassanāsu anuyogo bhāvanā.
atk-s0508a2:2564_0: Sīlanti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Heṭṭhā hi bhinditvā vuttaṃ, idha abhinditvā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:2564_1: Bāhusaccanti bahussutabhāvo. So hi bhāvanānuyogassa bahukāro, bojjhaṅgakosallaanuttarasītibhāvaadhicittayuttatādīsu
atk-s0508a2:2564_2: sammā pavicayabahulassa samathavipassanānuyogo sampajjati. Dhammānaṃ pavicayo yathābhūtanti
atk-s0508a2:2564_3: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aviparītasalakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca parivīmaṃsā. Iminā adhipaññādhammavipassanamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2564_4: Saccānaṃ abhisamayoti dukkhādīnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena paṭivedho.
atk-s0508a2:2565_0: Svāyaṃ saccābhisamayo yathā hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “bhāveyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bhāveyya
atk-s0508a2:2565_1: ca aniccanti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā avibhāgato “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a2:2565_2: vibhāgato vā sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccasaññaṃ bhāveyya uppādeyya ceva vaḍḍheyya cāti
atk-s0508a2:2565_3: attho. Anattasaññanti, “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti pavattaṃ anattasaññañca bhāveyyāti
atk-s0508a2:2565_4: yojanā. Evaṃ sesesupi. Asubhasaññanti, karajakāye sabbasmimpi vā tebhūmakasaṅkhāre
atk-s0508a2:2565_5: kilesāsucipaggharaṇato “asubhā”ti pavattasaññaṃ. Dukkhasaññāparivārā hi ayaṃ, eteneva
atk-s0508a2:2565_6: cettha dukkhasaññāpi gahitāti veditabbaṃ. Lokamhi ca anabhiratinti sabbaloke tebhūmakesu
atk-s0508a2:2565_7: saṅkhāresu anābhiratisaññaṃ. Etena ādīnavānupassanaṃ nibbidānupassanañca vadati.
atk-s0508a2:2566_0: Evaṃ pana vipassanābhāvanaṃ anuyutto taṃ ussukkāpento ime dhamme vaḍḍheyyāti dassento
atk-s0508a2:2566_1: “bhāveyya ca bojjhaṅge”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – bodhiyā satiādisattavidhadhammasāmaggiyā,
atk-s0508a2:2566_2: bodhissa vā taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā, satiādayo dhammā. Te satiādike
atk-s0508a2:2566_3: sattabojjhaṅge, chandaādīni cattāri iddhipādāni, saddhādīni pañcindriyāni, saddhādīniyeva
atk-s0508a2:2566_4: pañca balāni, sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgaariyamaggañca. Ca-saddena satipaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0508a2:2566_5: sammappadhānāni ca gahitānīti sabbepi sattatiṃsappabhede bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāveyya
atk-s0508a2:2566_6: uppādeyya ceva vaḍḍheyya ca. Tattha yadetesaṃ paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe uppādanaṃ, uparimaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0508a2:2566_7: ca vaḍḍhanaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa bhikkhuno sāruppanti.
atk-s0508a2:2567_0: Evaṃ bodhipakkhiyasattatiṃsadhamme bhāvento yathā maggasaccaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena
atk-s0508a2:2567_1: abhisameti, evaṃ samudayasaccaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena, nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
atk-s0508a2:2567_2: abhisametīti dassento “taṇhaṃ pajaheyyā”ti osānagāthamāha. Tattha taṇhaṃ pajaheyyāti,
atk-s0508a2:2567_3: kāmataṇhādipabhedaṃ sabbaṃ taṇhaṃ ariyamaggena anavasesato samucchindeyya, monaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2567_4: vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena samannāgatattā muni. Samūlake āsave padāleyyāti kāmarāgānusayādisamūlake
atk-s0508a2:2567_5: kāmāsavādike sabbepi āsave bhindeyya samucchindeyya. Vihareyya vippamuttoti evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2567_6: sabbaso kilesānaṃ pahīnattā sabbadhi vimutto sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggaṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2567_7: sacchikatvā vihareyya. Etanti yadetaṃ viharaṇaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa samitapāpassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0508a2:2568_0: Evaṃ thero samaṇasāruppapaṭipattikittanamukhena sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ tabbilomato
atk-s0508a2:2568_1: bāhirakasamayassa aniyyānikatañca vibhāvesi. Taṃ sutvā te brāhmaṇamahāsālā sāsane
atk-s0508a2:2573_0: Ekādasanipāte kiṃ tavattho vane tātātiādikā āyasmato saṃkiccattherassa gāthā. Kā
atk-s0508a2:2573_1: uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2573_2: kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2573_3: gaṇhi. Tasmiṃ kucchigateyeva mātā byādhitā hutvā kālamakāsi. Tassā susānaṃ netvā
atk-s0508a2:2573_4: jhāpiyamānāya gabbhāsayo na jhāyi. Manussā sūlehi kucchiṃ vijjhantā dārakassa akkhikoṭiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2573_5: pahariṃsu. Te taṃ vijjhitvā aṅgārehi paṭicchādetvā pakkamiṃsu. Kucchipadesopi jhāyi,
atk-s0508a2:2573_6: aṅgāramatthake pana suvaṇṇabimbasadiso dārako padumagabbhe nipanno viya ahosi. Pacchimabhavikasattassa
atk-s0508a2:2573_7: hi sinerunā otthariyamānassapi arahattaṃ appatvā jīvitakkhayo nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a2:2574_0: Punadivase āḷāhanaṭṭhānaṃ gatā manussā tathānipannaṃ dārakaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā
atk-s0508a2:2574_1: dārakaṃ ādāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā nemittake pucchiṃsu. Nemittakā “sace ayaṃ dārako agāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2574_2: ajjhāvasissati, yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā duggatā bhavissanti. Sace pabbajissati,
atk-s0508a2:2574_3: pañcahi samaṇasatehi parivuto vicarissatī”ti āhaṃsu. Ñātakā “hotu, vaḍḍhitakāle amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2574_4: ayyassa sāriputtattherassa santike taṃ pabbājessāmā”ti vatvā saṅkunā chinnakkhikoṭitāya
atk-s0508a2:2574_5: saṃkiccoti vadantā aparabhāge saṃkiccoti vohariṃsu. So sattavassikakāle attano gabbhagatasseva
atk-s0508a2:2574_6: mātu maraṇaṃ, gabbhe ca attano pavattiṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto “pabbajissāmī”ti āha. Ñātakā
atk-s0508a2:2574_7: “sādhu, tātā”ti dhammasenāpatissa santikaṃ netvā, “bhante, imaṃ pabbājethā”ti adaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2574_8: Thero taṃ tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi. So khuraggeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0508a2:2574_9: arahattaṃ patvā tiṃsamattehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ araññe viharanto ce corahatthato mocetvā
atk-s0508a2:2574_10: sayampi te core dametvā pabbājetvā aññatarasmiṃ vihāre bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ viharanto
atk-s0508a2:2574_11: te vivādapasute disvā “aññattha gacchāmī”ti bhikkhū āpucchi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0508a2:2574_12: vitthāro pana dhammapadavatthumhi āgatanayeneva veditabbo. Atha naṃ aññataro upāsako
atk-s0508a2:2577: Verambhā ramaṇīyā te, paviveko hi jhāyina”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:2586: “Yañca aññe na rakkhanti, yo ca aññe na rakkhati;
atk-s0508a2:2587: Sa ve bhikkhu sukhaṃ seti, kāmesu anapekkhavā.
atk-s0508a2:2608: Kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, sampajāno patissato”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2609_0: Tattha kiṃ tavattho vaneti kinti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. Vane ko tavattho, kiṃ payojananti
atk-s0508a2:2609_1: attho. Tātāti daharasāmaṇeratāya naṃ attano puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā ālapati. Ujjuhānova
atk-s0508a2:2609_2: pāvuseti ujjuhāno kira nāma eko pabbato, so pana gahanasañchanno bahusoṇḍikandaro,
atk-s0508a2:2609_3: tahaṃ tahaṃ sandamānasalilo, vassakāle asappāyo, tasmā ujjuhāno vā pabbato etarahi
atk-s0508a2:2609_4: pāvusakāle tava kimatthiyoti attho. Keci panettha “ujjuhāno nāma eko sakuṇo sītaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2609_5: na sahati, vassakāle vanagumbe nilīno acchatī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ matena ujjuhānassa
atk-s0508a2:2609_6: viya sakuṇassa pāvusakāle ko tava attho vaneti? Verambhā ramaṇīyā teti verambhavātā
atk-s0508a2:2609_7: vāyantā kiṃ te ramaṇīyāti yojanā. Keci “verambhā nāma ekā pabbataguhā, pabbhāro”ti
atk-s0508a2:2609_8: ca vadanti. Tañca ṭhānaṃ gamanāgamanayuttaṃ janasambādharahitaṃ chāyūdakasampannañca,
atk-s0508a2:2609_9: tasmā verambhā ramaṇīyā, vane vasituṃ yuttarūpā. Kasmā? Paviveko hi jhāyinaṃ yasmā
atk-s0508a2:2609_10: tādisānaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yattha katthaci pavivekoyeva icchitabbo, tasmā “dūraṃ araññaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2609_11: agantvā verambhāyaṃ vasa, tātā”ti vadati. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yasmā jhāyīnaṃ pavivekakkhame
atk-s0508a2:2609_12: nivāsaphāsuke senāsane laddheyeva jhānādayo sampajjanti, na aladdhe, tasmā na evarūpe
atk-s0508a2:2609_13: sītakāle yattha katthaci vane vasituṃ sakkā, guhāpabbhārādīsu pana sakkāti.
atk-s0508a2:2610_0: Evaṃ upāsakena vutte thero vanādayo eva maṃ ramentīti dassento “yathā abbhānī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:2610_1: Tassattho – yathā pāvuse kāle abbhāni valāhakāni verambhavāto nudati khipati nīharati,
atk-s0508a2:2610_2: evameva me cittaṃ vivekapaṭisaññutā saññā abhikiranti vivekaṭṭhānaṃyeva ākaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0508a2:2611_0: Kiñca? Apaṇḍaro kāḷavaṇṇo, aṇḍasambhavo aṇḍajo kāko, sīvathikāya susānaṭṭhāne, niketacāriko
atk-s0508a2:2611_1: tameva nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vicaraṇako uppādayateva me satiṃ, sandehasmiṃ virāganissitanti,
atk-s0508a2:2611_2: kāyasmiṃ virāgūpasaṃhitaṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ mayhaṃ uppādayatiyeva. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2611_3: kira thero kākena khajjamānaṃ manussakuṇapaṃ passitvā asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhi, taṃ
atk-s0508a2:2611_4: sandhāya evamāha. Tena kāye sabbaso chandarāgassa natthitāya vaneyeva vasitukāmomhīti
atk-s0508a2:2611_5: dasseti. Yañcāti ca-saddo samuccayattho, tena aññampi mama araññavāsakāraṇaṃ suṇāhīti
atk-s0508a2:2611_6: dasseti. Yaṃ pabbajitaṃ mettāvihāritāya alobhaniyaparikkhāratāya ca rakkhitabbassa
atk-s0508a2:2611_7: abhāvato aññe sevakādayo na rakkhanti. Yo ca pabbajito aññe kenaci kiñcanapalibodhabhūte
atk-s0508a2:2611_8: na rakkhati tādisānaṃyeva abhāvato. Sa ve bhikkhu sukhaṃ setīti, so bhikkhu samucchinnakilesakāmatāya
atk-s0508a2:2611_9: sabbaso vatthukāmesu anapekkhavā apekkhārahito yattha katthaci sukhaṃ seti. Tassa
atk-s0508a2:2612_0: Idāni pabbatavanādīnaṃ ramaṇīyataṃ vasitapubbatañca dassetuṃ “acchodikā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2612_1: Tattha vasitaṃ meti, vuṭṭhapubbaṃ mayā. Vāḷamiganiseviteti, sīhabyagghādīhi vāḷamigehi upasevite vane.
atk-s0508a2:2613_0: Saṅkappaṃ nābhijānāmīti, ime ye keci pāṇino sattā ususattiādīhi paharaṇehi haññantu
atk-s0508a2:2613_1: māriyantu muṭṭhippahārādīhi vajjhantu bādhīyantu, aññena vā yena kenaci ākārena dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2613_2: pappontu pāpuṇantūti; evaṃ dosasaṃhitaṃ paṭighasaṃyuttaṃ tato eva anariyaṃ byāpādavihiṃsādippabhedaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2613_3: pāpasaṅkappaṃ uppāditaṃ nābhijānāmi, micchāvitakko na uppannapubboti mettāvihāritaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2614: Idāni “pariciṇṇo”tiādinā attano katakiccataṃ dasseti. Tattha pariciṇṇoti upāsito ovādānusāsanīkaraṇavasena. Ohitoti orohito. Garuko bhāroti garutaro khandhabhāro.
atk-s0508a2:2615_0: Nābhinandāmi maraṇanti “kathaṃ nu kho me maraṇaṃ siyā”ti maraṇaṃ na icchāmi. Nābhinandāmi
atk-s0508a2:2615_1: jīvitanti “kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ ciraṃ jīveyya”nti jīvitampi na icchāmi. Etena maraṇe
atk-s0508a2:2615_2: jīvite ca samānacittataṃ dasseti. Kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmīti parinibbānakālaṃva āgamemi.
atk-s0508a2:2615_3: Nibbisanti nibbisanto, bhatiyā kammaṃ karonto. Bhatako yathāti yathā bhatako parassa
atk-s0508a2:2615_4: kammaṃ karonto kammasiddhiṃ anabhinandantopi kammaṃ karontova divasakkhayaṃ udikkhati,
atk-s0508a2:2615_5: evaṃ ahampi jīvitaṃ anabhinandantopi attabhāvassa yāpanena maraṇaṃ anabhinandantopi
atk-s0508a2:2620_0: Dvādasakanipāte sīlamevātiādikā āyasmato sīlavattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:2620_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā
atk-s0508a2:2620_2: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe bimbisārarañño putto hutvā nibbatti, sīlavātissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2620_3: ahosi. Taṃ vayappattaṃ rājā ajātasattu māretukāmo caṇḍaṃ mattahatthiṃ āropetvā nānāvidhehi
atk-s0508a2:2620_4: upāyehi upakkamantopi māretuṃ nāsakkhi pacchimabhavikassa arahattaṃ appatvā antarā
atk-s0508a2:2620_5: jīvitantarāyābhāvato. Tassa pavattiṃ disvā bhagavā mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āṇāpesi
atk-s0508a2:2620_6: – “sīlavakumāraṃ ānehī”ti. Thero iddhibalena saddhiṃ hatthinā taṃ ānesi. Kumāro hatthito
atk-s0508a2:2620_7: oruyha bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2620_8: desesi. So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a2:2620_9: arahattaṃ patvā kosalaraṭṭhe vasati. Atha naṃ ajātasattu “mārethā”ti purise āṇāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:2620_10: Te therassa santikaṃ gantvā ṭhitā therena kathitaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvegā
atk-s0508a2:2632: Vaṇṇaṃ kittiṃ pasaṃsañca, sadā labhati sīlavā.
atk-s0508a2:2644: Sīlaṃ vilepanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, yena vāti disodisaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2647: Sīlaṃ seṭṭho ativāho, yena yāti disodisaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2652: “Idheva kittiṃ labhati, pecca sagge ca summano;
atk-s0508a2:2658_0: Tattha sīlamevidha sikkhetha, asmiṃ loketi idhāti, nipātamattaṃ, imasmiṃ sattaloke
atk-s0508a2:2658_1: atthakāmo kulaputto cārittavārittādibhedaṃ ādito sīlameva sikkheyya, sikkhanto ca
atk-s0508a2:2658_2: naṃ susikkhitaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena suṭṭhu sikkhitaṃ suparisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇañca
atk-s0508a2:2658_3: katvā sikkheyya. Asmiṃ loketi vā imasmiṃ saṅkhāraloke sikkhitabbadhammesu sīlaṃ ādito
atk-s0508a2:2658_4: sikkheyya. Diṭṭhisampattiyāpi sīlassa patiṭṭhābhāvato āha “sīlaṃ hī”tiādi. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:2658_5: hīti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā sīlaṃ sevitaṃ paricitaṃ rakkhitaṃ manussasampatti, dibbasampatti,
atk-s0508a2:2658_6: nibbānasampattīti etaṃ sabbasampattiṃ taṃsamaṅgino sattassa upanāmeti āvahati.
atk-s0508a2:2659_0: Sīlaṃ sabbasampattiṃ upanāmetīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “sīlaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2659_1: rakkheyyā”tiādimāha. Tattha rakkheyyāti gopeyya. Pāṇātipātādito hi viramanto vattapaṭivattañca
atk-s0508a2:2659_2: pūrento paṭipakkhābhibhavanato taṃ rakkhati nāma. Medhāvīti paññavā, idaṃ tassa rakkhanupāyadassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2659_3: ñāṇabalena hissa samādānaṃ avikopanañca hoti. Patthayānoti icchanto. Tayo sukheti
atk-s0508a2:2659_4: tīṇi sukhāni. Sukhanimittaṃ vā “sukha”nti adhippetaṃ. Pasaṃsanti kittiṃ, viññūhi
atk-s0508a2:2659_5: vā pasaṃsanaṃ. Vittilābhanti tuṭṭhilābhaṃ. “Vittalābha”nti ca paṭhanti, dhanalābhanti
atk-s0508a2:2659_6: attho. Sīlavā hi appamattatāya mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati. Peccāti kālaṅkatvā.
atk-s0508a2:2659_7: Sagge pamodananti devaloke iṭṭhehi kāmaguṇehi, modanañca patthayamānoti sambandho.
atk-s0508a2:2659_8: Idhaloke pasaṃsaṃ vittilābhaṃ paraloke dibbasampattiyā modanañca icchanto sīlaṃ rakkheyyāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2660_0: Saññamenāti kāyādīnaṃ saṃyamena. Saṃyato hi kāyaduccaritādīhi kañci aviheṭhento abhayadānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2660_1: dadanto piyamanāpatāya mittāni ganthati. Dhaṃsateti apeti. Pāpamācaranti pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2660_2: karonto. Dussīlañhi puggalaṃ atthakāmā sattā na bhajanti, aññadatthu parivajjenti.
atk-s0508a2:2661: Avaṇṇanti aguṇaṃ, sammukhā garahaṃ vā. Akittinti, ayasaṃ asilokaṃ. Vaṇṇanti guṇaṃ. Kittinti silokaṃ patthaṭayasataṃ. Pasaṃsanti sammukhā thomanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2662_0: Ādīti mūlaṃ. Sīlañhi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādi. Yathāha – “tasmātiha tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a2:2662_1: ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddha”nti.
atk-s0508a2:2662_2: Patiṭṭhāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlañhi sabbesaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ patiṭṭhā. Tenāha
atk-s0508a2:2662_4: mātubhūtaṃ, janakanti, attho. Pamukhaṃ sabbadhammānanti, sabbesaṃ pāmojjādīnaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2662_5: pamukhaṃ mukhabhūtaṃ, pavattidvāranti attho. Tasmāti ādibhāvādito. Visodhayeti akkhaṇḍādibhāvena sampādeyya.
atk-s0508a2:2663_0: Velāti duccaritehi anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena velā, sīmāti attho. Velāyati vā dussilyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2663_1: calayati viddhaṃsetīti velā. Saṃvaraṃ sīlaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ uppattidvārassa pidahanato.
atk-s0508a2:2663_2: Abhihāsananti tosanaṃ avippaṭisārahetutāya cittassābhippamodanato. Titthañca sabbabuddhānanti
atk-s0508a2:2663_3: sāvakabuddhā, paccekabuddhā, sammāsambuddhāti sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ kilesamalappavāhane
atk-s0508a2:2664_0: Sīlaṃ balaṃ appaṭimanti mārasenappamaddane asadisaṃ balaṃ senāthāmo ca. Āvudhamuttamanti
atk-s0508a2:2664_1: saṃkilesadhammānaṃ chedane uttamaṃ paharaṇaṃ. Guṇasarīropasobhanaṭṭhena ābharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2664_2: Seṭṭhanti sabbakālaṃ uttamaṃ dabbañca. Sapāṇaparittānato kavacamabbhutaṃ. “Abbhida”nti
atk-s0508a2:2665_0: Apāyamahoghātikkamane saṃsāramahoghātikkamane ca kilesehi asaṃsīdanaṭṭhena setu.
atk-s0508a2:2665_1: Mahesakkhoti mahabbalo. Gandho anuttaroti paṭivātaṃ sabbadisāsu vāyanato anuttaro
atk-s0508a2:2665_2: gandho sabbajanamanoharattā. Tenāha “yena vāti disodisa”nti yena sīlagandhena taṃsamaṅgī
atk-s0508a2:2665_3: disodisaṃ sabbā disā vāyati. “Disodisā”tipi pāḷi, dasa disāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2666_0: Sambalamevagganti sambalaṃ nāma puṭabhattaṃ. Yathā puṭabhattaṃ gahetvā maggaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0508a2:2666_1: puriso antarāmagge jighacchādukkhena na kilamati, evaṃ sīlasampannopi suddhaṃ sīlasambalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2666_2: gahetvā saṃsārakantāraṃ paṭipanno gatagataṭṭhāne na kilamatīti sīlaṃ aggaṃ sambalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2666_3: nāma. Tathā sīlaṃ pātheyyamuttamaṃ corādīhi asādhāraṇattā tattha tattha icchitabbasampattinipphādanato
atk-s0508a2:2666_4: ca. Atikkāmento taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ vā vāheti sampāpetīti ativāho,
atk-s0508a2:2666_5: yānaṃ. Kenaci anupaddutaṃ hutvā icchitaṭṭhānappattihetutāya sīlaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ativāho.
atk-s0508a2:2666_6: Yenāti yena ativāhena yāti disodisanti agatiṃ gatiñcāpi taṃ taṃ disaṃ sukheneva gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:2667_0: Idheva nindaṃ labhatīti idhalokepi dummano rāgādīhi dūsitacitto “dussīlo pāpadhammo”ti
atk-s0508a2:2667_1: nindaṃ garahaṃ labhati. Pecca paralokepi apāye “purisattakali avajātā”tiādinā yamapurisādīhi
atk-s0508a2:2667_2: ca nindaṃ labhati. Na kevalaṃ nindameva labhati, atha kho sabbattha dummano bālo
atk-s0508a2:2667_3: idhaloke duccaritacaraṇena dūsitacitto paraloke kammakāraṇādivasena dukkhuppattiyāti
atk-s0508a2:2667_4: sabbattha bālo dummano hoti. Kathaṃ? Sīlesu asamāhito sammā sīlesu na ṭhapitacitto appatiṭṭhitacitto.
atk-s0508a2:2668_0: Idheva kittiṃ labhatīti idhalokepi sumano “sappuriso sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”ti kittiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2668_1: labhati. Pecca paralokepi sagge “ayaṃ sappuriso sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo. Tathā hi devānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2668_2: sahabyataṃ upapanno”tiādinā kittiṃ labhati. Na kevalaṃ kittimeva labhati, atha kho
atk-s0508a2:2668_3: dhīro dhitisampanno sīlesu suṭṭhu samāhito appitacitto supatiṭṭhitacitto sabbattha
atk-s0508a2:2668_4: idhaloke sucaritacaraṇena, paraloke sampattipaṭilābhena sumano somanassappatto hoti.
atk-s0508a2:2668_5: Sīlameva idha agganti duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttaranti. Tattha lokiyaṃ tāva kāmaloke
atk-s0508a2:2668_6: khattiyamahāsālādīsu, devaloke brahmaloke ca upapattivisesaṃ āvahati, lābhībhāvādikassa
atk-s0508a2:2668_7: ca kāraṇaṃ hoti. Lokuttaraṃ pana sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkāmetīti sīlaṃ aggameva. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:2671_1: “sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti, “ijjhati, bhikkhave, sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti ca.
atk-s0508a2:2672_0: Lokuttarasīlassa pana sabbaso pahīnapaṭipakkhassa sattamabhavato paṭṭhāya saṃsāradukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2672_1: vinivattentassa aggabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Paññavā pana uttamoti “paññavā pana
atk-s0508a2:2672_2: puggalo uttamo paramo seṭṭhoyevā”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānena paññāya eva seṭṭhabhāvaṃ vadati.
atk-s0508a2:2672_3: Idāni sīlapaññānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ kiccato dassento “sīlapaññāṇato jaya”nti āha. Jayanti
atk-s0508a2:2672_4: ca liṅgavipallāso daṭṭhabbo, ahūti vā vacanaseso. Tattha pajānanaṭṭhena paññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2672_5: sīlato paññāṇato ca paṭipakkhajayo. Na hi sīlena vinā paññā sambhavati, paññāya ca
atk-s0508a2:2672_6: vinā sīlaṃ kiccakaraṃ, aññamaññopakārakañcetaṃ. Vuttañhi “sīlaparidhotā paññā, paññāparidhotaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2672_7: sīla”nti manussesu ca devesūti idaṃ nesaṃ ṭhānavisesadassanaṃ. Tattha hi tāni savisesāni
atk-s0508a2:2672_8: vattanti, samādhi panettha sīlapakkhiko paññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, paññāpakkhiko
atk-s0508a2:2673: Evaṃ thero tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlamukhena dhammaṃ desento attano suvisuddhasīlādiguṇatādīpanena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2676_0: Nīce kulamhītiādikā āyasmato sunītattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:2676_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto buddhassa
atk-s0508a2:2676_2: suññakāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto bālajanehi saddhiṃ kīḷāpasuto hutvā vicaranto
atk-s0508a2:2676_3: ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ gāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā, “kiṃ tuyhaṃ sabbaso vaṇitasarīrassa
atk-s0508a2:2676_4: viya sakalaṃ kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā bhikkhācaraṇena, nanu nāma kasivāṇijjādīhi jīvikā
atk-s0508a2:2676_5: kappetabbā? Tāni ce kātuṃ na sakkosi, ghare ghare muttakarīsādīni nīharanto pacchā
atk-s0508a2:2676_6: vatthusodhanena jīvāhī”ti akkosi. So tena kammena niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa
atk-s0508a2:2676_7: vipākāvasesena manussalokepi bahūni jātisatāni pupphachaḍḍakakule nibbattitvā tathā
atk-s0508a2:2676_8: jīvikaṃ kappesi. Imasmiñca buddhuppāde pupphachaḍḍakakule eva nibbatto ukkārasodhanakammena
atk-s0508a2:2677_0: Atha bhagavā pacchimayāme buddhāciṇṇaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a2:2677_1: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento sunītassa hadayabbhantare ghaṭe padīpaṃ viya pajjalantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2677_2: arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0508a2:2677_3: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho. Yassaṃ vīthiyaṃ sunīto ukkārasodhanakammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2677_4: karoti, taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajji. Sunītopi tattha tattha vighāsuccārasaṅkārādikaṃ rāsiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2677_5: katvā piṭakesu pakkhipitvā kājenādāya pariharanto bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2677_6: āgacchantaṃ disvā sārajjamāno sambhamākulahadayo gamanamaggaṃ nilīyanokāsañca alabhanto
atk-s0508a2:2677_7: kājaṃ bhittipasse ṭhapetvā ekena passena anupavisanto viya bhittiṃ allīno pañjaliko
atk-s0508a2:2678_0: Satthā tassa samīpaṃ patvā “ayaṃ attano kusalamūlasañcoditaṃ upagataṃ maṃ sārajjamāno
atk-s0508a2:2678_1: jātiyā kammassa ca nihīnatāya sammukhībhāvampi lajjati, handassa vesārajjaṃ uppādessāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2678_3: “kiṃ imāya dukkhajīvikāya pabbajituṃ sakkhissatī”ti āha. Sunīto tena satthu vacanena
atk-s0508a2:2678_4: amatena viya abhisitto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento “bhagavā, sace mādisāpi
atk-s0508a2:2678_5: idha pabbajjaṃ labhanti, kasmāhaṃ na pabbajissāmi, pabbājetha maṃ bhagavā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:2678_6: Satthā “ehi, bhikkhū”ti āha. So tāvadeva ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca
atk-s0508a2:2678_7: labhitvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharo vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya hutvā satthu santike
atk-s0508a2:2678_8: aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā taṃ vihāraṃ netvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. So paṭhamaṃ aṭṭha samāpattiyo,
atk-s0508a2:2678_9: pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Taṃ sakkādayo
atk-s0508a2:2678_10: devā brahmāno ca upasaṅkamitvā namassiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:2679: “Tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā, brahmā ca indo upasaṅkamitvā;
atk-s0508a2:2681_0: Bhagavā taṃyeva devasaṅghapurakkhataṃ disvā sitaṃ katvā pasaṃsanto “tapena brahmacariyenā”ti
atk-s0508a2:2681_1: gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi. Atha naṃ sambahulā bhikkhū sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmā, “āvuso
atk-s0508a2:2681_2: sunīta, kasmā kulā tvaṃ pabbajito, kathaṃ vā pabbajito, kathañca saccāni paṭivijjhī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2687: Nīcaṃ manaṃ karitvāna, vandissaṃ bahukaṃ janaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2699: ‘Ehi bhikkhū’ti maṃ āha, sā me āsūpasampadā.
atk-s0508a2:2701: Akāsiṃ satthu vacanaṃ, yathā maṃ ovadī jino.
atk-s0508a2:2708: Indo brahmā ca āgantvā, maṃ namassiṃsu pañjalī.
atk-s0508a2:2711: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisa.
atk-s0508a2:2719_0: Tattha nīceti lāmake sabbanihīne. Uccanīcabhāvo hi nāma sattānaṃ upādāyupādāya, ayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2719_1: pana sabbanihīne pukkusakule uppannataṃ dassento “nīce kulamhi jāto”ti āha. Tena
atk-s0508a2:2719_2: vuttaṃ – “nīceti lāmake sabbanihīne”ti. Daliddoti duggato, daliddāpi keci kadāci
atk-s0508a2:2719_3: ghāsacchādanassa lābhino, akasiravuttino honti, ahaṃ pana sabbakālaṃ kasiravuttitāya
atk-s0508a2:2719_4: hīno uddhanaṃ upaṭṭhapitaukkhaliko dassanayuttaṃ thevakampi apassiṃ yevāti dassento
atk-s0508a2:2719_5: “appabhojano”ti āha. Nīcakulikā daliddāpi keci anīcakammājīvā honti, mayhaṃ pana
atk-s0508a2:2719_6: na tathāti dassento āha “hīnakammaṃ mamaṃ āsī”ti. Kīdisanti ce? Ahosiṃ pupphachaḍḍako,
atk-s0508a2:2719_7: hatthavikalassa hatthavāti viya upacāravasenāyaṃ imassa samaññā ahosi yadidaṃ “pupphachaḍḍako”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2720_0: Jigucchitoti jātiyā ceva kammunā ca hīḷito. Manussānanti manussehi. Paribhūtoti avaññāto.
atk-s0508a2:2720_1: Vambhitoti khuṃsito. Nīcaṃ manaṃ karitvānāti aññe manusse sineruṃ viya ukkhipitvā
atk-s0508a2:2720_2: tesaṃ pādapaṃsutopi attānaṃ nihīnaṃ katvā pavattiyā nīcaṃ nihīnaṃ manaṃ katvā. Vandissaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2720_3: bahukaṃ jananti puthumahājanaṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭhakāle vandiṃ sirasi añjaliṃ karonto paṇāmiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2721_0: Athāti adhikārantaradīpane nipāto. Addasāsinti addakkhiṃ. Magadhānanti magadhā nāma
atk-s0508a2:2721_1: jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhiyā “magadhāna”nti vutto,
atk-s0508a2:2722_0: Byābhaṅginti kājaṃ. Pabbajjaṃ ahamāyācinti, “sunīta, pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti satthārā
atk-s0508a2:2722_1: okāse kate ahaṃ pabbajjaṃ ayāciṃ. Āsūpasampadāti “ehi, bhikkhū”ti satthu vacanamattena
atk-s0508a2:2722_2: āsi upasampadā. Yathā maṃ ovadīti “evaṃ samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvehī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2722_3: yathā maṃ ovadi, tathā satthuno vacanaṃ akāsiṃ paṭipajjiṃ. Rattiyātiādi tassā paṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a2:2722_4: rasadassanaṃ. Tattha pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇañca bahukiccanti “paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2722_5: majjhimaṃ yāma”nti accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Na tathā āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2722_6: ekābhisamayavasena pavattanatoti “pacchime yāme”ti bhummavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2722_7: Indoti sakko devarājā. Brahmāti mahābrahmā. Indabrahmaggahaṇena aññesaṃ kāmadevānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2722_8: brahmūnañca āgamanaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ukkaṭṭhaniddeso hesa yathā “rājā āgato”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2722_9: Namassiṃsūti kāyena vācāya ca namakkāraṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2723_0: Tattha kāyena kataṃ namakkāraṃ dassento “pañjalī”ti vatvā vācāya kataṃ dassetuṃ “namo
atk-s0508a2:2723_1: te”tiādi vuttaṃ. Devasaṅghapurakkhatanti devaggahaṇena upapattidevabhāvato brahmānopi
atk-s0508a2:2723_2: gahitā. Sitaṃ pātukaritvānāti attano ovādassa mahapphalataṃ devabrahmūnañca guṇasampattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2723_3: nissāya satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Pātukaronto ca na aññe viya dante vidaṃseti, mukhādhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2723_4: pana thokaṃ vivarati, tattakena ca abhibhūtadibbaphalikamuttarasmiyo avahasitatārakāsasimarīciyo
atk-s0508a2:2723_5: susukkadāṭhasambhavā ghanarasmiyo nikkhamitvā tikkhattuṃ satthu mukhaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2723_6: karonti, taṃ disvā pacchato gacchantāpi satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti sañjānanti.
atk-s0508a2:2724_0: Tapenāti indriyasaṃvarena, “dhutadhammasamādānenā”ti keci. Saṃyamenāti sīlena. Damenāti
atk-s0508a2:2724_1: paññāya. Brahmacariyenāti avasiṭṭhaseṭṭhacariyāya. Etenāti yathāvuttena tapādinā.
atk-s0508a2:2724_2: Brāhmaṇo hoti bāhitapāpabhāvato. Etanti tapādi yathāvuttaṃ. Brāhmaṇamuttamanti uttamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2724_3: brāhmaṇaṃ, brāhmaṇesu vā uttamaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ, ahūti vacanaseso. Brāhmaṇanti vā brahmaññamāha,
atk-s0508a2:2724_4: evaṃ uttamaṃ brahmaññaṃ, na jaccādīti adhippāyo. Na hi jātikulapadesagottasampattiādayo
atk-s0508a2:2724_5: ariyabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, adhisīlasikkhādayo eva pana kāraṇaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:2729: Evaṃ thero tehi bhikkhūhi pucchitamatthaṃ imāhi gāthāhi vissajjento sīhanādaṃ nadīti.
atk-s0508a2:2734_0: Terasanipāte yāhu raṭṭhetiādikā āyasmato soṇassa koḷivisassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:2734_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacini. Ayaṃ kira anomadassissa
atk-s0508a2:2734_2: bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike
atk-s0508a2:2734_3: dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṃ kāretvā nānāvaṇṇehi
atk-s0508a2:2734_4: pupphehi santharitvā upari nānāvirāgavatthehi vitānaṃ bandhāpesi, tathā satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a2:2734_5: ca dīghasālaṃ kāretvā niyyādesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:2734_6: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti, sirivaḍḍhotissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:2734_7: So vayappatto vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2734_8: āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento sattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2734_9: mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānamakāsi. Satthāpi tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2735_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto parinibbute kassapadasabale
atk-s0508a2:2735_1: anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṅgātīre
atk-s0508a2:2735_2: paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0508a2:2735_3: Paccekabuddho vuṭṭhavasso paripuṇṇaparikkhāro gandhamādanameva gato. Sopi kulaputto
atk-s0508a2:2735_4: yāvajīvaṃ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:2735_5: kāle campānagare usabhaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato
atk-s0508a2:2735_6: paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi. Tassa jātadivase sakalanagare mahāsakkārasampanno
atk-s0508a2:2735_8: sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi, tenassa soṇoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Mahatā parivārena
atk-s0508a2:2735_9: vaḍḍhati, tassa hatthapādatalāni bandhujīvakapupphavaṇṇāni ahesuṃ, satavihatakappāsassa
atk-s0508a2:2735_10: viya samphasso pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvaṭṭavaṇṇāni lomāni jāyiṃsu. Vayappattassa tassa
atk-s0508a2:2735_11: tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni upaṭṭhāpesuṃ. So tattha mahatiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2736_0: Atha amhākaṃ satthari sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0508a2:2736_1: viharante bimbisāraraññā pakkosāpito asītiyā gāmikasahassehi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ āgato,
atk-s0508a2:2736_2: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā sāsane
atk-s0508a2:2736_3: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā, janasaṃsaggapariharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2736_4: sītavane vasanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2736_5: kāyaṃ kilametvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya, padhānamanuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a2:2736_6: pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhahitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya
atk-s0508a2:2736_7: visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto, “evaṃ vāyamantopi ahaṃ maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2736_8: na sakkomi, kiṃ me pabbajjāya, hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjissāmi, puññāni ca karissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:2736_9: cintesi. Satthā tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2736_10: dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Soṇattheropi satthu sammukhā ovādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2736_11: labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:2738: Sudhāya lepanaṃ katvā, caṅkamaṃ kārayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2747: “Yo so haṭṭhena cittena, dīghasālaṃ adāsi me;
atk-s0508a2:2764: Okkāko nāma nāmena, rājā raṭṭhe bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2768: Taruṇī ca piyā kaññā, mahesittaṃ karissati.
atk-s0508a2:2770: Varaṃ laddhāna sā kaññā, putte pabbājayissati.
atk-s0508a2:2774: Mā no jāti pabhijjīti, nikhaṇissanti khattiyā.
atk-s0508a2:2788: Ṭhatvāna yogassa payuttatādino, tatottariṃ pāramatā na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:2790: Bhāro me ohito sabbo, nibbutomhi anāsavo.
atk-s0508a2:2794: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena aññābyākaraṇavasena ca –
atk-s0508a2:2797: Svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭho, soṇo dukkhassa pāragū.
atk-s0508a2:2799: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
atk-s0508a2:2803: Sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:2809: Akiccaṃ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino;
atk-s0508a2:2816: Vīṇopamaṃ karitvā me, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a2:2817: Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, vihāsiṃ sāsane rato.
atk-s0508a2:2820: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2829: Katassa paticayo natthi, karaṇīyaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:2832: Evaṃ rūpā rasā saddā, gandhā phassā ca kevalā.
atk-s0508a2:2835: Ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ visaññuttaṃ, vayañcassānupassatī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2836_0: Tattha yāhu raṭṭhe samukkaṭṭhoti yo ahu ahosi aṅgaraṭṭhe asītiyā gāmikasahassehi
atk-s0508a2:2836_1: bhogasampattiyā issariyasampattiyā ca sammā ativiya ukkaṭṭho seṭṭho. Rañño aṅgassa
atk-s0508a2:2836_2: paddhagūti catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisāya rañjanaṭṭhena rañño aṅgādhipatino bimbisārassa
atk-s0508a2:2836_3: parivārabhūto gahapativiseso tassa raṭṭhe kuṭumbiko ahūti yojetabbaṃ. Svājja dhammesu
atk-s0508a2:2836_4: ukkaṭṭhoti so soṇo ajjetarahi lokuttaradhammesu ukkaṭṭho jāto, gihikālepi kehici
atk-s0508a2:2836_5: ukkaṭṭhoyeva hutvā idāni pabbajitakālepi ukkaṭṭhoyeva hotīti attānameva paraṃ viya
atk-s0508a2:2836_6: dasseti. Dukkhassa pāragūti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gato, etena
atk-s0508a2:2836_7: dhammesu ukkaṭṭhoti avisesena vuttaṃ ukkaṭṭhabhāvaṃ viseseti arahattādhigamadīpanato.
atk-s0508a2:2837_0: Idāni yāya paṭipattiyā dukkhapāragū jāto, aññāpadesena taṃ dassento “pañca chinde”ti
atk-s0508a2:2837_1: gāthamāha. Tassattho – apāyakāmasugatisampāpakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni puriso
atk-s0508a2:2837_2: satthena pāde baddharajjukaṃ viya heṭṭhimena maggattayena chindeyya, rūpārūpabhavasampāpakāni
atk-s0508a2:2837_3: pañca uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjukaṃ viya aggamaggena jaheyya,
atk-s0508a2:2837_4: chindeyya, tesaṃ pana uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya pañca saddhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0508a2:2837_5: uttari bhāvaye bhāveyya. Evaṃbhūto pana bhikkhu rāgasaṅgo dosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgoti
atk-s0508a2:2837_6: pañcannaṃ saṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā, kāmogho, bhavogho, diṭṭhogho,
atk-s0508a2:2837_7: avijjoghoti catunnaṃ oghānaṃ tiṇṇattā oghatiṇṇoti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:2838_0: Ayañca oghataraṇapaṭipattisīlādīnaṃ pāripūriyāva hoti, sīlādayo ca mānādippahānena
atk-s0508a2:2838_1: pāripūriṃ gacchanti, na aññathāti dassento “unnaḷassā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha unnaḷassāti
atk-s0508a2:2838_2: uggatatucchamānassa. Māno hi unnamanākāravuttiyā tucchabhāvena naḷo viyāti “naḷo”ti
atk-s0508a2:2838_3: vuccati. Pamattassāti sativossaggena pamādaṃ āpannassa. Bāhirāsassāti bāhiresu āyatanesu
atk-s0508a2:2838_4: āsāvato, kāmesu avītarāgassāti attho. Sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṃ na gacchatīti
atk-s0508a2:2838_5: tassa sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhasevino lokiyopi tāva sīlādiguṇo pāripūriṃ na gacchati, pageva lokuttaro.
atk-s0508a2:2839_0: Tattha kāraṇamāha “yañhi kicca”ntiādinā. Bhikkhuno hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2839_1: araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ bhāvanārāmatāti evamādi kiccaṃ nāma. Yehi pana idaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2839_2: yathāvuttaṃ attano kiccaṃ, taṃ apaviddhaṃ akaraṇena chaḍḍitaṃ. Akiccanti pattamaṇḍanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2839_4: paccayabāhuliyanti evamādi bhikkhuno akiccaṃ nāma, taṃ kayirati, tesaṃ mānanaḷaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2839_5: ukkhipitvā caraṇena unnaḷānaṃ sativossaggena pamattānaṃ cattāropi āsavā vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0508a2:2840_0: Yesaṃ pana paññādiguṇo vaḍḍhati, te dassetuṃ “yesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha susamāraddhāti
atk-s0508a2:2840_1: suṭṭhu paggahitā. Kāyagatā satīti, kāyānupassanābhāvanā. Akiccaṃ teti te etaṃ pattamaṇḍanādiakiccaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2840_2: Na sevantīti na karonti. Kicceti, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kattabbe aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanādike.
atk-s0508a2:2840_3: Sātaccakārinoti satatakārino tesaṃ satiyā avippavāsena satānaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2840_5: sampajānānaṃ, cattāropi āsavā atthaṃ gacchanti parikkhayaṃ abhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2841_0: Idāni attano santike ṭhitabhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento “ujumaggamhī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:2841_1: ujumaggamhi akkhāteti antadvayaparivajjanena kāyavaṅkādippahānena ca ujuke majjhimapaṭipadābhūte
atk-s0508a2:2841_2: ariyamagge satthārā bhāsite. Gacchathāti paṭipajjatha. Mā nivattathāti antarā vosānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2841_3: māpajjatha. Attanā codayattānanti idha atthakāmo kulaputto apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇādinā
atk-s0508a2:2841_4: attanāva attānaṃ codento. Nibbānamabhihārayeti, attānaṃ nibbānaṃ abhihareyya upaneyya,
atk-s0508a2:2841_5: yathā naṃ sacchikaroti, tathā paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2842_0: Idāni mayāpi evameva paṭipannanti, attano paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “accāraddhamhī”tiādi
atk-s0508a2:2842_1: vuttaṃ. Accāraddhamhi vīriyamhīti vipassanaṃ bhāventena mayā samādhinā vīriyaṃ samarasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2842_2: akatvā ativiya vīriye paggahite. Accāraddhavīriyatā cassa heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. Vīṇopamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2842_3: karitvā meti āyasmato soṇassa “ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti.
atk-s0508a2:2842_4: Ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro, atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati, tasmāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2842_5: vibbhamissāmī”ti citte uppanne satthā iddhiyā tassa sammukhe attānaṃ dassetvā “kasmā
atk-s0508a2:2842_6: tvaṃ, soṇa, ‘vibbhamissāmī’ti cittaṃ uppādesi, kusalo tvaṃ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya
atk-s0508a2:2842_7: tantissare”ti pucchitvā tena “evaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa? Yadā
atk-s0508a2:2842_8: te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā
atk-s0508a2:2842_9: vāti? No hetaṃ, bhante! Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā
atk-s0508a2:2842_10: honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? No hetaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0508a2:2842_11: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, yadā pana te vīṇāya tantiyo neva accāyatā honti, nātisithilā
atk-s0508a2:2842_12: same guṇe patiṭṭhitā, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti?
atk-s0508a2:2842_13: Evaṃ, bhante. Evameva kho, soṇa, accāraddhavīriyaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati, atilīnavīriyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2842_14: kosajjāya saṃvattati, tasmātiha tvaṃ, soṇa, vīriyasamataṃ adhiṭṭhaha, indriyānañca
atk-s0508a2:2842_15: samataṃ paṭivijjhā”ti evaṃ vīṇaṃ upamaṃ katvā pavattitena vīṇopamovādena mayhaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2842_16: desesi. Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāti tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ vīṇopamovādaṃ sutvā antarā
atk-s0508a2:2842_17: uppannaṃ vibbhamitukāmataṃ pahāya satthu sāsane rato abhirato vihariṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2843_0: Viharanto ca samathaṃ paṭipādesiṃ vīriyasamataṃ yojento saddhāpaññānaṃ viya samādhivīriyānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2843_1: samarasataṃ uppādento jhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ vipassanāsamādhiṃ sampādesiṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpesiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2843_2: Tattha payojanaṃ āha “uttamatthassa pattiyā”ti. Uttamatthassa pattiyāti arahattādhigamāyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2844_0: Idāni yathā paṭipannassa samathavipassanā sampajjiṃsu, taṃ aññāpadesena dassento
atk-s0508a2:2844_2: tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena yuttappayuttassa, paṭhamaṃ tāva pabbajjābhimukho
atk-s0508a2:2844_3: hutvā kāme pahāya pabbajitvā ca sīlavisodhanaṃ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ bhāvanābhiyogoti
atk-s0508a2:2844_4: evamādīsu anavajjadhammesu yuttappayuttassāti attho. Pavivekañca cetasoti cetaso
atk-s0508a2:2844_5: pavivekañca adhimuttassa evaṃ nekkhammādhimuttassa sato catukkapañcakajjhānānaṃ nibbattanena
atk-s0508a2:2844_6: viveke yuttassa payuttassa. Abyābajjhādhimuttassāti abyābajjhe nidukkhatāya adhimuttassa
atk-s0508a2:2844_7: jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samathasukhe yuttappayuttassa. Upādānakkhayassa cāti
atk-s0508a2:2844_8: catunnampi upādānānaṃ khayante arahatte adhimuttassa. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2844_9: Taṃ yathādhigataṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattādhigamāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2845_0: Taṇhakkhayādhimuttassāti taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayo, nibbānaṃ, tasmiṃ adhimuttassa
atk-s0508a2:2845_1: upādiṃ bhayato, anupādiñca khemato dassanena nirodhe ninnapoṇapabbhārassa. Asammohañca
atk-s0508a2:2845_3: vā cittassa asammohabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ adhimuttassa. Disvā āyatanuppādanti cakkhādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2845_4: āyatanānaṃ yathāsakapaccayehi khaṇe khaṇe uppādaṃ, tappaṭipakkhato nirodhañca vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0508a2:2845_5: maggapaññāya disvā dassanahetu sammā cittaṃ vimuccatīti sammā hetunā ñāyena maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a2:2846_0: “Tassa sammā vimuttassā”tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – tassa vuttanayena sammadeva sabbasaṃkilesato
atk-s0508a2:2846_1: vimuttassa, tato eva accantupasamena santacittassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno katassa kusalassa
atk-s0508a2:2846_2: akusalassa vā upacayo natthi maggeneva samugghātitattā, pariññādibhedaṃ karaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2846_3: na vijjati katakiccattā. Evaṃ bhūtassa yathā ekaghano selo pabbato pakativātena na
atk-s0508a2:2846_4: samīrati na saṃkampati, evaṃ iṭṭhā ca aniṭṭhā ca rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā tādino tādibhāvappattassa
atk-s0508a2:2846_5: ṭhitaṃ anejaṃ pahīnasabbasokatāya visaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ nappavedhanti na cālenti. Assa
atk-s0508a2:2846_6: ca ārammaṇadhammassa kālena kālaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vipassanto vayaṃ nirodhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2846_7: khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṃ anupassatīti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2851_0: Cuddasakanipāte yadā ahantiādikā āyasmato khadiravaniyarevatattherassa gāthā. Kā
atk-s0508a2:2851_1: uppatti? Kāmañcimassa therassa gāthā heṭṭhā ekakanipāte āgatā. Tattha panassa attano
atk-s0508a2:2851_2: bhāgineyyesu satijananamattaṃ dassitanti tassā ekakanipāte saṅgaho kato. Imā pana
atk-s0508a2:2851_3: therassa pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā paṭipattipakāsitā gāthā imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2851_4: cuddasakanipāte saṅgahaṃ āropitā. Tattha aṭṭhuppatti heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0508a2:2851_5: viseso – thero kira arahattaṃ patvā kālena kālaṃ satthu dhammasenāpatippabhūtīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2851_6: mahātherānañca upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā katipāhameva tattha vasitvā khadiravanameva paccāgantvā
atk-s0508a2:2851_7: phalasamāpattisukhena brahmavihārehi ca vītināmeti. Evaṃ gacchante kāle jiṇṇo vuḍḍho
atk-s0508a2:2851_8: vayo anuppatto ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge sāvatthiyā
atk-s0508a2:2851_9: avidūre araññe vasi. Tena ca samayena corā nagare katakammā ārakkhamanussehi anubandhā
atk-s0508a2:2851_10: palāyantā therassa samīpe gahitabhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. Manussā anudhāvantā
atk-s0508a2:2851_11: therassa samīpe bhaṇḍaṃ disvā theraṃ bandhitvā “coro”ti saññāya gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2851_12: “ayaṃ, deva, coro”ti. Rājā theraṃ muñcāpetvā, “kiṃ, bhante, tumhehi idaṃ corikakammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2851_13: kataṃ vā, no vā”ti pucchi. Thero kiñcāpi jātito paṭṭhāya attanā tādisaṃ na katapubbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2851_14: taṃ pabbajitato paṭṭhāya pana akatabhāvassa, sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tādisassa
atk-s0508a2:2851_15: karaṇe abhabbatāya pakāsanatthaṃ samīpe ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rañño ca dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a2:2872: Evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhati.
atk-s0508a2:2878: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā.
atk-s0508a2:2893: Handāhaṃ parinibbissaṃ vippamuttomhi sabbadhī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2894_0: Tatthāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā imasmiṃ dīghamantareti, yadā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi, tato
atk-s0508a2:2894_1: paṭṭhāya ayañca me carimakālo, etasmiṃ dīghamantare kāle “idaṃ mayhaṃ hotū”ti abhijjhāvasena
atk-s0508a2:2894_2: vā, “ime sattā haññantū”tiādinā byāpādavasena vā anariyaṃ dosasaṃhitaṃ saṅkappaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2895_0: Mettañca abhijānāmīti, mijjati siniyhati etāyāti mettā, abyāpādo. Mettā etissā atthīti
atk-s0508a2:2895_1: mettā, mettābhāvanā mettābrahmavihāro, taṃ mettaṃ. Ca-saddena karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkhañcāti
atk-s0508a2:2895_2: itarabrahmavihāre saṅgaṇhāti. Abhijānāmīti, abhimukhato jānāmi. Adhigatañhi jhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2895_3: paccavekkhato paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa abhimukhaṃ hoti. Kīdisanti āha “appamāṇa”ntiādi.
atk-s0508a2:2895_4: Tañhi yathā buddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ, tathā anodissakapharaṇavasena aparimāṇasattārammaṇatāya
atk-s0508a2:2895_5: appamāṇaṃ. Paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena suṭṭhu bhāvitattā subhāvitaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ mettā,
atk-s0508a2:2895_6: tato karuṇā, tato muditā, pacchā upekkhāti evaṃ anupubbaṃ anukkamena paricitaṃ āsevitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2896_0: Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ mitto, sabbe vā te mayhaṃ mittāti sabbamitto. Mettañhi bhāvento
atk-s0508a2:2896_1: sattānaṃ piyo hoti. Sabbasakhoti, etthāpi eseva nayo. Sabbabhūtānukampakoti, sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2896_2: anuggaṇhanako. Mettacittañca bhāvemīti, mettāya sahitaṃ sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ visesato
atk-s0508a2:2896_3: bhāvemi, vaḍḍhemi, pakāsemi vā akathentepi bhāvanāya ukkaṃsagatabhāvato. “Mettaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2896_4: cittañca bhāvemī”ti vā pāṭho. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayova. Abyāpajjaratoti, abyāpajje
atk-s0508a2:2896_5: sattānaṃ hitūpasaṃhāre abhirato. Sadāti, sabbakālaṃ, tena tattha sātaccakiriyaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2897_0: Asaṃhīranti na saṃhīraṃ, āsannapaccatthikena rāgena anākaḍḍhaniyaṃ. Asaṃkuppanti
atk-s0508a2:2897_1: na kuppaṃ, dūrapaccatthikena byāpādena akopiyaṃ, evaṃbhūtaṃ katvā mama mettacittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2897_2: āmodayāmi abhippamodayāmi brahmavihāraṃ bhāvemi. Akāpurisasevitanti, kāpurisehi nīcajanehi
atk-s0508a2:2897_3: asevitaṃ, akāpurisehi vā ariyehi buddhādīhi sevitaṃ brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ niddosaṃ mettādivihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2898_0: Evaṃ attuddesavasena pañcahi gāthāhi attano paṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aññāpadesena
atk-s0508a2:2898_1: dassento “avitakka”ntiādinā catasso gāthā abhāsi. Tattha avitakkaṃ samāpannoti, vitakkavirahitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2898_2: dutiyādijhānaṃ samāpanno, etena thero brahmavihārabhāvanāya aññāpadesena attanā dutiyādijhānādhigamamāha.
