atk-s0508a2:2898_3: Yasmā panāyaṃ thero tameva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ekāsaneneva
atk-s0508a2:2898_4: arahattaṃ gaṇhi, tasmā tamatthaṃ aññāpadeseneva dassento “avitakkaṃ samāpanno”ti
atk-s0508a2:2898_5: vatvā “sammāsambuddhasāvako. Ariyena tuṇhībhāvena, upeto hoti tāvade”ti āha. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:2898_7: vo, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti pana vacanato
atk-s0508a2:2898_8: yā kāci samāpatti ariyo tuṇhībhāvo nāma. Idha pana catutthajjhānikā aggaphalasamāpatti adhippetā.
atk-s0508a2:2899_0: Idāni tassādhigatattā lokadhammehi akampanīyataṃ upamāya pakāsento “yathāpi pabbato”ti
atk-s0508a2:2899_1: gāthamāha. Tattha yathāpi pabbato seloti, yathā silāmayo ekaghanaselo pabbato, na
atk-s0508a2:2899_2: paṃsupabbato na missakapabbatoti attho. Acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti, suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitamūlo
atk-s0508a2:2899_3: pakativātehi acalo akampanīyo hoti, tasmā arahattaṃ nibbānañca evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a2:2899_4: pabbatova na vedhatīti mohassa anavasesappahānā, mohamūlakattā ca sabbākusalānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2899_5: pahīnasabbākusalo bhikkhu yathā so pabbato pakativātehi, evaṃ lokadhammehi na vedhati
atk-s0508a2:2899_6: na kampati, mohakkhayoti vā yasmā arahattaṃ nibbānañca vuccati, tasmā mohakkhayāti
atk-s0508a2:2899_7: mohakkhayassa hetu nibbānassa arahattassa ca adhigatattā catūsu ariyasaccesu suppatiṭṭhito
atk-s0508a2:2899_8: asamāpannakālepi pabbato viya na vedhati, pageva samāpannakāleti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2900_0: Idāni pāpaṃ nāmetaṃ asucisīlo eva samācarati, na ca sucisīlo, sucisīlassa pana taṃ
atk-s0508a2:2900_1: aṇumattampi bhāriyaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti dassento “anaṅgaṇassā”tiādigāthamāha. Tassattho
atk-s0508a2:2900_2: – rāgādiaṅgaṇābhāvato anaṅgaṇassa sabbakālaṃ sucianavajjadhamme eva gavesantassa
atk-s0508a2:2900_3: sappurisassa vālaggamattaṃ kesaggamattaṃ pāpassa lesamattampi sakalaṃ lokadhātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2900_4: pharitvā ṭhitaṃ abbhamattaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tasmā na evarūpe kamme mādisā āsaṅkitabbāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2901_0: Yasmā nikkilesesupi andhabālā evarūpe apavāde samuṭṭhāpenti, tasmā atthakāmehi sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2901_1: attā rakkhitabboti ovādaṃ dento “nagaraṃ yathā”tiādigāthamāha. Tassattho – yathā
atk-s0508a2:2901_2: pana paccantanagaravāsīhi manussehi paccantaṃ nagaraṃ dvārapākārādīni thirāni karontehi
atk-s0508a2:2901_3: saantaraṃ, uddāpaparikhādīni thirāni karontehi sabāhiranti santarabāhiraṃ guttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2901_4: karīyati, evaṃ tumhehipi satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ajjhattikāni cha dvārāni pidahitvā dvārarakkhitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2901_5: satiṃ avissajjetvā yathā gayhamānāni bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ajjhattikāni upaghātāya
atk-s0508a2:2901_6: saṃvattanti, tathā aggahaṇena tānipi thirāni katvā tesaṃ appavesāya dvārarakkhitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2901_7: satiṃ appahāya vicarantā attānaṃ gopetha. Kasmā? Khaṇo vo mā upaccagā. Yo hi evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2901_8: attānaṃ na gopeti, taṃ puggalaṃ buddhuppādakkhaṇo, manussattabhāvakkhaṇo, majjhimadese
atk-s0508a2:2901_9: uppattikkhaṇo, sammādiṭṭhiyā paṭiladdhakkhaṇo, channaṃ āyatanānaṃ avekallakkhaṇoti
atk-s0508a2:2901_10: sabbopi ayaṃ khaṇo atikkamati, so khaṇo tumhe mā atikkamatūti.
atk-s0508a2:2902_0: Evaṃ thero imāya gāthāya sarājikaṃ parisaṃ bhikkhū ca ovaditvā puna maraṇe jīvite
atk-s0508a2:2902_1: ca attano samacittataṃ katakiccatañca pakāsento “nābhinandāmi maraṇa”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:2903_0: Evaṃ pana vatvā attano parinibbānakālaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ disvā saṅkhepeneva nesaṃ ovādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2903_1: datvā parinibbānaṃ pavedento osānagāthamāha. Tattha sampādethappamādenāti sampādetabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2903_3: sīlānurakkhaṇe samathaanuyoge vipassanābhāvanāya ca appamattā hotha. Esā me anusāsanīti
atk-s0508a2:2903_4: dānasīlādīsu na pamajjathāti esā mama anusiṭṭhi ovādo.
atk-s0508a2:2904_0: Evaṃ sikhāpattaṃ parahitapaṭipattiṃ dīpetvā attahitapaṭipattiyāpi matthakaṃ gaṇhanto
atk-s0508a2:2904_1: “handāhaṃ parinibbissaṃ, vippamuttomhi sabbadhī”ti āha. Tattha vippamuttomhi sabbadhīti
atk-s0508a2:2904_2: sabbaso kilesehi bhavehi ca vippamutto amhi, tasmā ekaṃsena parinibbāyissāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:2905: Evaṃ pana vatvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā pajjalanto anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0508a2:2908_0: Yathāpi bhaddotiādikā āyasmato godattattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:2908_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:2908_2: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ satthavāhakule nibbatto. Godattoti nāmena
atk-s0508a2:2908_3: vayappatto pitari kālaṅkate kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapento pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya
atk-s0508a2:2908_4: aparāparaṃ sañcaritvā vāṇijjena jīvikaṃ kappeti yathāvibhavaṃ puññānipi karoti. So
atk-s0508a2:2908_5: ekadivasaṃ antarāmagge dhure yuttagoṇe vahituṃ asakkonte patite manussesu taṃ vuṭṭhāpetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2908_6: asakkontesu sayameva gantvā taṃ naṅguṭṭhe gāḷhaṃ vijjhi. Goṇo “ayaṃ asappuriso mama
atk-s0508a2:2908_7: balābalaṃ ajānanto gāḷhaṃ vijjhatī”ti kuddho manussavācāya, “bho godatta, ahaṃ ettakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2908_8: kālaṃ attano balaṃ aniguhanto tuyhaṃ bhāraṃ vahiṃ, ajja pana asamatthabhāvena patitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2908_9: maṃ ativiya bādhasi, hotu, ito cavitvā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne taṃ bādhetuṃ samattho
atk-s0508a2:2908_10: paṭisattu bhaveyya”nti patthanānurūpena akkosi. Taṃ sutvā godatto “evaṃ nāma satte
atk-s0508a2:2908_11: bādhetvā kiṃ imāya jīvikāyā”ti saṃvegajāto sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ pahāya aññatarassa mahātherassa
atk-s0508a2:2908_12: santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā samāpattisukhena
atk-s0508a2:2908_13: vītināmento ekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ ariyagaṇānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2913: “Evaṃ paññāya ye tittā, samuddo vārinā yathā;
atk-s0508a2:2917: Narā dukkhaṃ nigacchanti, tedha socanti māṇavā.
atk-s0508a2:2923: Ṭhitā te indakhīlova, na te unnataonatā.
atk-s0508a2:2925: “Na heva lābhe nālābhe, na yase na ca kittiyā;
atk-s0508a2:2926: Na nindāyaṃ pasaṃsāya, na te dukkhe sukhamhi ca.
atk-s0508a2:2931: “Dhammena ca alābho yo, yo ca lābho adhammiko;
atk-s0508a2:2932: Alābho dhammiko seyyo, yañce lābho adhammiko.
atk-s0508a2:2934: “Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yo;
atk-s0508a2:2935: Ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ, na yaso appabuddhinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2937: “Dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
atk-s0508a2:2944: Maraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2947: Caranti loke asitā, natthi tesaṃ piyāpiyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2950: Pappuyya paramaṃ santiṃ, parinibbantināsavā”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2951_0: Tattha ājaññoti, usabhājānīyo. Dhure yuttoti, sakaṭadhure yojito. Dhurassahoti, dhuravāho.
atk-s0508a2:2951_1: Gāthāsukhatthañcettha dvisakārato niddeso kato, sakaṭabhāraṃ vahituṃ samatthoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2951_2: Mathito atibhārenāti, atibhārena garubhārena pīḷito. “Maddito”tipi pāḷi, so evattho.
atk-s0508a2:2951_3: Saṃyuganti, attano khandhe ṭhapitaṃ yugaṃ nātivattati na atikkāmeti, sammā yo uddharitvā
atk-s0508a2:2951_4: dhuraṃ chaḍḍetvā na tiṭṭhati. Evanti yathā so dhorayho attano bhadrājānīyatāya attano
atk-s0508a2:2951_5: dhīravīratāya attano bhāraṃ nātivattati na pariccajati, evaṃ ye vārinā viya mahāsamuddo
atk-s0508a2:2951_6: lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya tittā dhātā paripuṇṇā, te pare nihīnapaññe na atimaññanti,
atk-s0508a2:2951_7: na paribhavanti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “ariyadhammova pāṇina”nti, pāṇinaṃ sattesu ayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2951_8: ariyānaṃ dhammo yadidaṃ tesaṃ paññāya pāripūriṃ gatattā lābhādinā attānukkaṃsanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2952_0: Evaṃ paññāpāripūriyā ariyānaṃ sukhavihāraṃ dassetvā tadabhāvato anariyānaṃ dukkhavihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:2952_1: dassetuṃ “kāle”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāleti lābhālābhādinā samaṅgībhūtakāle. Kālavasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2952_2: pattāti lābhādikālassa ca vasaṃ upagatā, lābhādinā somanassitā alābhādinā ca domanassitāti
atk-s0508a2:2952_3: attho. Bhavābhavavasaṃ gatāti bhavassa abhavassa ca vasaṃ upagatā vuddhihāniyo anuvattantā
atk-s0508a2:2952_4: te. Narā dukkhaṃ nigacchanti, tedha socanti māṇavāti te narā “māṇavā”ti laddhanāmā
atk-s0508a2:2952_5: sattā lābhālābhādivasena vuddhihānivasena anurodhapaṭivirodhaṃ āpannā idhaloke socanti,
atk-s0508a2:2952_6: paraloke ca nirayādidukkhaṃ gacchanti pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2953_0: “Unnatā”tiādināpi lokadhammavasena sattānaṃ anatthappattimeva dasseti. Tattha unnatā
atk-s0508a2:2953_1: sukhadhammenāti sukhahetunā sukhapaccayena bhogasampattiādinā unnatiṃ gatā, bhogamadādinā
atk-s0508a2:2953_2: mattāti attho. Dukkhadhammena conatāti dukkhahetunā dukkhapaccayena bhogavipattiādinā
atk-s0508a2:2953_3: nihīnataṃ gatā dāliddiyādinā kāpaññataṃ pattā. Dvayenāti yathāvuttena unnationatidvayena
atk-s0508a2:2953_4: lābhālābhādidvayena vā bālaputhujjanā haññanti, anurodhapaṭivirodhavasena vibādhīyanti
atk-s0508a2:2953_5: pīḷiyanti. Kasmā? Yathābhūtaṃ adassino yasmā te dhammasabhāvaṃ yāthāvato nabbhaññaṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:2953_6: pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā ca na honti, tasmāti attho. “Yathābhūtaṃ adassanā”tipi
atk-s0508a2:2953_7: paṭhanti, adassanahetūti attho. Ye ca dukkhe sukhasmiñca, majjhe sibbinimaccagūti
atk-s0508a2:2953_8: ye pana ariyā dukkhavedanāya sukhavedanāya majjhattatāvedanāya ca tappaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2953_9: chandarāgabhūtaṃ sibbiniṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggādhigamena accagū atikkamiṃsu, te indakhīlo
atk-s0508a2:2953_10: viya vātehi lokadhammehi asampakampiyā ṭhitā, na te unnataonatā, kadācipi unnatā
atk-s0508a2:2953_11: vā onatā vā na honti sabbaso anunayapaṭighābhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:2954_0: Evaṃ vedanādhiṭṭhānaṃ arahato anupalepaṃ dassetvā idāni lokadhamme vibhajitvā sabbatthakamevassa
atk-s0508a2:2954_1: anupalepaṃ dassento “na hevā”tiādimāha. Tattha lābheti cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭilābhe.
atk-s0508a2:2954_2: Alābheti tesaṃyeva appaṭilābhe apagame. Na yaseti parivārahāniyaṃ akittiyañca. Kittiyāti
atk-s0508a2:2954_3: parammukhā kittane patthaṭayasatāyaṃ. Nindāyanti sammukhā garahāyaṃ. Pasaṃsāyanti,
atk-s0508a2:2954_4: paccakkhato guṇābhitthavane. Dukkheti dukkhe uppanne. Sukheti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-s0508a2:2955_0: Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ yathāvutte aṭṭhavidhepi lokadhamme, sabbattha vā rūpādike visaye
atk-s0508a2:2955_1: te khīṇāsavā na limpanti sabbaso pahīnakilesattā. Yathā kiṃ? Udabinduva pokkhare
atk-s0508a2:2955_2: yathā kamaladale jalabindu allīyitvā ṭhitampi tena na limpati, jalabindunā ca kamaladalaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2955_3: aññadatthu visaṃsaṭṭhameva, evametepi upaṭṭhite lābhādike, āpāthagate rūpādiārammaṇe
atk-s0508a2:2955_4: ca visaṃsaṭṭhā evaṃ. Tato eva dhīrā paṇḍitā sabbattha lābhādīsu ñāṇamukhena piyanimittānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2955_5: sokādīnañca abhāvato sukhitā lābhādīhi ca anabhibhavanīyato sabbattha aparājitāva honti.
atk-s0508a2:2956_0: Idāni lābhālābhādīsu seyyaṃ niddhāretvā dassento “dhammenā”tiādimāha. Tattha dhammena
atk-s0508a2:2956_1: ca alābho yoti yo dhammaṃ rakkhantassa taṃnimittaṃ alābho lābhābhāvo, lābhahāni.
atk-s0508a2:2956_2: Yo ca lābho adhammiko adhammena aññāyena buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena vidhinā uppanno, tesu
atk-s0508a2:2956_3: dvīsu alābho dhammiko dhammāvaho seyyo, yādisaṃ lābhaṃ parivajjantassa akusalā dhammā
atk-s0508a2:2956_4: parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, tādiso alābho pāsaṃsataro atthāvaho. Yañce
atk-s0508a2:2956_5: lābho adhammikoti yo lābho adhammena uppanno, so na seyyoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2957_0: Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yoti yo appabuddhīnaṃ duppaññānaṃ vasena
atk-s0508a2:2957_1: puggalassa yaso labbhati, yo ca viññūnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ vasena ayaso yasahāni. Imesu
atk-s0508a2:2957_2: dvīsu ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ. Te hissa yathā akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā
atk-s0508a2:2957_3: abhivaḍḍhanti, evaṃ yasahāniṃ iccheyyuṃ, tathā ca bhabbajātiko taṃ aguṇaṃ pahāya
atk-s0508a2:2957_4: guṇe patiṭṭheyya. Na yaso appabuddhīnanti duppaññānaṃ vasena yaso seyyo hoti, te
atk-s0508a2:2957_5: hi abhūtaguṇābhibyāhāravasenāpi naṃ uppādeyyuṃ, so cassa idha ceva viññūgarahādinā
atk-s0508a2:2957_6: samparāye ca duggatiyaṃ dukkhaparikkilesādinā anatthāvaho. Tenāha bhagavā – “lābho
atk-s0508a2:2957_7: siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso”ti “sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hantī”ti ca.
atk-s0508a2:2958: Dummedhehīti, nippaññehi. Yañce bālappasaṃsanāti bālehi aviddasūhi yā nāma pasaṃsanā.
atk-s0508a2:2959_0: Kāmamayikanti vatthukāmamayaṃ, kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppannaṃ. Dukkhañca pavivekiyanti
atk-s0508a2:2959_1: pavivekato nibbattaṃ kāyakilamathavasena pavattaṃ visamāsanupatāpādihetukaṃ kāyikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2959_2: dukkhaṃ, taṃ pana nirāmisavivaṭṭūpanissayatāya viññūnaṃ pāsaṃsā. Tena vuttaṃ “pavivekadukkhaṃ seyyo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2960_0: Jīvitañca adhammenāti adhammena jīvikakappanaṃ jīvitahetu adhammacaraṇaṃ. Dhammena
atk-s0508a2:2960_1: maraṇaṃ nāma “imaṃ nāma pāpaṃ akarontaṃ taṃ māressāmī”ti kenaci vutte mārentepi tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2960_2: pāpaṃ akatvā dhammaṃ avikopentassa dhammahetumaraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyoti tādisaṃ maraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2960_3: dhammato anapetattā dhammikaṃ saggasampāpanato nibbānupanissayato ca viññūnaṃ pāsaṃsataraṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:2961: “Caje dhanaṃ aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
atk-s0508a2:2962: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti. ;
atk-s0508a2:2963: Yañce jīve adhammikanti puriso yaṃ dhammato apetaṃ jīvikaṃ jīveyya, taṃ na seveyya viññūhi garahitattā apāyasampāpanato cāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2964: Idāni yathāvuttaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anupalepaṃ kāraṇato dassento “kāmakopapahīnā”tiādigāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2965_0: Tattha kāmakopapahīnāti ariyamaggena sabbasova pahīnā anurodhapaṭivirodhā. Santacittā
atk-s0508a2:2965_1: bhavābhaveti khuddake ceva mahante ca bhave anavasesapahīnakilesapariḷāhatāya vūpasantacittā.
atk-s0508a2:2965_2: Loketi khandhādiloke. Asitāti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayavasena anissitā. Natthi tesaṃ piyāpiyanti
atk-s0508a2:2965_3: tesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ katthaci lābhādike rūpādivisaye ca piyaṃ vā apiyaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0508a2:2966_0: Idāni yāya bhāvanāya te evarūpā jātā, taṃ dassetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanāya
atk-s0508a2:2966_1: kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto “bhāvayitvānā”ti osānagāthamāha. Tattha pappuyyāti, pāpuṇitvā. Sesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2966_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Imā eva ca gāthā therassa aññābyākaraṇāpi ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2971_0: Soḷasakanipāte esa bhiyyotiādikā āyasmato aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a2:2971_1: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:2971_2: viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:2971_3: attano sāsane paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammarattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi
atk-s0508a2:2971_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa satthuno sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2971_5: pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthāpissa anantarāyataṃ disvā bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2971_6: So yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā satthari parinibbute cetiye patiṭṭhāpiyamāne antocetiye
atk-s0508a2:2971_7: ratanagharaṃ kāresi, cetiyaṃ parivāretvā sahassaratanagghiyāni ca kāresi.
atk-s0508a2:2972_0: So evaṃ puññāni katvā, tato cavitvā, devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:2972_1: kāle mahākālo nāma kuṭumbiko hutvā aṭṭhakarīsamatte khette sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā,
atk-s0508a2:2972_3: pakkhipitvā, buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi. Sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2972_4: puna pūrati, puthukakāle puthukaggaṃ nāma adāsi. Lāyane lāyanaggaṃ, veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2972_5: kalāpādikaraṇe kalāpaggaṃ, khalaggaṃ, bhaṇḍaggaṃ, minaggaṃ, koṭṭhagganti; evaṃ ekasasse
atk-s0508a2:2972_6: nava vāre aggadānaṃ nāma adāsi. Tampi sassaṃ atirekataraṃ sampannaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:2973_0: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā, tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu
atk-s0508a2:2973_1: ca saṃsaranto, amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre
atk-s0508a2:2973_2: doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Tassa koṇḍaññoti gottato
atk-s0508a2:2973_3: āgataṃ nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantesu ca pāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2973_4: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurato cavitvā kapilavatthupure suddhodanamahārājassa
atk-s0508a2:2973_5: gehe nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttarasatesu brāhmaṇesu upanītesu ye aṭṭha
atk-s0508a2:2973_6: brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇapariggahaṇatthaṃ mahātalaṃ upanītā. So tesu sabbanavako hutvā, mahāpurisassa
atk-s0508a2:2973_7: lakkhaṇanipphattiṃ disvā, “ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa
atk-s0508a2:2974_0: Bodhisattopi kho mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhamāno anukkamena vuddhippatto ñāṇaparipākaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2974_1: gantvā ekūnatiṃsatime vasse mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomānadītīre pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:2974_2: anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā padhānaṃ padahi. Tadā koṇḍañño māṇavo mahāsattassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2974_3: sutvā, lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ puttehi vappamāṇavādīhi saddhiṃ attapañcamo
atk-s0508a2:2974_4: pabbajitvā, anukkamena bodhisattassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, chabbassāni taṃ upaṭṭhahanto
atk-s0508a2:2974_5: tassa oḷārikāhāraparibhogena nibbinno apakkamitvā isipatanaṃ agamāsi. Atha kho bodhisatto
atk-s0508a2:2974_7: nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā, abhisambuddho hutvā, sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva
atk-s0508a2:2974_8: vītināmetvā, pañcavaggiyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā, āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ isipatanaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0508a2:2974_9: tesaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0508a2:2974_10: brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Atha pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāya
atk-s0508a2:2988: Idaṃ me paṭhamaṃ bhattaṃ, brahmacārissa yāpanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2989: “Tusitā hi idhāgantvā, yo me bhikkhaṃ upānayi;
atk-s0508a2:2996: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:3008_0: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0508a2:3008_1: nisinno paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammabhāvaṃ dīpento, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3008_2: bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. So dvīhi aggasāvakehi
atk-s0508a2:3008_3: attani karīyamānaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ gāmantasenāsane ākiṇṇavihārañca pariharitukāmo,
atk-s0508a2:3008_4: vivekābhiratiyā viharitukāmo ca attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇampi
atk-s0508a2:3008_5: papañcaṃ maññamāno satthāraṃ āpucchitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā chaddantehi nāgehi upaṭṭhiyamāno
atk-s0508a2:3008_6: chaddantadahatīre dvādasa vassāni vasi. Evaṃ tattha vasantaṃ theraṃ ekadivasaṃ sakko
atk-s0508a2:3008_7: devarājā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ṭhito evamāha – “sādhu me, bhante, ayyo dhammaṃ desetū”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3008_8: Thero tassa catusaccagabbhaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suññatapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3008_9: amatogadhaṃ buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi. Taṃ sutvā sakko attano pasādaṃ pavedento –
atk-s0508a2:3011: Virāgo desito dhammo, anupādāya sabbaso”ti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:3012_0: Tattha esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvā dhammaṃ mahārasanti yadipi anekavāraṃ satthu santike
atk-s0508a2:3012_1: dhammaṃ sutvā tattha abhippasanno. Idāni pana tumhehi kathitaṃ nānānayavicittatāya
atk-s0508a2:3012_2: asecanakatāya ca mahārasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā eso ahaṃ tato bhiyyo pasīdāmi. Virāgo desito
atk-s0508a2:3012_3: dhammo, anupādāya sabbasoti sabbasaṃkilesato sabbasaṅkhārato ca virajjanato virāgajananato
atk-s0508a2:3012_4: virāgo. Tato eva rūpādīsu kañci dhammaṃ anupādāya aggahetvā vimuttisādhanavasena
atk-s0508a2:3013_0: Evaṃ sakko devarājā therassa desanaṃ thometvā theraṃ abhivādetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0508a2:3013_1: Athekadivasaṃ thero micchāvitakkehi abhibhuyyamānānaṃ ekaccānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ cittācāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:3013_2: disvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtañcassa anukkamaṃ anussaritvā, attano ca sabbaso tato vinivattitamānasataṃ
atk-s0508a2:3019: Evaṃ sammanti saṅkappā, yadā paññāya passatī”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3020_0: Tattha bahūni loke citrānīti rūpādivasena tatthāpi nīlapītādivasena itthipurisādivasena
atk-s0508a2:3020_1: ca anekāni loke cittavicittāni ārammaṇajātāni. Asmiṃ pathavimaṇḍaleti paccakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3020_2: manussalokaṃ sandhāya vadati. Mathenti maññe saṅkappanti tajjaṃ purisavāyāmasahitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3020_3: araṇisahitaṃ viya aggiṃ ayonisomanasikārābhisaṅkhātāni micchāsaṅkappāni mathenti
atk-s0508a2:3020_4: maññe mathentāni viya tiṭṭhanti. Kīdisaṃ? Subhaṃ rāgūpasaṃhitaṃ, kāmavitakkanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3021_0: Rajamuhatañca vātenāti ca-iti nipātamattaṃ. Yathā gimhānaṃ pacchime māse vātena ūhataṃ
atk-s0508a2:3021_1: uṭṭhitaṃ rajaṃ mahāmegho vassanto upasammaye, vūpasameyya. Evaṃ sammanti saṅkappā,
atk-s0508a2:3021_2: yadā paññāya passatīti yadā ariyasāvako tāni lokacitrāni samudayato, assādato, ādīnavato,
atk-s0508a2:3021_3: nissaraṇato ca yathābhūtaṃ paññāya passati, atha yathā taṃ rajaṃ uhataṃ meghena,
atk-s0508a2:3021_4: evaṃ sammanti paññāya sabbepi micchāsaṅkappā. Na hi uppannāya sammādiṭṭhiyā micchāsaṅkappā
atk-s0508a2:3021_5: patiṭṭhaṃ labhanti. Yathā pana paññāya passati, taṃ dassento –
atk-s0508a2:3024: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā.
atk-s0508a2:3029: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3031_0: Tattha sabbe saṅkhārāti chaḷārammaṇasaṅgahā sabbe tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā. Aniccāti
atk-s0508a2:3031_1: “ādimajjhaantavantato, aniccantikato, tāvakālikato, tattha tattha bhijjanato na niccā”ti
atk-s0508a2:3031_2: yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati. Atha nibbindati dukkheti atha imasmiṃ vaṭṭadukkhe
atk-s0508a2:3031_3: nibbindati, nibbindanto dukkhaparijānanādividhinā saccāni paṭivijjhati. Esa maggo
atk-s0508a2:3031_4: visuddhiyāti esa yathāvutto vipassanāvidhi ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā, accantavisuddhiyā
atk-s0508a2:3032: Dukkhāti sappaṭibhayato, udayabbayasampaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato, sukhapaṭikkhepato ca dukkhā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:3033_0: Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbepi catubhūmakā dhammā anattā. Idha pana tebhūmakadhammāva
atk-s0508a2:3033_1: gahetabbā. Te hi asārato, avasavattanato, suññato, attapaṭikkhepato ca anattāti vipassitabbā.
atk-s0508a2:3034: Evaṃ vipassanāvidhiṃ dassetvā tena vidhinā katakiccaṃ attānaṃ aññaṃ viya katvā dassento –
atk-s0508a2:3040: Chetvā khilañca pāsañca, selaṃ bhetvāna dubbhidaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3041: Tiṇṇo pāraṅgato jhāyī, mutto so mārabandhanā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3043_0: Tattha buddhānubuddhoti buddhānaṃ anubuddho, sammāsambuddhehi bujjhitāni saccāni
atk-s0508a2:3043_1: tesaṃ desanānusārena bujjhatīti attho. Thirehi asekkhehi sīlasārādīhi samannāgatoti,
atk-s0508a2:3043_2: thero. Koṇḍaññoti gottakittanaṃ. Tibbanikkamoti daḷhavīriyo, thiraparakkamo. Jātimaraṇānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3043_3: pahīnakāraṇattā pahīnajātimaraṇo. Brahmacariyassa kevalīti maggabrahmacariyassa anavasesaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3043_4: anavasesato vā maggabrahmacariyassa pāripūrako, atha vā kevalī nāma kilesehi asammissatāya
atk-s0508a2:3043_5: maggañāṇaṃ phalañāṇañca, taṃ imasmiṃ atthīti kevalī. Yasmā pana tadubhayampi maggabrahmacariyassa
atk-s0508a2:3043_6: vasena hoti na aññathā, tasmā “brahmacariyassa kevalī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3044_0: Oghapāsoti “kāmogho, bhavogho, diṭṭhogho, avijjogho”ti evaṃ vuttā cattāro oghā –
atk-s0508a2:3044_1: “antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti evaṃ vutto rāgapāso ca. Daḷhakhiloti
atk-s0508a2:3044_2: “satthari kaṅkhati, dhamme kaṅkhati, saṅghe kaṅkhati, sikkhāya kaṅkhati, sabrahmacārīsu
atk-s0508a2:3044_3: kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto”ti evaṃ vutto daḷho thiro pañcavidho
atk-s0508a2:3044_4: cetokhilo ca. Pacurajanehi padāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya duppadālayo. Tato eva pabbatasadisatāya
atk-s0508a2:3044_5: pabbatoti ca saṅkhaṃ gato. “Dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā vā nayena vutto aññāṇappabhedo
atk-s0508a2:3044_6: ca. Iti etaṃ sabbaṃ chetvā khilañca pāsañcāti etesu catubbidhesu saṃkilesadhammesu
atk-s0508a2:3044_7: yo khilañca pāsañca ariyamaggañāṇāsinā chinditvā. Selaṃ bhetvāna dubbhidanti yena
atk-s0508a2:3044_8: kenaci ñāṇena chindituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aññāṇaselaṃ vajirūpamañāṇena chinditvā, cattāropi
atk-s0508a2:3044_9: oghe taritvā, tesaṃ paratīre nibbāne ṭhitattā tiṇṇo pāraṅgato. Ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena
atk-s0508a2:3044_10: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇenāti duvidhenapi jhāyī; mutto so mārabandhanāti so evarūpo
atk-s0508a2:3044_11: khīṇāsavo sabbasmāpi kilesamārabandhanā mutto vippamutto visaṃyuttoti. Attānameva
atk-s0508a2:3045_0: Athekadivasaṃ thero, attano saddhivihārikaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ akalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena
atk-s0508a2:3045_1: kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ uddhataṃ unnaḷaṃ viharantaṃ disvā, iddhiyā tattha gantvā, taṃ
atk-s0508a2:3045_2: “mā, āvuso, evaṃ kari, akalyāṇamitte pahāya kalyāṇamitte sevanto samaṇadhammaṃ karohī”ti
atk-s0508a2:3045_3: ovadi. So therassa vacanaṃ nādiyi. Thero tassa anādiyanena dhammasaṃvegappatto puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0508a2:3045_4: kathāya micchāpaṭipattiṃ garahanto sammāpaṭipattiṃ vivekavāsañca pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0508a2:3064: So me attho anuppatto, kiṃ me saddhivihārinā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3066_0: Tattha uddhatoti uddhaccayutto asamāhito vikkhittacitto. Capaloti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā
atk-s0508a2:3066_1: cāpalyena samannāgato lolapakatiko. Mitte āgamma pāpaketi akalyāṇamitte nissāya samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3066_2: akaronto. Saṃsīdati mahoghasmiṃ, ūmiyā paṭikujjitoti yathā mahāsamudde patitapuriso
atk-s0508a2:3066_3: samuddavīcīhi otthaṭo sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ alabhanto tattheva saṃsīdati, evaṃ saṃsāramahoghasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3066_4: paribbhamanto kodhupāyāsaūmiyā paṭikujjito otthaṭo vipassanāvasena paññāsīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ
atk-s0508a2:3067_0: Nipakoti nipuṇo, attatthaparatthesu kusalo. Saṃvutindriyoti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3067_1: saṃvaraṇena pihitindriyo. Kalyāṇamittoti kalyāṇehi mittehi samannāgato. Medhāvīti
atk-s0508a2:3067_2: dhammojapaññāya samaṅgībhūto. Dukkhassantakaro siyāti so tādiso sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a2:3068_1: Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Osāne pana kiṃ me saddhivihārināti attano saddhivihārikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3068_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tasmā edisena dubbacena anādarena saddhivihārinā kiṃ me payojanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3069: Evaṃ pana vatvā chaddantadahameva gato. Tattha dvādasa vassāni vasitvā upakaṭṭhe parinibbāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā tattheva gantvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0508a2:3072_0: Manussabhūtantiādikā āyasmato udāyittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:3072_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:3072_2: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā udāyīti
atk-s0508a2:3072_3: laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā, paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:3072_4: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tayo hi ime udāyittherā
atk-s0508a2:3072_5: amaccaputto pubbe āgato kāḷudāyī, kovariyaputto lāludāyī, ayaṃ brāhmaṇaputto mahāudāyīti.
atk-s0508a2:3072_6: Svāyaṃ ekadivasaṃ satthārā setavāraṇaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahājanena pasaṃsiyamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3072_7: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā nāgopamasuttante desite desanāpariyosāne attano ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3072_8: satthu guṇe anussaritvā, buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā samussāhitamānaso “ayaṃ mahājano
atk-s0508a2:3072_9: imaṃ tiracchānagataṃ nāgaṃ pasaṃsati, na buddhamahānāgaṃ. Handāhaṃ buddhamahāgandhahatthino
atk-s0508a2:3078: Devāpi taṃ namassanti, iti me arahato sutaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3086: “Nāgaṃ vo kittayissāmi, na hi āguṃ karoti so;
atk-s0508a2:3087: Soraccaṃ avihiṃsā ca, pādā nāgassa te duve.
atk-s0508a2:3096: Gacchaṃ samāhito nāgo, ṭhito nāgo samāhito.
atk-s0508a2:3099: Sabbattha saṃvuto nāgo, esā nāgassa sampadā.
atk-s0508a2:3110: “Tatheva ca loke jāto, buddho loke viharati;
atk-s0508a2:3120: Sarīraṃ vijahaṃ nāgo, parinibbissatyanāsavo”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3121_0: Tattha manussabhūtanti manussesu bhūtaṃ, nibbattaṃ; manussattabhāvaṃ vā pattaṃ. Satthā
atk-s0508a2:3121_2: “manusso”tveva voharīyatīti. Guṇavasena pana devānaṃ atidevo, brahmānaṃ atibrahmā.
atk-s0508a2:3121_3: Sambuddhanti sayameva bujjhitabbabuddhavantaṃ. Attadantanti attanāyeva dantaṃ. Bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:3121_4: hi attanāyeva uppāditena ariyamaggena cakkhutopi…pe… manatopi uttamena damathena
atk-s0508a2:3121_5: danto. Samāhitanti aṭṭhavidhena samādhinā maggaphalasamādhinā ca samāhitaṃ. Iriyamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3121_6: brahmapatheti catubbidhepi brahmavihārapathe, brahme vā seṭṭhe phalasamāpattipathe
atk-s0508a2:3121_7: samāpajjanavasena pavattamānaṃ. Kiñcāpi bhagavā na sabbakālaṃ yathāvutte brahmapathe
atk-s0508a2:3121_8: iriyati, tattha iriyasāmatthiyaṃ pana tanninnatañca upādāya “iriyamāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3121_9: Cittassūpasame ratanti cittassa upasamahetubhūte sabbasaṅkhārasamathe, nibbāne, abhirataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3121_10: Yaṃ manussā namassanti, sabbadhammāna pāragunti yaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ sabbesaṃ khandhāyatanādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3121_11: abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, pahānapāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, sacchikiriyapāragū, samāpattipāragūti
atk-s0508a2:3121_12: chadhā pāraguṃ paramukkaṃsagatasampattiṃ khattiyapaṇḍitādayo manussā namassanti.
atk-s0508a2:3121_13: Dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā pūjentā kāyena vācāya manasā ca tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā
atk-s0508a2:3121_14: honti. Devāpi taṃ namassantīti na kevalaṃ manussā eva, atha kho aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0508a2:3121_15: devāpi taṃ namassanti. Iti me arahato sutanti evaṃ mayā ārakattādīhi kāraṇehi arahato,
atk-s0508a2:3122_0: Sabbasaṃyojanātītanti sabbāni dasapi saṃyojanāni yathārahaṃ catūhi maggehi saha vāsanāya
atk-s0508a2:3122_1: atikkantaṃ. Vanā nibbanamāgatanti kilesavanato tabbirahitaṃ nibbanaṃ upagataṃ. Kāmehi
atk-s0508a2:3122_2: nekkhammaratanti sabbaso kāmehi nikkhamitvā pabbajjājhānavipassanādibhede nekkhamme
atk-s0508a2:3122_3: abhirataṃ. Muttaṃ selāva kañcananti asārato nissaṭasārasabhāvattā selato nissaṭakañcanasadisaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3123_0: Sa ve accaruci nāgoti so ekaṃsato āguṃ na karoti, punabbhavaṃ na gacchati; nāgo viya
atk-s0508a2:3123_1: balavāti. “Nāgo”ti laddhanāmo sammāsambuddho, accarucīti attano kāyaruciyā ñāṇaruciyā
atk-s0508a2:3123_2: ca sadevakaṃ lokaṃ atikkamitvā ruci, sobhi. Yathā kiṃ? Himavāvaññe siluccaye, yathā
atk-s0508a2:3123_3: hi himavā pabbatarājā attano thiragarumahāsārabhāvādīhi guṇehi aññe pabbate atirocati,
atk-s0508a2:3123_4: evaṃ atirocatīti attho. Sabbesaṃ nāganāmānanti ahināgahatthināgapurisanāgānaṃ, sekhāsekhapaccekabuddhanāgānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3123_5: vā. Saccanāmoti sacceneva nāganāmo. Taṃ pana saccanāmataṃ “na hi āguṃ karotī”tiādinā sayameva vakkhati.
atk-s0508a2:3124_0: Idāni buddhanāgaṃ avayavato ca dassento nāmato tāva dassetuṃ “na hi āguṃ karoti so”ti
atk-s0508a2:3124_1: āha. Yasmā āguṃ, pāpaṃ, sabbena sabbaṃ na karoti, tasmā nāgoti attho. Soraccanti
atk-s0508a2:3124_2: sīlaṃ. Avihiṃsāti karuṇā. Tadubhayaṃ sabbassapi guṇarāsissa pubbaṅgamanti, katvā
atk-s0508a2:3124_3: buddhanāgassa purimapādabhāvo tassa yuttoti āha “pādā nāgassa te duve”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3125_0: Aparapādabhāvena vadanto “sati ca sampajaññañca, caraṇā nāgassa tepare”ti āha. “Tyāpare”ti
atk-s0508a2:3125_1: vā pāṭho. Te aparetveva padavibhāgo. Anavajjadhammānaṃ ādāne saddhā hattho etassāti,
atk-s0508a2:3125_2: saddhāhattho. Suparisuddhavedanā ñāṇappabhedā upekkhā setadantā te etassa atthīti, upekkhāsetadantavā.
atk-s0508a2:3126_0: Uttamaṅgaṃ paññā, tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ satīti āha “sati gīvā siro paññā”ti. Vīmaṃsā
atk-s0508a2:3126_1: dhammacintanāti yathā khāditabbākhāditabbassa soṇḍāya parāmasanaṃ ghāyanañca hatthināgassa
atk-s0508a2:3126_2: vīmaṃsā nāma hoti, evaṃ buddhanāgassa kusalādidhammacintanā vīmaṃsā. Samā vasanti
atk-s0508a2:3126_3: etthāti, samāvāso, bhājanaṃ kucchi eva samāvāso, abhiññāsamathānaṃ ādhānabhāvato
atk-s0508a2:3126_4: samathavipassanāsaṅkhāto dhammo kucchisamāvāso etassāti dhammakucchisamāvāso. Vivekoti
atk-s0508a2:3127_0: Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanasīlo. Assāsaratoti paramassāsabhūte nibbāne
atk-s0508a2:3127_1: rato. Ajjhattaṃ susamāhitoti visayajjhatte phalasamāpattiyaṃ suṭṭhu samāhito tadidaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3127_2: samādhānaṃ suṭṭhu sabbakālikanti dassetuṃ “gacchaṃ samāhito nāgo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:3127_3: hi savāsanassa uddhaccassa pahīnattā vikkhepābhāvato niccaṃ samāhitova. Tasmā yaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3127_4: yaṃ iriyāpathaṃ kappeti, taṃ taṃ samāhitova kappesīti.
atk-s0508a2:3128_0: Sabbatthāti, sabbasmiṃ gocare, sabbasmiñca dvāre sabbaso pihitavutti. Tenāha – “sabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3128_1: kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatta”ntiādi. Esā nāgassa sampadāti esā “na
atk-s0508a2:3128_2: hi āguṃ karoti so”tiādinā “sambuddha”ntiādinā eva vā yathāvuttā vakkhamānā ca buddhagandhahatthino
atk-s0508a2:3129_0: Bhuñjati anavajjānīti sammājīvassa ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā bhuñjati agarahitabbāni,
atk-s0508a2:3129_1: micchājīvassa sabbaso savāsanānañca pahīnattā sāvajjāni garahitabbāni na bhuñjati
atk-s0508a2:3129_2: anavajjāni bhuñjanto ca sannidhiṃ parivajjayaṃ bhuñjatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3130_0: Saṃyojananti vaṭṭadukkhena saddhiṃ santānaṃ saṃyojanato vaṭṭe osīdāpanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3130_1: dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ. Aṇuṃ thūlanti khuddakañceva mahantañca. Sabbaṃ chetvāna
atk-s0508a2:3130_2: bandhananti maggañāṇena anavasesaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ chinditvā. Yena yenāti yena yena disābhāgena.
atk-s0508a2:3131_0: Yathā hi udake jātaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ udake pavaḍḍhati nopalippati toyena, anupalepasabhāvattā,
atk-s0508a2:3131_1: tatheva loke jāto buddho loke viharati, nopalippati lokena taṇhādiṭṭhimānalepābhāvatoti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3133_0: Atthassāyaṃ viññāpanīti satthu guṇasaṅkhātassa upameyyatthassa viññāpanī, pakāsanī
atk-s0508a2:3133_1: ayaṃ nāgūpamā. Viññūhīti satthu paṭividdhacatusaccadhammaṃ parijānantehi attānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3133_2: sandhāya vadati. Viññissantītiādi kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā nāgena mayā desitaṃ nāgaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3133_3: tathāgatagandhahatthiṃ mahānāgā khīṇāsavā attano visaye ṭhatvā vijānissanti, tasmā
atk-s0508a2:3133_4: aññesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ ayaṃ upamā amhehi bhāsitāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:3134_0: Sarīraṃ vijahaṃ nāgo, parinibbissatyanāsavoti bodhimūle saupādisesaparinibbānena
atk-s0508a2:3134_1: anāsavo sammāsambuddhanāgo, idāni sarīraṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahanto khandhaparinibbānena parinibbāyissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3135: Evaṃ cuddasahi upamāhi maṇḍetvā, soḷasahi gāthāhi, catusaṭṭhiyā pādehi satthu guṇe vaṇṇento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:3140_0: Vīsatinipāte yaññatthaṃ vātiādikā āyasmato aparassa adhimuttattherassa gāthā. Kā
atk-s0508a2:3140_1: uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0508a2:3140_2: atthadassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari
atk-s0508a2:3140_3: parinibbute bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upaṭṭhahanto mahādānāni pavattesi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a2:3140_4: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde āyasmato saṃkiccattherassa bhaginiyā
atk-s0508a2:3140_5: kucchimhi nibbatti, adhimuttotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto mātulattherassa santike
atk-s0508a2:3140_6: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃyeva ṭhito arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3150_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento upasampajjitukāmo “mātaraṃ āpucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:3150_1: mātu santikaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge devatāya balikammakaraṇatthaṃ maṃsapariyesanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3150_2: carantehi pañcasatehi corehi samāgacchi. Corā ca taṃ aggahesuṃ “devatāya bali bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3150_3: So corehi gahitopi abhīto acchambhī vippasannamukhova aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ disvā coragāmaṇiacchariyabbhutacittajāto pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0508a2:3152: “Yaññatthaṃ vā dhanatthaṃ vā, ye hanāma mayaṃ pure;
atk-s0508a2:3153: Avasesaṃ bhayaṃ hoti, vedhanti vilapanti ca.
atk-s0508a2:3155: “Tassa te natthi bhītattaṃ, bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdati;
atk-s0508a2:3156: Kasmā na paridevesi, evarūpe mahabbhaye”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3157_0: Tattha yaññatthanti yajanatthaṃ devatānaṃ balikammakaraṇatthaṃ vā. Vā-saddo vikappanattho.
atk-s0508a2:3157_1: Dhanatthanti sāpateyyaharaṇatthaṃ. Ye hanāma mayaṃ pureti ye satte mayaṃ pubbe hanimha.
atk-s0508a2:3157_2: Atītatthe hi idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ. Avaseti avase aserike katvā. Tanti tesaṃ. “Avasesanti”pi
atk-s0508a2:3157_3: paṭhanti. Amhehi gahitesu taṃ ekaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesānaṃ; ayameva vā pāṭho. Bhayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3157_4: hotīti maraṇabhayaṃ hoti. Yena te vedhanti vilapanti,cittutrāsena vedhanti, “sāmi,
atk-s0508a2:3157_5: tumhākaṃ idañcidañca dassāma, dāsā bhavissāmā”tiādikaṃ vadantā vilapanti.
atk-s0508a2:3158_0: Tassa teti yo tvaṃ amhehi devatāya balikammatthaṃ jīvitā voropetukāmehi ukkhittāsikehi
atk-s0508a2:3158_1: santajjito, tassa te. Bhītattanti bhītabhāvo, bhayanti attho. Bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdatīti
atk-s0508a2:3158_2: pakativaṇṇato uparipi te mukhavaṇṇo vippasīdati. Therassa kira tadā “sace ime māressanti,
atk-s0508a2:3158_3: idānevāhaṃ anupādāya parinibbāyissāmi, dukkhabhāro vigacchissatī”ti uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3158_4: uppajji. Evarūpe mahabbhayeti edise mahati maraṇabhaye upaṭṭhite. Hetuatthe vā etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3159: Idāni thero coragāmaṇissa paṭivacanadānamukhena dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a2:3165: Na bhayaṃ maraṇe hoti, bhāranikkhepane yathā.
atk-s0508a2:3168: Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, rogānamiva saṅkhaye.
atk-s0508a2:3171: Nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhā, visaṃ pitvāva chaḍḍitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3174: Tuṭṭho āyukkhayā hoti, mutto āghātanā yathā.
atk-s0508a2:3177: Ādittāva gharā mutto, maraṇasmiṃ na socati.
atk-s0508a2:3179: “Yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñci, bhavo vā yattha labbhati;
atk-s0508a2:3180: Sabbaṃ anissaraṃ etaṃ, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
atk-s0508a2:3182: “Yo taṃ tathā pajānāti, yathā buddhena desitaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3183: Na gaṇhāti bhavaṃ kiñci, sutattaṃva ayoguḷaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3189: Passantassa yathābhūtaṃ, na bhayaṃ hoti gāmaṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3192: Mamattaṃ so asaṃvindaṃ, ‘natthi me’ti na socati.
atk-s0508a2:3195: Soyaṃ bhijjissati kāyo, añño ca na bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:3197: “Yaṃ vo kiccaṃ sarīrena, taṃ karotha yadicchatha;
atk-s0508a2:3198: Na me tappaccayā tattha, doso pemañca hehitī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3203: Ayaṃ saṅgītikārehi vuttagāthā. Ito aparā tisso corānaṃ, therassa ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā –
atk-s0508a2:3205: “Kiṃ bhadante karitvāna, ko vā ācariyo tava;
atk-s0508a2:3214: “Sutvāna corā isino subhāsitaṃ, nikkhippa satthāni ca āvudhāni ca;
atk-s0508a2:3215: Tamhā ca kammā viramiṃsu eke, eke ca pabbajjamarocayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:3217: “Te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsane, bhāvetva bojjhaṅgabalāni paṇḍitā;
atk-s0508a2:3218: Udaggacittā sumanā katindriyā, phusiṃsu nibbānapadaṃ asaṅkhata”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:3220_0: Tattha natthi cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, anapekkhassa, gāmaṇīti gāmaṇi, apekkhāya, taṇhāya,
atk-s0508a2:3220_1: abhāvena anapekkhassa mādisassa, lohitasabhāvo pubbo viya, cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3220_2: natthi, domanassābhāvāpadesena bhayābhāvaṃ vadati. Tenāha “atikkantā bhayā sabbe”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3220_3: Atikkantā bhayā sabbeti khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato pañcavīsati mahābhayā, aññe ca
atk-s0508a2:3220_4: sabbepi bhayā ekaṃsena atikkantā atītā, apagatāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3221_1: maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhe. Maraṇeti maraṇahetu. Bhāranikkhepane yathāti yathā
atk-s0508a2:3221_2: koci puriso sīse ṭhitena mahatā garubhārena saṃsīdanto tassa nikkhepane, apanayane
atk-s0508a2:3221_3: na bhāyati, evaṃ sampadamidanti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0508a2:3224_0: Suciṇṇanti suṭṭhu caritaṃ. Brahmacariyanti, sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3224_1: Tato eva maggo cāpi subhāvito aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggopi sammadeva bhāvito. Rogānamiva
atk-s0508a2:3224_2: saṅkhayeti yathā bahūhi rogehi abhibhūtassa āturassa rogānaṃ saṅkhaye pītisomanassameva
atk-s0508a2:3224_3: hoti, evaṃ khandharogasaṅkhaye maraṇe mādisassa bhayaṃ natthi.
atk-s0508a2:3225_0: Nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhāti tīhi dukkhatāhi abhibhūtā, ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā, tayo
atk-s0508a2:3225_1: bhavā nirassādā, assādarahitā, mayā diṭṭhā. Visaṃ pitvāva chaḍḍitanti pamādavasena
atk-s0508a2:3225_2: visaṃ pivitvā tādisena payogena chaḍḍitaṃ viya maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3226_0: Mutto āghātanā yathāti yathā corehi māraṇatthaṃ āghātanaṃ nīto kenaci upāyena tato
atk-s0508a2:3226_1: mutto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hoti, evaṃ saṃsārapāraṃ, nibbānaṃ, gatattā pāragū, catūhipi upādānehi
atk-s0508a2:3226_2: anupādāno, pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā katakicco kāmāsavādīhi anāsavo,
atk-s0508a2:3227_0: Uttamanti seṭṭhaṃ. Dhammatanti, dhammasabhāvaṃ. Arahatte siddhe sijjhanahetu iṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0508a2:3227_2: loke. Anatthikoti, anapekkho. Ādittāva gharā muttoti yathā koci puriso samantato
atk-s0508a2:3227_3: ādittato pajjalitato gehato nissaṭo, tato nissaraṇanimittaṃ na socati, evaṃ khīṇāsavo
atk-s0508a2:3228_0: Yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñcīti yaṃkiñci imasmiṃ loke atthi, vijjati, upalabbhati saṅgataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3228_1: sattehi saṅkhārehi vā samāgamo, samodhānaṃ. “Saṅkhata”ntipi pāṭho, tassa yaṃkiñci
atk-s0508a2:3228_2: paccayehi samacca sambhuyya kataṃ, paṭiccasamuppannanti attho. Bhavo vā yattha labbhatīti
atk-s0508a2:3228_3: yasmiṃ sattanikāye yo upapattibhavo labbhati. Sabbaṃ anissaraṃ etanti sabbametaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3228_4: issararahitaṃ, na ettha kenaci “evaṃ hotū”ti issariyaṃ vattetuṃ sakkā. Iti vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3228_5: mahesināti “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. Tasmā “anissaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:3228_6: eta”nti pajānanto maraṇasmiṃ na socatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3229_0: Na gaṇhāti bhavaṃ kiñcīti yo ariyasāvako “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā yathā buddhena
atk-s0508a2:3229_1: bhagavatā desitaṃ, tathā taṃ bhavattayaṃ vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pajānāti.
atk-s0508a2:3229_2: So yathā koci puriso sukhakāmo divasaṃ santattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ hatthena na gaṇhāti, evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3229_3: kiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhavaṃ na gaṇhāti, na tattha taṇhaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3230_0: Na me hoti “ahosi”nti “atītamaddhānaṃ ahaṃ īdiso ahosi”nti attadiṭṭhivasena na me
atk-s0508a2:3230_1: cittappavatti atthi diṭṭhiyā sammadeva ugghāṭitattā, dhammasabhāvassa ca sudiṭṭhattā.
atk-s0508a2:3230_2: “Bhavissa”nti na hoti meti tato eva “anāgatamaddhānaṃ ahaṃ ediso kathaṃ nu kho bhavissaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3230_3: bhaveyya”nti evampi me na hoti. Saṅkhārā vigamissantīti evaṃ pana hoti “yathāpaccayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3230_4: pavattamānā saṅkhārāva, na ettha koci attā vā attaniyaṃ vā, te ca kho vigamissanti,
atk-s0508a2:3230_5: vinassissanti, khaṇe khaṇe bhijjissantī”ti. Tattha kā paridevanāti evaṃ passantassa
atk-s0508a2:3230_6: mādisassa tattha saṅkhāragate kā nāma paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:3231_0: Suddhanti kevalaṃ, attasārena asammissaṃ. Dhammasamuppādanti paccayapaccayuppannadhammasamuppattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3231_2: Passantassa yathābhūtanti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya yāthāvato jānantassa.
atk-s0508a2:3232_0: Tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ lokanti yathā araññe apariggahe tiṇakaṭṭhe kenaci gayhamāne aparassa
atk-s0508a2:3232_1: “mayhaṃ santakaṃ ayaṃ gaṇhatī”ti na hoti, evaṃ so asāmikatāya tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ saṅkhāralokaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3232_2: yadā paññāya passati, so tattha mamattaṃ asaṃvindaṃ asaṃvindanto alabhanto akaronto.
atk-s0508a2:3232_3: Natthi meti “ahu vata sohaṃ, taṃ me natthī”ti na socati.
atk-s0508a2:3233_0: Ukkaṇṭhāmi sarīrenāti asārakena abhinudena dukkhena akataññunā asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlasabhāvena
atk-s0508a2:3233_1: iminā kāyena ukkaṇṭhāmi imaṃ kāyaṃ nibbindanto evaṃ tiṭṭhāmi. Bhavenamhi anatthikoti
atk-s0508a2:3233_2: sabbenapi bhavena anatthiko amhi, na kiñci bhavaṃ patthemi. Soyaṃ bhijjissati kāyoti
atk-s0508a2:3233_3: ayaṃ mama kāyo idāni tumhākaṃ payogena aññathā vā aññattha bhijjissati. Añño ca na
atk-s0508a2:3233_4: bhavissatīti añño kāyo mayhaṃ āyatiṃ na bhavissati, punabbhavābhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:3234_0: Yaṃ vo kiccaṃ sarīrenāti yaṃ tumhākaṃ iminā sarīrena payojanaṃ, taṃ karotha yadicchatha,
atk-s0508a2:3234_1: icchatha ce. Na me tappaccayāti, taṃ nimittaṃ imassa sarīrassa tumhehi yathicchitakiccassa
atk-s0508a2:3234_2: karaṇahetu. Tatthāti tesu karontesu ca akarontesu ca. Doso pemañca hehitīti yathākkamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3234_3: paṭigho anunayo na bhavissati, attano bhave apekkhāya sabbaso pahīnattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:3234_4: Aññapaccayā aññattha ca paṭighānunayesu asantesupi tappaccayā, “tatthā”ti vacanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3235_0: Tassāti adhimuttattherassa. Taṃ vacananti “natthi cetasikaṃ dukkha”ntiādikaṃ maraṇe
atk-s0508a2:3235_1: bhayābhāvādidīpakaṃ, tato eva abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā. Māṇavāti corā.
atk-s0508a2:3235_2: Corā hi “māṇavā”ti vuccanti “māṇavehi saha gacchanti katakammehi akatakammehipī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a2:3236_0: Kiṃ bhadante karitvānāti, bhante, kiṃ nāma tapokammaṃ katvā. Ko vā tava ācariyo kassa
atk-s0508a2:3236_1: sāsanaṃ, ovādaṃ nissāya ayaṃ asokatā maraṇakāle sokābhāvo labbhatīti etaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3237_0: Taṃ sutvā thero tesaṃ paṭivacanaṃ dento “sabbaññū”tiādimāha. Tattha sabbaññūti paropadesena
atk-s0508a2:3237_2: adhigamena atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti, sabbaññū. Teneva samantacakkhunā sabbassa
atk-s0508a2:3237_3: dassanato sabbadassāvī. Yamhi anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, tadeva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, nattheva asādhāraṇañāṇapāḷiyā
atk-s0508a2:3237_4: virodho visayuppattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā
atk-s0508a2:3237_5: vuttattā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato vuttamevāti
atk-s0508a2:3237_6: tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Pañcannampi mārānaṃ vijayato jino, hīnādivibhāgabhinne
atk-s0508a2:3237_7: sabbasmiṃ sattanikāye adhimuttavuttitāya mahatiyā karuṇāya samannāgatattā mahākāruṇiko,
atk-s0508a2:3237_8: diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ veneyyānaṃ anusāsanato satthā, tato
atk-s0508a2:3237_9: eva sabbalokassa kilesarogatikicchanato sabbalokatikicchako, sammāsambuddho ācariyo
atk-s0508a2:3238_0: Evaṃ therena satthu sāsanassa ca guṇe pakāsite paṭiladdhasaddhā ekacce corā pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:3238_1: ekacce upāsakattaṃ pavedesuṃ. Tamatthaṃ dīpento dhammasaṅgāhakā “sutvāna corā”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:3238_2: dve gāthā abhāsiṃsu. Tattha isinoti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena isino, adhimuttattherassa.
atk-s0508a2:3238_3: Nikkhippāti pahāya. Satthāni ca āvudhāni cāti asiādisatthāni ceva dhanukalāpādiāvudhāni
atk-s0508a2:3238_4: ca. Tamhā ca kammāti tato corakammato.
atk-s0508a2:3239_0: Te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsaneti te corā sobhanagamanatādīhi sugatassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:3239_1: sāsane pabbajjaṃ upagantvā. Bhāvanāvisesādhigatāya odagyalakkhaṇāya pītiyā samannāgamena
atk-s0508a2:3239_2: udaggacittā. Sumanāti somanassappattā. Katindriyāti bhāvitindriyā. Phusiṃsūti aggamaggādhigamena
atk-s0508a2:3239_3: asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchiṃsu. Adhimutto kira core nibbisevane katvā, te tattheva
atk-s0508a2:3239_4: ṭhapetvā, mātu santikaṃ gantvā, mātaraṃ āpucchitvā, paccāgantvā tehi saddhiṃ upajjhāyassa
atk-s0508a2:3239_5: santikaṃ gantvā, pabbājetvā upasampadaṃ akāsi. Atha tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi, te
atk-s0508a2:3239_6: nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “pabbajitvā…pe… asaṅkhata”nti.
atk-s0508a2:3242_0: Samaṇassa ahu cintātiādikā āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:3242_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā
atk-s0508a2:3242_2: sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa
atk-s0508a2:3242_3: putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa vayappattassa gottavasena pārāpariyotveva samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:3242_4: So tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato. Ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanākāle
atk-s0508a2:3242_5: jetavanavihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā indriyabhāvanāsuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3242_6: desesi. So taṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. Taṃ suttaṃ uggahetvā tadatthamanucintesi.
atk-s0508a2:3242_7: Yathā pana anucintesi, svāyamattho gāthāsu eva āvi bhavissati. So tathā anuvicintento
atk-s0508a2:3242_8: āyatanamukhena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto. Aparabhāge attanā
atk-s0508a2:3248: Attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye.
atk-s0508a2:3254: Attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye.
atk-s0508a2:3257: Anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati.
atk-s0508a2:3260: Anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati.
atk-s0508a2:3263: Na so muccati dukkhamhā, gandhesu adhimucchito.
atk-s0508a2:3271: “Manaṃ cetehi dhammehi, yo na sakkoti rakkhituṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3286: “So atthavā so dhammaṭṭho, so dakkho so vicakkhaṇo;
atk-s0508a2:3290: Na taṃ kiccanti maññitvā, appamatto vicakkhaṇo.
atk-s0508a2:3292: “Yañca atthena saññuttaṃ, yā ca dhammagatā rati;
atk-s0508a2:3293: Taṃ samādāya vattetha, sā hi ve uttamā rati.
atk-s0508a2:3296: Hantvā vadhitvā atha socayitvā, ālopati sāhasā yo paresaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3302: Pañca pañcahi hantvāna, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0508a2:3305: Sabbena sabbaṃ buddhassa, so naro sukhamedhatī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3306_0: Tattha samaṇassāti pabbajitassa. Ahūti ahosi. Cintāti dhammacintā dhammavicāraṇā.
atk-s0508a2:3306_2: bhayaṃ ikkhanasīlassa. Ekakassāti asahāyassa, etena kāyavivekaṃ dasseti. Pavivittassāti
atk-s0508a2:3306_3: pavivekahetunā kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanena vivekaṃ āraddhassa, etena cittavivekaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:3306_4: Tenāha “jhāyino”ti. Jhāyinoti jhāyanasīlassa, yonisomanasikāresu yuttassāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3306_5: Sabbametaṃ thero attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3307_0: “Kimānupubba”ntiādinā taṃ cintanaṃ dasseti. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ tāva kimānupubbanti
atk-s0508a2:3307_1: anupubbaṃ anukkamo, anupubbameva vakkhamānesu vatasamācāresu ko anukkamo, kena anukkamena
atk-s0508a2:3307_2: te paṭipajjitabbāti attho. Puriso kiṃ vataṃ kiṃ samācāranti atthakāmo puriso samādiyitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a2:3307_3: “vata”nti laddhanāmaṃ, kīdisaṃ sīlaṃ samācāraṃ, samācaranto, attano kiccakārī kattabbakārī
atk-s0508a2:3307_4: assa, kañci sattaṃ na ca viheṭhaye, na bādheyyāti attho. Attano kiccaṃ nāma samaṇadhammo,
atk-s0508a2:3307_5: saṅkhepato sīlasamādhipaññā, taṃ sampādentassa paraviheṭhanāya lesopi natthi tāya
atk-s0508a2:3308_0: Yathāha bhagavā – “na hi pabbajito parūpaghātī, na samaṇo hoti paraṃ viheṭhayanto”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3308_1: Ettha ca vataggahaṇena vārittasīlaṃ gahitaṃ, samācāraggahaṇena samācaritabbato cārittasīlena
atk-s0508a2:3308_2: saddhiṃ jhānavipassanādi, tasmā vārittasīlaṃ padhānaṃ. Tatthāpi ca yasmā indriyasaṃvare
atk-s0508a2:3308_3: siddhe sabbaṃ sīlaṃ surakkhitaṃ, sugopitameva hoti, tasmā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ tāva
atk-s0508a2:3308_4: dassetukāmo indriyānaṃ arakkhaṇe rakkhaṇe ca ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento “indriyāni
atk-s0508a2:3308_5: manussāna”ntiādimāha. Tattha indriyānīti rakkhitabbadhammanidassanaṃ, tasmā cakkhādīni
atk-s0508a2:3308_6: cha indriyānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Manussānanti rakkhaṇayogyapuggalanidassanaṃ. Hitāyāti
atk-s0508a2:3308_7: atthāya. Ahitāyāti anatthāya. Hontīti vacanaseso. Kathaṃ pana tāniyeva hitāya ca
atk-s0508a2:3308_8: ahitāya hontīti āha “rakkhitānī”tiādi. Tassattho – yassa cakkhādīni indriyāni satikavāṭena
atk-s0508a2:3308_9: apihitāni, tassa rūpādīsu abhijjhādipāpadhammapavattiyā dvārabhāvato anatthāya pihitāni,
atk-s0508a2:3309_0: Indriyāneva sārakkhanti yasmā indriyasaṃvaro paripuṇṇo sīlasampadaṃ paripūreti, sīlasampadā
atk-s0508a2:3309_1: paripuṇṇā samādhisampadaṃ paripūreti, samādhisampadā paripuṇṇā paññāsampadaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0508a2:3309_2: tasmā indriyārakkhā attahitapaṭipattiyāva mūlanti dassento āha “indriyāneva sārakkha”nti.
atk-s0508a2:3309_3: Satipubbaṅgamena ārakkhena saṃrakkhanto yonisomanasikārena indriyāni eva tāva sammadeva
atk-s0508a2:3309_4: rakkhanto, yathā akusalacorā tehi tehi dvārehi pavisitvā cittasantāne kusalaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3309_5: na vilumpanti, tathā tāni pidahantoti attho. Sārakkhanti ca saṃ-saddassa sābhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3309_6: katvā vuttaṃ, “sārāgo”tiādīsu viya. “Saṃrakkha”nti ca pāṭho. Indriyāni ca gopayanti
atk-s0508a2:3309_7: tasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ, pariyāyavacane payojanaṃ nettiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0508a2:3309_8: veditabbaṃ. “Attano kiccakārīssā”ti iminā attahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti, “na ca kañci
atk-s0508a2:3309_9: viheṭhaye”ti iminā parahitapaṭipattiṃ, ubhayenāpi vā attahitapaṭipattimeva dasseti
atk-s0508a2:3309_10: parāviheṭhanassāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato. Atha vā padadvayenapi attahitapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3309_11: dasseti puthujjanassa sekkhassa ca parahitapaṭipattiyāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:3310_0: Evaṃ rakkhitāni indriyāni hitāya hontīti vodānapakkhaṃ saṅkhepeneva dassetvā, arakkhitāni
atk-s0508a2:3310_1: ahitāya hontīti saṃkilesapakkhaṃ pana vibhajitvā dassento “cakkhundriyaṃ ce”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3310_2: Tattha cakkhundriyaṃ ce rūpesu, gacchantaṃ anivārayaṃ. Anādīnavadassāvīti yo nīlapītādibhedesu
atk-s0508a2:3310_3: iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu rūpāyatanesu gacchantaṃ yathāruci pavattantaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ anivārayaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3310_4: anivārayanto appaṭibāhanto tathāpavattiyaṃ ādīnavadassāvī na hoti ce, diṭṭhadhammikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3310_5: samparāyikañca ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ na passati ce. “Gacchantaṃ nivāraye anissaraṇadassāvī”ti
atk-s0508a2:3310_6: ca pāṭho. Tattha yo “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti vuttavidhinā diṭṭhamatteyeva
atk-s0508a2:3310_7: ṭhatvā satisampajaññavasena rūpāyatane pavattamāno tattha nissaraṇadassāvī nāma.
atk-s0508a2:3310_8: Vuttavipariyāyena anissaraṇadassāvī daṭṭhabbo. So dukkhā na hi muccatīti so evarūpo
atk-s0508a2:3310_9: puggalo vaṭṭadukkhato na muccateva. Ettha ca cakkhundriyassa anivāraṇaṃ nāma yathā
atk-s0508a2:3310_10: tena dvārena abhijjhādayo pāpadhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tathā pavattanaṃ, taṃ pana atthato
atk-s0508a2:3310_11: satisampajaññassa anuṭṭhāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesindriyesupi eseva nayo. Adhimucchitoti
atk-s0508a2:3310_12: adhimuttataṇhāya mucchaṃ āpanno. Ambilanti ambilarasaṃ. Madhuragganti madhurarasakoṭṭhāsaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3310_13: Tathā tittakaggaṃ. Anussaranti assādavasena taṃ taṃ rasaṃ anuvicintento. Ganthitoti
atk-s0508a2:3310_14: rasataṇhāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rase ganthito bandho. “Gadhito”ti ca paṭhanti, gedhaṃ āpannoti
atk-s0508a2:3310_15: attho. Hadayaṃ nāvabujjhatīti “dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti pabbajjādikkhaṇe uppannaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3310_16: cittaṃ na jānāti na sallakkheti, sāsanassa hadayaṃ abbhantaraṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3310_17: sammaddanarasataṇhāya gadhito nāvabujjhati na jānāti, na paṭipajjatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3311_0: Subhānīti sundarāni. Appaṭikūlānīti manoramāni, iṭṭhāni. Phoṭṭhabbānīti upādiṇṇānupādiṇṇappabhede
atk-s0508a2:3311_1: phasse. Rattoti rajjanasabhāvena rāgena ratto. Rāgādhikaraṇanti rāgahetu. Vividhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3311_2: vindate dukhanti rāgapariḷāhādivasena diṭṭhadhammikañca nirayasantāpādivasena abhisamparāyañca
atk-s0508a2:3312_0: Manaṃ cetehīti manañca etehi rūpārammaṇādīhi dhammārammaṇappabhedehi ca. Nanti puggalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3312_1: Sabbehīti sabbehi pañcahipi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo puggalo manaṃ, manodvāraṃ, etehi
atk-s0508a2:3312_2: yathāvuttehi rūpādīhi pañcahi dhammehi dhammārammaṇappabhedato ca. Tattha pavattanakapāpakammanivāraṇena
atk-s0508a2:3312_3: rakkhituṃ, gopituṃ na sakkoti, tato tassa arakkhaṇato naṃ puggalaṃ taṃnimittaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3312_4: anveti, anugacchati, anugacchantañca etehi pañcahipi rūpārammaṇādīhi chaṭṭhārammaṇena
atk-s0508a2:3312_5: saddhiṃ sabbehipi ārammaṇappaccayabhūtehi anugacchatīti. Ettha cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyañca
atk-s0508a2:3312_7: ce paṭisevatī”tiādinā vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi ca rasataṇhā ca phoṭṭhabbataṇhā ca sattānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3312_8: visesato balavatīti “rasataṇhāya gadhito, phoṭṭhabbāni anussarantoti” vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3313_0: Evaṃ aguttadvārassa puggalassa chahi dvārehi chasupi ārammaṇesu asaṃvaranimittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3313_1: uppajjanakadukkhaṃ dassetvā svāyamasaṃvaro yasmā sarīrasabhāvānavabodhena hoti, tasmā
atk-s0508a2:3313_3: – sarīraṃ nāmetaṃ pubbena lohitena ca sampuṇṇaṃ bharitaṃ aññena ca pittasemhādinā
atk-s0508a2:3313_4: bahunā kuṇapena, tayidaṃ naravīrena naresu chekena sippācariyena kataṃ vaggu maṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3313_5: lākhāparikammādinā cittitaṃ, anto pana gūthādiasucibharitaṃ samuggaṃ viya chavimattamanoharaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3313_6: bālajanasammohaṃ dukkhasabhāvatāya nirayādidukkhatāpanato ca kaṭukaṃ, parikappasambhavena
atk-s0508a2:3313_7: amūlakena assādamattena madhuratāya madhurassādaṃ, tato eva piyabhāvanibandhanena
atk-s0508a2:3313_8: piyanibandhanaṃ, dussahatāya appatītatāya ca dukhaṃ, īdise sarīre assādalobhena mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3313_9: paccanubhuyyamānaṃ anavabujjhanto loko madhuragiddho khuradhārālehakapuriso viya daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0508a2:3314_0: Idāni ete cakkhādīnaṃ gocarabhūtā rūpādayo vuttā, te visesato purisassa itthipaṭibaddhā
atk-s0508a2:3314_1: kamanīyāti tattha saṃvaro kātabboti dassento “itthirūpe”tiādimāha. Tattha itthirūpeti
atk-s0508a2:3314_2: itthiyā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpāyatanasaṅkhāte vaṇṇe. Api ca yo koci itthiyā nivatthassa
atk-s0508a2:3314_3: alaṅkārassa vā gandhavaṇṇakādīnaṃ vā piḷandhanamālānaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddho vaṇṇo purisassa
atk-s0508a2:3314_5: Itthisareti itthiyā gītalapitahasitaruditasadde. Api ca itthiyā nivatthavatthassapi
atk-s0508a2:3314_7: itthisaraggahaṇena gahitāti veditabbā. Sabbopeso purisassa cittaṃ ākaḍḍhatīti. “Itthirase”ti
atk-s0508a2:3314_8: pana pāḷiyā catusamuṭṭhānikarasāyatanavasena vuttaṃ. Itthiyā kiṃkārapaṭissāvitādivasena
atk-s0508a2:3314_9: assavaraso ceva paribhogaraso ca itthirasoti eke. Yo pana itthiyā oṭṭhamaṃsasammakkhitakheḷādiraso,
atk-s0508a2:3314_10: yo ca tāya purisassa dinnayāgubhattādīnaṃ raso, sabbopeso “itthiraso”tveva veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:3314_11: Phoṭṭhabbepi ca itthiyā kāyasamphasso, itthisarīrārūḷhānaṃ vatthālaṅkāramālādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3314_12: phasso “itthiphoṭṭhabbo”tveva veditabbo. Ettha ca yesaṃ itthirūpe itthisareti pāḷi,
atk-s0508a2:3314_13: tesaṃ api-saddena itthirasasaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Itthigandhesūti itthiyā catusamuṭṭhānikagandhāyatanesu.
atk-s0508a2:3314_14: Itthiyā sarīragandho nāma duggandho. Ekaccā hi itthī assagandhinī hoti, ekaccā meṇḍagandhinī,
atk-s0508a2:3314_15: ekaccā sedagandhinī, ekaccā soṇitagandhinī, tathāpi tāsu andhabālo rajjateva. Cakkavattino
atk-s0508a2:3314_16: pana itthiratanassa kāyato candanagandho vāyati, mukhato uppalagandho, ayaṃ na sabbāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3314_17: hotīti, itthiyā sarīre ārūḷho āgantuko anulimpanādigandho “itthigandho”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:3314_18: Sārattoti suṭṭhu ratto gadhito mucchito, idaṃ pana padaṃ “itthirūpe”tiādīsupi yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3314_19: Vividhaṃ vindate dukhanti itthirūpādīsu sarāganimittaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vadhabandhanādivasena
atk-s0508a2:3315_0: Itthisotāni sabbānīti itthiyā rūpādiārammaṇāni sabbāni anavasesāni pañca taṇhāsotāni
atk-s0508a2:3315_1: sandanti. Pañcasūti purisassa pañcasu dvāresu. Tesanti tesaṃ pañcannaṃ sotānaṃ. Āvaraṇanti
atk-s0508a2:3315_2: saṃvaraṇaṃ, yathā asaṃvaro na uppajjati, evaṃ satisampajaññaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā saṃvaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:3315_3: pavattetuṃ yo sakkoti, so vīriyavā āraddhavīriyo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3316_0: Evaṃ rūpādigocare pabbajitassa paṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni gahaṭṭhassa dassetuṃ “so
atk-s0508a2:3316_1: atthavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha so atthavā so dhammaṭṭho, so dakkho so vicakkhaṇoti
atk-s0508a2:3316_2: so puggalo imasmiṃ loke atthavā, buddhimā, dhamme ṭhito, dhamme dakkho, dhamme cheko,
atk-s0508a2:3316_3: analaso vā vicakkhaṇo iti kattabbatāsu kusalo nāma. Kareyya ramamānopi, kiccaṃ dhammatthasaṃhitanti
atk-s0508a2:3316_4: geharatiyā ramamānopi dhammatthasaṃhitaṃ dhammato atthato ca anapetameva taṃ taṃ
atk-s0508a2:3316_5: kattabbaṃ. Anuppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ uppādanaṃ, uppannānaṃ paripālanaṃ, paribhogañca
atk-s0508a2:3316_6: kareyya, aññamaññaṃ, avirodhena, aññamaññaṃ, abādhanena, tivaggatthaṃ anuyuñjeyyāti
atk-s0508a2:3316_7: adhippāyo. Ayañca nayo yesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiavirodhena tivaggatthassa vasena vattati
atk-s0508a2:3316_8: bimbisāramahārājādīnaṃ viya, tesaṃ vasena vutto. Na yesaṃ kesañci vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3317_0: Atho sīdati saññuttanti yadi idhaloke supasaṃhitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ atthaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-s0508a2:3317_1: ṭhitaṃ. Vajje kiccaṃ niratthakanti samparāyikattharahitaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ kiccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3317_2: sacepi vissajjeyya pariccajeyya. Na taṃ kiccanti maññitvā, appamatto vicakkhaṇoti
atk-s0508a2:3317_4: taṃ kiccaṃ mayā na kātabbanti maññitvā vivajjeyya.
atk-s0508a2:3318_0: Vivajjetvā pana yañca atthena saññuttaṃ, yā ca dhammagatā rati. Taṃ samādāya vattethāti
atk-s0508a2:3318_1: yaṃkiñci diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikappabhedena atthena hitena saṃyuttaṃ tadubhayahitāvahaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3318_2: yā ca adhikusaladhammagatā samathavipassanāsahitā rati, tadubhayaṃ sammā ādiyitvā
atk-s0508a2:3318_3: pariggahaṃ katvā vatteyya. “Sabbaṃ ratiṃ dhammarati jinātī”ti vacanato sā hi ekaṃsena
atk-s0508a2:3319_0: Yaṃ pana kāmaratisaṃyuttaṃ kiccaṃ niratthakanti vuttaṃ, tassā anatthupasaṃhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3319_1: dassetuṃ “uccāvacehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha uccāvacehīti mahantehi ceva khuddakehi
atk-s0508a2:3319_2: ca. Upāyehīti nayehi. Paresamabhijigīsatīti paresaṃ santakaṃ āharituṃ icchati, pare
atk-s0508a2:3319_3: vā sabbathā hāpeti, jināpeti paraṃ hantvā, vadhitvā atha socayitvā, ālopati sāhasā
atk-s0508a2:3319_4: yo paresaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo puggalo kāmahetu pare hananto, ghātento, socento
atk-s0508a2:3319_5: sandhicchedasandhiruhanapasayhāvahārādīhi nānupāyehi paresaṃ santakaṃ harituṃ vāyamanto
atk-s0508a2:3319_6: sāhasākāraṃ karoti, ālopati, jigīsati sāpateyyavasena pare hāpeti, tassa taṃ kiccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3319_7: kāmaratisannissitaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ ekantanihīnanti. Etena tappaṭipakkhato dhammagatāya
atk-s0508a2:3320_0: Idāni yaṃ “tesamāvaraṇaṃ kātuṃ yo sakkotī”ti indriyānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ upāyena
atk-s0508a2:3320_1: saha vibhāvento “tacchanto āṇiyā āṇiṃ, nihanti balavā yathā”ti āha. Yathā balavā
atk-s0508a2:3320_2: kāyabalena, ñāṇabalena ca samannāgato tacchako rukkhadaṇḍagataṃ āṇiṃ nīharitukāmo
atk-s0508a2:3320_3: tato balavatiṃ āṇiṃ koṭento tato nīharati, tathā kusalo bhikkhu cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0508a2:3321_0: Katamehi panāti āha “saddha”ntiādi. Tassattho – adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhaṃ, paggahalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3321_1: vīriyaṃ, avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhiṃ, upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satiṃ, dassanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3321_2: paññanti imānipi vimuttiparipācakāni pañcindriyāni bhāvento vaḍḍhento etehi pañcahi
atk-s0508a2:3321_4: hantvā, ariyamaggena tadupanissaye kilese samucchinditvā, tato eva anīgho niddukkho
atk-s0508a2:3322_0: So atthavāti so yathāvutto brāhmaṇo uttamatthena samannāgatattā atthavā, taṃ sampāpake
atk-s0508a2:3322_1: dhamme ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭho. Sabbena sabbaṃ anavasesena vidhinā anavasesaṃ buddhassa
atk-s0508a2:3322_2: bhagavato vākyabhūtaṃ anusāsaniṃ katvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā ṭhito. Tato eva
atk-s0508a2:3322_3: so naro uttamapuriso nibbānasukhañca edhati, brūheti, vaḍḍhetīti.
atk-s0508a2:3323: Evaṃ therena attano cintitākāravibhāvanāvasena paṭipattiyā pakāsitattā idameva cassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3326_0: Cirarattaṃ vatātāpītiādikā āyasmato telakānittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:3326_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:3326_2: satthu abhijātito puretaraṃyeva sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:3326_3: telakānīti laddhanāmo vayappatto hetusampannatāya kāme jigucchanto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya
atk-s0508a2:3326_4: paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vivaṭṭajjhāsayo “ko so pāraṅgato loke”tiādinā vimokkhapariyesanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3326_5: caramāno te te samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati, te na sampāyanti. So
atk-s0508a2:3326_6: tena anārādhitacitto vicarati. Atha amhākaṃ bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke
atk-s0508a2:3326_7: lokahitaṃ karonte ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:3326_8: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāti. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3326_9: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nisinno attanā adhigatavisesaṃ paccavekkhitvā tadanusārena attano
atk-s0508a2:3326_10: paṭipattiṃ anussaritvā taṃ sabbaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a2:3331: “Ko so pāraṅgato loke, ko patto amatogadhaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3338: Ko me bandhaṃ muñcaṃ loke, sambodhiṃ vedayissati.
atk-s0508a2:3347: Passa orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ, bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a2:3355: “Taṃ na passāmi tekicchaṃ, yo metaṃ sallamuddhare;
atk-s0508a2:3362: Gambhīre patitassa me, thalaṃ pāṇiñca dassaye.
atk-s0508a2:3371: Te sote ko nivāreyya, taṃ lataṃ ko hi checchati.
atk-s0508a2:3374: Mā te manomayo sotā, rukkhaṃva sahasā luve.
atk-s0508a2:3380: Pādāsi vuyhamānassa, mā bhāyīti ca mabravi.
atk-s0508a2:3383: Yaṃ taṃ pubbe amaññissaṃ, sakkāyābhirataṃ pajaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3392: Buddho mepānudī ganthaṃ, visadosappavāhano”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3393_0: Tattha cirarattaṃ vatāti cirakālaṃ vata. Ātāpīti vīriyavā vimokkhadhammapariyesane
atk-s0508a2:3393_1: āraddhavīriyo. Dhammaṃ anuvicintayanti “kīdiso nu kho vimokkhadhammo, kathaṃ vā adhigantabbo”ti
atk-s0508a2:3393_2: vimuttidhammaṃ anuvicinanto gavesanto. Samaṃ cittassa nālatthaṃ, pucchaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇeti
atk-s0508a2:3393_3: te te nānātitthiye samaṇabrāhmaṇe vimuttidhammaṃ pucchanto pakatiyā anupasantasabhāvassa
atk-s0508a2:3393_4: cittassa samaṃ vūpasamabhūtaṃ vaṭṭadukkhavissaraṇaṃ ariyadhammaṃ nālatthaṃ nādhigacchanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3394_0: Ko so pāraṅgatotiādi pucchitākāradassanaṃ. Tattha ko so pāraṅgato loketi imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3394_1: loke titthakārapaṭiññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu ko nu kho so saṃsārassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3394_2: upagato. Ko patto amatogadhanti nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ vimokkhamaggaṃ ko patto adhigatoti
atk-s0508a2:3394_3: attho. Kassa dhammaṃ paṭicchāmīti kassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā ovādadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3394_4: paṭiggaṇhāmi paṭipajjāmi. Paramatthavijānananti paramatthassa vijānanaṃ, aviparītappavattinivattiyo pavedentanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3395_0: Antovaṅkagato āsīti vaṅkaṃ vuccati diṭṭhigataṃ manovaṅkabhāvato, sabbepi vā kilesā,
atk-s0508a2:3395_1: antoti pana hadayavaṅkassa anto, hadayabbhantaragatakilesavaṅko vā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3395_2: Macchova ghasamāmisanti āmisaṃ ghasanto khādanto maccho viya, gilabaḷiso maccho viyāti
atk-s0508a2:3395_3: adhippāyo. Baddho mahindapāsena, vepacityasuro yathāti mahindassa sakkassa pāsena
atk-s0508a2:3395_4: baddho yathā vepacitti asurindo aserivihārī mahādukkhappatto, evamahaṃ pubbe kilesapāsena
atk-s0508a2:3396_0: Añchāmīti ākaḍḍhāmi. Nanti kilesapāsaṃ. Na muñcāmīti na mocemi. Asmā sokapariddavāti
atk-s0508a2:3396_1: imasmā sokaparidevavaṭṭato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathāpāsena baddho migo sūkaro vā
atk-s0508a2:3396_2: mocanupāyaṃ ajānanto paripphandamāno taṃ āviñchanto bandhanaṃ daḷhaṃ karoti, evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3396_3: ahaṃ pubbe kilesapāsena paṭimukko mocanupāyaṃ ajānanto kāyasañcetanādivasena paripphandamāno
atk-s0508a2:3396_4: taṃ na mocesiṃ, aññadatthu taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto sokādinā paraṃ kilesaṃ eva pāpuṇinti.
atk-s0508a2:3396_5: Ko me bandhaṃ muñcaṃ loke, sambodhiṃ vedayissatīti imasmiṃ loke etaṃ kilesabandhanena
atk-s0508a2:3396_6: bandhaṃ muñcanto sambujjhati etenāti “sambodhī”ti laddhanāmaṃ vimokkhamaggaṃ ko me
atk-s0508a2:3396_7: vedayissati ācikkhissatīti attho. “Bandhamuñca”ntipi paṭhanti, bandhā, bandhassa
atk-s0508a2:3397_0: Ādisantanti desentaṃ. Pabhaṅgunanti pabhañjanaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ, pabhaṅgunaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3397_1: vā dhammappavattiṃ ādisantaṃ kathentaṃ jarāya maccuno ca pavāhanaṃ kassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3397_2: paṭicchāmi. “Paṭipajjāmī”ti vā pāṭho, so evattho. Vicikicchākaṅkhāganthitanti “ahosiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3397_4: kaṅkhāya ca ganthitaṃ. Sārambhabalasaññutanti karaṇuttariyakaraṇalakkhaṇena balappattena
atk-s0508a2:3397_5: sārambhena yuttaṃ. Kodhappattamanatthaddhanti sabbattha kodhena yuttamanasā thaddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3397_6: gataṃ abhijappappadāraṇaṃ. Icchitālābhādivasena hi taṇhā sattānaṃ cittaṃ padālentī
atk-s0508a2:3397_7: viya pavattati. Dūre ṭhitassāpi vijjhanupāyatāya taṇhāva dhanu samupatiṭṭhati uppajjati
atk-s0508a2:3397_8: etasmāti taṇhādhanusamuṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhisallaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0508a2:3397_9: dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhīti tiṃsappabhedaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “dve ca pannarasāyuta”nti,
atk-s0508a2:3397_10: dvikkhattuṃ pannarasabhedavantanti attho. Passa orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ, bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0508a2:3397_11: yaṃ urasambandhanīyatāya orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ balavataraṃ bhetvāna hadayaṃ vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0508a2:3397_12: tasmiṃyeva hadaye tiṭṭhati, taṃ passāti attānameva ālapati.
atk-s0508a2:3398_0: Anudiṭṭhīnaṃ appahānanti anudiṭṭhibhūtānaṃ sesadiṭṭhīnaṃ appahānakāraṇaṃ. Yāva hi
atk-s0508a2:3398_1: sakkāyadiṭṭhi santānato na vigacchati, tāva sassatadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ appahānamevāti. Saṅkappaparatejitanti
atk-s0508a2:3398_2: saṅkappena micchāvitakkena pare parajane nissayalakkhaṇaṃ patipatite tejitaṃ ussāhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3398_3: Tena viddho pavedhāmīti tena diṭṭhisallena yathā hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati, evaṃ viddho
atk-s0508a2:3398_4: pavedhāmi saṅkappāmi sassatucchedādivasena ito cito ca parivaṭṭāmi. Pattaṃva māluteritanti
atk-s0508a2:3398_5: mālutena vāyunā eritaṃ vaṇṭato muttaṃ dumapattaṃ viya.
atk-s0508a2:3399_0: Ajjhattaṃ me samuṭṭhāyāti yathā loke sallaṃ nāma bāhirato uṭṭhāya ajjhattaṃ nimmathetvā
atk-s0508a2:3399_1: bādhati, na evamidaṃ. Idaṃ pana ajjhattaṃ me mama attabhāve samuṭṭhāya so attabhāvasaññito
atk-s0508a2:3399_2: chaphassāyatanakāyo yathā khippaṃ sīghaṃ paccati, ḍayhati. Yathā kiṃ? Aggi viya sanissayaḍāhako
atk-s0508a2:3399_3: taṃyeva māmakaṃ mama santakaṃ attabhāvaṃ ḍahanto yattha uppanno, tattheva sarati pavattati.
atk-s0508a2:3400_0: Taṃ na passāmi tekicchanti tādisāya tikicchāya niyuttatāya tekicchaṃ sallakattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3400_1: bhisakkaṃ taṃ na passāmi. Yo metaṃ sallamuddhareti yo bhisakko etaṃ diṭṭhisallaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3400_2: kilesasallañca uddhareyya, uddharanto ca nānārajjena rajjusadisasaṅkhātāya esanisalākāya
atk-s0508a2:3400_3: pavesetvāna satthena kantitvā nāññena mantāgadappayogena vicikicchitaṃ sallaṃ tikicchituṃ
atk-s0508a2:3400_4: sakkāti āharitvā yojetabbaṃ. Vicikicchitanti, ca nidassanamattametaṃ. Sabbassapi
atk-s0508a2:3401_0: Asatthoti sattharahito. Avaṇoti vaṇena vinā. Abbhantarapassayanti abbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3401_1: hadayaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Ahiṃsanti apīḷento. “Ahiṃsā”ti ca pāṭho, ahiṃsāya apīḷanenāti
atk-s0508a2:3401_2: attho. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – ko nu kho kiñci satthaṃ aggahetvā vaṇañca akaronto
atk-s0508a2:3401_3: tato eva sabbagattāni abādhento mama hadayabbhantaragataṃ pīḷājananato anto tudanato
atk-s0508a2:3401_4: anto ruddhanato ca paramattheneva sallabhūtaṃ kilesasallaṃ uddharissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3402_0: Evaṃ dasahi gāthāhi pubbe attanā cintitākāraṃ dassetvā punapi taṃ pakārantarena dassetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:3402_1: “dhammappati hi so seṭṭho”tiādimāha. Tattha dhammappatīti dhammanimittaṃ dhammahetu.
atk-s0508a2:3402_2: Hīti nipātamattaṃ. So seṭṭhoti so puggalo uttamo. Visadosappavāhakoti yo mayhaṃ rāgādikilesassa
atk-s0508a2:3402_3: pavāhako ucchinnako. Gambhīre patitassa me, thalaṃ pāṇiñca dassayeti ko nu kho atigambhīre
atk-s0508a2:3402_4: saṃsāramahoghe patitassa mayhaṃ “mā bhāyī”ti assāsento nibbānathalaṃ taṃsampāpakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3403_0: Rahadehamasmi ogāḷhoti mahati saṃsārarahade ahamasmi sasīsaṃ nimujjanavasena otiṇṇo
atk-s0508a2:3403_1: anupaviṭṭho. Ahāriyarajamattiketi apanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo rāgādirajo mattikā kaddamo
atk-s0508a2:3403_2: etassāti ahāriyarajamattiko, rahado. Tasmiṃ rahadasmiṃ. “Ahāriyarajamantike”ti vā
atk-s0508a2:3403_3: pāṭho, antike ṭhitarāgādīsu dunnīharaṇīyarāgādirajeti attho. Santadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0508a2:3403_4: māyā, parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇā usūyā, karaṇuttariyakaraṇalakkhaṇo sārambho, cittālasiyalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3403_5: thinaṃ, kāyālasiyalakkhaṇaṃ middhanti ime pāpadhammā patthaṭā yaṃ rahadaṃ, tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3403_6: māyāusūyasārambhathinamiddhamapatthaṭe, makāro cettha padasandhikaro vutto. Yathāvuttehi
atk-s0508a2:3404_1: uddhaccaṃ meghathanitaṃ meghagajjitaṃ etesanti uddhaccameghathanitā. Dasavidhā saṃyojanā
atk-s0508a2:3404_2: eva valāhakā etesanti saṃyojanavalāhakā. Vāhā mahāudakavāhasadisā rāganissitā micchāsaṅkappā
atk-s0508a2:3404_3: asubhādīsu ṭhitā kuddiṭṭhiṃ maṃ vahanti apāyasamuddameva uddissa kaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3405_0: Savanti sabbadhi sotāti taṇhāsoto, diṭṭhisoto, mānasoto, avijjāsoto, kilesasototi
atk-s0508a2:3405_1: ime pañcapisotā cakkhudvārādīnaṃ vasena sabbesu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu savanato “rūpataṇhā…pe…
atk-s0508a2:3405_2: dhammataṇhā”tiādinā sabbabhāgehi vā savanato sabbadhi savanti. Latāti paliveṭhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a2:3405_3: saṃsibbanaṭṭhena latā viyāti latā, taṇhā. Ubbhijja tiṭṭhatīti chahi dvārehi ubbhijjitvā
atk-s0508a2:3405_4: rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhati. Te soteti taṇhādike sote mama santāne sandante maggasetubandhanena
atk-s0508a2:3405_5: ko purisaviseso nivāreyya, taṃ latanti taṇhālataṃ, maggasatthena ko checchati chindissati.
atk-s0508a2:3406_0: Velaṃ karothāti tesaṃ sotānaṃ velaṃ setuṃ karotha sannivāraṇaṃ. Bhaddanteti ālapanākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3406_1: Mā te manomayo sototi udakasoto oḷāriko, tassa bālamahājanenapi setuṃ katvā nivāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3406_2: sakkā. Ayaṃ pana manomayo soto sukhumo dunnivāraṇo. So yathā udakasoto vaḍḍhanto
atk-s0508a2:3406_3: kūle ṭhitaṃ rukkhaṃ pātetvāva nāseti, evaṃ tumhe apāyatīre ṭhite tattha sahasā pātetvā
atk-s0508a2:3406_4: apāyasamuddaṃ pāpento mā luve mā vināseyya mā anayabyasanaṃ pāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3407_0: Evaṃ ayaṃ thero purimattabhāve parimadditasaṅkhārattā ñāṇaparipākaṃ gatattā pavattidukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3407_1: upadhārento yathā vicikicchādike saṃkilesadhamme pariggaṇhi, tamākāraṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0508a2:3407_2: jātasaṃvego kiṃkusalagavesī satthu santikaṃ gato yaṃ visesaṃ adhimucci, taṃ dassento
atk-s0508a2:3407_3: “evaṃ me bhayajātassā”tiādimāha. Tattha evaṃ me bhayajātassāti evaṃ vuttappakārena
atk-s0508a2:3407_4: saṃsāre jātabhayassa apārā orimatīrato sappaṭibhayato saṃsāravaṭṭato “kathaṃ nu kho
atk-s0508a2:3407_5: muñceyya”nti pāraṃ nibbānaṃ, esato gavesato, tāṇo sadevakassa lokassa tāṇabhūto kilesasamucchedanī
atk-s0508a2:3407_6: paññā āvudho etassāti paññāvudho. Diṭṭhadhammikādiatthena sattānaṃ yathārahaṃ anusāsanato
atk-s0508a2:3407_7: satthā, isisaṅghena aggasāvakādiariyapuggalasamūhena nisevito payirupāsito isisaṅghanisevito,
atk-s0508a2:3407_8: sopānanti desanāñāṇena suṭṭhu katattā abhisaṅkhatattā sukataṃ, upakkilesavirahitato
atk-s0508a2:3407_9: suddhaṃ, saddhāpaññādisārabhūtaṃ dhammasāramayaṃ paṭipakkhehi acalanīyato daḷhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3407_10: vipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ sopānaṃ mahoghena vuyhamānassa mayhaṃ satthā pādāsi, dadanto ca
atk-s0508a2:3407_11: “iminā te sotthi bhavissatī”ti samassāsento mā bhāyīti ca abravi, kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:3408_1: catubhūmisampannaṃ satipaṭṭhānapāsādaṃ āruhitvā paccavekkhisaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ maggañāṇena
atk-s0508a2:3408_2: patiavekkhiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ. Yaṃ taṃ pubbe amaññissaṃ, sakkāyābhirataṃ pajanti evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3408_3: paṭividdhasacco yaṃ sakkāye “ahaṃ mamā”ti abhirataṃ pajaṃ titthiyajanaṃ tena parikappitaattānañca
atk-s0508a2:3408_4: pubbe sārato amaññissaṃ. Yadā ca maggamaddakkhiṃ, nāvāya abhirūhananti ariyamagganāvāya
atk-s0508a2:3408_5: abhiruhanūpāyabhūtaṃ yadā vipassanāmaggaṃ yāthāvato addakkhiṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ
atk-s0508a2:3408_6: titthiyajanaṃ attānañca anadhiṭṭhāya citte aṭṭhapetvā aggahetvā titthaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0508a2:3408_7: amatamahāpārassa titthabhūtaṃ ariyamaggadassanaṃ sabbehi maggehi sabbehi kusaladhammehi
atk-s0508a2:3409_0: Evaṃ attano anuttaraṃ maggādhigamaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tassa desakaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3409_2: Attasamuṭṭhānanti “aha”nti mānaṭṭhānatāya “attā”ti ca laddhanāme attabhāve sambhūtaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3409_3: Bhavanettippabhāvitanti bhavataṇhāsamuṭṭhitaṃ bhavataṇhāsannissayaṃ. Sā hi diṭṭhimānādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3409_4: sambhavo. Etesaṃ appavattāyāti yathāvuttānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ appavattiyā anuppādāya.
atk-s0508a2:3409_5: Desesi maggamuttamanti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, tadupāyañca vipassanāmaggaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:3410_0: Dīgharattānusayitanti anamatagge saṃsāre cirakālaṃ santāne anu anu sayitaṃ kāraṇalābhena
atk-s0508a2:3410_1: uppajjanārahabhāvena thāmagataṃ, tato ca cirarattaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ santānaṃ ajjhāruyha
atk-s0508a2:3410_2: ṭhitaṃ. Ganthanti abhijjhākāyaganthādiṃ mama santāne ganthabhūtaṃ kilesavisadosaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3410_3: pavāhano buddho bhagavā attano desanānubhāvena apānudī parijahāpesi, ganthesu hi
atk-s0508a2:3410_4: anavasesato pahīnesu appahīno nāma kileso natthīti.
atk-s0508a2:3413_0: Passa cittakatantiādikā āyasmato raṭṭhapālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0508a2:3413_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule
atk-s0508a2:3413_2: nibbattitvā vayappatto pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena
atk-s0508a2:3413_3: dassitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ kulavaṃsānugataṃ dhanaṃ disvā “imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3413_4: pituayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, mayā pana gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:3413_5: gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi. So abhiññālābhiṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3413_6: tāpasaṃ upaṭṭhahanto tena devalokādhipacce niyojito yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato
atk-s0508a2:3413_7: cuto devaloke nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato
atk-s0508a2:3413_8: cuto manussaloke bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:3414_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte
atk-s0508a2:3414_1: nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātaṃ khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesi. Atha so kulaputto anukkamena
atk-s0508a2:3414_2: viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3414_3: disvā pasannacitto parisapariyante nisīdi. Tena kho pana samayena satthā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:3414_4: saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Taṃ disvā so pasannamānaso tadatthāya cittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3414_5: ṭhapetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato mahatā sakkārena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3414_6: pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa anantarāyena ijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate
atk-s0508a2:3414_7: gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3414_8: So satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3414_9: puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa
atk-s0508a2:3414_10: bhagavato kāle satthu vemātikabhātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahantesu
atk-s0508a2:3415_0: Evaṃ tattha tattha bhave taṃ taṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:3415_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kururaṭṭhe thullakoṭṭhikanigame raṭṭhapālaseṭṭhino gehe nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:3415_2: tassa bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthe kule nibbattattā raṭṭhapāloti vaṃsānugatameva
atk-s0508a2:3415_3: nāmaṃ ahosi. So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanapatto mātāpitūhi patirūpena
atk-s0508a2:3415_4: dārena saṃyojito mahante ca yase patiṭṭhāpito dibbasampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0508a2:3415_5: Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṃ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṃ anupāpuṇi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:3415_6: raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:3415_7: pabbajitukāmo sattāhaṃ bhattacchedaṃ katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:3415_8: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike
atk-s0508a2:3415_9: pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3423: Sabbe jane hāsayanto, desesi amataṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3433: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:3441: Kheḷapiṇḍeva bhogamhi, pemaṃ mayhaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:3446_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro passituṃ thullakoṭṭhikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0508a2:3446_1: tattha sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ labhitvā taṃ
atk-s0508a2:3446_2: amataṃ viya paribhuñjanto, pitarā nimantito svātanāya adhivāsetvā, dutiyadivase pitu
atk-s0508a2:3446_3: nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthāgārajane upagantvā “kīdisā
atk-s0508a2:3446_4: nāma tā, ayyaputta, accharāyo, yāsaṃ tvaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carasī”tiādīni vatvā,
