atk-s0508a2:3446_5: palobhanakammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe tassa adhippāyaṃ parivattetvā aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:3449: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
atk-s0508a2:3452: Aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati.
atk-s0508a2:3455: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:3458: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:3461: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:3467: Bhutvā nivāpaṃ gacchāma, socante migaluddake”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3468_0: Tattha cittakatanti cittaṃ kataṃ cittakataṃ, vatthābharaṇamālādīhi vicittaṃ katanti
atk-s0508a2:3468_1: attho. Bimbanti dīghādibhāvena yuttaṭṭhānesu dīghādīhi aṅgapaccaṅgehi maṇḍitaṃ attabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3468_2: Arukāyanti navannaṃ vaṇamukhānaṃ lomakūpānañca vasena vissandamānaasuciṃ, sabbaso
atk-s0508a2:3468_3: ca arubhūtaṃ vaṇabhūtaṃ arūnaṃ vā kāyaṃ. Samussitanti tīhi aṭṭhisatehi samussitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3468_4: Āturanti sabbakālaṃ iriyāpathantarādīhi pariharitabbatāya niccaṃ gilānaṃ. Bahusaṅkappanti
atk-s0508a2:3468_5: bālajanena abhūtaṃ āropetvā bahudhā saṅkappitabbaṃ. Yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitīti yassa
atk-s0508a2:3468_6: kāyassa dhuvabhāvo ṭhitisabhāvo natthi, ekaṃsato bhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammoyeva.
atk-s0508a2:3468_7: Taṃ passāti samīpe ṭhitaṃ janaṃ, attānameva vā sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3469_0: Rūpanti sarīraṃ. Sarīrampi hi “aṭṭhiñca paṭicca, nhāruñca paṭicca, maṃsañca paṭicca,
atk-s0508a2:3469_1: cammañca paṭicca, ākāso parivārito ‘rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu rūpanti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:3469_2: Maṇinā kuṇḍalena cāti sīsūpagādiābharaṇagatena maṇinā kuṇḍalena cittakataṃ. Aṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3469_3: tacena onaddhanti allacammena pariyonaddhaṃ atirekatisatapabhedaṃ aṭṭhiṃ passāti
atk-s0508a2:3469_4: yojanā. Kuṇḍalena cāti ca-saddena sesābharaṇālaṅkāre saṅgaṇhāti. Saha vatthehi sobhatīti
atk-s0508a2:3469_5: tayidaṃ rūpaṃ maṇinā cittakatampi vatthehi paṭicchāditameva sobhati, na apaṭicchāditanti
atk-s0508a2:3469_6: attho. Ye pana “aṭṭhitacenā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ aṭṭhitacenaṃ onaddhaṃ sobhati, onaddhattā
atk-s0508a2:3470_0: Alattakakatāti alattakena katarañjanā lākhāya saṃrañjitā. Pādāti caraṇā. Mukhaṃ cuṇṇakamakkhitanti
atk-s0508a2:3470_1: mukhaṃ cuṇṇakena makkhitaṃ, yaṃ maṇḍanamanuyuttā sāsapakakkena mukhapīḷakādīni haritvā
atk-s0508a2:3470_2: loṇamattikāya duṭṭhalohitaṃ haritvā mukhacuṇṇakavilepanaṃ karonti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3470_3: Alanti bālassa andhaputhujjanassa no ca pāragavesino vaṭṭābhiratassa mohāya sammohanāya
atk-s0508a2:3470_4: samatthaṃ tassa cittaṃ mohetuṃ pariyattaṃ, pāragavesino pana vivaṭṭābhiratassa no alaṃ na pariyattaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3471_0: Aṭṭhāpadakatāti aṭṭhapadākārena katā sañcitā purimabhāge kese kappetvā nalāṭassa
atk-s0508a2:3471_1: paṭicchādanavasena katā kesaracanā aṭṭhapadaṃ nāma, yaṃ “alaka”ntipi vuccati. Nettā
atk-s0508a2:3471_2: añjanamakkhitāti ubhopi nayanāni anto dvīsu antesu ca yathā añjanacchāyā dissati, evaṃ añjitañjanāni.
atk-s0508a2:3472_0: Añjanīva navā cittā, pūtikāyo alaṅkatoti yathā añjanī añjananāḷikā navā abhinavā
atk-s0508a2:3472_1: mālākammamakaradantādivasena cittā bahi maṭṭhā ujjalā dassanīyā, anto pana na dassanīyā
atk-s0508a2:3472_2: hoti, evameva tāsaṃ kāyo nhānabbhañjanavatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkato bahi ujjalo, anto
atk-s0508a2:3472_3: pana pūti nānappakāraasucīhi bharito tiṭṭhatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3473_0: Odahīti oḍḍesi. Migavoti, migaluddako. Pāsanti, daṇḍavāguraṃ. Nāsadāti na saṅghaṭṭesi.
atk-s0508a2:3473_1: Vāguranti pāsaṃ. Nivāpanti migānaṃ khādanatthāya khittaṃ tiṇādighāsaṃ. Upamā kho
atk-s0508a2:3473_2: ayaṃ therena katā atthassa viññāpanāya. Ayañhettha attho – yathā migānaṃ māraṇatthāya
atk-s0508a2:3473_3: daṇḍavāguraṃ oḍḍetvā tattha nivāpaṃ vikiriya migaluddake nilīne ṭhite tattheko javaparakkamasampanno
atk-s0508a2:3473_4: cheko migo pāsaṃ aphusanto eva yathāsukhaṃ nivāpaṃ khāditvā, “vañcesi vata migo”ti
atk-s0508a2:3473_5: migaluddake viravante eva gacchati. Aparo migo balavā cheko javasampannova tattha
atk-s0508a2:3473_6: gantvā nivāpaṃ khāditvā tattha tattha pāsaṃ chinditvā, “vañcesi vata migo, pāso chinno”ti
atk-s0508a2:3473_7: migaluddake socante eva gacchati, evaṃ mayampi pubbe puthujjanakāle mātāpitūhi āsajjanatthāya
atk-s0508a2:3473_8: niyyādite bhoge bhuñjitvā tattha tattha asajjamānā nikkhantā. Idāni pana sabbaso
atk-s0508a2:3473_9: chinnakilesā apāsā hutvā ṭhitā, tehi dinnabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tesu socantesu eva gacchāmāti.
atk-s0508a2:3474_0: Evaṃ thero migaluddakaṃ viya mātāpitaro, hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ itthāgārañca vāgurajālaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3474_1: viya, attanā pubbe bhuttabhoge ca idāni bhuttabhojanañca nivāpatiṇaṃ viya, attānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3474_2: mahāmigaṃ viya ca katvā dasseti. Imā gāthā vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño korabyassa
atk-s0508a2:3474_3: migājinauyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi. Therassa kira pitā sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu
atk-s0508a2:3474_4: aggaḷaṃ dāpetvā malle āṇāpesi “nikkhamituṃ mā detha, kāsāyāni apanetvā setakāni nivāsethā”ti,
atk-s0508a2:3474_5: tasmā thero ākāsena agamāsi. Atha rājā korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:3474_6: taṃ upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā “idha, bho raṭṭhapāla,
atk-s0508a2:3474_7: pabbajanto byādhipārijuññaṃ vā jarābhogañātipārijuññaṃ vā patto pabbajati. Tvaṃ pana
atk-s0508a2:3474_8: kiñcipi pārijuññaṃ anupagato eva kasmā pabbajito”ti pucchi. Athassa thero, “upaniyyati
atk-s0508a2:3474_9: loko addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro, assako loko sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko
atk-s0508a2:3474_10: atitto taṇhādāso”ti imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammuddesānaṃ attānaṃ vivittabhāvaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0508a2:3476: “Passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṃ na dadanti mohā;
atk-s0508a2:3477: Luddhā dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti, bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayanti.
atk-s0508a2:3480: Oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha.
atk-s0508a2:3482: “Rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṃ upenti;
atk-s0508a2:3483: Ūnāva hutvāna jahanti dehaṃ, kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi titti.
atk-s0508a2:3485: “Kandanti naṃ ñātī pakiriya kese, ‘aho vatā no amarā’ti cāhu;
atk-s0508a2:3486: Vatthena naṃ pārutaṃ nīharitvā, citaṃ samodhāya tato ḍahanti.
atk-s0508a2:3488: “So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno, ekena vatthena pahāya bhoge;
atk-s0508a2:3489: Na mīyamānassa bhavanti tāṇā, ñātī ca mittā atha vā sahāyā.
atk-s0508a2:3491: “Dāyādakā tassa dhanaṃ haranti, satto pana gacchati yenakammaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3492: Na mīyamānaṃ dhanamanveti kiñci, puttā ca dārā ca dhanañca raṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3494: “Na dīghamāyuṃ labhate dhanena, na cāpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti;
atk-s0508a2:3495: Appaṃ hidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3497: “Aḍḍhā daliddā ca phusanti phassaṃ, bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho;
atk-s0508a2:3498: Bālo hi bālyā vadhitova seti, dhīro ca no vedhati phassaphuṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:3500: “Tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchati;
atk-s0508a2:3501: Abyositattā hi bhavābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
atk-s0508a2:3504: Tassappapañño abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3506: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo;
atk-s0508a2:3507: Evaṃ pajā pecca paramhi loke, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo.
atk-s0508a2:3509: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3510: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0508a2:3512: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0508a2:3513: Etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo.
atk-s0508a2:3516: Avañjhā mayhaṃ pabbajjā, anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3522: Sohaṃ viddho tadā santo, sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3528: So me attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo”ti. – imā gāthā avoca;
atk-s0508a2:3529_0: Tattha passāmi loketi ahaṃ, mahārāja, imasmiṃ loke sadhane dhanasampanne aḍḍhe manusse
atk-s0508a2:3529_1: passāmi, te pana laddhāna vittaṃ dhanaṃ labhitvā bhogasampattiyaṃ ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇādīsu
atk-s0508a2:3529_2: kassaci kiñcipi na dadanti. Kasmā? Mohā kammassakatāpaññāya abhāvato. Luddhā lobhābhibhūtā
atk-s0508a2:3529_3: yathāladdhaṃ dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ sabbaso nicetabbaṃ nidhetabbaṃ karonti. Bhiyyova yathādhigatakāmato
atk-s0508a2:3529_4: upari kāme kāmaguṇe “tathāhaṃ edise ca bhoge paṭilabheyya”nti abhipatthayanti paccāsīsanti
atk-s0508a2:3530_0: Bhiyyo kāmapatthanāya udāharaṇaṃ dassento “rājā”tiādimāha. Tattha pasayhappathaviṃ
atk-s0508a2:3530_1: vijetvāti attano vaṃsānugataṃ pathaviṃ balakkārena abhivijiya. Āvasantoti pasāsento.
atk-s0508a2:3530_2: Oraṃ samuddassāti anavasesaṃ samuddassa orabhāgaṃ labhitvāpi tena atittarūpo pāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:3531: Avītataṇhāti avigatataṇhā. Ūnāvāti aparipuṇṇamanorathāva. Kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi tittīti taṇhāvipannānaṃ imasmiṃ loke vatthukāmehi titti nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a2:3532_0: Kandanti nanti matapurisaṃ uddissa tassa guṇe kittentā kandanaṃ karonti. Aho vatā
atk-s0508a2:3532_1: no amarāti cāhūti aho vata amhākaṃ ñātī amarā siyunti ca kathenti, gāthāsukhatthañhettha
atk-s0508a2:3533: So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamānoti so matasatto chavaḍāhakehi sammā jhāpetuṃ sūlehi tujjamāno. Tāṇāti parittāṇakarā.
atk-s0508a2:3534: Yenakammanti yathākammaṃ. Dhananti dhanāyitabbaṃ yaṃkiñci vatthu. Puna dhananti hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3535_0: “Na dīghamāyu”ntiādinā kāmaguṇassa jarāya ca paṭikārābhāvaṃ vatvā puna tassa ekantikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3535_1: dassetuṃ “appaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Phusantīti aniṭṭhaphassaṃ phusanti pāpuṇanti, tattha
atk-s0508a2:3535_2: aḍḍhadaliddatā akāraṇanti dasseti. Phassaṃ bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭhoti yathā
atk-s0508a2:3535_3: bālo iṭṭhāniṭṭhasamphassaṃ phuṭṭho, tatheva dhīro iṭṭhāniṭṭhaphassaṃ phuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0508a2:3535_4: na ettha bālapaṇḍitānaṃ koci viseso. Ayaṃ pana viseso, bālo hi bālyā vadhitova setīti
atk-s0508a2:3535_5: bālapuggalo kenaci dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho socanto kilamanto urattāḷiṃ kandanto bālabhāvena
atk-s0508a2:3535_6: vadhito pīḷitova hutvā seti sayati. Ito cito ca āvaṭṭanto vivaṭṭanto virodhento vedhati
atk-s0508a2:3535_7: phassaphuṭṭhoti dhīro pana paṇḍito dukkhasamphassena samphuṭṭho na vedhati kampanamattampi tassa na hotīti.
atk-s0508a2:3536_0: Tasmāti yasmā bālapaṇḍitānaṃ lokadhamme edisī pavatti, tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā,
atk-s0508a2:3536_1: yāya vosānamidhādhigacchatīti paññāva dhanato pāsaṃsatarā, yāya paññāya vosānaṃ bhavassa
atk-s0508a2:3536_2: pariyosānabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchati. Abyositattā hīti anadhigataniṭṭhattā. Bhavābhavesūti
atk-s0508a2:3537_0: Upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ, saṃsāramāpajja paramparāyāti yo pāpāni katvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3537_1: saṃsaraṇamāpajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ gabbhaseyyāya paralokuppattiyā
atk-s0508a2:3537_2: ca na muccati, tassa pāpakammakārino puggalassa kiriyaṃ abhisaddahanto “attā ca me
atk-s0508a2:3537_3: hotī”ti pattiyāyanto aññopi appapañño bālo yathā paṭipajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca
atk-s0508a2:3538_0: Coro yathāti yathā coro pāpadhammo gharasandhiṃ chindanto sandhimukhe ārakkhakapurisehi
atk-s0508a2:3538_1: gahito sakammunā tena attano sandhicchedakammunā kāraṇabhūtena kasādīhi tāḷanādivasena
atk-s0508a2:3538_2: haññati rājapurisehi bādhiyyati bajjhati ca. Evaṃ pajāti evamayaṃ sattaloko idha
atk-s0508a2:3538_3: pāpāni karitvā pecca patvā tena kammunā paramhi loke nirayādīsu haññati, pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena bādhiyyati.
atk-s0508a2:3539_0: Evametāhi ekādasahi gāthāhi yathārahaṃ cattāro dhammuddese pakāsetvā idāni kāmesu
atk-s0508a2:3539_1: saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ disvā saddhāya attano pabbajitabhāvaṃ pabbajitakiccassa ca matthakappattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3539_2: vibhāvento “kāmā hī”tiādimāha. Tattha kāmāti vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpādayo dhammā,
atk-s0508a2:3539_3: kilesakāmā sabbepi rāgappabhedā. Idha pana vatthukāmā veditabbā. Te hi rūpādivasena
atk-s0508a2:3539_4: anekappakāratāya citrā. Lokassādavasena iṭṭhākāratāya madhurā. Bālaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3539_5: manaṃ ramentīti manoramā. Virūparūpenāti vividharūpena, anekavidhasabhāvenāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3539_6: Te hi rūpādivasena citrā, nīlādivasena vividharūpā. Evaṃ tena virūparūpena tathā
atk-s0508a2:3539_7: tathā assādaṃ dassetvā mathenti cittaṃ pabbajjāya abhiramituṃ na dentīti iminā appassādabahudukkhatādinā
atk-s0508a2:3539_8: ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā tasmā taṃnimittaṃ ahaṃ pabbajito amhi. Dumapphalāni pakkakāle
atk-s0508a2:3539_9: aparipakkakāle ca yattha katthaci parūpakkamato sarasato vā patanti, evaṃ sattā daharā
atk-s0508a2:3539_10: ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrassa bhedā patantiyeva. Etampi disvāti evaṃ aniccatampi paññācakkhunā
atk-s0508a2:3539_11: disvā, na kevalaṃ appassādatāditāya ādīnavamevāti adhippāyo. Apaṇṇakanti aviraddhanakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3540_0: Saddhāyāti kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca
atk-s0508a2:3540_1: saddahitvā. Upeto jinasāsaneti satthu sāsane sammāpaṭipattiṃ upagato. Avañjhā mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3540_2: pabbajjā arahattassa adhigatattā. Tato eva anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ nikkilesavasena
atk-s0508a2:3541_0: Kāme ādittato disvāti vatthukāme kilesakāme ca ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato disvā.
atk-s0508a2:3541_1: Jātarūpāni satthatoti katākatappabhedā sabbasuvaṇṇavikatiyo anatthāvahatāya nisitasatthato.
atk-s0508a2:3541_3: Nirayesu mahabbhayanti saussadesu aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu labbhamānaṃ mahābhayañca sabbattha disvāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3542_0: Etamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti etaṃ kāmānaṃ ādittatādiṃ saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā. Saṃvegaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3542_1: alabhiṃ tadāti tasmiṃ satthu santike dhammassa sutakāle bhavādike saṃvegaṃ alatthaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3542_2: Viddho tadā santoti tasmiṃ gahaṭṭhakāle rāgasallādīhi viddho samāno idāni satthu
atk-s0508a2:3542_3: sāsanaṃ āgamma sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ, viddho vā cattāri saccāni, paṭividdhoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3543: Evaṃ thero rañño korabyassa dhammaṃ desetvā satthu santikameva gato. Satthā ca aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0508a2:3546_0: Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhātiādikā āyasmato mālukyaputtassa gāthā. Imassa āyasmato vatthu
atk-s0508a2:3546_1: heṭṭhā chakkanipāte vuttameva. Tā pana gāthā therena arahatte patiṭṭhitena ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3546_2: dhammadesanāvasena bhāsitā. Idha pana puthujjanakāle “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena
atk-s0508a2:3546_3: dhammaṃ desetū”ti yācitena satthārā “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mālukyaputta, ye te cakkhuviññeyyā
atk-s0508a2:3546_4: rūpā adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbā, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti, atthi te tattha
atk-s0508a2:3546_5: chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti? “No hetaṃ, bhante”. “Ye te sotaviññeyyā saddā…pe…
atk-s0508a2:3546_6: ghāna…jivhā…kāya…manoviññeyyā dhammā aviññātā aviññātapubbā, na ca vijānāsi, na ca
atk-s0508a2:3546_7: te hoti vijāneyyanti, atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti? “No hetaṃ, bhante”.
atk-s0508a2:3546_8: “Ettha ca te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3546_9: bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ, mute mutamattaṃ, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati. Yato
atk-s0508a2:3546_10: kho te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ, sute
atk-s0508a2:3546_11: sutamattaṃ, mute mutamattaṃ, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta,
atk-s0508a2:3546_12: na tena. Yato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, na tena, tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, na tattha. Yato
atk-s0508a2:3546_13: tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, na tattha, tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena,
atk-s0508a2:3546_14: esevanto dukkhassā”ti. Saṃkhittena dhamme desite tassa dhammassa sādhukaṃ uggahitabhāvaṃ pakāsentena –
atk-s0508a2:3548: “Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
atk-s0508a2:3555: “Saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
atk-s0508a2:3562: “Gandhaṃ ghatvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
atk-s0508a2:3569: “Rasaṃ bhotvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
atk-s0508a2:3576: “Phassaṃ phussa sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
atk-s0508a2:3583: “Dhammaṃ ñatvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
atk-s0508a2:3590: “Na so rajjati rūpesu, rūpaṃ disvā paṭissato;
atk-s0508a2:3594: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
atk-s0508a2:3595: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:3597: “Na so rajjati saddesu, saddaṃ sutvā paṭissato;
atk-s0508a2:3601: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
atk-s0508a2:3602: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:3604: “Na so rajjati gandhesu, gandhaṃ ghatvā paṭissato;
atk-s0508a2:3608: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
atk-s0508a2:3609: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:3611: “Na so rajjati rasesu, rasaṃ bhotvā paṭissato;
atk-s0508a2:3615: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
atk-s0508a2:3616: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:3618: “Na so rajjati phassesu, phassaṃ phussa paṭissato;
atk-s0508a2:3622: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
atk-s0508a2:3623: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:3625: “Na so rajjati dhammesu, dhammaṃ ñatvā paṭissato;
atk-s0508a2:3629: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
atk-s0508a2:3630: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3632_0: Tattha rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ cakkhudvārena upalabhitvā. Sati muṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a2:3632_1: piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karototi tasmiṃ rūpe diṭṭhamatte eva aṭṭhatvā subhanimittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3632_2: manasi karoto subhākāraggahaṇavasena ayoniso manasi karoto sati muṭṭhā hoti. Tathā
atk-s0508a2:3632_3: ca sati sārattacitto vedeti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ ratto, giddho, gadhito hutvā anubhavati,
atk-s0508a2:3632_4: assādeti, abhinandati. Tathābhūto ca tañca ajjhosa tiṭṭhatīti tañca rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3632_5: ajjhosāya “sukhaṃ sukha”nti abhinivissa gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a2:3633_0: Tassa vaḍḍhanti vedanā, anekā rūpasambhavāti tassa evarūpassa puggalassa rūpasambhavā
atk-s0508a2:3633_1: rūpārammaṇā sukhādibhedena anekā vedanā kilesuppattihetubhūtā vaḍḍhanti. Abhijjhā
atk-s0508a2:3633_2: ca vihesā ca, cittamassūpahaññatīti piyarūpe sārajjanavasena uppajjamānāya abhijjhāya,
atk-s0508a2:3633_3: apiyarūpe byāpajjanavasena piyarūpasseva vipariṇāmaññathābhāvāya uppajjamānāya sokādilakkhaṇāya
atk-s0508a2:3633_4: vihesāya ca assa puggalassa cittaṃ upahaññati bādhīyati. Evamācinato dukkhanti vuttākārena
atk-s0508a2:3633_5: taṃ taṃ vedanassādavasena bhavābhisaṅkhāraṃ ācinato vaṭṭadukkhaṃ pavattati. Tenāha
atk-s0508a2:3633_6: bhagavā – “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti. Tathābhūtassa
atk-s0508a2:3633_7: ārā ārakā dūre nibbānaṃ vuccati, tassa taṃ dullabhanti attho. Saddaṃ sutvātiādigāthāsupi
atk-s0508a2:3633_8: vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Tattha ghatvāti ghāyitvā. Bhotvāti sāyitvā. Phussāti
atk-s0508a2:3634_0: Evaṃ chadvāragocare sārajjantassa vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni tattha virajjantassa vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3634_1: dassento “na so rajjati rūpesū”tiādimāha. Tattha na so rajjati rūpesu, rūpaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:3634_2: paṭissatoti yo puggalo rūpaṃ disvā āpāthagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvārikena viññāṇasantānena
atk-s0508a2:3634_3: gahetvā catusampajaññavasena sampajānakāritāya paṭissato hoti, so rūpārammaṇesu na
atk-s0508a2:3634_4: rajjati rāgaṃ na janeti, aññadatthu virattacitto vedeti, rūpārammaṇamhi samudayādito
atk-s0508a2:3634_5: yathābhūtaṃ pajānanto nibbindati, nibbindanto taṃ tatthuppannavedanañca virattacitto
atk-s0508a2:3634_6: vedeti, tathābhūto ca tañca najjhosa tiṭṭhatīti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sammadeva virattacittatāya
atk-s0508a2:3634_7: ajjhosāya na tiṭṭhati “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena nābhinivisati.
atk-s0508a2:3635_0: Yathāssa passato rūpanti assa yogino yathā tattha abhijjhādayo nappavattanti, evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3635_1: aniccādito rūpaṃ passantassa. Sevato cāpi vedananti taṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3635_2: taṃsampayuttadhamme ca gocarasevanāya sevato cāpi. Khīyatīti sabbaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3635_3: parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati. Nopacīyatīti na upaciyati na ācayaṃ gacchati. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3635_4: so caratī satoti evaṃ kilesāpanayanapaṭipattiyā sato sampajāno hutvā carati, viharati.
atk-s0508a2:3635_5: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhanti vuttanayena apacayagāminiyā maggapaññāya sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3635_7: evāti vuccati asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā sacchikatattā. Na so rajjati saddesūtiādīsupi imināva
atk-s0508a2:3636: Evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi satthu ovādassa attanā upadhāritabhāvaṃ pavedetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ vanditvā gato nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0508a2:3639_0: Paripuṇṇakāyotiādikā āyasmato selattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabhagavato
atk-s0508a2:3639_1: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṇapāmokkho hutvā tīṇi purisasatāni samādapetvā
atk-s0508a2:3639_2: tehi saddhiṃ satthu gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā katapariyositāya gandhakuṭiyā sabhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a2:3639_3: bhagavato mahādānaṃ pavattetvā satthāraṃ bhikkhū ca ticīvarena acchādesi. So tena
atk-s0508a2:3639_4: puññakammena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke eva vasitvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:3639_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aṅguttarāpesu āpaṇe nāma brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:3639_6: seloti laddhanāmo ahosi. So vayappatto tīsu vedesu, brāhmaṇasippesu ca nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3639_7: gantvā tīṇi māṇavakasatāni mante vācento āpaṇe paṭivasati. Tena ca samayena satthā
atk-s0508a2:3639_8: sāvatthito nikkhamitvā aḍḍhateḷasahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3639_9: caranto selassa, antevāsikānañca ñāṇaparipākaṃ disvā aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0508a2:3639_10: Atha keṇiyo nāma jaṭilo satthu āgamanaṃ sutvā tattha gantvā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0508a2:3639_11: satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantetvā sake assame pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādeti.
atk-s0508a2:3639_12: Tasmiñca samaye selo brāhmaṇo saddhiṃ tīhi māṇavakasatehi jaṅghāvihāraṃ anuvicaranto
atk-s0508a2:3639_13: keṇiyassa assamaṃ pavisitvā jaṭile kaṭṭhaphālanuddhanasampādanādinā dānūpakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3639_14: sajjente disvā, “kiṃ nu kho te, keṇiya, mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito”tiādiṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0508a2:3639_15: tena “buddho bhagavā mayā svātanāya nimantito”ti vutte “buddho”ti vacanaṃ sutvāva
atk-s0508a2:3639_16: haṭṭho udaggo pītisomanassajāto tāvadeva māṇavakehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:3639_17: katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisinno bhagavato kāye bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni disvā
atk-s0508a2:3639_18: “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato rājā vā hoti cakkavattī, buddho vā loke vivaṭṭacchado,
atk-s0508a2:3639_19: ayaṃ pana pabbajito, no ca kho naṃ jānāmi ‘buddho vā, no vā’, sutaṃ kho pana metaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3639_20: brāhmaṇānaṃ vuddhānaṃ mahallakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ ‘ye te bhavanti
atk-s0508a2:3639_21: arahanto sammāsambuddhā, te sake vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṃ pātukarontī’ti asammāsambuddho
atk-s0508a2:3639_22: hi sammukhe ṭhatvā buddhaguṇehi abhitthavīyamāno sārajjati maṅkubhāvaṃ āpajjati avesārajjappattatāya
atk-s0508a2:3639_23: ananuyogakkhamattā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyya”nti
atk-s0508a2:3659_0: Tattha paripuṇṇakāyoti abhibyattarūpānaṃ dvattiṃsāya mahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ paripuṇṇatāya
atk-s0508a2:3659_1: ahīnaṅgapaccaṅgatāya ca paripuṇṇasarīro. Surucīti sundarasarīrappabho. Sujātoti ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā,
atk-s0508a2:3659_2: saṇṭhānasampattiyā ca sunibbatto. Cārudassanoti sucirampi passantānaṃ atittijanakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3659_3: appaṭikkūlaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cāru eva dassanaṃ assāti cārudassano. Keci panāhu “cārudassanoti
atk-s0508a2:3659_4: sundaranetto”ti. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇoti suvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇo. Asīti bhavasi, idaṃ padaṃ “paripuṇṇakāyo
atk-s0508a2:3659_5: asī”tiādinā sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. Susukkadāṭhoti suṭṭhu sukkadāṭho. Bhagavato hi
atk-s0508a2:3659_6: dāṭhāhi candakiraṇā viya dhavalarasmiyo niccharanti. Vīriyavāti vīriyapāramīpāripūriyā
atk-s0508a2:3659_7: caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānato catubbidhassa sammappadhānassa sampattiyā ca atisayayutto.
atk-s0508a2:3660_0: Narassa hi sujātassāti samatiṃsāya pāramīnaṃ, ariyassa vā cakkavattīvattassa paripūritattā
atk-s0508a2:3660_1: suṭṭhu sammadeva jātassa narassa, mahāpurisassāti attho. Sabbe teti ye mahāpurisabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3661: Mahāpurisalakkhaṇāti pubbe vuttabyañjanāneva vacanantarena nigamento āha.
atk-s0508a2:3662_0: Idāni tesu lakkhaṇesu attanā abhirucitehi lakkhaṇehi bhagavantaṃ thomento “pasannanetto”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3662_1: Bhagavā hi pañca vaṇṇapasādasampattiyā pasannanetto. Paripuṇṇacandamaṇḍalasadisamukhatāya
atk-s0508a2:3662_2: sumukho. Ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā brahā. Brahmujugattatāya uju. Jutimantatāya patāpavā.
atk-s0508a2:3663_0: Idāni tameva patāpavantataṃ ādiccūpamāya vibhāvento “majjhe samaṇasaṅghassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3663_1: Tattha ādiccova virocasīti yathā ādicco uggacchanto sabbaṃ tamagataṃ vidhametvā ālokaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3663_2: karonto virocati, evaṃ tvampi anto ceva bahi ca sabbaṃ avijjātamaṃ viddhaṃsetvā ñāṇālokaṃ karonto virocasi.
atk-s0508a2:3664: Dassanīyarūpatāya aṅgīgatānaṃ dassanasampattīnaṃ āvahanato, kalyāṇehi pañcahi dassanehi samannāgatattā ca kalyāṇadassano. Uttamavaṇṇinoti uttamavaṇṇasampannassa.
atk-s0508a2:3665_0: Cakkavattīti cakkaratanaṃ vatteti, catūhi sampatticakkehi vatteti, tehi ca pare vatteti.
atk-s0508a2:3665_1: Parahitāya iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti cakkavattī. Atha vā catūhi acchariyadhammehi
atk-s0508a2:3665_2: ca saṅgahavatthūhi ca samannāgamena parehi anabhibhavanīyassa āṇācakkassa vatto etasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3665_3: atthītipi cakkavattī. Rathesabhoti rathikesu ājānīyausabhapuriso, mahārathikoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3665_4: Cāturantoti catusamuddantāya pathaviyā issaro. Vijitāvīti vijitavijayo. Jambusaṇḍassāti
atk-s0508a2:3665_5: jambudīpassa, pākaṭena hi issariyāni dassento evamāha. Cakkavattī pana saparittadīpānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3666_0: Khattiyāti jātikhattiyā. Bhogīti bhogiyā. Rājānoti ye keci rajjaṃ kārentā. Anuyantāti
atk-s0508a2:3666_1: anugāmino sevakā. Rājābhirājāti rājūnaṃ pūjanīyo rājā hutvā, cakkavattīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:3667: Evaṃ selena vutte bhagavā “ye te bhavanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, te sake vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṃ pātukarontī”ti imaṃ selassa manorathaṃ pūrento –
atk-s0508a2:3670: Dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi, cakkaṃ appaṭivattiya”nti. – imaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:3671_0: Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ, sela, yācasi, “rājā arahasi bhavituṃ cakkavattī”ti,
atk-s0508a2:3671_1: ettha appossukko hohi, rājāhamasmi, sati ca rājatte yathā añño rājā samānopi yojanasataṃ
atk-s0508a2:3671_2: vā anusāsati, dve tīṇi cattāri pañca yojanasatāni vā yojanasahassaṃ vā cakkavattī
atk-s0508a2:3671_3: hutvāpi catudīpapariyantamattaṃ vā, nāhamevaṃ paricchinnavisayo. Ahañhi dhammarājā
atk-s0508a2:3671_4: anuttaro bhavaggato avīcipariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimeyyalokadhātuyo anusāsāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3671_5: Yāvatā hi apadādibhedā sattā, ahaṃ tesaṃ aggo. Na hi me koci sīlena vā…pe… vimuttiñāṇadassanena
atk-s0508a2:3671_6: vā sadiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo. Svāhaṃ evaṃ dhammarājā anuttaro, anuttareneva catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedabodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a2:3671_7: dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi, “idaṃ pajahatha, idaṃ upasampajja viharathā”tiādinā āṇācakkaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3671_8: “Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādinā pariyattidhammena dhammacakkameva
atk-s0508a2:3671_9: vā. Cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti yaṃ cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti samaṇena vā…pe… kenaci vā lokasminti.
atk-s0508a2:3672: Evaṃ attānamāvikarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pītisomanassajāto selo puna daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:3675: Dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi, iti bhāsatha gotama.
atk-s0508a2:3679: Tattha ko nu senāpatīti dhammarañño bhoto dhammena pavattitassa cakkassa anupavattanako senāpati ko nūti pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:3680: Tena ca samayena bhagavato dakkhiṇapasse āyasmā sāriputto nisinno hoti, suvaṇṇapuñjo viya siriyā sobhamāno. Taṃ dassento bhagavā –
atk-s0508a2:3684: Tattha anujāto tathāgatanti, tathāgataṃ anujāto, tathā gatena hetunā ariyāya jātiyā jātoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3685_0: Evaṃ “ko nu senāpati bhoto”ti selena vuttapañhaṃ byākaritvā yaṃ selo āha “sambuddho
atk-s0508a2:3685_1: paṭijānāsī”ti tattha naṃ nikkaṅkhaṃ kātukāmo “nāhaṃ paṭiññāmatteneva paṭijānāmi,
atk-s0508a2:3685_2: api cāhaṃ iminā kāraṇena buddho”ti ñāpetuṃ –
atk-s0508a2:3688: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:3689_0: Tattha abhiññeyyanti cattāri saccāni cattāri ariyasaccāni. Catunnañhi saccānaṃ ariyasaccānañca
atk-s0508a2:3689_1: sāmaññaggahaṇametaṃ yadidaṃ abhiññeyyanti. Tattha ariyasaccesu yaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maggasaccaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3689_2: yañca pahātabbaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, tadubhayaggahaṇena tesaṃ phalabhūtāni nirodhasaccadukkhasaccānipi
atk-s0508a2:3689_3: gahitāneva honti hetuggahaṇeneva phalasiddhito. Tena tattha “sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3689_4: pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”nti idampi vuttameva hoti. “Abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññāta”nti vā iminā
atk-s0508a2:3689_5: ca sabbassapi ñeyyassa abhiññātasambuddhabhāvaṃ uddesavasena pakāsetvā tadekadesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3689_6: niddesavasena dassento “bhāvetabbañca bhāvita”ntiādimāha. Atha vā “bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3689_7: pahātabbaṃ pahīna”nti iminā attano ñāṇapahānasampadākittanamukhena taṃmūlakattā sabbepi
atk-s0508a2:3689_8: buddhaguṇā kittitā hontīti āha “tasmā buddhosmi, brāhmaṇā”ti. Abhiññeyyaabhiññātaggahaṇena
atk-s0508a2:3689_9: hi sabbaso vijjāvimuttīnaṃ gahitattā saphalaṃ catusaccabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ hetusampattiyā
atk-s0508a2:3689_10: dassento bujjhitabbaṃ sabbaṃ bujjhitvā buddho jātosmīti ñāyena hetunā attano buddhabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
atk-s0508a2:3690: Evaṃ nippariyāyena attānaṃ pātukaritvā attani kaṅkhāvitaraṇatthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ussāhento –
atk-s0508a2:3699: Sabbāmitte vase katvā, modāmi akutobhayo”ti. – gāthattayamāha;
atk-s0508a2:3700_0: Tattha vinayassūti vinehi chinda. Kaṅkhanti vicikicchaṃ. Adhimuccassūti adhimokkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3700_1: kara “sammāsambuddho”ti saddaha. Dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ hoti, sambuddhānanti yato kappānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3700_2: asaṅkhyeyyampi buddhasuñño loko hoti. Sallakattoti, rāgādisallakattano. Brahmabhūtoti
atk-s0508a2:3700_3: seṭṭhabhūto. Atituloti tulaṃ atīto, nirupamoti attho. Mārasenappamaddanoti “kāmā
atk-s0508a2:3700_4: te paṭhamā senā”ti evaṃ āgatāya mārasenāya pamaddano. Sabbāmitteti khandhakilesābhisaṅkhāramaccudevaputtamārasaṅkhāte
atk-s0508a2:3700_5: sabbapaccatthike. Vase katvāti attano vase katvā. Modāmi akutobhayoti kutoci nibbhayo
atk-s0508a2:3701: Evaṃ vutte selo brāhmaṇo tāvadeva bhagavati sañjātapasādo pabbajjāpekkho hutvā –
atk-s0508a2:3709: “Yo maṃ icchati anvetu, yo vā nicchati gacchatu;
atk-s0508a2:3711: Gāthattayamāha. Yathā taṃ paripākagatāya upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno.
atk-s0508a2:3713: Tato tepi māṇavakā hetusampannatāya tattheva pabbajjāpekkhā hutvā –
atk-s0508a2:3717: Gāthamāhaṃsu, yathā taṃ tena saddhiṃ katādhikārā kulaputtā.
atk-s0508a2:3718: Atha selo tesu māṇavakesu tuṭṭhacitto te dassento pabbajjañca yācamāno –
atk-s0508a2:3721: Brahmacariyaṃ carissāma, bhagavā tava santike”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:3722_0: Tato bhagavā yasmā selo heṭṭhā vuttanayena padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tesaṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:3722_1: tiṇṇaṃ purisasatānaṃ gaṇajeṭṭho hutvā ropitakusalamūlo, idāni pacchimabhavepi tesaṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:3722_2: ācariyo hutvā nibbatto, ñāṇañcassa tesañca paripakkaṃ, ehibhikkhubhāvassa ca upanissayo
atk-s0508a2:3722_3: atthi, tasmā te sabbeva ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjāya pabbājento –
atk-s0508a2:3725: Yattha amoghā pabbajjā, appamattassa sikkhato”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:3726_0: Tattha sandiṭṭhikanti paccakkhaṃ. Akālikanti maggānantaraphaluppattito na kālantare
atk-s0508a2:3726_1: pattabbaphalaṃ. Yatthāti yaṃnimittā. Maggabrahmacariyanimittā hi pabbajjā amoghā
atk-s0508a2:3726_2: anipphalā, yatthāti vā yasmiṃ sāsane appamattassa sativippavāsarahitassa tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhato.
atk-s0508a2:3727_0: Evañca vatvā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti bhagavā avoca. Tāvadeva te sabbe iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0508a2:3727_1: hutvā saṭṭhivassikattherā viya bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā parivāresuṃ. So evaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:3727_2: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sattame divase sapariso arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:3736: “Uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0508a2:3756: “Te me sutvāna vacanaṃ, gaṇaṃ bandhiṃsu tāvade;
atk-s0508a2:3762: “Ime tīṇi satā vīra, purisā ekato gaṇā;
atk-s0508a2:3765: Tiṇṇaṃ satānaṃ purato, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a2:3777: Pacchime bhave sampatte, vāseṭṭho nāma brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0508a2:3779: Selo iti mamaṃ nāmaṃ, chaḷaṅge pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:3783: Āvāho vā vivāho vā, rājā vā te nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3785: Na nimantemi rājānaṃ, āhutī me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:3786: “Na catthi mayhamāvāho, vivāho me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:3789: So me nimantito ajja, tassetaṃ paṭiyādanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3793: Vijjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3797: Sīhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3799: Nāgūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3801: Usabhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3803: Sakkūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3804: “Vasī gaṇī patāpī ca, tejassī ca durāsado;
atk-s0508a2:3805: Brahmūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3807: Dharaṇūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3809: Udadhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3811: Nerūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3813: Gaganūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3815: Assāsako mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3817: Ratanākaro mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3819: Meghūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3821: Sūriyūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3823: Candūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3825: Appameyyo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3827: Vimutti asadisā yassa, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3829: Yassa parakkamo jeṭṭho, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3830: “Rāgo doso ca moho ca, visā sabbe samūhatā;
atk-s0508a2:3831: Agadūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3833: Vejjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3835: Buddho buddhoti sutvāna, pīti me udapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:3838: “Kahaṃ nu kho so bhagavā, lokajeṭṭho narāsabho;
atk-s0508a2:3847: Gāvī yathā vacchagiddhā, evāhaṃ viciniṃ jinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3853: Mattova kuñjaro dantī, evaṃ buddhā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:3869: Buddhoti niṭṭhaṃ gantvāna, saha sissehi pabbajiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3875: Tena kammena sukatena, aṭṭha hetū labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3876: “Disāsu pūjito homi, bhogā ca amitā mama;
atk-s0508a2:3877: Patiṭṭhā homi sabbesaṃ, tāso mama na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:3878: “Byādhayo me na vijjanti, dīghāyuṃ pālayāmi ca;
atk-s0508a2:3883: Aṭṭha gopānasī nāma, tava putto mahāmuni.
atk-s0508a2:3885: Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3887: Ādeyyavacano homi, na dhaṃsemi yathā ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3888: “Abhantaṃ hoti me cittaṃ, akhilo homi kassaci;
atk-s0508a2:3889: Tena kammena sukatena, vimalo homi sāsane.
atk-s0508a2:3891: Sāvako te mahāvīra, bhikkhu taṃ vandate muni.
atk-s0508a2:3893: Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3895: Sabbasampattiko homi, maccheraṃ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:3901: Tena kammena sukatena, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3904: “Ye keci damakā loke, hatthiasse damenti ye;
atk-s0508a2:3905: Karitvā kāraṇā nānā, dāruṇena damenti te.
atk-s0508a2:3915: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:3919_0: Gāthamāha. Tassattho – pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhuma bhagavā yasmā mayaṃ ito atīte aṭṭhame
atk-s0508a2:3919_1: divase taṃ saraṇaṃ agamimha. Tasmā sattarattena tava sāsane damakena dantā amha,
atk-s0508a2:3919_2: aho te saraṇagamanassa ānubhāvoti. Tato paraṃ –
atk-s0508a2:3921: “Tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni;
atk-s0508a2:3922: Tuvaṃ anusaye chetvā, tiṇṇo tāresimaṃ pajaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3926: Imāhi dvīhi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā osānagāthāya satthāraṃ vandanaṃ yācati –
atk-s0508a2:3929: Pāde vīra pasārehi, nāgā vandantu satthuno”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3930_0: Tattha tuvaṃ buddhoti tvameva imasmiṃ loke sabbaññubuddho. Diṭṭhadhammikādiatthena
atk-s0508a2:3930_1: sattānaṃ anusāsanato tvameva satthā. Sabbesaṃ mārānaṃ abhibhavanato mārābhibhū. Munibhāvato
atk-s0508a2:3930_2: muni. Anusaye chetvāti kāmarāgādike anusaye ariyamaggasatthena chinditvā. Tiṇṇoti
atk-s0508a2:3930_3: sayaṃ saṃsāramahoghaṃ tiṇṇo, desanāhatthena imaṃ pajaṃ sattakāyaṃ tāresi. Upadhīti
atk-s0508a2:3930_4: khandhūpadhiādayo sabbe upadhī. Adupādānoti sabbaso pahīnakāmupādānādiko. Evaṃ vatvā
atk-s0508a2:3933_0: Yātaṃ me hatthigīvāyātiādikā āyasmato bhaddiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:3933_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle mahābhogakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:3933_2: viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uccākulikānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3933_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0508a2:3933_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3933_5: disvā byākāsi. Sopi taṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā uccākulikasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0508a2:3933_6: dhammassavanassa kārāpanaṃ, dhammamaṇḍape āsanadānaṃ, bījanīdānaṃ, dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3933_7: pūjāsakkārakaraṇaṃ, uposathāgāre paṭissayadānanti evamādiṃ yāvajīvaṃ bahupuññaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:3933_8: tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:3933_9: uppattiyā puretaraṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto sambahule paccekabuddhe piṇḍāya
atk-s0508a2:3933_10: caritvā ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samāgantvā bhattavissaggaṃ karonte disvā tattha pāsāṇaphalakāni
atk-s0508a2:3934_0: So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare
atk-s0508a2:3934_1: sākiyarājakule nibbatti, bhaddiyotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So vayappatto anuruddhādīhi pañcahi
atk-s0508a2:3934_2: khattiyehi saddhiṃ satthari anupiyambavane viharante satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3934_3: pāpuṇi. Taṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3934_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmento araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi
atk-s0508a2:3934_5: suññāgāragatopi “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti abhikkhaṇaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:3934_6: bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷigodhāya putto abhikkhaṇaṃ ‘aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3934_7: aho sukha’nti vadati, anabhirato maññe brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:3934_8: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhaddiya, abhikkhaṇaṃ ‘aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha’nti vadasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:3934_9: So “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti paṭijānitvā “pubbe me, bhante, rajjaṃ kārentassa susaṃvihitārakkho
atk-s0508a2:3934_10: ahosiṃ, tathāpi bhīto ubbiggo ussaṅkito vihāsiṃ. Idāni pana pabbajito abhīto anubbiggo
atk-s0508a2:3991: Imāhi gāthāhi satthu purato sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0508a2:3992_0: Tattha yātaṃ me hatthigīvāyāti, bhante, pubbe mayā gacchantenāpi hatthigīvāya hatthikkhandhe
atk-s0508a2:3992_1: nisīditvā yātaṃ caritaṃ. Vatthāni pariharantenāpi sukhumā sukhasamphassā kāsikavatthavisesā
atk-s0508a2:3992_2: dhāritā. Odanaṃ bhuñjantenāpi tivassikānaṃ purāṇagandhasālīnaṃ odano tittirakapiñjarādinā
atk-s0508a2:3992_3: sucinā maṃsena upasittatāya sucimaṃsūpasecano bhutto, tathāpi taṃ sukhaṃ na mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3992_4: cittaparitosakaraṃ ahosi, yathā etarahi vivekasukhanti dassento āha “sojja bhaddo”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:3992_5: Ettha ca hatthiggahaṇeneva assarathayānāni, vatthaggahaṇena sabbarājālaṅkārā, odanaggahaṇena
atk-s0508a2:3992_6: sabbabhojanavikati gahitāti veditabbaṃ. Sojjāti so ajja etarahi pabbajjāyaṃ ṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:3992_7: Bhaddoti sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā bhaddo. Sātatikoti samaṇadhamme diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāre
atk-s0508a2:3992_8: sātaccayutto. Uñchāpattāgate ratoti uñchācariyāya patte āgate pattapariyāpanne abhirato,
atk-s0508a2:3992_9: teneva santuṭṭhoti adhippāyo. Jhāyatīti phalasamāpattijhānena jhāyati. Putto godhāyāti
atk-s0508a2:3992_10: kāḷigodhāya nāma khattiyāya putto. Bhaddiyoti evaṃnāmo attānameva thero aññaṃ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3993_3: sapadānacārī. Nānāsanabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ekāsanikaṅgasamādānena ekāsaniko. Dutiyakabhājanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3993_8: Nasusānaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sosānikaṅgasamādānena sosāniko. Senāsanaloluppaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0508a2:3993_10: nesajjiko. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana dhutaṅgakathā visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva gahetabbā.
atk-s0508a2:3994_0: Ucceti uccādiṭṭhāne, uparipāsādatāya vā ucce. Maṇḍalipākāreti maṇḍalākārena pākāraparikkhitte.
atk-s0508a2:3994_1: Daḷhamaṭṭālakoṭṭhaketi thirehi aṭṭālehi dvārakoṭṭhakehi ca samannāgate, nagareti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3995: Satiṃ paññañcāti ettha satisīsena samādhiṃ vadati. Phalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattiyo sandhāya “satiṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti vutto. Sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-s0508a2:3996: Evaṃ thero satthu sammukhā sīhanādaṃ nadi. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū abhippasannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3999_0: Gacchaṃ vadesītiādikā āyasmato aṅgulimālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:3999_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:3999_2: sāvatthiyaṃ kosalarañño purohitassa bhaggavassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:3999_3: Tassa jātadivase sakalanagare āvudhāni pajjaliṃsu, rañño ca maṅgalāvudhaṃ sayanapīṭhe
atk-s0508a2:3999_4: ṭhapitaṃ pajjali, taṃ disvā rājā bhīto saṃviggo niddaṃ na labhi. Purohito tāyaṃ velāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3999_5: nakkhattayogaṃ ullokento “coranakkhattena jāto”ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi. So vibhātāya
atk-s0508a2:3999_6: rattiyā rañño santikaṃ gato sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi. Rājā “kuto, ācariya, sukhaseyyaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3999_7: rattiyaṃ mayhaṃ maṅgalāvudhaṃ pajjali, tassa ko nu kho vipāko bhavissatī”ti? “Mā
atk-s0508a2:3999_8: bhāyi, mahārāja, mayhaṃ ghare dārako jāto. Tassa ānubhāvena sakalanagarepi āvudhāni
atk-s0508a2:3999_9: pajjaliṃsū”ti. “Kiṃ bhavissati, ācariyā”ti? “Dārako coro bhavissatī”ti. “Kiṃ ekacārī
atk-s0508a2:3999_10: coro, udāhu gaṇajeṭṭhako”ti? “Ekacāriko, deva”. “Kiṃ naṃ māremā”ti? “Ekacāriko ce,
atk-s0508a2:3999_11: paṭijaggatha tāva na”nti āha. Tassa nāmaṃ karontā yasmā jāyamāno rañño cittaṃ vihesento
atk-s0508a2:3999_12: jāto, tasmā hiṃsakoti katvā pacchā diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭhanti viya ahiṃsakoti vohariṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4000_0: So vayappatto pubbakammabalena sattannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti. Tassidaṃ pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4000_1: – buddhasuññe loke kassako hutvā nibbatto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ vassodakena tintaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4000_2: allacīvaraṃ sītapīḷitaṃ attano khettabhūmiṃ upagataṃ disvā “puññakkhettaṃ me upaṭṭhita”nti
atk-s0508a2:4000_3: somanassajāto aggiṃ katvā adāsi. So tassa kammassa balena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:4000_4: thāmajavabalasampanno ca hutvā imasmiṃ pacchimattabhāve sattannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4000_5: dhāreti. So takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike dhammantevāsī hutvā
atk-s0508a2:4000_6: sippaṃ uggaṇhato ācariyabrāhmaṇaṃ tassa bhariyañca sakkaccaṃ paṭijaggati. Tenassa
atk-s0508a2:4000_7: sā brāhmaṇī gehe labbhamānena bhattādinā saṅgahaṃ karoti. Taṃ asahamānā aññe māṇavā
atk-s0508a2:4000_8: ācariyena saddhiṃ bhedaṃ akaṃsu. Brāhmaṇo tesaṃ vacanaṃ dve tayo vāre asaddahanto
atk-s0508a2:4000_9: hutvā pacchā saddahitvā “mahābalo māṇavo, na sakkā kenaci mārāpetuṃ, upāyena naṃ
atk-s0508a2:4000_10: māressāmī”ti cintetvā niṭṭhitasippaṃ attano nagaraṃ gantuṃ āpucchantaṃ māṇavaṃ āha
atk-s0508a2:4000_11: – “tāta ahiṃsaka, niṭṭhitasippena nāma antevāsinā ācariyassa garudakkhiṇā dātabbā,
atk-s0508a2:4000_12: taṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti. “Sādhu, ācariya, kiṃ dassāmī”ti? “Manussānaṃ sahassadakkhiṇahatthaṅgaliyo
atk-s0508a2:4000_13: ānehī”ti. Brāhmaṇassa kira ayamassa adhippāyo – bahūsu māriyamānesu ekantato eko
atk-s0508a2:4000_14: naṃ māreyyāti. Taṃ sutvā ahiṃsako attano ciraparicitaṃ nikkaruṇataṃ purakkhatvā sannaddhapañcāvudho
atk-s0508a2:4000_15: kosalarañño vijite jālinaṃ vanaṃ pavisitvā mahāmaggasamīpe pabbatantare vasanto pabbatasikhare
atk-s0508a2:4000_16: ṭhatvā maggena gacchante manusse oloketvā vegena gantvā aṅguliyo gahetvā rukkhagge
atk-s0508a2:4000_17: olambesi. Tā gijjhāpi kākāpi khādiṃsu, bhūmiyaṃ nikkhittā pūtibhāvaṃ agamaṃsu. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4000_18: gaṇanāya aparipūramānāya laddhā laddhā aṅguliyo suttena ganthitvā mālaṃ katvā yaññopacitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4000_19: viya aṃse olambesi. Tato paṭṭhāya aṅgulimālotvevassa samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4001_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ manusse mārente maggo avaḷañjo ahosi. So magge manusse alabhanto gāmūpacāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:4001_1: gantvā nilīyitvā āgatāgate manusse māretvā aṅguliyo gahetvā gacchati. Taṃ ñatvā manussā
atk-s0508a2:4001_2: gāmato apakkamiṃsu, gāmā suññā ahesuṃ, tathā nigamā janapadā ca. Evaṃ tena so padeso
atk-s0508a2:4001_3: ubbāsito ahosi. Aṅgulimālassa ca ekāya ūnā sahassaaṅguliyo saṅgahā ahesuṃ. Atha manussā
atk-s0508a2:4001_4: taṃ corupaddavaṃ kosalarañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā pātova nagare bheriṃ carāpesi, “sīghaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4001_5: aṅgulimālacoraṃ gaṇhāma, balakāyo āgacchatū”ti. Taṃ sutvā aṅgulimālassa mātā mantāṇī
atk-s0508a2:4001_6: nāma brāhmaṇī tassa pitaraṃ āha – “putto kira te coro hutvā idañcidañca karoti, taṃ
atk-s0508a2:4001_7: ‘īdisaṃ mā karī’ti saññāpetvā ānehi, aññathā naṃ rājā ghāteyyā”ti. Brāhmaṇo “na mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4001_8: tādisehi puttehi attho, rājā yaṃ vā taṃ vā karotū”ti āha. Atha brāhmaṇī puttasinehena
atk-s0508a2:4001_9: pātheyyaṃ gahetvā “mama puttaṃ saññāpetvā ānessāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0508a2:4002_0: Bhagavā “ayaṃ ‘aṅgulimālaṃ ānessāmī’ti gacchati, sace sā gamissati, aṅgulimālo ‘aṅgulisahassaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4002_1: pūressāmī’ti mātarampi māressati. So ca pacchimabhaviko, sacāhaṃ na gamissaṃ, mahājāni
atk-s0508a2:4002_2: abhavissā”ti ñatvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sayameva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:4002_3: aṅgulimālaṃ uddissa tiṃsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ padasāva paṭipajjamāno antarāmagge gopālakādīhi
atk-s0508a2:4002_4: vāriyamānopi jālinaṃ vanaṃ upagacchi. Tasmiñca khaṇe tassa mātā tena diṭṭhā, so mātaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:4002_5: dūratova disvā “mātarampi māretvā ajja ūnaṅguliṃ pūressāmī”ti asiṃ ukkhipitvā upadhāvi.
atk-s0508a2:4002_6: Tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ antare bhagavā attānaṃ dassesi. Aṅgulimālo bhagavantaṃ disvā “kiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4002_7: me mātaraṃ vadhitvā aṅguliyā gahitena? Jīvatu me mātā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ jīvitā
atk-s0508a2:4002_8: voropetvā aṅguliṃ gaṇheyya”nti ukkhittāsiko bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
atk-s0508a2:4002_9: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi, yathā pakatiiriyāpathena
atk-s0508a2:4002_10: gacchantampi attānaṃ aṅgulimālo sabbathāmena dhāvantopi na sakkoti sampāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4002_11: So parihīnajavo ghurughurupassāsī kacchehi sedaṃ muñcanto padaṃ uddharitumpi asakkonto
atk-s0508a2:4002_12: khāṇu viya ṭhito bhagavantaṃ “tiṭṭha tiṭṭha, samaṇā”ti āha. Bhagavā gacchantova “ṭhito
atk-s0508a2:4002_13: ahaṃ, aṅgulimāla, tvañca tiṭṭhā”ti āha. So “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā saccavādino,
atk-s0508a2:4002_14: ayaṃ samaṇo gacchantoyeva ‘ṭhito ahaṃ, aṅgulimāla, tvañca tiṭṭhā’ti āha, ahañcamhi
atk-s0508a2:4002_15: ṭhito, ko nu kho imassa adhippāyo, pucchitvā naṃ jānissāmī”ti bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0508a2:4004: “Gacchaṃ vadesi samaṇa ṭhitomhi, mamañca brūsi ṭhitamaṭṭhitoti;
atk-s0508a2:4005: Pucchāmi taṃ samaṇa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ ṭhito tvaṃ ahamaṭṭhitomhī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4006_0: Tattha samaṇāti bhagavantaṃ ālapati. Mamanti maṃ. Kathanti kenākārena. Ayañhettha
atk-s0508a2:4006_1: attho – samaṇa, tvaṃ gacchantova samāno “ṭhitomhī”ti vadesi. Mamañca ṭhitaṃyeva “aṭṭhito”ti
atk-s0508a2:4006_2: brūsi, vadesi. Kāraṇenettha bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā taṃ samaṇaṃ ahaṃ evamatthaṃ pucchāmi.
atk-s0508a2:4006_3: Kathaṃ kenākārena tvaṃ ṭhito ahosi, ahañca aṭṭhitomhīti. Evaṃ vutte bhagavā –
atk-s0508a2:4008: “Ṭhito ahaṃ aṅgulimāla sabbadā, sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4009: Tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosi, tasmā ṭhitohaṃ tuvamaṭṭhitosī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:4011_0: Tattha ṭhito ahaṃ, aṅgulimāla, sabbadā, sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍanti, aṅgulimāla,
atk-s0508a2:4011_1: ahaṃ sabbadā sabbakāle ādimajjhapariyosānesu tasathāvarabhedesu sabbesu sattesu daṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4011_2: nidhāya nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno, tato aññathā avattanato evarūpeneva
atk-s0508a2:4011_3: ṭhito. Tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosīti tvaṃ pana sattesu saññamarahito asi, luddo lohitapāṇi
atk-s0508a2:4011_4: hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno, tasmā asaññato virativasena aṭṭhito. Tato eva tāsu
atk-s0508a2:4011_5: tāsu gatīsu paribbhamanatopi tuvaṃ idāni iriyāpathena ṭhitopi aṭṭhito asi, ahaṃ pana
atk-s0508a2:4011_6: vuttappakārena ṭhitoti. Tato aṅgulimālo yathābhuccaguṇappabhāvitassa jalatale telassa
atk-s0508a2:4011_7: viya sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibyāpetvā ṭhitassa bhagavato kittisaddassa sutapubbattā hetusampattiyā
atk-s0508a2:4011_8: ñāṇassa ca paripākagatattā “ayaṃ so bhagavā”ti sañjātapītisomanasso “mahā ayaṃ sīhanādo,
atk-s0508a2:4011_9: mahantaṃ gajjitaṃ, nayidaṃ aññassa bhavissati, samaṇassa maññe gotamassa etaṃ gajjitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4011_10: diṭṭho vatamhi mahesinā sammāsambuddhena, mayhaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthaṃ bhagavā idhāgato”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0508a2:4013: “Cirassaṃ vata me mahito mahesī, mahāvanaṃ samaṇo paccapādi;
atk-s0508a2:4014: Sohaṃ cajissāmi sahassapāpaṃ, sutvāna gāthaṃ tava dhammayutta”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:4016_0: Tattha cirassaṃ vatāti cirakālena vata. Meti mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya. Mahitoti sadevakena
atk-s0508a2:4016_1: lokena mahatiyā pūjāya pūjito. Mahante sīlakkhandhādiguṇe esi, gavesīti mahesī. Mahāvanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4016_2: samaṇo paccapādīti imaṃ mahāraññaṃ samitasabbapāpo bhagavā paṭipajji. Sohaṃ cajissāmi
atk-s0508a2:4016_3: sahassapāpaṃ, sutvāna gāthaṃ tava dhammayuttanti sohaṃ dhammayuttaṃ dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4016_4: tava gāthaṃ suṇiṃ. Sohaṃ taṃ sutvāna “cirassampi cirakālenapi saṅgataṃ paricitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4016_5: pāpasahassaṃ pajahissa”nti cintetvā idāni naṃ aññadatthu pariccajissāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4016_6: Evaṃ pana vatvā yathā paṭipajji, yathā ca bhagavatā anuggahito, taṃ dassetuṃ –
atk-s0508a2:4018: “Icceva coro asimāvudhañca, sobbhe papāte narake anvakāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4019: Avandi coro sugatassa pāde, tattheva pabbajjamayāci buddhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4021: “Buddho ca kho kāruṇiko mahesi, yo satthā lokassa sadevakassa;
atk-s0508a2:4022: Tamehi bhikkhūti tadā avoca, eseva tassa ahu bhikkhubhāvo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4024_0: Tattha iccevāti iti eva evaṃ vatvā anantarameva. Coroti aṅgulimālo. Asinti khaggaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4024_1: Āvudhanti sesāvudhaṃ. Sobbheti samantato chinnataṭe. Papāteti ekato chinnataṭe. Naraketi
atk-s0508a2:4024_2: bhūmiyā phalitavivare. Idha pana tīhipi padehi yattha patitaṃ aññena gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0508a2:4024_3: tādisaṃ pabbatantarameva vadati. Anvakāsīti anu akāsi, pañcavidhampi attano āvudhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4024_4: anu khipi chaḍḍesi, tāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā “pabbājetha
atk-s0508a2:4024_5: maṃ, bhante”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ “avandi coro sugatassa pāde, tattheva pabbajjamayāci
atk-s0508a2:4024_6: buddha”nti. Evaṃ tena pabbajjāya yācitāya satthā tassa purimakammaṃ olokento ehibhikkhubhāvāya
atk-s0508a2:4024_7: hetusampattiṃ disvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā – “ehi, bhikkhu, svākhāto dhammo, cara
atk-s0508a2:4024_8: brahmacariyaṃ, sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha. Sā eva ca tassa pabbajjā upasampadā
atk-s0508a2:4024_9: ca ahosi. Tenāha “tamehi bhikkhūti tadā avoca, eseva tassa ahu bhikkhubhāvo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4025: Evaṃ thero satthu santike ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca labhitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento pītisomanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:4027: “Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
atk-s0508a2:4028: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
atk-s0508a2:4031: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
atk-s0508a2:4034: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. – gāthattayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4035_0: Tassattho – yo puggalo gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggato pubbe pāpamittasaṃsaggena
atk-s0508a2:4035_1: vā attano vā paṭisaṅkhānābhāvena pamajjitvā sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ pamādaṃ āpajjitvā,
atk-s0508a2:4035_2: pacchā kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena yoniso ummujjanto nappamajjati, sammā paṭipajjati,
atk-s0508a2:4035_3: samathavipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto tisso vijjā cha abhiññā pāpuṇāti, so abbhādīhi mutto
atk-s0508a2:4035_4: cando viya okāsalokaṃ attanā adhigatāhi vijjābhiññāhi imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ obhāsetīti.
atk-s0508a2:4036: Yassa puggalassa kataṃ upacitaṃ pāpakammaṃ kammakkhayakarena lokuttarakusalena avipākārahabhāvassa āharitattā vipākuppādane dvārapidhānena pidhīyati thakīyati. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:4037_0: Daharoti taruṇo, tenassa yogakkhamasarīrataṃ dasseti. So hi uppannaṃ vātātapaparissayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4037_1: abhibhavitvā yogaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. Yuñjati buddhasāsane sikkhattaye yuttappayutto
atk-s0508a2:4038_0: Evaṃ pītisomanassajāto vimuttisukhena viharanto yadā nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, tadā
atk-s0508a2:4038_1: aññenapi khitto leḍḍu therassa kāye nipatati, aññenapi khitto daṇḍo tasseva kāye
atk-s0508a2:4038_2: nipatati. So bhinnena pattena vihāraṃ pavisitvā satthu santikaṃ gacchati. Satthā
atk-s0508a2:4038_3: taṃ ovadati “adhivāsehi, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, adhivāsehi, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, yassa kho, tvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4038_4: brāhmaṇa, kammassa vipākena bahūni vassasahassāni niraye pacceyyāsi, tassa, tvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4038_5: brāhmaṇa, kammassa vipākaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme paṭisaṃvedesī”ti. Atha thero anodhiso
atk-s0508a2:4040: “Disāpi me dhammakathaṃ suṇantu, disāpi me yuñjantu buddhasāsane;
atk-s0508a2:4041: Disāpi me te manuje bhajantu, ye dhammamevādapayanti santo.
atk-s0508a2:4046: “Na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃse, aññaṃ vā pana kañci naṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4050: Dāruṃ damayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā.
atk-s0508a2:4056: Ajjāhaṃ saccanāmomhi, na naṃ hiṃsāmi kañci naṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4071: Appamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4077: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4092: Ohito garuko bhāro, bhavanetti samūhatā”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4093_0: Tattha disāpīti mayhaṃ disāpi amittā paccatthikāpi ye maṃ evaṃ upavadanti “yathā
atk-s0508a2:4093_1: mayaṃ aṅgulimālassa vasena ñātiviyogadukkhaparetā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāma, evaṃ aṅgulimālopi
atk-s0508a2:4093_2: dukkhaṃ pāpuṇātū”ti. Me dhammakathaṃ suṇantūti mayā satthu santike sutaṃ catusaccadhammapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4093_3: kathaṃ suṇantu. Yuñjantūti sutvā ca tadatthāya paṭipajjantu. Te manuje bhajantūti
atk-s0508a2:4093_4: tādise sappurise kalyāṇamitte bhajantu sevantu. Ye dhammamevādapayanti santoti ye
atk-s0508a2:4094_0: Khantivādānanti adhivāsanakhantimeva vadantānaṃ tato eva avirodhappasaṃsinanti kenaci
atk-s0508a2:4094_1: avirodhabhūtāya mettāya eva pasaṃsanasīlānaṃ. Suṇantu dhammaṃ kālenāti yuttappayuttakāle
atk-s0508a2:4094_2: tesaṃ santike dhammaṃ suṇantu. Tañca anuvidhīyantūti tañca yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ sammadeva
atk-s0508a2:4095_0: Na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃseti so mayhaṃ diso paccatthiko jātu, ekaṃseneva maṃ na hiṃse,
atk-s0508a2:4095_1: na bādheyya. Aññaṃ vā pana kañci nanti na kevalaṃ maṃyeva, aññaṃ vāpi kañci sattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4095_2: na hiṃseyya, pappuyya paramaṃ santinti, paramaṃ uttamaṃ santiṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇeyya,
atk-s0508a2:4095_3: pāpuṇitvā ca rakkheyya tasathāvareti sabbe ca satte paramāya rakkhāya rakkheyya,
atk-s0508a2:4096_0: Evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi pare pāpato parimocento parittakiriyaṃ nāma katvā attano
atk-s0508a2:4096_1: paṭipattiṃ pakāsento “udakaṃ hī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha pathaviyā thalaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā
atk-s0508a2:4096_2: ninnaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā mātikaṃ vā katvā rukkhadoṇiṃ vā ṭhapetvā attanā icchikicchitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4096_3: udakaṃ nentīti nettikā, udakahārino. Tejananti kaṇḍaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – nettikā
atk-s0508a2:4096_4: attano ruciyā udakaṃ nayanti, usukārāpi tāpetvā vaṅkābhāvaṃ harantā tejanaṃ usuṃ
atk-s0508a2:4096_5: damayanti, ujukaṃ karonti, tacchakāpi nemiādīnaṃ atthāya tacchantā dāruṃ damayanti
atk-s0508a2:4096_6: attano ruciyā ujuṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā karonti. Evaṃ ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṇḍitā sappaññā
atk-s0508a2:4096_7: ariyamaggaṃ uppādentā attānaṃ damenti, arahattappattā pana ekantadantā nāma hontīti.
atk-s0508a2:4097_0: Idāni purisadammasārathinā satthārā attano damitākāraṃ kataññutañca pakāsento “daṇḍeneke”tiādikā
atk-s0508a2:4097_1: pañca gāthā abhāsi. Tattha daṇḍeneke damayantīti rājarājamahāmattādayo daṇḍena, hatthiassādinā
atk-s0508a2:4097_2: balakāyena ca paccatthikādike damenti, gopālādayo ca gāvādike daṇḍena yaṭṭhiyā damenti.
atk-s0508a2:4097_3: Hatthācariyā hatthiṃ aṅkusehi, assācariyā asse kasāhi ca damenti. Adaṇḍena asatthena,
atk-s0508a2:4097_4: ahaṃ dantomhi tādināti ahaṃ pana iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattena sammāsambuddhena vinā
atk-s0508a2:4097_5: eva daṇḍena, vinā satthena, nihitadaṇḍanihitasatthabhāvena danto damito nibbisevano gato amhi.
atk-s0508a2:4098_0: Ahiṃsakoti me nāmaṃ, hiṃsakassa pure satoti satthārā samāgamato pubbe hiṃsakassa
atk-s0508a2:4098_1: me samānassa ahiṃsakoti nāmamattaṃ ahosi. Ajjāhanti idāni panāhaṃ “ahiṃsako”ti saccanāmo
atk-s0508a2:4098_2: avitathanāmo amhi. Tasmā na naṃ hiṃsāmi kañcipi sattaṃ na hiṃsāmi na bādhemi, nanti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4099_0: Vissutoti “pāṇātipātī luddo lohitapāṇī”tiādinā paññāto. Mahoghenāti kāmoghādinā mahatā
atk-s0508a2:4099_1: oghena, tassa oghassa vicchedakaraṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ buddhasaṅkhātaṃ saraṇaṃ agamaṃ upagacchiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4100: Lohitapāṇīti pāṇamatipātanena paresaṃ lohitena ruhirena makkhitapāṇi. Saraṇagamanaṃ passāti mahapphalaṃ mama saraṇagamanaṃ passāti attānamevālapati.
atk-s0508a2:4101_0: Tādisaṃ kammanti anekasatapurisavadhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tathārūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ. Phuṭṭho kammavipākenāti
atk-s0508a2:4101_1: pubbe katassa pāpakammassa vipākena phuṭṭho, sabbaso pahīnakammo vipākamattaṃ paccanubhonto.
atk-s0508a2:4101_2: Atha vā phuṭṭho kammavipākenāti upanissayabhūtassa kusalakammassa phalabhūtena lokuttaramaggena,
atk-s0508a2:4101_3: lokuttarakammasseva vā phalena vimuttisukhena phuṭṭho. Sabbaso kilesānaṃ khīṇattā
atk-s0508a2:4101_4: anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ, bhojanāpadesena cattāropi paccaye vadati.
atk-s0508a2:4102_0: Idāni pubbe attano pamādavihāraṃ garahāmukhena pacchā appamādapaṭipattiṃ pasaṃsanto
atk-s0508a2:4102_1: tattha ca paresaṃ ussāhaṃ janento “pamādamanuyuñjantī”tiādikā gāthā abhāsi. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:4102_2: bālāti bālyena samannāgatā idhalokaparalokatthaṃ ajānantā. Dummedhinoti nippaññā,
atk-s0508a2:4102_3: te pamāde ādīnavaṃ apassantā pamādaṃ anuyuñjanti pavattenti, pamādeneva kālaṃ vītināmenti.
atk-s0508a2:4102_4: Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya samannāgato pana paṇḍito kulavaṃsāgataṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4102_5: sattaratanadhanaṃ viya appamādaṃ rakkhati. Yathā hi “uttamaṃ dhanaṃ nissāya bhogasampattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4102_6: pāpuṇissāma, puttadāraṃ posessāma, sugatimaggaṃ sodhessāmā”ti dhane ānisaṃsaṃ passantā
atk-s0508a2:4102_7: dhanaṃ rakkhanti; evaṃ paṇḍitopi “appamādaṃ nissāya paṭhamajjhānādīni paṭilabhissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:4102_8: maggaphalāni pāpuṇissāmi, tisso vijjā cha abhiññā sampādessāmī”ti appamāde ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4102_9: passanto dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva appamādaṃ rakkhatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4103_0: Mā pamādanti pamādaṃ mā anuyuñjetha pamādena kālaṃ mā vītināmayittha. Kāmaratisanthavanti
atk-s0508a2:4103_1: vatthukāmesu, kilesakāmesu ca ratisaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāsanthavampi mā anuyuñjetha mā vindittha
atk-s0508a2:4103_2: mā paṭilabhittha. Appamatto hīti upaṭṭhitasatitāya appamatto puggalo jhāyanto jhāyanappasuto
atk-s0508a2:4104_0: Svāgataṃ nāpagatanti yaṃ tadā mama satthu santike āgataṃ āgamanaṃ, satthu vā tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4104_1: mahāvane āgamanaṃ, taṃ svāgataṃ svāgamanaṃ nāpagataṃ, atthato apetaṃ vigataṃ na hoti.
atk-s0508a2:4104_2: Netaṃ dummantitaṃ mamāti yaṃ tadā mayā “satthu santike pabbajissāmī”ti mantitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4104_3: idampi mama na dummantitaṃ, sumantitameva. Kasmā? Savibhattesu dhammesūti sāvajjānavajjādivasena
atk-s0508a2:4104_4: pakārato vibhattesu dhammesu yaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ nibbānaṃ. Tadupāgamaṃ tadeva upagacchinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4105_0: “Tadā puthujjanakāle payogāsayavipannatāya araññādīsu dukkhaṃ vihāsiṃ, idāni payogāsayasampannatāya
atk-s0508a2:4105_1: tattha sukhaṃ viharāmī”ti sukhavihārabhāvañceva “pubbe jātimattena brāhmaṇo, idāni
atk-s0508a2:4105_3: Tattha sukhaṃ sayāmīti sayantopi sukhaṃ sukhena nidukkhena cittutrāsādīnaṃ abhāvena
atk-s0508a2:4105_4: cetodukkharahito sayāmi. Ṭhāyāmīti ṭhāmi. Ahatthapāso mārassāti kilesamārādīnaṃ agocaro.
atk-s0508a2:4106: Brahmajaccoti brāhmaṇajātiko. Udicco ubhatoti mātito ca pitito ca ubhato udito saṃsuddhagahaṇiko. Sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:4109_0: Pahāya mātāpitarotiādikā āyasmato anuruddhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:4109_1: katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanno kuṭumbiko hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:4109_2: So ekadivasaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:4109_3: dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa
atk-s0508a2:4109_4: bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase bhagavato, bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a2:4109_5: ca uttamāni vatthāni datvā paṇidhānamakāsi. Satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4109_6: disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:4109_7: byākāsi. Sopi tattha puññāni karonto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite sattayojanike
atk-s0508a2:4110_0: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4110_1: kuṭumbikagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite yojanike kanakathūpe
atk-s0508a2:4110_2: bahū kaṃsapātiyo kāretvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā majjhe ekekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:4110_3: mukhavaṭṭiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ phusāpento cetiyaṃ parikkhipāpetvā attanā ekaṃ mahatiṃ kaṃsapātiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4110_4: kāretvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā sīse ṭhapetvā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4111_0: Evaṃ tasmimpi attabhāve yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā tattha
atk-s0508a2:4111_1: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto anuppanne buddhe bārāṇasiyaṃyeva duggatakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:4111_2: annabhārotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So sumanaseṭṭhissa nāma gehe kammaṃ karonto jīvati. So
atk-s0508a2:4111_3: ekadivasaṃ upariṭṭhaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya gandhamādanapabbatato
atk-s0508a2:4111_4: ākāsenāgantvā bārāṇasīnagaradvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4111_5: disvā pasannacitto pattaṃ gahetvā attano atthāya ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ bhāgabhattaṃ patte
atk-s0508a2:4111_6: pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa dātukāmo ārabhi. Bhariyāpissa attano bhāgabhattaṃ tattheva
atk-s0508a2:4111_7: pakkhipi. So taṃ netvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapesi. Paccekabuddho taṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:4111_8: anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Taṃ disvā rattiṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa chatte adhivatthā devatā
atk-s0508a2:4111_9: “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ, upariṭṭhe, suppatiṭṭhita”nti mahāsaddena anumodi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:4111_10: sumanaseṭṭhi “evaṃ devatāya anumoditaṃ idameva uttamadāna”nti cintetvā tattha pattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4111_11: yāci. Annabhāro pana tassa pattiṃ adāsi. Tena pasannacitto sumanaseṭṭhi tassa sahassaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4111_12: datvā “ito paṭṭhāya tuyhaṃ sahatthena kammakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi, patirūpaṃ gehaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:4112_0: Yasmā nirodhato vuṭṭhitassa paccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāto taṃdivasameva uḷārataravipāko
atk-s0508a2:4112_1: hoti, tasmā taṃdivasaṃ sumanaseṭṭhi rañño santikaṃ gacchanto taṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4112_2: Rājā pana taṃ ādaravasena olokesi. Seṭṭhi “mahārāja, ayaṃ oloketabbayuttoyevā”ti
atk-s0508a2:4112_3: vatvā tadā tena katapuññaṃ attanāpissa sahassaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā
atk-s0508a2:4112_4: tussitvā sahassaṃ datvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne gehaṃ katvā vasā”ti gehaṭṭhānamassa
atk-s0508a2:4112_5: āṇāpesi. Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhāpentassa mahantiyo nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tā disvā
atk-s0508a2:4112_6: so rañño ārocesi. Rājā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ uddharāpetvā rāsikataṃ disvā “ettakaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4112_7: imasmiṃ nagare kassa gehe atthī”ti? “Na kassaci, devā”ti. “Tena hi ayaṃ annabhāro
atk-s0508a2:4112_8: imasmiṃ nagare mahādhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotū”ti taṃdivasameva tassa seṭṭhichattaṃ ussāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:4113_0: So tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0508a2:4113_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sukkodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0508a2:4113_2: anuruddhotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So mahānāmassa sakkassa kaniṭṭhabhātā, satthu cūḷapitu
atk-s0508a2:4113_3: putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu alaṅkatanāṭakitthīhi
atk-s0508a2:4113_4: parivuto devo viya sampattiṃ anubhavanto suddhodanamahārājena ussāhitehi sakyarājūhi
atk-s0508a2:4113_5: satthu parivāratthaṃ pesitehi bhaddiyakumārādīhi anupiyambavane viharantaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:4113_6: upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā antovasseyeva dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetvā, puna
atk-s0508a2:4113_7: dhammasenāpatissa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāyaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a2:4113_8: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto sattamahāpurisavitakke vitakketvā aṭṭhamaṃ jānituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a2:4113_9: Tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā satthā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ kathetvā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4113_10: mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ deseti. So desanānusārena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhiññāpaṭisambhidāparivāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:4133: Divā rattiñca passāmi, samantā yojanaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4137: Tassa dīpo mayā dinno, vippasannena cetasā.
atk-s0508a2:4139_0: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno dibbacakkhukānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4139_1: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4140_0: So vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī viharanto ekadivasaṃ attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0508a2:4140_1: pītisomanassajāto udānavasena “pahāya mātāpitaro”tiādikā gāthā abhāsi. Keci pana
atk-s0508a2:4140_2: “therassa pabbajjaṃ arahattappattiñca pakāsentehi saṅgītikārehi ādito catasso gāthā
atk-s0508a2:4140_3: bhāsitā. Tato parā therassa ariyavaṃsapaṭipattiyā ārādhitacittena bhagavatā bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:4140_4: Itarā sabbāpi tena tena kāraṇena thereneva bhāsitā”ti vadanti. Iti sabbathāpi imā
atk-s0508a2:4140_5: gāthā therena bhāsitāpi, theraṃ uddissa bhāsitāpi therassa cetā gāthāti veditabbā. Seyyathidaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:4146: Na tena suddhimajjhagaṃ, mārassa visaye rato.
atk-s0508a2:4151: “Rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā;
atk-s0508a2:4160: “Mahiccho ca asantuṭṭho, saṃsaṭṭho yo ca uddhato;
atk-s0508a2:4161: Tassa dhammā ime honti, pāpakā saṃkilesikā.
atk-s0508a2:4167: Anāsavo ca so hoti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
atk-s0508a2:4172: “Yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi;
atk-s0508a2:4176: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4194: Vasī iddhiguṇe cutūpapāte, kāle passati devatā sa bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:4225_0: Tattha pahāyāti pajahitvā. Mātāpitaroti mātarañca pitarañca. Ayañhettha adhippāyo
atk-s0508a2:4225_1: – yathā aññe keci ñātipārijuññena vā bhogapārijuññena vā abhibhūtā pabbajanti, pabbajitā
atk-s0508a2:4225_2: ca kiccantarapasutā viharanti, na evaṃ mayaṃ. Mayaṃ pana mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4225_3: mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya kāmesu nirapekkhā pabbajitāti. Jhāyatīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4226_0: Sameto naccagītehīti naccehi ca gītehi ca samaṅgībhūto, naccāni passanto gītāni suṇantoti
atk-s0508a2:4226_1: attho. “Sammato”ti ca paṭhanti, naccagītehi pūjitoti attho. Sammatāḷappabodhanoti
atk-s0508a2:4226_2: sammatāḷasaddehi paccūsakāle pabodhetabbo. Na tena suddhimajjhaganti tena kāmabhogena
atk-s0508a2:4226_3: saṃsārasuddhiṃ nādhigacchiṃ. Mārassa visaye ratoti kilesamārassa visayabhūte kāmaguṇe
atk-s0508a2:4226_4: rato. “Kilesamārassa visayabhūtena kāmaguṇabhogena saṃsārasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhiko
atk-s0508a2:4226_5: ahutvāti attho. Tenāha “etañca samatikkammā”tiādi. Tattha etanti etaṃ pañcavidhampi
atk-s0508a2:4226_6: kāmaguṇaṃ. Samatikkammāti samatikkamitvā, anapekkho chaḍḍetvāti attho. Sabboghanti
atk-s0508a2:4227_0: Pañca kāmaguṇe sarūpato dassetuṃ “rūpā saddā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha manoramāti lobhanīyaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a2:4227_1: manaṃ ramayantīti manoramā, manāpiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha “katame pañca manāpiyā
atk-s0508a2:4228_1: attho. Ekoti ekākī apacchāsamaṇo. Adutiyoti nittaṇho. Taṇhā hi purisassa dutiyo nāma.
atk-s0508a2:4229_0: Vicinīti esantova tattha tattha saṅkārakūṭādike paṃsukūluppattiṭṭhāne vicini. Aggahīti
atk-s0508a2:4229_1: vicinitvā asucimakkhitampi ajigucchanto gaṇhi. Dhovīti, vikkhālesi. Rajayīti dhovitvā
atk-s0508a2:4229_2: gahitaṃ sibbitvā kappiyarajanena rajayi. Dhārayīti rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā dhāresi,
atk-s0508a2:4230_0: Idāni pācīnavaṃsadāye satthārā dinnaovādaṃ tassa ca attanā matthakappattabhāvaṃ dīpento
atk-s0508a2:4230_1: “mahiccho ca asantuṭṭho”tiādikā gāthā abhāsi. Tattha mahicchoti mahatiyā paccayicchāya
atk-s0508a2:4230_2: samannāgato, uḷāruḷāre bahū ca paccaye icchantoti attho. Asantuṭṭhoti nissantuṭṭho,
atk-s0508a2:4230_3: yathālābhasantosādinā santosena virahito. Saṃsaṭṭhoti gihīhi ceva pabbajitehi ca
atk-s0508a2:4230_4: ananulomikena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho. Uddhatoti ukkhitto. Tassāti “mahiccho”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:4230_5: vuttapuggalassa. Dhammāti mahicchatā asantoso, saṃsaṭṭhatā vikkhepoti īdisā. Lāmakaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a2:4230_6: pāpakā. Saṃkilesikāti tassa cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇato saṃkilesikā dhammā honti.
atk-s0508a2:4231_0: Sato ca hoti appicchoti yadā panāyaṃ puggalo kalyāṇamitte sevanto bhajanto payirupāsanto
atk-s0508a2:4231_1: saddhammaṃ suṇanto yoniso manasi karonto satimā ca mahicchataṃ pahāya appiccho ca
atk-s0508a2:4231_2: hoti. Asantosaṃ pahāya santuṭṭho, cittassa vighātakaraṃ vikkhepaṃ pahāya avighātavā
atk-s0508a2:4231_3: avikkhitto samāhito, gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya pavivekarato, vivekābhiratiyā nibbidāya
atk-s0508a2:4231_4: dhammapītiyā vitto sumano tuṭṭhacitto, sabbaso kosajjapahānena āraddhavīriyo.
atk-s0508a2:4232_0: Tassa evaṃ appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatassa ime satipaṭṭhānādayo sattatiṃsappabhedā
atk-s0508a2:4232_2: dhammā honti. So tehi samannāgato sabbaso āsavānaṃ khepanena aggamaggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a2:4232_3: anāsavo ca hoti. Iti evaṃ vuttaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena pācīnavaṃsadāye mahāpurisavitakke
atk-s0508a2:4233_0: Mama saṅkappamaññāyāti “apicchassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo mahicchassā”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:4233_1: mahāpurisavitakkavasena āraddhaṃ, te ca matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ asamatthabhāvena ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4233_2: mama saṅkappaṃ jānitvā. Manomayenāti manomayena viya, manasā nimmitasadisena pariṇāmitenāti
atk-s0508a2:4233_3: attho. Iddhiyāti “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti evaṃ pavattaadhiṭṭhāniddhiyā.
atk-s0508a2:4234_0: Yadā me ahu saṅkappoti yasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ “kīdiso nu kho aṭṭhamo mahāpurisavitakko”ti
atk-s0508a2:4234_1: parivitakko ahosi. Tato mama saṅkappamaññāya iddhiyā upasaṅkamīti yojanā. Uttari
atk-s0508a2:4234_2: desayīti “nippapañcārāmassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo nippapañcaratino, nāyaṃdhammo papañcārāmassa
atk-s0508a2:4234_3: papañcaratino”ti imamaṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūrento upari desayi. Taṃ pana desitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4234_4: dhammaṃ desento āha “nippapañcarato buddho, nippapañcamadesayī”ti. Papañcā nāma rāgādayo
atk-s0508a2:4234_5: kilesā, tesaṃ vūpasamatāya, tadabhāvato ca lokuttaradhammā nippapañcā nāma. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4234_6: nippapañce rato abhirato sammāsambuddho yathā taṃ pāpuṇāmi, tathā tādisaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4235: Tassāhaṃ dhammamaññāyāti tassā satthu desanāya dhammaṃ jānitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanto vihāsiṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahe sāsane rato abhirato hutvāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4236_0: Satthārā attano samāgamaṃ tena sādhitamatthaṃ dassetvā idāni attano pabbajitakālato
atk-s0508a2:4236_1: paṭṭhāya āraddhavīriyataṃ, kāye anapekkhatāya seyyasukhapassasukhānaṃ pariccāgaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4236_3: Tattha yato nesajjiko ahanti yato paṭṭhāya “yogānukūlatā kammaṭṭhānapariyuṭṭhitasappurisacariyā
atk-s0508a2:4236_4: sallekhavuttī”ti evamādiguṇe disvā nesajjiko ahosiṃ tāni pañcapaññāsa vassāni. Yato
atk-s0508a2:4236_5: middhaṃ samūhatanti yato paṭṭhāya mayā niddā pariccattā tāni pañcavīsativassāni.
atk-s0508a2:4236_6: “Therassa pañcapaññāsāya vassesu nesajjikassa sato ādito pañcavīsativassāni niddā
atk-s0508a2:4236_7: nāhosi, tato paraṃ sarīrakilamathena pacchimayāme niddā ahosī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:4237_0: “Nāhu assāsapassāsā” tiādikā tisso gāthā satthu parinibbānakāle bhikkhūhi “kiṃ bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:4237_1: parinibbuto”ti puṭṭho parinibbānabhāvaṃ pavedento āha. Tattha nāhu assāsapassāsā,
atk-s0508a2:4237_2: ṭhitacittassa tādinoti anulomapaṭilomato anekākāravokārā sabbā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a2:4237_3: vuṭṭhāya sabbapacchā catutthajjhāne ṭhitacittassa tādino buddhassa bhagavato assāsapassāsā
atk-s0508a2:4237_4: nāhu nāhesunti attho. Etena yasmā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannassa kāyasaṅkhārā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0508a2:4237_5: Kāyasaṅkhārāti ca assāsapassāsā vuccanti, tasmā catutthajjhānakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya assāsapassāsā
atk-s0508a2:4237_6: nāhesunti dasseti. Taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya abhāvato anejo, samādhismiṃ ṭhitattā vā
atk-s0508a2:4237_7: anejo. Santimārabbhāti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya. Cakkhumāti
atk-s0508a2:4237_8: pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā. Parinibbutoti parinibbāyi. Ayañhettha attho – nibbānārammaṇacatutthajjhānaphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4238_0: Asallīnenāti alīnena asaṃkuṭitena suvikasiteneva cittena. Vedanaṃ ajjhavāsayīti sato
atk-s0508a2:4238_1: sampajāno hutvā māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsesi, na vedanānuvattī hutvā ito cito
atk-s0508a2:4238_2: ca samparivatti. Pajjotasseva nibbānaṃ, vimokkho cetaso ahūti yathā telañca paṭicca,
atk-s0508a2:4238_3: vaṭṭiñca paṭicca pajjalanto pajjoto padīpo tesaṃ parikkhaye nibbāyati. Nibbuto ca
atk-s0508a2:4238_4: katthaci gantvā na tiṭṭhati, aññadatthu antaradhāyati, adassanameva gacchati; evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4238_5: kilesābhisaṅkhāre nissāya pavattamāno khandhasantāno tesaṃ parikkhaye nibbāyati,
atk-s0508a2:4238_6: nibbuto ca katthaci gantvā na tiṭṭhati, aññadatthu antaradhāyati, adassanameva gacchatīti
atk-s0508a2:4238_7: dasseti. Tena vuttaṃ “nibbanti dhīrā yathāyaṃ padīpo”ti, “accī yathā vātavegena khittā”ti ca ādi.
atk-s0508a2:4239_0: Eteti parinibbānakkhaṇe satthu santāne pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ attano paccakkhatāya
atk-s0508a2:4239_1: vuttaṃ. Pacchimakā tato paraṃ cittuppādābhāvato. Dānīti etarahi. Phassapañcamāti
atk-s0508a2:4239_2: phassapañcamakānaṃ dhammānaṃ pākaṭabhāvato vuttaṃ. Tathā hi cittuppādakathāyampi
atk-s0508a2:4239_3: phassapañcamakāva ādito vuttā. Aññe dhammāti saha nissayena aññe cittacetasikā dhammā,
atk-s0508a2:4239_4: na parinibbānacittacetasikā. Nanu tepi na bhavissantevāti? Saccaṃ na bhavissanti,
atk-s0508a2:4239_5: āsaṅkābhāvato pana te sandhāya “na bhavissantī”ti na vattabbameva. “Itare pana sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4239_6: viya bhavissanti nu kho”ti siyā āsaṅkāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “nāññe dhammā bhavissantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4240_0: Natthi dāni punāvāso, devakāyasmi jālinīti, ettha jālinīti devataṃ ālapati, devate
atk-s0508a2:4240_1: devakāyasmiṃ devasamūhe upapajjanavasena puna āvāso āvasanaṃ idāni mayhaṃ natthīti
atk-s0508a2:4240_2: attho. Tattha kāraṇamāha “vikkhīṇo”tiādinā. Sā kira devatā purimattabhāve therassa
atk-s0508a2:4240_3: pādaparicārikā, tasmā idāni theraṃ jiṇṇaṃ vuddhaṃ disvā purimasinehena āgantvā “tattha
atk-s0508a2:4240_4: cittaṃ paṇidhehi, yattha te vusitaṃ pure”ti devūpapattiṃ yāci. Atha “dāni natthī”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:4240_5: thero tassā paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. Taṃ sutvā devatā vihatāsā tatthevantaradhāyi.
atk-s0508a2:4241_0: Atha thero vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā attano ānubhāvaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento “yassa
atk-s0508a2:4241_1: muhuttenā”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – yassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno muhuttamattena eva sahassadhā
atk-s0508a2:4241_2: sahassappakāro tisahassimahāsahassipabhedo, loko sabrahmakappo sahabrahmaloko, saṃvidito
atk-s0508a2:4241_3: sammadeva vidito ñāto paccakkhaṃ kato, evaṃ iddhiguṇe iddhisampadāya cutūpapāte ca
atk-s0508a2:4241_4: vasībhāvappatto so bhikkhu upagatakāle devatā passati, na tassa devatānaṃ dassane
atk-s0508a2:4241_5: parihānīti. Therena kira jāliniyā devatāya paṭivacanadānavasena “natthi dānī”ti gāthāya
atk-s0508a2:4241_6: vuttāya bhikkhū jāliniṃ apassantā “kiṃ nu kho thero dhammālapanavasena kiñci ālapatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:4241_7: cintesuṃ. Tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā thero “yassa muhuttenā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:4242_0: Annabhāro pureti evaṃnāmo purimattabhāve. Ghāsahārakoti ghāsamattassa atthāya bhattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4242_1: katvā jīvanako. Samaṇanti samitapāpaṃ. Paṭipādesinti paṭimukho hutvā pādāsiṃ, pasādena
atk-s0508a2:4242_2: abhimukho hutvā āhāradānaṃ adāsinti adhippāyo. Upariṭṭhanti evaṃnāmakaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4242_3: Yasassinanti kittimantaṃ patthaṭayasaṃ. Imāya gāthāya yāva carimattabhāvā uḷārasampattihetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4242_4: attano pubbakammaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “somhi sakyakule jāto”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:4243_0: Ito sattāti ito manussalokato cavitvā devaloke dibbena ādhipaccena satta. Tato sattāti
atk-s0508a2:4243_1: tato devalokato cavitvā manussaloke cakkavattibhāvena satta. Saṃsārāni catuddasāti
atk-s0508a2:4243_2: catuddasa bhavantarasaṃsaraṇāni. Nivāsamabhijānissanti pubbenivāsaṃ aññāsiṃ. Devaloke
atk-s0508a2:4243_3: ṭhito tadāti tañca kho na imasmiṃyeva attabhāve, api ca kho yadā ito anantarātīte
atk-s0508a2:4243_4: attabhāve devaloke ṭhito, tadā aññāsinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4244_1: dve gāthā abhāsi. Tattha pañcaṅgike samādhimhīti abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānasamādhimhi.
atk-s0508a2:4244_2: So hi pītipharaṇatā, sukhapharaṇatā, cetopharaṇatā, ālokapharaṇatā, paccavekkhaṇanimittanti
atk-s0508a2:4244_3: imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā pañcaṅgiko samādhīti vuccati. Santeti paṭipakkhavūpasamena
atk-s0508a2:4244_4: aṅgasantatāya ca sante. Ekodibhāviteti ekodibhāvagate, suciṇṇe vasībhāvappatteti
atk-s0508a2:4244_5: attho. Paṭippassaddhiladdhamhīti kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā laddhe. Dibbacakkhu visujjhi
atk-s0508a2:4244_6: meti evaṃvidhe samādhimhi sampādite mayhaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visujjhi, ekādasahi upakkilesehi
atk-s0508a2:4245_0: Cutūpapātaṃ jānāmīti sattānaṃ cutiñca upapattiñca jānāmi, jānanto ca “ime sattā amumhā
atk-s0508a2:4245_1: lokamhā āgantvā idhūpapannā, imamhā ca lokā gantvā amumhi loke upapajjissantī”ti
atk-s0508a2:4245_2: sattānaṃ āgatiṃ gatiñca jānāmi, jānanto eva ca nesaṃ itthabhāvaṃ manussabhāvaṃ tato
atk-s0508a2:4245_3: aññathābhāvaṃ aññathātiracchānabhāvañca upapattito puretarameva jānāmi. Tayidaṃ sabbampi
atk-s0508a2:4245_4: pañcaṅgike samādhimhi sampādite evāti dassento āha “jhāne pañcaṅgike ṭhito”ti. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:4245_5: pañcaṅgike jhāne ṭhito patiṭṭhito hutvā evaṃ jānāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4246_0: Evaṃ vijjāttayaṃ dassetvā tappasaṅgena pubbe dassitampi tatiyavijjaṃ saha kiccanipphattiyā
atk-s0508a2:4246_1: dassento “pariciṇṇo mayā satthā”tiādinā gāthādvayamāha. Tattha vajjīnaṃ veḷuvagāmeti
atk-s0508a2:4246_2: vajjiraṭṭhassa veḷuvagāme, vajjiraṭṭhe yattha pacchimavassaṃ upagacchi veḷuvagāme.
atk-s0508a2:4246_3: Heṭṭhato veḷugumbasminti tattha aññatarassa veḷugumbassa heṭṭhā. Nibbāyissanti nibbāyissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:4249_0: Samaṇassa ahu cintātiādikā āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā. Imassa vatthu heṭṭhā
atk-s0508a2:4249_1: āgatameva. Tā ca gāthā satthari dharante attano puthujjanakāle manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4249_2: niggaṇhanacintāya pakāsanavasena bhāsitā. Imā pana aparabhāge satthari parinibbute
atk-s0508a2:4249_3: attano ca parinibbāne upaṭṭhite tadā āyatiñca bhikkhūnaṃ uddhammapaṭipattiyā pakāsanavasena bhāsitā. Tattha –
atk-s0508a2:4253_0: Ayaṃ gāthā saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitā. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayova. Ayaṃ pana sambandho
atk-s0508a2:4253_1: – satthari aggasāvakesu ekaccesu mahātheresu ca parinibbutesu atītasatthuke pāvacane
atk-s0508a2:4253_2: subbacesu sikkhākāmesu bhikkhūsu dullabhesu, dubbacesu micchāpaṭipattibahulesu bhikkhūsu
