atk-s0508a2:4253_3: ca jātesu supupphite mahante sālavane nisinnassa pavivittassa ekaggassa jhāyanasīlassa,
atk-s0508a2:4253_4: samitapāpatāya samaṇassa, pārāpariyattherassa paṭipattiṃ nissāya cintā vīmaṃsā ahosīti itarā –
atk-s0508a2:4256: Iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūnaṃ, aññathā dāni dissati.
atk-s0508a2:4261: “Paṇītaṃ yadi vā lūkhaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4265: Na bāḷhaṃ ussukā āsuṃ, yathā te āsavakkhaye.
atk-s0508a2:4277: Nibbutā dāni te therā, parittā dāni tādisā.
atk-s0508a2:4298: Kathā vaḍḍhenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.
atk-s0508a2:4307: Piṇḍapāte ca sampanne, ambe āmalakāni ca.
atk-s0508a2:4319: Dhammaṃ paresaṃ desenti, lābhato no ca atthato.
atk-s0508a2:4331: Satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna, evaṃ gāme munī care.
atk-s0508a2:4334: Kiñcāpi pacchimo kālo, phuseyya amataṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4339_0: Tattha iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūnanti purisuttame lokanāthamhi sammāsambuddhe tiṭṭhante
atk-s0508a2:4339_1: dharante etarahi paṭipattibhāvato. Aññathā aññena pakārena bhikkhūnaṃ iriyaṃ caritaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4339_2: ahosi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattibhāvato. Aññathā dāni dissatīti idāni pana tato aññathā
atk-s0508a2:4340_0: Idāni satthari dharante yenākārena bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipatti ahosi, taṃ tāva dassetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:4340_1: “sītavātaparittāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha mattaṭṭhiyanti taṃ mattaṃ payojanaṃ. Yāvadeva
atk-s0508a2:4340_2: sītavātaparittāṇaṃ, yāvadeva hirīkopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4340_3: Kathaṃ? Santuṭṭhā itarītare yasmiṃ tasmiṃ hīne paṇīte vā yathāladdhe paccaye santosaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0508a2:4341_0: Paṇītanti uḷāraṃ sappiādinā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tadabhāvena lūkhaṃ. Appanti, catupañcālopamattampi.
atk-s0508a2:4341_1: Bahuṃ yāpanatthaṃ abhuñjiṃsūti paṇītaṃ bahuṃ bhuñjantāpi yāpanamattameva āhāraṃ bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4341_2: Tato eva agiddhā gedhaṃ anāpannā. Nādhimucchitā na ajjhositā akkhabbhañjanaṃ viya
atk-s0508a2:4342_0: Jīvitānaṃ parikkhāre, bhesajje atha paccayepi jīvitānaṃ pavattiyā parikkhārabhūte
atk-s0508a2:4342_1: bhesajjasaṅkhāte paccaye gilānapaccaye. Yathā teti yathā te purimakā bhikkhū āsavakkhaye
atk-s0508a2:4342_2: ussukā yuttā āsuṃ, tathā te rogābhibhūtāpi gilānapaccaye bāḷhaṃ ativiya ussukā nāhesunti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4343: Tapparāyaṇāti vivekaparāyaṇā vivekapoṇā. Evaṃ catūhi gāthāhi catupaccayasantosaṃ bhāvanābhiratiñca dassentena tesaṃ ariyavaṃsapaṭipadā dassitā.
atk-s0508a2:4344_0: Nīcāti “mayaṃ paṃsukūlikā piṇḍapātikā”ti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāni akatvā nīcavuttino,
atk-s0508a2:4344_1: nivātavuttinoti attho. Niviṭṭhāti sāsane niviṭṭhasaddhā. Subharāti appicchatādibhāvena
atk-s0508a2:4344_2: suposā. Mudūti vattapaṭipattiyaṃ sakale ca brahmacariye mudū, suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4344_3: viya viniyogakkhamā. Mudūti vā abhākuṭikā uttānamukhā pupphitamukhena paṭisanthāravuttino,
atk-s0508a2:4344_4: sutitthaṃ viya sukhāvahāti vuttaṃ hoti. Athaddhamānasāti akathinacittā tena subbacabhāvamāha.
atk-s0508a2:4344_6: avokiṇṇāti attho. Amukharāti na mukharā, na mukhena kharā vacīpāgabbhiyarahitāti
atk-s0508a2:4344_7: vā attho. Atthacintāvasānugāti hitacintāvasānugāhitacintāvasikā, attano paresañca
atk-s0508a2:4345_0: Tatoti tasmā nīcavuttādihetu. Pāsādikanti pasādajanikaṃ paṭipattiṃ passantānaṃ suṇantānañca
atk-s0508a2:4345_1: pasādāvahaṃ. Gatanti abhikkantapaṭikkantaparivattanādigamanaṃ. Gatanti vā kāyavācāpavatti.
atk-s0508a2:4345_2: Bhuttanti catupaccayaparibhogo. Nisevitanti gocaranisevanaṃ. Siniddhā teladhārāvāti
atk-s0508a2:4345_3: yathā anivattitā kusalajanābhisiñcitā savantī teladhārā avicchinnā siniddhā maṭṭhā
atk-s0508a2:4345_4: dassanīyā pāsādikā hoti, evaṃ tesaṃ ākappasampannānaṃ iriyāpatho acchiddo saṇho maṭṭho
atk-s0508a2:4346_0: Mahājhāyīti mahantehi jhānehi jhāyanasīlā, mahantaṃ vā nibbānaṃ jhāyantīti mahājhāyī.
atk-s0508a2:4346_1: Tato eva mahāhitā, mahantehi hitehi samannāgatāti attho. Te therāti te yathāvuttappakārā
atk-s0508a2:4346_2: paṭipattiparāyaṇā therā idāni parinibbutāti attho. Parittā dāni tādisāti idāni pacchime
atk-s0508a2:4346_3: kāle tādisā tathārūpā therā parittā appakā katipayā evāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:4347_0: Kusalānañca dhammānanti vivaṭṭassa upanissayabhūtānaṃ vimokkhasambhārānaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4347_1: Paññāya cāti tathārūpāya paññāya ca. Parikkhayāti abhāvato anuppattito. Kāmañcettha
atk-s0508a2:4347_2: paññāpi siyā anavajjadhammā, bahukārabhāvadassanatthaṃ panassā visuṃ gahaṇaṃ yathā
atk-s0508a2:4347_3: puññañāṇasambhārāti. Sabbākāravarūpetanti ādikalyāṇatādīhi sabbehi ākāravarehi pakāravisesehi
atk-s0508a2:4347_4: upetaṃ yuttaṃ jinassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ lujjati vinassatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4348_0: Pāpakānañca dhammānaṃ, kilesānañca yo utūti kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ lobhādīnañca
atk-s0508a2:4348_1: kilesānaṃ yo utu yo kālo, so ayaṃ vattatīti vacanaseso. Upaṭṭhitā vivekāya, ye ca
atk-s0508a2:4348_2: saddhammasesakāti ye pana evarūpe kāle kāyacittaupadhivivekatthāya upaṭṭhitā āraddhavīriyā,
atk-s0508a2:4348_3: te ca sesapaṭipattisaddhammakā honti. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – suvisuddhasīlācārāpi
atk-s0508a2:4348_4: samānā idāni ekacce bhikkhū iriyāpathasaṇṭhāpanaṃ, samathavipassanābhāvanāvidhānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4348_6: bhāvanamanuyuñjanti. Te sesapaṭipattisaddhammakā, paṭipattiṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0508a2:4349_0: Te kilesā pavaḍḍhantāti ye bhagavato orasaputtehi ca tadā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4349_1: gamitā kilesā, te etarahi laddhokāsā bhikkhūsu vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantā.
atk-s0508a2:4349_2: Āvisanti bahuṃ jananti kalyāṇamittarahitaṃ ayonisomanasikārabahulaṃ andhabālajanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4349_3: abhibhavitvā avasaṃ karontā āvisanti santānaṃ anupavisanti. Evaṃbhūtā ca te kīḷanti
atk-s0508a2:4349_4: maññe bālehi, ummattehiva rakkhasā, yathā nāma keḷisīlā rakkhasā bhisakkarahite ummatte
atk-s0508a2:4349_5: āvisitvā te anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā tehi kīḷanti, evaṃ te kilesā sammāsambuddhabhisakkarahite
atk-s0508a2:4349_6: andhabāle bhikkhū āvisitvā tesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādibhedaṃ anatthaṃ uppādentā tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4349_7: kīḷanti maññe, kīḷantā viya hontīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4350_0: Tena tenāti tena tena ārammaṇabhāgena. Vidhāvitāti virūpaṃ dhāvitā asāruppavasena
atk-s0508a2:4350_1: paṭipajjantā. Kilesavatthūsūti paṭhamaṃ uppannaṃ kilesā pacchā uppajjanakānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato
atk-s0508a2:4350_2: kilesāva kilesavatthūni, tesu kilesavatthūsu samūhitesu. Sasaṅgāmeva ghositeti hiraññasuvaṇṇamaṇimuttādikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4350_3: dhanaṃ vippakiritvā “yaṃ yaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādi yassa yassa hatthagataṃ, taṃ taṃ tassa
atk-s0508a2:4350_4: tasseva hotū”ti evaṃ kāmaghosanā sasaṅgāmaghosanā nāma. Tatthāyamattho – kilesavatthūsu
atk-s0508a2:4350_5: “yo yo kileso yaṃ yaṃ sattaṃ gaṇhāti abhibhavati, so so tassa tassa hotū”ti kilesasenāpatinā
atk-s0508a2:4350_6: mārena sasaṅgāme ghosite viya. Tehi tehi kilesehi abhibhūtā te bālaputhujjanā tena
atk-s0508a2:4351_0: Te evaṃ vidhāvitā kiṃ karontīti āha “pariccajitvā saddhammaṃ, aññamaññehi bhaṇḍare”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4351_1: Tassattho – paṭipattisaddhammaṃ chaḍḍetvā āmisakiñjakkhahetu aññamaññehi bhaṇḍare
atk-s0508a2:4351_2: kalahaṃ karontīti. Diṭṭhigatānīti “viññāṇamattameva atthi, nattheva rūpadhammā”ti,
atk-s0508a2:4351_3: “yathā puggalo nāma paramatthato natthi, evaṃ sabhāvadhammāpi paramatthato natthi,
atk-s0508a2:4351_4: vohāramattamevā”ti ca evamādīni diṭṭhigatāni micchāgāhe anventā anugacchantā idaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4351_5: seyyo idameva seṭṭhaṃ, aññaṃ micchāti maññanti.
atk-s0508a2:4352_1: Taṃ dadantassa gahaṭṭhassa ananulomikasaṃsaggavasena akiccāni pabbajitena akattabbāni
atk-s0508a2:4353_0: Udarāvadehakaṃ bhutvāti “ūnūdaro mitāhāro”ti vuttavacanaṃ acintetvā udarapūraṃ bhuñjitvā.
atk-s0508a2:4353_1: Sayantuttānaseyyakāti “dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti pāde pādaṃ accādhāya
atk-s0508a2:4353_2: sato sampajāno”ti vuttavidhānaṃ ananussaritvā uttānaseyyakā sayanti. Yā kathā satthugarahitāti
atk-s0508a2:4354_0: Sabbakārukasippānīti sabbehi vessādīhi kārukehi kattabbāni bhattatālavaṇṭakaraṇādīni
atk-s0508a2:4354_1: hatthasippāni. Cittiṃ katvānāti sakkaccaṃ sādaraṃ katvā. Avūpasantā ajjhattanti kilesavūpasamābhāvato
atk-s0508a2:4354_2: gadduhanamattampi samādhānābhāvato ca ajjhattaṃ avūpasantā, avūpasantacittāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4354_3: Sāmaññatthoti samaṇadhammo. Atiacchatīti tesaṃ ājīvakiccapasutatāya ekadesampi aphusanato
atk-s0508a2:4355_0: Mattikanti pākatikaṃ vā pañcavaṇṇaṃ vā gihīnaṃ viniyogakkhamaṃ mattikaṃ. Telacuṇṇañcāti
atk-s0508a2:4355_1: pākatikaṃ, abhisaṅkhataṃ vā telañca cuṇṇañca. Udakāsanabhojananti udakañca āsanañca
atk-s0508a2:4355_2: bhojanañca. Ākaṅkhantā bahuttaranti bahuṃ piṇḍapātādiuttaruttaraṃ ākaṅkhantā “amhehi
atk-s0508a2:4355_3: mattikādīsu dinnesu manussā daḷhabhattikā hutvā bahuṃ uttaruttaraṃ catupaccayajātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4356_0: Dante punanti sodhenti etenāti dantaponaṃ, dantakaṭṭhaṃ. Kapitthanti kapitthaphalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4356_2: Piṇḍapāte ca sampanneti vaṇṇādisampayutte odanavisese. “Ambe āmalakāni cā”ti ca-saddena
atk-s0508a2:4356_3: mātuluṅgatālanāḷikerādiphalāni avuttāni saṅgaṇhāti. Sabbattha gihīnaṃ upanāmenti
atk-s0508a2:4357_0: Bhesajjesu yathā vejjāti gihīnaṃ bhesajjappayogesu yathā vejjā, tathā bhikkhū paṭipajjantīti
atk-s0508a2:4357_1: adhippāyo. Kiccākicce yathā gihīti gahaṭṭhānaṃ khuddake ceva mahante ca kicce kattabbe
atk-s0508a2:4357_2: gihī viya. Gaṇikāva vibhūsāyanti attano sarīrassa vibhūsane rūpūpajīviniyo viya.
atk-s0508a2:4357_3: Issare khattiyā yathāti issare issariyapavattane yathā khattiyā, evaṃ kulapatī hutvā vattantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4358_0: Nekatikāti nikatiyaṃ niyuttā, amaṇiṃyeva maṇiṃ, asuvaṇṇaṃyeva suvaṇṇaṃ katvā paṭirūpasāciyoganiratā.
atk-s0508a2:4358_1: Vañcanikāti kūṭamānādīhi vippalambakā. Kūṭasakkhīti ayāthāvasakkhino. Apāṭukāti vāmakā,
atk-s0508a2:4358_2: asaṃyatavuttīti attho. Bahūhi parikappehīti yathāvuttehi aññehi ca bahūhi micchājīvappakārehi.
atk-s0508a2:4359_0: Lesakappeti kappiyalese kappiyapaṭirūpe. Pariyāyeti, paccayesu pariyāyassa yoge.
atk-s0508a2:4359_1: Parikappeti vaḍḍhiādivikappane, sabbattha visaye bhummaṃ. Anudhāvitāti mahicchatādīhi
atk-s0508a2:4359_2: pāpadhammehi anudhāvitā vositā. Jīvikatthā jīvikappayojanā ājīvahetukā. Upāyenāti
atk-s0508a2:4360_0: Upaṭṭhāpenti parisanti parisāya attānaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, yathā parisā attānaṃ upaṭṭhapenti,
atk-s0508a2:4360_1: evaṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantīti attho. Kammatoti kammahetu. Te hi attano kattabbaveyyāvaccanimittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4360_2: upaṭṭhapenti. No ca dhammatoti dhammanimittaṃ no ca upaṭṭhapenti. Yo satthārā ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitāya
atk-s0508a2:4360_3: parisāya saṅgaho anuññāto, tena na saṅgaṇhantīti attho. Lābhatoti lābhahetu, “ayyo
atk-s0508a2:4360_4: bahussuto, bhāṇako, ‘dhammakathiko’ti evaṃ sambhāvento mahājano mayhaṃ lābhasakkāre
atk-s0508a2:4360_5: upanayissatī”ti icchācāre ṭhatvā lābhanimittaṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desenti. No ca atthatoti
atk-s0508a2:4360_6: yo so vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ kathentena pattabbo attho, na taṃdiṭṭhadhammikādibhedahitanimittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4361_0: Saṅghalābhassa bhaṇḍantīti saṅghalābhahetu bhaṇḍanti “mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti, na tuyha”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a2:4361_1: kalahaṃ karonti. Saṅghato paribāhirāti, ariyasaṅghato bahibhūtā ariyasaṅghe tadabhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:4361_2: Paralābhopajīvantāti sāsane lābhassa andhabālaputhujjanehi pare sīlādiguṇasampanne
atk-s0508a2:4361_3: sekkhe uddissa uppannattā taṃ paralābhaṃ, parato vā dāyakato laddhabbalābhaṃ upajīvantā
atk-s0508a2:4361_4: bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū pāpajigucchāya abhāvato ahirikā samānā ca “mayaṃ paralābhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4361_5: bhuñjāma, parapaṭibaddhajīvikā”tipi na lajjare na hirīyanti.
atk-s0508a2:4362_0: Nānuyuttāti samaṇakaraṇehi dhammehi ananuyuttā. Tathāti yathā pubbe vuttā bandhanakārakādayo,
atk-s0508a2:4362_1: tathā. Eketi ekacce. Muṇḍā saṅghāṭipārutāti kevalaṃ muṇḍitakesatāya muṇḍā pilotikakhaṇḍehi
atk-s0508a2:4362_3: lābhasakkāramucchitāti lābhasakkārāsāya mucchitā ajjhositā hutvā, “pesalo dhutavādo
atk-s0508a2:4362_4: bahussuto”ti vā madhuravacanamanuyuttā “ariyo”ti ca kevalaṃ sambhāvanaṃ bahumānaṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:4362_5: icchanti esanti, na tannimitte guṇeti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4363_0: Evanti “kusalānañca dhammānaṃ paññāya ca parikkhayā”ti vuttanayena. Nānappayātamhīti
atk-s0508a2:4363_1: nānappakāre bhedanadhamme payāte samakate, nānappakārena vā saṃkilesadhamme payātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:4363_2: pavattituṃ āraddhe. Na dāni sukaraṃ tathāti idāni imasmiṃ dullabhakalyāṇamitte dullabhasappāyasaddhammassavane
atk-s0508a2:4363_3: ca kāle yathā satthari dharante aphusitaṃ aphuṭṭhaṃ, anadhigataṃ jhānavipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4363_4: phusituṃ adhigantuṃ, phusitaṃ vā hānabhāgiyaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyameva vā ahutvā yathā visesabhāgiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4363_5: hoti, tathā anurakkhituṃ pāletuṃ sukaraṃ, tathā na sukaraṃ, tathā sampādetuṃ na sakkāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4364_0: Idāni attano parinibbānakālassa āsannattā saṃkhittena ovādena sabrahmacāriṃ ovadanto
atk-s0508a2:4364_1: “yathā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānamhī”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yathā puriso kenacideva payojanena
atk-s0508a2:4364_2: kaṇṭakanicite padese anupāhano vicaranto “mā maṃ kaṇṭako vijjhī”ti satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva
atk-s0508a2:4364_3: vicarati, evaṃ kilesakaṇṭakanicite gocaragāme payojanena caranto muni satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna
atk-s0508a2:4364_4: satisampajaññayutto appamattova careyya kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:4365_0: Saritvā pubbake yogī, tesaṃ vattamanussaranti purimake yoge bhāvanāya yuttatāya yogī
atk-s0508a2:4365_1: āraddhavipassake saritvā tesaṃ vattaṃ āgamānusārena sammāpaṭipattibhāvanāvidhiṃ anussaranto
atk-s0508a2:4365_2: dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā yathāpaṭipajjanto. Kiñcāpi pacchimo kāloti yadipāyaṃ atītasatthuko
atk-s0508a2:4365_3: carimo kālo, tathāpi yathādhammameva paṭipajjanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpento phuseyya
atk-s0508a2:4366: Idaṃ vatvāti, yathādassitaṃ saṃkilesavodānesu imaṃ paṭipattividhiṃ kathetvā. Ayañca osānagāthā saṅgītikārehi therassa parinibbānaṃ pakāsetuṃ vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:4371_0: Tiṃsanipāte pāsādike bahū disvātiādikā āyasmato phussattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a2:4371_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā
atk-s0508a2:4371_2: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:4371_3: phussoti nāmaṃ ahosi. So viññutaṃ patto khattiyakumārehi sikkhitabbasippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4371_4: gato. Upanissayasampannattā kāmesu alaggacitto aññatarassa mahātherassa santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4371_5: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a2:4371_6: jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4371_7: Athekadivasaṃ paṇḍaragotto nāma eko tāpaso tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā nisinno sambahule
atk-s0508a2:4371_8: bhikkhū sīlācārasampanne susaṃvutindriye bhāvitakāye bhāvitacitte disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a2:4371_9: “sādhu vatāyaṃ paṭipatti loke ciraṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti cintetvā “kathaṃ nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:4371_10: anāgatamaddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipatti bhavissatī”ti theraṃ pucchi. Tamatthaṃ dassento saṅgītikārā –
atk-s0508a2:4374: Isi paṇḍarasagotto, apucchi phussasavhaya”nti. – gāthaṃ ādito ṭhapesuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4375_0: Tattha pāsādiketi attano paṭipattiyā pasādārahe. Bahūti sambahule. Bhāvitatteti samathavipassanābhāvanāhi
atk-s0508a2:4375_1: bhāvitacitte. Susaṃvuteti suṭṭhu saṃvutindriye. Isīti tāpaso. Paṇḍarasagottoti paṇḍarassa
atk-s0508a2:4375_2: nāma isino vaṃse jātattā tena samānagotto. Phussasavhayanti phussasaddena avhātabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4378: Anāgatamhi kālamhi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:4380_0: Tattha kiṃ chandāti imasmiṃ sāsane anāgate bhikkhū kīdisacchandā kīdisādhimuttikā,
atk-s0508a2:4380_1: kiṃ hīnādhimuttikā, udāhu paṇītādhimuttikāti attho. Kimadhippāyāti kīdisādhippāyā
atk-s0508a2:4380_2: kīdisajjhāsayā, kiṃ saṃkilesajjhāsayā, udāhu vodānajjhāsayāti attho. Atha vā chandā
atk-s0508a2:4380_3: nāma kattukamyatā, tasmā kīdisī tesaṃ kattukamyatāti attho. Adhippāyo ajjhāsayoyeva.
atk-s0508a2:4380_4: Kimākappāti kīdisākappā. Ākappāti ca vesagahaṇādivārittacārittavantoti attho. Bhavissareti
atk-s0508a2:4380_5: bhavissanti. Taṃ meti taṃ anāgate bhikkhūnaṃ chandādhippāyākappabhedaṃ pucchito mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4380_6: akkhāhi kathehīti theraṃ ajjhesati. Tassa thero tamatthaṃ ācikkhanto sakkaccasavane tāva niyojetuṃ –
atk-s0508a2:4384_0: Tassattho – bho paṇḍaranāma isi, yaṃ tvaṃ maṃ pucchasi, taṃ te anāgataṃ ācikkhissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:4384_1: ācikkhato pana mama vacanaṃ suṇāhi anāgatatthadīpanato saṃvegāvahato ca sakkaccaṃ upadhārehīti.
atk-s0508a2:4385: Atha thero anāgataṃsañāṇena bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca bhāviniṃ pavattiṃ yathābhūtaṃ disvā tassa ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a2:4387: “Kodhanā upanāhī ca, makkhī thambhī saṭhā bahū;
atk-s0508a2:4409: Kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī, carissantyariyā viya.
atk-s0508a2:4423: “Ye ye alābhino lābhaṃ, na te pujjā bhavissare;
atk-s0508a2:4424: Supesalepi te dhīre, sevissanti na te tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4430: Paṭisaṅkhā ca kāsāve, bhikkhūnaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:4450: “Uddhato unnaḷo bālo, sīlaṃ yassa na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:4472: Bhāvethaṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, phusantā amataṃ pada”nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4473_0: Tattha kodhanāti kujjhanasīlā. Bhavissanti anāgateti sambandho. Kiṃ therassa kāle
atk-s0508a2:4473_1: tathā nāhesunti? Na nāhesuṃ. Tadā pana kalyāṇamittabahulatāya ovādakesu viññāpakesu
atk-s0508a2:4473_2: sabrahmacārīsu bahūsu vijjamānesu kilesesu balavantesu paṭisaṅkhānabahulatāya ca
atk-s0508a2:4473_3: yebhuyyena bhikkhū akkodhanā ahesuṃ, āyatiṃ tabbipariyāye atikodhanā bhavissanti,
atk-s0508a2:4473_4: tasmā “anāgate”ti vuttaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Upanāhīti āghātavatthūsu āghātassa
atk-s0508a2:4473_5: upanayhanasīlā upanāhasambhavato vā upanāhī. Tattha purimakāliko byāpādo kodho, aparakāliko
atk-s0508a2:4473_6: upanāho. Sakiṃ pavatto vā doso kodho, anekakkhattuṃ pavatto upanāho. Paresaṃ vijjamāne
atk-s0508a2:4473_7: guṇe makkhanti puñjanti, tesaṃ vā udakapuñjaniyā viya udakassa makkho makkhanaṃ puñjanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4473_8: etesaṃ atthīti makkhī. Atimānalakkhaṇo thambho etesaṃ atthīti thambhī. Saṭhāti asantaguṇavibhāvanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0508a2:4473_9: sāṭheyyena samannāgatā. Issukīti parasampattikhiyyanalakkhaṇāya issāya samannāgatā.
atk-s0508a2:4473_10: Nānāvādāti aññamaññaṃ viruddhavādā viruddhadiṭṭhikā, kalahakārakā cāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4474_0: Aññātamānino dhamme, gambhīre tīragocarāti gambhīre durobhāse saddhamme aññāte eva
atk-s0508a2:4474_1: “ñātoti, diṭṭho”ti evaṃ mānino, tato eva tassa orabhāge pavattitāya orimatīragocarā.
atk-s0508a2:4474_2: Lahukāti lahusabhāvā capalā. Agarū dhammeti saddhamme gāravarahitā. Aññamaññamagāravāti
atk-s0508a2:4474_3: aññamaññasmiṃ appatissā, saṅghe sabrahmacārīsu ca garugāravavirahitā. Bahū ādīnavāti
atk-s0508a2:4474_4: vuttappakārā, vakkhamānā ca bahū anekadosā antarāyā. Loketi sattaloke. Uppajjissantyanāgateti
atk-s0508a2:4474_5: anāgate pātu bhavissanti. Sudesitaṃ imaṃ dhammanti, sammāsambuddhena suṭṭhu aviparītaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4474_6: ādikalyāṇādippakārena desitaṃ imaṃ āgamasaddhammaṃ. Kilesissantīti kiliṭṭhaṃ kilesadūsitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4474_8: asaddhammena saṇhasukhumaṃ rūpārūpadhammaṃ paṭikkhipissanti, diṭṭhisaṃkilesena ubhayatrāpi
atk-s0508a2:4474_9: taṇhāsaṃkilesena saṃkilesissanti malinaṃ karissanti. Dummatīti nippaññā. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4474_11: vedallakathaṃ kathentā kaṇhadhammaṃ okkamamānā na bujjhissantī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4475_0: Guṇahīnāti sīlādiguṇavirahitā dussīlā, alajjino ca. Atha vā guṇahīnāti vinayavārittādiguṇena
atk-s0508a2:4475_1: hīnā dhammavinaye appakataññuno. Saṅghamhīti saṅghamajjhe. Voharantāti kathentā,
atk-s0508a2:4475_2: saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya yaṃkiñci bhaṇantā. Visāradāti nibbhayā pagabbhā.
atk-s0508a2:4475_3: Balavantoti pakkhabalena balavanto. Mukharāti mukhakharā kharavādino. Assutāvinoti
atk-s0508a2:4475_4: na sutavanto, kevalaṃ lābhasakkārasilokasannissayena guṇadharā hutvā “dhammaṃ ‘adhammo’ti,
atk-s0508a2:4475_5: adhammañca ‘dhammo’ti, vinayaṃ ‘avinayo’ti, avinayañca ‘vinayo”’ti evaṃ attanā yathicchitamatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4476_0: Guṇavantoti sīlādiguṇasampannā. Voharantā yathātthatoti atthānurūpaṃ, aviparītatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4476_2: evaṃ dīpentā. Dubbalā te bhavissantīti parisāyaṃ alajjussannatāya balavirahitā te
atk-s0508a2:4476_3: bhavissanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ na tiṭṭhissati. Hirīmanā anatthikāti hirīmanto kenaci
atk-s0508a2:4476_4: anatthikā. Te hi dhammena vattuṃ samatthāpi pāpajigucchatāya appakiccatāya ca kehici
atk-s0508a2:4476_5: virodhaṃ akarontā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na vāyamantā diṭṭhāvikammaṃ vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4477_0: Rajatanti rūpiyaṃ, tena kahāpaṇalohamāsakādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Jātarūpanti
atk-s0508a2:4477_1: suvaṇṇaṃ, tena maṇimuttādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Vā-saddo samuccayattho “apadā
atk-s0508a2:4477_2: vā”tiādīsu viya. “Rajatajātarūpañcā”ti vā pāṭho. Khettanti yattha pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4477_3: ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ. Tadatthaṃ akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Ajeḷakanti eḷakā nāma ajāyeva,
atk-s0508a2:4477_4: te ṭhapetvā avasesā pasujātī ajā nāma. Ajeḷakaggahaṇeneva hettha gomahiṃsādīnampi
atk-s0508a2:4477_5: saṅgaho kato. Dāsidāsañcāti dāsiyo ca dāse ca. Dummedhāti aviddasuno, kappiyākappiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4477_6: sāruppāsāruppaṃ ajānantā attano atthāya sādiyissanti sampaṭicchissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4478_0: Ujjhānasaññinoti pare heṭṭhato katvā olokanacittā, anujjhāyitabbaṭṭhānepi vā ujjhānasīlā.
atk-s0508a2:4478_1: Bālāti duccintitacintanādinā bālalakkhaṇena samannāgatā, tato eva sīlesu asamāhitā
atk-s0508a2:4478_2: catupārisuddhisīlesu na samāhitacittā. Unnaḷāti, samussitatucchamānā. Vicarissantīti
atk-s0508a2:4478_3: mānaddhajaṃ ukkhipitvā vicarissanti. Kalahābhiratā magāti sārambhabahulatāya karaṇuttariyapasutā
atk-s0508a2:4478_4: kalahe eva abhiratā magasadisā migā viya attahitāpekkhā ghāsesanābhiratā dubbalavihesaparāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4479_0: Uddhatāti uddhaccena samannāgatā cittekaggatārahitā. Nīlacīvarapārutāti akappiyarajanarattena
atk-s0508a2:4479_1: nīlavaṇṇena cīvarena pārutā, tādisaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakā.
atk-s0508a2:4479_2: Kuhāti sāmantajappanādinā kuhanavatthunā kuhakā, asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya kohaññaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4479_3: katvā paresaṃ vimhāpayā. Thaddhāti kodhena mānena ca thaddhamānasā kakkhaḷahadayā.
atk-s0508a2:4479_4: Lapāti lapanakā kuhanavuttikā, pasannamānasehi manussehi “kena, bhante, ayyassa attho”ti
atk-s0508a2:4479_5: paccayadāyakānaṃ vadāpanakā, payuttavācāvasena, nippesikatāvasena ca paccayatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4479_6: lapakāti vā attho. Siṅgīti “tattha katamaṃ siṅgaṃ? Yaṃ siṅgaṃ siṅgāratā cāturatā
atk-s0508a2:4479_7: cāturiyaṃ parikkhatatā pārikkhatiya”nti evaṃ vuttehi siṅgasadisehi pākaṭakilesehi
atk-s0508a2:4479_8: samannāgatā, siṅgāracaritāti attho. “Ariyā viyā”ti idaṃ “kuhā”ti etasseva atthadassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4479_9: Kuhakānañhi ariyānamiva ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassento ariyā viya vicarantīti āha.
atk-s0508a2:4480_0: Telasaṇṭhehīti sitthakatelena vā udakatelena vā osaṇṭhitehi. Capalāti kāyamaṇḍanaparikkhāramaṇḍanādinā
atk-s0508a2:4480_1: cāpallena yuttā. Añjanakkhikāti alaṅkārañjanena añjitanettā. Rathiyāya gamissantīti
atk-s0508a2:4480_2: bhikkhācariyāya kulūpasaṅkamanāpadesehi, mahāracchāya ito cito ca paribbhamissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4481_0: Ajegucchanti ajigucchitabbaṃ. Vimuttehīti ariyehi. Surattanti kappiyarajanena suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a2:4481_1: rattaṃ, arahantānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ciṇṇatāya arahaddhajaṃ jigucchissanti kāsāvaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:4481_2: Odātesu samucchitā gedhaṃ āpannā. Dantavaṇṇapārupanassa hi idaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ. Te
atk-s0508a2:4481_3: hi setakaṃ sambhāventā “sabbena sabbaṃ setake gahite liṅgapariccāgo eva siyā”ti dantavaṇṇaṃ pārupanti.
atk-s0508a2:4482_0: Lābhakāmāti lābhagiddhā. Bhikkhācariyāsupi kosajjayogato kusītā. Samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:4482_1: cittassa ussāhābhāvena hīnavīriyā. Kicchantāti, kilamantā, vanapatthesu vasituṃ kicchantā
atk-s0508a2:4482_2: kilantacittāti attho. Gāmantesūti gāmantasenāsanesu gāmasamīpesu senāsanesu, gāmadvāresu
atk-s0508a2:4483_0: Te teva anusikkhantāti ye ye micchājīvappayogena laddhalābhā, te te eva puggale anusikkhantā
atk-s0508a2:4483_1: bhamissanti. Bhamissantīti sayampi te viya micchājīvena lābhaṃ uppādetuṃ rājakulādīni
atk-s0508a2:4483_2: sevantā paribbhamissanti. “Bhajissantī”ti vā pāṭho, sevissantīti attho. Asaṃyatāti sīlasaṃyamarahitā.
atk-s0508a2:4484_0: Ye ye alābhino lābhanti ye ye bhikkhū micchājīvaparivajjanena appapuññatāya ca lābhassa
atk-s0508a2:4484_1: paccayassa na lābhino, te pujjā pūjanīyā pāsaṃsā tadā anāgate kāle na bhavissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4484_2: Supesalepi te dhīreti dhitisampannatāya dhīre suṭṭhu pesalepi te bhikkhū na sevissanti,
atk-s0508a2:4484_3: tadā anāgate te lābhino lābhakāmāva bhikkhūti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4485_0: Milakkhurajanaṃ rattanti kālakacchakarajanena rattaṃ. Samāsapadañhetaṃ, gāthāsukhatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4485_1: sānunāsikaniddeso. Garahantā sakaṃ dhajanti attano dhajabhūtaṃ kāsāvaṃ jigucchantā.
atk-s0508a2:4485_2: Sāsane pabbajitānañhi kāsāvo dhajo nāma. Titthiyānaṃ dhajaṃ kecīti keci sakyaputtiyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4485_3: paṭijānantā eva titthiyānaṃ setavatthikānaṃ dhajabhūtaṃ avadātakaṃ setavatthaṃ dhāressanti.
atk-s0508a2:4486_0: Agāravo ca kāsāveti arahaddhajabhūte kāsāve agāravo abahumānaṃ tadā anāgate tesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4486_1: bhavissati. Paṭisaṅkhā ca kāsāveti “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmī”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:4487_0: Kāsāvaṃ dhārentena kāsāvaṃ bahumānena “duccaritato oramitabba”nti kāsāvassa garukātabbabhāve
atk-s0508a2:4487_2: puthunā savisena sallena viddhassa, tato eva mahatā dukkhena abhibhūtassa. Ruppatoti
atk-s0508a2:4487_3: sarīravikāraṃ āpajjato. Mahāghorāti sarīrajīvitesu nirapekkhatāya bhimmā garutarā
atk-s0508a2:4487_4: paṭisaṅkhā aññehi acintiyā cintāmattena pavattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā chaddantamahānāgassaāsi,
atk-s0508a2:4487_5: ahosi. Chaddantanāgarājakāle hi bodhisatto soṇuttarena nāma nesādena paṭicchannaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:4487_6: ṭhatvā visapītena sallena viddho mahatā dukkhena abhibhūto taṃ gahetvā paridahitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4487_7: kāsāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ariyaddhajena paṭicchanno, na mayā hiṃsitabbo”ti tattha mettacittameva
atk-s0508a2:4492_0: Imamatthaṃ dassento thero “chaddanto hī”tiādimāha. Tattha surattaṃ arahaddhajanti
atk-s0508a2:4492_1: soṇuttarena paridahitakāsāvaṃ sandhāyāha. Abhaṇīti abhāsi. Gāthāti gāthāyo. Gajoti
atk-s0508a2:4492_2: chaddanto nāgarājā. Atthopasaṃhitāti atthasannissitā hitā, hitayuttāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4493_0: Chaddantanāgarājena vuttagāthāsu anikkasāvoti rāgādīhi kasāvehi kasāvo, paridahissatīti
atk-s0508a2:4493_2: damasaccenāti indriyadamena ceva paramatthasaccapakkhikena vacīsaccena ca apeto,
atk-s0508a2:4493_3: viyutto pariccattoti attho. Na soti so evarūpo puggalo kāsāvaṃ paridahituṃ nārahati.
atk-s0508a2:4494_0: Vantakasāvassāti catūhi maggehi vantakasāvo chaḍḍitakasāvo pahīnakasāvo assa bhaveyyāti
atk-s0508a2:4494_1: attho. Sīlesūti catupārisuddhisīlesu. Susamāhitoti suṭṭhu samāhito. Upetoti indriyadamena
atk-s0508a2:4494_2: ceva vuttappakārena saccena ca upagato samannāgato. Sa veti so evarūpo puggalo taṃ
atk-s0508a2:4495_0: Vipannasīloti bhinnasīlo. Dummedhoti nippañño sīlavisodhanapaññāya virahito. Pākaṭoti
atk-s0508a2:4495_1: “dussīlo aya”nti pākaṭo pakāso, vikkhittindriyatāya vā pākaṭo pākaṭindriyoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4495_2: Kāmakāriyoti bhinnasaṃvaratāya yathicchitakārako, kāmassa vā mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo.
atk-s0508a2:4495_3: Vibbhantacittoti rūpādīsu visayesu vikkhittacitto. Nissukkoti asukko sukkadhammarahito
atk-s0508a2:4496: Vītarāgoti vigatacchandarāgo. Odātamanasaṅkappoti suvisuddhamanovitakko, anāvilasaṅkappo vā.
atk-s0508a2:4497: Kāsāvaṃ kiṃ karissatīti yassa sīlaṃ natthi, tassa kāsāvaṃ kiṃ nāma payojanaṃ sādhessati, cittakatasadisaṃ tassa pabbajitaliṅganti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4498_0: Duṭṭhacittāti rāgādidosehi dūsitacittā. Anādarāti satthari dhamme aññamaññañca ādararahitā
atk-s0508a2:4498_1: agāravā. Tādīnaṃ mettacittānanti mettābhāvanāya sampayuttahadaye teneva arahattādhigamena
atk-s0508a2:4498_2: iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappatte uḷāraguṇe. Upayogatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Niggaṇhissantīti
atk-s0508a2:4498_3: “sīlādisampanne disvā te sambhāventā vipannasīle amhe na bahuṃ maññissantī”ti attani
atk-s0508a2:4498_4: agāravabhayena yathā te ubbāḷhā pakkamissanti, tathā bādhissantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4499_0: Sikkhāpentāpīti sikkhāpiyamānāpi. Kammatthe hi ayaṃ kattuniddeso. Therehīti attano
atk-s0508a2:4499_1: ācariyupajjhāyehi. Cīvaradhāraṇanti idaṃ samaṇapaṭipattiyā nidassanamattaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0508a2:4499_2: “evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādinā sikkhāpiyamānāpīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4500_0: Te tathā sikkhitā bālāti te andhabālā ācariyupajjhāyehi sikkhāpiyamānāpi anādaratāya
atk-s0508a2:4500_1: asikkhitāti. Nādiyissantupajjhāyeti upajjhāye ācariye ca ādaraṃ na karonti, tesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4500_2: anusāsaniyaṃ na tiṭṭhanti. Yathā kiṃ? Khaḷuṅko viya sārathiṃ yathā khaḷuṅko duṭṭhasso
atk-s0508a2:4500_3: assadamakaṃ nādiyati na tassa upadese tiṭṭhati, evaṃ tepi upajjhāyācariye na bhāyanti
atk-s0508a2:4501_0: “Eva”ntiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṃ. Tattha evanti vuttappakārena. Anāgataddhānanti
atk-s0508a2:4501_1: anāgatamaddhānaṃ, anāgate kāleti attho. Taṃyeva sarūpato dassento “patte kālamhi
atk-s0508a2:4501_2: pacchime”ti āha. Tattha katamo pacchimakālo? “Tatiyasaṅgītito paṭṭhāya pacchimakālo”ti
atk-s0508a2:4501_3: keci, taṃ eke nānujānanti. Sāsanassa hi pañcayugāni vimuttiyugaṃ, samādhiyugaṃ, sīlayugaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4501_4: sutayugaṃ, dānayuganti. Tesu paṭhamaṃ vimuttiyugaṃ, tasmiṃ antarahite samādhiyugaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4501_5: vattati, tasmimpi antarahite sīlayugaṃ vattati, tasmimpi antarahite sutayugaṃ vattateva.
atk-s0508a2:4501_6: Aparisuddhasīlo hi ekadesena pariyattibāhusaccaṃ paggayha tiṭṭhati lābhādikāmatāya.
atk-s0508a2:4501_7: Yadā pana mātikāpariyosānā pariyatti sabbaso antaradhāyati, tato paṭṭhāya liṅgamattameva
atk-s0508a2:4501_8: avasissati, tadā yathā tathā dhanaṃ saṃharitvā dānamukhena vissajjenti, sā kira nesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4501_9: carimā sammāpaṭipatti. Tattha sutayugato paṭṭhāya pacchimakālo, “sīlayugato paṭṭhāyā”ti apare.
atk-s0508a2:4502_0: Evaṃ thero pacchime kāle uppajjanakaṃ mahābhayaṃ dassetvā puna tattha sannipatitabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4502_1: ovādaṃ dadanto “purā āgacchate”tiādinā tisso gāthā abhāsi. Tattha purā āgacchate
atk-s0508a2:4502_2: etanti etaṃ mayā tumhākaṃ vuttaṃ paṭipattiantarāyakaraṃ anāgataṃ mahābhayaṃ āgacchati
atk-s0508a2:4502_3: purā, yāva āgamissati, tāvadevāti attho. Subbacāti vacanakkhamā sovacassakārakehi
atk-s0508a2:4502_4: dhammehi samannāgatā, garūnaṃ anusāsaniyo padakkhiṇaggāhino hothāti attho. Sakhilāti muduhadayā.
atk-s0508a2:4503_0: Mettacittāti sabbasattesu hitūpasaṃhāralakkhaṇāya mettāya sampayuttacittā. Kāruṇikāti
atk-s0508a2:4503_1: karuṇāya niyuttā paresaṃ dukkhāpanayanākāravuttiyā karuṇāya samannāgatā. Āraddhavīriyāti
atk-s0508a2:4503_2: akusalānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ upasampadāya paggahitavīriyā. Pahitattāti nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4504: Pamādanti pamajjanaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ananuṭṭhānaṃ, akusalesu ca dhammesu cittavossaggo. Vuttañhi –
atk-s0508a2:4505_0: “Tattha katamo pamādo? Kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu
atk-s0508a2:4505_1: vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppadānaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya
atk-s0508a2:4506_0: Appamādanti appamajjanaṃ, so pamādassa paṭipakkhato veditabbo. Atthato hi appamādo
atk-s0508a2:4506_1: nāma satiyā avippavāso, upaṭṭhitāya satiyā eva cetaṃ nāmaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – yasmā
atk-s0508a2:4506_2: pamādamūlakā sabbe anatthā, appamādamūlakā ca sabbe atthā, tasmā pamādaṃ bhayato
atk-s0508a2:4506_3: upaddavato disvā appamādañca khemato anupaddavato disvā appamādapaṭipattiyā sikhābhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4506_4: sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4506_5: ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetha, amataṃ nibbānaṃ phusantā sacchikarontā attano santāne uppādetha,
atk-s0508a2:4506_6: dassanamaggamatte aṭṭhatvā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ uppādanavasena vaḍḍhetha, evaṃ vo
atk-s0508a2:4507: Evaṃ thero sampattaparisaṃ ovadati. Imā eva cimassa therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahesunti.
atk-s0508a2:4510_0: Yathācārī yathāsatotiādikā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa gāthā. Tassa āyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa
atk-s0508a2:4510_1: ca vatthu evaṃ veditabbaṃ – atīte ito satasahassakappādhike asaṅkhyeyyamatthake āyasmā
atk-s0508a2:4510_2: sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, nāmena saradamāṇavo nāma ahosi. Mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0508a2:4510_3: gahapatimahāsālakule nibbatti, nāmena sirivaḍḍhakuṭumbiko nāma ahosi. Te ubhopi sahapaṃsukīḷakasahāyā
atk-s0508a2:4510_4: ahesuṃ. Tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4510_5: rahogato cintesi – “imesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma ekantikaṃ, tasmā mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4510_6: upagantvā mokkhamaggo gavesitabbo”ti sahāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, samma, ahaṃ pabbajitukāmo,
atk-s0508a2:4510_7: kiṃ tvaṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti vatvā tena “na sakkhissāmī”ti vutte “hotu ahameva
atk-s0508a2:4510_8: pabbajissāmī”ti ratanakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0508a2:4510_9: pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Tassa pabbajjaṃ anupabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā
atk-s0508a2:4510_10: brāhmaṇaputtā ahesuṃ. So pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi
atk-s0508a2:4510_11: jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi. Tepi sabbe pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4511_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0508a2:4511_1: satte saṃsāramahoghato tāretvā ekadivasaṃ “saradatāpasassa ca antevāsikānañca saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4511_2: karissāmī”ti eko adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya ākāsena gantvā “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti
atk-s0508a2:4511_3: tāpasassa passantasseva ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Saradatāpaso satthu
atk-s0508a2:4511_5: paccuggamanaṃ katvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Saradatāpaso
atk-s0508a2:4512_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tassa antevāsikā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni
atk-s0508a2:4512_1: phalāphalāni gahetvā āgatā satthāraṃ disvā sañjātappasādā attano ācariyassa ca satthu
atk-s0508a2:4512_2: ca nisinnākāraṃ oloketvā, “ācariya, mayaṃ pubbe ‘tumhehi mahantataro koci natthī’ti
atk-s0508a2:4512_3: vicarāma, ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti āhaṃsu. “Kiṃ vadetha, tātā?
atk-s0508a2:4512_4: Sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha?
atk-s0508a2:4512_5: Sabbaññubuddhena maṃ tulyaṃ mā karitthā”ti. Atha te tāpasā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:4512_6: “yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisuttamo”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4513_0: Atha te ācariyo āha – “tātā, satthu anucchaviko no deyyadhammo natthi, satthā ca
atk-s0508a2:4513_1: bhikkhācāravelāya idhāgato, handa mayaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathābalaṃ dassāma. Tumhehi
atk-s0508a2:4513_2: yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ, taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā
atk-s0508a2:4513_3: sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthārā ca phalāphale paṭiggaṇhitamatte devatā
atk-s0508a2:4513_4: dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. Tato bhojanakiccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4513_5: niṭṭhāpetvā satthari nisinne sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4513_6: kathaṃ kathento nisīdi. Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti
atk-s0508a2:4513_7: cintesi. Te satthu cittaṃ ñatvā tāvadeva satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā aggasāvakā
atk-s0508a2:4514_0: Tato saradatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi – “tātā, satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pupphāsanena
atk-s0508a2:4514_1: pūjā kātabbā, tasmā pupphāni āharathā”ti. Te tāvadeva iddhiyā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni
atk-s0508a2:4514_2: pupphāni āharitvā buddhassa yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ, ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4514_3: tigāvutaṃ, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṃ, saṅghanavakassa usabhamattaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4514_4: Evaṃ tesaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito
atk-s0508a2:4514_5: – “bhante, mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā”ti āha. Nisīdi bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:4514_6: pupphāsane. Satthari nisinne dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane
atk-s0508a2:4514_7: nisīdiṃsu. Satthā “tesaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū”ti nirodhaṃ samāpajji. Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4514_8: ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi nirodhaṃ samāpajjiṃsu. Tāpaso sattāhaṃ nirantaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:4514_9: pupphacchattaṃ dhārento aṭṭhāsi. Itare pana vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle
atk-s0508a2:4515_0: Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhāya aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi
atk-s0508a2:4515_1: – “tāpasānaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti. Thero sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā tesaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4515_2: akāsi. Tassa desanāvasāne satthā dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ anomattheraṃ āmantesi – “tvampi
atk-s0508a2:4515_3: imesaṃ dhammaṃ desehī”ti. Sopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:4515_4: Dvinnampi desanāya ekassapi dhammābhisamayo nāhosi. Atha satthā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā
atk-s0508a2:4515_5: dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. Desanāvasāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ avasesā sabbepi catusattatisahassamattā
atk-s0508a2:4515_6: jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Te tāvadeva
atk-s0508a2:4516_0: Saradatāpaso pana “aho vatāhampi ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa
atk-s0508a2:4516_1: aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti satthu desanākāle uppannaparivitakkatāya aññavihito hutvā
atk-s0508a2:4516_2: maggaphalāni paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi. Atha tathāgataṃ vanditvā tathā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4516_3: Satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā – “ito tvaṃ kappasatasahassādhikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4516_4: ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako sāriputto
atk-s0508a2:4516_5: nāma bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0508a2:4517_0: Saradatāpasopi sahāyakassa sirivaḍḍhassa santikaṃ gantvā, samma, mayā anomadassissa
atk-s0508a2:4517_1: bhagavato pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4518_0: Sirivaḍḍho taṃ upadesaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4518_1: kāretvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4518_2: paññāpetvā bhikkhūnampi āsanāni paññāpetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā, saradatāpasena
atk-s0508a2:4518_3: satthāraṃ nimantāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā, buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4518_4: mahārahehi vatthehi acchādetvā, dutiyasāvakabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthāpissa
atk-s0508a2:4518_5: anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā vuttanayena byākaritvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:4518_6: pakkāmi. Sirivaḍḍho haṭṭhapahaṭṭho yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā dutiyacittavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke
atk-s0508a2:4518_7: nibbatti. Saradatāpaso cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:4519_0: Tato paṭṭhāya nesaṃ ubhinnampi antarākammaṃ na kathitaṃ. Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato uppattito
atk-s0508a2:4519_1: puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahassa avidūre upatissagāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0508a2:4519_2: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Taṃdivasamevassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme
atk-s0508a2:4519_3: moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tāni kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā
atk-s0508a2:4519_4: kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyakāneva. Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ ekadivasameva gabbhaparihāramadaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4519_5: Dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesuṃ, nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0508a2:4519_6: rūpasāribrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā upatissoti nāmaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4519_7: akaṃsu. Itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Te ubhopi
atk-s0508a2:4519_8: mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhantā vuddhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4520_0: Athekadivasaṃ te rājagahe giraggasamajjaṃ passantā mahājanaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā ñāṇassa
atk-s0508a2:4520_1: paripākagatattā yoniso ummujjantā “sabbepime oraṃ vassasatānaṃ maccumukhe patissantī”ti
atk-s0508a2:4520_2: saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā “amhehi mokkhadhammo pariyesitabbo, tañca pariyesantehi ekaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4520_3: pabbajjaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nicchayaṃ katvā pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa
atk-s0508a2:4520_4: paribbājakassa santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo lābhaggayasaggappatto
atk-s0508a2:4520_5: ahosi. Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ pariggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ adisvā
atk-s0508a2:4520_6: tato nikkhamitvā tattha tattha te te paṇḍitasammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe pañhaṃ pucchanti,
atk-s0508a2:4520_7: te tehi puṭṭhā neva sampāyanti, aññadatthu teyeva tesaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjenti. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4520_8: te mokkhaṃ pariyesantā katikaṃ akaṃsu – “amhesu yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0508a2:4521_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthari paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke
atk-s0508a2:4521_1: anupubbena uruvelakassapādike sahassajaṭile dametvā rājagahe viharante ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4521_2: upatisso paribbājako paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto āyasmantaṃ assajittheraṃ rājagahe
atk-s0508a2:4521_3: piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “na mayā evarūpo ākappasampanno pabbajito diṭṭhapubbo, santadhammena
atk-s0508a2:4521_4: nāma ettha bhavitabba”nti sañjātappasādo pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āyasmantaṃ udikkhanto piṭṭhito
atk-s0508a2:4521_5: piṭṭhito anubandhi. Theropi laddhapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjituṃ patirūpaṃ okāsaṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:4521_6: Paribbājako attano paribbājakapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Bhattakiccapariyosāne cassa
atk-s0508a2:4522_0: Evaṃ so ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:4522_1: “ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi. Thero sammāsambuddhaṃ apadisi.
atk-s0508a2:4522_2: Puna tena “kiṃvādī panāyasmato satthā”ti puṭṭho “imassa sāsanassa gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:4522_3: attano navakabhāvaṃ pavedetvā saṅkhepavasena cassa sāsanadhammaṃ kathento “ye dhammā
atk-s0508a2:4522_4: hetuppabhavā”ti gāthamāha. Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva sutvā sahassanayasampanne
atk-s0508a2:4522_5: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, itaraṃ padadvayaṃ sotāpannakāle niṭṭhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0508a2:4522_6: pana sotāpanno hutvā upari visese appavattente “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0508a2:4522_7: theraṃ āha – “mā, bhante, upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhayittha, ettakameva hotu, kahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4522_8: amhākaṃ satthā vasatī”ti? “Veḷuvane”ti. “Bhante, tumhe purato gacchatha, ahaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4522_9: sahāyakassa katapaṭiññaṃ mocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgamissāmī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0508a2:4522_10: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4523_0: Kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya,
atk-s0508a2:4523_1: addhānena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti tenevassa visesādhigamaṃ sambhāvetvā amatādhigamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4523_2: pucchi. Sopissa “āmāvuso, amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0508a2:4523_3: kolito sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā āha – “kahaṃ no satthā”ti? “Veḷuvane”ti. “Tena
atk-s0508a2:4523_4: hi, āvuso, āyāma, satthāraṃ passissāmā”ti. Upatisso sabbakālampi ācariyapūjakova,
atk-s0508a2:4523_5: tasmā sañcayassa santikaṃ gantvā satthu guṇe pakāsetvā tampi satthu santikaṃ netukāmo
atk-s0508a2:4523_6: ahosi. So lābhāsāpakato antevāsikabhāvaṃ anicchanto “na sakkomi cāṭi hutvā udakasiñcanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4523_7: hotu”nti paṭikkhipi. Te anekehi kāraṇehi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānehi
atk-s0508a2:4523_8: aḍḍhateyyasatehi antevāsikehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu. Satthā te dūratova āgacchante
atk-s0508a2:4523_9: disvā “etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti vatvā tesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena
atk-s0508a2:4523_10: dhammaṃ desetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi. Yathā
atk-s0508a2:4523_11: tesaṃ, evaṃ aggasāvakānampi iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ āgatameva. Uparimaggattayakiccaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4523_12: pana na niṭṭhāti. Kasmā? Sāvakapāramīñāṇassa mahantatāya.
atk-s0508a2:4524_0: Tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāme
atk-s0508a2:4524_1: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto thinamiddhe okkante satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0508a2:4524_2: dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇanto eva uparimaggattayaṃ adhigantvā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4524_3: pāpuṇi. Āyasmā sāriputto pabbajitadivasato aḍḍhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4524_4: rājagahe sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa
atk-s0508a2:4524_5: vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4524_6: bhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi. Iti dvinnampi aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4524_7: satthu samīpe eva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:4542: Aṅkolā bimbijālā ca, pupphitā mama assame.
atk-s0508a2:4554: Aññe opupphā padumā, pupphitā taḷāke tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4560: Saṃgulā maggurā ceva, vasanti taḷāke tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4562: Oguhā ajagarā ca, vasanti taḷāke tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4566: Dindibhā suvapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4568: Pampakā jīvaṃjīvā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4570: Mahākāḷā ca sakuṇā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4571: “Pasadā ca varāhā ca, camarā gaṇḍakā bahū;
atk-s0508a2:4572: Rohiccā sukapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4576: Cetā ca luddakā ceva, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4582: Kolā bhallātakā billā, phalāni dhārayanti te.
atk-s0508a2:4584: Jīvakā sutakā ceva, bahukā mama assame.
atk-s0508a2:4590: Sukate assame ramme, viharāmi ahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4594: Sabbe maṃ brāhmaṇā ete, jātimanto yasassino.
atk-s0508a2:4606: Asaṃsaṭṭhā ca te dhīrā, mama sissā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:4608: Vītināmenti te rattiṃ, mama sissā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:4610: Mohanīye na muyhanti, mama sissā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:4617: “Purato pesenti khāriṃ, pacchato ca vajanti te;
atk-s0508a2:4636: Anattukkaṃsakā sabbe, na te vambhenti kassaci.
atk-s0508a2:4640: Kumbhaṇḍā dānavā garuḷā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4648: Vasāmi assame tattha, jhāyī jhānarato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4651: “Rattindivaṃ na jānāmi, arati me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:4652: Sake sisse ovadanto, bhiyyo hāsaṃ labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4670: Buddho nu kho na vā buddho, handa passāmi cakkhumaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4678: Taṃ ñāṇaṃ kittayissāmi, suṇātha mama bhāsato.
atk-s0508a2:4681: “Tuvaṃ satthā ca ketu ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4682: Parāyaṇo patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
atk-s0508a2:4684: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a2:4686: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā dharetave.
atk-s0508a2:4688: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a2:4699: “Tāva accuggato neru, āyato vitthato ca so;
atk-s0508a2:4702: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a2:4704: Ye keci udake pāṇā, antojālīkatā siyuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4721: “Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
atk-s0508a2:4722: Na hi buddhā ahetūhi, sitaṃ pātukaronti te.
atk-s0508a2:4731: “Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
atk-s0508a2:4750: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:4772: Yassāhaṃ kāraṃ katvāna, sabbattha pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:4773: “Aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dasseti me idha;
atk-s0508a2:4776: Vicinaṃ titthiye sabbe, esāhaṃ saṃsariṃ bhave.
atk-s0508a2:4784: Ye keci buddhimā sattā, sujjhanti jinasāsane.
atk-s0508a2:4788: Na tattha sāraṃ vindeyya, sārena rittako hi so.
atk-s0508a2:4794: Brāhmaṇo sañcayo nāma, tassa mūle vasāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4804: So me puṭṭho kathessati, paṭipucchāmahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4808: Kathaṃ gottosi tvaṃ vīra, kassa sissosi mārisa.
atk-s0508a2:4810: Buddho loke samuppanno, tassa sissomhi āvuso.
atk-s0508a2:4812: Buddhassa sāsanaṃ dhammaṃ, sādhu me kathayassu bho.
atk-s0508a2:4813: “So me puṭṭho kathī sabbaṃ, gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ padaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4815: “Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha;
atk-s0508a2:4824: So me attho anuppatto, kālo me nappamajjituṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4850: Paññāya sadiso natthi, tava puttassa cakkhuma.
atk-s0508a2:4852: Uttame damathe dantā, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4862: Anāgāmī ca arahā, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4864: Sāvakā te bahū sabbe, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4868: Paññāya pāramiṃ pattā, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4876: Sāsane te patiṭṭhāya, labhanti amataṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4878: Gaṅgā ca yamunā ceva, sarabhū ca atho mahī.
atk-s0508a2:4886: Ete sabbe atikkamma, jalasi sabbadā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4888: Sabbā velaṃva phusanti, sañcuṇṇā vikiranti tā.
atk-s0508a2:4890: Dhammaṃ vāditukāmā te, nātivattanti taṃ muniṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4898: Na so limpati toyena, parisuddho hi kesarī.
atk-s0508a2:4902: Nātikkamanti taṃ māsaṃ, samayo pupphanāya so.
atk-s0508a2:4912: Tevijjā chaḷabhiññā ca, iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a2:4918: Tathā hi jātimā eso, pasū tāseti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a2:4922: Kākā senāva vibbhantā, migaraññā yathā migā.
atk-s0508a2:4925: “Na hevaṃ tvaṃ mahāvīra, dhammaṃ desesi pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4932: Ekaṃ pañhaṃ kathentova, vimatiṃ chindasi pāṇinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4937: “Yathā sakena thāmena, kittito hi mayā jino;
atk-s0508a2:4939: “Sace hi koci devo vā, manusso vā susikkhito;
atk-s0508a2:4945: “Aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a2:4947: “Yo koci manujo bhāraṃ, dhāreyya matthake sadā;
atk-s0508a2:4948: Bhārena dukkhito assa, bhārehi bharito tathā.
atk-s0508a2:4951: “Oropito ca me bhāro, bhavā ugghāṭitā mayā;
atk-s0508a2:4954: Ahaṃ aggomhi paññāya, sadiso me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:4958: Kathesi sāsanaṃ mayhaṃ, nirodho sayanaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a2:4962: Lokanāthaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sadiso me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:4969: “Yadi rūpinī bhaveyya, paññā me vasumatīpi na sameyya;
atk-s0508a2:4978: Appicchā hotha santuṭṭhā, jhāyī jhānaratā sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4980: So me ācariyo dhīro, assaji nāma sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:4983: “Yo me ācariyo āsi, assaji nāma sāvako;
atk-s0508a2:4988_0: Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno attano sāvake tena
atk-s0508a2:4988_1: tena guṇavisesena etadagge ṭhapento – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4988_2: mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti theraṃ mahāpaññabhāvena etadagge ṭhapesi. So evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4988_3: sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patvā dhammasenāpatiṭṭhāne patiṭṭhahitvā sattahitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4988_4: karonto ekadivasaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ attano cariyavibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:4991: Ajjhattarato samāhitatto, eko santusito tamāhu bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4993: “Allaṃ sukkhaṃ vā bhuñjanto, na bāḷhaṃ suhito siyā;
atk-s0508a2:5006: Ubhayantarena nāhosi, kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā.
atk-s0508a2:5009: Appassuto anādaro, kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā.
atk-s0508a2:5020: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0508a2:5028: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0508a2:5031: Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo.
atk-s0508a2:5035: Taṃ me amoghaṃ savanaṃ, vimuttomhi anāsavo.
atk-s0508a2:5048: Evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhati.
atk-s0508a2:5059: “Ubhayena midaṃ maraṇameva, nāmaraṇaṃ pacchā vā pure vā;
atk-s0508a2:5060: Paṭipajjatha mā vinassatha, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā.
atk-s0508a2:5063: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā;
atk-s0508a2:5075: “Na vissase ekatiyesu evaṃ, agārisu pabbajitesu cāpi;
atk-s0508a2:5076: Sādhūpi hutvāna asādhu honti, asādhu hutvā puna sādhu honti.
atk-s0508a2:5100: Imā gāthā abhāsi. Imā hi kāci gāthā therena bhāsitā, kāci theraṃ ārabbha bhagavatā bhāsitā, sabbā pacchā attano cariyapavedanavasena therena bhāsitattā therasseva gāthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5101_0: Tattha yathācārīti yathā kāyādīhi saṃyato, saṃvuto hutvā carati viharati, yathācaraṇasīloti
atk-s0508a2:5101_1: vā yathācārī, sīlasampannoti attho. Yathāsatoti yathāsanto. Gāthāsukhatthañhi anunāsikalopaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5101_2: katvā niddeso kato, santo viya, ariyehi nibbisesoti attho. Satīmāti paramāya satiyā
atk-s0508a2:5101_3: samannāgato. Yatasaṅkappajjhāyīti sabbaso micchāsaṅkappaṃ pahāya nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena
atk-s0508a2:5101_4: saṃyatasaṅkappo hutvā ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanasīlo. Appamattoti
atk-s0508a2:5101_5: tasmiṃyeva yathācāribhāve yatasaṅkappo hutvā jhāyanena ca pamādarahito sabbattha
atk-s0508a2:5101_7: Samāhitattoti tāya eva bhāvanāya ekaggacitto. Ekoti asahāyo gaṇasaṃsaggaṃ, kilesasaṃsaggañca
atk-s0508a2:5101_8: pahāya kāyavivekaṃ, cittavivekañca paribrūhayanto. Santusitoti paccayasantosena ca
atk-s0508a2:5101_9: bhāvanārāmasantosena ca sammadeva tusito tuṭṭho. Bhāvanāya hi uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantiyā
atk-s0508a2:5101_10: uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati, matthakaṃ pattāya pana vattabbameva natthi. Tamāhu
atk-s0508a2:5101_11: bhikkhunti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ sikkhattayapāripūriyā bhayaṃ ikkhanatāya bhinnakilesatāya
atk-s0508a2:5102_0: Idāni yathāvuttasantosadvaye paccayasantosaṃ tāva dassento “allaṃ sukkhaṃ vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:5102_1: Tattha allanti sappiādiupasekena tintaṃ siniddhaṃ. Sukkhanti tadabhāvena lūkhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5102_2: Vā-saddo aniyamattho, allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ vāti. Bāḷhanti ativiya. Suhitoti dhāto na
atk-s0508a2:5102_3: siyāti attho. Kathaṃ pana siyāti āha “ūnūdaro mitāhāro”ti paṇītaṃ lūkhaṃ vāpi bhojanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5102_4: bhuñjanto bhikkhu yāvadatthaṃ abhuñjitvā ūnūdaro sallahukudaro, tato eva mitāhāro
atk-s0508a2:5102_5: parimitabhojano aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āharanto tattha mattaññutāya paccavekkhaṇasatiyā
atk-s0508a2:5103_0: Yathā pana ūnūdaro mitāhāro ca nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:5103_1: abhutvāti cattāro vā pañca vā ālope kabaḷe abhuñjitvā tattakassa āhārassa okāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5103_2: ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ piveyya. Ayañhi āhāre sallahukavutti. Nibbānañhi pesitacittassa
atk-s0508a2:5103_3: bhikkhuno phāsuvihārāya jhānādīnaṃ adhigamayogyatāya sukhavihārāya alaṃ pariyattanti
atk-s0508a2:5103_4: attho. Iminā kucchiparihāriyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vadanto piṇḍapāte itarītarasantosaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5103_5: “Bhutvānā”ti vā pāṭho, so catupañcālopamattenāpi āhārena sarīraṃ yāpetuṃ samatthassa
atk-s0508a2:5103_6: ativiya thirapakatikassa puggalassa vasena vutto siyā, uttaragāthāhipi saṃsandati
atk-s0508a2:5103_7: eva appakasseva cīvarassa senāsanassa ca vakkhamānattā.
atk-s0508a2:5104_0: Kappiyanti yaṃ kappiyakappiyānulomesu khomādīsu aññataranti attho. Tañce chādetīti
atk-s0508a2:5104_1: kappiyaṃ cīvaraṃ samānaṃ chādetabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ chādeti ce, satthārā anuññātajātiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5104_2: santaṃ heṭṭhimantena anuññātapamāṇayuttaṃ ce hotīti attho. Idamatthikanti idaṃ payojanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5104_4: attho. Etena kāyaparihāriyaṃ cīvaraṃ tattha itarītarasantosañca vadati.
atk-s0508a2:5105_0: Pallaṅkena nisinnassāti pallaṅkaṃ vuccati samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ, tena nisinnassa,
atk-s0508a2:5105_1: tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnassāti attho. Jaṇṇuke nābhivassatīti yassaṃ kuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5105_2: tathā nisinnassa deve vassante jaṇṇukadvayaṃ vassodakena na temiyati, ettakampi sabbapariyantasenāsanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5105_3: sakkā hi tattha nisīditvā atthakāmarūpena kulaputtena sadatthaṃ nipphādetuṃ. Tenāha
atk-s0508a2:5106_0: Evaṃ thero imāhi catūhi gāthāhi ye te bhikkhū mahicchā asantuṭṭhā, tesaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ
atk-s0508a2:5106_1: sallekhaovādaṃ pakāsetvā idāni vedanāmukhena bhāvanārāmasantosaṃ dassento “yo sukha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:5106_2: Tattha sukhanti sukhavedanaṃ. Dukkhatoti vipariṇāmadukkhato. Addāti addasa, vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0508a2:5106_3: maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ yo apassīti attho. Sukhavedanā hi paribhogakāle assādiyamānāpi
atk-s0508a2:5106_4: visamissaṃ viya bhojanaṃ vipariṇāmakāle dukkhāyeva hoti. Tenettha dukkhānupassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5106_5: dasseti. Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti dukkhavedanaṃ yo sallanti passi. Dukkhavedanā
atk-s0508a2:5106_6: hi yathā sallaṃ sarīraṃ anupavisantampi anupavisitvā ṭhitampi uddhariyamānampi pīḷanameva
atk-s0508a2:5106_7: janeti, evaṃ uppajjamānāpi ṭhitippattāpi bhijjamānāpi vibādhatiyevāti. Etenettha
atk-s0508a2:5106_8: dukkhānupassanaṃyeva ukkaṃsetvā vadati, tena ca “yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato
atk-s0508a2:5106_9: vedanādvaye attattaniyagāhaṃ viniveṭheti. Ubhayantarenāti ubhayesaṃ antare, sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5106_10: majjhabhūte adukkhamasukheti attho. Nāhosīti yathābhūtāvabodhane attattaniyābhinivesanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5106_11: ahosi. Kena lokasmi kiṃ siyāti evaṃ vedanāmukhena pañcapi upādānakkhandhe parijānitvā
atk-s0508a2:5106_12: tappaṭibaddhaṃ sakalakilesajālaṃ samucchinditvā ṭhito kena nāma kilesena lokasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5106_13: baddho, devatādīsu kiṃ vā āyati siyā, aññadatthu chinnabandhano apaññattikova siyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5107_0: Idāni micchāpaṭipanne puggale garahanto sammāpaṭipanne pasaṃsanto “mā me”tiādikā
atk-s0508a2:5107_1: catasso gāthā abhāsi. Tattha mā me kadāci pāpicchoti yo asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya
atk-s0508a2:5107_2: pāpiccho, samaṇadhamme ussāhābhāvena kusīto, tatoyeva hīnavīriyo, saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttassa
atk-s0508a2:5107_3: sutassa abhāvena appassuto, ovādānusāsanīsu ādarābhāvena anādaro, tādiso atihīnapuggalo
atk-s0508a2:5107_4: mama santike kadācipi mā hotu. Kasmā? Kena lokasmi kiṃ siyāti lokasmiṃ sattanikāye
atk-s0508a2:5107_5: tassa tādisassa puggalassa kena ovādena kiṃ bhavitabbaṃ, kena vā katena kiṃ siyā,
atk-s0508a2:5108_0: Bahussuto cāti yo puggalo sīlādipaṭisaṃyuttassa suttageyyādibhedassa bahuno sutassa
atk-s0508a2:5108_1: sambhavena bahussuto, dhammojapaññāya pārihāriyapaññāya paṭivedhapaññāya ca vasena
atk-s0508a2:5108_2: medhāvī, sīlesu ca suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitattā susamāhito, cetosamathaṃ lokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5108_3: cittasamādhānaṃ anuyutto, tādiso puggalo mayhaṃ matthakepi tiṭṭhatu, pageva sahavāso.
atk-s0508a2:5109_0: Yo papañcamanuyuttoti yo pana puggalo kammārāmatādivasena rūpābhisaṅgādivasena ca
atk-s0508a2:5109_1: pavattiyā papañcanaṭṭhena taṇhādibhedaṃ papañcaṃ anuyutto, tattha ca anādīnavadassanena
atk-s0508a2:5109_2: abhirato magasadiso, so nibbānaṃ virādhayi, so nibbānā suvidūravidūre ṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:5110_0: Yo ca papañcaṃ hitvānāti yo pana puggalo taṇhāpapañcaṃ pahāya tadabhāvato nippapañcassa
atk-s0508a2:5110_1: nibbānassa pathe adhigamupāye ariyamagge rato bhāvanābhisamaye abhirato, so nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5111_0: Athekadivasaṃ thero attano kaniṭṭhabhātikassa revatattherassa kaṇṭakanicitakhadirarukkhasañchanne
atk-s0508a2:5111_1: nirudakakantāre vāsaṃ disvā taṃ pasaṃsanto “gāme vā”tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:5111_2: gāme vāti kiñcāpi arahanto gāmante kāyavivekaṃ na labhanti, cittavivekaṃ pana labhanteva.
atk-s0508a2:5111_3: Tesañhi dibbapaṭibhāgānipi ārammaṇāni cittaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā gāme vā hotu
atk-s0508a2:5111_4: araññādīsu aññataraṃ vā, yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakanti so bhūmippadeso
atk-s0508a2:5112_1: sambandho. Yatthāti yesu araññesu vikasitesu viya ramamānesu kāmapakkhiko kāmagavesako
atk-s0508a2:5112_2: jano na ramati. Vītarāgāti vigatarāgā pana khīṇāsavā bhamaramadhukarā viya padumavanesu
atk-s0508a2:5112_3: tathārūpesu araññesu ramissantīti. Na te kāmagavesinoti yasmā te vītarāgā kāmagavesino na hontīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5113_0: Puna thero rādhaṃ nāma duggatabrāhmaṇaṃ anukampāya pabbājetvā, upasampādetvā tameva
atk-s0508a2:5113_1: pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ tassa ca subbacabhāvena tussitvā ovādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_2: dento “nidhīnaṃvā”tiādimāha. Tattha nidhīnaṃvāti tattha tattha nidahitvā ṭhapitānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_4: anukampaṃ katvā “ehi te sukhena jīvituṃ upāyaṃ dassessāmī”ti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ netvā hatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_5: pasāretvā “imaṃ gahetvā sukhaṃ jīvāhī”ti ācikkhitāraṃ viya. Vajjadassinanti dve vajjadassino
atk-s0508a2:5113_6: – “iminā naṃ asāruppena vā khalitena vā saṅghamajjhe niggaṇhissāmī”ti randhagavesako
atk-s0508a2:5113_7: ca, aññātaṃ ñāpetukāmo ñātaṃ assādento sīlādivuddhikāmatāya taṃ taṃ vajjaṃ olokento
atk-s0508a2:5113_8: ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhito cāti, ayaṃ idha adhippeto. Yathā hi duggatamanusso “imaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_9: nidhiṃ gaṇhāhī”ti niggayhamānopi nidhidassane kopaṃ na karoti, pamuditova hoti, evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_10: evarūpesu puggalesu asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā ācikkhante kopo na kātabbo, tuṭṭhacitteneva
atk-s0508a2:5113_11: bhavitabbaṃ, “bhante, punapi maṃ evarūpaṃ vadeyyāthā”ti pavāretabbameva. Niggayhavādinti
atk-s0508a2:5113_12: yo vajjaṃ disvā ayaṃ me saddhivihāriko, antevāsiko, upakārakoti acintetvā vajjānurūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_13: tajjento paṇāmento daṇḍakammaṃ karonto sikkhāpeti, ayaṃ niggayhavādī nāma sammāsambuddho
atk-s0508a2:5113_14: viya. Vuttañhetaṃ – “niggayha niggayhāhaṃ, ānanda, vakkhāmi; pavayha pavayha, ānanda,
atk-s0508a2:5113_15: vakkhāmi. Yo sāro so ṭhassatī”ti. Medhāvinti dhammojapaññāya samannāgataṃ. Tādisanti
atk-s0508a2:5113_16: evarūpaṃ paṇḍitaṃ. Bhajeti payirupāseyya. Tādisañhi ācariyaṃ bhajamānassa antevāsikassa
atk-s0508a2:5113_17: seyyo hoti, na pāpiyo, vuḍḍhiyeva hoti, no parihānīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5114_0: Athekadā assajipunabbasukehi kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāse dūsite satthārā āṇatto attano parisāya
atk-s0508a2:5114_1: mahāmoggallānena ca saddhiṃ tattha gato dhammasenāpati assajipunabbasukesu ovādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5114_2: anādiyantesu imaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha ovadeyyāti ovādaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ dadeyya. Anusāseyyāti
atk-s0508a2:5114_3: tasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ. Atha vā uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma, anuppanne
atk-s0508a2:5114_4: “ayasopi te siyā”tiādiṃ anāgataṃ uddissa vadanto anusāsati nāma. Sammukhā vadanto
atk-s0508a2:5114_5: vā ovadati nāma, parammukhā dūtaṃ, sāsanaṃ vā pesetvā vadanto anusāsati nāma. Sakiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5114_6: vadanto vā ovadati nāma, punappunaṃ vadanto anusāsati nāma. Asabbhā cāti akusalā
atk-s0508a2:5114_7: dhammā ca nivāraye, kusale dhamme ca patiṭṭhāpeyyāti attho. Satañhi soti evarūpo
atk-s0508a2:5114_8: puggalo sādhūnaṃ piyo hoti. Ye pana asantā asappurisā vitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā
atk-s0508a2:5114_9: jīvikatthāya pabbajitā, tesaṃ so ovādako anusāsako “na tvaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyo, na
atk-s0508a2:5114_10: ācariyo, kasmā amhe vadasī”ti evaṃ mukhasattīhi vijjhantānaṃ appiyo hotīti.
atk-s0508a2:5115_0: “Yaṃ ārabbha satthā dhammaṃ deseti, so eva upanissayasampanno”ti bhikkhūsu kathāya
atk-s0508a2:5115_1: samuṭṭhitāya “nayidameta”nti dassento “aññassā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha aññassāti attano
atk-s0508a2:5115_2: bhāgineyyaṃ dīghanakhaparibbājakaṃ sandhāyāha. Tassa hi satthārā vedanāpariggahasutte
atk-s0508a2:5115_3: desiyamāne ayaṃ mahāthero bhāvanāmagge adhigantvā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0508a2:5115_4: Sotamodhesimatthikoti satthāraṃ bījayamāno ṭhito atthiko hutvā sussūsanto sotaṃ odahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5115_5: Taṃ me amoghaṃ savananti taṃ tathā sutaṃ savanaṃ mayhaṃ amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ ahosi, aggasāvakena
atk-s0508a2:5116_0: Tattha neva pubbenivāsāyāti attano paresañca pubbenivāsajānanañāṇatthāya, paṇidhī
atk-s0508a2:5116_1: me neva vijjatīti yojanā. Parikammakaraṇavasena tadatthaṃ cittapaṇidhānamattampi
atk-s0508a2:5116_2: nevatthi neva ahosīti attho. Cetopariyāyāti cetopariyañāṇassa. Iddhiyāti iddhividhañāṇassa.
atk-s0508a2:5116_3: Cutiyā upapattiyāti, sattānaṃ cutiyā upapattiyā ca jānanañāṇāya cutūpapātañāṇatthāya.
atk-s0508a2:5116_4: Sotadhātuvisuddhiyāti dibbasotañāṇassa. Paṇidhī me na vijjatīti imesaṃ abhiññāvisesānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5116_5: atthāya parikammavasena cittassa paṇidhi cittābhinīhāro me natthi nāhosīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5116_6: Sabbaññuguṇā viya hi buddhānaṃ aggamaggādhigameneva sāvakānaṃ sabbe sāvakaguṇā hatthagatā
atk-s0508a2:5116_7: honti, na tesaṃ adhigamāya visuṃ parikammakaraṇakiccaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0508a2:5117_0: Rukkhamūlantiādikā tisso gāthā kapotakandarāyaṃ viharantassa yakkhena pahatakāle
atk-s0508a2:5117_1: samāpattibalena attano nibbikāratādīpanavasena vuttā. Tattha muṇḍoti na voropitakeso.
atk-s0508a2:5117_2: Saṅghāṭipārutoti saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā nisinno. “Saṅghāṭiyā supāruto”ti ca paṭhanti.
atk-s0508a2:5117_3: Paññāya uttamo theroti thero hutvā paññāya uttamo, sāvakesu paññāya seṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5117_4: Jhāyatīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyati, bahulaṃ samāpattivihārena viharatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5118_0: Upeto hoti tāvadeti yadā yakkhena sīse pahato, tāvadeva avitakkaṃ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5118_1: samāpanno ariyena tuṇhībhāvena upeto samannāgato ahosi. Atītatthe hi hotīti idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5119: Pabbatova na vedhatīti mohakkhayā bhinnasabbakileso bhikkhu. So selamayapabbato viya acalo suppatiṭṭhito iṭṭhādinā kenaci na vedhati, sabbattha nibbikāro hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5120_0: Athekadivasaṃ therassa asatiyā nivāsanakaṇṇe olambante aññataro sāmaṇero, “bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5120_1: parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabba”nti āha. Taṃ sutvā “bhaddaṃ tayā suṭṭhu vutta”nti sirasā
atk-s0508a2:5120_2: viya sampaṭicchanto tāvadeva thokaṃ apakkamitvā parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā “mādisānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5121_0: Puna maraṇe jīvite ca attano samacittataṃ dassento “nābhinandāmī”tiādinā dve gāthā
atk-s0508a2:5121_1: vatvā paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathento “ubhayena mida”ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha. Tattha ubhayenāti
atk-s0508a2:5121_2: ubhayesu, ubhosu kālesūti attho. Midanti ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Idaṃ maraṇameva,
atk-s0508a2:5121_3: maraṇaṃ attheva nāma, amaraṇaṃ nāma natthi. Kesu ubhosu kālesūti āha “pacchā vā pure
atk-s0508a2:5121_4: vā”ti majjhimavayassa pacchā vā jarājiṇṇakāle pure vā daharakāle maraṇameva maraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5121_5: ekantikameva. Tasmā paṭipajjatha sammā paṭipattiṃ pūretha vippaṭipajjitvā mā vinassatha
atk-s0508a2:5121_6: apāyesu mahādukkhaṃ mānubhavatha. Khaṇo vo mā upaccagāti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vivajjito
atk-s0508a2:5121_7: ayaṃ navamo khaṇo mā tumhe atikkamīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5122_0: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ disvā tassa guṇaṃ pakāsento “upasanto”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:5122_1: tisso gāthā abhāsi. Tattha anuddesikavasena “dhunātī”ti vuttamevatthaṃ puna therasannissitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5122_2: katvā vadanto “appāsī”tiādimāha. Tattha appāsīti adhunā pahāsīti attho. Anāyāsoti
atk-s0508a2:5122_3: aparissamo, kilesadukkharahitoti attho. Vippasanno anāviloti vippasanno asaddhiyādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5123_0: Na vissaseti gāthā devadattaṃ saddahitvā tassa diṭṭhiṃ rocetvā ṭhite vajjiputtake
atk-s0508a2:5123_1: ārabbha vuttā. Tattha na vissaseti vissaṭṭho na bhaveyya, na saddaheyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5123_2: Ekatiyesūti ekaccesu anavaṭṭhitasabhāvesu puthujjanesu. Evanti yathā tumhe “devadatto
atk-s0508a2:5123_3: sammā paṭipanno”ti vissāsaṃ āpajjittha, evaṃ. Agārisūti gahaṭṭhesu. Sādhūpi hutvānāti
atk-s0508a2:5123_4: yasmā puthujjanabhāvo nāma assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇukaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5123_5: viya ca anavaṭṭhito, tasmā ekacce ādito sādhū hutvā ṭhitāpi pacchā asādhū honti.
atk-s0508a2:5123_6: Yathā devadatto pubbe sīlasampanno abhiññāsamāpattilābhī hutvā lābhasakkārapakato
atk-s0508a2:5123_7: idāni parihīnaviseso chinnapakkhakāko viya āpāyiko jāto. Tasmā tādiso diṭṭhamattena
atk-s0508a2:5123_8: “sādhū”ti na vissāsitabbo. Ekacce pana kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggābhāvena ādito asādhū hutvāpi
atk-s0508a2:5123_9: pacchā kalyāṇasaṃsaggena sādhū hontiyeva, tasmā devadattasadise sādhupatirūpe “sādhū”ti
atk-s0508a2:5124_0: Yesaṃ kāmacchandādayo cittupakkilesā avigatā, te asādhū. Yesaṃ te vigatā, te sādhūti
atk-s0508a2:5124_1: dassetuṃ “kāmacchando”ti gāthaṃ vatvā asādhāraṇato ukkaṃsagataṃ sādhulakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5125_0: Asādhāraṇato pana ukkaṃsagataṃ taṃ dassetuṃ satthāraṃ attānañca udāharanto “mahāsamuddo”tiādikā
atk-s0508a2:5125_1: gāthā abhāsi. Tattha mahāsamuddoti ayaṃ mahāsamuddo, mahāpathavī selo pabbato, puratthimādibhedato
atk-s0508a2:5125_2: anilo ca attano acetanābhāvena iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ sahanti, na paṭisaṅkhānabalena, satthā
atk-s0508a2:5125_3: pana yassā arahattuppattiyā vasena uttame tādibhāve ṭhito iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha samo
atk-s0508a2:5125_4: nibbikāro, tassā satthu varavimuttiyā aggaphalavimuttiyā te mahāsamuddādayo upamāya
atk-s0508a2:5125_5: upamābhāvena na yujjanti kalabhāgampi na upentīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5126_0: Cakkānuvattakoti satthārā vattitassa dhammacakkassa anuvattako. Theroti asekkhehi
atk-s0508a2:5126_1: sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgamena thero. Mahāñāṇīti mahāpañño. Samāhitoti upacārappanāsamādhinā
atk-s0508a2:5126_2: anuttarasamādhinā ca samāhito. Paṭhavāpaggisamānoti iṭṭhādiārammaṇasannipāte nibbikāratāya
atk-s0508a2:5126_3: pathaviyā āpena agginā ca sadisavuttiko. Tenāha “na rajjati na dussatī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5127_0: Paññāpāramitaṃ pattoti sāvakañāṇassa pāramiṃ pārakoṭiṃ patto. Mahābuddhīti mahāputhuhāsajavanatikkhanibbedhikabhāvappattāya
atk-s0508a2:5127_1: mahatiyā buddhiyā paññāya samannāgato. Mahāmatīti dhammanvayaveditasaṅkhātāya mahatiyā
atk-s0508a2:5127_2: nayaggāhamatiyā samannāgato. Ye hi te catubbidhā, soḷasavidhā, catucattālīsavidhā,
atk-s0508a2:5127_3: tesattatividhā ca paññappabhedā. Tesaṃ sabbaso anavasesānaṃ adhigatattā mahāpaññatā
atk-s0508a2:5127_4: divisesayogato ca ayaṃ mahāthero sātisayaṃ “mahābuddhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati. Yathāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a2:5128_0: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, sāriputto; mahāpañño, bhikkhave, sāriputto; puthupañño, bhikkhave,
atk-s0508a2:5128_1: sāriputto; hāsapañño, bhikkhave, sāriputto; javanapañño, bhikkhave, sāriputto; tikkhapañño,
atk-s0508a2:5129_0: Tatthāyaṃ paṇḍitabhāvādīnaṃ vibhāgavibhāvanā. Dhātukusalatā, āyatanakusalatā, paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā,
atk-s0508a2:5129_1: ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalatāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito. Mahāpaññatādīnaṃ vibhāgadassane ayaṃ pāḷi –
atk-s0508a2:5130_0: “Katamā mahāpaññā? Mahante atthe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante dhamme pariggaṇhātīti
atk-s0508a2:5130_1: mahāpaññā, mahantā niruttiyo pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahantāni paṭibhānāni pariggaṇhātīti
atk-s0508a2:5130_2: mahāpaññā, mahante sīlakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante samādhikkhandhe
atk-s0508a2:5130_3: pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante paññākkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante
atk-s0508a2:5130_4: vimuttikkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti
atk-s0508a2:5130_5: mahāpaññā, mahantāni ṭhānāṭṭhānāni pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahantā vihārasamāpattiyo
atk-s0508a2:5130_6: pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahantāni ariyasaccāni pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante
atk-s0508a2:5130_7: satipaṭṭhāne pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante sammappadhāne pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5130_8: mahante iddhipāde pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahantāni indriyāni pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5130_9: mahantāni balāni pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante bojjhaṅge pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5130_10: mahante ariyamagge pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahantāni sāmaññaphalāni pariggaṇhātīti
atk-s0508a2:5130_11: mahāpaññā, mahantā abhiññāyo pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5131_0: “Katamā puthupaññā? Puthunānākhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānādhātūsu
atk-s0508a2:5131_1: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāāyatanesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāpaṭiccasamuppādesu
atk-s0508a2:5131_2: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāsuññatamanupalabbhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5131_3: puthunānāatthesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānādhammesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti
atk-s0508a2:5131_4: puthupaññā, puthunānāniruttīsu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāpaṭibhānesu
atk-s0508a2:5131_5: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāsīlakkhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5131_7: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāvimuttikkhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5131_9: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāvihārasamāpattīsu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5131_10: puthunānāariyasaccesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāsatipaṭṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5131_11: pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāsammappadhānesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāiddhipādesu
atk-s0508a2:5131_12: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāindriyesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānābalesu
atk-s0508a2:5131_13: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānābojjhaṅgesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5131_14: puthunānāariyamaggesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāsāmaññaphalesu ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5131_15: pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthunānāabhiññāsu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā, puthujjanasādhāraṇe
atk-s0508a2:5131_16: dhamme atikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.
atk-s0508a2:5132_0: “Katamā hāsapaññā? Idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlāni
atk-s0508a2:5132_1: paripūretīti hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo…pe… pāmojjabahulo indriyasaṃvaraṃ paripūretīti
atk-s0508a2:5132_2: hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo…pe… pāmojjabahulo bhojane mattaññutaṃ paripūretīti hāsapaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5132_3: hāsabahulo…pe… pāmojjabahulo jāgariyānuyogaṃ paripūretīti hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo…pe…
atk-s0508a2:5132_6: ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhatīti, satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetīti, sammappadhāne bhāvetīti, iddhipāde
atk-s0508a2:5132_7: bhāvetīti, indriyāni bhāvetīti, balāni bhāvetīti, bojjhaṅge bhāvetīti, ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5132_8: bhāvetīti…pe… sāmaññaphalāni sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo
atk-s0508a2:5132_9: pāmojjabahulo abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti hāsapaññā; hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo
atk-s0508a2:5133_0: “Katamā javanapaññā? Yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe… yaṃ dūre santike
atk-s0508a2:5133_1: vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā, dukkhato khippaṃ javatīti
atk-s0508a2:5133_2: javanapaññā, anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā; yā kāci vedanā…pe… yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0508a2:5133_3: viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe… sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5133_4: dukkhato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā, anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Cakkhu…pe…
atk-s0508a2:5133_5: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ, aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā, dukkhato
atk-s0508a2:5133_6: khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā, anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0508a2:5134_0: “Rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti
atk-s0508a2:5134_1: tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti
atk-s0508a2:5134_2: javanapaññā…pe… vedanā…pe… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ… cakkhu…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5134_3: aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti tulayitvā tīrayitvā
atk-s0508a2:5134_4: vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0508a2:5135_1: vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5135_2: katvā rūpanirodhe khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Vedanā…pe… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ…
atk-s0508a2:5135_3: cakkhu…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5135_4: khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā
atk-s0508a2:5135_5: vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0508a2:5136_0: “Katamā tikkhapaññā? Khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā, uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5136_1: nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā; uppannaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5136_2: byāpādavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā;
atk-s0508a2:5136_3: uppannaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ nādhivāseti…pe… uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti
atk-s0508a2:5136_4: pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā; uppannaṃ rāgaṃ nādhivāseti
atk-s0508a2:5136_5: pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā; uppannaṃ dosaṃ…pe…
atk-s0508a2:5136_6: uppannaṃ mohaṃ… uppannaṃ kodhaṃ… uppannaṃ upanāhaṃ… makkhaṃ… paḷāsaṃ… issaṃ… macchariyaṃ…
atk-s0508a2:5136_7: māyaṃ… sāṭheyyaṃ… thambhaṃ… sārambhaṃ… mānaṃ… atimānaṃ… madaṃ… pamādaṃ… sabbe kilese…
atk-s0508a2:5136_8: sabbe duccarite… sabbe abhisaṅkhāre…pe… sabbe bhavagāmikamme nādhivāseti pajahati
atk-s0508a2:5136_9: vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā. Ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro ca ariyamaggā,
atk-s0508a2:5136_10: cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidāyo, cha abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā
atk-s0508a2:5137_0: “Katamā nibbedhikapaññā? Idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo
atk-s0508a2:5137_1: ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu,
atk-s0508a2:5137_2: anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5137_3: anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā,
atk-s0508a2:5137_4: anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā;
atk-s0508a2:5137_5: anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ kodhaṃ…pe… upanāhaṃ…pe… sabbe bhavagāmikamme nibbijjhati
atk-s0508a2:5138: Evaṃ yathāvuttavibhāgāya mahatiyā paññāya samannāgatattā “mahābuddhī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5139: Apica anupadadhammavipassanāvasenāpi imassa therassa mahāpaññatā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:5140: “Sāriputto, bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ anupadadhammavipassanaṃ vipassati. Tatridaṃ, bhikkhave, sāriputtassa anupadadhammavipassanāya hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5141_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, sāriputto vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
atk-s0508a2:5141_1: Ye ca paṭhame jhāne dhammā vitakko ca…pe… cittekaggatā ca phasso vedanā saññā cetanā
atk-s0508a2:5141_2: cittaṃ chando adhimokkho vīriyaṃ sati upekkhā manasikāro, tyāssa dhammā anupadavavatthitā
atk-s0508a2:5141_3: honti, tyāssa dhammā viditā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a2:5141_4: So evaṃ pajānāti ‘evaṃ kira me dhammā ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventī’ti. So tesu
atk-s0508a2:5141_5: dhammesu anupāyo anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho vippamutto visaṃyutto vimariyādīkatena
atk-s0508a2:5141_6: cetasā viharati. So ‘atthi uttari nissaraṇa’nti pajānāti. Tabbahulīkārā atthitvevassa hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5142_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sāriputto vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā…pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ…
atk-s0508a2:5142_1: tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ… viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ…
atk-s0508a2:5142_2: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ… sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0508a2:5142_3: viharati. So tāya samāpattiyā sato vuṭṭhahati, so tāya samāpattiyā sato vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a2:5142_4: ye dhammā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā, te dhamme samanupassati “evaṃ kira me dhammā
atk-s0508a2:5142_5: ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventī”ti. So tesu dhammesu anupāyo anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho
atk-s0508a2:5142_6: vippamutto visaṃyutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharati. So ‘atthi uttari nissaraṇa’nti
atk-s0508a2:5143_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sāriputto sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma
atk-s0508a2:5143_1: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati. Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā
atk-s0508a2:5143_2: honti. So tāya samāpattiyā sato vuṭṭhahati, so tāya samāpattiyā sato vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a2:5143_3: ye dhammā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā, te dhamme samanupassati ‘evaṃ kira me dhammā
atk-s0508a2:5143_4: ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventī’ti. So tesu dhammesu anupāyo anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho
atk-s0508a2:5143_5: vippamutto visaṃyutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharati, so ‘natthi uttari nissaraṇa’nti
atk-s0508a2:5144_0: “Yaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya ‘vasippatto pāramippatto ariyasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5144_1: sīlasmiṃ, vasippatto pāramippatto ariyasmiṃ samādhismiṃ, vasippatto pāramippatto
atk-s0508a2:5144_2: ariyāya paññāya, vasippatto pāramippatto ariyāya vimuttiyā’ti. Sāriputtamevetaṃ sammā
atk-s0508a2:5145_1: thero mahābuddhīti attho. Dhammanvayaveditā panassa sampasādanīyasuttena dīpetabbā.
atk-s0508a2:5145_2: Tattha hi sabbaññutaññāṇasadiso therassa nayaggāho vutto. Ajaḷo jaḷasamānoti sāvakesu
atk-s0508a2:5145_3: paññāya ukkaṃsagatattā sabbathāpi ajaḷo samāno paramappicchatāya attānaṃ ajānantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5145_4: viya katvā, dassanena jaḷasadiso mandasarikkho kilesapariḷāhābhāvena nibbuto sītibhūto
atk-s0508a2:5146: Pariciṇṇoti gāthā therena attano katakiccataṃ pakāsentena bhāsitā, sāpi vuttatthāyeva.
