atk-s0508a2:5147: Sampādethappamādenāti ayaṃ pana attano parinibbānakāle sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena bhāsitā. Sāpi vuttatthāyevāti.
atk-s0508a2:5150_0: Pisuṇena ca kodhanenātiādikā āyasmato ānandattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a2:5150_1: katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare satthu vemātikabhātā hutvā
atk-s0508a2:5150_2: nibbatti, sumanotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Pitā panassa ānandarājā nāma. So attano puttassa
atk-s0508a2:5150_3: sumanakumārassa vayappattassa haṃsavatito vīsayojanasate ṭhāne bhoganagaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5150_4: So kadāci kadāci āgantvā attānañca pitarañca passati. Tadā rājā satthārañca satasahassaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5150_5: bhikkhusaṅghañca sayameva sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi, aññesaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ na deti.
atk-s0508a2:5151_0: Tena samayena paccanto kupito ahosi. Kumāro tassa kupitabhāvaṃ rañño anārocetvā sayameva
atk-s0508a2:5151_1: taṃ vūpasameti. Taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso puttaṃ pakkosāpetvā “varaṃ te, tāta dammi,
atk-s0508a2:5151_2: varaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti āha. Kumāro “satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca temāsaṃ upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5151_3: avañjhaṃ kātuṃ icchāmī”ti āha. “Etaṃ na sakkā, aññaṃ vadehī”ti. “Deva, khattiyānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5151_4: dvekathā nāma natthi, etadeva me dehi, na mayhaṃ aññena attho”ti. “Sace satthā anujānāti,
atk-s0508a2:5151_5: dinnamevā”ti. So “satthu cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:5152_0: Tena ca samayena bhagavā bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti. So bhikkhū
atk-s0508a2:5152_1: upasaṅkamitvā “ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgato, dassetha me bhagavanta”nti
atk-s0508a2:5152_2: āha. Bhikkhū “sumano nāma thero satthu upaṭṭhāko, tassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5152_3: So therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā “satthāraṃ, bhante, me dassethā”ti āha. Atha
atk-s0508a2:5152_4: thero tassa passantasseva pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5152_5: rājaputto tumhākaṃ dassanāya āgato”ti āha. “Tena hi, bhikkhu, bahi āsanaṃ paññāpehī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5152_6: Thero punapi tassa passantasseva buddhāsanaṃ gahetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nimujjitvā
atk-s0508a2:5152_7: bahipariveṇe pātubhavitvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe āsanaṃ paññāpesi. Kumāro taṃ disvā “mahanto
atk-s0508a2:5153_0: Bhagavāpi gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā paññattāsane nisīdi. Rājaputto satthāraṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0508a2:5153_1: paṭisanthāraṃ katvā, ayaṃ, bhante, thero tumhākaṃ sāsane vallabho maññeti. “Āma kumāra,
atk-s0508a2:5153_2: vallabho”ti? “Kiṃ katvā, bhante, esa vallabho hotī”ti?“Dānādīni puññāni katvā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5153_3: “Bhagavā, ahampi ayaṃ thero viya anāgate buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo”ti satthāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5153_4: khandhāvārabhattaṃ nāma datvāpi sattame divase, bhante, mayā pitu santikā temāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5153_5: tumhākaṃ paṭijagganavaro laddho, temāsaṃ me vassāvāsaṃ adhivāsethāti. Bhagavā, “atthi
atk-s0508a2:5153_6: nu kho tattha gatena attho”ti oloketvā “atthī”ti disvā “suññāgāre kho, kumāra, tathāgatā
atk-s0508a2:5153_7: abhiramantī”ti āha. Kumāro “aññātaṃ bhagavā, aññātaṃ sugatā”ti vatvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5153_8: purimataraṃ gantvā vihāraṃ kāremi, mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ āgacchathā”ti
atk-s0508a2:5153_9: paṭiññaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ gantvā “dinnā me, deva, bhagavatā paṭiññā, mayā pahite
atk-s0508a2:5153_10: bhagavantaṃ peseyyāthā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā, nikkhamitvā yojane yojane vihāraṃ karonto
atk-s0508a2:5153_11: vīsayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ gato. Gantvā ca attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sobhanassa
atk-s0508a2:5153_12: nāma kuṭumbikassa uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena kiṇitvā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5153_13: kāresi. Tattha bhagavato gandhakuṭiṃ sesabhikkhūnañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānatthāya
atk-s0508a2:5153_14: kuṭileṇamaṇḍape kāretvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakañca niṭṭhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5154_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā “bhagavā sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, tumhākaṃ gamanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:5154_1: āha. Bhagavā satasahassabhikkhuparivuto yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5154_2: Kumāro “satthā āgacchatī”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamāno
atk-s0508a2:5154_3: satasahassena kīte sobhane nāma uyyāne satasahassena kāritaṃ vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0508a2:5157_0: Taṃ niyyādesi. So vassūpanāyikadivase mahādānaṃ pavattetvā “imināva nīhārena dānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5157_1: dadeyyāthā”ti puttadāre amacce ca kiccakaraṇīyesu ca niyojetvā sayaṃ sumanattherassa
atk-s0508a2:5157_2: vasanaṭṭhānasamīpeyeva vasanto temāsaṃ satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahanto upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya
atk-s0508a2:5157_3: gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase satthu bhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0508a2:5157_4: ca pādamūle ticīvarāni ṭhapetvā vanditvā, “bhante, yadetaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ khandhāvāradānato
atk-s0508a2:5157_5: paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ, na taṃ saggasampattiādīnaṃ atthāya, atha kho ahaṃ ayaṃ sumanatthero
atk-s0508a2:5157_6: viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko bhaveyya”nti paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. Satthāpissa
atk-s0508a2:5158_0: Sopi tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ puññāni katvā tato parampi tattha tattha
atk-s0508a2:5158_1: bhave uḷārāni puññakammāni upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:5158_2: kāle piṇḍāya carato ekassa therassa pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5158_3: Puna sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā aṭṭha paccekabuddhe disvā te
atk-s0508a2:5158_4: bhojetvā attano maṅgaluyyāne aṭṭha paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā tesaṃ nisīdanatthāya aṭṭha
atk-s0508a2:5158_5: sabbaratanamayapīṭhe ceva maṇiādhārake ca paṭiyādetvā dasavassasahassāni upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5159_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana tattha tattha bhave puññāni karontova amhākaṃ bodhisattena
atk-s0508a2:5159_1: saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbatti. Tassa sabbe
atk-s0508a2:5159_2: ñātake ānandite karonto jātoti ānandotveva nāmaṃ ahosi. So anukkamena vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:5159_3: katābhinikkhamane sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke paṭhamaṃ kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5159_4: gantvā tato nikkhante bhagavati tassa parivāratthaṃ pabbajituṃ nikkhantehi bhaddiyādīhi
atk-s0508a2:5159_5: saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa
atk-s0508a2:5160_0: Tena ca samayena bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhaupaṭṭhākā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5160_1: Ekadā nāgasamālo pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicari, ekadā nāgito, ekadā upavāno, ekadā
atk-s0508a2:5160_2: sunakkhatto, ekadā cundo samaṇuddeso, ekadā sāgato, ekadā meghiyo, te yebhuyyena
atk-s0508a2:5160_3: satthu cittaṃ nārādhayiṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0508a2:5160_4: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi – “ahaṃ, bhikkhave, idānimhi mahallako,
atk-s0508a2:5160_5: ekacce bhikkhū ‘iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti, ekacce mayhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5160_6: bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanti, mayhaṃ nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṃ bhikkhuṃ jānāthā”ti. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5160_7: dhammasaṃvego udapādi. Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ vanditvā – “ahaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5160_8: bhante, tumhe upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti āha. Taṃ bhagavā paṭikkhipi. Etenupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5160_9: ādiṃ katvā sabbe mahāsāvakā – “ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi, ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti uṭṭhahiṃsu
atk-s0508a2:5160_10: ṭhapetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ, tepi bhagavā paṭikkhipi. So pana tuṇhīyeva nisīdi. Atha
atk-s0508a2:5160_11: naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “āvuso, tvampi satthu upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācāhī”ti. Yācitvā laddhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5160_12: nāma kīdisaṃ hoti, sace ruccati, satthā sayameva vakkhatīti. Atha bhagavā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0508a2:5160_13: ānando aññehi ussāhetabbo, sayameva jānitvā maṃ upaṭṭhahissatī”ti āha. Tato bhikkhū
atk-s0508a2:5160_14: “uṭṭhehi, āvuso ānanda, satthāraṃ upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācāhī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5161_0: Thero uṭṭhahitvā “sace me, bhante, bhagavā attanā laddhaṃ paṇītacīvaraṃ na dassati,
atk-s0508a2:5161_1: paṇītapiṇḍapātaṃ na dassati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasituṃ na dassati, nimantanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:5161_2: na gamissati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti āha. “Ettake guṇe labhato satthu
atk-s0508a2:5161_3: upaṭṭhāne ko bhāro”ti upavādamocanatthaṃ ime cattāro paṭikkhepā ca – “sace, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5161_4: bhagavā mayā gahitanimantanaṃ gamissati, sacāhaṃ desantarato āgatāgate tāvadeva dassetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5161_5: lacchāmi; yadā me kaṅkhā uppajjati, tāvadeva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ lacchāmi,
atk-s0508a2:5161_6: sace bhagavā parammukhā desitaṃ dhammaṃ puna mayhaṃ kathessati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5161_7: upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti “ettakampi satthu santike anuggahaṃ na labhatī”ti upavādamocanatthañceva
atk-s0508a2:5161_8: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikabhāvapāramīpūraṇatthañca imā catasso āyācanā cāti aṭṭha vare gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:5161_9: nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5161_10: pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇi. So upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ duvidhena
atk-s0508a2:5161_11: udakena, tividhena dantakaṭṭhena, hatthapādaparikammena piṭṭhiparikammena, gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanenāti
atk-s0508a2:5161_12: evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto “imāya nāma velāya satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0508a2:5161_13: idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti divasabhāgaṃ santikāvacaro hutvā, rattibhāge mahantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5161_14: daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ nava vāre anupariyāyati, satthari pakkosante
atk-s0508a2:5162_0: Atha naṃ satthā jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno anekapariyāyena pasaṃsitvā “bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5162_1: satimantānaṃ gatimantānaṃ dhitimantānaṃ upaṭṭhākānañca bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5162_2: Evaṃ satthārā pañcasu ṭhānesu etadagge ṭhapito catūhi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgato
atk-s0508a2:5162_3: satthu dhammakosārakkho ayaṃ mahāthero sekhova samāno satthari parinibbute heṭṭhā
atk-s0508a2:5162_4: vuttanayena bhikkhūhi samuttejito devatāya ca saṃvejito “sveyeva ca dāni dhammasaṅgīti
atk-s0508a2:5162_5: kātabbā, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yvāyaṃ sekho sakaraṇīyo hutvā asekhehi therehi
atk-s0508a2:5162_6: saddhiṃ dhammaṃ saṅgāyituṃ sannipātaṃ gantu”nti sañjātussāho vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:5162_7: bahudevarattiṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto caṅkame vīriyasamataṃ alabhitvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5162_8: pavisitvā sayane nisīditvā sayitukāmo kāyaṃ āvaṭṭesi. Appattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5162_9: pādā ca bhūmito muttamattā, etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0508a2:5172: Taṃ kathaṃ ṭhapayitvāna, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a2:5182: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5192: Sabbe te buddhanāgassa, na hontupaṇidhimhi te.
atk-s0508a2:5199: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti.
atk-s0508a2:5200_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā saṅgītimaṇḍapaṃ pavisitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyanto tattha tattha
atk-s0508a2:5200_1: bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena attano paṭipattidīpanādivasena ca bhāsitagāthā ekajjhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5200_2: katvā anukkameva khuddakanikāyasaṅgāyanakāle theragāthāsu saṅgītiṃ āropento –
atk-s0508a2:5202: “Pisuṇena ca kodhanena ca, maccharinā ca vibhūtanandinā;
atk-s0508a2:5203: Sakhitaṃ na kareyya paṇḍito, pāpo kāpurisena saṅgamo.
atk-s0508a2:5205: “Saddhena ca pesalena ca, paññavatā bahussutena ca;
atk-s0508a2:5206: Sakhitaṃ kareyya paṇḍito, bhaddo sappurisena saṅgamo.
atk-s0508a2:5209: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
atk-s0508a2:5215: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:5218: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:5221: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:5240: Maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti, paññā tassa na vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0508a2:5246: Taṃ mūlaṃ brahmacariyassa, tasmā dhammadharo siyā.
atk-s0508a2:5261: Dhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyati.
atk-s0508a2:5266: “Na pakkhanti disā sabbā, dhammā na paṭibhanti maṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5270: Natthi etādisaṃ mittaṃ, yathā kāyagatā sati.
atk-s0508a2:5272: “Ye purāṇā atītā te, navehi na sameti me;
atk-s0508a2:5276: Mā vārayittha sotāro, passantu samayo mamaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5279: Karoti satthā okāsaṃ, na nivāreti cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a2:5300: Satthu ca parinibbānaṃ, yo amhaṃ anukampako.
atk-s0508a2:5315: Ohito garuko bhāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:5317_0: Tattha pisuṇena cāti ādito dve gāthā chabbaggiye bhikkhū devadattapakkhiyehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0508a2:5317_1: saddhiṃ saṃsaggaṃ karonte disvā tesaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā. Tattha pisuṇenāti pisuṇāya
atk-s0508a2:5317_2: vācāya. Tāya hi yutto puggalo “pisuṇo”ti vutto yathā nīlaguṇayutto paṭo nīloti. Kodhanenāti
atk-s0508a2:5317_4: Vibhūtanandināti sattānaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhavanaṃ vināsaṃ icchantena, vibhūtaṃ vā visuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5317_5: bhāvo bhedo, taṃ nandanena, sabbametaṃ devadattapakkhiyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Te hi
atk-s0508a2:5317_6: pañcavatthudīpanāya bahū jane sammāpaṭipanne bhindantā satthari bahiddhatāya thaddhamacchariyādimacchariyapakatā
atk-s0508a2:5317_7: mahājanassa mahato anatthāya paṭipajjiṃsu. Sakhitanti sahāyabhāvaṃ saṃsaggaṃ na kareyya,
atk-s0508a2:5317_8: kiṃkāraṇā? Pāpo kāpurisena saṅgamo kāpurisena pāpapuggalena samāgamo nihīno lāmako.
atk-s0508a2:5317_9: Ye hissa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanti. Tesaṃ ducintitādibhedaṃ bālalakkhaṇameva āvahati,
atk-s0508a2:5317_10: pageva vacanakarassa. Tenāha bhagavā – “yāni kānici, bhikkhave, bhayāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0508a2:5317_11: sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:5318_0: Yena pana saṃsaggo kātabbo, taṃ dassetuṃ “saddhena cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saddhenāti
atk-s0508a2:5318_1: kammakammaphalasaddhāya ceva, ratanattayasaddhāya ca samannāgatena. Pesalenāti piyasīlena
atk-s0508a2:5318_2: sīlasampannena. Paññavatāti udayatthagāminiyā nibbedhikāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannena.
atk-s0508a2:5318_3: Bahussutenāti pariyattipaṭivedhabāhusaccānaṃ pāripūriyā bahussutena. Bhaddoti tena
atk-s0508a2:5318_4: tādisena sādhunā saṅgamo bhaddo sundaro kalyāṇo diṭṭhadhammikādibhedaṃ atthaṃ āvahatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5319_0: Passa cittakatantiādikā satta gāthā attano rūpasampattiṃ disvā kāmasaññaṃ uppādentiyā
atk-s0508a2:5319_1: uttarāya nāma upāsikāya kāyavicchandajananatthaṃ bhāsitā. “Ambapāliṃ gaṇikaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:5319_2: vikkhittacittānaṃ ovādadānattha”ntipi vadanti. Tā heṭṭhā vuttatthā eva.
atk-s0508a2:5320_0: Bahussuto cittakathītiādikā dve gāthā therena arahattaṃ patvā udānavasena bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:5320_1: Tattha paricārakoti upaṭṭhāko. Seyyaṃ kappetīti arahattappattisamanantaraṃ sayitattā
atk-s0508a2:5320_2: vuttaṃ. Thero hi bahudeva rattiṃ caṅkamena vītināmetvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetuṃ ovarakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5320_3: pavisitvā sayituṃ mañcake nisinno pādā ca bhūmito muttā, appattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5321: Khīṇāsavoti parikkhīṇacaturāsavo, tato eva catūhipi yogehi visaṃyutto, rāgasaṅgādīnaṃ atikkantattā saṅgātīto, sabbaso kilesapariḷāhassa vūpasantattā sunibbuto sītibhūtoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5322_0: Yasmiṃ patiṭṭhitā dhammāti theraṃ uddissa khīṇāsavamahābrahmunā bhāsitā gāthā. Upaṭṭhitāya
atk-s0508a2:5322_1: hi dhammasaṅgītiyā theraṃ uddissa yehi bhikkhūhi “eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:5322_2: vuttaṃ. Atha thero adhigate arahatte sattapaṇṇiguhādvāraṃ saṅghassa sāmaggīdānatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5322_3: āgato, tassa khīṇāsavabhāvappakāsanena suddhāvāsamahābrahmā. Te bhikkhū lajjāpento
atk-s0508a2:5322_4: “yasmiṃ patiṭṭhitā dhammā”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – buddhassa bhagavato dhammā teneva
atk-s0508a2:5322_5: adhigatā paveditā ca paṭivedhapariyattidhammā. Yasmiṃ purisavisese patiṭṭhitā, soyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5322_6: gottato gotamo dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko saupādisesanibbānassa adhigatattā idāni anupādisesanibbānagamane
atk-s0508a2:5323_0: Athekadivasaṃ gopakamoggallāno nāma brāhmaṇo theraṃ pucchi – “tvaṃ bahussutoti buddhassa
atk-s0508a2:5323_1: sāsane pākaṭo, kittakā dhammā te satthārā bhāsitā, tayā dhāritā”ti? Tassa thero paṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5323_2: dento “dvāsītī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha dvāsīti sahassānīti yojanā, buddhato gaṇhinti
atk-s0508a2:5323_3: sammāsambuddhato uggaṇhiṃ dvisahassādhikāni asītidhammakkhandhasahassāni satthu santikā
atk-s0508a2:5323_4: adhigaṇhinti attho. Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti dve dhammakkhandhasahassāni bhikkhuto
atk-s0508a2:5323_5: gaṇhiṃ, dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikā adhigacchiṃ. Caturāsītisahassānīti
atk-s0508a2:5323_6: tadubhayaṃ samodhānetvā catusahassādhikāni asītisahassāni. Ye me dhammā pavattinoti
atk-s0508a2:5323_7: ye yathāvuttaparimāṇā dhammakkhandhā mayhaṃ paguṇā vācuggatā jivhagge parivattantīti.
atk-s0508a2:5324_0: Athekadā thero sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanādhurepi ganthadhurepi ananuyuttaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5324_1: puggalaṃ disvā bāhusaccābhāve ādīnavaṃ pakāsento “appassutāya”nti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:5324_2: appassutāyanti ekassa dvinnaṃ vā paṇṇāsānaṃ, atha vā pana vaggānaṃ antamaso ekassa
atk-s0508a2:5324_3: dvinnaṃ vā suttantānampi uggahitānaṃ abhāvena appassuto ayaṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana uggahetvā
atk-s0508a2:5324_4: anuyuñjanto bahussutova. Balibaddova jīratīti yathā balibaddo jīramāno vaḍḍhamāno
atk-s0508a2:5324_5: neva mātu na pitu, na sesañātakānaṃ atthāya vaḍḍhati, atha kho niratthakameva jīrati;
atk-s0508a2:5324_6: evamevaṃ ayampi na upajjhāyavattaṃ karoti, na ācariyavattaṃ, na āgantukavattādīni,
atk-s0508a2:5324_7: na bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjati, niratthakameva jīrati. Maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhantīti yathā balibaddassa
atk-s0508a2:5324_8: “kasanabhāravahanādīsu asamattho eso”ti araññe vissaṭṭhassa yathā tathā vicarantassa
atk-s0508a2:5324_9: khādantassa pivantassa maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti; evamevaṃ imassāpi upajjhāyādīhi vissaṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a2:5324_10: saṅghaṃ nissāya cattāro paccaye labhitvā uddhaṃvirecanādīni katvā kāyaṃ posentassa
atk-s0508a2:5324_11: maṃsāni vaḍḍhanti thūlasarīro hutvā vicarati. Paññāti lokiyalokuttarā panassa paññā
atk-s0508a2:5324_12: ekaṅgulimattāpi na vaḍḍhati, araññe gacchalatādīni viya assa chadvārāni nissāya taṇhā
atk-s0508a2:5325_0: Bahussutoti gāthā attano bāhusaccaṃ nissāya aññaṃ atimaññantaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa
atk-s0508a2:5325_1: vuttā. Tattha sutenāti sutahetu attano bāhusaccanimittaṃ. Atimaññatīti atikkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:5325_2: maññati attānaṃ ukkaṃsento paraṃ paribhavati. Tathevāti yathā andho andhakāre telapajjotaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5325_3: dhārento ālokadānena paresaṃyeva atthāvaho, na attano, tatheva pariyattibāhusaccena
atk-s0508a2:5325_4: sutavā puggalo sutena anupapanno attano atthaṃ aparipūrento andho ñāṇālokadānena
atk-s0508a2:5325_5: paresaṃyeva atthāvaho, na attano, dīpadhāro andho viya mayhaṃ upaṭṭhātīti.
atk-s0508a2:5326_0: Idāni bāhusacce ānisaṃsaṃ dassento “bahussuta”nti gāthamāha. Tattha upāseyyāti payirupāseyya.
atk-s0508a2:5326_1: Sutañca na vināsayeti bahussutaṃ payirupāsitvā laddhaṃ sutañca na vināseyya, na susseyya
atk-s0508a2:5326_2: dhāraṇaparicayaparipucchāmanasikārehi vaḍḍheyya. Taṃ mūlaṃ brahmacariyassāti yasmā
atk-s0508a2:5326_3: bahussutaṃ payirupāsitvā laddhaṃ taṃ sutaṃ pariyattibāhusaccaṃ maggabrahmacariyassa
atk-s0508a2:5326_4: mūlaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ. Tasmā dhammadharo siyā vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā yathāsutassa
atk-s0508a2:5327_1: Tattha pubbañca aparañca jānātīti pubbāparaññū. Ekissā hi gāthāya pubbabhāge apaññāyamānepi
atk-s0508a2:5327_2: pubbabhāge vā paññāyamāne aparabhāge apaññāyamānepi “imassa aparabhāgassa iminā pubbabhāgena,
atk-s0508a2:5327_3: imassa vā pubbabhāgassa iminā aparabhāgena bhavitabba”nti jānanto pubbāparaññū nāma.
atk-s0508a2:5327_4: Attatthādibhedaṃ tassa tassa bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānātīti atthaññū. Niruttipadakovidoti
atk-s0508a2:5327_5: niruttiyaṃ sesapadesupi cāti catūsupi paṭisambhidāsu cheko. Suggahītañca gaṇhātīti
atk-s0508a2:5327_6: teneva kovidabhāvena atthato byañjanato ca dhammaṃ sugahitameva katvā gaṇhāti. Atthañcopaparikkhatīti
atk-s0508a2:5327_7: yathāsutassa yathāpariyattassa dhammassa atthaṃ upaparikkhati “iti sīlaṃ, iti samādhi,
atk-s0508a2:5327_8: iti paññā, ime rūpārūpadhammā”ti manasā anupekkhati.
atk-s0508a2:5328_0: Khantyā chandikato hotīti tesu manasā anupekkhitesu dhammesu diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā
atk-s0508a2:5328_1: nijjhānaṃ khamāpetvā rūpapariggahādimukhena vipassanābhinivese chandikato chandajāto
atk-s0508a2:5328_2: hoti. Tathābhūto ca vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ussahitvā tuleti taṃtaṃpaccayanāmarūpadassanavasena
atk-s0508a2:5328_3: ussāhaṃ katvā tato paraṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā tuleti “anicca”ntipi, “dukkha”ntipi,
atk-s0508a2:5328_4: “anattā”tipi taṃ nāmarūpaṃ tīreti vipassati. Samaye so padahati, ajjhattaṃ susamāhitoti
atk-s0508a2:5328_5: so evaṃ passanto paggahetabbādisamaye cittassa paggaṇhanādinā padahati, padahanto
atk-s0508a2:5328_6: ca ajjhattaṃ gocarajjhatte vipassanāsamādhinā maggasamādhinā ca suṭṭhu samāhito bhaveyya,
atk-s0508a2:5328_7: asamādhānahetubhūte kilese pajaheyya. Svāyaṃ guṇo sabbopi yasmā bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5328_8: sappaññaṃ buddhasāvakaṃ payirupāsantassa hoti, tasmā asaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha dukkhādīsu
atk-s0508a2:5328_10: vuttappakāraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ bhajetha, seveyya payirupāseyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5329_0: Evaṃ bahupakāratāya tassa pūjanīyakaṃ dassento “bahussuto”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho
atk-s0508a2:5329_1: – suttageyyādi bahu sutaṃ etassāti bahussuto. Tameva desanādhammaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane
atk-s0508a2:5329_2: pakkhittasīhavasā viya avinassantaṃ dhāretīti dhammadharo. Tato eva mahesino bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:5329_3: dhammakosaṃ dhammaratanaṃ ārakkhatīti kosārakkho. Yasmā sadevakassa lokassa samadassanena
atk-s0508a2:5329_4: cakkhubhūto, tasmā cakkhu sabbassa lokassa pūjanīyo mānanīyoti, bahussutabhāvena
atk-s0508a2:5330_0: Evarūpaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ labhitvāpi kārakasseva aparihāni, na akārakassāti dassento
atk-s0508a2:5330_1: “dhammārāmo”ti gāthamāha. Tattha nivāsanaṭṭhena samathavipassanādhammo ārāmo, tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5330_2: eva dhamme rato abhiratoti dhammarato, tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanena dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5330_3: anuvicintayaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjento manasi karotīti attho. Anussaranti tameva dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5330_4: anussaranto. Saddhammāti evarūpo bhikkhu sattatiṃsapabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā
atk-s0508a2:5330_5: ca na parihāyati, na kadāci tassa tato parihāni hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5331_0: Athekadivasaṃ kāye avītarāgaṃ kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ kosallāyā ti nāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejento
atk-s0508a2:5331_2: kāye mamattassa ācariyupajjhāyānampi kāyena kattabbaṃ kiñci akatvā vicarantassa.
atk-s0508a2:5331_3: Hiyyamāneti attano kāye jīvite ca khaṇe khaṇe parihiyyamāne. Anuṭṭhaheti sīlādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5331_4: paripūraṇavasena uṭṭhānavīriyaṃ na kareyya. Sarīrasukhagiddhassāti attano sarīrassa
atk-s0508a2:5331_5: sukhāpaneneva gedhaṃ āpannassa. Kuto samaṇaphāsutāti evarūpassa puggalassa sāmaññavasena
atk-s0508a2:5331_6: kuto sukhavihāro, phāsuvihāro na tassa vijjatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5332_0: Na pakkhantītiādikā āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatino parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:5332_1: therena bhāsitā. Tattha na pakkhanti disā sabbāti puratthimādibhedā sabbā disā na
atk-s0508a2:5332_2: pakkhayanti, disāmūḷhoti attho. Dhammā na paṭibhanti manti pubbe suṭṭhu paguṇāpi
atk-s0508a2:5332_3: pariyattidhammā idāni sakkaccaṃ samannāhariyamānāpi mayhaṃ na upaṭṭhahanti. Gate
atk-s0508a2:5332_4: kalyāṇamittamhīti sadevakassa lokassa kalyāṇamittabhūte dhammasenāpatimhi anupādisesanibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5332_5: gate. Andhakāraṃva khāyatīti sabbopāyaṃ loko andhakāro viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0508a2:5333_1: āyasmato atīto hutvā nibbānagatasatthukassa, satthari parinibbuteti attho. Yathā
atk-s0508a2:5333_2: kāyagatā satīti kāyagatāsatibhāvanā takkarassa yathā ekantahitāvahā, evaṃ etādisaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5333_3: anāthassa puggalassa ekantahitāvahaṃ aññaṃ mittaṃ nāma natthi, sanāthassa aññāpi
atk-s0508a2:5334_0: Purāṇāti porāṇā, sāriputtādike kalyāṇamitte sandhāya vadati. Navehīti navakehi. Na
atk-s0508a2:5334_1: sameti meti mayhaṃ cittaṃ na samāgacchati, na te mama cittaṃ ārādhentīti attho. Svajja
atk-s0508a2:5334_2: ekova jhāyāmīti sohaṃ ajja vuḍḍhatarehi virahito ekova hutvā jhāyāmi jhānapasuto
atk-s0508a2:5334_3: homi. Vassupetoti vassakāle kulāvakaṃ upeto pakkhī viya. “Vāsupeto”tipi pāḷi, vāsaṃ upagatoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5335_0: Dassanāya abhikkanteti gāthā satthārā bhāsitā. Tassattho – mama dassanāya abhikkante
atk-s0508a2:5335_1: nānāvidhavidesapavāsikabahujane, ānanda, mama upasaṅkamanaṃ mā vāresi. Kasmā? Te
atk-s0508a2:5335_2: sotāro dhammassa, mamaṃ passantu, ayameva dassanāya samayoti.
atk-s0508a2:5336_0: Taṃ sutvā thero “dassanāya abhikkante”ti aparaṃ gāthamāha. Imāya hi gāthāya sambandhatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5336_1: purimagāthā idha nikkhittā. Teneva sacāhaṃ desantarato āgatāgate tāvadeva dassetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5337_0: Paṇṇavīsati vassānīti pañca gāthā attano aggupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttā. Āraddhakammaṭṭhānabhāvena
atk-s0508a2:5337_1: hi satthu upaṭṭhānapasutabhāvena ca therassa maggena asamucchinnāpi kāmasaññādayo
atk-s0508a2:5337_2: na uppajjiṃsu, kāyavacīmanokammāni ca sabbakālaṃ satthari mettāpubbaṅgamāni mettānuparivattāni
atk-s0508a2:5337_3: ahesuṃ. Tattha paṇṇavīsati vassānīti pañcavīsati saṃvaccharāni. Sekhabhūtassa me
atk-s0508a2:5337_4: satoti sekhabhūmiyaṃ sotāpattiphale ṭhitassa me sato. Kāmasaññāti kāmasahagatā saññā
atk-s0508a2:5337_5: na uppajji, ettha ca kāmasaññādianuppattivacanena attano āsayasuddhiṃ dasseti, “mettena
atk-s0508a2:5337_6: kāyakammenā”tiādinā payogasuddhiṃ. Tattha gandhakuṭiyaṃ paribhaṇḍakaraṇādinā satthu
atk-s0508a2:5337_7: vattapaṭivattakaraṇena ca mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ veditabbaṃ, dhammadesanākālārocanādinā
atk-s0508a2:5337_8: mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ, rahogatassa satthāraṃ uddissa hitūpasaṃhāramanasikārena mettaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5337_9: manokammaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ me udapajjathāti attano sekkhabhūmipattimāha.
atk-s0508a2:5338_0: Ahaṃ sakaraṇīyomhīti satthu parinibbāne upaṭṭhite maṇḍalamāḷaṃ pavisitvā kapisīsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5338_1: ālambitvā sokābhibhūtena vuttagāthā. Tattha sakaraṇīyomhīti dukkhaparijānanādinā
atk-s0508a2:5338_2: karaṇīyena sakaraṇīyo amhi. Appattamānasoti anadhigatārahatto. Satthu ca parinibbānanti
atk-s0508a2:5338_3: mayhaṃ satthu parinibbānañca upaṭṭhitaṃ. Yo amhaṃ anukampakoti yo satthā mayhaṃ anuggāhako.
atk-s0508a2:5339: Tadāsi yaṃ bhiṃsanakanti gāthā satthu parinibbānakāle pathavīkampanadevadundubhiphalanādike disvā sañjātasaṃvegena vuttagāthā.
atk-s0508a2:5340_0: Bahussutotiādikā tisso gāthā theraṃ pasaṃsantehi saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitā. Tattha gatimantoti
atk-s0508a2:5340_1: asadisāya ñāṇagatiyā samannāgato. Satimantoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato.
atk-s0508a2:5340_3: Ayañhi thero ekapadeyeva ṭhatvā saṭṭhipadasahassāni satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva gaṇhāti,
atk-s0508a2:5340_4: gahitañca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya sabbakālaṃ na vinassati, aviparītabyañjanāvadhāraṇasamatthāya
atk-s0508a2:5340_5: satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya, atthāvadhāraṇasamatthāya paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā ca samannāgato.
atk-s0508a2:5340_6: Tenāha bhagavā – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutāna”ntiādi.
atk-s0508a2:5340_7: Tathā cāha dhammasenāpati – “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo”tiādi. Ratanākaroti saddhammaratanassa ākarabhūto.
atk-s0508a2:5341: Pariciṇṇoti gāthā parinibbānakāle therena bhāsitā, sā vuttatthā eva.
atk-s0508a2:5346_0: Cattālīsanipāte na gaṇena purakkhatotiādikā āyasmato mahākassapattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:5346_1: Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vedeho nāma asītikoṭivibhavo
atk-s0508a2:5346_2: kuṭumbiko ahosi. So buddhamāmako, dhammamāmako, saṅghamāmako upāsako hutvā viharanto
atk-s0508a2:5346_3: ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni
atk-s0508a2:5346_4: gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:5347_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0508a2:5347_1: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ, yadidaṃ nisabho”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. Upāsako
atk-s0508a2:5347_2: taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā “sve
atk-s0508a2:5347_3: mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti nimantesi. “Mahā kho, upāsaka, bhikkhusaṅgho”ti. “Kittako,
atk-s0508a2:5347_5: mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti. Satthā adhivāsesi. Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā
atk-s0508a2:5347_6: gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Satthā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0508a2:5347_7: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
atk-s0508a2:5347_8: yāguādīni sampaṭicchanto bhattavissaggaṃ akāsi. Upāsakopi satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:5348_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthiṃ paṭipajji. Upāsako
atk-s0508a2:5348_1: disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante, dethā”ti āha. Thero pattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5348_2: adāsi. “Bhante, idheva pavisatha, satthāpi gehe nisinno”ti. “Na vaṭṭissati, upāsakā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5348_3: So therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā adāsi. Tato theraṃ anugantvā nivatto
atk-s0508a2:5348_4: satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha – “mahānisabhatthero, bhante, ‘satthāpi gehe nisinno’ti
atk-s0508a2:5348_5: vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi, atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atirekaguṇo”ti. Buddhānañca
atk-s0508a2:5348_6: vaṇṇamaccheraṃ nāma natthi, tasmā satthā evamāha – “upāsaka, mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ āgamayamānā
atk-s0508a2:5348_7: gehe nisīdāma, so pana bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati, mayaṃ gāmantasenāsane
atk-s0508a2:5348_8: vasāma, so araññasmiṃyeva vasati, mayaṃ channe vasāma, so abbhokāseyeva vasatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:5348_9: bhagavā “ayañca ayañcetassa guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya tassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:5349_0: Upāsako pakatiyāpi jalamānapadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi
atk-s0508a2:5349_1: – “kiṃ mayhaṃ aññāya sampattiyā, anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya
atk-s0508a2:5349_2: patthanaṃ karissāmī”ti. So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divase
atk-s0508a2:5349_3: mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa mahābhikkhusaṅghassa ticīvarāni
atk-s0508a2:5349_4: datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante, satta divase dānaṃ dentassa
atk-s0508a2:5349_5: mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ, mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ, mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ, imināhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5349_6: na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ vā patthemi, idaṃ pana me kammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5349_7: anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike mahānisabhattherena pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya
atk-s0508a2:5349_8: terasadhutaṅgadharānaṃ aggabhāvassa adhikāro hotū”ti. Satthā “mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ iminā
atk-s0508a2:5349_9: patthitaṃ, samijjhissati nu kho, no”ti olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā āha – “manāpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5349_10: te ṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, anāgate satasahassakappāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a2:5349_11: tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. Taṃ sutvā upāsako
atk-s0508a2:5349_12: “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ amaññittha.
atk-s0508a2:5349_13: So yāvatāyukaṃ dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādāya rakkhitvā, nānappakāraṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5350_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassisammāsambuddhe
atk-s0508a2:5350_1: bandhumatīnagaraṃ upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5350_2: parijiṇṇabrāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Tasmiñca kāle vipassī bhagavā sattame sattame saṃvacchare
atk-s0508a2:5350_3: dhammaṃ kathesi, mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ hoti. Sakalajambudīpe devatā “satthā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5350_4: kathessatī”ti ārocesuṃ. Brāhmaṇo taṃ sāsanaṃ assosi. Tassa ca nivāsanasāṭako ekoyeva
atk-s0508a2:5350_5: hoti, tathā brāhmaṇiyā. Pārupanaṃ pana dvinnampi ekameva. So sakalanagare “ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇo”ti
atk-s0508a2:5350_6: paññāyi. So brāhmaṇānaṃ kenacideva kiccena sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:5350_7: sayaṃ taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā gacchati. Brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe acchati,
atk-s0508a2:5350_8: brāhmaṇī taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā gacchati. Tasmiṃ pana divase brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āha
atk-s0508a2:5350_9: – “bhoti, kiṃ rattiṃ dhammaṃ suṇissasi, divā”ti? “Mayaṃ mātugāmajātikā nāma rattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5350_10: sotuṃ na sakkoma, divā sossāmā”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi
atk-s0508a2:5350_11: saddhiṃ divā gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamante nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhiyeva
atk-s0508a2:5350_12: saddhiṃ āgamāsi. Atha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:5351_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisinno cittabījaniṃ ādāya ākāsagaṅgaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5351_1: otārento viya, sineruṃ manthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmathento viya, dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:5351_2: Brāhmaṇassa parisapariyante nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmasmiṃyeva sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5351_3: pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji. So pārutavatthaṃ saṅgharitvā “dasabalassa dassāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:5351_4: cintesi. Athassa ādīnavasahassaṃ dassayamānaṃ maccheraṃ uppajji. So “brāhmaṇiyā mayhañca
atk-s0508a2:5351_5: ekameva vatthaṃ, aññaṃ kiñci pārupanaṃ natthi, apārupitvā ca nāma bahi vicarituṃ
atk-s0508a2:5351_6: na sakkā”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi, athassa nikkhante paṭhamayāme majjhimayāmepi
atk-s0508a2:5351_7: tatheva pīti uppajji. Tatheva cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi. Athassa majjhimayāme
atk-s0508a2:5351_8: nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji. Tadā so “yaṃ vā hotu taṃ vā pacchāpi
atk-s0508a2:5351_9: jānissāmī”ti vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi. Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0508a2:5351_10: dakkhiṇena hatthena tikkhattuṃ apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me, jitaṃ me”ti tayo vāre nadi.
atk-s0508a2:5352_0: Tasmiñca samaye bandhumarājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0508a2:5352_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti. So purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, etaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5352_2: puccha kiṃ vadasī”ti. So tena gantvā pucchito “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni
atk-s0508a2:5352_3: gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti, na taṃ acchariyaṃ. Ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa kūṭagoṇassa
atk-s0508a2:5352_4: muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ madditvā pārutavatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5352_5: dasabalassa adāsiṃ, taṃ me macchariyaṃ jita”nti āha. So puriso āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5352_6: rañño ārocesi. Rājā āha – “amhe, bhaṇe, dasabalassa anurūpaṃ na jānimha, brāhmaṇo
atk-s0508a2:5352_7: jānī”ti vatthayugaṃ pesesi. Taṃ disvā brāhmaṇo cintesi – “ayaṃ mayhaṃ tuṇhīnisinnassa
atk-s0508a2:5352_8: paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi. Satthu guṇe paṭicca uppannena
atk-s0508a2:5352_9: pana mayhaṃ ko attho”ti tampi vatthayugaṃ dasabalasseva adāsi. Rājāpi “kiṃ brāhmaṇena
atk-s0508a2:5352_10: kata”nti pucchitvā “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññānipi
atk-s0508a2:5352_11: dve vatthayugāni pesesi, so tānipi adāsi. Rājā aññānipi cattārīti evaṃ yāva dvattiṃsavatthayugāni
atk-s0508a2:5352_12: pesesi. Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya
atk-s0508a2:5352_13: ekaṃ, brāhmaṇiyā ekanti dve vatthayugāni gahetvā tiṃsayugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5352_14: Tato paṭṭhāya ca so satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0508a2:5353_0: Atha naṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5353_1: attanā pārutarattakambalaṃ datvā āha – “ito paṭṭhāya imaṃ pārupitvā dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5353_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti cintetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5353_3: tathāgatassa mañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi. Athekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5353_4: gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi. Tasmiñca samaye chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo
atk-s0508a2:5353_5: kambale paṭihaññanti, kambalo ativiya virocati. Rājā ullokento sañjānitvā āha – “amhākaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5353_6: bhante, esa kambalo, amhehi ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇassa dinno”ti. “Tumhehi, mahārāja, brāhmaṇo
atk-s0508a2:5353_7: pūjito, brāhmaṇena mayaṃ pūjitā”ti. Rājā “brāhmaṇo yuttaṃ aññāsi, na maya”nti pasīditvā
atk-s0508a2:5353_8: yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5353_9: datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāla catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti catusaṭṭhi
atk-s0508a2:5353_10: salākabhattāni upanibandhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:5354_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe koṇāgamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa cāti dvinnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5354_1: buddhānaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto. So vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5354_2: vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ carati. Tasmiñca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre
atk-s0508a2:5354_3: cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. So disvā “kasmā,
atk-s0508a2:5354_4: bhante, saṅgharitvā ṭhapethā”ti āha. “Anuvāto nappahotī”ti. “Iminā, bhante, karothā”ti
atk-s0508a2:5354_5: uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kenaci parihāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5355_0: Gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0508a2:5355_1: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya “evarūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5355_2: bālaṃ yojanasatena parivajjeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Sā gehaṅgaṇe ṭhitā sutvā
atk-s0508a2:5355_3: “imāya dinnabhattaṃ mā esa bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa
atk-s0508a2:5355_4: pūretvā adāsi. Itarā disvā “bāle, tvaṃ maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā, evarūpassa pana
atk-s0508a2:5355_5: dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramissa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na yutta”nti
atk-s0508a2:5355_6: āha. Athassa bhariyāya paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppajji. Sā “tiṭṭhatha, bhante”ti kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0508a2:5355_7: pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena. Ubbaṭṭetvā paṇītabhattassa catumadhurassa ca pūretvā
atk-s0508a2:5355_8: upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:5355_9: “yathā ayaṃ piṇḍapāto obhāsajāto, evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5356_0: Tepi jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ katvā sagge nibbattitvā puna tato cavitvā upāsako
atk-s0508a2:5356_1: kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:5356_2: itarāpi tādisasseva seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti. Tassa vuddhippattassa tameva seṭṭhidhītaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5356_3: ānayiṃsu. Tassā pubbe aniṭṭhavipākassa pāpakammassa ānubhāvena patikulaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya
atk-s0508a2:5356_4: ummārabbhantare sakalasarīraṃ ugghāṭitavaccakuṭi viya duggandhaṃ jātaṃ. Seṭṭhikumāro
atk-s0508a2:5356_6: ābhataniyāmeneva kulagharaṃ pesesi. Sā eteneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā.
atk-s0508a2:5357_0: Tena ca samayena kassapadasabalo parinibbāyi. Tassa ghanakoṭṭimāhi satasahassagghanikāhi
atk-s0508a2:5357_1: rattasuvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi yojanubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ cetiye karīyamāne sā
atk-s0508a2:5357_2: seṭṭhidhītā cintesi – “ahaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā, kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti attano
atk-s0508a2:5357_3: ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthinnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5357_4: caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ. Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha uppalahatthake ādāya
atk-s0508a2:5357_5: cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā. Tasmiñca khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakāpanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā
atk-s0508a2:5357_6: ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti, seṭṭhidhītā vaḍḍhakiṃ āha – “imaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ ettha ṭhapethā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5357_7: “Amma, bhaddake kāle āgatāsi, sayameva ṭhapehī”ti. Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5357_8: yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi uppalahatthakehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5357_9: katvā vanditvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāyato candanagandho vāyatu, mukhato uppalagandho”ti
atk-s0508a2:5357_10: patthanaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5358_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā, tassa taṃ ārabbha
atk-s0508a2:5358_1: sati udapādi. Nagarepi nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ hoti. So upaṭṭhāke āha – “tadā idha
atk-s0508a2:5358_2: ānītā seṭṭhidhītā atthi, kahaṃ sā”ti? “Kulagehe sāmī”ti. “Ānetha naṃ, nakkhattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5358_3: kīḷissāmā”ti. Te gantvā taṃ vanditvā ṭhitā “kiṃ, tātā, āgatatthā”ti tāya puṭṭhā taṃ
atk-s0508a2:5358_4: pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu. “Tātā, mayā ābharaṇabhaṇḍena cetiyaṃ pūjitaṃ, ābharaṇaṃ me natthī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5358_5: Te gantvā seṭṭhiputtassa ārocesuṃ. Ānetha naṃ, piḷandhanaṃ labhissatīti. Te ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5358_6: Tassā saha gharapavesanena sakalagehaṃ candanagandho ceva nīluppalagandho ca vāyi.
atk-s0508a2:5358_7: Seṭṭhiputto taṃ pucchi – “paṭhamaṃ tava sarīrato duggandho vāyi, idāni pana te sarīrato
atk-s0508a2:5358_8: candanagandho, mukhato uppalagandho vāyati. Kiṃ eta”nti? Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attanā
atk-s0508a2:5358_9: katakammaṃ ārocesi. Seṭṭhiputto “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5358_10: suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena parikkhipitvā tattha tattha rathacakkappamāṇehi suvaṇṇapadumehi
atk-s0508a2:5359_0: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:5359_1: aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti, seṭṭhikaññāpi devalokato cavitvā rājakule jeṭṭhadhītā
atk-s0508a2:5359_2: hutvā nibbatti. Tesu vayappattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. So
atk-s0508a2:5359_3: mātaraṃ āha – “sāṭakaṃ me, amma, dehi, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti. Sā dhotavatthaṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0508a2:5359_4: adāsi. “Amma, thūlaṃ ida”nti āha. Sā aññaṃ nīharitvā adāsi, tampi paṭikkhipi. Atha
atk-s0508a2:5359_5: naṃ mātā āha – “tāta, yādise gehe mayaṃ jātā, natthi no ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya
atk-s0508a2:5359_6: puñña”nti. “Tena hi labhanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchāmi ammā”ti. “Putta, ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare
atk-s0508a2:5359_7: rajjapaṭilābhampi icchāmī”ti. So mātaraṃ vanditvā āha – “gacchāmi, ammā”ti. “Gaccha,
atk-s0508a2:5359_8: tātā”ti. Evaṃ kirassā cittaṃ ahosi – “kahaṃ gamissati? Idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5359_9: So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5359_10: pārupitvā nipajji. So ca bārāṇasirañño kālaṅkatassa sattamo divaso hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5360_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu – “rañño ekā dhītāva
atk-s0508a2:5360_1: atthi, putto natthi, arājakaṃ rajjaṃ nassati, ko rājā hotī”ti? “Tvaṃ hohi, tvaṃ hohī”ti
atk-s0508a2:5360_2: āhaṃsu. Purohito āha – “bahuṃ oloketuṃ na vaṭṭati, phussarathaṃ vissajjemā”ti. Te
atk-s0508a2:5360_3: kumudavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca
atk-s0508a2:5360_4: rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ. Ratho
atk-s0508a2:5360_5: pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā uyyānābhimukho ahosi. “Paricayena uyyānābhimukho gacchati,
atk-s0508a2:5360_6: nivattemā”ti keci āhaṃsu. Purohito “mā nivattayitthā”ti āha. Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5360_7: katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi, purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento,
atk-s0508a2:5360_8: “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo, dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu esa rajjaṃ kāretuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5360_9: yutto”ti vatvā “punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhatha, punapi paggaṇhathā”ti tikkhattuṃ tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:5361_0: Atha kumāro mukhaṃ vivaritvā oloketvā, “kena kammena āgatatthā”ti āha. “Deva, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5361_1: rajjaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti. “Rājā kaha”nti? “Devattaṃ gato, sāmī”ti. “Kati divasā atikkantā”ti?
atk-s0508a2:5361_2: “Ajja sattamo divaso”ti. “Putto vā dhītā vā natthī”ti? “Dhītā atthi deva, putto natthī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5361_3: “Karissāmi rajja”nti. Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi
atk-s0508a2:5361_4: alaṅkaritvā, uyyānaṃ ānetvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu. Athassa katābhisekassa satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5361_5: vatthaṃ upahariṃsu. So “kimidaṃ, tātā”ti āha. “Nivāsanavatthaṃ devā”ti. “Nanu, tātā,
atk-s0508a2:5361_6: thūla”nti? “Manussānaṃ paribhogavatthesu ito sukhumataraṃ natthi, devā”ti. “Tumhākaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5361_7: rājā evarūpaṃ nivāsesī”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Na maññe puññavā tumhākaṃ rājā, suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5361_8: āharatha, labhissāma vattha”nti. Suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ āhariṃsu. So uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā
atk-s0508a2:5361_9: mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthena udakaṃ ādāya puratthimadisāyaṃ abbhukkiri. Tāvadeva ghanapathaviṃ
atk-s0508a2:5361_10: bhinditvā aṭṭha kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇāyaṃ pacchimāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5361_11: uttarāyanti evaṃ catūsu disāsu abbhukkiri. Sabbadisāsu aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā dvattiṃsa
atk-s0508a2:5361_12: kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño
atk-s0508a2:5361_13: vijite suttakantikā itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti evaṃ bheriṃ carāpethā”ti vatvā chattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5361_14: ussāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha
atk-s0508a2:5362_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ devī rañño mahāsampattiṃ disvā, “aho tapassī”ti kāruññākāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5362_1: dasseti. “Kimidaṃ, devī”ti ca puṭṭhā “atimahatī te, deva, sampatti. Atīte buddhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5362_2: saddahitvā kalyāṇaṃ akattha, idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ kusalaṃ na karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:5362_3: “Kassa dassāma, sīlavanto natthī”ti? “Asuñño, deva, jambudīpo arahantehi, tumhe dānameva
atk-s0508a2:5362_4: sajjetha, ahaṃ arahante lacchāmī”ti āha. Rājā punadivase pācīnadvāre dānaṃ sajjāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:5362_5: Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā
atk-s0508a2:5362_6: “sace etissaṃ disāyaṃ arahanto atthi, sveva āgantvā amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti
atk-s0508a2:5362_7: āha. Tassaṃ disāyaṃ arahanto nāhesuṃ, taṃ sakkāraṃ kapaṇayācakānaṃ adaṃsu. Punadivase
atk-s0508a2:5362_8: dakkhiṇadvāre dānaṃ sajjetvā tatheva akāsi, punadivase pacchimadvāre. Uttaradvāre
atk-s0508a2:5362_9: sajjitadivase pana deviyā tatheva nimantentiyā himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā
atk-s0508a2:5362_10: puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho bhātike āmantesi,
atk-s0508a2:5362_11: “mārisā, nandarājā, tumhe nimanteti, adhivāsetha tassā”ti. Te adhivāsetvā punadivase
atk-s0508a2:5362_12: anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā, ākāsena āgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu. Manussā disvā
atk-s0508a2:5362_13: gantvā “pañcasatā, deva, paccekabuddhā āgatā”ti rañjo ārocesuṃ. Rājā saddhiṃ deviyā
atk-s0508a2:5362_14: gantvā, vanditvā, pattaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā, tatra nesaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5362_15: datvā, bhattakiccāvasāne rājā saṅghattherassa, devī, saṅghanavakassa pādamūle nipajjitvā
atk-s0508a2:5362_16: “ayyā paccayehi na kilamissanti, mayaṃ puññena na hāyissāma. Amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha
atk-s0508a2:5362_17: nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañcapaṇṇasālāsatāni pañcacaṅkamanasatānīti
atk-s0508a2:5363_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccanto kupito. So “ahaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametuṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0508a2:5363_1: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjī”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato. Tasmiṃ anāgateyeva paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5363_2: āyusaṅkhārā khīṇā. Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane
atk-s0508a2:5363_3: ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Etenupāyena
atk-s0508a2:5363_4: sesāpīti sabbeva parinibbutā. Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritūpalittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5363_5: kāretvā pupphāni vikiritvā, dhūpaṃ datvā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokayantī nisinnā āgamanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5363_6: apassantī purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, tāta, jānāhi, kiṃ ayyānaṃ kiñci aphāsuka”nti?
atk-s0508a2:5363_7: So gantvā mahāpadumassa paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha apassanto caṅkamanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5363_8: gantvā ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā “kālo, bhante”ti āha. “Parinibbutasarīraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5363_9: kiṃ kathessati? So niddāyati maññe”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasitvā pādānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5363_10: sītalatāya ceva thaddhatāya ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā, dutiyassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5363_11: Evaṃ tatiyassāti sabbesaṃ parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ gato. “Kahaṃ, tāta, paccekabuddhā”ti
atk-s0508a2:5363_12: puṭṭho “parinibbutā, devī”ti āha. Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5363_13: tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo
atk-s0508a2:5364_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0508a2:5364_1: paccekabuddhesu nappamajji, nirogā ayyā”ti? “Parinibbutā devā”ti. Rājā cinteti “evarūpānampi
atk-s0508a2:5364_2: paṇḍitānaṃ maraṇaṃ uppajjati, amhākaṃ kuto mokkho”ti. So nagaraṃ agantvā, uyyānameva
atk-s0508a2:5364_3: pavisitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā, tassa rajjaṃ niyyātetvā, sayaṃ samaṇapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5364_4: pabbaji. Devīpi “imasmiṃ pabbajite ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmī”ti tattheva uyyāne pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:5364_5: dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5365_0: Tesu tattheva vasantesu amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0508a2:5365_1: rājagahaṃ pāvisi. Satthari tattha paṭivasante ayaṃ pippalimāṇavo magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0508a2:5365_2: kapilabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatto. Ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī maddaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a2:5365_3: sāgalanagare kosiyagottabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattā. Tesaṃ anukkamena
atk-s0508a2:5365_4: vaḍḍhamānānaṃ pippalimāṇavassa vīsatime, bhaddāya soḷasame vasse sampatte mātāpitaro
atk-s0508a2:5365_5: puttaṃ oloketvā “tāta, tvaṃ vayappatto, kulavaṃso nāma patiṭṭhapetabbo”ti ativiya
atk-s0508a2:5365_6: nippīḷayiṃsu. Māṇavo āha “mayhaṃ sotapathe evarūpaṃ kathaṃ mā kathetha. Ahaṃ yāva
atk-s0508a2:5365_7: tumhe dharatha, tāva paṭijaggissāmi, tumhākaṃ accayena nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5365_8: Te katipāhaṃ atikkamitvā puna kathayiṃsu. Sopi tatheva paṭikkhipi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a2:5366_0: Māṇavo “mama mātaraṃ saññāpessāmī”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā sabbakāmehi
atk-s0508a2:5366_1: santappetvā suvaṇṇakārehi ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ kārāpetvā tassa majjanaghaṭṭanādikammapariyosāne
atk-s0508a2:5366_2: taṃ rattavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā vaṇṇasampannehi pupphehi ceva nānāalaṅkārehi ca alaṅkārāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:5366_3: mātaraṃ pakkosāpetvā āha “amma, evarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ labhanto gehe vasissāmi alabhanto
atk-s0508a2:5366_4: na vasissāmī”ti. Paṇḍitā brāhmaṇī cintesi – “mayhaṃ putto puññavā dinnadāno katābhinīhāro,
atk-s0508a2:5366_5: puññaṃ karonto na ekakova akāsi, addhā etena sahakatapuññā suvaṇṇarūpapaṭibhāgāva
atk-s0508a2:5366_6: bhavissatī”ti aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sabbakāmehi santappetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5366_7: rathaṃ āropetvā “gacchatha, tātā, yattha amhākaṃ jātigottabhogehi samāne kule evarūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5366_8: dārikaṃ passatha, imameva suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ katvā ethā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0508a2:5367_0: Te “amhākaṃ nāma etaṃ kamma”nti nikkhamitvā “kattha gamissāmā”ti cintetvā “maddaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5367_1: nāma itthākaro, maddaraṭṭhaṃ gamissāmā”ti maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ agamaṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:5367_2: taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nhānatitthe ṭhapetvā ekamante nisīdiṃsu. Atha bhaddāya dhātī bhaddaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5367_3: nhāpetvā, alaṅkaritvā, sirigabbhe nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ nhāyituṃ udakatitthaṃ gatā tattha
atk-s0508a2:5367_4: taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ disvā “kissāyaṃ avinītā idhāgantvā ṭhitā”ti piṭṭhipasse paharitvā
atk-s0508a2:5367_5: “suvaṇṇarūpaka”nti ñatvā “ayyadhītā me”ti saññaṃ uppādesiṃ, “ayaṃ pana me ayyadhītāya
atk-s0508a2:5367_6: nivāsanapaṭiggāhikāyāpi asadisā”ti āha. Atha naṃ te manussā parivāretvā “evarūpā
atk-s0508a2:5367_7: te sāmidhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. “Kiṃ esā, imāya suvaṇṇapaṭimāya sataguṇena sahassaguṇena
atk-s0508a2:5367_8: mayhaṃ ayyadhītā abhirūpatarā, dvādasahatthe gabbhe nisinnāya padīpakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0508a2:5367_9: sarīrobhāseneva tamaṃ vidhamatī”ti. “Tena hi āgacchā”ti taṃ khujjaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5367_10: rathe āropetvā kosiyagottassa brāhmaṇassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā āgamanaṃ nivedayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5368_0: Brāhmaṇo paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi. “Magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthagāme
atk-s0508a2:5368_1: kapilabrāhmaṇassa gharato”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā āgatā”ti? “Iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti. “Kalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5368_2: tātā, samajātigottavibhavo amhākaṃ brāhmaṇo, dassāmi dārika”nti paṇṇākāraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:5368_3: Te kapilabrāhmaṇassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “laddhā dārikā, kattabbaṃ karothā”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0508a2:5368_4: sāsanaṃ sutvā pippalimāṇavassa ārocayiṃsu “laddhā kira dārikā”ti. Māṇavo “ahaṃ ‘na
atk-s0508a2:5368_5: labhissantī’ti cintesiṃ, ime ‘laddhā’ti vadanti, anatthiko hutvā paṇṇaṃ pesessāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:5368_6: rahogato paṇṇaṃ likhi “bhaddā, attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ gharāvāsaṃ labhatu, ahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5368_7: nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmi, mā pacchā vippaṭisārinī ahosī”ti. Bhaddāpi “asukassa kira
atk-s0508a2:5368_8: maṃ dātukāmo”ti sutvā “paṇṇaṃ pesessāmī”ti rahogatā paṇṇaṃ likhi “ayyaputto attano
atk-s0508a2:5368_9: jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ gharāvāsaṃ labhatu, ahaṃ pabbajissāmi, mā pacchā vippaṭisārī
atk-s0508a2:5368_10: ahosī”ti. Dvepi paṇṇāni antarāmagge samāgacchiṃsu. “Idaṃ kassa paṇṇa”nti? “Pippalimāṇavena
atk-s0508a2:5368_11: bhaddāya pahita”nti. “Idaṃ kassā”ti? “Bhaddāya pippalimāṇavassa pahita”nti ca vutte
atk-s0508a2:5368_12: te dvepi vācetvā “passatha dārakānaṃ kamma”nti phāletvā araññe chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ taṃsamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5368_13: paṇṇaṃ likhitvā ito etto ca pesesuṃ. Iti kumārassa kumārikāya ca sadisaṃ paṇṇaṃ lokassādarahitamevāti
atk-s0508a2:5369_0: Taṃ divasaṃyeva pippalimāṇavo ekaṃ pupphadāmaṃ ganthāpesi bhaddāpi. Tāni sayanamajjhe
atk-s0508a2:5369_1: ṭhapesuṃ bhuttasāyamāsā ubhopi “sayanaṃ āruhissāmā”ti māṇavo dakkhiṇapassena sayanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5369_2: āruhi. Bhaddā vāmapassena abhiruhitvā āha – “yassa passe pupphāni milāyanti, tassa
atk-s0508a2:5369_3: rāgacittaṃ uppannanti vijānissāma, imaṃ pupphadāmaṃ na alliyitabba”nti. Te pana aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5369_4: sarīrasamphassabhayena tiyāmarattiṃ niddaṃ anokkamantāva vītināmenti, divā pana hasitamattampi
atk-s0508a2:5369_5: nāhosi. Te lokāmisena asaṃsaṭṭhā yāva mātāpitaro dharanti, tāva kuṭumbaṃ avicāretvā
atk-s0508a2:5369_6: tesu kālaṅkatesu vicārayiṃsu. Mahatī māṇavassa sampatti – ekadivasaṃ sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā
atk-s0508a2:5369_7: chaḍḍetabbaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇaṃ eva magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Yantabaddhāni
atk-s0508a2:5369_8: saṭṭhimahātaḷākāni, kammanto dvādasayojaniko, anurādhapurapamāṇā cuddasa gāmā, cuddasa
atk-s0508a2:5370_0: So ekadivasaṃ alaṅkataassaṃ āruyha mahājanaparivuto kammantaṃ gantvā khettakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5370_1: ṭhito naṅgalehi bhinnaṭṭhānato kākādayo sakuṇe gaṇḍuppādādipāṇake uddharitvā khādante
atk-s0508a2:5370_2: disvā, “tātā, ime kiṃ khādantī”ti pucchi. “Gaṇḍuppāde, ayyā”ti. “Etehi kataṃ pāpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5370_3: kassa hotī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ, ayyā”ti. So cintesi – “sace etehi kataṃ pāpaṃ mayhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:5370_4: kiṃ me karissati sattaasītikoṭidhanaṃ, kiṃ dvādasayojano kammanto, kiṃ yantabaddhāni
atk-s0508a2:5370_5: taḷākāni, kiṃ cuddasa gāmā, sabbametaṃ bhaddāya kāpilāniyā niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5371_0: Bhaddāpi kāpilānī tasmiṃ khaṇe antaravatthumhi tayo tilakumbhe pattharāpetvā dhātīhi
atk-s0508a2:5371_1: parivutā nisinnā kāke tilapāṇake khādamāne disvā, “ammā, kiṃ ime khādantī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:5371_2: “Pāṇake ayye”ti. “Akusalaṃ kassa hotī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ, ayye”ti. Sā cintesi – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5371_3: catuhatthavatthaṃ nāḷikodanamattañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, yadi panetaṃ ettakena janena
atk-s0508a2:5371_4: kataṃ akusalaṃ mayhaṃ hoti, bhavasahassenapi vaṭṭato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā. Ayyaputte
atk-s0508a2:5371_5: āgatamatteyeva sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5372_0: Māṇavo āgantvā, nhatvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdi. Athassa cakkavattino
atk-s0508a2:5372_1: anucchavikaṃ bhojanaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Dvepi bhuñjitvā parijane nikkhante rahogatā phāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:5372_2: nisīdiṃsu. Tato māṇavo bhaddaṃ āha – “bhadde, imaṃ gharaṃ āgacchantī tvaṃ kittakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5372_3: dhanaṃ āharasī”ti? “Pañcapaṇṇāsa sakaṭasahassāni, ayyā”ti. “Taṃ sabbaṃ, yā ca imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5372_4: ghare sattaasītikoṭiyo yantabaddhasaṭṭhitaḷākādibhedā ca sampatti atthi, taṃ sabbañca
atk-s0508a2:5372_5: tuyhaṃyeva niyyādemī”ti. “Tumhe pana kahaṃ gacchatha, ayyā”ti? “Ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5372_6: “Ayya, ahampi tumhākaṃyeva āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisinnā. Ahampi pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5372_7: Tesaṃ ādittapaṇṇakuṭi viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Te antarāpaṇato kasāyarasapītāni
atk-s0508a2:5372_8: vatthāni mattikāpatte ca āharāpetvā aññamaññaṃ kese oropetvā “ye loke arahanto, te
atk-s0508a2:5372_9: uddissa amhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti pabbajitvā, thavikāsu patte pakkhipitvā aṃse laggetvā
atk-s0508a2:5372_10: pāsādato otariṃsu. Gehe dāsesu vā kammakaresu vā na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0508a2:5373_0: Atha ne brāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamma dāsagāmadvārena gacchante ākappakuttavasena dāsagāmavāsino
atk-s0508a2:5373_1: sañjāniṃsu. Te rodantā pādesu nipatitvā “kiṃ, amhe, anāthe karotha ayyā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5373_2: “Mayaṃ, ‘bhaṇe, ādittapaṇṇasālā viya tayo bhavā’ti pabbajimhā. Sace tumhesu ekekaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5373_3: bhujissaṃ karoma, vassasatampi nappahoti. Tumheva tumhākaṃ sīsaṃ dhovitvā bhujissā
atk-s0508a2:5373_4: hutvā jīvathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ rodantānaṃyeva pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5374_0: Thero purato gacchanto nivattitvā olokento cintesi – “ayaṃ, bhaddā kāpilānī, sakalajambudīpagghanikā
atk-s0508a2:5374_1: itthī mayhaṃ pacchato āgacchati, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ kocideva evaṃ cinteyya
atk-s0508a2:5374_2: ‘ime pabbajitāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti, ananucchavikaṃ karontī’ti, koci pāpena
atk-s0508a2:5374_3: manaṃ padūsetvā apāyapūrako bhaveyya, imaṃ pahāya mayhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5374_4: uppādesi. So purato gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ disvā tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi. Bhaddāpi
atk-s0508a2:5374_5: āgantvā, vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ āha – “bhadde, tādisiṃ itthiṃ mama pacchato āgacchantiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5374_6: disvā ‘ime pabbajitāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkontī’ti cintetvā amhesu paduṭṭhacitto
atk-s0508a2:5374_7: mahājano apāyapūrako bhaveyya. Imasmiṃ dvedhāpathe tvaṃ ekaṃ gaṇha, ahamekena gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5374_8: “Āma, ayya, pabbajitānaṃ mātugāmo palibodho, ‘pabbajitvāpi vinā na bhavantī’ti amhākaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5374_9: dosaṃ dassessanti, tumhe ekaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhatha, vinā bhavissāmā”ti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5374_10: katvā catūsu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ
atk-s0508a2:5374_11: paggayha “satasahassakappaparimāṇe addhāne kato mittasanthavo ajja bhijjatī”ti vatvā
atk-s0508a2:5374_12: “tumhe dakkhiṇajātikā nāma, tumhākaṃ dakkhiṇamaggo vaṭṭati, mayaṃ mātugāmā nāma vāmajātikā,
atk-s0508a2:5374_13: amhākaṃ vāmamaggo vaṭṭatī”ti vanditvā maggaṃ paṭipannā. Tesaṃ dvedhābhūtakāle ayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5374_14: mahāpathavī “ahaṃ cakkavāḷasinerupabbate dhāretuṃ sakkontīpi tumhākaṃ guṇe dhāretuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5374_15: na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya viravamānā kampi, ākāse asanisaddo viya pavatti, cakkavāḷasinerupabbato unnadi.
atk-s0508a2:5375_0: Sammāsambuddho veḷuvanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno pathavīkampanasaddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:5375_1: “kissa nu kho pathavī kampatī”ti āvajjento “pippalimāṇavo ca bhaddā ca kāpilānī maṃ
atk-s0508a2:5375_2: uddissa appameyyaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya pabbajitā. Tesaṃ viyogaṭṭhāne ubhinnaṃ guṇabalena
atk-s0508a2:5375_3: ayaṃ pathavīkampo jāto. Mayāpi etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamma
atk-s0508a2:5375_4: sayameva pattacīvaramādāya asītimahātheresu kañcipi anāmantetvā tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5375_5: paccuggamanaṃ katvā rājagahassa ca nālandāya ca antare bahuputtakanigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0508a2:5375_6: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Nisīdanto pana aññatarapaṃsukūliko viya anisīditvā buddhavesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5375_7: gahetvā asītihatthaghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjento nisīdi. Iti tasmiṃ khaṇe paṇṇacchattasakaṭacakkakūṭāgārādippamāṇā
atk-s0508a2:5375_8: buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vippharantiyo vidhāvantiyo candasahassasūriyasahassauggamanakālo
atk-s0508a2:5375_9: viya kurumānā taṃ vanantaṃ ekobhāsaṃ akaṃsu. Dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā samujjalatārāgaṇena
atk-s0508a2:5375_10: viya gaganaṃ, supupphitakamalakuvalayena viya salilaṃ, vanantaṃ virocittha. Nigrodharukkhassa
atk-s0508a2:5375_11: nāma khandho seto hoti, pattāni nīlāni, pakkāni rattāni. Tasmiṃ pana divase satasākho
atk-s0508a2:5376_0: Mahākassapatthero “ayaṃ amhākaṃ satthā bhavissati, imaṃ ahaṃ uddissa pabbajito”ti
atk-s0508a2:5376_1: diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya oṇatoṇatova gantvā tīsu ṭhānesu vanditvā “satthā me, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5376_2: bhagavā, sāvakohamasmi, satthā me, bhante, bhagavā sāvakohamasmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ
atk-s0508a2:5376_3: bhagavā āha “kassapa, sace tvaṃ imaṃ nipaccakāraṃ mahāpathaviyā kareyyāsi, sāpi dhāretuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5376_4: na sakkuṇeyya. Tathāgatassa evaṃ guṇamahantataṃ jānatā tayā kato nipaccakāro mayhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5376_5: lomampi cāletuṃ na sakkoti. Nisīda, kassapa, dāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti. Athassa bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:5376_6: tīhi ovādehi upasampadamadāsi. Datvā bahuputtakanigrodhamūlato nikkhamitvā theraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5376_7: pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā maggaṃ paṭipajji. Satthu sarīraṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇavicittaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5376_9: pacchābaddho viya satthu padānupadikaṃ anugacchi. Satthā thokaṃ maggaṃ gantvā maggā
atk-s0508a2:5376_10: okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisajjākāraṃ dassesi. Thero “nisīditukāmo satthā”ti
atk-s0508a2:5376_11: ñatvā attano pārupitapaṭapilotikasaṅghāṭiṃ catugguṇaṃ katvā paññapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5377_0: Satthā tattha nisīditvā hatthena cīvaraṃ parimajjanto “mudukā kho tyāyaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0508a2:5377_1: paṭapilotikasaṅghāṭī”ti āha. Thero “satthā mama saṅghāṭiyā mudubhāvaṃ katheti, pārupitukāmo
atk-s0508a2:5377_2: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “pārupatu, bhante, bhagavā saṅghāṭi”nti āha. “Tvaṃ kiṃ pārupissasi,
atk-s0508a2:5377_3: kassapā”ti? “Tumhākaṃ nivāsanaṃ labhanto pārupissāmi, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5377_4: kassapa, imaṃ paribhogajiṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāretuṃ sakkhissasi? Mayā hi imassa paṃsukūlassa
atk-s0508a2:5377_5: gahitadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi, imaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogajiṇṇacīvaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5377_6: nāma na sakkā parittaguṇena dhāretuṃ, paṭibalenevidaṃ paṭipattipūraṇasamatthena jātipaṃsukūlikena
atk-s0508a2:5377_7: dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0508a2:5378_0: Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā therassa pārutacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi, satthu
atk-s0508a2:5378_1: cīvaraṃ thero. Tasmiṃ samaye acetanāpi ayaṃ mahāpathavī “dukkaraṃ, bhante, akattha,
atk-s0508a2:5378_2: attanā pārutacīvaraṃ sāvakassa dinnapubbo nāma natthi, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ
atk-s0508a2:5378_3: na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampi. Theropi “laddhaṃ dāni mayā
atk-s0508a2:5378_4: buddhānaṃ paribhogacīvaraṃ, kiṃ me idāni uttari kattabbaṃ atthī”ti unnatiṃ akatvā
atk-s0508a2:5378_5: buddhānaṃ santikeyeva terasa dhutaguṇe samādāya sattadivasamattaṃ puthujjano ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:5378_6: aṭṭhame divase saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:5385: “Sādhūti te paṭissutvā, bhiyyo hāsaṃ janiṃsu me;
atk-s0508a2:5400: Tepi jotanti ābhāya, samantā caturo disā.
atk-s0508a2:5419: “Tattha bhutvā pivitvā ca, puna devattanaṃ gato;
atk-s0508a2:5424_0: Atha naṃ satthā “kassapo, bhikkhave, candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva kāyaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5424_1: apakassa cittaṃ, niccanavako kulesu appagabbho”ti evamādinā pasaṃsitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0508a2:5424_2: ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5424_3: yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti dhutaṅgadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So vivekābhiratikittanamukhena
atk-s0508a2:5424_4: bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento attano paṭipattiṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a2:5426: “Na gaṇena purakkhato care, vimano hoti samādhi dullabho;
atk-s0508a2:5427: Nānājanasaṅgaho dukho, iti disvāna gaṇaṃ na rocaye.
atk-s0508a2:5429: “Na kulāni upabbaje muni, vimano hoti samādhi dullabho;
atk-s0508a2:5430: So ussukko rasānugiddho, atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhāvaho.
atk-s0508a2:5432: “Paṅkoti hi naṃ avedayuṃ, yāyaṃ vandanapūjanā kulesu;
atk-s0508a2:5433: Sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho.
atk-s0508a2:5436: Bhuñjantaṃ purisaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ, sakkaccaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5442: Bhuñjamāne vā bhutte vā, jegucchaṃ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:5446: Yassete abhisambhutvā, sa ve cātuddiso naro.
atk-s0508a2:5462: Kuñjarābhirudā rammā, te selā ramayanti maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5468: Vāraṇābhirudā rammā, te selā ramayanti maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5471: Abbhunnaditā sikhīhi, te selā ramayanti maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5488: “Na pañcaṅgikena tūriyena, rati me hoti tādisī;
atk-s0508a2:5491: “Kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kāraye, parivajjeyya janaṃ na uyyame;
atk-s0508a2:5492: Ussukko so rasānugiddho, atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhāvaho.
atk-s0508a2:5495: Kicchati kāyo kilamati, dukkhito so samathaṃ na vindati.
atk-s0508a2:5501: Na taṃ viññū pasaṃsanti, patthaddhamānasaṃ naraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5503: “Yo ca seyyohamasmīti, nāhaṃ seyyoti vā pana;
atk-s0508a2:5504: Hīno taṃsadiso vāti, vidhāsu na vikampati.
atk-s0508a2:5510: Ārakā hoti saddhammā, nabhato puthavī yathā.
atk-s0508a2:5528: Yassa te nābhijānāma, yampi nissāya jhāyati.
atk-s0508a2:5534: Sāriputtaṃ tadā disvā, kappinassa sitaṃ ahu.
atk-s0508a2:5537: Dhutaguṇe visiṭṭhohaṃ, sadiso me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:5540: Ohito garuko bhāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo.
atk-s0508a2:5548: Imā gāthā abhāsi. Tattha ādito tisso gāthā gaṇesu kulesu ca saṃsaṭṭhe bhikkhū disvā tesaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5549_0: Tattha na gaṇena purakkhato careti bhikkhugaṇehi purakkhato parivārito hutvā na careyya
atk-s0508a2:5549_1: na vihareyya. Kasmā? Vimano hoti samādhi dullabho gaṇaṃ pariharantassa dukkhuppattiyā
atk-s0508a2:5549_2: byākulamanatāya, uddesena ovādena anusāsaniyā anuggahaṃ karonto yathānusiṭṭhaṃ appaṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a2:5549_3: ca vimano vikāribhūtacitto hoti, tato saṃsaggena ekaggataṃ alabhantassa samādhi dullabho
atk-s0508a2:5549_4: hoti. Tathārūpassa hi upacārasamādhimattampi na ijjhati, pageva itaro. Nānājanasaṅgahoti
atk-s0508a2:5549_5: nānajjhāsayassa nānārucikassa janassa peyyakhajjādinā saṅgaho. Dukhoti kiccho kasiro.
atk-s0508a2:5549_6: Iti disvānāti evaṃ gaṇasaṅgahe bahuvidhaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā ñāṇacakkhunā oloketvā. Gaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5549_7: gaṇavāsaṃ na rocaye na roceyya na iccheyya.
atk-s0508a2:5550_0: Na kulāni upabbaje munīti imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito khattiyādikulūpako hutvā na upagaccheyya.
atk-s0508a2:5550_1: Kiṃkāraṇā? Vimano hoti samādhi dullabho. So ussukko kulūpasaṅkamane ussukkaṃ āpanno
atk-s0508a2:5550_2: kulesu laddhabbesu madhurādirasesu anugiddho gedhaṃ āpanno tattha uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu
atk-s0508a2:5550_3: attanāva yogaṃ āpajjanto. Atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhāvahoti yo attano maggaphalanibbānasukhāvaho
atk-s0508a2:5550_4: taṃ sīlavisuddhiādisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ riñcati jahati, nānuyuñjatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5552_0: Senāsanamhā oruyhātiādikā catasso gāthā paccayesu attano santosadassanamukhena “bhikkhunā
atk-s0508a2:5552_1: nāma evaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā. Tattha senāsanamhā
atk-s0508a2:5552_2: oruyhāti pabbatasenāsanattā vuttaṃ. Sakkaccaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahinti taṃ kuṭṭhipurisaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5552_3: uḷārasampattiṃ pāpetukāmatāya bhikkhāya atthiko hutvā paṇītabhikkhadāyakaṃ kulaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5553: Pakkenāti aṭṭhigatakuṭṭharogatāya upakkena kuthitena. Aṅguli cettha chijjathāti ettha patte tassa aṅguli chijjitvā āhārena saddhiṃ patatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5554_0: Kuṭṭamūlaṃ nissāyāti tassa purisassa pasādajananatthaṃ tādise gharabhittisamīpe nisīditvā
atk-s0508a2:5554_1: ālopaṃ taṃ abhuñjisaṃ paribhuñjiṃ. Ayaṃ pana therassa paṭipatti sikkhāpade apaññatteti
atk-s0508a2:5554_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭikkūle ca appaṭikkūle iva appaṭikkūlasaññitāya ariyiddhiyā ukkaṃsagatattā
atk-s0508a2:5554_3: therassa taṃ ajjhoharantassa jigucchā na uppajji, puthujjanassa pana tādisaṃ bhuñjantassa
atk-s0508a2:5554_4: antāni nikkhameyyuṃ. Tenāha “bhuñjamāne vā bhutte vā, jegucchaṃ me na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5555_0: Uttiṭṭhapiṇḍoti uttiṭṭhitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍo, jaṅghabalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5555_1: nissāya anugharaṃ gantvā laddhabbamissakabhikkhāti attho. Pūtimuttanti gomuttaparibhāvitaharīṭakādi
atk-s0508a2:5555_2: ca. Yassete abhisambhutvāti, yo bhikkhu ete uttiṭṭhapiṇḍādayo cattāro paccaye antimantena
atk-s0508a2:5555_3: abhiramitvā paribhuñjati. Sa ve cātuddiso naroti so puggalo ekaṃsena cātuddiso puratthimādicatudisāyogyo,
atk-s0508a2:5555_4: katthaci appaṭigho yāya kāyaci disāya viharituṃ sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5556_0: Atha thero attano mahallakakāle manussehi “kathaṃ, bhante, tumhe evarūpāya jarāya
atk-s0508a2:5556_1: vattamānāya dine dine pabbataṃ abhiruhathā”ti vutte “yattha eke”tiādikā catasso gāthā
atk-s0508a2:5556_2: abhāsi. Tattha yatthāti yasmiṃ pacchimavaye. Eketi ekacce. Vihaññantīti sarīrakilamathena
atk-s0508a2:5556_3: cittena vighātaṃ āpajjanti. Siluccayanti pabbataṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ jarājiṇṇakālepi.
atk-s0508a2:5556_4: Sampajāno paṭissatoti iminā cittakhedābhāvaṃ dasseti, iddhibalenupatthaddhoti iminā sarīrakhedābhāvaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5558: Ḍayhamānesūti rāgaggiādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi sattesu ḍayhamānesu. Saṃkilesapariḷāhābhāvena nibbuto sītibhūto.
atk-s0508a2:5559_0: Puna manussehi “kiṃ, bhante, jiṇṇakālepi araññapabbateyeva viharatha, nanu ime veḷuvanādayo
atk-s0508a2:5559_1: vihārā manoramā”ti vutte araññapabbatā eva mayhaṃ manoramāti dassento “karerimālāvitatā”tiādikā
atk-s0508a2:5559_2: dvādasa gāthā abhāsi. Tattha karerimālāvitatāti varuṇarukkhapantīhi samāgatā. “Kālavaṇṇapupphehi
atk-s0508a2:5559_3: otthaṭā”tipi vadanti. Kuñjarābhirudāti paṭighosādiguṇībhūtehi hatthīnaṃ gocaresīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5560_0: Abhivuṭṭhāti mahāmeghena abhippavuṭṭhā. Rammatalāti teneva rajojallapaṇṇeyyādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5560_1: apagamena ramaṇīyatalā. Nagāti desantaraṃ agamanato “nagā”ti selamayatāya “selā”ti
atk-s0508a2:5560_2: ca laddhanāmā pabbatā. Abbhunnaditā sikhīhīti madhurassarena unnaditā.
atk-s0508a2:5561: Alanti yuttaṃ samatthaṃ vā. Jhāyitukāmassa atthakāmassātiādīsupi iminā nayena yojetabbaṃ. Bhikkhunoti bhinnakilesabhikkhuno, meti sambandho.
atk-s0508a2:5562: Umāpupphena samānāti mecakanibhatāya umākusumasadisā. Gaganāvabbha chāditāti tato eva saradassa gaganaabbhā viya kāḷameghasañchāditā, nīlavaṇṇāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5563_0: Anākiṇṇāti asaṃkiṇṇā asambādhā. Pañcaṅgikenāti ātatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi yuttena tūriyena
atk-s0508a2:5563_1: parivāriyamānassa tādisīpi na hoti, yathā yādisī ekaggacittassa samāhitacittassa
atk-s0508a2:5563_2: sammadeva rūpārūpadhammaṃ aniccādivasena vipassantassa rati hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a2:5566_0: Kammaṃ bahukantiādinā dve gāthā kammārāmānaṃ paccayagiddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena
atk-s0508a2:5566_1: vuttā. Tattha kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kārayeti kammārāmo hutvā bahuṃ nāma kammaṃ na kāraye
atk-s0508a2:5566_2: na adhiṭṭhahe, khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ pana satthārā anuññātameva. Parivajjeyya
atk-s0508a2:5566_3: jananti akalyāṇamittabhūtaṃ janaṃ vajjeyya. Na uyyameti paccayuppādanagaṇabandhādivasena vāyāmaṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0508a2:5567_0: Anattaneyyametanti etaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhānādikaṃ attano atthāvahaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5567_1: Tattha kāraṇamāha “kicchati kāyo kilamatī”ti. Navakammādipasutassa hi tahaṃ tahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5567_2: vicarato kāyasukhādialābhena kicchappatto hoti kilamati khedaṃ āpajjati, tena ca
atk-s0508a2:5567_3: kāyakilamathena dukkhito. Vatthuvisadaattaneyyakiriyādīnaṃ abhāvena so puggalo samathaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5568_0: Oṭṭhappahatamattenātiādinā dve gāthā sutaparamassa paṇḍitamānino garahavasena, tato
atk-s0508a2:5568_1: parā dve paṇḍitassa pasaṃsāvasena vuttā. Tattha oṭṭhappahatamattenāti sajjhāyasīsena
atk-s0508a2:5568_2: oṭṭhaparivattanamattena, buddhavacanaṃ sajjhāyakaraṇamattenāti attho. Attānampi na
atk-s0508a2:5568_3: passatīti anatthaññutāya attano paccakkhabhūtampi atthaṃ na jānāti, yāthāvato attano
atk-s0508a2:5568_4: pamāṇaṃ na paricchindatīti attho. Patthaddhagīvo caratīti “ahaṃ bahussuto, satimā,
atk-s0508a2:5568_5: paññavā, na mayā sadiso añño atthī”ti mānatthaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniyānampi apacitiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5568_6: adassento ayosalākaṃ gilitvā ṭhito viya thaddhagīvo carati. Ahaṃ seyyoti maññatīti
atk-s0508a2:5569_0: Aseyyo seyyasamānaṃ, bālo maññati attānanti ayaṃ aseyyo hīno samāno aññena seyyena
atk-s0508a2:5569_1: uttamena samānaṃ sadisaṃ katvā attānaṃ bālo mandabuddhi bālabhāveneva maññatīti.
atk-s0508a2:5569_2: Na taṃ viññū pasaṃsantīti taṃ tādisaṃ bālaṃ paggahitacittatāya patthaddhamānasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5569_3: thambhitattaṃ naraṃ viññū paṇḍitā na pasaṃsanti, aññadatthu garahantiyeva.
atk-s0508a2:5570_0: Seyyohamasmīti yo pana paṇḍito puggalo “seyyohamasmī”ti vā hīnasadisamānavasena “nāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5570_1: seyyo”ti vā kañcipi mānaṃ ajappento vidhāsu navasu mānakoṭṭhāsesu kassacipi vasena na vikampati.
atk-s0508a2:5571_0: Paññavantanti aggaphalapaññāvasena paññavantaṃ iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā tādiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5571_1: asekkhaphalasīlesu suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitattā sīlesu susamāhitaṃ, arahattaphalasamāpattisamāpajjanena
atk-s0508a2:5571_2: cetosamathamanuyuttanti tādisaṃ sabbaso pahīnamānaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ viññū buddhādayo paṇḍitā
atk-s0508a2:5572: Puna aññataraṃ dubbacaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā dovacassatāya ādīnavaṃ, sovacassatāya ānisaṃsañca pakāsento “yassa sabrahmacārīsū”tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi. Tā vuttatthā eva.
atk-s0508a2:5573_0: Puna uddhataṃ unnaḷaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā uddhatādibhāve dosaṃ, anuddhatādibhāve
atk-s0508a2:5573_1: ca guṇaṃ vibhāvento “uddhato capalo bhikkhū”tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi. Tattha kapīva
atk-s0508a2:5573_2: sīhacammenāti sīhacammena pāruto makkaṭo viya. So uddhatādidosasaṃyutto bhikkhu tena
atk-s0508a2:5573_3: paṃsukūlena ariyaddhajena na upasobhati ariyaguṇānaṃ abhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:5574: Yo pana upasobhati, taṃ dassetuṃ “anuddhato”tiādi vuttaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5575_0: Ete sambahulātiādikā pañca gāthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ namassante brahmakāyike deve
atk-s0508a2:5575_1: disvā āyasmato kappinassa sitapātukammanimittaṃ vuttā. Tattha eteti tesaṃ paccakkhatāya
atk-s0508a2:5575_2: vuttaṃ. Sambahulāti bahubhāvato, taṃ pana bahubhāvaṃ “dasadevasahassānī”ti paricchinditvā
atk-s0508a2:5575_3: āha. Devāti upapattidevā. Taṃ tesaṃ devabhāvaṃ aññehi visesetvā dassento “sabbe te
atk-s0508a2:5575_4: brahmakāyikā”ti āha. Yasmā te attano upapattiddhiyā mahatiyā deviddhiyā samannāgatā
atk-s0508a2:5576_0: “Ko nu senāpati bhoto”ti pucchāya vissajjanavasena “mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5576_1: anuttaraṃ sāriputto anuvattetī”ti vadantena bhagavatā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0508a2:5576_2: dhammasenāpatibhāvo anuññātoti āha – “dhammasenāpatiṃ vīraṃ mahājhāyiṃ samāhitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5576_3: sāriputta”nti. Tattha vīranti kilesamārādīnaṃ nimmathanena vīriyavantaṃ mahāvikkantaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5576_4: Mahājhāyinti dibbavihārādīnaṃ ukkaṃsagamanena mahantaṃ jhāyiṃ. Tato eva sabbaso vikkhepaviddhaṃsanavasena
atk-s0508a2:5576_5: samāhitaṃ. Namassantāti sirasi añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0508a2:5577: Yampi nissāyāti yaṃ nu kho ārammaṇaṃ nissāya ārabbha jhāyatīti nābhijānāmāti puthujjanabhāvena brahmāno evaṃ āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5578_0: Accheraṃ vatāti acchariyaṃ vata. Buddhānanti catusaccabuddhānaṃ. Gambhīro gocaro
atk-s0508a2:5578_1: sakoti paramagambhīro atiduddaso duranubodho puthujjanehi asādhāraṇo avisayo. Idāni
atk-s0508a2:5578_2: tassa gambhīrabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ye maya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vālavedhisamāgatāti
atk-s0508a2:5578_3: ye mayaṃ vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā atisukhumampi visayaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā āgatā
atk-s0508a2:5578_4: upaparikkhantā nābhijānāma, gambhīro vata buddhānaṃ visayoti attho. Taṃ tathā devakāyehīti
atk-s0508a2:5578_5: taṃ tathārūpaṃ sāriputtaṃ sadevakassa lokassa pūjanārahaṃ tehi brahmakāyikehi tadā
atk-s0508a2:5578_6: tathā pūjitaṃ disvā āyasmato mahākappinassa sitaṃ ahosi. Imesaṃ lokasammatānaṃ brahmūnampi
atk-s0508a2:5579_0: Yāvatā buddhakhettamhīti gāthā therena attānaṃ ārabbha sīhanādaṃ nadantena bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:5579_1: Tattha buddhakhettamhīti āṇākhettaṃ sandhāya vadati. Ṭhapayitvā mahāmuninti sammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5579_2: ṭhapetvā. Buddhā hi bhagavanto dhutaguṇehipi sabbasattehi paramukkaṃsagatā eva, kevalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5579_3: pana mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānasā sattānaṃ tādisaṃ mahantaṃ upakāraṃ oloketvā gāmantasenāsanavāsādiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5579_4: anuvattantīti taṃ taṃ dhutadhammavirodhī hoti. Dhutaguṇeti kilesānaṃ dhutena guṇena
atk-s0508a2:5579_5: āraññakādibhāvena apekkhitaguṇe. Karaṇatthe vā etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Sadiso me na vijjati,
atk-s0508a2:5579_6: kuto pana uttarīti adhippāyo. Tathā hesa thero tattha aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
atk-s0508a2:5580_0: Na cīvareti gāthāya “ṭhapayitvā mahāmuni”nti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti, cīvarādīsu
atk-s0508a2:5580_1: taṇhāya anupalepo dhutaṅgaphalaṃ. Tattha na cīvare sampatte taṇhālepenāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5580_2: Sayaneti senāsane. Gotamoti bhagavantaṃ gottena kitteti. Anappameyyoti pamāṇakarakilesābhāvato
atk-s0508a2:5580_3: aparimāṇaguṇatāya ca anappameyyo. Muḷālapupphaṃ vimalaṃva ambunāti yathā nimmalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5580_4: virajaṃ naḷinaṃ udakena na limpati, evaṃ gotamo bhagavā taṇhālepādinā na limpatīti
atk-s0508a2:5580_5: attho. Nekkhammaninno abhinikkhammaninno tato eva tibhavābhinissaṭo bhavattayato
atk-s0508a2:5581_0: Yesaṃ satipaṭṭhānagīvādīnaṃ bhāvanāpāripūriyā yattha katthaci anupalitto nekkhammaninnova
atk-s0508a2:5581_1: ahosi, te aṅgabhūte dassento “satipaṭṭhānagīvo”ti osānagāthamāha. Tattha guṇarāsito
atk-s0508a2:5581_2: uttamaṅgabhūtāya paññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato satipaṭṭhānaṃ gīvā etassāti satipaṭṭhānagīvo,
atk-s0508a2:5581_3: anavajjadhammānaṃ ādāne saddhā hattho etassāti saddhāhattho. Guṇasarīrassa uttamaṅgabhāvato
atk-s0508a2:5581_4: paññā sīsaṃ etassāti paññāsīso. Mahāsamudāgamanatāya mahāvisayatāya mahānubhāvatāya
atk-s0508a2:5581_5: mahābalatāya ca mahantaṃ sabbaññutasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ etassa atthīti mahāñāṇī. Sadā
atk-s0508a2:5581_6: sabbakālaṃ nibbuto sītibhūto carati. “Susamāhito…pe… nāgo”ti suttapadañcettha nidassetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5581_7: Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a2:5586_0: Paññāsanipāte kadā nuhantiādikā āyasmato tālapuṭattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a2:5586_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā
atk-s0508a2:5586_2: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarasmiṃ naṭakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kulānurūpesu
atk-s0508a2:5586_3: naccaṭṭhānesu nipphattiṃ gantvā sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo naṭagāmaṇi ahosi. So pañcasatamātugāmaparivāro
atk-s0508a2:5586_4: mahatā naṭavibhavena gāmanigamarājadhānīsu samajjaṃ dassetvā, mahantaṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5586_5: labhitvā, vicaranto rājagahaṃ āgantvā, nagaravāsīnaṃ samajjaṃ dassetvā, laddhasammānasakkāro
atk-s0508a2:5586_6: ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā satthu santikaṃ gantvā, vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5586_7: etadavoca – “sutametaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ naṭānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5586_8: ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa
atk-s0508a2:5586_9: bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti, idha bhagavā kimāhā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5586_10: Atha naṃ bhagavā tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipi “mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī”ti. Catutthavāraṃ puṭṭho
atk-s0508a2:5586_11: āha – “gāmaṇi, ime sattā pakatiyāpi rāgabandhanabaddhā dosabandhanabaddhā mohabandhanabaddhā
atk-s0508a2:5586_12: tesaṃ bhiyyopi rajanīye dosanīye mohanīye dhamme upasaṃharanto pamādetvā kāyassa
atk-s0508a2:5586_13: bhedā paraṃ maraṇā niraye upapajjati. Sace panassa evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe
atk-s0508a2:5586_14: samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5586_15: devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”’ti sāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhissa ca dvinnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5586_16: gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati icchitabbā, nirayassa vā tiracchānayoniyā vāti. Taṃ sutvā tālapuṭo
atk-s0508a2:5586_17: gāmaṇi parodi. Nanu gāmaṇi pageva mayā paṭikkhitto “mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī”ti ? “Nāhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5586_18: bhante, etaṃ rodāmi, yaṃ maṃ bhagavā naṭānaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ evamāhā”ti. Api cāhaṃ,
