atk-s0508a2:5586_19: bhante, pubbakehi ācariyapācariyehi naṭehi vañcito “naṭo mahājanassa naṭasamajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5586_20: dassetvā sugatiṃ upapajjatī”ti. So satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:5586_21: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampanno vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0508a2:5586_22: adhigatārahatto pana arahattappattito pubbe yenākārena attano cittaṃ niggaṇhanavasena
atk-s0508a2:5586_23: yonisomanasikāro udapādi, taṃ anekadhā vibhajitvā dassetuṃ –
atk-s0508a2:5589: Aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassaṃ, taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5591: “Kadā nuhaṃ bhinnapaṭandharo muni, kāsāvavattho amamo nirāso;
atk-s0508a2:5592: Rāgañca dosañca tatheva mohaṃ, hantvā sukhī pavanagato vihassaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5595: Vipassamāno vītabhayo vihassaṃ, eko vane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5598: Paññāmayaṃ tikhiṇamasiṃ gahetvā, chetvā vase tampi kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5601: Māraṃ sasenaṃ sahasā bhañjissaṃ, sīhāsane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5603: “Kadā nuhaṃ sabbhi samāgamesu, diṭṭho bhave dhammagarūhi tādibhi;
atk-s0508a2:5604: Yāthāvadassīhi jitindriyehi, padhāniyo taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5606: “Kadā nu maṃ tandi khudā pipāsā, vātātapā kīṭasarīsapā vā;
atk-s0508a2:5607: Na bādhayissanti na taṃ giribbaje, atthatthiyaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5609: “Kadā nu kho yaṃ viditaṃ mahesinā, cattāri saccāni sududdasāni;
atk-s0508a2:5610: Samāhitatto satimā agacchaṃ, paññāya taṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5612: “Kadā nu rūpe amite ca sadde, gandhe rase phusitabbe ca dhamme;
atk-s0508a2:5613: Ādittatohaṃ samathehi yutto, paññāya dacchaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
atk-s0508a2:5615: “Kadā nuhaṃ dubbacanena vutto, tato nimittaṃ vimano na hessaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5616: Atho pasatthopi tato nimittaṃ, tuṭṭho na hessaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
atk-s0508a2:5618: “Kadā nu kaṭṭhe ca tiṇe latā ca, khandhe imehaṃ amite ca dhamme;
atk-s0508a2:5619: Ajjhattikāneva ca bāhirāni ca, samaṃ tuleyyaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
atk-s0508a2:5621: “Kadā nu maṃ pāvusakālamegho, navena toyena sacīvaraṃ vane;
atk-s0508a2:5622: Isippayātamhi pathe vajantaṃ, ovassate taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5624: “Kadā mayūrassa sikhaṇḍino vane, dijassa sutvā girigabbhare rutaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5625: Paccuṭṭhahitvā amatassa pattiyā, saṃcintaye taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5627: “Kadā nu gaṅgaṃ yamunaṃ sarassatiṃ, pātālakhittaṃ vaḷavāmukhañca;
atk-s0508a2:5628: Asajjamāno patareyyamiddhiyā, vibhiṃsanaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5630: “Kadā nu nāgova asaṅgacārī, padālaye kāmaguṇesu chandaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5631: Nibbajjayaṃ sabbasubhaṃ nimittaṃ, jhāne yuto taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5633: “Kadā iṇaṭṭova daliddako nidhiṃ, ārādhayitvā dhanikehi pīḷito;
atk-s0508a2:5634: Tuṭṭho bhavissaṃ adhigamma sāsanaṃ, mahesino taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5636: “Bahūni vassāni tayāmhi yācito, agāravāsena alaṃ nu te idaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5637: Taṃ dāni maṃ pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ, kiṃkāraṇā citta tuvaṃ na yuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5639: “Nanu ahaṃ citta tayāmhi yācito, giribbaje citrachadā vihaṅgamā;
atk-s0508a2:5640: Mahindaghosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5642: “Kulamhi mitte ca piye ca ñātake, khiḍḍāratiṃ kāmaguṇañca loke;
atk-s0508a2:5643: Sabbaṃ pahāya imamajjhupāgato, athopi tvaṃ citta na mayha tussasi.
atk-s0508a2:5645: “Mameva etaṃ na hi tvaṃ paresaṃ, sannāhakāle paridevitena kiṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5646: Sabbaṃ idaṃ calamiti pekkhamāno, abhinikkhamiṃ amatapadaṃ jigīsaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5649: Cittaṃ calaṃ makkaṭasannibhaṃ iti, avītarāgena sudunnivārayaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5651: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanā;
atk-s0508a2:5652: Te dukkhamicchanti punabbhavesino, cittena nītā niraye nirākatā.
atk-s0508a2:5655: Kāye apekkhaṃ jaha mā virādhaya, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5657: “Bhāvehi jhānāni ca indriyāni ca, balāni bojjhaṅgasamādhibhāvanā;
atk-s0508a2:5658: Tisso ca vijjā phusa buddhasāsane, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5661: Aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ sabbakilesasodhanaṃ, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5663: “Dukkhanti khandhe paṭipassa yoniso, yato ca dukkhaṃ samudeti taṃ jaha;
atk-s0508a2:5664: Idheva dukkhassa karohi antaṃ, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5666: “Aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassa yoniso, suññaṃ anattāti aghaṃ vadhanti ca;
atk-s0508a2:5667: Manovicāre uparundha cetaso, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5670: Yuñjassu satthuvacane mahesino, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5673: Cando yathā dosinapuṇṇamāsiyā, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5675: “Āraññiko hohi ca piṇḍapātiko, sosāniko hohi ca paṃsukūliko;
atk-s0508a2:5676: Nesajjiko hohi sadā dhute rato, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5678: “Ropetva rukkhāni yathā phalesī, mūle taruṃ chettu tameva icchasi;
atk-s0508a2:5679: Tathūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ karosi, yaṃ maṃ aniccamhi cale niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5681: “Arūpa dūraṅgama ekacāri, na te karissaṃ vacanaṃ idānihaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5682: Dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahabbhayā, nibbānamevābhimano carissaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5687: Kato ca te citta paṭissavo mayā.
atk-s0508a2:5690: Itissu maṃ citta tadā niyuñjasi, idāni tvaṃ gacchasi pubbaciṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5692: “Taṇhā avijjā ca piyāpiyañca, subhāni rūpāni sukhā ca vedanā;
atk-s0508a2:5693: Manāpiyā kāmaguṇā ca vantā, vante ahaṃ āvamituṃ na ussahe.
atk-s0508a2:5695: “Sabbattha te citta vaco kataṃ mayā, bahūsu jātīsu namesi kopito;
atk-s0508a2:5696: Ajjhattasambhavo kataññutāya te, dukkhe ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kate.
atk-s0508a2:5698: “Tvaññeva no citta karosi brāhmaṇo, tvaṃ khattiyo rājadasī karosi;
atk-s0508a2:5699: Vessā ca suddā ca bhavāma ekadā, devattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā.
atk-s0508a2:5701: “Taveva hetū asurā bhavāmase, tvaṃmūlakaṃ nerayikā bhavāmase;
atk-s0508a2:5702: Atho tiracchānagatāpi ekadā, petattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā.
atk-s0508a2:5704: “Nanu dubbhissasi maṃ punappunaṃ, muhuṃ muhuṃ cāraṇikaṃva dassayaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5705: Ummattakeneva mayā palobhasi, kiñcāpi te citta virādhitaṃ mayā.
atk-s0508a2:5707: “Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5708: Tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅgusaggaho.
atk-s0508a2:5710: “Satthā ca me lokamimaṃ adhiṭṭhahi, aniccato addhuvato asārato;
atk-s0508a2:5711: Pakkhanda maṃ citta jinassa sāsane, tārehi oghā mahatā suduttarā.
atk-s0508a2:5713: “Na te idaṃ citta yathā purāṇakaṃ, nāhaṃ alaṃ tuyha vase nivattituṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5714: Mahesino pabbajitomhi sāsane, na mādisā honti vināsadhārino.
atk-s0508a2:5716: “Nagā samuddā saritā vasundharā, disā catasso vidisā adho divā;
atk-s0508a2:5717: Sabbe aniccā tibhavā upaddutā, kuhiṃ gato citta sukhaṃ ramissasi.
atk-s0508a2:5719: “Dhitipparaṃ kiṃ mama citta kāhisi, na te alaṃ citta vasānuvattako;
atk-s0508a2:5720: Na jātu bhastaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ chupe, dhiratthu pūraṃ navasotasandaniṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5726: Sumañjughosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5728: “Vuṭṭhamhi deve caturaṅgule tiṇe, saṃpupphite meghanibhamhi kānane;
atk-s0508a2:5729: Nagantare viṭapisamo sayissaṃ, taṃ me mudū hehiti tūlasannibhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5731: “Tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5732: Na tāhaṃ kassāmi yathā atandito, biḷārabhastaṃva yathā sumadditaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5734: “Tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5735: Viriyena taṃ mayha vasānayissaṃ, gajaṃva mattaṃ kusalaṅkusaggaho.
atk-s0508a2:5737: “Tayā sudantena avaṭṭhitena hi, hayena yoggācariyova ujjunā;
atk-s0508a2:5738: Pahomi maggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ sivaṃ, cittānurakkhīhi sadā nisevitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5740: “Ārammaṇe taṃ balasā nibandhisaṃ, nāgaṃva thambhamhi daḷhāya rajjuyā;
atk-s0508a2:5741: Taṃ me suguttaṃ satiyā subhāvitaṃ, anissitaṃ sabbabhavesu hehisi.
atk-s0508a2:5743: “Paññāya chetvā vipathānusārinaṃ, yogena niggayha pathe nivesiya;
atk-s0508a2:5744: Disvā samudayaṃ vibhavañca sambhavaṃ, dāyādako hehisi aggavādino.
atk-s0508a2:5749: “Migo yathā seri sucittakānane, rammaṃ giriṃ pāvusaabbhamāliniṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5750: Anākule tattha nage ramissaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ citta parā bhavissasi.
atk-s0508a2:5753: Narā ca nārī ca anubhonti yaṃ sukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5756_0: Tattha kadā nuhanti kadā nu ahaṃ. Pabbatakandarāsūti pabbatesu ca kandaresu ca, pabbatassa
atk-s0508a2:5756_1: vā kandarāsu. Ekākiyoti ekako. Addutiyoti nittaṇho. Taṇhā hi purisassa dutiyā nāma.
atk-s0508a2:5756_2: Vihassanti viharissāmi. Aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassanti kāmabhavādibhedaṃ sabbampi
atk-s0508a2:5756_3: bhavaṃ “hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena anicca”nti vipassanto kadā nu viharissanti yojanā. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5756_4: “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5756_5: vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissatīti taṃ idaṃ me parivitakkitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5756_6: kadā nu bhavissati, kadā nu kho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatīti attho. Taṃ nūti cettha tanti
atk-s0508a2:5756_7: nipātamattaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – kadā nu kho ahaṃ mahāgajo viya saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5756_8: gihibandhanaṃ chinditvā pabbajitvā kāyavivekaṃ paribrūhayanto ekākī pabbatakandarāsu
atk-s0508a2:5756_9: adutiyo sabbattha nirapekkho sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccādito vipassanto viharissāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:5757_0: Bhinnapaṭandharoti bhinnavatthadharo, gāthāsukhatthaṃ nakārāgamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Satthakacchinnaagghaphassavaṇṇabhinnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5757_1: paṭacīvaraṃ dhārentoti attho. Munīti pabbajito. Amamoti kule vā gaṇe vā mamattābhāvena
atk-s0508a2:5757_2: amamo. Katthacipi ārammaṇe āsīsanāya abhāvena nirāso. Hantvā sukhī pavanagato vihassanti
atk-s0508a2:5757_3: rāgādike kilese ariyamaggena samucchinditvā maggasukhena phalasukhena sukhī mahāvanagato
atk-s0508a2:5758_0: Vadharoganīḷanti maraṇassa ca rogassa ca kulāvakabhūtaṃ. Kāyaṃ imanti imaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5758_1: kāyaṃ. Khandhapañcakopi hi “avijjāgatassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa taṇhānugatassa
atk-s0508a2:5758_2: ayameva kāyo bahiddhā nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu kāyo vuccati. Maccujarāyupaddutanti maraṇena
atk-s0508a2:5758_3: ceva jarāya ca pīḷitaṃ, vipassamāno ahaṃ bhayahetupahānena vītabhayo, taṃ nu kadā bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5759_0: Bhayajananinti pañcavīsatiyā mahābhayānaṃ uppādakāraṇabhūtaṃ kāyikassa ca cetasikassa
atk-s0508a2:5759_1: ca sakalassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa āvahanato dukhāvahaṃ. Taṇhālataṃ bahuvidhānuvattaninti
atk-s0508a2:5759_2: bahuvidhañca ārammaṇaṃ bhavameva vā anuvattati santanotīti bahuvidhānuvattaniṃ, taṇhāsaṅkhātalataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5759_3: Paññāmayanti maggapaññāmayaṃ sunisitaṃ asikhaggaṃ vīriyapaggahitena saddhāhatthena
atk-s0508a2:5759_4: gahetvā samucchinditvā “kadā nuhaṃ vase”ti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ, tampi kadā bhavissatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5760_0: Uggatejanti samathavipassanāvasena nisitatāya tikkhatejaṃ. Satthaṃ isīnanti buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakaisīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5760_1: satthabhūtaṃ. Māraṃ sasenaṃ sahasā bhañjissanti kilesasenāya sasenaṃ abhisaṅkhārādimāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5760_2: sahasā sīghameva bhañjissāmi. Sīhāsaneti thirāsane, aparājitapallaṅketi attho.
atk-s0508a2:5761_0: Sabbhi samāgamesu diṭṭho bhaveti dhammagāravayuttatāya dhammagarūhi tādilakkhaṇappattiyā
atk-s0508a2:5761_1: tādīhi aviparītadassitāya yāthāvadassīhi ariyamaggeneva pāpajitindriyatāya jitindriyehi
atk-s0508a2:5761_2: buddhādīhi sādhūhi samāgamesu “kadā nu ahaṃ padhāniyoti diṭṭho bhaveyya”nti yaṃ me
atk-s0508a2:5761_3: parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ nu kadā bhavissatīti yojanā. Iminā nayena sabbattha padayojanā
atk-s0508a2:5762_0: Tandīti ālasiyaṃ. Khudāti jighacchā. Kīṭasarīsapāti kīṭañceva sarīsapā ca. Na bādhayissantīti
atk-s0508a2:5762_1: maṃ na byādhayissanti sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassānaṃ jhānehi paṭibāhitattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5762_2: Giribbajeti pabbatakandarāya. Atthatthiyanti sadatthasaṅkhātena atthena atthikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5763_0: Yaṃ viditaṃ mahesināti yaṃ catusaccaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena sayambhūñāṇena ñātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5763_1: paṭividdhaṃ, tāni cattāri saccāni anupacitakusalasambhārehi suṭṭhu duddasāni maggasamādhinā
atk-s0508a2:5763_2: samāhitatto, sammāsatiyā satimā, ariyamaggapaññāya ahaṃ agacchaṃ paṭivijjhissaṃ adhigamissanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5764_0: Rūpeti cakkhuviññeyyarūpe. Amiteti ñāṇena amite, aparicchinne apariññāteti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5764_1: Phusitabbeti, phoṭṭhabbe. Dhammeti manoviññeyyadhamme. Amiteti vā aparimāṇe nīlādivasena
atk-s0508a2:5764_3: sukhadukkhādivasena ca, anekabhedasaddādike cāti attho. Ādittatoti ekādasahi aggīhi
atk-s0508a2:5764_4: ādittabhāvato. Samathehi yuttoti jhānavipassanāmaggasamādhīhi samannāgato. Paññāya
atk-s0508a2:5765: Dubbacanena vuttoti duruttavacanena ghaṭṭito. Tato nimittanti pharusavācāhetu. Vimano na hessanti domanassito na bhaveyyaṃ. Athoti atha. Pasatthoti kenaci pasaṃsito.
atk-s0508a2:5766_0: Kaṭṭheti dārukkhandhe. Tiṇeti tiṇānaṃ khandhe. Imeti ime mama santatipariyāpanne
atk-s0508a2:5766_1: pañca khandhe. Amite ca dhammeti tato aññena indriyakkhandhena amite rūpadhamme.
atk-s0508a2:5766_2: Tenāha – “ajjhattikāneva ca bāhirāni cā”ti. Samaṃ tuleyyanti aniccādivasena ceva
atk-s0508a2:5766_3: asārādiupamāvasena ca sabbaṃ samameva katvā tīreyyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5767_0: Isippayātamhi pathe vajantanti buddhādīhi mahesīhi sammadeva payāte samathavipassanāmagge
atk-s0508a2:5767_1: vajantaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ. Pāvusasamaye kālamegho navena toyena vassodakena sacīvaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5767_2: pavane kadā nu ovassati, temetīti attano abbhokāsikabhāvaparivitakkitaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5768_0: Mayūrassa sikhaṇḍino vane dijassāti mātukucchito aṇḍakosato cāti dvikkhattuṃ jāyanavasena
atk-s0508a2:5768_1: dijassa, sikhāsambhavena sikhaṇḍino ca mayūrassa vane kadā pana girigabbhare rutaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5768_2: kekāravaṃ sutvā velaṃ sallakkhitvā sayanato vuṭṭhahitvā amatassa pattiyā nibbānādhigamāya.
atk-s0508a2:5768_3: Saṃcintayeti vuccamāne bhave aniccādito manasi kareyyaṃ vipasseyyanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5769_0: Gaṅgaṃ yamunaṃ sarassatinti etā mahānadiyo asajjamāno bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā kadā
atk-s0508a2:5769_1: nu patareyyanti yojanā. Pātālakhittaṃ baḷavāmukhañcāti pātāya alaṃ pariyattanti pātālaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5769_2: tadeva khittaṃ, pathaviyā saṇṭhahanakāle tathā ṭhitanti pātālakhittaṃ. Yojanasatikādibhedāni
atk-s0508a2:5769_3: samuddassa antopathaviyā tīraṭṭhānāni, yesu kānici nāgādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānāni honti,
atk-s0508a2:5769_4: kānici suññāniyeva hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Baḷavāmukhanti mahāsamudde mahantaṃ āvaṭṭamukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5769_5: Mahānirayadvārassa hi vivaṭakāle mahāaggikkhandho tato nikkhanto tadabhimukhaṃ anekayojanasatāyāmavitthāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5769_6: heṭṭhā samuddapadesaṃ ḍahati, tasmiṃ daḍḍhe upari udakaṃ āvaṭṭākārena paribbhamantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5769_7: mahatā saddena heṭṭhā nipatati. Tattha baḷavāmukhasamaññā, iti tañca pātālakhittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5769_8: baḷavāmukhañca vibhiṃsanaṃ bhayānakaṃ asajjamāno iddhiyā kadā nu patareyyanti yaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5769_9: parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ kadā nu bhavissati, bhāvanāmayaṃ iddhiṃ nibbattetvā kadā nu evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5770_0: Nāgova asaṅgacārī padālayeti yathā mattavāraṇo daḷhathambhaṃ bhinditvā ayasaṅkhalikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5770_1: viddhaṃsetvā asaṅgacārī vanaṃ pavisitvā eko adutiyo hutvā attano rucivasena carati,
atk-s0508a2:5770_2: evamahaṃ kadā nu sabbasubhaṃ nimittaṃ nibbajjayaṃ niravasesato vajjayanto kāmacchandavaso
atk-s0508a2:5770_3: ahutvā jhāne yuto payutto kāmaguṇesu chandaṃ sammadeva padāleyyaṃ chindeyyaṃ pajaheyyanti
atk-s0508a2:5770_4: yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5771_0: Iṇaṭṭova daliddako nidhiṃ ārādhayitvāti yathā koci daliddo jīvikapakato iṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:5771_1: taṃ sodhetuṃ asakkonto iṇaṭṭo iṇena aṭṭito dhanikehi pīḷito nidhiṃ ārādhayitvā adhigantvā
atk-s0508a2:5771_2: iṇañca sodhetvā sukhena ca jīvanto tuṭṭho bhaveyya, evaṃ ahampi kadā nu iṇasadisaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5771_4: buddhassa sāsanaṃ adhigantvā tuṭṭho bhaveyyanti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ kadā nu bhavissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:5772_0: Evaṃ pabbajjato pubbe nekkhammavitakkavasena pavattaṃ attano vitakkapavattiṃ dassetvā
atk-s0508a2:5772_1: idāni pabbajitvā yehākārehi attānaṃ ovaditvā adhigacchi, te dassento “bahūni vassānī”tiādikā
atk-s0508a2:5772_2: gāthā abhāsi. Tattha bahūni vassāni tayāmhi yācito, agāravāsena alaṃ nu te idanti
atk-s0508a2:5772_3: anekasaṃvaccharāni vividhadukkhānubandhena agāramajjhe vāsena alaṃ pariyattameva
atk-s0508a2:5772_4: teti, ambho citta, idaṃ tayā anekāni saṃvaccharāni ahaṃ amhi nanu yācito. Taṃ dāni
atk-s0508a2:5772_5: maṃ pabbajitaṃ samānanti taṃ maṃ tayā tathā ussāhanena pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ kena kāraṇena
atk-s0508a2:5772_6: citta tuvaṃ na yuñjasi, samathavipassanaṃ chaḍḍetvā nihīne ālasiye niyojesīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5773_0: Nanu ahaṃ, citta, tayāmhi yācitoti, ambho citta, ahaṃ tayā nanu yācito amhi āyācito
atk-s0508a2:5773_1: maññe. Yadi yācito, kasmā idāni tadanurūpaṃ na paṭipajjasīti adhippāyo. “Giribbaje”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:5773_2: yācitākāraṃ dasseti. Citrachadā vihaṅgamā vicitrapekhuṇapakkhino, mayūrāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5773_3: Mahindaghosatthanitābhigajjinoti jalaghosatthanitena hetunā suṭṭhu gajjanasīlā. Te
atk-s0508a2:5773_4: taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinanti te mayūrā taṃ vane jhānapasutaṃ ramessantīti nanu
atk-s0508a2:5774: Kulamhīti kulaparivaṭṭe. Imamajjhupāgatoti imaṃ araññaṭṭhānaṃ pabbajjaṃ vā ajjhupāgato. Athopi tvaṃ, citta, na mayha tussasīti tvaṃ anuvattitvā ṭhitampi maṃ nārādhessasīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5775_0: Mameva etaṃ na hi tvaṃ paresanti etaṃ, citta, mameva tasmā tvaṃ paresaṃ na hosi.
atk-s0508a2:5775_1: Tvaṃ pana aññesaṃ viya katvā sannāhakāle kilesamāre yujjhituṃ bhāvanāsannāhakāle
atk-s0508a2:5775_2: nati vatvā paridevitena kiṃ payojanaṃ, idāni taṃ aññathā vattituṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5775_3: Sabbaṃ idaṃ calamiti pekkhamānoti yasmā “idaṃ cittaṃ aññañca sabbaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5775_4: calaṃ anavaṭṭhita”nti paññācakkhunā olokento gehato kāmehi ca abhinikkhamiṃ amatapadaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5775_5: nibbānaṃ jigīsaṃ pariyesanto, tasmā, citta, ananuvattanto nibbānaṃ pariyesanameva karomīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5776: Avītarāgena sudunnivārayaṃ cittaṃ calaṃ makkaṭasannibhaṃ vanamakkaṭasadisaṃ iti suyuttavādī subhāsitavādī dvipadānamuttamo mahābhisakko naradammasārathīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5777_0: Aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanāti yattha yesu vatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu ca sitā paṭibaddhā
atk-s0508a2:5777_1: te andhaputhujjanā tena kāmarāgena punabbhavesino ekanteneva dukkhamicchanti. Icchantā
atk-s0508a2:5777_2: ca cittena nītā niraye nirākatāti cittavasikā nirayasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ karontā
atk-s0508a2:5777_3: hitasukhato nirākatā hutvā attano citteneva niraye nītā na aññathāti cittasseva niggahetabbataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5778_0: Punapi cittaṃyeva niggahetuṃ mantento “mayūrakoñcābhirutamhī”tiādimāha. Tattha mayūrakoñcābhirutamhīti
atk-s0508a2:5778_1: sikhīhi sārasehi ca abhikūjite. Dīpīhi byagghehi purakkhato vasanti mettāvihāritāya
atk-s0508a2:5778_2: evarūpehi tiracchānagatehi purakkhato parivārito hutvā vane vasanto, etena suññabhāvaparibrūhanamāha.
atk-s0508a2:5778_3: Kāye apekkhaṃ jahāti sabbaso kāye nirapekkho jaha, etena pahitattataṃ vadati. Mā
atk-s0508a2:5778_4: virādhayāti imaṃ sudullabhaṃ navamaṃ khaṇaṃ mā virādhehi. Itissu maṃ, citta, pure
atk-s0508a2:5778_5: niyuñjasīti evañhi tvaṃ, citta, maṃ pabbajjato pubbe sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uyyojesīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5779_0: Bhāvehīti uppādehi vaḍḍhehi ca. Jhānānīti paṭhamādīni cattāri jhānāni. Indriyānīti
atk-s0508a2:5779_1: saddhādīni pañcindriyāni. Balānīti tāniyeva pañca balāni. Bojjhaṅgasamādhibhāvanāti
atk-s0508a2:5779_2: satta bojjhaṅge catasso samādhibhāvanā ca. Tisso ca vijjāti pubbenivāsañāṇādikā tisso
atk-s0508a2:5779_3: vijjā ca. Phusa pāpuṇāhi buddhasāsane sammāsambuddhaovāde ṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:5780: Niyyānikanti vaṭṭadukkhato niyhānavahaṃ. Sabbadukkhakkhayogadhanti amatogadhaṃ nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ. Sabbakilesasodhananti anavasesakilesamalavisodhanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5781_0: Khandheti upādānakkhandhe. Paṭipassa yonisoti rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhatoti
atk-s0508a2:5781_1: evamādīhi vividhehi pakārehi vipassanāñāṇena sammā upāyena nayena passa. Taṃ jahāti
atk-s0508a2:5781_2: taṃ dukkhassa samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ pajaha, samucchinda. Idhevāti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve.
atk-s0508a2:5782_0: Aniccantiādi antavantato aniccantikato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepato ca aniccanti
atk-s0508a2:5782_1: vā passa. Dukkhanti te udayabbayapaṭipīḷanato sappaṭibhayato dukkhamato sukhapaṭikkhepato
atk-s0508a2:5782_2: dukkhanti vā passa. Suññanti avasavattanato asāmikato asārato attapaṭikkhepato ca
atk-s0508a2:5782_3: suññaṃ, tato eva anattāti. Vigarahitabbato avaḍḍhiābādhanato ca aghanti ca vadhanti
atk-s0508a2:5782_4: ca vipassa yonisoti yojanā. Manovicāre uparundha cetasoti manovicārasaññino gehasitasomanassupavicārādike
atk-s0508a2:5783_0: Muṇḍoti muṇḍabhāvaṃ upagato, ohāritakesamassuko. Virūpoti tena muṇḍabhāvena parūḷhalomatāya
atk-s0508a2:5783_1: chinnabhinnakāsāya vatthatāya virūpo vevaṇṇiyaṃ upagato. Abhisāpamāgatoti “piṇḍolo
atk-s0508a2:5783_2: vicarati pattapāṇī”ti ariyehi kātabbaṃ abhisāpaṃ upagato. Vuttañhetaṃ – “abhisāpoyaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5783_3: bhikkhave, lokasmiṃ piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī”ti. Tenāha “kapālahatthova kulesu
atk-s0508a2:5783_4: bhikkhasū”ti. Yuñjassu satthuvacaneti sammāsambuddhassa ovāde yogaṃ karohi anuyuñjassu.
atk-s0508a2:5784_0: Susaṃvutattoti suṭṭhu kāyavācācittehi sammadeva saṃvuto. Visikhantare caranti bhikkhācariyāya
atk-s0508a2:5784_1: icchāvisesesu caranto. Cando yathā dosinapuṇṇamāsiyāti vigatadosāya puṇṇamāya kulesu
atk-s0508a2:5784_2: niccanavasāya pāsādikatāya candimā viya carāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5785_0: Sadā dhute ratoti sabbakālañca dhutaguṇe abhirato. Tathūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ karosīti
atk-s0508a2:5785_1: yathā koci puriso phalāni icchanto phalarukkhe ropetvā tato aladdhaphalova te mūlato
atk-s0508a2:5785_2: chindituṃ icchati, citta, tvaṃ tathūpamaṃ tappaṭibhāgaṃ idaṃ karosi. Yaṃ maṃ aniccamhi
atk-s0508a2:5785_3: cale niyuñjasīti yaṃ maṃ pabbajjāya niyojetvā pabbajitvā addhāgataṃ pabbajjāphalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5785_4: aniccamhi cale saṃsāramukhe niyuñjasi niyojanavasena pavattesi.
atk-s0508a2:5786_0: Rūpābhāvato arūpā. Cittassa hi tādisaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ nīlādivaṇṇabhedo vā natthi, tasmā
atk-s0508a2:5786_1: vuttaṃ arūpāti. Dūraṭṭhānappavattiyā dūraṅgama. Yadipi cittassa makkaṭasuttamattampi
atk-s0508a2:5786_2: puratthimādidisābhāgena gamanaṃ nāma natthi, dūre santaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchatīti
atk-s0508a2:5786_3: dūraṅgama. Ekoyeva hutvā caraṇavasena pavattanato ekacāri, antamaso dve tīṇipi cittāni
atk-s0508a2:5786_4: ekato uppajjituṃ samatthāni nāma natthi, ekameva pana cittaṃ ekasmiṃ santāne uppajjati.
atk-s0508a2:5786_5: Tasmiṃ niruddhe aparampi ekameva uppajjati, tasmā ekacāri. Na te karissaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5786_6: idānihanti yadipi pubbe tava vase anuvattiṃ, idāni pana satthu ovādaṃ laddhakālato
atk-s0508a2:5786_7: paṭṭhāya cittavasiko na bhavissāmi. Kasmāti ce? Dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahabbhayā
atk-s0508a2:5786_8: kāmā nāmete atītepi dukkhā, āyatimpi kaṭukaphalā, attānuvādādibhedena mahatā bhayena
atk-s0508a2:5786_9: anubandhantā mahabbhayā. Nibbānamevābhimano carissaṃ tasmā nibbānameva uddissa abhimukhacitto viharissaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5787: Tameva nibbānābhimukhabhāvaṃ dassento “nāhaṃ alakkhyā”tiādimāha. Tattha nāhaṃ alakkhyāti alakkhikatāya nissirīkatāya nāhaṃ gehato nikkhaminti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5788_0: Ahirikkatāyāti yathāvajjaṃ keḷiṃ karonto viya nillajjatāya. Cittahetūti ekadā nigaṇṭho,
atk-s0508a2:5788_1: ekadā paribbājakādiko honto anavaṭṭhitacitto puriso viya cittavasiko hutvā. Dūrakantanāti
atk-s0508a2:5788_2: rājādīhi mettaṃ katvā tesu dubbhitvā dubbhibhāvena. Ājīvahetūti ājīvakāraṇā jīvikāpakato
atk-s0508a2:5788_3: hutvā ājīvikābhayena ahaṃ na nikkhamiṃ na pabbajiṃ. Kato ca te, citta, paṭissavo
atk-s0508a2:5788_4: mayāti, “pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya na tava vase vattāmi, mameva pana vase vattāmī”ti,
atk-s0508a2:5788_5: citta, mayā nanu paṭiññā katāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5789_0: Appicchatā sappurisehi vaṇṇitāti “paccayesu sabbaso appicchā nāma sādhū”ti buddhādīhi
atk-s0508a2:5789_1: pasaṭṭhā, tathā makkhappahānaṃ paresaṃ guṇe makkhanassa pahānaṃ vūpasamo sabbassa
atk-s0508a2:5789_2: dukkhassa vūpasamo nibbāpanaṃ sappurisehi vaṇṇitaṃ. Itissu maṃ, citta, tadā niyuñjasi,
atk-s0508a2:5789_3: “samma, tayā tesu guṇesu patiṭṭhātabba”nti, citta, tvaṃ evaṃ tadā niyuñjasi. Idāni
atk-s0508a2:5789_4: tvaṃ gacchasi pubbaciṇṇaṃ idāni maṃ tvaṃ pahāya attano purimāciṇṇaṃ mahicchatādiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5790_0: Yamatthaṃ sandhāya “gacchasi pubbaciṇṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ dassetuṃ “taṇhā avijjā cā”tiādi
atk-s0508a2:5790_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha taṇhāti paccayesu taṇhā, avijjāti tattheva ādīnavapaṭicchādikā avijjā.
atk-s0508a2:5790_2: Piyāpiyanti puttadārādīsu pemasaṅkhāto piyabhāvo ceva pantasenāsanesu adhikusaladhammesu
atk-s0508a2:5790_3: anabhiratisaṅkhāto appiyabhāvo ca ubhayattha anurodhapaṭivirodho. Subhāni rūpānīti
atk-s0508a2:5790_4: ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca subharūpāni. Sukhā vedanāti iṭṭhārammaṇe paṭicca uppajjanasukhavedanā.
atk-s0508a2:5790_5: Manāpiyā kāmaguṇāti vuttāvasesā manoramā kāmakoṭṭhāsā. Vantāti nirūpato taṃnissitassa
atk-s0508a2:5790_6: chandarāgassa vikkhambhanapahānena chaḍḍitatāya pariccattatāya ca vantā. Vante ahaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5790_7: āvamituṃ na ussaheti evaṃ te chaḍḍite puna paccāvamituṃ ahaṃ na sakkomi, pariccattā eva hontīti vadati.
atk-s0508a2:5791_0: Sabbatthāti sabbesu bhavesu sabbāsu yonīsu sabbāsu gatīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu ca. Vaco
atk-s0508a2:5791_1: kataṃ mayāti, ambho citta, tava vacanaṃ mayā kataṃ. Karonto ca bahūsu jātīsu na mesi
atk-s0508a2:5791_2: kopitoti anekāsu jātīsu pana mayā na kopito asi. Mayā neva paribhavito. Tathāpi ajjhattasambhavo
atk-s0508a2:5791_3: attani sambhūto hutvāpi tava akataññutāya dukkhe cīraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kateti tayā
atk-s0508a2:5791_4: nibbattite anādimati saṃsāradukkhe sucirakālaṃ mayā saṃsaritaṃ paribbhamitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5792_0: Idāni “dukkhe ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kate”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ uppattibhedena
atk-s0508a2:5792_1: gatibhedena ca vitthārato dassento “tvaññevā”tiādimāha. Tattha rājadasīti rājā asi,
atk-s0508a2:5792_2: dakāro padasandhikaro, vessā ca suddā ca bhavāma ekadā taveva vāhasāti yojanā. Devattanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5792_3: vāpīti devabhāvaṃ vāpi tvaṃyeva no amhākaṃ, citta, karosīti yojanā. Vāhasāti kāraṇabhāvena.
atk-s0508a2:5793: Taveva hetūti taveva hetubhāvena. Tvaṃmūlakanti tvaṃnimittaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5794_0: Nanu dubbhissasi maṃ punappunanti punappunaṃ dubbhissasi nuna, yathā pubbe tvaṃ anantāsu
atk-s0508a2:5794_1: jātīsu, citta, mittapaṭirūpako sapatto hutvā mayhaṃ punappunaṃ dubbhi, idāni tathā
atk-s0508a2:5794_2: dubbhissasi maññe, pubbe viya cāretuṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo. Muhuṃ muhuṃ cāraṇikaṃva
atk-s0508a2:5794_3: dassayanti abhiṇhato caraṇārahaṃ viya mano dassento caraṇārahaṃ purisaṃ vañcetvā
atk-s0508a2:5794_4: caragopakaṃ nipphādento viya punappunaṃ taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ dassento. Ummattakeneva mayā
atk-s0508a2:5794_5: palobhasīti ummattakapurisena viya mayā saddhiṃ kīḷanto taṃ taṃ palobhanīyaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0508a2:5794_6: palobhasi. Kiñcāpi te, citta, virādhitaṃ mayāti, ambho citta, kiṃ nāma te mayā viraddhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5795_0: Idaṃ pure cittanti idaṃ cittaṃ nāma ito pubbe rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu rajjanādinā, yena
atk-s0508a2:5795_1: ākārena icchati, yattheva cassa kāmo uppajjati, tassa vasena yatthakāmaṃ yathā vicarantassa
atk-s0508a2:5795_2: sukhaṃ hoti, tatheva ca caranto yathāsukhaṃ dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ acari. Ajjāhaṃ pabhinnamadaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5795_3: mattahatthiṃ hatthācariyasaṅkhāto cheko aṅkusaggaho aṅkusena viya yonisomanasikārena
atk-s0508a2:5796_0: Satthā ca me lokamimaṃ adhiṭṭhahīti mama satthā sammāsambuddho imaṃ anavasesakhandhalokaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5796_1: ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahi. Kinti? Hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccato, kassacipi dhuvassa thāvarassa
atk-s0508a2:5796_2: abhāvato addhuvato sukhasārādīnaṃ abhāvato asārato. Pakkhanda maṃ, citta, jinassa
atk-s0508a2:5796_3: sāsaneti tasmā yāthāvato paṭipajjituṃ, citta, maṃ jinassa bhagavato sāsane pakkhandehi
atk-s0508a2:5796_4: anuppavesehi. “Pakkhandima”ntipi pāḷi, jinassa sāsane imaṃ lokaṃ ñāṇena pakkhanda,
atk-s0508a2:5796_5: yāthāvato tārehi, pakkhandanto ca vipassanāñāṇamaggena yāpento suduttarato mahantato
atk-s0508a2:5797_0: Na te idaṃ, citta, yathā purāṇakanti, ambho citta, idaṃ attabhāvagehaṃ porāṇakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5797_1: viya tava na hotīti attho. Kasmā? Nāhaṃ alaṃ tuyha vase nivattitunti idānāhaṃ tava
atk-s0508a2:5797_2: vase nivattituṃ na yutto. Yasmā mahesino bhagavato pabbajitomhi sāsane. Pabbajitakālato
atk-s0508a2:5797_3: ca paṭṭhāya samaṇā nāma mādisāva na honti vināsadhārino, ekaṃsato samaṇāyeva hontīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5798_0: Nagāti sineruhimavantādayo sabbe pabbatā. Samuddāti puratthimasamuddādayo sītasamuddādayo,
atk-s0508a2:5798_1: na sabbe samuddā. Saritāti gaṅgādayo sabbā nadiyo ca. Vasundharāti pathavī. Disā
atk-s0508a2:5798_2: catassoti puratthimādibhedā catasso disā. Vidisāti puratthimadakkhiṇādayo catasso
atk-s0508a2:5798_3: anudisā. Adhoti heṭṭhā yāva udakasandhārakavāyukhandhā. Divāti devalokā. Divāggahaṇena
atk-s0508a2:5798_4: cettha tattha gate sattasaṅkhāre vadati. Sabbe aniccā tibhavā upaddutāti sabbe kāmabhavādayo
atk-s0508a2:5798_5: tayo bhavā aniccā ceva jātiādīhi rāgādīhi kilesehi upaddutā pīḷitā ca, na ettha kiñci
atk-s0508a2:5798_6: khemaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthi, tadabhāvato kuhiṃ gato, citta, sukhaṃ ramissasi, tasmā tato
atk-s0508a2:5799_0: Dhitipparanti dhitiparāyaṇaṃ paramaṃ thirabhāve ṭhitaṃ mamaṃ, citta, kiṃ kāhisi,
atk-s0508a2:5799_1: tato īsakampi maṃ cāletuṃ nāsakkhissasīti attho. Tenāha “na te alaṃ, citta, vasānuvattako”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5799_2: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassento “na jātu bhastaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ chupe,
atk-s0508a2:5799_3: dhiratthu pūraṃ navasotasandani”nti āha. Tattha bhastanti ruttiṃ. Ubhatomukhanti
atk-s0508a2:5799_4: putoḷiyā ubhatomukhaṃ. Na jātu chupeti ekaṃseneva pādenāpi na chupeyya, tathā dhiratthu
atk-s0508a2:5799_5: pūraṃ navasotasandaninti nānappakārassa asucino pūraṃ navahi sotehi vaṇamukhehi asucisandaniṃ
atk-s0508a2:5799_6: savatiṃ. Tāya vaccakuṭiyā dhī atthu, tassā garahā hotu.
atk-s0508a2:5800_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhavīsatiyā gāthāhi niggaṇhanavasena cittaṃ ovaditvā idāni vivekaṭṭhānācikkhaṇādinā
atk-s0508a2:5800_2: varāhehi ceva eṇeyyehi ca ogāhetvā sevite. Pabbhārakuṭṭeti pabbhāraṭṭhāne ceva pabbatasikhare
atk-s0508a2:5800_3: ca. Pakateva sundareti pakatiyā eva sundare atittimanohare. “Pakativasundhare”ti
atk-s0508a2:5800_4: vā pāṭho, pākatike bhūmipadeseti attho. Navambunā pāvusasittakānaneti pāvusavasena
atk-s0508a2:5800_5: vuṭṭhena meghodakena upasittavasse sutheve vane. Tahiṃ guhāgehagato ramissasīti tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5800_6: pabbatakānane guhāsaṅkhātaṃ gehaṃ upagato bhāvanāratiyā abhiramissasi.
atk-s0508a2:5801: Te taṃ ramessantīti te mayūrādayo vanasaññaṃ uppādentā taṃ ramessantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5802_0: Vuṭṭhamhi deveti meghe adhippavuṭṭhe. Caturaṅgule tiṇeti teneva gassodakapātena tattha
atk-s0508a2:5802_1: tattha tiṇe surattavaṇṇakambalasadise caturaṅgule jāte. Saṃpupphite meghanibhamhi
atk-s0508a2:5802_2: kānaneti pāvusameghasaṅkāse kānane sammadeva pupphite. Nagantareti pabbatantare.
atk-s0508a2:5802_3: Viṭapisamo sayissanti tarusadiso apariggaho hutvā nipajjissaṃ. Taṃ me mudū hehiti
atk-s0508a2:5802_4: tūlasannibhanti taṃ tiṇapaccattharaṇaṃ mudu sukhasamphassaṃ tūlasannibhaṃ tūlikasadisaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5803_0: Tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaroti yathā koci issarapuriso attano vacanakaradāsādiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5803_1: vase vatteti, ahampi, citta, taṃ tathā karissāmi, mayhaṃ vase vattemiyeva. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0508a2:5803_2: Yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alanti catūsu paccayesu yaṃ yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā labbhati,
atk-s0508a2:5803_3: tena ca mayhaṃ alaṃ pariyattaṃ hotu. Etena idaṃ dasseti – yasmā idhekacce sattā taṇhuppādahetu
atk-s0508a2:5803_4: cittassa vase anuvattanti, ahaṃ pana taṇhuppādaṃ dūrato vajjento cittaṃ dāsaṃ viya
atk-s0508a2:5803_5: karonto attano vase vattemīti. Na tāhaṃ kassāmi yathā atandito, biḷārabhastaṃva yathā
atk-s0508a2:5803_6: sumadditanti citta taṇhuppādaparivajjanahetu, puna tanti cittaṃ āmasati, yathā aññopi
atk-s0508a2:5803_7: koci sammappadhānayogena bhāvanāya atandito attano cittaṃ kammakkhamaṃ, kammayoggaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5803_8: karoti, tathā ahampi, citta, taṃ kammakkhamaṃ, kammayoggaṃ mayhaṃ vase vattaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0508a2:5803_9: Yathā kiṃ? Biḷārabhastaṃva yathā sumadditaṃ, naiti nipātamattaṃ. Yathā suṭṭhu madditaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5803_10: biḷārabhastaṃ kammakkhamaṃ, kammayoggaṃ sukhena pariharaṇīyañca hoti, tathāhaṃ taṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0508a2:5804_0: Vīriyena taṃ mayha vasānayissanti, ambho citta, taṃ attano vīriyena bhāvanābalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5804_1: uppādetvā tena mayhaṃ vasaṃ ānayissaṃ. Gajaṃva mattaṃ kusalaṅkusaggahoti yathā kusalo
atk-s0508a2:5804_2: cheko aṅkusaggaho hatthācariyo attano sikkhābalena mattahatthiṃ attano vasaṃ āneti, tathevāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5805_0: Tayā sudantena avaṭṭhitena hīti hīti nipātamattaṃ, citta, samathavipassanābhāvanāhi
atk-s0508a2:5805_1: suṭṭhu dantena tato eva sammadeva vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipannattā avaṭṭhitena tayā.
atk-s0508a2:5805_2: Hayena yoggācariyova ujjunāti yathā sudantena sudantattā eva ujunā avaṅkagatinā assājānīyena
atk-s0508a2:5805_3: yoggācariyo assadammasārathi akhemaṭṭhānato khemantabhūmiṃ paṭipajjituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0508a2:5805_4: evaṃ pahomi maggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ sivanti asivabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena sivaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5805_5: Cittānurakkhīhīti attano cittaṃ anurakkhaṇasīlehi buddhādīhi sabbakālaṃ sevitaṃ ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5806_0: Ārammaṇe taṃ balasā nibandhisaṃ, nāgaṃva thambhamhi daḷhāya rajjuyāti yathā hatthācariyo
atk-s0508a2:5806_1: mahāhatthiṃ āḷānathambhe daḷhāya thirāya rajjuyā nibandhati, evamahaṃ, citta, kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe
atk-s0508a2:5806_2: bhāvanābalena nibandhissaṃ. Taṃ me suguttaṃ satiyā subhāvitanti taṃ tvaṃ, citta,
atk-s0508a2:5806_3: mama satiyā suguttaṃ subhāvitañca hutvā. Anissitaṃ sabbabhavesu hehisīti ariyamaggabhāvanādibalena
atk-s0508a2:5806_4: kāmabhavādīsu sabbesupi bhavesu taṇhādinissayehi anissitaṃ bhavissasi.
atk-s0508a2:5807_0: Paññāya chetvā vipathānusārinanti uppathagāminaṃ āyatanasamudayaṃ yāthāvato disvā
atk-s0508a2:5807_1: yena samudayena uppathagāmī, tassa kilesavissandanaṃ kilesavipphanditaṃ indriyasaṃvarūpanissayāya
atk-s0508a2:5807_2: paṭisaṅkhānapaññāya chinditvā sotavicchedanavasena āvaraṇaṃ katvā. Yogena niggayhāti
atk-s0508a2:5807_3: vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātena yogena sāmatthiyavidhamanena niggahetvā. Pathe nivesiyāti
atk-s0508a2:5807_4: vipassanāvīthiyaṃ nivesetvā, patiṭṭhapetvā. Yadā pana vipassanā ussukkāpitā maggena
atk-s0508a2:5807_5: ghaṭṭeti, tadā maggapaññāya “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti
atk-s0508a2:5807_6: nidassanena sabbaso āyatanasamudayassa vibhavaṃ sambhavañca asammohato disvā sadevake
atk-s0508a2:5807_7: loke aggavādino sammāsambuddhassa dāyādo orasaputto hehisi bhavissasīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5808_0: Catubbipallāsavasaṃ adhiṭṭhitanti anicce niccanti, asubhe subhanti, dukkhe sukhanti,
atk-s0508a2:5808_1: anattani attāti imesaṃ catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ vasaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ anuvattantaṃ. Gāmaṇḍalaṃva
atk-s0508a2:5808_2: parinesi, citta, manti, ambho citta, maṃ gāmadārakaṃ viya parikaḍḍhasi, ito cito
atk-s0508a2:5808_3: parikaḍḍhasi. Nanu saṃyojanabandhanacchidanti saṃyojanasaṅkhātānaṃ dasannaṃ bandhanānaṃ

atk-s0508a2:5816_0: Saṭṭhinipāte āraññikātiādikā āyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?

atk-s0508a2:5816_4: saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā bhagavatā vuccamānaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇanto eva

atk-s0508a2:5828: Obhāsento disā sabbā, bhavanaṃ me upāgami.

atk-s0508a2:6069_0: Tattha “āraññikā”tiādikā catasso gāthā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena bhāsitā. Āraññikāti
atk-s0508a2:6069_2: paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍapātikaṅgasamādānena piṇḍapātikā, ghare ghare laddhapiṇḍapātena
atk-s0508a2:6069_3: yāpanakā. Uñchāpattāgate ratāti uñchācariyāya patte āgate pattapariyāpanne ratā,
atk-s0508a2:6069_4: teneva abhiratā santuṭṭhā. Dālemu maccuno senanti attānaṃ anatthajanane sahāyabhāvūpagamanato
atk-s0508a2:6069_5: maccurājassa senābhūtaṃ kilesavāhiniṃ samucchindema. Ajjhattaṃ susamāhitāti gocarajjhattesu
atk-s0508a2:6072_0: “Aṭṭhikaṅkalakuṭike”tiādikā catasso gāthā attānaṃ palobhetuṃ upagatāya gaṇikāya ovādavasena
atk-s0508a2:6072_1: abhāsi. Tattha aṭṭhikaṅkalakuṭiketi aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāmayakuṭike. Nhārupasibbiteti navahi
atk-s0508a2:6072_2: nhārusatehi samantato sibbite. Araññe kuṭiyo dārudaṇḍe ussāpetvā valliādīhi bandhitvā
atk-s0508a2:6072_3: kariyanti, tvaṃ pana paramajegucchena aṭṭhikaṅkalena paramajeguccheheva nhārūhi bandhitvā
atk-s0508a2:6072_4: katā, ativiya jegucchā paṭikkūlā cāti dasseti. Dhiratthu pūre duggandheti kesalomādino
atk-s0508a2:6072_5: nānappakārassa asucino pūre paripuṇṇe, tato eva duggandhe dhiratthu tava dhīkāro
atk-s0508a2:6072_6: hotu. Paragatte mamāyaseti idañca te duggandhassa upari phoṭasamuṭṭhānaṃ parissayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6072_7: evaṃ asuciduggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlasamādānaṃ tādise eva aññasmiṃ padese soṇasiṅgālakimikulādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6073_0: Gūthabhasteti gūthabharitabhastasadise. Taconaddheti tacena onaddhe chavimattapaṭicchāditakibbise.
atk-s0508a2:6073_1: Uragaṇḍipisācinīti ure ṭhitagaṇḍadvayavatī bhayānakabhāvato anatthāvahato ca pisācasadisī.
atk-s0508a2:6073_2: Yāni sandanti sabbadāti yāni nava sotāni, nava vaṇamukhāni sabbadā rattindivaṃ sandanti,
atk-s0508a2:6074_0: Paribandhanti sammāpaṭipattiparibandhabhūtaṃ. Bhikkhūti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanto bhinnakileso
atk-s0508a2:6074_1: vā dūrato parivajjayateti mamattaṃ na karoti. Mīḷhañca yathā sucikāmoti ca-iti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6074_2: Yathā sucijātiko sucimeva icchanto sasīsaṃ nhāto mīḷhaṃ disvā dūratova parivajjesi,
atk-s0508a2:6075_0: Evañce taṃ jano jaññā, yathā jānāmi taṃ ahanti evaṃ sarīrasaññitaṃ asucipuñjaṃ yathā
atk-s0508a2:6075_1: ahaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāmi, evameva mahājano jāneyya, taṃ ārakā dūratova parivajjeyya.
atk-s0508a2:6075_2: Gūthaṭṭhānaṃva pāvuseti pāvusakāle kilinnāsuciṃ nirantaraṃ gūthaṭṭhānaṃ viya sucijātiko.
atk-s0508a2:6075_3: Yasmā pana taṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti, tasmā tattha nimuggo sīsaṃ na ukkhipatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:6076_0: Evaṃ therena sarīre dose vibhāvite sā gaṇikā lajjāvanatamukhā there gāravaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:6076_1: “evametaṃ mahāvīrā”ti gāthaṃ vatvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Tattha ettha ceketi evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6076_2: pākaṭapaṭikkūlasabhāvepi etasmiṃ kāye ekacce sattā āsattibalavatāya visīdanti visādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6076_3: āpajjanti. Paṅkamhiva jaraggavo mahākaddamakucchiyaṃ sampatitadubbalabalibaddo viya
atk-s0508a2:6077_0: Puna taṃ thero mādise evarūpā paṭipatti niratthakā vighātāvahā evāti dassento “ākāsamhī”tiādinā
atk-s0508a2:6077_1: gāthādvayamāha. Tassattho – yo puggalo haliddiyā aññena vā raṅgajātena ākāsaṃ rañjituṃ
atk-s0508a2:6077_2: maññeyya, tassa taṃ kammaṃ vighātudayaṃ cittavighātāvahameva siyā, yathā taṃ avisaye yogo.
atk-s0508a2:6078_0: Tadākāsasamaṃ cittanti tayidaṃ mama cittaṃ ākāsasamaṃ katthaci alaggabhāvena ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6078_1: suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ, tasmā mā pāpacitte āsādīti kāmesu nimuggatāya lāmakacitte nihīnacitte
atk-s0508a2:6078_2: mādise mā āsādehi. Aggikhandhaṃva pakkhimāti pakkhimā salabho aggikkhandhaṃ āsādento
atk-s0508a2:6078_3: anatthameva pāpuṇāti, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ tuyhanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:6079: Passa cittakatantiādikā satta gāthā tameva gaṇikaṃ disvā vipallattacittānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā. Taṃ sutvā sā gaṇikā maṅkubhūtā āgatamaggeneva palātā.
atk-s0508a2:6080: Tadāsītiādikā catasso gāthā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa parinibbānaṃ ārabbha vuttā. Tattha anekākārasampanneti anekehi sīlasaṃvarādippakārehi paripuṇṇe.
atk-s0508a2:6081_0: Sukhumaṃ te paṭivijjhantīti te yogino atisukhumaṃ paṭivijjhanti nāma. Yathā kiṃ?
atk-s0508a2:6081_1: Vālaggaṃ usunā yathā yathā satadhābhinnassa vālassa ekaṃ aṃsu aggaṃ rattandhakāratimisāya
atk-s0508a2:6081_2: vijjullatobhāsena vijjhantā viyāti attho. Ke pana teti āha “ye pañcakkhandhe passanti,
atk-s0508a2:6081_3: parato no ca attato”ti. Tattha paratoti anattato. Tassa attaggāhapaṭikkhepadassanañhetaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6081_4: Tenāha “no ca attato”ti. Etena anattato abhivuṭṭhitassa ariyamaggassa vasena dukkhasacce
atk-s0508a2:6081_5: pariññābhisamayaṃ āha, tadavinābhāvato pana itaresampi abhisamayānaṃ suppaṭivijjhatā
atk-s0508a2:6081_6: vuttā eva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana “anatthakārakato pare nāma pañcupādānakkhandhāti
atk-s0508a2:6081_7: ‘parato passantī’ti iminā visesato sabbopi sammadeva vutto”ti vadanti. Paccabyādhiṃsūti paṭivijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6082: Sattiyā viya omaṭṭhoti paṭhamagāthā tissattheraṃ ārabbha vuttā, dutiyā vaḍḍhamānattheraṃ. Tā heṭṭhā vuttatthāva.
atk-s0508a2:6083: Codito bhāvitattenāti gāthā pāsādakampanasuttantaṃ ārabbha vuttā. Tattha bhāvitattena sarīrantimadhārināti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6084_0: Nayidaṃ sithilamārabbhātiādikā dve gāthā hīnavīriyaṃ vedanāmakaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0508a2:6084_1: vuttā. Tattha sithilamārabbhāti sithilaṃ katvā vīriyaṃ akatvā. Appena thāmasāti appakena
atk-s0508a2:6084_2: vīriyabalena nayidaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantabbaṃ, mahanteneva pana catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyena pattabbanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6085: Vivaramanupabhantītiādikā dve gāthā attano vivekabhāvaṃ ārabbha vuttā. Tattha brahmunā abhivanditoti mahābrahmunā sadevakena lokena ca abhimukhena hutvā thomito namassito ca.
atk-s0508a2:6086_0: Upasantaṃ uparatantiādikā pañca gāthā rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6086_1: disvā “kāḷakaṇṇī mayā diṭṭhā”ti oloketvā ṭhitaṃ sāriputtattherassa bhāgineyyaṃ micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6086_2: disvā tassa anukampāya “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo mā nassī”ti ariyūpavādapaṭighātatthaṃ “theraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6086_3: vandāhī”ti taṃ uyyojentena vuttā. Tattha jātisataṃ gaccheti jātīnaṃ sataṃ upagaccheyya.
atk-s0508a2:6086_4: Sottiyoti sottiyajātiko. Vedasampannoti ñāṇasampanno. Etassāti therassa. Ayañhettha
atk-s0508a2:6086_5: saṅkhepattho – yo puggalo uditoditā asambhinnā satabrāhmaṇajātiyo anupaṭipāṭiyā uppajjanavasena
atk-s0508a2:6086_6: upagaccheyya, tattha ca brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū
atk-s0508a2:6086_7: siyā brāhmaṇavattañca pūrento, tassetaṃ vijjādianuṭṭhānaṃ etassa mahākassapattherassa
atk-s0508a2:6086_8: vandanāya vandanāmayapuññassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghati, vandanāmayapuññameva tato mahantataranti.
atk-s0508a2:6087_0: Aṭṭha vimokkhānīti rūpajjhānādike aṭṭha vimokkhe. Bhāvanāvasena hi laddhāni rūpajjhānāni
atk-s0508a2:6087_1: paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttataṃ abhirativasena ārammaṇe nirāsaṅgañca pavattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6087_2: upādāya “vimokkhānī”ti vuccanti. Nirodhasamāpatti pana paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā
atk-s0508a2:6087_3: eva. Idha pana jhānameva veditabbaṃ. Anulomaṃ paṭilomanti paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a2:6087_4: yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā anulomaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā
atk-s0508a2:6087_5: paṭilomaṃ. Purebhattanti bhattakiccato pureyeva. Aphassayīti anekākāravokārā samāpattiyo
atk-s0508a2:6087_6: samāpajji. Tato piṇḍāya gacchatīti tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya, tato vā samāpattisamāpajjitato
atk-s0508a2:6087_7: pacchā idāni piṇḍāya gacchatīti tadahu pavattaṃ therassa paṭipattiṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6087_8: Thero pana divase divase tatheva paṭipajjati.
atk-s0508a2:6088_0: Tādisaṃ bhikkhuṃ māsādīti yādisassa guṇā ekadesena vuttā, tādisaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhānubuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6088_1: mahākhīṇāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ mā āsādehi. Māttānaṃ khaṇi brāhmaṇāti āsādanena ca, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0508a2:6088_2: mā attānaṃ khaṇi, ariyūpavādena attano kusaladhammaṃ vā ummulehi. Abhippasādehi mananti
atk-s0508a2:6088_3: “sādhurūpo vata ayaṃ samaṇo”ti attano cittaṃ pasādehi. Mā te vijaṭi matthakanti tava
atk-s0508a2:6088_4: matthakaṃ tasmiṃ katena aparādhena sattadhā mā phali. Tasmā tassa paṭikāratthaṃ khippameva
atk-s0508a2:6088_5: pañjaliko vandāti. Brāhmaṇo taṃ sutvā bhīto saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto tāvadeva theraṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:6089_0: Neso passatītiādikā dve gāthā poṭṭhilaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ sammā apaṭipajjantaṃ micchājīvakataṃ
atk-s0508a2:6089_1: disvā codanāvasena vuttā. Tattha neso passati saddhammanti eso poṭṭhilo bhikkhu sataṃ
atk-s0508a2:6089_2: buddhādīnaṃ dhammaṃ maggaphalanibbānaṃ na passati. Kasmā? Saṃsārena purakkhato saṃsārabandhanaavijjādinā
atk-s0508a2:6089_3: purakkhato apāyesu nibbattanato adhogamaṃ heṭṭhāgāmiṃ māyāsāṭheyyānugatattā jimhapathaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6090_0: Kimīva mīḷhasallittoti gūthakimī viya mīḷhena samantato litto kilesāsucivimissite
atk-s0508a2:6090_1: saṅkhāre adhimucchito ajjhāpanno. Pagāḷho lābhasakkāreti lābhe ca sakkāre ca taṇhāvasena
atk-s0508a2:6090_2: pakārato gāḷho ogāḷho. Tuccho gacchati poṭṭhiloti adhisīlasikkhābhāvato tuccho asāro
atk-s0508a2:6091_0: Imañca passātiādikā dve gāthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ pasaṃsantena vuttā. Tattha imañca
atk-s0508a2:6091_1: passāti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano cittaṃ ālapati. Sudassananti
atk-s0508a2:6091_2: asekkhānaṃ sīlakkhandhānañceva pāripūriyā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca pāripūriyā sundaradassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6091_3: Vimuttaṃ ubhatobhāgeti ubhatobhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ ubhatobhāgeti
atk-s0508a2:6091_4: arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato, maggena nāmakāyato, yathārahaṃ tehiyeva vikkhambhanasamucchedabhāgehi
atk-s0508a2:6091_5: vimuttanti attho. Sabbaso rāgasallādīnaṃ abhāvena visallaṃ kāmādiyogānaṃ sammadeva
atk-s0508a2:6091_6: khīṇattā khīṇasaṃyogaṃ suparisuddhassa vijjāttayassa adhigatattā tevijjaṃ maccurājassa
atk-s0508a2:6092_0: Ete sambahulātiādikā gāthā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena mahāmoggallānattheraṃ pasaṃsantena
atk-s0508a2:6092_1: vuttā. Tattha pūjito naradevenāti narehi ca devehi ca paramāya pūjāya pūjito. Uppanno
atk-s0508a2:6092_2: maraṇābhibhūti loke uppanno hutvā maraṇaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Atha vā pūjito naradevena
atk-s0508a2:6092_3: sammāsambuddhena kāraṇabhūtena ariyāya jātiyā uppanno. Sammāsambuddho hi paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6092_4: kammunā naro manusso hutvā pacchāpi ariyāya jātiyā uttamo devo devātidevo ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:6092_5: tasmā “naradevo”ti vuccati. Pūjito naradevena bhagavatā pasaṃsāvasena uppanno maraṇābhibhūte
atk-s0508a2:6092_6: loke uppanno hutvā maraṇābhibhū maccuhāyī. Puṇḍarīkaṃva toyena udakena puṇḍarīkaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6092_7: viya saṅkhāragate taṇhādiṭṭhilepena na upalimpati, katthacipi anissitoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6093_0: Yassāti yena. Muhutteti khaṇamatte kāle. Sahassadhāti sahassapakāro. Lokoti okāsaloko.
atk-s0508a2:6093_1: Ayañhettha attho – yena mahiddhikena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena sahassilokadhātu khaṇeneva
atk-s0508a2:6093_2: sammadeva vidito, paccakkhato ñāto sabrahmakappo mahābrahmasadiso āvajjanādivasībhāvappattiyā
atk-s0508a2:6093_3: iddhisampadāya cutūpapāte ca vasī. Kāle passatīti tadanurūpe kāle dibbena cakkhunā devatā passatīti.
atk-s0508a2:6094_0: Sāriputtovātiādikā gāthā āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena attano guṇe pakāsentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6094_1: Tattha sāriputtovāti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – paññāya paññāsampadāya, sīlena sīlasampattiyā,
atk-s0508a2:6094_2: upasamena kilesavūpasamena, yo bhikkhu pāraṅgato pāraṃ pariyantaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ gato so
atk-s0508a2:6094_3: sāriputto sāvakehi paññādīhi guṇehi paramukkaṃsagato. Paññāya sīlena hi paramukkaṃsagato.
atk-s0508a2:6094_4: Etāvaparamo siyā etaparamo eva, natthi tato uttarīti. Imaṃ pana thero yathā sāriputto
atk-s0508a2:6094_5: paññāya uttamo, tathā ahaṃ samādhinā uttamoti dīpetuṃ avoca. Tenevāha “koṭisatasahassassā”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:6095_0: Tattha khaṇena nimmineti khaṇeneva koṭisatasahassaattabhāvaṃ nimmineyya nimmituṃ
atk-s0508a2:6095_1: samattho. Tassa nimminane na mayhaṃ bhāro atthi. Vikubbanāsu kusalo, vasībhūtomhi
atk-s0508a2:6095_2: iddhiyāti na kevalaṃ manomayavikubbanāsu eva, sabbāyapi iddhiyā vasībhāvappatto amhi.
atk-s0508a2:6096_1: ca vasībhāvena pāramiṃ koṭiṃ patto asi. Tassa taṇhānissayādirahitassa satthu sāsane
atk-s0508a2:6096_2: yathāvuttehi guṇehi ukkaṃsagato. Dhitisampannatāya dhīro, moggallānagotto moggallāno,
atk-s0508a2:6096_3: suṭṭhu ṭhapitaindriyatāya samāhitindriyo, yathā hatthināgo pūtilatābandhanaṃ sukheneva
atk-s0508a2:6096_4: chindati, evaṃ sakalaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ samucchindi evāti.
atk-s0508a2:6097_0: Kīdiso nirayo āsītiādayo gāthā koṭṭhaṃ anupavisitvā nikkhamitvā ṭhitamāraṃ tajjentena
atk-s0508a2:6097_1: therena vuttā. Tattha kīdisoti kiṃpakāro. Yattha dussīti yasmiṃ niraye “dussī”ti
atk-s0508a2:6097_2: evaṃnāmo māro. Apaccathāti nirayagginā apacci. Vidhuraṃ sāvakanti vidhuraṃ nāma kakusandhassa
atk-s0508a2:6097_3: bhagavato aggasāvakaṃ. Āsajjāti ghaṭṭayitvā bādhitvā. Kakusandhañca brāhmaṇanti kakusandhañca
atk-s0508a2:6097_4: sammāsambuddhaṃ āsajjāti attho. Bhagavantaṃ uddissa kumāraṃ āvisitvā mārena khittā
atk-s0508a2:6098_0: Sataṃ āsi ayosaṅkūti tasmiṃ kira niraye upapannānaṃ tigāvuto attabhāvo hoti, dussīmārassāpi
atk-s0508a2:6098_1: tādisova ahosi. Atha nirayapālā tālakkhandhappamāṇānaṃ ayosūlānaṃ ādittānaṃ sampajjalitānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6098_2: sajotibhūtānaṃ satameva gahetvā “imasmiṃva te ṭhāne ṭhitena hadayena cintetvā pāpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6098_3: kata”nti sudhādoṇiyaṃ sudhaṃ koṭṭentā viya hadayamajjhaṃ koṭṭetvā paṇṇāsa janā pādābhimukhā,
atk-s0508a2:6098_4: paṇṇāsa janā sīsābhimukhā koṭṭentā gacchanti, evaṃ gacchantā ca pañcahi vassasatehi
atk-s0508a2:6098_5: ubho ante patvā puna nivattamānā pañcahi vassasatehi hadayamajjhaṃ upagacchanti,
atk-s0508a2:6098_6: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sataṃ āsi ayosaṅkū”ti. Sabbe paccattavedanāti sayameva pāṭiyekkavedanājanakā.
atk-s0508a2:6098_7: Sā kira vedanā mahānirayavedanāto dukkhatarā hoti, yathā hi sinehapānasattāhato parihārasattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6098_8: dukkhataraṃ, evaṃ mahānirayadukkhato ussade vuṭṭhānavedanā dukkhatarā. Īdiso nirayo
atk-s0508a2:6098_9: āsīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne devadūtasuttena nirayo dīpetabbo.
atk-s0508a2:6099_0: Yo etamabhijānātīti yo mahābhiñño etaṃ kammaphalañca hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya
atk-s0508a2:6099_1: abhimukhaṃ katvā paccakkhato jānāti. Bhikkhu buddhassa sāvakoti bhinnakileso bhikkhu
atk-s0508a2:6099_2: sammāsambuddhassa sāvako. Kaṇha, dukkhaṃ nigacchasīti ekantakāḷakehi pāpadhammehi
atk-s0508a2:6100_0: Majjhesarasminti mahāsamuddassa majjhe kira udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā nibbattavimānāni
atk-s0508a2:6100_1: kappaṭṭhitikāni honti. Tenāha “vimānā kappaṭhāyino”ti. Tesaṃ veḷuriyassa viya vaṇṇo
atk-s0508a2:6100_2: hoti, pabbatamatthake jalitanaḷaggikhandho viya ca etesaṃ acciyo jotanti, tena te
atk-s0508a2:6100_3: ativiya pabhassarā pabhāsampannā honti. Tenāha “veḷuriyavaṇṇā rucirā, accimanto pabhassarā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6100_4: Puthu nānattavaṇṇiyoti nīlādivasena nānattavaṇṇā bahū accharā tattha tesu vimānesu naccanti.
atk-s0508a2:6101: Yo etamabhijānātīti yo etaṃ vimānaṃ vatthuṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā jānāti. Ayañhi attho vimānapetavatthūhi dīpetabbo.
atk-s0508a2:6102_0: Buddhena coditoti sammāsambuddhena codito uyyojito. Bhikkhusaṅghassa pekkhatoti mahato
atk-s0508a2:6102_1: bhikkhusaṅghassa passantassa. Migāramātupāsādaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti pubbārāme
atk-s0508a2:6102_2: visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ attano pādaṅguṭṭhena
atk-s0508a2:6102_3: kampesiṃ. Ekasmiñhi samaye pubbārāme yathāvuttapāsāde bhagavati viharante sambahulā
atk-s0508a2:6102_4: navakatarā bhikkhū uparipāsāde nisinnā satthārampi acintetvā tiracchānakathaṃ kathetumāraddhā,
atk-s0508a2:6102_5: taṃ sutvā bhagavā te saṃvejetvā attano dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte kātukāmo āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6102_6: mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āmantesi – “passasi tvaṃ, moggallāna, nave bhikkhū tiracchānakathamanuyutte”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6102_7: Taṃ sutvā thero satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ āpokasiṇārammaṇaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6102_8: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “pāsādassa patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya pāsādamatthake
atk-s0508a2:6102_9: thūpikaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena pahari, pāsādo onamitvā ekena passena aṭṭhāsi. Punapi pahari,
atk-s0508a2:6102_10: aparena passena aṭṭhāsi. Te bhikkhū bhītā saṃviggā pāsādassa patanabhayena tato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0508a2:6102_11: bhagavato samīpe aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ deseti. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0508a2:6102_12: tesu keci sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, keci sakadāgāmiphale, keci anāgāmiphale,
atk-s0508a2:6102_13: keci arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Svāyamattho pāsādakampanasuttena dīpetabbo.
atk-s0508a2:6103_0: Vejayantapāsādanti so vejayantapāsādo tāvatiṃsabhavane yojanasahassubbedho anekasahassaniyyūhakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0508a2:6103_1: devāsurasaṅgāme asure jinitvā sakke devānaminde nagaramajjhe ṭhite uṭṭhito vijayantena
atk-s0508a2:6103_3: Tampi hi ayaṃ thero pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi. Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavantaṃ pubbārāme
atk-s0508a2:6103_4: viharantaṃ sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ pucchi. Tassa bhagavā
atk-s0508a2:6103_5: vissajjeti. So taṃ sutvā attamano pamudito abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā attano devalokameva
atk-s0508a2:6103_6: gato. Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṃ cintesi – “ayaṃ sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:6103_7: evarūpaṃ gambhīraṃ nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavatā ca pañho vissajjito,
atk-s0508a2:6103_8: kinnu kho jānitvā gato, udāhu ajānitvā? Yaṃnūnāhaṃ devalokaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ jāneyya”nti.
atk-s0508a2:6103_9: So tāvadeva tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ tamatthaṃ pucchi. Sakko
atk-s0508a2:6103_10: dibbasampattiyā pamatto hutvā vikkhepaṃ akāsi. Thero tassa saṃvegajananatthaṃ vejayantapāsādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6106: Ayaṃ panattho cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena dīpetabbo. Kampitākāro heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0508a2:6107_0: Sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti yathāvuttameva therassa taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttipucchaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0508a2:6107_1: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “api, āvuso, jānāsi, taṇhakkhayavimuttiyo”ti. Tassa sakko viyākāsīti
atk-s0508a2:6107_2: idaṃ therena pāsādakampane kate saṃviggahadayena pamādaṃ pahāya yoniso manasi karitvā
atk-s0508a2:6107_3: pañhassa byākatabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Satthārā desitaniyāmeneva hi so tadā kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:6107_4: Tenāha “pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātatha”nti. Tattha sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti sakkaṃ devarājaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6107_5: so moggallānatthero satthārā desitāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyā sammadeva gahitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6107_6: pucchi. Atītatthe hi idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ. Api, āvuso, jānāsīti, āvuso, api jānāsi,
atk-s0508a2:6107_7: kiṃ jānāsi? Taṇhakkhayavimuttiyoti yathā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyo satthārā tuyhaṃ desitā,
atk-s0508a2:6107_8: tathā kiṃ jānāsīti pucchi. Taṇhakkhayavimuttiyoti vā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttassa desanaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0508a2:6108_0: Brahmānanti mahābrahmānaṃ. Sudhammāyaṃ ṭhito sabhanti sudhammāya sabhāya. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0508a2:6108_1: brahmaloke sudhammasabhāva, na tāvatiṃsabhavane, sudhammasabhāvirahito devaloko nāma
atk-s0508a2:6108_2: natthi. Ajjāpi tyāvuso, sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahūti imaṃ brahmalokaṃ upagantuṃ
atk-s0508a2:6108_3: samattho natthi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, satthu idhāgamanato pubbe yā tuyhaṃ diṭṭhi
atk-s0508a2:6108_4: ahosi, kiṃ ajjāpi idānipi sā diṭṭhi na vigatāti? Passasi vītivattantaṃ, brahmaloke
atk-s0508a2:6108_5: pabhassaranti brahmaloke vītipatantaṃ mahākappinamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi parivāritassa
atk-s0508a2:6108_6: tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa sasāvakassa bhagavato obhāsaṃ passasīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6108_7: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya sabhāya sannipatitvā sannisinnassa
atk-s0508a2:6108_8: – “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko, yo idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti
atk-s0508a2:6108_9: cintentassa brahmuno cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmuno matthake ākāse nisinno tejodhātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:6108_10: samāpajjitvā obhāsaṃ muñcanto mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi. Saha cintanena
atk-s0508a2:6108_11: tepi tattha gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a2:6108_12: paccekadisāsu nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjitvā sakalabrahmaloko ekobhāso ahosi. Satthā
atk-s0508a2:6108_13: brahmuno kallacittataṃ ñatvā catusaccapakāsanaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0508a2:6108_14: anekāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhahiṃsu, taṃ sandhāya codento “ajjāpi
atk-s0508a2:6108_15: tyāvuso, sā diṭṭhī”ti gāthamāha. Ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:6109_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena
atk-s0508a2:6109_1: kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti
atk-s0508a2:6109_2: – ‘natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, yo idha āgaccheyyā’ti. Atha kho bhagavā tassa
atk-s0508a2:6109_3: brahmuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā
atk-s0508a2:6109_4: bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya, evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6109_5: brahmaloke pāturahosi. Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi
atk-s0508a2:6110_0: “Atha kho āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa etadahosi – ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0508a2:6110_1: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0508a2:6110_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0508a2:6110_3: nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya,
atk-s0508a2:6110_4: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi. Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0508a2:6110_5: puratthimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:6111_0: “Atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi – ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0508a2:6111_1: Addasā kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0508a2:6111_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0508a2:6111_3: nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6111_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena
atk-s0508a2:6112_0: “Atha kho āyasmato mahākappinassa etadahosi – ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0508a2:6112_1: Addasā kho āyasmā mahākappino bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0508a2:6112_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0508a2:6112_3: nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6112_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino pacchimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno. Uparivehāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6112_5: pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0508a2:6113_0: “Atha kho āyasmato anuruddhassa etadahosi – ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0508a2:6113_1: Addasā kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
atk-s0508a2:6113_2: tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. Disvāna seyyathāpi
atk-s0508a2:6113_3: nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6113_4: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho uttaraṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena
atk-s0508a2:6113_5: nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato. Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0508a2:6114: “Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0508a2:6116: “Na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0508a2:6118: Svāhaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6119_0: “Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brahmānaṃ saṃvejetvā seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso…pe… evameva
atk-s0508a2:6119_1: tasmiṃ brahmaloke antarahito jetavane pāturahosi. Atha kho so brahmā aññataraṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6119_2: āmantesi – ‘ehi tvaṃ, mārisa, yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:6119_3: āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ evaṃ vadehi ‘atthi nu kho mārisa moggallāna, aññepi tassa
atk-s0508a2:6119_4: bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno, kassapo,
atk-s0508a2:6119_5: kappino, anuruddho”’ti. “Evaṃ, mārisā”ti kho so brahmapārisajjo tassa brahmuno paṭissutvā
atk-s0508a2:6119_6: yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6119_7: etadavoca – “atthi nu kho, mārisa moggallāna, aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā
atk-s0508a2:6119_8: evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno, kassapo, kappino, anuruddho”ti. Atha
atk-s0508a2:6119_9: kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0508a2:6122_0: “Atha kho so brahmapārisajjo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā
atk-s0508a2:6122_1: yena so brahmā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ brahmānaṃ etadavoca – āyasmā, mārisa
atk-s0508a2:6125: “Idamavoca so brahmapārisajjo. Attamano ca so brahmā tassa brahmapārisajjassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6126: Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6127_0: Mahāneruno kūṭanti kūṭasīsena sakalameva sinerupabbatarājaṃ vadati. Vimokkhena aphassayīti
atk-s0508a2:6127_1: jhānavimokkhanissayena abhiññāṇena phassayīti adhippāyo. Vananti jambudīpaṃ. So hi
atk-s0508a2:6127_3: pubbavidehaṭṭhānaṃ, pubbavidehanti attho. Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā nāma
atk-s0508a2:6127_4: aparagoyānakā ca uttarakurukā ca manussā. Te hi gehābhāvato “bhūmisayā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6127_5: Tepi sabbe aphassayīti sambandho. Ayaṃ panattho nandopanandadamanena dīpetabbo –
atk-s0508a2:6128_0: “Ekasmiṃ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ‘sve, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:6128_1: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā’ti nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a2:6128_2: Taṃdivasañca bhagavato paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokentassa nandopanando
atk-s0508a2:6128_3: nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchi. Bhagavā ‘ayaṃ nāgarājā mayhaṃ ñāṇamukhe
atk-s0508a2:6128_4: āpāthaṃ āgacchati, kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī’ti āvajjento saraṇagamanassa upanissayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6128_5: disvā ‘ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasanno, ko nu kho imaṃ micchādiṭṭhito
atk-s0508a2:6129_0: “Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi – ‘ānanda,
atk-s0508a2:6129_1: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ ārocehi tathāgato devacārikaṃ gacchatī’ti. Taṃdivasañca
atk-s0508a2:6129_2: nandopanandassa āpānabhūmiṃ sajjayiṃsu. So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena
atk-s0508a2:6129_3: dhāriyamāno tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto dibbabhājanesu upaṭṭhāpitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6129_4: annapānavidhiṃ olokayamāno nisinno hoti. Atha kho bhagavā yathā nāgarājā passati,
atk-s0508a2:6129_5: tathā katvā tassa vimānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6130_0: “Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ
atk-s0508a2:6130_1: uppannaṃ hoti – ‘ime hi nāma muṇḍakā samaṇakā amhākaṃ uparibhavanena devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6130_2: bhavanaṃ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi, na idāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṃ amhākaṃ matthake
atk-s0508a2:6130_3: pādapaṃsuṃ okirantānaṃ gantuṃ dassāmī’ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṃ gantvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6130_4: vijahitvā sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6131_0: “Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘pubbe, bhante, imasmiṃ padese
atk-s0508a2:6131_1: ṭhito sineruṃ passāmi, sineruparibhaṇḍaṃ passāmi, tāvatiṃsaṃ passāmi, vejayantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6131_2: passāmi, vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ passāmi. Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko
atk-s0508a2:6131_3: paccayo, yaṃ etarahi neva sineruṃ passāmi…pe… na vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6131_4: passāmī’ti? Ayaṃ, raṭṭhapāla, nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṃ kupito sineruṃ
atk-s0508a2:6131_5: sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:6131_6: ṭhitoti. ‘Damemi naṃ, bhante’ti. Na bhagavā naṃ anujāni. Atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo
atk-s0508a2:6131_7: āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṃsu. Na bhagavā anujāni.
atk-s0508a2:6132_0: “Avasāne mahāmoggallānatthero ‘ahaṃ, bhante, damemi na’nti āha. ‘Damehi, moggallānā’ti
atk-s0508a2:6132_1: bhagavā anujāni. Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahantaṃ nāgarājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā
atk-s0508a2:6132_2: nandopanandaṃ cuddasakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇassa matthake attano
atk-s0508a2:6132_3: phaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷesi. Nāgarājā dhūmāyi. Thero ‘na tuyhaṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:6132_4: sarīre dhūmo atthi, mayhampi atthī’ti dhūmāyi. Nāgarājassa dhūmo theraṃ na bādhati.
atk-s0508a2:6132_5: Therassa pana dhūmo nāgarājaṃ bādhati. Tato nāgarājā pajjali. Theropi ‘na tuyhaṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:6132_6: sarīre aggi atthi, mayhampi atthī’ti pajjali. Nāgarājassa tejo theraṃ na bādhati,
atk-s0508a2:6132_7: therassa pana tejo nāgarājaṃ bādhati. Nāgarājā ‘ayaṃ maṃ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā
atk-s0508a2:6132_8: dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cā’ti cintetvā, ‘bho, tuvaṃ kosī’ti paṭipucchi. Ahaṃ kho,
atk-s0508a2:6132_9: nanda, moggallānoti. Bhante, attano bhikkhubhāvena tiṭṭhāhī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6133_0: “Thero taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena
atk-s0508a2:6133_1: nikkhami, vāmakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena nikkhami. Tathā dakkhiṇanāsasotena
atk-s0508a2:6133_2: pavisitvā vāmanāsasotena nikkhami, vāmanāsasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇanāsasotena nikkhami.
atk-s0508a2:6133_3: Tato nāgarājā mukhaṃ vivari. Thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṃ pācīnena ca pacchimena
atk-s0508a2:6133_4: ca caṅkamati. Bhagavā ‘moggallāna, manasi karohi mahiddhiko nāgo’ti āha. Thero ‘mayhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6133_5: kho, bhante, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā
atk-s0508a2:6133_6: susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante, nandopanando, ahaṃ nandopanandasadisānaṃ nāgarājānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6134_0: “Nāgarājā cintesi – ‘pavisanto tāva me na diṭṭho, nikkhamanakāle dāni naṃ dāṭhāntare
atk-s0508a2:6134_1: pakkhipitvā saṅkhādissāmī’ti cintetvā ‘nikkhamatha, bhante, mā maṃ antokucchiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6134_2: aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto bādhayitthā’ti āha. Thero nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. Nāgarājā
atk-s0508a2:6134_3: ‘ayaṃ so’ti disvā nāsavātaṃ vissajji. Thero catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajji, lomakūpampissa
atk-s0508a2:6134_4: vāto cāletuṃ nāsakkhi. ‘Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:6134_5: sakkuṇeyyuṃ, imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ patvā evaṃ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṃ nāsakkhissantī’ti
atk-s0508a2:6135_0: “Nāgarājā ‘ahaṃ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, mahiddhiko
atk-s0508a2:6135_1: so samaṇo’ti cintesi. Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṃ nimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6135_2: dassento nāgarājānaṃ anubandhi, nāgarājā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6135_3: abhinimminitvā, ‘bhante, tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī’ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
atk-s0508a2:6135_4: Thero ‘satthā, nando āgato, ehi tvaṃ, gamissāmā’ti nāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisaṃ katvā,
atk-s0508a2:6135_5: gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. Nāgarājā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ‘bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6135_6: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī’ti āha. Bhagavā ‘sukhī hohi, nāgarājā’ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0508a2:6136_0: “Anāthapiṇḍiko ‘kiṃ, bhante, atidivā āgatatthā’ti āha. Moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa
atk-s0508a2:6136_1: ca saṅgāmo ahosīti. Kassa pana, bhante, jayo, kassa parājayoti? Moggallānassa jayo,
atk-s0508a2:6136_2: nandassa parājayoti. Anāthapiṇḍiko ‘adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a2:6136_3: bhattaṃ, sattāhaṃ therassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī’ti vatvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6136_4: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘nandopanandadamanena dīpetabbo”’ti.
atk-s0508a2:6137: Yo etamabhijānātīti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ vimokkhaṃ phusanakaraṇavasena jānāti.
atk-s0508a2:6138_0: Na ve aggi cetayati, ahaṃ bālaṃ ḍahāmīti evaṃ na aggi abhisaṃceteti, nāpi ḍahanāya
atk-s0508a2:6138_1: payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti, bālo eva pana “ayaṃ mandāgatī”ti anijalantaṃ viya jalitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6138_2: aggiṃ āsajja naṃ paḍayhati, evameva, māra, na mayaṃ ḍahitukāmā, bādhetukāmā, tvaññeva
atk-s0508a2:6138_3: pana tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgataṃ aggikhandhasadisaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ āsajja attānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6139: Apuññaṃ pasavīti apuññaṃ paṭilabhati. Na me pāpaṃ vipaccatīti mama pāpaṃ na vipaccati, kiṃ nu, māra, evaṃ maññasi nayidamatthi.
atk-s0508a2:6140_0: Karoto te cīyate pāpanti ekaṃsena karontassa te pāpaṃ cirarattāya cirakālaṃ anatthāya
atk-s0508a2:6140_1: dukkhāya upacīyati. Māra, nibbinda buddhamhāti catusaccabuddhato buddhasāvakato nibbinda
atk-s0508a2:6140_2: nibbijja parato kammaṃ. Āsaṃ mākāsi bhikkhusūti “bhikkhū virodhemi vihesemī”ti etaṃ āsaṃ mākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6141_0: Itīti evaṃ. Māraṃ atajjesīti, “māra, nibbinda…pe… bhikkhusū”ti āyasmā mahāmoggallāno.
atk-s0508a2:6141_1: Bhesakaḷāvaneti evaṃnāmake araññe. Tatoti tajjanahetu. So dummano yakkhoti so māro
atk-s0508a2:6141_2: domanassiko hutvā tattheva tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne antaradhāyi, adassanaṃ agamāsi. Ayañca
atk-s0508a2:6141_3: gāthā dhammasaṅgāyanakāle ṭhapitā. Yaṃ panettha antarantarā atthato na vibhattaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6142_0: Evamayaṃ mahāthero māraṃ tajjetvā devacārikānarakacārikādivasena aññehi sāvakehi
atk-s0508a2:6142_1: asādhāraṇaṃ sattūpakāraṃ katvā āyupariyosāne parinibbāyi. Parinibbāyanto ca anomadassissa
atk-s0508a2:6142_2: bhagavato pādamūle paṇidhānaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya tattha tattha bhave uḷārāni puññāni
atk-s0508a2:6142_3: katvā sāvakapāramiyā matthake ṭhitopi antarā katassa pāpakammassa vasena uṭṭhitāya
atk-s0508a2:6142_4: kammapilotikāya titthiyehi uyyojitehi corehi bādhito anappakaṃ sarīrakhedaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:6164: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:6181: “Asmimānaṃ na passāmi, māno mayhaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:6190_0: Sattatinipāte nikkhantaṃ vata maṃ santantiādikā āyasmato vaṅgīsattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:6190_1: Kā uppatti? Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto,
atk-s0508a2:6190_2: purimanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6190_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā – “ahampi anāgate paṭibhānavantānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6190_4: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā, satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:6190_5: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vaṅgīsoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a2:6190_6: tayo bede uggaṇhanto ācariyaṃ ārādhetvā, chavasīsamantaṃ nāma sikkhitvā chavasīsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6190_7: nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ satto asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto”ti jānāti.
atk-s0508a2:6191_0: Brāhmaṇā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ jīvitamaggo”ti ñatvā vaṅgīsaṃ gahetvā paṭicchannayāne nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:6191_1: gāmanigamarājadhāniyo vicaranti. Vaṅgīsopi tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:6191_2: nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ satto asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto”ti vatvā mahājanassa kaṅkhacchedanatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6191_3: te te jane āvāhetvā attano attano gatiṃ kathāpeti. Tena tasmiṃ mahājano abhippasīdati.
atk-s0508a2:6191_4: So taṃ nissāya mahājanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhatīti. Brāhmaṇā vaṅgīsamādāya
atk-s0508a2:6191_5: yathāruciṃ vicaritvā puna sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu. Vaṅgīso satthu guṇe sutvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6191_6: upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi. Brāhmaṇā “samaṇo gotamo māyāya taṃ āvaṭṭessatī”ti paṭikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6191_7: Vaṅgīso tesaṃ vacanaṃ anādiyitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:6192_0: Taṃ satthā pucchi – “vaṅgīsa, kiñci sippaṃ jānāsī”ti? “Āma, bho gotama, chavasīsamantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6192_1: nāma jānāmi. Tena tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6192_2: jānāmī”ti. Satthā tassa ekaṃ niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ dassesi, ekaṃ manussesu, ekaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6192_3: devesu, ekaṃ parinibbutassa sīsaṃ dassesi. So paṭhamaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā, “bho gotama,
atk-s0508a2:6192_4: ayaṃ satto niraye nibbatto”ti āha. “Sādhu, vaṅgīsa, suṭṭhu tayā diṭṭhaṃ. Ayaṃ satto
atk-s0508a2:6192_6: nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Parinibbutassa pana sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭento neva antaṃ na
atk-s0508a2:6192_7: koṭiṃ passi. Atha naṃ satthā “na sakkosi vaṅgīsā”ti pucchi. “Upaparikkhāmi tāvā”ti
atk-s0508a2:6192_8: punappunaṃ parivattetvā ākoṭentopi bāhirakamantena khīṇāsavassa gatiṃ kathaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0508a2:6192_9: athassa matthakato sedo mucci. So lajjitvā tuṇhībhūto aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā –
atk-s0508a2:6192_10: “kilamasi, vaṅgīsā”ti āha. “Āma, bho gotama, imassa uppannaṭṭhānaṃ jānituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0508a2:6192_11: sace tumhe jānātha, kathethā”ti. “Vaṅgīsa, ahaṃ etampi jānāmi, ito uttaritarampi jānāmī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0508a2:6194: Asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6197_0: Imā dve gāthā abhāsi. Vaṅgīso “tena hi, bho gotama, taṃ vijjaṃ me dethā”ti apacitiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6197_1: dassetvā satthu santike nisīdi. Satthā “amhehi samānaliṅgassa demā”ti āha. Vaṅgīso
atk-s0508a2:6197_2: “yaṃkiñci katvā mayā imaṃ mantaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti brāhmaṇe āha – “tumhe mayi pabbajante
atk-s0508a2:6197_3: mā cintayittha, ahaṃ mantaṃ uggaṇhitvā sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi, tumhākampi
atk-s0508a2:6197_4: tena bhaddakameva bhavissatī”ti mantatthāya satthusantikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6197_5: yāci. Tadā ca thero nigrodhakappo bhagavato santike ṭhito hoti, taṃ bhagavā āṇāpesi
atk-s0508a2:6197_6: – “nigrodhakappa, imaṃ pabbājehī”ti. So satthu āṇāya taṃ pabbājesi. Athassa satthā
atk-s0508a2:6197_8: ācikkhi. So dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Brāhmaṇā vaṅgīsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6197_9: upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, bho vaṅgīsa, samaṇasma gotamassa santike sippaṃ sikkhita”nti
atk-s0508a2:6197_10: pucchiṃsu. “Kiṃ sippasikkhanena, gacchatha tumhe, na mayhaṃ tumhehi kattabbakicca”nti.
atk-s0508a2:6197_11: Brāhmaṇā “tvampi dāni samaṇassa gotamassa vasaṃ āpanno, māyāya āvaṭṭito, kiṃ mayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6197_12: tava santike karissāmā”ti āgatamaggeneva pakkamiṃsu. Vaṅgīsatthero vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a2:6211: Devā naro vā brahmā vā, paṭivattā na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:6215: Guṇaṃ bahuṃ pakittetvā, etadagge ṭhapesi taṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6225: Namo te sabbalokagga, namo te abhayaṃ kara.
atk-s0508a2:6227: Namo te santisukhada, namo te saraṇaṃ kara.
atk-s0508a2:6233: Yo so buddhaṃ abhojesi, sattāhaṃ sahasāvakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6239: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:6241: Vaṅgīso nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:6242: “Taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6246: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto vippakule ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6251: Vaṅgīso iti me nāmaṃ, abhavī lokasammataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6259: Tadā so paṇḍito vīro, uttariṃ samavoca me.
atk-s0508a2:6265: Mamāha vadataṃ seṭṭho, kacci vaṅgīsa jānāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6276: Takkikā panimā gāthā, ṭhānaso paṭibhanti taṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6278: Tena hi dāni vaṅgīsa, ṭhānaso santhavāhi maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6280: Ṭhānaso me tadā tuṭṭho, jino agge ṭhapesi maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6284: Yathāyaṃ bhikkhu vaṅgīso, evaṃ dhāretha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0508a2:6285: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a2:6290: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6293_0: Arahā pana hutvā thero satthu santikaṃ gacchanto cakkhupathato paṭṭhāya candena,
atk-s0508a2:6293_1: sūriyena, ākāsena, mahāsamuddena, sinerunā pabbatarājena, sīhena migaraññā, hatthināgenāti
atk-s0508a2:6293_2: tena tena saddhiṃ upamento anekehi padasatehi satthāraṃ vaṇṇentova upagacchati. Tena
atk-s0508a2:6293_3: taṃ satthā saṅghamajjhe nisinno paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Atha therena
atk-s0508a2:6293_4: arahattappattito pubbe ca pacchā ca taṃ taṃ cittaṃ āgamma bhāsitā. Theraṃ uddissa
atk-s0508a2:6302: Neva maṃ byādhayissanti, dhamme samhi patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:6305: Nibbānagamanaṃ maggaṃ, tattha me nirato mano.
atk-s0508a2:6308: Tathā maccu karissāmi, na me maggampi dakkhasi.
atk-s0508a2:6311: Vanathaṃ na kareyya kuhiñci, nibbanatho avanatho sa bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:6314: Parijīyati sabbamaniccaṃ, evaṃ samecca caranti mutattā.
atk-s0508a2:6316: “Upadhīsu janā gadhitāse, diṭṭhasute paṭighe ca mute ca;
atk-s0508a2:6317: Ettha vinodaya chandamanejo, yo hettha na limpati muni tamāhu.
atk-s0508a2:6320: Na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñci, no pana duṭṭhullagāhī sa bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:6323: Santaṃ padaṃ ajjhagamā muni, paṭicca parinibbuto kaṅkhati kālaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6329: Socanti janā cirarattaṃ, mānahatā nirayaṃ upapannā.
atk-s0508a2:6331: “Na hi socati bhikkhu kadāci, maggajino sammā paṭipanno;
atk-s0508a2:6334: “Tasmā akhilo idha padhānavā, nīvaraṇāni pahāya visuddho;
atk-s0508a2:6350: Pare ca na vihiṃseyya, sā ve vācā subhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:6353: Yaṃ anādāya pāpāni, paresaṃ bhāsate piyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6355: “Saccaṃ ve amatā vācā, esa dhammo sanantano;
atk-s0508a2:6356: Sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, āhu santo patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:6393: Sāvako te mahāvīra, pāde vandati vaṅgiso.
atk-s0508a2:6396: Taṃ passatha bandhapamuñca karaṃ, asitaṃva bhāgaso pavibhajja.
atk-s0508a2:6399: Tasmiñca amate akkhāte, dhammadasā ṭhitā asaṃhīrā.
atk-s0508a2:6402: Ñatvā ca sacchikatvā ca, aggaṃ so desayi dasaddhānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6404: “Evaṃ sudesite dhamme, ko pamādo vijānataṃ dhammaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6405: Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsane, appamatto sadā namassamanusikkhe.
atk-s0508a2:6425: “Cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabhe, virocati vītamalova bhāṇumā;
atk-s0508a2:6426: Evampi aṅgīrasa tvaṃ mahāmuni, atirocasi yasasā sabbalokaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6428: “Kāveyyamattā vicarimha pubbe, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6432: Dhammaṃ sutvā pasīdimha, saddhā no udapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:6449: “Evamete tathā vuttā, diṭṭhā me te yathā tathā;
atk-s0508a2:6450: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6452: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a2:6458: “Pucchāmi satthāramanomapaññaṃ, diṭṭheva dhamme yo vicikicchānaṃ chettā;
atk-s0508a2:6459: Aggāḷave kālamakāsi bhikkhu, ñāto yasassī abhinibbutatto.
atk-s0508a2:6461: “Nigrodhakappo iti tassa nāmaṃ, tayā kataṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa;
atk-s0508a2:6462: So taṃ namassaṃ acari mutyapekho, āraddhavīriyo daḷhadhammadassī.
atk-s0508a2:6464: “Taṃ sāvakaṃ sakka mayampi sabbe, aññātumicchāma samantacakkhu;
atk-s0508a2:6465: Samavaṭṭhitā no savanāya sotā, tuvaṃ no satthā tvamanuttarosi.
atk-s0508a2:6467: “Chinda no vicikicchaṃ brūhi metaṃ, parinibbutaṃ vedaya bhūripañña;
atk-s0508a2:6468: Majjheva no bhāsa samantacakkhu, sakkova devāna sahassanetto.
atk-s0508a2:6470: “Ye keci ganthā idha mohamaggā, aññāṇapakkhā vicikicchaṭhānā;
atk-s0508a2:6471: Tathāgataṃ patvā na te bhavanti, cakkhuñhi etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6473: “No ce hi jātu puriso kilese, vāto yathā abbhaghanaṃ vihāne;
atk-s0508a2:6474: Tamovassa nivuto sabbaloko, jotimantopi na pabhāseyyuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6476: “Dhīrā ca pajjotakarā bhavanti, taṃ taṃ ahaṃ vīra tatheva maññe;
atk-s0508a2:6477: Vipassinaṃ jānamupāgamimha, parisāsu no āvikarohi kappaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6479: “Khippaṃ giraṃ eraya vaggu vagguṃ, haṃsova paggayha saṇikaṃ nikūja;
atk-s0508a2:6480: Bindussarena suvikappitena, sabbeva te ujjugatā suṇoma.
atk-s0508a2:6483: Na kāmakāro hi puthujjanānaṃ, saṅkheyyakāro ca tathāgatānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6486: Ayamañjali pacchimo suppaṇāmito, mā mohayī jānamanomapañña.
atk-s0508a2:6489: Vāriṃ yathā ghammani ghammatatto, vācābhikaṅkhāmi sutaṃ pavassa.
atk-s0508a2:6492: Nibbāyi so ādu saupādiseso, yathā vimutto ahu taṃ suṇoma.
atk-s0508a2:6496: Atāri jātiṃ maraṇaṃ asesaṃ, iccabravi bhagavā pañcaseṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:6499: Amoghaṃ kira me puṭṭhaṃ, na maṃ vañcesi brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0508a2:6501: “Yathā vādī tathā kārī, ahu buddhassa sāvako;
atk-s0508a2:6502: Acchecchi maccuno jālaṃ, tataṃ māyāvino daḷhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6509_0: Imā gāthā saṅgītikāle ekajjhaṃ katvā saṅgahaṃ āropitā. Tattha “nikkhantaṃ vata maṃ
atk-s0508a2:6509_1: santa”ntiādayo pañca gāthā āyasmā vaṅgīso navo acirapabbajito hutvā vihāraṃ upagatā
atk-s0508a2:6509_2: alaṅkatapaṭiyattā sambahulā itthiyo disvā uppannarāgo taṃ vinodento abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6510_0: Tattha nikkhantaṃ vata maṃ santaṃ, agārasmānagāriyanti agārato nikkhantaṃ anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6510_1: pabbajitaṃ maṃ samānaṃ. Vitakkāti kāmavitakkādayo pāpavitakkā. Upadhāvantīti mama
atk-s0508a2:6510_2: cittaṃ upagacchanti. Pagabbhāti pāgabbhiyayuttā vasino. “Ayaṃ gehato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0508a2:6510_3: pabbajito, nayimaṃ anuddhaṃsituṃ yutta”nti evaṃ aparihārato nillajjā. Kaṇhatoti kāḷato,
