atk-s0508a2:6510_4: lāmakabhāvatoti attho. Imeti tesaṃ attano paccakkhatā vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6511_0: Asuddhajīvino parivārayuttā manussā uggakiccatāya “uggā”ti vuccanti, tesaṃ puttā
atk-s0508a2:6511_1: uggaputtā. Mahissāsāti mahāissāsā. Sikkhitāti dvādasa vassāni ācariyakule uggahitasippā.
atk-s0508a2:6511_2: Daḷhadhamminoti, daḷhadhanuno. Daḷhadhanu nāma dvisahassathāmaṃ vuccati. Dvisahassathāmanti,
atk-s0508a2:6511_3: ca yassa āropitassa jiyāya bandho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā yāva kaṇḍapamāṇā
atk-s0508a2:6511_4: nabhaṃ ukkhittassa pathavito muccati. Samantā parikireyyunti samantato kaṇḍe khipeyyuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6511_5: Kittakāti ce āha “sahassaṃ apalāyina”nti. Yuddhe aparaṃ mukhānaṃ sahassamattānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6511_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sikkhitā katahatthā uggā daḷhadhanuno mahissāsā uggaputtā sahassamattā
atk-s0508a2:6511_7: kadācipi yuddhe parājayaṃ apattā appamattā samantato ṭhatvā thambhaṃ upanissāya sacepi
atk-s0508a2:6511_8: vasseyyuṃ. Tādisehipi issāsasahassehi samantā sare parikirīyante susikkhito puriso
atk-s0508a2:6511_9: daṇḍaṃ gahetvā sabbe sare attano sarīre apatamāne katvā pādamūle pāteyya. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:6511_10: ekopi issāso dve sare ekato khipanto nāma natthi. Itthiyo pana rūpārammaṇādivasena
atk-s0508a2:6511_11: pañca pañca sare ekato khipanti, evaṃ khipantiyo. Ettakā bhiyyoti imāhi itthīhi bhiyyopi
atk-s0508a2:6512_0: Sakkhī hi me sutaṃ etanti sammukhā mayā etaṃ sutaṃ. Nibbānagamanaṃ magganti liṅgavipallāsena
atk-s0508a2:6512_1: vuttaṃ, nibbānagāmimaggoti attho, vipassanaṃ sandhāyāha. Tattha me nirato manoti
atk-s0508a2:6513_0: Evañce maṃ viharantanti evaṃ aniccaasubhajjhānabhāvanāya ca vipassanābhāvanāya ca
atk-s0508a2:6513_1: viharantaṃ maṃ. Pāpimāti kilesamāraṃ ālapati. Tathā maccu karissāmi, na me maggampi
atk-s0508a2:6513_2: dakkhasīti mayā kataṃ maggampi yathā na passasi, tathā maccu antaṃ karissāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:6514_0: Aratiñcātiādikā pañca gāthā attano santāne uppanne aratiādike vinodentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6514_1: Tattha aratinti adhikusalesu dhammesu pantasenāsanesu ca ukkaṇṭhanaṃ. Ratinti pañcakāmaguṇaratiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6514_2: Pahāyāti pajahitvā. Sabbaso gehasitañca vitakkanti, gehanissitaṃ puttadārādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6514_3: ñātivitakkādiñca micchāvitakkaṃ anavasesato pahāya. Vanathaṃ na kareyya kuhiñcīti
atk-s0508a2:6514_4: ajjhattikabāhirappabhede sabbasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ taṇhaṃ na kareyyaṃ. Nibbanatho avanatho
atk-s0508a2:6514_5: sa bhikkhūti yo hi sabbena sabbaṃ nittaṇho, tato eva katthacipi nandiyā abhāvato
atk-s0508a2:6514_6: avanatho, so bhikkhu nāma saṃsāre bhayassa sammadeva ikkhaṇatāya bhinnakilesatāya cāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6515_0: Yamidha pathaviñca vehāsaṃ, rūpagataṃ jagatogadhaṃ kiñcīti yaṃkiñci idha pathavīgataṃ
atk-s0508a2:6515_1: bhūminissitaṃ vehāsaṃ vehāsaṭṭhaṃ devalokanissitaṃ rūpagataṃ rūpajātaṃ ruppanasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6515_2: jagatogadhaṃ lokikaṃ bhavattayapariyāpannaṃ saṅkhataṃ. Parijīyati sabbamaniccanti
atk-s0508a2:6515_3: sabbaṃ taṃ jarābhibhūtaṃ, tato eva aniccaṃ tato eva dukkhaṃ anattāti evaṃ tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6515_4: āha. Ayaṃ therassa mahāvipassanāti vadanti. Evaṃ samecca caranti mutattāti evaṃ samecca
atk-s0508a2:6515_5: abhisamecca vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya paṭivijjhitvā mutattā pariññātattabhāvā
atk-s0508a2:6516_0: Upadhīsūti khandhūpadhiādīsu. Janāti andhaputhujjanā. Gadhitāseti paṭibaddhacittā.
atk-s0508a2:6516_1: Ettha hi visesato kāmaguṇūpadhīsu chando apanetabboti dassento āha diṭṭhasute paṭighe
atk-s0508a2:6516_2: ca mute cāti. Diṭṭhasuteti diṭṭhe ceva sute ca, rūpasaddesūti attho. Paṭigheti ghaṭṭanīye
atk-s0508a2:6516_3: phoṭṭhabbe. Muteti vuttāvasese mute, gandharasesūti vuttaṃ hoti. Sāratthapakāsaniyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6516_4: “paṭighapadena gandharasā gahitā, mutapadena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ettha
atk-s0508a2:6516_5: vinodaya chandamanejoti etasmiṃ diṭṭhādibhede pañcakāmaguṇe kāmacchandaṃ vinodehi,
atk-s0508a2:6516_6: tathā sati sabbattha anejo avikappo bhavasi. Yo hettha na limpati muni tamāhūti yo
atk-s0508a2:6516_7: hi ettha kāmaguṇe taṇhālepena na limpati, taṃ moneyyadhammaṭṭhato “munī”ti paṇḍitā
atk-s0508a2:6516_9: atthaṃ vadanti. “Aṭṭhasaṭṭhisitā savitakkā”ti pana pāḷi, appakañhi ūnaṃ adhikaṃ vā
atk-s0508a2:6516_10: na gaṇanūpagaṃ hotīti. Aṭṭhasaṭṭhisitāti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatasannissitā micchāvitakkāti
atk-s0508a2:6516_11: atthoti keci vadanti. Diṭṭhigatikā ca sattāvāsābhāvaladdhiṃ ajjhūpagatāti adhiccasamuppannavādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6516_12: ṭhapetvā itaresaṃ vasena “atha saṭṭhisitā savitakkā”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā hi taṇhālepābhāvena
atk-s0508a2:6516_13: bhikkhūti vuccati, evaṃ diṭṭhilepābhāvenapīti dassetuṃ “atha saṭṭhisitā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6516_14: Puthujjanatāya adhammā niviṭṭhāti te pana micchāvitakkā niccādigāhavasena adhammā
atk-s0508a2:6516_15: dhammato apetā puthujjanatāyaṃ andhabāle niviṭṭhā abhiniviṭṭhā. Na ca vaggagatassa
atk-s0508a2:6516_16: kuhiñcīti yattha katthaci vatthusmiṃ sassatavādādimicchādiṭṭhivaggagato, taṃladdhiko
atk-s0508a2:6516_17: na ca assa bhaveyya. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “atha saṭṭhisitā savitakkā, puthū janatāya
atk-s0508a2:6516_18: adhammā niviṭṭhā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā atha cha ārammaṇanissitā puthū adhammavitakkā
atk-s0508a2:6516_19: janatāya niviṭṭhāti vuttaṃ. Tathā na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñcīti tesaṃ vasena na katthaci
atk-s0508a2:6516_20: kilesavaggagato bhaveyyāti ca vuttaṃ. No pana duṭṭhullagāhī sa bhikkhūti yo kilesehi
atk-s0508a2:6516_21: dūsitattā ativiya duṭṭhullatā ca duṭṭhullānaṃ micchāvādānaṃ gaṇhanasīlo ca no assa
atk-s0508a2:6516_22: no bhaveyya, so bhikkhu nāma hotīti.
atk-s0508a2:6517_0: Dabboti dabbajātiko paṇḍito. Cirarattasamāhitoti cirakālato paṭṭhāya samāhito. Akuhakoti
atk-s0508a2:6517_1: kohaññarahito asaṭho amāyāvī. Nipakoti nipuṇo cheko. Apihālūti nittaṇho. Santaṃ padaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6517_2: ajjhagamāti, nibbānaṃ adhigato. Moneyyadhammasamannāgatato muni. Parinibbutoti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
atk-s0508a2:6517_3: nibbānaṃ paṭicca saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto. Kaṅkhati kālanti idāni
atk-s0508a2:6517_4: anupādisesanibbānatthāya kālaṃ āgameti. Na tassa kiñci karaṇīyaṃ atthi, yathā ediso
atk-s0508a2:6518_0: Mānaṃ pajahassūtiādayo catasso gāthā paṭibhānasampattiṃ nissāya attano pavattamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6518_1: mānaṃ vinodentena vuttā. Tattha mānaṃ pajahassūti seyyamānādinavavidhaṃ mānaṃ pariccaja.
atk-s0508a2:6518_2: Gotamāti gotamagottassa bhagavato sāvakattā attānaṃ gotamagottaṃ katvā ālapati. Mānapathanti
atk-s0508a2:6518_4: jahassu pajaha. Asesanti sabbameva. Mānapathamhi sa mucchitoti mānavatthunimittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6518_5: mucchaṃ āpanno. Vippaṭisārīhuvā cirarattanti imasmiṃ mānapathānuyogakkhaṇe vītivatte
atk-s0508a2:6518_6: pubbeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissa, “naṭṭhohamasmī”ti vippaṭisārī ahuvā ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6519_0: Makkhena makkhitā pajāti sūrādinā attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā pare vambhetvā paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0508a2:6519_1: makkhena pisitattā makkhī. Puggalo hi yathā yathā paresaṃ guṇe makkheti, tathā tathā
atk-s0508a2:6519_2: attano guṇe puñjati nirākaroti nāma. Mānahatāti mānena hataguṇā. Nirayaṃ papatantīti
atk-s0508a2:6520_0: Maggajinoti maggena vijitakileso. Kittiñca sukhañcāti viññūhi pasaṃsitañca kāyikacetasikasukhañca
atk-s0508a2:6520_1: anubhotīti paṭilabhati. Dhammadasoti tamāhu tathattanti taṃ tathabhāvaṃ sammāpaṭipannaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6521_1: nīvaraṇasaṅkhātavalāhakāpagamena visuddhamānaso. Asesanti navavidhampi mānaṃ aggamaggena
atk-s0508a2:6521_2: pajahitvā. Vijjāyantakaro samitāvīti sabbaso samitakileso tividhāya vijjāya pariyosānappatto
atk-s0508a2:6522_0: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā ānando aññatarena rājamahāmattena nimantito pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6522_1: tassa gehaṃ gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi āyasmatā vaṅgīsena pacchāsamaṇena. Atha
atk-s0508a2:6522_2: tasmiṃ gehe itthiyo sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, vanditvā pañhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6522_3: pucchanti, dhammaṃ suṇanti. Athāyasmato vaṅgīsassa navapabbajitassa ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:6522_4: asakkontassa visabhāgārammaṇe rāgo uppajji. So saddho ujujātiko kulaputto “ayaṃ me
atk-s0508a2:6522_5: rāgo vaḍḍhitvā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikampi atthaṃ nāseyyā”ti cintetvā yathānisinnova
atk-s0508a2:6522_6: therassa attano pavattiṃ āvikaronto “kāmarāgenā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha yadipi kilesarajjanapariḷāho
atk-s0508a2:6522_7: kāyampi bādhati, cittaṃ pana bādhento cirataraṃ bādhetīti dassetuṃ “kāmarāgena ḍayhāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:6522_8: vatvā “cittaṃ me pariḍayhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbāpananti rāganibbāpanakāraṇaṃ rāgapariḷāhassa
atk-s0508a2:6523_0: Saññāya vipariyesātiādikā gāthā tena yācitena āyasmatā ānandena vuttā. Vipariyesāti
atk-s0508a2:6523_1: vipallāsena asubhe subhanti pavattena viparītaggāhena. Nimittanti kilesajanakanimittaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6523_2: Parivajjehīti paribbaja. Subhaṃ rāgūpasaṃhitanti rāgavaḍḍhanārammaṇaṃ subhaṃ parivajjento
atk-s0508a2:6523_3: asubhasaññāya parivajjeyya, sabbattha anabhiratisaññāya. Tasmā tadubhayampi dassento
atk-s0508a2:6524_0: Tattha asubhāyāti asubhānupassanāya. Cittaṃ bhāvehi ekaggaṃ susamāhitanti attano
atk-s0508a2:6524_1: cittavikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ ārammaṇesu susamāhitaṃ appitaṃ katvā bhāvehi tava asubhānupassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6524_2: sukaraṃ akkhāmīti. Sati kāyagatā tyatthūti vuttakāyagatāsatibhāvanā tayā bhāvitā
atk-s0508a2:6524_3: bahulīkatā hotūti attho. Nibbidābahulo bhavāti attabhāve sabbasmiñca nibbedabahulo hohi.
atk-s0508a2:6525_0: Animittañca bhāvehīti niccanimittādīnaṃ ugghāṭanena visesato aniccānupassanā animittā
atk-s0508a2:6525_1: nāma, tato mānānusayamujjahāti taṃ bhāvento maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggādhigamena mānānusayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6525_2: samucchinda. Mānābhisamayāti mānassa dassanābhisamayā ceva pahānābhisamayā ca. Upasantoti
atk-s0508a2:6525_3: sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ santatāya upasanto carissasi viharissasīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6526_0: Tameva vācantiādikā catasso gāthā bhagavatā subhāsitasutte desite somanassajātena
atk-s0508a2:6526_1: therena bhagavantaṃ sammukhā abhitthavantena vuttā. Yāyattānaṃ na tāpayeti yāya vācāya
atk-s0508a2:6526_2: hetubhūtāya attānaṃ vippaṭisārena na tāpeyya na viheṭheyya. Pare ca na vihiṃseyyāti
atk-s0508a2:6526_3: pare ca parehi bhindanto na bādheyya. Sā ve vācā subhāsitāti sā vācā ekaṃsena subhāsitā
atk-s0508a2:6526_4: nāma, tasmā tameva vācaṃ bhāseyyāti yojanā. Imāya gāthāya apisuṇavācāvasena bhagavantaṃ thometi.
atk-s0508a2:6527_0: Paṭinanditāti paṭimukhabhāvena nanditā piyāyitā sampati āyatiñca suṇantehi sampaṭicchitā.
atk-s0508a2:6527_1: Yaṃ anādāyāti yaṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto pāpāni paresaṃ appiyāni aniṭṭhāni pharusavacanāni
atk-s0508a2:6527_2: anādāya aggahetvā atthabyañjanamadhuraṃ piyameva dīpeti. Tameva piyavācaṃ bhāseyyāti
atk-s0508a2:6528_0: Amatāti sādhubhāvena amatasadisā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “saccaṃ have sādhutaraṃ rasāna”nti.
atk-s0508a2:6528_1: Nibbānāmatapaccayattā vā amatā. Esa dhammo sanantanoti yā ayaṃ saccavācā nāma, esa
atk-s0508a2:6528_2: porāṇo dhammo cariyā paveṇi. Idameva hi porāṇānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ yaṃ te na alikaṃ bhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6528_3: Tenāha – “sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, āhu santo patiṭṭhitā”ti. Tattha sacce patiṭṭhitattā
atk-s0508a2:6528_4: eva attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā, atthe patiṭṭhitattā eva dhamme patiṭṭhitā
atk-s0508a2:6528_5: hontīti veditabbā. Saccavisesanameva vā etaṃ. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – sacce patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:6528_6: Kīdise? Atthe ca dhamme ca, yaṃ paresaṃ atthato anapetattā atthaṃ anuparodhakaraṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6528_7: dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ dhammikameva atthaṃ sādhetīti. Imāya gāthāya saccavācāvasena
atk-s0508a2:6528_8: abhitthavi. Khemanti abhayaṃ nirupaddavaṃ. Kena kāraṇenāti ce? Nibbānapattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāya,
atk-s0508a2:6528_9: yasmā kilesanibbānaṃ pāpeti, vaṭṭadukkhassa ca antakiriyāya saṃvaṭṭati, tasmā khemanti
atk-s0508a2:6528_10: attho. Atha vā yaṃ buddho nibbānapattiyā vā dukkhassantakiriyāya vāti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6528_11: atthāya khemamaggappakāsanato khemaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati. Sā ve vācānamuttamāti sā vācā
atk-s0508a2:6528_12: sabbavācānaṃ seṭṭhāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Imāya gāthāya mantāvacanavasena
atk-s0508a2:6529_0: Gambhīrapaññoti tisso gāthā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa pasaṃsanavasena vuttā. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:6529_1: gambhīrapaññoti gambhīresu khandhāyatanādīsu pavattāya nipuṇāya paññāya samannāgatattā
atk-s0508a2:6529_2: gambhīrapañño. Medhāsaṅkhātāya dhammojapaññāya samannāgatattā medhāvī. “Ayaṃ duggatiyā
atk-s0508a2:6529_3: maggo, ayaṃ sugatiyā maggo, ayaṃ nibbānassa maggo”ti evaṃ magge ca amagge ca kovidatāya
atk-s0508a2:6529_4: maggāmaggassa kovido. Mahatiyā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pattāya paññāya vasena
atk-s0508a2:6529_5: mahāpañño. Dhammaṃ deseti bhikkhunanti sammadeva pavattiṃ nivattiṃ vibhāvento bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6529_6: dhammaṃ deseti. Tassā pana desanāya pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “saṃkhittenapī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6530_0: Tattha saṃkhittenapīti “cattārimāni, āvuso, ariyasaccāni. Katamāni cattāri? Dukkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6530_1: ariyasaccaṃ…pe… imāni kho, āvuso, cattāri ariyasaccāni, tasmā tihāvuso, idaṃ dukkhanti
atk-s0508a2:6530_2: yogo karaṇīyo”ti evaṃ saṃkhittenapi deseti. “Katamañcāvuso, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ?
atk-s0508a2:6530_3: Jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā nayena tāneva vibhajanto vitthārenapi bhāsati. Khandhādidesanāsupi
atk-s0508a2:6530_4: eseva nayo. Sālikāyiva nigghosoti yathā madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ sāyitvā pakkhehi vātaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6530_5: datvā madhuraravaṃ nicchārentiyā sālikāya nigghoso, evaṃ therassa dhammaṃ kathentassa
atk-s0508a2:6530_6: madhuro nigghoso hoti. Dhammasenāpatissa hi pittādīnaṃ vasena apalibuddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6530_7: hoti, ayadaṇḍena pahaṭakaṃsathālako viya saddo niccharati. Paṭibhānaṃ udiyyatīti
atk-s0508a2:6530_8: kathetukamyatāya sati samuddato vīciyo viya uparūpari anantaṃ paṭibhānaṃ uṭṭhahati.
atk-s0508a2:6531_0: Tassāti dhammasenāpatissa. Tanti dhammaṃ desentassa. Suṇantīti yaṃ no thero katheti,
atk-s0508a2:6531_1: taṃ no sossāmāti ādarajātā suṇanti. Madhuranti iṭṭhaṃ. Rajanīyenāti kantena. Savanīyenāti
atk-s0508a2:6531_2: kaṇṇasukhena. Vaggunāti maṭṭhena manoharena. Udaggacittāti odagyapītiyā vasena udaggacittā
atk-s0508a2:6531_3: alīnacittā. Muditāti āmoditā pāmojjena samannāgatā. Odhentīti avadahanti aññāya cittaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6532_0: Ajja pannarasetiādikā catasso gāthā pavāraṇāsuttantadesanāya satthāraṃ mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6532_1: nisinnaṃ disvā thomentena vuttā. Tattha pannaraseti yasmiñhi samaye bhagavā pubbārāme
atk-s0508a2:6532_2: nisīdanto sāyanhasamaye sampattaparisāya kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā,
atk-s0508a2:6532_3: udakakoṭṭhake gattāni parisiñcitvā, vatthanivasano ekaṃsaṃ sugatamahācīvaraṃ katvā,
atk-s0508a2:6532_4: migāramātupāsāde majjhimathambhaṃ nissāya paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīditvā, samantato
atk-s0508a2:6532_5: nisinnaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā tadahuposathe pavāraṇādivase nisinno hoti, imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6532_6: pannarasīuposatheti attho. Visuddhiyāti visuddhatthāya visuddhipavāraṇāya. Bhikkhū
atk-s0508a2:6532_7: pañcasatā samāgatāti, pañcasatamattā bhikkhū satthāraṃ parivāretvā nisajjavasena
atk-s0508a2:6532_8: ceva ajjhāsayavasena ca samāgatā. Te ca saṃyojanabandhanacchidāti saṃyojanasaṅkhāte
atk-s0508a2:6532_9: santānassa bandhanabhūte kilese chinditvā ṭhitā. Tato eva anīghā khīṇapunabbhavā
atk-s0508a2:6532_10: isīti kilesadukkhābhāvena nidukkhā khīṇapunabbhavā, asekkhānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esitabhāvena isīti.
atk-s0508a2:6533_1: aṭṭhaṅgike ariyamaggarathe āropetvā veneyyasatte vāheti saṃsārakantārato uttāretīti
atk-s0508a2:6533_2: bhagavā satthavāho. Tenāha brahmā sahampati “uṭṭhehi, vīra, vijitasaṅgāma, satthavāhā”ti,
atk-s0508a2:6533_3: taṃ satthavāhaṃ anuttaraṃ satthāraṃ sāvakā payirupāsanti. Tevijjā maccuhāyinoti evarūpehi
atk-s0508a2:6533_4: sāvakehi parivārito cakkavatti viya rājā amaccaparivārito janapadacārikavasena samantā
atk-s0508a2:6534: Palāpoti tuccho antosārarahito, sīlarahitoti attho. Vande ādiccabandhunanti ādiccabandhuṃ satthāraṃ dasabalaṃ vandāmīti vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6535_0: Parosahassantiādikā catasso gāthā nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6535_1: dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhagavantaṃ thomentena vuttā. Tattha parosahassanti atirekasahassaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6535_2: aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusahassāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Akutobhayanti nibbāne kutocipi bhayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6535_3: natthi. Nibbānaṃ pattassa ca kutocipi bhayaṃ natthīti nibbānaṃ akutobhayaṃ nāma.
atk-s0508a2:6536_0: “Āguṃ na karotī”tiādinā vuttakāraṇehi bhagavā nāgoti vuccatīti nāganāmosi bhagavāti.
atk-s0508a2:6536_1: Isīnaṃ isisattamoti sāvakapaccekabuddhaisīnaṃ uttamo isi, vipassīsammāsambuddhato
atk-s0508a2:6536_2: paṭṭhāya isīnaṃ vā sattamako isi. Mahāmeghovāti cātuddīpikamahāmegho viya hutvā.
atk-s0508a2:6537: Divā vihārāti paṭisallānaṭṭhānato. Sāvako te, mahāvīra, pāde vandati vaṅgīsoti idaṃ thero arahattaṃ patvā attano visesādhigamaṃ pakāsento vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6538_0: Ummaggapathantiādikā catasso gāthā bhagavatā “kiṃ nu te, vaṅgīsa, imā gāthāyo pubbe
atk-s0508a2:6538_1: parivitakkitā, udāhu ṭhānaso cetā paṭibhantī”ti pucchitena ṭhānaso paṭibhantīti dassentena
atk-s0508a2:6538_2: vuttā. Kasmā panevaṃ taṃ bhagavā avoca? Saṅghamajjhe kira kathā udapādi – “vaṅgīsatthero
atk-s0508a2:6538_3: vissaṭṭhagantho neva uddesena, na paripucchāya, na yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a2:6538_4: Gāthaṃ bandhanto vaṇṇapadāni karonto vicaratī”ti. Atha bhagavā “ime bhikkhū vaṅgīsassa
atk-s0508a2:6538_5: paṭibhānasampattiṃ na jānanti, ahamassa paṭibhānasampattiṃ jānāpessāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0508a2:6538_6: “kiṃ nu kho, vaṅgīsā”tiādinā pucchati. Ummaggapathanti anekāni kilesuppajjanapathāni.
atk-s0508a2:6538_7: Vaṭṭappasutapathatāya hi pathanti vuttaṃ. Pabhijja khīlānīti rāgādikhīlāni pañca
atk-s0508a2:6538_8: bhinditvā carasi. Taṃ passathāti evaṃ abhibhuyya ca chinditvā ca carantaṃ buddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6538_9: passatha. Bandhapamuñcakaranti bandhanamocanakaraṃ. Asitanti anissitaṃ. Bhāgaso paṭibhajjāti
atk-s0508a2:6538_10: satipaṭṭhānādikoṭṭhāsato dhammaṃ paṭibhajjanīyaṃ katvā. Pavibhajjātipi pāṭho. Uddesādikoṭṭhāsato
atk-s0508a2:6538_11: pakārena vibhajitvā vibhajitvā dhammaṃ desetīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6539_0: Oghassāti kāmādicaturoghassa. Anekavihitanti satipaṭṭhānādivasena anekavidhaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya
atk-s0508a2:6539_1: vā kammaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena anekappakāraṃ amatāvahaṃ maggaṃ akkhāsi abhāsi. Tasmiñca
atk-s0508a2:6539_2: amate akkhāteti tasmiṃ tena akkhāte amate amatāvahe. Dhammadasāti dhammassa passitāro.
atk-s0508a2:6539_3: Ṭhitā asaṃhīrāti kenaci asaṃhāriyā hutvā patiṭṭhitā. Ativijjhāti ativijjhitvā. Sabbaṭṭhitīnanti
atk-s0508a2:6539_4: sabbesaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ viññāṇaṭṭhitīnaṃ vā. Atikkamamaddasāti atikkamabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6539_5: addasa. Agganti uttamaṃ dhammaṃ. Aggeti vā pāṭho, paṭhamataranti attho. Dasaddhānanti
atk-s0508a2:6539_6: pañcavaggiyānaṃ aggaṃ dhammaṃ, agge vā ādito desayīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6540: Tasmāti yasmā “esa dhammo sudesito”ti jānantena pamādo na kātabbo, tasmā anusikkheti tisso sikkhā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā ca sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a2:6541_0: Buddhānubuddhotiādikā tisso gāthā āyasmato aññātakoṇḍaññattherassa thomanavasena
atk-s0508a2:6541_1: vuttā. Tattha buddhānubuddhoti buddhānaṃ anubuddho. Buddhā hi paṭhamaṃ cattāri saccāni
atk-s0508a2:6541_2: bujjhiṃsu, pacchā thero sabbapaṭhamaṃ, tasmā buddhānubuddhoti. Thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
atk-s0508a2:6541_3: samannāgatattā thero, akuppadhammoti attho. Tibbanikkamoti daḷhavīriyo. Sukhavihārānanti
atk-s0508a2:6541_4: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ. Vivekānanti tiṇṇampi vivekānaṃ. Sabbassa tanti yaṃ sabbasāvakena
atk-s0508a2:6541_5: pattabbaṃ, assa anena taṃ anuppattaṃ. Appamattassa sikkhatoti appamattena hutvā sikkhantena.
atk-s0508a2:6542_0: Tevijjo cetopariyakovidoti chasu abhiññāsu catasso vadati, itarā dve yadipi na vuttā,
atk-s0508a2:6542_1: thero pana chaḷabhiññova. Yasmā theraṃ himavante chaddantadahato āgantvā bhagavati
atk-s0508a2:6542_2: paramanipaccakāraṃ dassetvā, vandantaṃ disvā pasannamānasena bhagavato sammukhā theraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6542_3: abhitthavantena imā gāthā vuttā, tasmā “koṇḍañño buddhadāyādo, pāde vandati satthuno”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6543_0: Nagassa passetiādikā tisso gāthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ sabbeheva arahantehi
atk-s0508a2:6543_1: bhagavati kāḷasilāyaṃ viharante āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittaṃ samanvesanto
atk-s0508a2:6543_2: arahattaphalavimuttiṃ passittha. Taṃ disvā āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavantaṃ there ca abhitthavanto
atk-s0508a2:6543_3: abhāsi. Tattha nagassa passeti isigilipabbatassa passe kāḷasilāyaṃ. Āsīnanti nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6544: Cetasāti attano cetopariyañāṇena. Cittaṃ nesaṃ samanvesanti tesaṃ khīṇāsavabhikkhūnaṃ cittaṃ samanvesanto. Anupariyetīti anukkamena paricchindati.
atk-s0508a2:6545_0: Evaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ “muniṃ dukkhassa pāragu”nti vuttāya satthusampattiyā ceva
atk-s0508a2:6545_1: “tevijjā maccuhāyino”ti vuttāya sāvakasampattiyā cāti sabbehi aṅgehi sampannaṃ samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6545_2: Muninti hi iminā padena monasaṅkhātena ñāṇena satthu anavasesañeyyāvabodho vuttoti
atk-s0508a2:6545_3: anāvaraṇañāṇena dasabalañāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti, tenassa ñāṇasampadaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:6545_4: Dukkhassa pāragunti iminā pahānasampadaṃ. Tadubhayena ca satthu ānubhāvasampadādayo
atk-s0508a2:6545_5: dassitā honti. Tevijjā maccuhāyinoti iminā sāvakānaṃ ñāṇasampattidīpanena ca nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0508a2:6545_6: adhigamadīpanena ca padadvayena satthusāvakasampatti dassitā hoti. Tathā hi yathāvuttamatthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6545_7: pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “muniṃ dukkhassa pāraguṃ. Anekākārasampannaṃ, payirupāsanti gotama”nti
atk-s0508a2:6545_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha anekākārasampannanti anekehi ākārehi sampannaṃ, anekākāraguṇasamannāgatanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6546_0: Cando yathāti gāthā bhagavantaṃ campānagare gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0508a2:6546_1: anekehi ca devanāgasahassehi parivutaṃ attano vaṇṇena ca yasasā ca virocamānaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:6546_2: somanassajātena abhitthavantena vuttā. Tattha cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabheti
atk-s0508a2:6546_3: yathā saradasamaye apagatavalāhake valāhakasadisena aññena ca mahikādinā upakkilesena
atk-s0508a2:6546_4: vimutte ākāse puṇṇacando virocati, vītamalova bhāṇumāti teneva valāhakādiupakkilesavigamena
atk-s0508a2:6546_5: vigatamalo bhāṇumā sūriyo yathā virocati. Evampi, aṅgīrasa, tvanti evaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇajutīhi
atk-s0508a2:6546_6: jutimanta tvampi mahāmuni bhagavā, atirocasi attano yasasā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ atikkamitvā virocasīti.
atk-s0508a2:6547_0: Kāveyyamattātiādikā dasa gāthā arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā satthu
atk-s0508a2:6547_1: attano ca guṇe vibhāventena vuttā. Tattha kāveyyamattāti kāveyyena kabbakaraṇena
atk-s0508a2:6547_2: mattā mānitā sambhāvitā guṇodayaṃ āpannā. Addasāmāti addasimhā.
atk-s0508a2:6548: Addhā no udapajjathāti ratanattayaṃ addhā amhākaṃ upakāratthāya uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:6549_0: Vacananti saccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ. Khandhe āyatanāni ca dhātuyo cāti pañcakkhandhe
atk-s0508a2:6549_1: dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo ca. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne khandhādikathā vattabbā. Sā
atk-s0508a2:6549_2: visuddhimagge vitthāritā evāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Viditvānāti rūpādivibhāgādito
atk-s0508a2:6550: Ye te sāsanakārakāti ye te sattā tathāgatānaṃ sāsanakārakā, tesaṃ bahūnaṃ atthāya vata uppajjanti tathāgatā.
atk-s0508a2:6551_0: Ye niyāmagataddasāti niyāmo eva niyāmagataṃ, ye bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ca sammattaniyāmaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6551_1: addasaṃsu adhigacchiṃsu. Tesaṃ atthāya vata bodhiṃ sammāsambodhiṃ ajjhagamā, muni bhagavāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:6552_0: Sudesitāti veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ saṅkhepato vitthārato ca suṭṭhu desitā. Cakkhumatāti
atk-s0508a2:6552_1: pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumatā. Attahitakāmehi araṇīyāni karaṇīyāni ariyabhāvakarāni,
atk-s0508a2:6552_2: ariyassa vā bhagavato saccānīti ariyasaccāni. Dukkhantiādi tesaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6552_3: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ariyasaccakathā vattabbā, sā sabbākārato visuddhimagge vitthāritāti
atk-s0508a2:6552_4: tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Evamete tathāti ete dukkhādayo ariyasaccadhammā evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6552_5: dukkhādippakārena tathā avitathā anaññathā. Vuttā diṭṭhā me te yathā tathāti yathā
atk-s0508a2:6552_6: satthārā vuttā, tathā mayā diṭṭhā, ariyamaggañāṇena paṭividdhattā evaṃ tesaṃ. Sadattho
atk-s0508a2:6552_7: me anuppatto arahattaṃ mayā sacchikataṃ. Tato ca kataṃ buddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6553: Svāgataṃ vata me āsīti suāgamanaṃ vata me ahosi. Mama buddhassa santiketi mama sambuddhassa bhagavato santike samīpe.
atk-s0508a2:6554: Abhiññāpāramippattoti channampi abhiññānaṃ pāramiṃ, ukkaṃsaṃ adhigato. Iminā hi padena vuttamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “sotadhātu visodhitā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6555_0: Pucchāmi satthārantiādikā dvādasa gāthā attano upajjhāyassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ pucchantena
atk-s0508a2:6555_1: vuttā. Āyasmato nigrodhakappattherassa hi parinibbānakāle āyasmā vaṅgīso asammukhā
atk-s0508a2:6555_2: ahosi. Diṭṭhapubbañca tena tassa hatthakukkuccādi, pubbavāsanāvasena hi tādisañca
atk-s0508a2:6555_3: āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalavādena samudācāro viya khīṇāsavānampi hotiyeva. Tena
atk-s0508a2:6555_4: “parinibbuto nu kho me upajjhāyo, udāhu no”ti uppannaparivitakko satthāraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:6555_5: Tena vuttaṃ – “upajjhāyassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ pucchantena vuttā”ti. Tattha satthāranti
atk-s0508a2:6555_6: diṭṭhadhammikādīhi veneyyānaṃ anusāsakaṃ. Anomapaññanti omaṃ vuccati parittaṃ lāmakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6555_7: Na omapaññaṃ anomapaññaṃ, mahāpaññanti attho. Diṭṭheva dhammeti paccakkhameva, imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0508a2:6555_8: attabhāveti attho. Vicikicchānanti saṃsayānaṃ evarūpānaṃ vā parivitakkānaṃ chettā.
atk-s0508a2:6555_9: Aggāḷaveti aggāḷavacetiyasaṅkhāte vihāre. Ñātoti pākaṭo. Yasassīti lābhasakkārasampanno.
atk-s0508a2:6556_0: Tayā katanti tādise chāyāsampanne nigrodharukkhamūle nisinnattā “nigrodhakappo”ti
atk-s0508a2:6556_1: tayā kataṃ nāmaṃ. Iti so yathā attanā upalakkhitaṃ tathā vadati. Bhagavā pana na
atk-s0508a2:6556_2: nisinnattā eva taṃ tathā ālapati, api ca kho tattha arahattaṃ pattattāpi. Brāhmaṇassāti
atk-s0508a2:6556_3: jātiṃ sandhāya vadati. So kira brāhmaṇamahāsālakulā pabbajito. Namassaṃ acarinti
atk-s0508a2:6557: Daḷhadhammadassīti bhagavantaṃ ālapati. Daḷhadhammañhi nibbānaṃ abhijjanaṭṭhena, tañca bhagavā passi dassesi ca.
atk-s0508a2:6558_0: Sakkātipi bhagavantameva kulanāmena ālapati. Mayampi sabbeti, niravasesaparisaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-s0508a2:6558_1: attānaṃ dassento vadati. Samantacakkhūtipi bhagavantameva sabbaññutaññāṇena ālapati.
atk-s0508a2:6558_2: Samavaṭṭhitāti sammā avaṭṭhitā, ābhogaṃ katvā ṭhitā. Noti amhākaṃ. Savanāyāti imassa
atk-s0508a2:6558_3: pañhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ savanatthāya. Sotāti sotadhātuyā. Tuvaṃ no satthā tvamanuttarosīti
atk-s0508a2:6559_0: Chinda no vicikicchanti vicikicchāpaṭirūpakaṃ taṃ parivitakkaṃ sandhāyāha. Akusalavicikicchāya
atk-s0508a2:6559_1: pana thero nibbicikicchova. Brūhi metanti brūhi me etaṃ. Yaṃ mayā yācitosi “taṃ sāvakaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6559_2: sakka, mayampi sabbe aññātumicchāmā”ti yācitova, taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ parinibbutaṃ vedaya
atk-s0508a2:6559_3: bhūripañña. Majjheva no bhāsā”ti parinibbutaṃ jānitvā mahāpañña bhagavā majjheva
atk-s0508a2:6559_4: amhākaṃ sabbesaṃ bhāsa, yathā sabbe mayaṃ jāneyyāma. Sakkova devāna sahassanettoti,
atk-s0508a2:6559_5: idaṃ pana thutivacanameva. Apicettha ayamadhippāyo – yathā sakko sahassanetto devānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6559_6: majjhe tehi sakkaccaṃ sampaṭicchitavacanaṃ bhāsati, evaṃ amhākaṃ majjhe amhehi sampaṭicchitavacanaṃ bhāsāti.
atk-s0508a2:6560_0: Ye kecīti imampi gāthaṃ bhagavantaṃ thunanto vattukāmataṃ janetuṃ bhaṇati. Tassattho
atk-s0508a2:6560_1: – ye keci abhijjhādayo ganthā, tesaṃ appahāne sati mohavicikicchānaṃ pahānābhāvato
atk-s0508a2:6560_2: mohamaggāti ca, aññāṇapakkhāti ca, vicikicchaṭhānāti ca vuccanti. Sabbe te tathāgataṃ
atk-s0508a2:6560_3: patvā tathāgatassa desanābalena viddhaṃsitā bhavanti, nassanti. Kiṃkāraṇanti? Cakkhuñhi
atk-s0508a2:6560_4: etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ, yasmā tathāgato sabbaganthavidhamanena paññācakkhujananato
atk-s0508a2:6561_0: No ce hi jātūti imampi gāthaṃ thunanto eva vattukāmataṃ janento bhaṇati. Tattha jātūti
atk-s0508a2:6561_1: ekaṃsavacanaṃ. Purisoti bhagavantaṃ sandhāyāha. Jotimantoti paññājotisampannā sāriputtādayo.
atk-s0508a2:6561_2: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadi bhagavā puratthimādibhedo vāto viya abbhaghanaṃ desanāvegena
atk-s0508a2:6561_3: kilese vihaneyya, tato yathā abbhaghananivuto loko tamova hoti ekandhakāro, evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6561_4: sabbopi loko aññāṇanivuto tamova siyā. Ye cāpi ime idāni jotimanto khāyanti sāriputtādayo,
atk-s0508a2:6562_0: Dhīrā cāti imampi gāthaṃ purimanayenevāha. Tassattho – dhīrā ca paṇḍitapurisā, pajjotakarā
atk-s0508a2:6562_1: bhavanti paññāpajjotaṃ uppādenti. Taṃ tasmā ahaṃ taṃ vīra padhānavīriyasamannāgata
atk-s0508a2:6562_2: bhagavā, tatheva maññe dhīro pajjotakarotveva maññāmi. Mayampi vipassinaṃ sabbadhamme
atk-s0508a2:6562_3: yathābhūtaṃ passantaṃ bhagavantaṃ jānantā eva upāgamimhā. Tasmā “parisāsu no āvikarohi
atk-s0508a2:6562_4: kappaṃ parinibbutova yathā nigrodhakappaṃ āvikarohi pakāsehī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6563_0: Khippanti imampi gāthaṃ purimanayeneva āha. Tassattho – bhagavā khippaṃ giraṃ eraya
atk-s0508a2:6563_1: vaggu vagguṃ acirāyamāno vācaṃ bhāsa vaggu manoharaṃ. Haṃsova yathā suvaṇṇahaṃso
atk-s0508a2:6563_2: gocaraṃ pariggaṇhanto jātassaravanasaṇḍaṃ disvā gīvaṃ paggayha pakkhe uddhunitvā
atk-s0508a2:6563_3: haṭṭhatuṭṭho saṇikaṃ ataramāno vagguṃ nikūjati giraṃ nicchāreti, evamevaṃ tvaṃ saṇikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6563_4: nikūja iminā mahāpurisalakkhaṇaññatarena bindussarena suṭṭhu vikappitena abhisaṅkhatena,
atk-s0508a2:6563_5: ete mayaṃ sabbe ujugatā avikkhittamānasā hutvā tava nikūjaṃ suṇomāti.
atk-s0508a2:6564_0: Pahīnajātimaraṇanti, idampi purimanayeneva āha. Tattha na sissatīti aseso, taṃ asesaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6564_1: sotāpannādayo viya kiñci asesetvā pahīnajātimaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Niggayhāti nibandhitvā,
atk-s0508a2:6564_2: dhonanti dhutasabbapāpaṃ. Vadessāmīti kathāpessāmi dhammaṃ. Na kāmakāro hohi puthujjanānanti
atk-s0508a2:6564_3: puthujjanasekkhādīnaṃ tividhānaṃ janānaṃ kāmakāro natthi, te yaṃ icchanti ñātuṃ vā
atk-s0508a2:6564_4: vattuṃ vā, taṃ na sakkonti. Saṅkheyyakāro ca tathāgatānanti tathāgatānaṃ pana vīmaṃsakāro
atk-s0508a2:6564_5: paññāpubbaṅgamakiriyā, te yaṃ icchanti ñātuṃ vā vattuṃ vā, taṃ sakkontiyevāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:6565_0: Idāni taṃ saṅkheyyakāraṃ pakāsento “sampannaveyyākaraṇa”nti gāthamāha. Tassattho
atk-s0508a2:6565_1: – tathā hi tava bhagavā idaṃ samujjupaññassa sabbattha appaṭihatabhāvena ujugatapaññassa
atk-s0508a2:6565_3: abbhuggantvā parinibbāyissati, suppabuddho sakko sattame divase pathaviṃ pavisissatī”ti
atk-s0508a2:6565_4: evamādiṃ samuggahitaṃ sammadeva uggahitaṃ aviparītaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, puna suṭṭhutaraṃ añjaliṃ
atk-s0508a2:6565_5: paṇāmetvā āha. Ayamañjali pacchimo suppaṇāmitoti ayaṃ aparopi añjali suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6565_6: paṇāmito. Mā mohayī jānanti mā no avacanena mohayi, jānanto tassa gatiṃ. Anomapaññāti
atk-s0508a2:6566_0: Paroparanti imaṃ pana gāthaṃ aparenapi pariyāyena amohanameva yācanto āha. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:6566_1: paroparanti lokuttaralokiyavasena sundarāsundaraṃ dūre santike vā. Ariyadhammanti
atk-s0508a2:6566_2: catusaccadhammaṃ. Viditvāti paṭivijjhitvā. Jānanti sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ jānanto. Vācābhikaṅkhāmīti
atk-s0508a2:6566_3: yathā ghammani ghammakāle uṇhābhitatto puriso kilanto tasito vāriṃ, evaṃ te vācaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6566_4: abhikaṅkhāmi. Sutaṃ pavassāti sutasaṅkhātaṃ saddāyatanaṃ pavassa pagghara muñca pavatta.
atk-s0508a2:6566_5: “Sutassa vassā”tipi pāḷi. Vuttapakārassa saddāyatanassa vuṭṭhiṃ vassāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6567_0: Idāni yādisaṃ vācaṃ abhikaṅkhati, taṃ pakāsento “yadatthika”nti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:6567_1: kappāyanoti kappameva pūjāvasena vadati. Yathā vimuttoti “kiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0508a2:6567_2: yathā asekkho, udāhu saupādisesāya yathā sekkho”ti vā pucchati. Sesamettha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0508a2:6568_0: Evaṃ dvādasahi gāthāhi yācito bhagavā taṃ viyākaronto “acchecchī”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:6568_1: acchecchi taṇhaṃ idha nāmarūpe (iti bhagavā) kaṇhassa sotaṃ dīgharattānusayitanti
atk-s0508a2:6568_2: imasmiṃ nāmarūpe kāmataṇhādibhedā taṇhā dīgharattaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena anusayitā kaṇhanāmakassa
atk-s0508a2:6568_3: mārassa sotantipi vuccati. Taṃ kaṇhassa sotamutaṃ dīgharattānusayitaṃ idha nāmarūpe
atk-s0508a2:6568_4: taṇhaṃ kappāyano chindi. Iti bhagavāti idaṃ pana saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ. Atāri jātiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6568_5: maraṇaṃ asesanti so taṃ taṇhaṃ chetvā asesaṃ jātimaraṇaṃ atari anupādisesāya parinibbāyīti
atk-s0508a2:6568_6: dasseti, iccabravi bhagavā pañcaseṭṭhoti āyasmatā vaṅgīsena puṭṭho bhagavā evaṃ avoca
atk-s0508a2:6568_7: pañcahi saddhādīhi indriyehi anaññasādhāraṇehi cakkhūhi vā seṭṭho. Atha vā pañcaseṭṭhoti
atk-s0508a2:6568_8: pañcahi sīlādīhi dhammakkhandhehi, pañcahi vā hetusampadādīhi seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti
atk-s0508a2:6569_0: Evaṃ vutte bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandamānaso āyasmā vaṅgīso “esa sutvā”tiādikā gāthāyo
atk-s0508a2:6569_1: āha. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ na maṃ vañcesīti yasmā parinibbuto, tasmā tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6569_2: icchantaṃ maṃ na vañcesi, na visaṃvādesīti attho. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0508a2:6570_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ yasmā mutyapekho vihāsi, tasmā taṃ sandhāyāha “yathā vādī tathā kārī,
atk-s0508a2:6570_1: ahu buddhassa sāvako”ti. Maccuno jālaṃ tata”nti tebhūmakavaṭṭe vitthataṃ mārassa
atk-s0508a2:6570_2: taṇhājālaṃ. Māyāvinoti bahumāyassa. “Tathā māyāvino”tipi keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ yo
atk-s0508a2:6570_3: anekāhi māyāhi anekakkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. Tassa tathā māyāvinoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:6571_0: Tatiyagāthāya ādinti mūlakāraṇaṃ. Upādānassāti vaṭṭassa. Vaṭṭaṃ daḷhehi kammakilesehi
atk-s0508a2:6571_1: upādātabbaṭṭhena “upādāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tassa upādānassa ādiṃ avijjātaṇhādibhedaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6571_2: ñāṇacakkhunā addasa. Kappo kappiyoti evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati bhagavāti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6571_3: Accagā vatāti atikkanto vata. Maccudheyyanti maccu ettha dhiyyatīti maccudheyyaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6571_4: tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ suduttaraṃ accagā vatāti vedajāto vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6572_0: Idāni satthari attano upajjhāye ca pasannamānaso pasannākāraṃ vibhāvento “taṃ devadeva”nti
atk-s0508a2:6572_1: osānagāthamāha. Tattha taṃ devadevaṃ vandāmīti sammutidevo, upapattidevo, visuddhidevoti
atk-s0508a2:6572_2: tesaṃ sabbesampi devānaṃ uttamadevatāya devadevaṃ dvipaduttama bhagavā taṃ vandāmi.
atk-s0508a2:6572_3: Na kevalaṃ taṃyeva, atha kho tava saccābhisambodhiyā anudhammajātattā anujātaṃ, māravijayena
atk-s0508a2:6572_4: mahāvīriyatāya mahāvīraṃ, āguakaraṇādiatthena nāgaṃ tava ure vāyāmajanitajātitāya
atk-s0508a2:6573_0: Evamete subhūtiādayo vaṅgīsapariyosānā dvisataṃ catusaṭṭhi ca mahātherā idha pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6573_1: ārūḷhā, te sabbe yathā sammāsambuddhassa sāvakabhāvena ekavidhā. Tathā asekkhabhāvena,
atk-s0508a2:6573_3: pannabhāratāya, visaṃyuttatāya, dasasu ariyavāsesu vuṭṭhavāsatāya ca. Tathā hi te
atk-s0508a2:6574_0: Ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampannā, na ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampannāti duvidhā. Tattha
atk-s0508a2:6574_1: aññāsi koṇḍaññappamukhā pañcavaggiyattherā, yasatthero, tassa sahāyabhūtā vimalo
atk-s0508a2:6574_2: subāhu puṇṇaji gavampatīti cattāro, aparepi tassa sahāyabhūtā pañcapaññāsa, tiṃsa
atk-s0508a2:6574_3: bhaddavaggiyā, uruvelakassapappamukhā sahassapurāṇajaṭilā, dve aggasāvakā, tesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6574_4: parivārabhūtā aḍḍhaterasasatā paribbājakā, coro aṅgulimālattheroti sabbe sahassaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6574_5: paññāsādhikāni tīṇi satāni ca honti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0508a2:6577_0: Na kevalañca ete eva, atha kho aññepi bahū santi. Seyyathidaṃ – selo brāhmaṇo, tassa
atk-s0508a2:6577_1: antevāsikabhūtā tisatabrāhmaṇā, mahākappino, tassa parivārabhūtaṃ purisasahassaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6577_3: antevāsikabhūtā ajitādayo soḷasa sahassaparimāṇāti. Evaṃ vuttato aññe na ehibhikkhubhāvena
atk-s0508a2:6577_4: upasampadā, te pana saraṇagamanūpasampadā, ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā, pañhābyākaraṇūpasampadā,
atk-s0508a2:6577_5: ñatticatutthakammūpasampadāti imehi catūhi ākārehi laddhūpasampadā. Ādito hi ehibhikkhubhāvūpagatā
atk-s0508a2:6577_6: therā, tesaṃ bhagavā pabbajjaṃ viya tīhi saraṇagamaneheva upasampadampi anuññāsi,
atk-s0508a2:6578_0: “Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – ‘tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ, paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6578_1: bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesū’ti, evaṃ hi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha
atk-s0508a2:6578_2: te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – ‘yaṃkiñci dhammaṃ suṇissāmi kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ, sabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6578_3: taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karitvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇissāmī’ti,
atk-s0508a2:6578_4: evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – ‘sātasahagatā
atk-s0508a2:6578_5: ca me kāyagatā sati na vijahissatī’ti, evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba”nti.
atk-s0508a2:6579_0: Imassa ovādassa paṭiggahaṇena mahākassapattherassa anuññātaupasampadā, ayaṃ ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā
atk-s0508a2:6579_1: nāma. Yā pubbārāme caṅkamantena bhagavatā “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopāka ‘rūpasaññā’ti
atk-s0508a2:6579_2: vā ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”ntiādinā asubhanissitesu
atk-s0508a2:6579_3: pañhesu pucchitesu bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantena sattavassikena sopākasāmaṇerena “uddhumātakasaññāti
atk-s0508a2:6579_4: vā bhagavā ‘rūpasaññā’ti vā ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”ntiādinā vissajjitesu
atk-s0508a2:6579_5: “iminā sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā ime pañhā byākatā”ti āraddhacittena
atk-s0508a2:6579_6: bhagavatā anuññātaupasampadā. Ayaṃ pañhābyākaraṇūpasampadā nāma. Ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā pākaṭāva.
atk-s0508a2:6580_0: Yathā ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadā, na ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadāti duvidhā, evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6580_1: sammukhāparammukhābhedatopi duvidhā. Ye hi satthu dharamānakāle ariyāya jātiyā jātā,
atk-s0508a2:6580_2: te aññāsikoṇḍaññādayo sammukhasāvakā nāma. Ye pana bhagavato parinibbānato pacchā
atk-s0508a2:6580_3: adhigatavisesā, te satipi satthu dhammasarīrassa paccakkhabhāve satthu sarīrassa
atk-s0508a2:6581: Tathā ubhatobhāgavimuttapaññāvimuttatāvasena, idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatā pana ubhatobhāgavimuttā evāti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ apadāne –
atk-s0508a2:6583_0: Tathā sāpadānānapadānabhedato, yesañhi purimesu sammāsambuddhesu paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakesupi
atk-s0508a2:6583_1: puññakiriyāvasena pavattitaṃ sāvakapāramitāsaṅkhātaṃ atthi apadānaṃ, te sāpadānā,
atk-s0508a2:6583_2: seyyathāpi apadānapāḷiyaṃ āgatā therā. Yesaṃ pana taṃ natthi, te anapadānā.
atk-s0508a2:6584_0: Kiṃ pana sabbena sabbaṃ pubbahetusampattiyā vinā saccābhisambodho sambhavatīti? Na
atk-s0508a2:6584_1: sambhavati. Na hi upanissayasampattirahitassa ariyamaggādhigamo atthi, tassa sudukkaradurabhisambhavasabhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:6584_2: Yathāha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6584_3: vā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ – “yesaṃ pana taṃ natthi, te anapadānā”ti? Nayidamevaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6584_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ “ye sabbena sabbaṃ upanissayasampattirahitā, te anapadānā”ti tādisānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6584_5: idha anadhippetattā. Yesaṃ pana atiukkaṃsagataṃ apadānaṃ natthi, te idha “anapadānā”ti
atk-s0508a2:6584_6: vuttā, na sabbena sabbaṃ upanissayarahitāyeva. Tathā hi ime sattā buddhuppādesu acchariyācinteyyaguṇavibhūtivitthataṃ
atk-s0508a2:6584_7: buddhānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ passantā catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbathāpi pasādāvahattā satthari
atk-s0508a2:6584_8: saddhaṃ paṭilabhanti. Tathā saddhammassavanena, sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattidassanena,
atk-s0508a2:6584_9: kadāci mahābodhisattānaṃ sammāsambodhiyā cittābhinīhāradassanena, tesaṃ santike ovādānusāsanapaṭilābhena
atk-s0508a2:6584_10: ca saddhamme saddhaṃ paṭilabhanti, te tattha paṭiladdhasaddhā yadipi saṃsāre nibbāne
atk-s0508a2:6584_11: ca ādīnavānisaṃse passanti, mahārajakkhatāya pana yogakkhemaṃ anabhisambhunantā antarantarā
atk-s0508a2:6584_12: vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalabījaṃ attano santāne ropentiyeva sappurisūpanissayassa bahūkārabhāvato. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:6591_1: vimokkhādhigamassa upanissayo na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ. Pageva patthanāvasena adhikāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6592_0: Aggasāvakā, mahāsāvakā, pakatisāvakāti tividhā. Tesu āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍañño, vappo,
atk-s0508a2:6592_1: bhaddiyo, mahānāmo, assaji, nālako, yaso, vimalo, subāhu, puṇṇaji, gavampati, uruvelakassapo,
atk-s0508a2:6592_2: nadīkassapo, gayākassapo, sāriputto, mahāmoggallāno, mahākassapo, mahākaccāyano,
atk-s0508a2:6592_3: mahākoṭṭhiko, mahākappino, mahācundo, anuruddho, kaṅkhārevato, ānando, nandako, bhagu,
atk-s0508a2:6592_4: nando, kimilo, bhaddiyo, rāhulo, sīvali, upāli, dabbo, upaseno, khadiravaniyarevato,
atk-s0508a2:6592_5: puṇṇo mantāṇiputto, puṇṇo sunāparantako, soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo, soṇo koḷivīso, rādho, subhūti,
atk-s0508a2:6592_6: aṅgulimālo, vakkali, kāḷudāyī, mahāudāyī, pilindavaccho, sobhito, kumārakassapo,
atk-s0508a2:6592_7: raṭṭhapālo, vaṅgīso, sabhiyo, selo, upavāno, meghiyo, sāgato, nāgito, lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo,
atk-s0508a2:6592_8: piṇḍolabhāradvājo, mahāpanthako, cūḷapanthako, bākulo, kuṇḍadhāno, dārucīriyo, yasojo,
atk-s0508a2:6592_9: ajito, tissametteyyo, puṇṇako, mettagū, dhotako, upasivo, nando, hemako, todeyyo,
atk-s0508a2:6592_10: kappo, jatukaṇṇi, bhadrāvudho, udayo, posālo, mogharājā, piṅgiyoti ete asītimahāsāvakā nāma.
atk-s0508a2:6593_0: Kasmā pana te eva therā “mahāsāvakā”ti vuccantīti? Abhinīhārassa mahantabhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:6593_1: Tathā hi dve aggasāvakāpi mahāsāvakesu antogadhā. Te hi sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakappattiyā
atk-s0508a2:6593_3: vuccanti. Itare pana pakatisāvakehi sātisayamahābhinīhārā. Tathā hi te padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:6593_4: bhagavato kāle katapaṇidhānā. Tato eva sātisayaṃ abhiññāsamāpattīsu vasino pabhinnapaṭisambhidā
atk-s0508a2:6593_5: ca. Kāmaṃ sabbepi arahanto sīlavisuddhiādike sampādetvā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu patiṭṭhitacittā
atk-s0508a2:6593_6: satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā anavasesato kilese khepetvā
atk-s0508a2:6593_7: aggaphale patiṭṭhahanti, tathāpi yathā saddhāvimuttato diṭṭhippattassa, paññāvimuttato
atk-s0508a2:6593_8: ca ubhatobhāgavimuttassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāviseso addhā icchito viseso, evaṃ abhinīhāramahantatāpubbayogamahantatāhi
atk-s0508a2:6593_9: attasantāne sātisayaguṇavisesassa nipphāditattā sīlādiguṇehi mahantā sāvakāti mahāsāvakā.
atk-s0508a2:6593_10: Tesuyeva pana ye bodhipakkhiyadhammesu pāmokkhabhāvena dhurabhūtānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisammāsamādhīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6593_12: nirantaraṃ cirakālaṃ samāhitāya sammāpaṭipattiyā yathākkamaṃ paññāya samādhismiñca
atk-s0508a2:6593_13: ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā savisesaṃ sabbaguṇehi aggabhāve ṭhitā. Te sāriputtamoggallānā
atk-s0508a2:6593_14: satipi mahāsāvakatte sāvakapāramiyā matthake sabbasāvakānaṃ aggabhāve ṭhitattā abhinīhāramahantabhāvato,
atk-s0508a2:6593_15: pubbayogamahantabhāvato ca “aggasāvakā”icceva vuccanti. Ye pana ariyasāvakā aggasāvakā
atk-s0508a2:6593_16: viya ca mahāsāvakā viya ca na parimitāva, atha kho anekasatā anekasahassā, te pakatisāvakā.
atk-s0508a2:6593_17: Idha pāḷiyaṃ ārūḷhā pana parimitāva gāthāvasena pariggahitattā. Tathāpi mahāsāvakesupi
atk-s0508a2:6594_0: Evaṃ tividhāpi te animittavimokkhādibhedato tividhā, vimokkhasamadhigamavasenapi
atk-s0508a2:6594_1: tividhā. Tayo hi ime vimokkhā suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkhoti.
atk-s0508a2:6594_2: Te ca vimokkhā suññatādīhi aniccānupassanādīhi tīhi anupassanāhi adhigantabbā. Ādito
atk-s0508a2:6594_3: hi aniccādīsu yena kenaci ākārena vipassanābhiniveso hoti. Yadā pana vuṭṭhānagāminiyā
atk-s0508a2:6594_4: vipassanāya aniccākārato saṅkhāre sammasantiyā maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tadā vipassanā
atk-s0508a2:6594_5: satipi rāganimittādīnaṃ samugghāṭane saṅkhāranimittaṃ pana sā na vissajjetīti nippariyāyena
atk-s0508a2:6594_6: animittanāmaṃ alabhamānā attano maggassa animittanāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotīti. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0508a2:6594_7: abhidhamme animittavimokkho na uddhaṭo, suttante pana rāgādinimittānaṃ samugghāṭena labbhatīti.
atk-s0508a2:6597_0: Ādinā hi vipassanāya animittavimokkhabhāvo anuttarassa animittavimokkhabhāvo ca vutto.
atk-s0508a2:6597_1: Yadā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya dukkhato saṅkhāre sammasantiyā maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6597_2: tadā vipassanā rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ samugghāṭanena appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhatīti appaṇihitavimokkhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6597_3: nāma hoti. Tadanantaro ca maggo appaṇihitavimokkho. Yadā pana vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:6597_4: anattākārena sammasantiyā maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tadā vipassanā attadiṭṭhiyā samugghāṭanena
atk-s0508a2:6597_5: suññatanāmaṃ labhatīti suññatavimokkhaṃ nāma hoti. Tadanantaro ca maggo suññatavimokkho
atk-s0508a2:6597_6: nāma hoti. Imesu aggamaggabhūtesu tīsu vimokkhesu imesaṃ therānaṃ keci animittavimokkhena
atk-s0508a2:6597_7: muttā, keci appaṇihitavimokkhena, keci suññatavimokkhena. Tena vuttaṃ – “animittavimokkhādibhedato
atk-s0508a2:6598_0: Paṭipadāvibhāgena catubbidhā. Catasso hi paṭipadā – dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā,
atk-s0508a2:6598_1: dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññāti.
atk-s0508a2:6598_2: Tattha rūpamukhādīsu vipassanābhinivesesu yo rūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā
atk-s0508a2:6598_3: cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetvā upādārūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti arūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti, rūpārūpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6598_4: pana pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahetuṃ sakkoti, tassa dukkhapaṭipadā
atk-s0508a2:6598_5: nāma hoti, pariggahitarūpārūpassa pana vipassanāparivāse maggapātubhāvadandhatāya
atk-s0508a2:6598_6: dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Yopi rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapento dukkhena
atk-s0508a2:6598_7: kasirena kilamanto vavatthapeti, vavatthapite ca nāmarūpe vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto
atk-s0508a2:6598_8: cirena maggaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti, tassapi dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Aparo
atk-s0508a2:6598_9: nāmarūpampi vavatthapetvā paccaye pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a2:6598_10: Paccaye ca pariggahetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti, evampi
atk-s0508a2:6598_11: dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Aparo paccayepi pariggahetvā lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhanto
atk-s0508a2:6598_12: dukkhena kasirena kilamanto paṭivijjhati, paṭividdhalakkhaṇo ca vipassanāparivāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6598_13: vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti, evampi dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Aparo
atk-s0508a2:6598_14: lakkhaṇānipi paṭivijjhitvā vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannavipassanānikantiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6598_15: pariyādiyamāno dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariyādiyati, nikantiñca pariyādiyitvā
atk-s0508a2:6598_16: vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti, evampi dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā
atk-s0508a2:6598_17: nāma hoti. Yathāvuttāsuyeva paṭipadāsu maggapātubhāvassa khippatāya dukkhapaṭipadā
atk-s0508a2:6598_18: khippābhiññā, tāsaṃ pana paṭipadānaṃ akicchasiddhiyaṃ maggapātubhāvassa dandhatāya
atk-s0508a2:6598_19: khippatāya ca yathākkamaṃ sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā
atk-s0508a2:6598_20: ca veditabbā. Imāsaṃ catassannaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena aggamaggappattiyā therānaṃ catubbidhatā
atk-s0508a2:6598_21: veditabbā. Na hi paṭipadāhi vinā ariyamaggādhigamo atthi. Tathā hi abhidhamme “yasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6598_22: samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ…pe… dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiñña”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a2:6598_23: paṭipadāya saddhiṃyeva ariyamaggo vibhatto, tena vuttaṃ “paṭipadāvibhāgena catubbidhā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6599_0: Indriyādhikavibhāgena pañcavidhā. Satipi nesaṃ saccābhisambodhasāmaññe ekacce therā
atk-s0508a2:6599_1: saddhuttarā, seyyathāpi thero vakkali; ekacce vīriyuttarā, seyyathāpi thero mahāsoṇo,
atk-s0508a2:6599_2: koḷivīso; ekacce satuttarā, seyyathāpi thero sobhito, ekacce samādhuttarā, seyyathāpi
atk-s0508a2:6599_3: thero cūḷapanthako, ekacce paññuttarā, seyyathāpi thero ānando. Tathā hi so gatimantatāya
atk-s0508a2:6599_4: atthakosallādivantatāya ca pasaṃsito, ayañca vibhāgo pubbabhāge labbhamānavisesavasena
atk-s0508a2:6599_5: vutto. Aggamaggakkhaṇe pana sesānampi indriyānaṃ ekasabhāvā icchitāti.
atk-s0508a2:6600_0: Tathā pāramippattā, paṭisambhidāppattā, chaḷabhiññā, tevijjā, sukkhavipassakāti pañcavidhā.
atk-s0508a2:6600_1: Sāvakesu hi ekacce sāvakapāramiyā matthakappattā, yathā taṃ āyasmā sāriputto, āyasmā
atk-s0508a2:6600_2: ca mahāmoggallāno; ekacce atthapaṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā
atk-s0508a2:6600_3: paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imāsaṃ catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ vasena paṭisambhidāppattā;
atk-s0508a2:6600_4: ekacce iddhividhañāṇādīnaṃ abhiññānaṃ vasena chaḷabhiññā; ekacce pubbenivāsañāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6600_5: tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ vasena tevijjā. Ye pana khaṇikasamādhimatte ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6600_6: paṭṭhapetvā adhigataaggamaggā, te ādito antarantarā ca samādhijena jhānaṅgena vipassanābbhantaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6600_7: paṭisandhānānaṃ abhāvā sukkhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā nāma. Ayañca vibhāgo
atk-s0508a2:6600_8: sāvakānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ upaparikkhitvā vutto. Idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatā nattheva sukkhavipassakā. Tenevāha –
atk-s0508a2:6605_0: Saddhādhuro, paññādhuroti duvidhā. Tathā appaṇihitavimutto paññāvimutto cāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6605_1: animittavimuttādivasena ca pariyāyavimuttabhedena sattavidhā. Catūsu hi arūpasamāpattīsu
atk-s0508a2:6605_2: ekamekaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pattā cattāro, nirodhato vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a2:6605_3: arahattaṃ patto cāti pañca, ubhatobhāgavimuttā, saddhādhurapaññādhuravasena dve paññāvimuttāti
atk-s0508a2:6606_0: Dhurapaṭipadāvibhāgena aṭṭhavidhā. Yo hi dukkhapaṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0508a2:6606_1: so saddhādhurapaññādhuravasena duvidhā, tathā sesapaṭipadāsupīti evaṃ dhurapaṭipadāvibhāgena aṭṭhavidhā.
atk-s0508a2:6607: Vimuttibhedena navavidhā. Pañca ubhatobhāgavimuttā, dve paññāvimuttā, paññāvimuttiyaṃ cetovimuttiyañca pāramippattā dve aggasāvakā cāti evaṃ navavidhā.
atk-s0508a2:6608_0: Vimuttivaseneva dasavidhā. Catūsu arūpāvacarajjhānesu ca ekamekaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6608_1: pattā cattāro, sukkhavipassakoti pañca paññāvimuttā, yathāvuttā ca ubhatobhāgavimuttā
atk-s0508a2:6608_2: cāti evaṃ vimuttibhedeneva dasavidhā. Te yathāvuttena dhurabhedena bhijjamānā vīsati
atk-s0508a2:6608_3: honti. Paṭipadābhedena bhijjamānā cattālīsaṃ honti. Puna paṭipadābhedena dhurabhedena
atk-s0508a2:6608_4: ca bhijjamānā asīti honti. Atha te suññatavimuttādivibhāgena bhijjamānā cattālīsādhikā
atk-s0508a2:6608_5: dve satāni honti. Puna indriyādhikabhāvena bhijjamānā dvisatuttaraṃ sahassaṃ hontīti.
atk-s0508a2:6608_6: Evaṃ attano guṇavasena anekabhedavibhattesu maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu ariyasāvakesu ye
atk-s0508a2:6608_7: attano paṭipattipavattiādike ca vibhāventi. Ye “channā me kuṭikā”tiādikā gāthā udānādivasena
atk-s0508a2:6608_8: abhāsiṃsu. Te ca idha gāthāmukhena saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā. Tenāha – “sīhānaṃva nadantānaṃ…pe…
atk-s0508a2:6608_9: phusitvā accutaṃ pada”nti. Evamettha pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā.
